title: Career Mein Safalta Ke 21 Mantra
description: Career mein Successful kaun nahi hona chahta lekin kaise? iska jawab bahut logon ko nahi malum. Lekin ab iska jawab aapko Brian Tracy ki is audiobook mein mil jayega. Jahan unhone career mein successful hone ke 21 mantron ke bare mein bataya hai jin ko sun kar aap apne Career mein aa rahi Problems ko Solve kar paenge.

title: The Painter - Beginning of a Journey
description: भगवन रेहान की ज़िन्दगी से उसके सारे चाहने वाले छीन लेता है। पर रेहान की माँ ने अपनी ऐसी कला उसके लिए विरासत में छोड़ी है जिससे रेहान बनाता है रहसयायी तस्वीरें । कुछ ऐसी तस्वीरें जिसे देखकर सच्चाई और तस्वीर में अंतर न किया जा सके। क्या होगा जब सच हो जाएगी रेहान की बनाई सारी तस्वीरें ?

title: मीना कुमारी ने खंजर से दिया ऑटोग्राफ
description: Amitabh Bachchan Saab ki  bollywwod mein sturggle aur safalata  ke kayi qisse hain. Kiski bah par Meena kumari ne diya khanjar se autograph. Janiye aise hi kuch kahaniya Bollywood ki andar se khas apke liye aur bane rahe KUKUfm par

title: फिल्म अभिनेत्रियों की ख़ूबसूरती का राज़
description: Film Sholay ke dher sare majedar qisse  ke sath is audiobbok mein ap janiye film abhinetriyon ka khubsoorti ka Raz. Aise hi kuch choti choti batein jan lijiye sirf is audiobook par

title: Nation First : हिन्दुस्तान की कसम
description: Covid 19 ke baad ek baar phir Hindustan ki hawa me jahar ghola gaya tha aur ye jahar is baar Atankwad ka wo bhayanak bomb tha jise Bio-War kahte hain. Desh me marne walon ki sankhya 100 hui 1000 hui aur dekhte hi dekhte lakhon mein hone lagi par Government aur experts kuch nahi kar sake. Indian intelligence Officer Abhijeet ko shaq tha ki ye zaroor Hindustan ko dahlane ki ek sajish hai aur ab Aatankwad ki dhamki ke baad ye proof bhi ho gaya. Desh ki Sarkar , Bade Officers aur Junta sannate me aa gayi kyon ki is Bio-War ko rokne ki shart Jammu & Kashmir ke kuch hisse the. Par kahte hai na jahan 1 rasta band hota hai wahin 10 raste bhagwan aur khol deta hai aur wo rasta tha ek saccha deshbhakt Intelligence ka sher Abhijeet. Aakhir kaise jitega  Abhijeet Desh hit ki ye ladai ? Suniye Nation First : हिन्दुस्तान की कसम.

title: Business Ki Fast Growth Ka Secret
description: Ek successful organization bana paana asaan baat nhi hai chaahe aap kitni hi planning ya strategy bana lo aapko apne har naye kadam par ek nayi problem ya uncertainties ka saamna karna pad sakta hai, jisme aapki madad karegi "Business Ki Fast Growth Ka Secret" audiobook jo aapko batayegi ki organization ka system kaise work karta hai, organization ka vision kya hona chahiye aur ek successful organization ka fifth discipline kya hota hai. Agar aapko Gary Keller dwara likhi "The One Thing: The Surprisingly Simple Truth Behind Extraordinary Results" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Kashi
description: Ranjhana movie ke Kundan-Zoya ki love story ho ya masaan movie ke Deepak-Shaalu Ki kahani, Bollywood Kashi ki galiyon mein panapti love stories se to waqif karata hi hai. Lekin kashi mein sirf love stories hi nahi basti. Kashi mein basta hai sukoon, shanti, aastha, aur gyaan. Kehte hain bharat mein aastha aur itihas ka asli rang sirf kashi mein ghula hua hai. Aur isi kashi se milaane ke lie hum layein hain Kuku FM par yeh original series “Kashi". jismein hum apko aastha se bhare kashi aur uski galiyon mein baste rehen sehen ke barein mein apko jankari denge. Is show ko sunkar aap kashi ko na sirf achhe se samajh paoge balki Kashi se man se jud jaoge.

title: Chanakyament
description: Hum Apne Jeevan Ke Har Phase Mein Kuch Naya Karna Chahte Hai Issi Liye Jeevan Ke Har Phase Management compulsory Hai Aur Yeh Audio Chanakya Ke "ArthShashtra" Aur "Purna Chanakyaniti" Par Adharit Hai. Iss Audiobook Mein Vyapari Ko Vyavsaay Ke Related, Shashak Ko Shashak Se Related Aur Family Man Ko Apne Ghar Ke Sambhandh Mein Kuch Na Kuch Mil Hi Jayega Jo Unhe Better Managment Mein Help Kar Sakta Hai

title: Budget 2023: Kya Mehanga, Kya Sasta?
description: 2023 ka BUDGET jaise hi sansad mein pesh hua aap sab ise samjhne mein lag gaye honge ki aakhir sarkar ne kyu, kise aur kitna paisa allot kiya hai? Ab kitna dena hoga income tax? Kin cheezon ke badhenge rate aur kin mein milegi rahat? Inhi sab sawalon ke jawab hain is show “BUDGET 2023: Kya Mehanga, Kya Sasta” mein.

title: तेरी मेरी लव स्टोरी
description:
काजल का कजिन भाई दीप्ति से प्‍यार करता है, लेकिन इनके प्‍यार के बहाने शुरू होती है काजल और समीर की लव स्‍टोरी। पहली नजर में ही समीर, काजल को अपना दिल दे बैठता है। काजल इस बात से अनजान है। छुट्टियां खत्‍म होते ही समीर को वापस जाना पड़ता है और अपने दिल की बात काजल से नहीं कह पाता है। तो क्‍या काजल समीर के प्‍यार को समझ पाएगी? ड्यूटी के नाते समीर काजल से दूर जा चुका है, तो क्‍या दोनों फिर से मिल पाएंगे? यह जानने के लिए आपको सुननी पड़ेगी पूरी कहानी।
Voiceover Artist : Rj Riddhi
Author : महिमा वर्णवाल

title: 8 बजे का ख़ौफ़
description: नाराज फसल देवता ने क्रोधित होकर रामू की गरदन को अपने खौफनाक पंजों से पकड़कर मरोड़ दिया और अगले ही पल रामू के शरीर से रक्‍त की धराएं बह उठी और खच खच कर उसके शरीर को खाने लगा….आखिर कौन है यह फसल देवता? रामू ने ऐसा क्‍या किया कि उसके साथ ही उसके बाकी के दो साथियों को भी फसल देवता जिंदा खा गए? पूरे गांव में रात 8 बजे के बाद कोई नहीं निकलता….क्‍या है इसका रहस्‍य? जानने के लिए सुनें खौफनाक घटनाओं की कहानी ‘सफल’ केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: सजा नहीं इनाम है फांसी
description: पेट की भूख, घरवालों की ज़िम्मेदारी ये सब किसी से भी कुछ भी करवा सकती है। पर सवाल उठता है कि क्या इसकी कोई सीमा होती है? मजबूरियों से जूझते गोविंद ने ऐसा क्या किया की हो गई उसे फांसी! पर हमारा गोविंद तो खुश है? आखिर क्यों ये उसके लिए सज़ा नहीं ईनाम है फांसी! जानने के लिए सुनिए संतोष भट्ट द्वारा लिखी ये कहानी।

title: The Temple Tiger by Jim Corbett
description: Chaliye chalte hai Himalay ke ghane jungle me , Famous British hunter Jim Corbett ke sath , aur sunte hain unke tigers aur jungle ke thrilling experiences unhi ke shabdo mein iss audiobook “Temple Tiger” mein.

title: Gayab Hatyara - Ajay ek Shokiya Jasus
description: शहर में हो रहे हैं नेताओं के कत्ल, पुलिस भी नहीं लगा पा रही है पता कातिलों का। तब याद आती है सबको डिटेक्टिव अजय की। क्या है ये कोई राजनीतिक खेल? या किसी की आपसी रंजिश? क्या हमारा अनाड़ी बना खिलाड़ी अजय कातिल या कातिलों को ढूंढ पाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनें प्रवीण सिंह नेगी द्वारा लिखित ये कहानी गायब हत्यारा

title: सायरा बानो की मोहब्बत की दास्तां
description: Smita Patil ki mante to amitabh bacchan film coolie wale accident se shayad bach jate. Janiye aisa hi kuch naya qissa bollywood ki sirf kukufm par

title: All time hit Heros Part 1
description: Jeetendra extra artist the to zyada kamate the...hero bane to free mein kam kiya. Kya ap jante ho Jeetendra ko V Shantaram ne de thi saja. Kya ap jante hain ki Rajesh Khanna Bollywood ki pehla Superstar hain. Par ek film thi jisme Rajesh Khanna bhi free mein kam kiya tha. Superhero se jude huye aise hi kuch ghatnao ko janiye in audiobook mein.

title: Beauties from 70's
description: Is audiobook mein p janiye bolloywood mein 70s dauran ka hui kuch ghatana ke bare mein. Janiye actress Mumtaz ki higest paid actress honeka kahani . aise hi kuch juicy secrets ka sath kukufm ki peskar hain Beauties from 70s

title: Z - A Great Invention
description: एक साइंटिस्ट ने एडवांस रोबोट बनाते हुए अपनी जान गंवा दी उसी रोबोट के हाथों. सालों बाद उसी की बेटी ने उस रोबोट को दोबारा बनाने का फैसला किया मगर उसे नहीं पता था कि रोबोट के बन जाने पर उसे बहुत से खतरों का सामना करना पड़ेगा. आखिर ऐसा क्या खास था उस रोबोट में. कौन थे वो लोग जो उस रोबोट को सामने नहीं आने देना चाहते थे. उसके पापा की मौत का क्या सच था. क्या सच में उस रोबोट ने उसके पापा की जान ली थी. इन्हीं सब उतार चढ़ाव की कहानी है ""Z" अ ग्रेट इन्वेंशन|

title: Swiggy -The Fastest Unicorn
description: Success kya hai? Failure ke baad milne wala ek naya padhaav. Aur isiki paribhaasha hai yeh naam - Swiggy. Jisne hindustaan ka sabse fastest unicorn bankar itihaas rach diya. Koramangala, Banglore se aur shuruaati dino mein 20 restaurants se aage badhkar, yeh food delivery application aaj urban aur growing India ke har shaqs ke phone mein apni jagah bana baitha hai. Bhook lagi aur Swiggy ki yaad aayi. Dheere-Dheere inhone apni reach ko aur badha diya hai aur ab yeh apne customers ko daily needs ke products bhi pohcha rahe hai. Chaliye jaante hai, ki ek logistics company Bundl ke failure ke baad, Swiggy mein badalkar Inka safar kaisa raha.

title: स्मृति
description: Jeevan ke har pal ko diary me kaid karta raha. Varshon baad us purani si diary ko khol kar padha, yaadein taja ho gai.

title: Seher banega shamshan
description: एक तरफ देश को बचाने वाले होते हैं पर दूसरी तरफ देश को बेच कर उस पे राज करने वाले भी बहुत होते हैं।  ये कहानी उन्ही घिनौने लोगों के सच का पर्दाफ़ाश करने वाली है। क्या होगा जब कॉलेज जाने वाली दो लड़कियाँ आ जाएँगी एक खतरनाक वायरस की चपेट में? और बन जाएँगी एक साइंस एक्सपेरिमेंट की शिकार? क्या ये मासूम लड़कियाँ बचा पाएंगी अपने शहर, अपने देश को ? या शहर बनेगा श्मशान ? सुनें प्रवीण सिंह नेगी द्वारा लिखी ये कहानी आपके अपने Kuku FM पर

title: A Killer Called KASAB
description: 26 November 2008 ko aatankwadiyon ne Mumbai jaise surakshit par hamla kaise kiya? Unke es mission ko hamari sena aur Police ke jawanon ne ko kaise apne control mein kiya? Aur es poori ghatna mein jab baki aatankwadi maare gaye to fir Kasab kaise zinda pakda gaya? Jaaniye Kasab aur es aatanki hamle ka poora sach.

title: Article 370
description: 5 August 2019 ka Din, Aisa Kya Hua Iss Tarikh Mein Ke Yeh Ek History Ka Chapter Ban Gya?  Poore Desh Mein Do Kheme Ban Gye Kuch Favour Mein Toh Kuch Against Mein , Kisi Ne Iska Khulla Virodh Kiya Toh Kahi Iske Samarthan Mein Naarebaazi Hui, Politicians Ne Isse Apne  - Apne Hisab Se Janata Ko Samjhaya Par Article 370 Ko Lekr Asal Sacchai Kya Hai ? Kyu Joda Gya Yeh Article Samvidhan Mein?  Kya Hai Iss Ek Article Se Judi Controversy? Jaanenge Detail Mein Humari Iss Audio Series Mein ,Taki Aap Tak Aaye Poora Sach.

title: Bimariyan Harengi
description: Bimariyan insaan ko sabse zyada haani pahuchaati hai. Yaha haani mann ki bhi hoti hai aur tann ki bhi. Insaan saari moh maaya ko tyaagkar sirf yehi manata hai ki uska sharir dobara swastha ho jaaye, bhale hi iske liye usse koi bhi keemat kyun na chukani padhe. Toh sabse badi daulat kya hui - humara swaasthya aur humara shareer. Is audio book mein jaaniye apne shareer ke dwaara aap kaise hara sakte hai khatarnaak bimariyon ko. By Dr. Abrar Multani!

title: Tere Mere Darmiyaan
description: Corporate world ka shark Rishabh Bajaj masoom si Ishika Deewan se roz raat le raha hai apni pregnant wife ke murder ka badla. Rishabh ke hath mein hai Ishika ke papa ki zindagi. Aur wo har halat mein Ishika se apna baccha wapas lena chahta hai . Kya Rishabh apna badla poora karne ke liye lega kisi Contract Marriage ka sahara? Kya Ishika degi Rishbah ke bacche ko janam? Ya khatam ho jayega Deewan parivaar? Kya Ishika ne sach mein kiya tha ek pregnant aurat ka murder?

title: How To Avoid Loss And Earn Consistently In The Stock Market
description: Kya Aap bhi Stock Market mein paisa invest kar return kamana chahte hain par aisa ho nahin pa raha hai? Kya Aapne bhi stocks market se related kai books padhin par wo aapke kaam nahi aa rahe? Agar haan, to ye audiobook jaroor suniye. Is khaas audiobook mein bahut hi easy language mein stock market se profit kamane ke tarike bataye gaye hain. Ise sun kar aap stock market se consistently earn karenge aur loss se hamesha bache rahenge. "The Little Book that still beats the Market" jaisi book aapko pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Mansarovar - Aatmaram
description: Munshi Premchand ne aatm-mukti aur aatm-samman ke muddon ko prastut karte hue likhi ek novel "Mansarovar Aatmaram". Is kahani mein ek samaj se pare khud ko dhundhne wale Aatmaram ki khoj aur unki manovaigyanik yatra ko bataya gaya hai. Is upanyas mein samajik bhedbhav aur manviya sukh ke aham sawalon par bhi vichar kiya gaya hai.

title: The Secret Couple
description: Film industry ke naami actor-director Anudit aur abhi abhi industry mein pair jamati Supriya saalon se ek dusre ko chahte hain. Phir bhi kyon hai in dono ka rishta duniya ke liye ek secret? Kya baar baar milane bichadne ke baad ye secret couple kar paaega ek dusre se akhiri baar apne pyaar ka izhaar? Janane ke liye sune kahani 'The Secret Couple'

title: India’s Five Year Plans
description: India mein Azadi ke baad Government ke samne bahut sare challenges the jaise Gareebi, Berojgari, Anpadhta, Rehne ke liye ghar, Food aur bhi bahut kuch, Inhe suljhane ke liye Planning Commission ke andar Five Year Plans banaye gaye jisne India ki Economy ko grow karane mein bahut help kiya. Is Audio Series ke Zariye hum un sare Five Year Plans ke bare mein baat karenge jo abhi tak ban chuke hai, sath hi sath unka kya result hua aur Indian economy mein changes aaye detail mein janenge.

title: NCERT Class 11th Geography Part 2
description: Yeh Class 11th ki NCERT Geography book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Physiography, Climate, Natural Hazards and disasters jaise topics ko achhe se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Fidel Castro
description: Fidel Castro ! Cuba ki kranti ka leader. Fidel Castro ! Cuba mein nayi chetna lane wala leader . Aur bhi bahut sare introduction hain Fidel ke. V. K. Singh Ji ki likhi is kamal ki audiobook mein hum aapko Fidel ke har rang se rubaru karwane ja rahe hain. Batayenge Fidel ka bachpan jisne unhe ek revolutionary banaya. Batayenge ki kaise Fidel ne apni sena banayi. Kaise logon ka bharosa jeeta aur kaise Cuba ko vikas ki nayi disha di. Har kahani se uthega parda is khas show "Fidel Castro" mein .

title: How To Boost Your Self Confidence
description: Kuch Log Academics Mein Toh Ustaad Hote Hain Lekin Jab Baat Aati Hai Job Interview Ki Toh Wahan Wo Low Self Confidence Ke Chalte Fail Ho Jate Hain Similarly Kuch Log Zindagi Bhar Apne Pyar Ka Izhaar Nahi Kar Pate, Khud Ko Sahi Tarah Se Express Nhi Kar Pate Lekin Dusri Taraf Hum Dekhte Hain Kuch Log Na Hi Academics Mein Bahut Acche Hote Hain, Na Hi Unmein Koi Dusra Talent Hota Hai Lekin Fir Bhi Unka Self Confidence Dekh Kar Aisa Lagta Hai Ki Jaise Ye Log Duniya Hi Jeete Lenge. Toh Chaliye Jante Hain Ki Aakhir Kaise Aap Bhi Aisa Hi Duniya Jeet Lene Wala Self Confidence Hasil Kar Sakte Hain.

title: History Of Amazon Rainforest
description: Kya aapne aise Forest ke baare me suna hai jo 9 deshon se hokar Gujarta hai Jangal ka kareeb 60% hissa Brazil, 30% hissa Paru, 10% hissa Colambia aur baaki ka hissa Bolivia, Ecuador, French Guiana, Guyana, Suriname aur Venezuela me faila huwa hai. Hum baat kar rahe hain Amazon Rainforest ki is forest ko mystery forest bhe kehte hain. Is Audio Show me hum aapko Amazon Rainforest ki har choti badi information ke baare me jankari denge aur bataenge ki aakhir kaise itne bade Forest ka naam Amazon Rainforest pada.

title: Ek Vichar Jo Aapki Zindagi Badal De
description: Apne aap se pucho ki aapke brain ki limit kya hai? Agar koi limit hai toh usse break kijiye. Joh Mangoge wo milega, iss kahawat ko kaise sach karna hai? aur Limitless hoke jeene ka gurumantra kya hai? aaiye suntte hai iss audiobok mein

title: Steve Jobs - Nayi Soch ka Genius | Writer - Mamta Jha
description: Steve Jobs 20th century ka ek ascharya byaktitwa hain. Jinki Pratibha sare biswa ko ek nayi daur mein samil kiya tha. Computer aur mobile se judi hui unki innovation aur nayi technologies ka sthapan aj bhii charchit hoti hain. Janiye aise hi ek  byaktitwa ke bare bistar mein KUKUfm ki is audioobook mein .

title: Main Pakistan Mein Bharat Ka Jasoos Tha
description: Bharat azad hua aur fir bani iski security agency RAW, jisne duniya bhar mein apne jasoos failaye taki bharat ko aage aane wale khatron se bachaya ja sake. Aise hi ek jasoos the "Mohanlal Bhaskar", jinhe RAW ne 60s aur 70s ke dashak mein Pakistan ke Atomic Programme ki jasoosi ke liye Pakistan bheja. Aur ek dusre Jasoos ki wajah se vo pakde gaye aur fir chala mukadma. Kya hai Poori kahani batayenge is Audio book "Main Pakistan Mein Bharat Ka Jasoos Tha" mein.

title: Hindi Sahitya ka Samagra Itihas
description: Hindi bhasha aur hindi kavita ka rutba duniya mein bahut bada hai. Adikaal se lekar Aadhunik yug tak Sahitya ne bharatiye sanskriti ko bhavnayon se aandolano tak kayam rakhne mein bada role nibhaya hai. Is kitaab mein apko milega Adikaal se lekar Adhunik kaal tak Hindi Sahitya ka Safar, kahan kahan se hota hua kaun kaun se pattharon se takraya, kahan kahan se isme dharayein judi, kahan se dharayein alag hui aur agar aap Sahitya ke thode bhi shaukeen hai to yeh kitaab aap ke liye hai. Suniye "Hindi Sahitya ka Samgra Itihaas" Sirf KukuFM par.

title: The Secrets Of Successful People
description: Hum sab ko life se ek hi cheez chahiye - Success yani safalta. Par hum success ko hasil kaise karein ? Yeh sawal humesha hota hai aur aapke yahi sawal ka jawab milega aapko iss audio book mein. Isme hum un tariko ke baare mein janenge jo hume safalta ke nazdik laa sakti hai

title: अदृश्य सोना, एक रहस्य
description: पंडित जी को रोज अजीब-अजीब तरह के सपने आते हैं और ये सपने उन्‍हें सोने नहीं देते...आखिर क्‍या है इन सपनों का रहस्‍य?

title: शेंकी की अम्बा
description: Shanky aur Amba ke mata-pita bachpan me hi gujar jate hain aur kismat se dono ki mulaqat hoti hai. Shanky pehli nazar me hi Amba ko pasand karne lagta hai lekin Amba ka gujra hua kal use nayi subah ki ijajat nahin deti. Amba gundo ki tarah rehti hai wahin Shanky ek seedha-saral, hansmukh aur smart ladka hai. Kya Amba ke jeevan me subah hogi? Kya Shankt apne pyar ko pane me kamyab hoga?

title: General Magic : Company which changed Tech Forever
description: Duniya ke first touchscreen smartphone ka vision 1990 me he tayyar ho gaya tha, Apple company ke secret department "Paradigm Project" ek alag company banai jiska naam tha "GENERAL MAGIC". chaliye jante hai ek aisi company jisme Apple ke sare Legend employees the aur jinhone internet ke time se pehle he wireless touch screen smartphones , USB ,software , modems , touch screens , micro ICs banai thi par fir bankrupt ho gayi, lekin duniya ko aise employees aur leader diye jinhone world ki techology industry ko humesha ke liye change kar diya.

title: Banking and Stock Market Literacy
description: Doston, kya aapko pata hai 100 main se 80 log newspaper main economy ka page skip karte hain? Reason yeh ki uski bhasha unhe samjh hi nahi aati. Market main aaj itni girawat, NSE main ek aur company add hui vagera vagera. Logon ko pata hi nahi hai basic si cheezein jo ki base hai market aur banking sector ka. To agar aap bhi market aur banking illiteracy se jujh rahe hain to ghabrayein nahi KUKU FM ki yeh exclusive audio series bani hai aapko banking aur market se judi har choti badi information dene ke liye. To bina deri kiye sabse pehele suniye yeh knowledgeable series aur uske baad deep dive kijiye finance ki baaki books main jaise Rich Dad Poor Dad aur gain kijiye 360 degree of knowledge only on KUKU FM. Agar aapko "The Little Book that still beats the Market" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: History of Navratri & Durga Puja
description: India apne culture aur festivals ke liye puri duniya mein jana jata hai. Navratri ke aagman se jo har gali-kuche mein dandiya aur Maa Durga ki jai jaikar ki gunj uthti hai, wo har kisi ko utsah se bhar deti hai! Magar kya itihas hai jo Durga maa ko inhi 9 dino mein puja jaata hai? Aur in 9 dino mein dandiya-garba ka kya mahatva hai? Jaane Navratri aur Kolkata ke mashoor Durga Puja ki kahani is show mein!

title: NCERT Class 12th History Part-1
description: Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT History Part-1 book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap "Early States and Economies, "Early Societies", "Cultural Development" jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Vishwa Itihas Ki Bhumika
description: Aakhir ye duniya kitni purani hai? Shayad hazaron lakhon saal aur naa jaane in hazaron salon mein is duniya mein kitne badlav aaye, par aakhir in sab ki shuruat kaise hui? Kahan se shuruat hui manav jaati ki? Dharm ki? Kaise shuruat hui Sabhyataon ki? Aur kaha se shuru huwa Islam ka uday? Kya hai is Vishwa Itihas ki Bhumika? Aur aakhir kisne rakhi iski neev janne ke liye suniye Vishwa Itihas ki bhumika ki ye Audio Book.

title: Ek Rahasyamai Duniya
description: Ek Aisi Rahasyamai Duniya Jahaa'n Har Taraf Bicha Hai Tilism Ka Jaal. Zameen Se Aasman Tak Phaili Hain Divya Shaktiyaa'n. Chaar Dost Achanak Se Insaani Duniya Se Jaadui Duniya Me Qaid Ho Jaate Hain Aur Phir Shuru Hoti Hai Maanav Aur Tilismi Rooho'n Ki Jaddojahad. Suryamani Ko Paane Ke Liye Mahashaktiyon Ke Beech Hogi Bhidant. Kaun Kar Raha Hai Is Nayi Duniya Par Raaz? Chaar Insaani Rooho'n Ko Kaise Milegi Aazadi Aur Kaisi Hai Ye Jaadui Duniya? Janne Ke Liye Sunein Ye Kahani.

title: Bhartiya Samvidhan: Ankahi Kahani
description: "SAMVIDHAN" Yani desh ko chalane ka tareeka. Kabhi socha hai aapne ki kitni mehnat aur din-raat chali debates ke baad samane aaya mahan "INDIAN CONSTITUTION". Kaise har field ke experts ne rakhe honge apne sujhav? Aur kya the vo sujhav? Kaise samvidhan sabha ke members ne aapas ke jhagde bhulkar ek sath banaya hoga ise. Sirf isliye taki azadi ke baad ka "BHARAT" ek mahan desh ban sake. Aaiye jaante hain samvidhan sabha ki har kahani ko "BHARTIYA SAMVIDHAN: ANKAHI KAHANI" kitab se.

title: Kaise Karein Bachchon Ka Brain Strong?
description: Kya aap apne bachchon ki achhi grades aur unki learning skills ko achha karne ke liye unhein kaunse tuition ya school mein bheje yeh soch kar pareshan hain? Apni yeh chinta padosi ya rishtedaron ko batane se kuch nahi hoga. In Sab sawalon ke jawab ke liye apko sunna hoga yeh Original Show “Kaise Karein Bachchon Ka Brain Strong”. Jise sunkar aap bachchon ki memory power ko strong karne ki kayi tips jaan jaayenge aur unko apply karke apne bachchon ke brain ko strong bana paayenge.

title: बेगुनाह गुनेहगार
description: Suhani duniya ke dikhave, jhoothe jhaanse, chhal in sab bhaavon se anjaan hai. Wo apne paarivarik rishton me apnapan chahti hai lekin use har jagah chhala jata hai. Ladki Hona yani ki use chahe koi bhi chhal sakta hai. Lekin fir bhi Suhani haar nahi manti. Antim sans tak ladti hai. In tathyon ko bayaan karti hai yah kahani.

title: Raaz Kabhi Marta Nahi
description: क्या होगा जब एक के बाद पहाड़ों में दो बुर्जुगों की मौत हो जाती है ? क्या उनके बीच के सम्बन्ध है उनके मरने का कारण ? या फिर कोई गहरा राज़ है जो "मौत का खेल" के भारत भूषण सुलझाएंगे? जानने के लिए सुने राज़ कभी मरते नहीं।

title: God of OZ
description: क्या हो अगर हम सभी सो रहे हो? जो हमारी जिंदगी में हो रहा है वो सब एक झूठ हो एक सपना हो। मान लो हम सभी एक फैक्ट्री में सो रहे हो और उस फैक्टरी को एक बच्चा चलाता हो? क्या हो अगर आप उस फैक्ट्री में उठ जाए और आपको पता चले कि हम सबका कोई भगवान नही । बल्कि हम तो फैक्ट्री के एक product है जो कि एक बच्चे के हाँथ में है। क्या हो जानकर की एक बच्चा ही भगवान है। क्या है इस दुनिया की फैक्ट्री का राज़? जानने के लिए सुनिए God of OZ.

title: The Tragic Story Of Bahadur Shah Zafar 2
description: Ek samay tha jab bharat pe mughalon ka raaj tha par aisa kya hua jo mughalon ka raaj bharat mein khatam hota chala gaya? Is Original Show mein  bharat ke last mughal Bahadurshah Zafar 2 ki kahaani aur  mughalon ki kahani ka The End kaise hua aur Britishers ka raaj kaise shuru hua yeh sab kuch aapko janne ko milega aur saath hi aap bharat ke itihas ko aur bhi kareeb se jaan paayenge.

title: Bicchoo ka Khel
description: अखिल उर्फ़ ‘बिच्छू’ के फ़ादर को एक झूठे मर्डर के इल्ज़ाम में फाँसी हो जाती है । अखिल को पता चलता है कि उनकी मौत के लिये एक क्रिमिनल लॉयर ज़िम्मेदार है ।  और तब अखिल अपने फ़ादर की मौत का बदला लेने के लिये उस क्रिमिनल लॉयर के मर्डर की ऐसी ज़बरदस्त प्लानिंग बनाता है, जो बन जाता है "बिच्छू का खेल!" बिच्छू का खेल- वह सुपरहिट उपन्यास, जिस पर इसी नाम से वेब सीरीज़ भी बनी। अब सुनें ये उपन्यास आपके अपने Kuku FM पर।

title: Ishq Ya Junoon
description: Is Junooni Ishq me Nivedita us raat ko anjane me hui galti ki saza abhi tak bhugat rahi thi. Wahin Advik us raat ka badla Nivedita se har rooz le raha tha , Us anjaan raat ki galti ko har roz dohra kar. Vo raat aur uske baad ki har raat un dono ko aur bhi kareeb lati ja rahi thi. Kya hoga jab Advik ko hone lagega Nivedita se uske pyar ka ehsaas ? Kya uske badle ki aag me wo kabhi is pyar ke  ehsaas ko pahchaan payega ? Janne ke liye abhi sunein poori kahani “Ishq ya Junoon” !

title: Behind Closed Doors: Rajneeti Aur Apradh
description: Kya aapko pata hai ki hamare Desh ki parliament mein 43% aise leaders chun kar aaye hain jin par criminal cases hai? Kya mystery hai es baat ke peeche ki accha insan election haar jata hai aur koi criminal jeet jaata hai? Kyon aisa hota hai ki India ke adhiktar leaders ko apne liye bahubaliyon ke ek gang ki zaroorat hoti hai? Aam Aadmi din raat kaam kar ke bhi apne bacche ki education ke liye loan lene par majboor hota hai. Wahin ek leader ki family kai generation tak ameeron wala lifestyle kaise maintain kar leti hai? Kahan se aate hain itne paise? In sabhi sawalon ke jawab aapko is khaas Original-Show mein milenge. Saath hi es show mein hum uthayenge un rahasyon se parda jo Politics ko Crime se jodti hai.

title: Jeevan ki Door (Dara, Mohobbat or Dosti ki Anokhi Dastan)
description: गांव का एक गरीब बच्‍चा राम जिसके परिवार में केवल उसकी दादी है...उसके माता-पिता कौन है..कहां हैं...ये कोई नहीं जानता! सालों बाद एक डॉ.कपल आते हैं, जो उसे अपना बच्‍चा बताते हैं और उसे दिल्‍ली ले आते हैं! क्‍या सच में वे उसके माता-पिता हैं? कहीं राम का बचपन गलत हाथों में तो नहीं चला गया? सालों बाद फिर राम अपने अतीत की सच्‍चाई को ढूंढता हुआ वापस गांव आता है। जहां उसकी मुलाकात कई अजनबियों से होती है। कौन हैं ये अजनबी? क्‍या राम के अतीत का हिस्‍सा हैं या उससे भी बढ़कर? प्‍यार और रिश्‍तों के ताने-बाने से बुनी सुनें कहानी जीवन की डोर!

title: Real Estate vs Stocks: Which is better for you?
description: Padhai aur acchi Naukri ke baad life ka agla important part hai savings. Aur agar savings se bhi kamai hoti rahe? tab toh phir life Set hai. Jo ki bilkul aasani se ho sakta hai, bas samajhdaari ke sath savings ko invest karne ki zaroorat hai. Ab waise toh aajkal investment ke bahut saare options hain jinmein real estate aur stock market sabse zyada popular hai. Lekin in dono mein se bhi real estate mein invest karein hai ya stock market mein? Kismein hai kam risk aur zyada profit? Janne ke liye suniye KUKU FM ka ye Original Show.

title: एक अरबपति से मोहब्बत
description: वर्षा और अनूप सिंघानिया कॉलेज में जूनियर-सीनियर थे लेकिन दिल की दुनिया में दोनों एक साथ सफर कर रहे थे। बात आगे कौन बढ़ाए इसी कशमकश में दोनों पास होकर भी दूर थे। तो क्‍या दोनों एक हो पाएंगे? कोई है, जो दोनों के बीच दूरियों की दीवार खड़ी करना चाहता है...कौन है वह? कॉलेज में नोक-झोक और रोमांस की अनोखी कहानी ‘एक अरबपति से मोहब्‍बत ’ सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: दस्तक प्यार की
description: मीरा सीधी, सरल और मेहनती लड़की है, जो बी.ए के फाइनल ईयर में है। मीरा को बार-बार एक सपना आता है और उस सपने के बाद वो बेहद परेशान हो जाती है। आखिर क्‍या होता है उस सपने में?  बाद में मीरा को सपने का सच और वजह पता चलता है और वह किसी के प्यार की मदद करती है और उसे अपना सच्चा प्यार भी मिलता है जो उसकी जिंदगी के हर खालीपन को दूर कर उसके जीवन में खुशियों के रंग भर देता है ।

title: Finances ko Control karne ke Tarike
description: Paisa kamana sabhi jante hai, lekin us paise ko kaise sambhala jaaye ya use kaise bachaya jaaye ye ek skill hai. Kehte hai jis kisi ne bhi is skill mein maharath haasil kar li, usne apne finances ko puri tarah control karna sikh liya. Lekin agar aap is qala se anjaan hai aur apne finances ko lekar aksar 50-50 ki situation mein phans jaate hai, to humari ye audiobook aapke liye hi hai. Ise sunne ke baad aap bhi na sirf paisa kamana, balki use bachana bhi sikh jayenge. Aaiye aapko is qala mein nikhaarein!

title: Kaisa Ye Pyaar Hai
description: Aadri ki duniya mein emotions aur pyaar ke liye koi jagah nahi hai. Papa ke kehne par India aata hai, Kuch dino ke liye lekin Shija se milne ke baad uski duniya badal jaati hai. Pyaar ki feelings se Aadri Aur Shija dono anjaan hai aur aadri wapas USA chala jata hai. Dooriyaan dono ko unke pyaar ka ahsas karati hai. To kya yai pyaar pura hoga? Janane ke liye sune puri kahani.

title: न जाने कब
description:
प्‍यार जीवन का सबसे खुशनुमा एहसास है, जो जीवन की दशा और दिशा दोनों ही बदल देता है। यह एहसास सख्‍त दिखनेवाला आभास और चुलबुली खनक को भी स्‍कूल के समय में होता है। लेकिन दोनों ही अपने जज्‍बात जाहिर नहीं कर पाते हैं। कॉलेज खत्‍म हो जाता है और दोनों के रास्‍ते अलग हो जाते हैं। तो क्‍या अब दोनों कभी मिल पाएंगे? वहीं दूसरी ओर खनक का रिश्‍ता तय होने वाला है... आभास का प्‍यार अधूरा रह जाएगा? सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Voiceover Artist : RJ Simmi
Author : अर्चना ठाकुर 'कनक'

title: 11 Secrets To Find Value Stocks
description: Khoob sare paise kamana kaun nahi chahta hai? Par khoob sare paise kamane ke liye khoob sara mehnat bhi karna padta hai, par kabhi kabhi wo mehnat bhi kam pad jaati hai, isiliye aaj ke waqt mein hum sab ko investment ki knowledge to honi he chahiye taaki hum sahi jagah aur acche stocks mein invest kar ke zayda paisa kama sakein. Isliye hum aapke liye 11 aise secrets lekar aaye hain jo best valuable stock dhundhne main aapki madad karega aur aapki Investment journey ko aasan banayega.

title: Kaise Banein Successful Entrepreneur
description: Har koi accha businessman ya phir businesswoman banna chahta hai. Jo thik bhi hai, paisa kamana aur use badhana sabke bas ki baat hoti bhi nahi hai. Lekin isi dauran sabhi successful log ye bhul jaate hai ki paisa acchi zindagi ki basic zarooraton ko poora karta hai. Kisi ko acchi zindagi jeene ka sabak nahi deta. Uske liye aap mein kuch moral values ka hona zaroori hota hai. Ye audiobook isi intention se banayi gayi hai ki business man ya woman sirf business ke sector mein successful na ho. Balki wo apni society aur apne logon ke liye bhi apne morals se successful ho.

title: 30 Tools To Solve Your Problems
description: Life hai to problems to hongi hi aur inka solution bhi hota hi hai. “To Darne Ka Nahin Boss”. Bas zaroorat hoti hai solution ko sahi time mein dhundhne ki. Jisne ise dhundh liya vahi hai successful. To kya hain aise 30 tools jinki madad se aap apni samsyaon ko door karke life mein aage badh sakte hain aur kaise khud ko ek average insaan se exceptional insaan bana sakte hain. Ye sab batane ke liye hi to ham le aayein ye khas show “30 Tools To Solve Your Problems”.

title: Kabeer ke Management Sootra
description: Kabeer ke Vichaar Aeyse hain ki vo Man ke kone mein Chupe Khyalo ko Bahar nikalkar, Hume Khuli Hawa mein Sans Lekar Khushhaal Jivaan Jine Ki Prerna Dete hain. Kabir Apne In Vicharo mein Karmachariyon ki Maujuda Chunautiyon Aur Sanghrash Ki bhi charcha karte hain. Aur Unko Manage karne ke tarike bhi btate hain. Is Kitaab mein aapko unke Vo sare management Sootra milenge jinke chalte aapki  zindagi behad saral ho jaygi.

title: Kaisi Mohabbat Hai
description:
Simmiji active hai apne search operation Mission Bahurani par. 

Apne tall, rich, handsome, and Delhi ke most eligible bachelor Aamir ke liye uski maa Simmiji dhundh rahi hai dulhaniya. Dimaag ko front seat aur dil ko back seat par rakh kar buisness karne wala Aamir pyaar ki race mein khada hai bahut peeche. Jabki humari Zoya ko chahiye hai apne sapno ka rajkumar Mr. Perfect.  Kya Simmi ji likhengi inke liye  kahaniyon wala pyaar? Janane ke liye sune- Kaisi Mohabbat Hai

title: The Everything Store : Jeff Bezos And The Age Of Amazon
description: Amazon Ki App Toh Aap Sabke Phone Mein Hogi Hi, Aaj Kal Ki Duniya Mein Kiske Pass Waqt Hai Ki Bazaar Ja Kar Saaman Khareede Aise Mein Amazon Se Accha Option Kya Hoga? Sui-Dhaage Se Lekar Gadgets Tak, Is Everything Store Mein Sab Kuch Milta Hai. Magar Kya Aapne Kabhi Socha Hai Ki Ye Mind Blowing Sa Business Shuru Kaise Hua? Iska Idea Kahan Se Aaya Aur Aise Startup Idea Ko Duniya Ka Itna Bada Business Banne Mein Kitna Waqt Lga Aur Kya Kya Challenges Jhelne Pade? Aapke Inhi Sare Sawalon Ke Jawab Milenge Aapko Is Book Summary Mein Jahan Aap Jeff Bezos Ki Poori Journey Se Seekhenge Ki Kaise Apne Sapno Ko Pankh Lgaye Jaate Hain.

title: The Royal Scandal
description: Yeh Kahaani England Ke Angrez James Aur Hyderabad Ke Sayeeda Musalman Parivaar Ki Khair-Un-Nisa Ki Hai. Yahaa’n Ishq Ka Khumar Toh Chadhta Hai Magar Muqammal Nahi Ho Paata! Do Alag Dharmo'n Ke Premi, Dono Ki Umr Alag. Wo Jab Milte Hain, Tab Sara Zamaana Unke Khilaaf Saazishein Rachne Lagta Hai, Rajneeti Hone Lagti Hai. Wo Tootte Hain, Bikharte Hain, Lekin Phir Khade Ho Jaate Hain. Is Prem Kahani Mei'n Maut Bhi Apni Jagah Banaati Hai, Magar Kaise? Kya Ye Dono In Saazisho'n Se Bach Paayein Ya Phir Inka Pyaar Duniya Ki Rasmo-Riwaazo'n Ki Bali Chadh Gaya? Ek Aisi Mohabbat Ki Daastaan Jisne British Bharat Mei Satta Ki Gateesheelta Ko Badal Diya.

title: Money Is In Your Mind
description: Ameer banne aur Paise ko double karne ke liye humein lagta hai ki job ya business karna hi important hai. Magar aisa nahi hai. Paise ko hum apne mindset ke saath bhi double kar sakte hain aur Wealthy ban sakte hain. Agar aap janna chahte hain kaise? to yeh original series aapke liye hi hai. Is Show Ko sunne ke baad aap samajh paayenge ki kaise acchi planning karke aap wealthy ban sakte hain. Chaliye Money Management ki kala ko janna shuru karte hain. Agar aapko "Why We Want You To Be Rich" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Cheekhti Laash
description: इंस्पेक्टर भारत भूषण अपने एक मित्र के साथ अपनी बूढ़ी चाची से मिलने जाते हैं एक बड़े वृद्धाश्रम में।उसे उस वृद्धाश्रम में कुछ अजीब और बुरा अहसास होने का अहसास होता है। मगर वहाँ पहुंचकर उन दोनों के ही कान तब खड़े हो जाते हैं जब वहाँ पर रहने वाली एक दूसरी वृद्ध महिला किसी बच्चे की लाश को जमीन में गड़े होने के बात करती है। उसके कुछ हफ्ते बाद ही भारत भूषण की उस मित्र की चाची की मौत हो जाती है और उसके बाद ही वृद्धाश्रम की ही एक महिला गायब हो जाती है। भारत को अपने चाची की मौत और उस औरत का वृद्धाश्रम से गायब होना सामान्य घटना नही लगती है बल्कि एक बड़ी चाल लगती है।उसकी चाची के पास उस गायब हुई महिला के द्वारा उनको दी गई एक चित्रकारी थी जिसमें एक पुराना बंगला बना हुआ था। भारत ने उस बंगले को पहले भी देखा हुआ है।उस बंगले पर पहुँचकर पता चलता है कि इस बंगले में कई बच्चों की हत्याएं हो चुकी थी और उनकी लाशें उसी घर की जमीन में गाड़ी गई थी।उधर उस वृद्धाश्रम में भी अचानक ही होने लगती है मौतें। भारत के हाथ लगता है अपने चाची का लिखा एक पत्र जिसमें उन्होंने उसको बताया कि वृद्धाश्रम में कुछ तो अजीब घट रहा था।इस रहस्यों से पर्दा उठाते उठाते भारत को पता चलता है कि उन बच्चों का हत्यारा अभी भी है जिंदा और उससे भारत की जान को है खतरा।

title: Smart work se badhaye productivity
description: Chaahe aap remotely kaam kar rahe ho ya office ke cubicle se, apne khud ke business ke liye ya kahi aur...kya aapne bhi ye sochne mein samay bitaya hai ki bina distract hue zyada kaam kaise kar paaye? Kya aapko bhi important projects par focus karna impossible lagta hai? Behtar productivity aur behtar kaam karne ki aadato ki yatra mein aapki madat karne ke liye ye book summary guide banegi

title: Beticket Muzrim Se Arabpati Banne Ki Kahani
description: Uttar Pradesh ke chhote se gaon ka 11 saal ka bachcha I.A.S. afsar banane ka sapna dekhta hai, Jiski Prerna hai jila collector lekin uski yeh raah asaan nahi thi. Rajneeti davpech aur jati aadharit arakshan neetiya kamyabi ki rah mein sabse badi rukavat thi. Aur dusri sabse badi samsya thi, Us ladke ki prem kahani aur uske khilaf badi hi chaturai se ki gai sajish. Aakhir kya thi wah sajish? Kya gaon ka ek garib ladka apne sapno ko pura karne mein kamyab ho payega? Kya uski premkahani jati aur samajik kuritiyon ki bali chadh jayegi? Samaj ki sachchai ko baya karti kahani "Beticket Muzrim Se Arabpati Banne Ki Kahani" Sune KukuFM par.

title: Dhan Nahi To Kadra Nahi | Writer - Sukhendra Kumar Pandey
description: Dhan nahi to kadar nahi is audiobook mein ap janiye., aj ki badlate huye paribesh mein Insaan ki bhabnao koi kadar nahi. Par Dhan hi ekmatra cheez nahi hain  zindagi ke. Is audiobook mein janiye Insaan ki ahmiyat ke barein mein.

title: Wings Of Fire
description: Kya aapko pata hai Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam ka rocket launch fail hone par akhbaar mein unke baare mein kya kya chhapa tha? Ya fir ek chhote se shehar ke maamooli se parivaar se uth kar vo desh ke liye itni badi kraanti kaise kar paaye? Agar nahi to suniye yeh Audiobook "Parwaaz - Wings Of Fire"  Unke dwara likhi Autobiography ka Hindi Anuwaad jise Gulzaar ne apni awaaz aur mosiki se sajaya hai. "Parwaaz - Wings Of FIre" Sirf KukuFM par.

title: You are the Best Wife
description: Aksar pyaar shabd ke sath logon ki ek bahut hi common baat bhi sunai deti hai....Opposites attract! Kyunki jab do logon ko pyaar hota hai to wo apni apni dissimilarity mein bhi apna comfort dhund lete hai. Ye audiobook bhi aise hi do logon ki kahani hai, jinhone, college crush se lekar pati-patni banne tak ka safar tay kiya. Par badkismati se baaki logon ki tarah inke pyaar ko Happy Ending naseeb na ho saki. Ise sunne ke baad aapko bhi ehsaas hoga ki pyaar karna aur pyaar nibhana kya hota hai. To chaliye bina deri ke ise sunna shuru karte hai

title: Read People Like A Book
description: Kya aap bhi apne emotions ke aage haar jate hain? Apne aas paas ke logon par jaldi bharosa kar lete hain aur fir dhokha khate hain? Sochte hain ki aap logon ko kam samjhate hain? To writer "Patrick King" ki likhi kitab "Read People Like a Book" ki ye audiobook aapke liye hi hai jahan aap saamne wale insan ko samajhna aur parakhana seekhenge.

title: The Life and Times of Napoleon Bonaparte
description: Jiska qadd chota, magar khyaati itni badi ki voh France jaise mahaan desh ka pehla Samrat bana. Ek Military commander ke roop mein France ke liye badi se badi jung jeetne wala, apni sena ka manobal, shabdo aur dimaagi daav-pech se harti hui jung ko jeet mein jisne badla voh kehlaaya Napolean Bonaparte. Aadhe se zyada Europe ko jeetkar, french revolution mein bhaagidaar aur kranti ke baad naye France ko military, education aur economy se mazboot karkar Napolean ne apni alag pehchaan banayi. Chaliye samajhte hai - 'Life and Times of Napolean Bonaparte'.

title: Motape se breakup
description: Sabhi umr ke logo ke liye lakshit, ye audiobook bhaartiya logo mein motape ke main karano ke mul siddhanto aur samadhano ka nishkarsh hai. Khaane ke alawa aisi kaunsi chize hai jo aap ka motape se breakup hi nahi hone deti? Jaanenge aisi kai chize isme!

title: NPS: 500 Rs Mein Safest Investment
description: National Pension Scheme har individual ki pehli investment honi chahiye jo usse kisi bhi aur tarah ki investment se pehle start karni chahiye. Humare is show mein aap National Pension Scheme kya hai se lekar NPS me step by step invest kaise karte hain ye saari baatein detail me janenge.

title: Kaala Teeka
description: Divya ki taqdeer bhi uske kaale rang ki tarah hi kaali thi. Divya ne bachpan me hi apne maa baap ko kho diya tha. Lekin property saari hai uske naam pe, isiliye uske khud ke Chacha Chachi ban gaye uske jaan ke dushman! Kya hua aisa ki kaal kothri mein band Divya ke jeevan mein aaya ujaala aur woh ban baithi karodon ki zaydad ki maalkin? Lekin, kya sach mein badal gayi thi uski qismat ya fir thi yeh ek bahut badi saazish?

title: Padosan
description: यह कहानी है एक ऐसी पड़ोसन की जिसने हवस की दुनिया में अलग ही मकाम किया। "अंकिता" गरीब घर से एक शहर में नई नवेली दुल्हन बनके आई ये लड़की।नजाने किस हवस का शिकार हुई कि बस फिर चीजें उथल पुथल ही होती चली गईं। एक वक्त ऐसा भी आया कि घर बार सब जगह से इसे हाथ धोना पड़ा।एक अच्छा खासा बस्ता घर उजड़ गया। लेकिन फिर जब औरत अपनी पर आती है तो क्या कुछ नही कर सकती? तो क्या किया अंकिता ने अपना खोया हुआ संसार वापिस पाने के लिए? क्या वो अपने मंसूबों में कामयाब हो पाई? जानने के लिए सुनिए "पड़ोसन"

title: How To Win Friends and Influence People
description: Ek accha first impression banane ke liye sirf ek smile kaafi hoti hai. Aise hi kahi saare countless principles aapko iss book mein milenge jisse aap ek likable person ban sakte hai aur relationships ko acche se handle kar sakte hai. Dale Carnegie ke dwara likhi gayi iss best selling kitaab ko abhi suniye

title: The 80 Minute MBA
description: Kya aap bhi ek business shuru karna chahte hain ? Lekin apke paas MBA ki padhayi karne layak paise aur waqt nahi hai ? To yeh kitaab aap ke liye hai. The 80 minute MBA mein MBA course ki sabse khaas aur zaroori cheezon ka nichod hai jo apko apni daily life se hi seekhne mil jayengi. Examples ke saath Is kitaab ke authors ne bade hi saleeke se hamare waqton mein business karne ko lekar aam aur khas tippaniyan ki hain. Suniye The 80 Minute MBA exclusively Hindi mein sirf KukuFM par.

title: Designing Destiny
description: Hum is sansaar mein kyu hain? Aur hamari zindagi mein "Niyati" ka kya matlab hai? Kaise banti hai ye? aur kya hum khud iska nirmaan karte hain? Chaliye ek chhote se safar pe nikalte hain is audiobook ke saath jahan aap sunenge Author Kamlesh D. Patel ki likhi kitaab "Niyati ka nirmaan" ko aur janne ki koshish karenge aise hi kuch ahem sawalon ke jawab.

title: The Shortest History of India
description: UPSC mein sabse zyada sawal is desh ki History ke bare mein pucha jata hai. History, Yani ki itihas. Kaun apna itihas nahi janna chahta. Aur jab baat apne desh ki ho tab to sabhi janna chahenge. Kaise hui thi Bharat desh ki shuruwat? Kaise khooj ki thi is desh ki? Kitne Rajaon ne raaj kiya hai is desh par? Aur aakhir kitna purana hai humare India ka Itihas. Janne le liye suniye Shortest History of India ka ye Audio show jiske Author hain John Zubrzycki.

title: Masti- Badmash Company 2
description: Disney Bank lootne ke liye Dadua ki khas aurat Salina ne Masti, uski gang aur baki sab ke sath milkar taiyar kiya hai ek master plan, magar loot se pehle hi shuru ho gayi hai team mein hi jaalsaaji. Sabke liye mushkil hai bank se looti 500 crore ki rakam tak pahunchna. Dadua ke khauf mein Salina kar rahi hai gaddari magar gaddar to aur bhi hain, par kaun? Kaun hai ye Dadua aur kahan hai iska adda? Aakhir kahan gayi loot ki rakam aur kaise ho gaya sab golmal? Kya is case ko suljhane mein lagi police pahunch payegi Badmash Company tak? Aur kaun hoga is Badmash Company ka aakhiri zinda sardar?

title: Reminiscences of a Stock Operator
description: Stock Market Ki Duniya Mein Ek Mashoor Kahavat Hai Ki Bazaar Aapko Sab Sikha Deta Hai. Bear Aur Bull Market Ke Beech Pisne Ke Baad Insaan Trading Aur Paisa Kamana Hi Nahi Balki Patience, Self Control Aur Sahi Choices Lene Jaise Life Lessons Bhi Seekh Jata Hai. Agar Aap Stock Market Mein Bina Galtiyan Kiye Kuch Sikhna Chahte Hain Toh Ye Audiobook Khas Aapke Liye Hi Hai. American Stock Trader Jesse Livermore Ke Experiences Se Sikhiye Stock Market Se Judi Kuch Aeham Baatein Jo Aapke Liye Life Changing Lesson Sabit Ho Sakti Hain.

title: कॉरपोरेट  लव तड़का
description:
एक दिल्ली की लड़की, एक मुंबई के छोरे को दिल दे बैठती है. मुश्किल बस ये है – वे एक दूसरे की प्रतिद्वंद्वी दो कंपनियों में काम करते हैं. फिर जब वे अपनी मस्ती के साथ अपने कारोबार की बातों को मिलाते हैं तो क्या होता है? क्या यह कॉरपोरेट रोमांस चल पाएगा या फिर उनके काम का दबाव उनके प्यार पर भारी पड़ेगा?
writer: मधुलिका रा चौहान
Voiceover Artist : RJ Swati
Script Writer : Madhulika Ra Chauhan

title: Doglapan: The Hard Truth about Life and Start-Ups
description: Shark Tank India ka wo judge jisne apni teekhi baaton se sabko unke baare mein sochne par majboor kar diya tha, aur saath hi poore India mein inke baare mein charcha hone lagi thi, Par inki asal zindagi mein chal rahi thi kuch aur hi kahani, kyu inhe khud ki hi banayi company se dena pada resign aur kya hai BharatPe aur Startup Industry ki asli sachchai? Jaane ke liye suniye Ashneer Grover ke dwara likhi gai ye Audio book “Doglapan: The Hard Truth about Life and Start-ups”.

title: "बिम्बिसार का  खजाना" - The Divine Treasure
description: Professor Bhattacharya ki Maut ke baad unke Khajanon ki Khoj ka sapna poora karne ki Raah pe nikal chuka Nakshatra apne doston ke sath aa fansa hai Bimbsaar ke khajane ki raah par jahan se wapas nikalne ka na to koi raasta hai aur na hi koi clue. Khajanon ke Lootere yani  King scorpion gang ka nishana ban chuki Nakshatra ki poori team na sirf gumraah ho chuki hai balki un sabhi par hai Maut ka saya.  Magar isse bhi bhayanak aur mushqil safar ki shuruwat to tab hoti hai jab khajanon ki hifazat me soya wo Rakshas Minotaur jaag jaata hai. Kaun bachega aur kise milega Bimbsaar ka khajana ? Kya yahi hai safar ka ant ya aage isse bhi bhayanak hogi ye Treasure Hunt Journey ?

title: Tera Suroor
description: Jaha ek taraf Sameera apni tooti shaadi ke dukh se ubar rahi hoti hai, vahi dusri or apni choti beti ko bachaane ke liye uske pita ne dhokhe se Sameera ki doosri shaadi famous business tycoon Rehan Singhaniya se tay kar di hoti hai. Rehan ke handicapped hone ka sach, Sameera ko uske nazdeek jaane se nahi rok paata. Lekin ek raat achanak Sameera ke pregnant hone ka sach sab badal ke rakh deta hai. Aakhir Sameera ke kokh mein pal rahe bacche ka kya hai sach? Kya apna payega Rehan yeh najayaz baccha aur Sameera ka yeh sach? Dhokhe se hui is shaadi ka kya hoga anjaam?

title: Selfie Sex
description: Sex word ka matlab kya hai? Masturbation? Penis? Vagina? Par kya sirf sex inhi sab words se connected hai? Bilkul nahi! Darasal ye humari saalon purani soch hai, jis wajah se hum intimacy se jude words ko bhi sex hi mante hai. Inhi sab chizon ko aur bhi zyada badhava mila hai internet se. Jiska sabse zyada impact hota hai Indian culture pe, jo online dekhi chizon par hi bharosa karne lagte hai. Ye audiobook aapko samjhayegi ki sirf jo internet par dikhta hai, ya jo porns mein hota hai, wahi sex nahi hota. Sex ka connection aur bhi gehra hai. Aaiye is connection ko jaane sirf Kuku FM par!

title: How to be Confident in any Situation
description: How to be Confident in Any Situation : Thoda tricky aur boht yada engaging title hai. Aatmavishwaas, kaha se aata hai? Kyun kuch log bina dare, bina hickichaaye aur bina kisi jhijhak badi se badi sabha ke saamne apne aap ko vyakt kar paate hai. Unhe dekh kar lagta hai, maano unhe self-confidence ki khoobi viraasat mein mili ho. Unke bolne se lekar, chalne ka andaaz aur yaha tak ki body language bhi sirf confidence reflect karti hai. Agar aapkoo lagta hai, ki is confidence ki aapke andar kami hai toh yeh original audiobook aapke us taale ki chaabi. Sune aur samjhe aatmavishwaas se jude har pehlu ko jo aapko is tarah badal degi, jo aapne kabhi nahi socha hoga.

title: The Millionaire Fastlane
description: Acchi naukri karo! Apni salary ka 10% save karo! Fizool kharche mat karo! Paise badhane aur bachane ke naam pe aisi hi baatein to humein sunayi jaati hai. Lekin ye sab millionaire banne ke wo tarike hai jo slowlane se guzarte hai. In purani techniques ko apnane se aap millionaire to banenge lekin kayi saalon baad. Par agar isi kaam ko aap 10X ki speed se karna chahte hai, to uske liye aapko sunni hogi The Millionaire Fastlane ki ye audiobook. Ise sunne ke baad aap apni financial independence mein champion ho jayenge. Aur ameer aur ameer kaise bante hai iska raaz jaan jayenge!

title: How CIA was exposed by Edward Snowden
description: Ex-CIA agent Russia federation ke assylum mein! Sunkar kuch baat jami nahi na. Afterall, yehi toh mystery hai. Edward Snowden, ek naujawaan CIA agent jo apne desh America ke liye honest service dene mein vishwaas rakhta tha. Magar Obama administration ke dauraan unhone apne sarkaar ki kuch aisi khufiyaa magar illegal activities ko trace kiya jise jaankar unke pairo ke neeche se zameen khisak gayi. Unhone khulaasa kiya aur pura vishwa America ki taraf ungli utha raha tha aur sawaalo ke katghare mein tha Snowden. Toh aaiye sunte hai yeh thriller, jo aapko CIA Agent Edward Snowden ke jeevan kaaryakaal se rubaroo karvaayega.

title: How to raise a Successful Child
description: Koi bhi baccha ek baar mein sab kuch nahi seekhta. Use baar baar situation ke hisaab se cheezein seekhani padti hain. Yahi cheezein bacchon ko zindagibhar seekhane mein parents mein patience ki Khas zaroorat hoti hai. Agar parents mein patience ki kami hogi to bahut high possibility hai ki bacche mein bhi patience nahi hoga. Jiska asar uski aane wali zindagi par pad sakta hai. Ek successful bacche ko bada karne ke liye aisi aur bhi kayi baaton ka dhyan maa-baap ko rakhna padta hai, jiski charcha is audiobook mein ki gayi hai. Aaiye is audiobook ko sunein, seekhein aur isse laagu karein.

title: Mystery of 7 Immortals
description: Kaha jata hai ki jab jab is Dharti par paap badhta hai tab tab Bhagwan Vishnu alag alag roop mein is dharti par Avatar lete hain. Hindu pauranik grantho mein Kahin 7 to kahin 8 Immortals ka zikar hota hai Par kahan hain ye Immortals aur Aakhir kya Uddeshya hain inka, agar ye Jeveet hain to kis Roop mein hain. Kya sach mein inhe Kalki ka intazaar hai, In 7 Immortals ke Pratiksha ki kahani ek aisi daastan hai jo Satyug se shuru hokar Kaliyug ke ant tak chalne wali hai Par kya hai inki kahani aur kon hai Kalki, aapke in Saare Sawalon ka jawab milega humare is show "Mystery of 7 Immortals" mein.

title: Secrets of Kailash Parvat
description: Kailash parbat par aajtak aakhir koi kyu nahi chad paya? Kya aaj bhi Bhagwan Shiv wahan niwaas karte hain? Aise bahut sare secrets aur mysteries ko jaane ke liye suniye “Secrets of Kailash Parvat” ka ye Audio show.

title: शौहरत
description: Kaamyabi haasil karne ke liye kis tarah kuch models kisi bhi had tak gir jaati hai, lekin galat raaste par chalkar kab tak khud se nazare mila payengi aise ladkiya? Ye kahani usi modeling ki duniya ki ek ladki ki hai jiska naam hai Akira, ek khubsoorat ladki jo ek mashhur model ban na chahti hai, par uske raaste mein hai kayi pareshaniya. Is kahani mein villain ki kami nahi hai, ek taraf hai ek paagal aashik, jo Akira ko har haal mein haasil karna chahta hai, uske alawa Akira ka dost Suraj, jo ki use pasand karta hai, lekin Akira ka hero toh koi aur hi hota hai. Is kahani mein aapko dekhne ko milega struggle, ek dusre ke prati jalan ki bhaavna, rishto ka maayajaal, pyaar mein pagal hue aashiqo ka alag alag roop, aur shoharat ke chakkar mein apne rishte aur parivar mein kis had tak neeche girkar log khatre mein aa jaate hai, inhi sab cheezo se bharpur kahani hai Shohrat. Kya Akira itni saari saajeesho ka Shikar hone ke baad bhi saphal ko payega? Kya Akiar ko apna pyaar mil jaayega? Sabhi sawaalo ke jawaab pane ki liye aap suniye Shohrat.

title: 9/11 Took Osama Bin Laden's life
description: Ek hi Jhatke mein Puree Duniya  mein Apne Khauf paida karne wala, abtak ka  Sabse khatarnak Atankwadi, Jise intelligence services aur  Special Forces das sal tak dhundhti rahi Lekin uske Khabriyon tak  ka pata bhi nahi laga pai,Us Osama Bin Laden Ki inside Story janne mein agar aapki dilchaspi hai toh ye audiobook sirf aur sirf  aapke liye hi hai. Is Audiobook mein Osama ke Bachpan Se lekar Engineer banne tak ka safar , Fir ek Super intelligent engineer se terrorist banne ke safar aur fir 9/11 ke hamle ko anjaam dekar duniya ka sabse khatarnak terriost banne tak ki har ek kahani hai. Aur Aant mein ye bhi ki kaise America 10 sal ke baad Osama ko Maut ke Ghaat utarne mein Kamyaab ho paya.

title: Just F*cking Do It
description: Agar aap apna best version dekhna chahte hai aur asmaan ki bulandiyon ko chhuna chahte hai, to ye audiobook aapke liye hi hai. Kyunki ise sunne ke baad aapke andar apne success ko 10 guna zyada karne ki power aa jayegi. Ye power aayegi 10 practical steps se jise is audiobook mein in-detail bataya gaya hai. Audiobook mein bataye gaye 10 steps ko follow karne ke baad,  aap na sirf chhota sochna band kar denge,  balki, apni life apni marzi ke mutabik jee payenge. Aaiye in steps ko Just F*cking Do It ki audiobook mein jaane! Agar aapko "The Rudest Book Ever" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Why India Chokes in ICC Tournaments
description: Saal 2013 mein ICC Champions Trophy jeetne ke baad se indian cricket team ek bhi ICC trophy jeetne mein kaamyab nahi ho paayi hai. Aur inmein se kai tournaments mein toh team semifinal aur final se bahar hui hai. Ab iska karan kharab selection hai, coaching hai ya strategy hai, ye sabse bada sawaal hai? Is show mein cricket interviews, stories aur insights ka sahara liya gaya hai. Taki ye samjha jaa sake ki kyun team india ko ICC tournaments mein haarne ki aadat pad gayi hai aur Team par winners se chokers ka tag lagana sahi hai ya nahi.

title: Detective Ajay - Gumnaam Murder
description: Sarpanch Shaitan singh ki dardnaak maut ke baad Shakti Pura gaon me marne wale badhte hi ja rahe hain , Gaon walon me Dayan ka khauf ghar kar gaya hai , Detective Ajay ko ab tak ek bhi saboot nahi mila hai. Aur qatil Ajay ki naak ke neeche se khoon kar ke gayab ho ja raha hai. Is gumnaam qatil ke peeche pada Detective Ajay kya solve kar payega ye case ya Dayan le legi Ajay ki bhi Jaan ?  Sune Abhi

title: IIT se IAS Tak
description: Bihar ka rehne wala Ara ka topper Ankur Thakur, jiska sapna hai IIT. Uske paas fees bharne ke paise nahi they, sirf thi gareebi aur mushkile, fir bhi IIT ki preparation ke liye wo Kota ja pahuncha. Par jab beemari, aur pita ki maut ke karan usey wapas ghar jana pada to wo pahunch gaya Jail. Pyaar, dhokha aur dam todti khwaishon se sangharsh kar raha Ankur kya kar payega apne sapno ko pura? Janne ke liye sune IIT Se IAS TAK: Khwaison Ka Safar. Sirf Kukufm Par.

title: Aarohi-  Ek Pret Katha
description: Shehar me ek ke baad ek qatl ho rhe hain. Marne wale ke shareer par ek bhi chot ke nishaan nahi aur maathe par laal rang ka ajeeb sa sign! Aarohi ke andar ki ek zindagi is qatl-e-aam se ho gyi hai badhawas wahi'n uske andar ki doosri zindagi is vaardat se hai waakif. Ek maasoom si dikhne wali normal aarohi pal bhar me kaise ban gyi ek darawni chudail? Aarohi ke upar har waqt ek saaya hai jiske pass hai kai raaz! Kya hoga jab aarohi ke sapne se nikalkar aaditya aa jaayega uske saamne? Aaditya ki kin shaktiyon se aarohi hai anjaan? Is dehshat me paida hogi ek prem kahani jise sunkar aapke hosh ud jaayenge.

title: Sex Ed- The Love School By Meena Anand
description: Kya aapke man mein bhi sex ko le kar bahut curiosity hai? Kya aap bhi Kamasutra mein aakhir likha kya hai ye janana chahte hai? Kya aapne bhi apna sex education sirf Bollywood movies ke romantic scenes ko dekh kar liya hai? Kya aap daily level par hone wale problems ko suljhana chahte hai? Agar haan to kahani ki tarah le hamari sexologist ki salah.

title: Inform nahi, Influence Kare
description: Hum sochte hai ki hum joh keh rahe hai woh log samjh rahe hai. Hume aise lagta hai ki hum public speaking mein bohot hi accha kar rahe hai aur humare colleagues humaari baaton ko asaani se absorb kar rahe hai. Par asal mein aisa nahi hai. Decker ki di hui kuch trademark methods se aap ek communication roadmap bana sakte hai jisse ki aap inform karne ke badle logon ko influence aur inspire karne lagoge

title: The Rules of Power
description: Successful log powerful hote hai ya Powerful log successful hote hai, in dono sentences mein Power ka hona common hai yani ki Power bahut zaroori hai jo aapki journey ko easy bana deti hai, Aap apne aas-pass reh rahe Powerful logo ko hi dekh lijiye. Is Audio Series mein Power ko hasil kaise kare aur Power ka sahi Istemal kaise karein achhe se samjhaya gaya hai, jo aapko Powerful banne mein bahut help kar sakti hai. To chaliye is safar ka anand lete hai sirf kuku fm ke sath.  Agar aapko 'The 48 Laws of Power' of jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor suniye.

title: Sirf Tum
description: अपने करियर की उड़ान के लिए सोनम पहुंचती है एक नए शहर, नए लोगों के बीच। नंदकिशोर जी का पूरा परिवार सोनम के सरल स्‍वभाव और मिलनसार व्‍यवहार को बेहद पसंद करने लगता है। लेकिन नंदकिशोर जी का बेटा डॉ अमित को बिलकुल नहीं पसंद कि कोई अनजान लड़की उनके घर रहे।  गुस्‍सैल और खडूस अमित, सीधी सरल सोनम को परेशान करने का कोई मौका नहीं छोड़ता है। ये लड़ाई कब तक चलेगी? क्‍या दोनों में दोस्‍ती होगी या सोनम मान लेगी हार?  क्‍या डॉ अमित का दिल गाएगा, तूने मारी एंट्रीया रे दिल में बजी घंटियां रे? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी सिर्फ तुम केवल कुकू एफएम पर

title: Chanakya Aur Jeene Ki Kala
description: Is kitab mein 17 adhyay dwara Chanakya ke kuch siddhant ko aasan bhasha mein samjhaya gaya hai, jo aaj ke samay mein bhi humein ye aasani se samjha sakenge ki samaj mein sahi vyavhar kya hona chahiye, humein jeevan mein kya karna chahiye aur kin baaton se bachna chahiye. Inshort, yeh kitaab har kisi ke liye hai, jo apne aap ko behtar aur successful banana chahta hai. Agar aapko "Chanakya In Daily Life" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Pishach
description: Jaane Maane Kavi, Vicharak Aur Painter Nahi Rahe !  Delhi ki ek society mein unka Katal hota hai ! Kaun kar gaya ek buzurg ka katal ? Kaatil ka kya maksad tha? Aur aakhir kyon katal ke baad kaatil diwaar par khoonn se bade-bade akshron men likh gaya—‘Pishaach’ ? Kya sandesh chhipaa hai ismen ? Sanjeev Paliwal Ji Dwara likhi gayi yeh kitaab ek asli crime par aadharit hai. Aakhir kaun tha vo pishach jisne delhi mein aatank macha diya tha ? Jaan ne ke liye suniye "Pishach" sirf KUKUFM par.

title: Corporate Guru - Narayan Murthy
description: Infosys, aaj iss company ke bare mein kaun nahi janta, jab 1981 mein Narayan Murthy ne apni patni se 10,000 rupay udhaar lekar company ki shuruaat ki thi, tab kisi ne socha bhi nahi tha ki 1999 tak yeh company international level tak pahuch jayegi aur iska pura shrey Narayan Murthy ki imagination aur vision ko jata hai, iske bare mein hum iss audiobook mein janenge

title: Civil Services main Safal Kaise hon
description: Civil services hamare desh main ek bahut jada reputed career option mana jata hai, par iss career main ane kae liye apko kafi tough exams clear karne padte hain. Iss exam ko clear karne kae liye consistent studies kae sath, proper strategy or training ki jaroorat bhi hoti hai, to hamare iss khash peshkash main ham apse share karenge kuch aise secrets or strategies jinse aap bhi inn exams ko kaise clear kiya jae ye jan paenge or Civil services main career bana paenge

title: Godan
description: Ek kahani jo aaj bhi hum sabse man mein basi hai, jiska nayak hai Hori. Hori jo sahukar ke bojh se daba hai, kheti bhi rehan par rakhi hai lekin sab uska shoshan kar rhe hain. Kaise hua Hori ka ant aur fir Godan. sab bataya gaya hai Munsi premchand ke likhe is upanyas "Godan" mein. Jiski Audiobook le aaya hai KUKU Fm.

title: The Power of Self Discipline
description: Kya apko lagta hai apki life mein koi anchor nahi hai ? Koi ek waqt nahi hai khane ka, sona ka ya uthne ka ? Aur us wajah se dimaag zyada khush nahi reh paata ? Aap apna best potential achieve nahi kar pa rahe ? Agar iska jwaab haan hai to yeh kitaab aap ke liye hain. Peter Hollins dwara likhi gayi yeh kitaab aapke har sawal ka jawab degi aur aapko sikhayegi daily life mein chhoti chhoti aadatein badalne se kitna bada change aa sakta hai. To suniye yeh audiobook sirf kukufm par.

title: Drugs, Sex aur Dhokha
description: Bollywood ki sabse badi actress Isha Khanna ko ek fake drug case mei fansane ke baad, Krishna Kapoor apne bete Aryan Kapoor ka badla poora karta hai. Lekin is jhoothe case se Isha ko bachaane ke liye Karan Khanna ek deewar ban kar, Kapoor family aur Shekhar Singh Shekhawat se ladta hai. Kya hoga aage ? Jan'ne ke liye suniye Ye kahani.. Sirf Kuku FM Par !

title: Overcoming Dopamine Addiction
description: Kya aap bhi koi kaam concentration se nahi kar paate? Kya aapke liye kisi bhi kaam par focus karna mushkil hota hai? Aur aap har kaam ko bas taalte jaate hain? Then ho sakta hai aapko ek Detox ki zarurat ho, ye shabd sun-ne me jitna mushkil lagta hai utna mushkil samajhne me hai nahi, so hum kaunse Detox ki baat kar rahein hai and kaise aap is detox se apni life ko change kar sakte hai ye sab jaan-ne ke liye suniye humari ye audiobook. To bina time waste kiye shuru karte hai.

title: Talaash
description: Sheerdweep, ek aisa island jahan ek khas kism ke crystal ke karan mutation ho raha hai. Aur is island par Nayan, Bani aur Garima ke saath apni aunty ki dost Suzanne ko dhoondhne pahunchta hai. Kya Nayan Suzanne ko dhoondh payega? Kya Nayan, Bani aur Garima mutation se bach payenge? Mutation se wahan kya asar ho raha hai? Aise hi kayi sawalon ke jawab paane ke liye suniye Talaash, sirf KUKUFM par!!!

title: Apna Routine Kaise Set Karein
description: Kya aap apni life mein bahut hi disorganised feel karte hai ? Kya aapko un cheezon par focus karne mein problem hoti hai jo aapke liye sabse zyada important hai? To suniye yeh audiobook jo aapko apne din ko puri tarah se productive banane aur focus karne mein help karegi. Agar aap popular book Atomic Habits by James Clear sunna chahate hain, to usse pehle ye audiobook zaroor sunein. Chahe aap student ho, professional ya aap sirf productivity badhana chahte ho, yeh audiobook aapko apna routine set karne ke liye aur goals ko achieve karne ke liye practical tips aur strategies ke baare mein batayegi. Agar aapko "The Rudest Book Ever" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: English Speaking Course
description: India mein har saal laakhon log english seekhne aur bolne ki koshish to karte hain, par safal nahi ho paate. Kisi ko sahi guidance nahin milta, to koi seekhne ka tarika hi galat chun leta hai. Isi problem ko solve karne ke liye KUKUFM laya hai ye khaas audiobook, jiski madad se aap English par waisa hi command hasil kar lenge jaisa ki un logon ka hota hai jo bachapan se English bolte aa rahein hain. Ye audiobook suniye aur Aaj se English seekhne ki journey shuru kijiye.

title: Walden
description: Kya Aapne kabhi socha hai ek Insan ke liye sabse jyada zaroori kya hai? Uski internal happiness jo basic needs se poori ki ja sakti hai jaise pet bharne ke liye khana, Rehne ke liye Ghar, Pehnne ke liye Kapde aur kuch paise Jo humein Nature se asaani se mil sakta hai lekin aaj hum Paise ke peeche bhaag rahe hain aur apni peace kho chuke hain. Is AudioBook mein Author apne Philosophical style mein Life ka purpose batate hai aur Nature ke alag alag rang mein jeena sikhate hain.

title: Mannat
description: Ek raat Aditya aur Mannat ek dusare se mile, Aur bina kisi pahchan ke un donon ke bich woh hua jo hona nahi chahiye tha, Us raat ki galati se mannat ki zindgi aur Sapne sab uthal-puthal ho jate hai, Wahi dusri aur jab aditya ko mannat se juda sach pata chalata hai to woh apni shadi tod kar mannat ko apne ghar le aata hai. Kya hoga jab aditya ko para chalega mannat ka asli sach? Kya aditya ke ghar wale apna payenge mannat ko? Kya mannat ke sapne udaan bharne se pehle ki bikhar jayenge? Janane ke liye sune "Mannat : Ek Anchahi Dua" sirf Kuku FM par.

title: How to become a Leader
description: Ek Manager aur Leader mein kya difference hota hai? Manager woh hota hai jo process ko manage karta hai aur Leader woh hota hai jo logo ko manage karta hai. Leader hone ke bahut sare fayde hai, aap apni Life ko aasani se manage kar sakte hai, apne decisions khud le sakte hai, apni family ko properly manage kar sakte hai, business mein ya job mein aap better perform kar sakte hai, apne finance ko khud manage kar sakte hai. Leadership ek training hai, ek art hai jise practice se seekha ja sakta hai. Suniye iss show ko aur improve kijiye apne Leadership Skills. Agar aapko  "The CEO Next Door" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: शैतानी अवतार
description: यदि एक मां को पता चले कि नौ महीने तक उसके पेट में एक शैतान पल रहा था, तो क्या उसके पैदा होते ही वो उससे मार डालेगी? एक ऐसा खूंखार शैतान का अवतार जिसके पैदा होते ही उसके परिवार वाले उेस देख कर डर जाते हैं और उसे मारना भी चाहते हैं। पर क्या एक मां की ममता उस शैतान को इंसान बना देगी? क्या वो शैतान बड़ा हो कर और ज़्यादा ख़तरनाक बन जाएगा? क्या कर देगा वो सबका विनाश? या उसका परिवार कर देगा उस बच्चे को खत्म? जानने के लिए सुनिए ये कहानी शैतानी अवतार

title: Shiddat - Safar Pyaar ka
description: Ek bade businessman ki beti Rani ka dil fisal gaya mamuli se tourist guide Raju ki saadgi par. Ishq ke saude me deni padi Rani ko apni jaan! Kya maut ke baad bhi kayam rahegi is Shiddat wali mohabbat ki pehchaan? Akhir kyun ishq ki rah ne chuna maut ka rasta? Rani aur Raju ki love story ka kya hoga anjam?

title: Detective Ajay - Bhootiya Farmhouse
description: Ek Farm House mei 4 sadi hui laash mili, jinka Murder mahine pehle hi ho chuka tha. Padosiyon ne Qaatil ko marane ke baad bhi dekha hai aur unka manana hai ki is Farm House mei darawani Aatma hai. Lekin kya hai Farm House aur Aatma ka Murder connection? Kya Ajay is Farm House ko Bhootiya maan kar Bhooton ko Criminal maan lega ya phir khud ki jaan khatre mei daal kar karega asli Gunehgaaron ka Pardafash. Abhi Suniye! Detective Ajay: Bhootiya Farm House.

title: Chanakya ka Raaz
description: Chanakya ki nitiyon se bharpur ek kahani, jise sunne ke baad aapko apni zindagi mein chal rahe sabhi sawalon ke jawab mil jayenge. Kya hai Chanakya ki rahasyamayi zindagi ka raaz? Kaise unhone apne jeevan ke har mod par apni chaturai ka istemaal kiya? Aur kya aap bhi unki tarah apne jeevan ke har kadam par apni akalmandi ka istemaal kar sakte hain? Is show mein milenge aapko Chanakya ke anmol vachanon se bharpur sujhav jo apko raah dikhaenge, jisse aap apni zindagi ko aur bhi behtar bana sakte hain. Agar aapko "Chanakya In Daily Life" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Samrat Ashoka
description: Humaare tirange ka chakra, national emblem, Non-violence ke prati humaara lagaav in sabhi mein Samrat Ashoka ki chaap milti hai. Ek fearsome warrior se ek ardent follower of Buddhism ki unki journey ko mehsus karte hai iss audiobook mein.

title: Radharani
description: Kya aapko pata hai dharti par Radha, Krishna se us raat mili thi jis raat unka janm hua tha? Yahi nahi, pichle kayi janamo se tay tha Radha ka Krishna se dharti par milna bhi aur bicchadna bhi. Ye bicchadna bhi ek shrap tha jo 100 saalon tak vrat karne ke baad bhi Radha ye doori rok nahi payi. Poore gaon ka Radha pe sawal uthane ke baad bhi Krishna ne kaise sabit kiya tha Radha ko sabse pavitra? Janein Radharani ki zindagi ke aise hi kuch raaz

title: Indian Parenting Guide
description: Chahe hum kitne bhe bade ho jaen maa baap humara sath kavi nhe chorte, unki zimmedariyan humare liye humesha maayne rakhti hai, bacchon ka future kaisa hoga ye Puri tarah unke parents par depend karta hai. Ab ek bada sawal aapse, kya aap parents banne ke liye taiyaar hain..? Acche parents banne ka shayad he koi course hota ho lekin Hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain "Indian Parenting Guide " ki Audio book is Audio show mein un saare important tips par discussion kiya gaya hai jo ek naye parents ko apne bacho ke liye karna chahiye.

title: Habits of Highly Successful People
description: Insaani dimaag ki Takat ki koi limit nahi hoti. Ispar Yakeen Leonardo Da Vinci, Jane Austen, Albert Einstein, Stephen Hawking, Steve Jobs aur Elon Musk jaise brilliant minds ko dekh kar kiya ja sakta hai. Darsal humare mind ke kuch hidden powers hote hain jinko in sabhi logon ne unlock kardiya hai aur ab usi ka istemal karke ye success ko achieve kar rahe hain. Toh in principles ko janne aur samajhne ke liye ye audiobook ekdam perfect hai. Kyuki ye humein sikhati hai ki, kis treeke se jo poori duniya ko impossible lagta hai vo humare liye  possible ho sakta hai. Agar aapko Charles Duhigg dwara likhi "Power Of Habit" aur "Rich Habits: The Daily Success Habits of Wealthy" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko zaroor sunni chahiye.

title: Perfect Mindset Aur Goals
description: Zindagi men hum sabhi successful hona chahte hain aur har haal mein hona hi chahate hain. Sabse pehla aur bada sawal hota hai ki " Kis raste jo pakdein aur kaise dimaag ko banaye sabse alag? Iss book summary mein hum aapko chun- chun ke aise tareeqe with example bata rahe hain jisse aap khud ko pehchan sakte hain aur apne dil tatha dimag dono ki baat sun ke uss raste mein aage badhne lagte hain, jahan se safalata milne ki ummed zyada ho jaati hai. Chaliye jaante hain rules apne dimag ko Extraordinary banane ke.

title: How To Convince Anybody In 45 Seconds
description: Life mein school mein presentation deni ho ya college mein, office mein presentation deni ho ya business mein. Jab humara confidence level low rehta hai to hum kisi ko bhi convince karne mein safal nahi ho paate hain. Is Original Show mein hum apko 45 second mein aisi presentation dene ki tricks samjhayenge ki apke lie kisi ko bhi convince karna ek dum easy-peasy ho jayega aur apko har jagah success milegi. Chaliye shuru karte hain convince karne ki tips ko samajhne ke is safar ko.

title: Make Your Brain Healthy
description: Kahawat hai ki “Hoga Dimag Tandurust To Life Hogi Mast” Aur ye bilkul sahi bhi hai. Dimag hi to hai jo poori body ko control karta hai. Tabhi to Police bhi helmet na use karne mein challan kaat deti hai. Lekin sirf helmet se hi to dimag ko safe nahi rakha ja sakta. Iske liye achche khane ki bhi zaroorat hoti hai, Nahin to Dementia aur Alzheimer jaisi bimariyon ka khatra rehta hai. Inhi sab bimariyon aur Dimag ke liye special Diet ko batane KUKU FM le aaya hai ye khas show “Make Your Brain Healthy”.

title: Vishwas Ka Jadu
description: Vishwas Ka Jadu Josheph Murphy dwara likhi The Magic of Faith ka Hindi anuwad hai, The Magic of Faith world me sabse jyada bikne vali books me se ek hai. Is Book me bataya gaya hai ki kaise aap apne Faith se apni Life badal sakte hai ? Aap apne Subconscious mind ki power se vo sab kuchh hasil kar sakte hai jo aap chahte hai. Josheph Murphy ne is book me aise bahut sare safal examples diye hai jinke jariye aapka Vishwas aur majbut hoga aur aap life me aage badenge. Ek bahut important baat hai jo aapko is Book ko sunne se pahle jaan leni chahiye ki book ke kisi bhi part ko skip mat kariyega because ye ek complete process hai aapke Vishwas ko develop karne ki. Agar aapko "The Secret - Hero" aur "The Magic" jaisi books pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Creative Process Of Hackers
description: Aajkal bhale hi IT sector ko choose karna ek Secure Career ki nishani maani jati hai. Lekin aisa sabke saath ho yeh zaroori nahi hai. Toh Kab aur Kaise hum IT sector mein jaa sakte hain? Hacker asal mein kaun hote hain? Hacker ya Programmer Banne ke kya fayde hain? kya sach mein IT field choose karna thoda mushkil hai? In sabhi sawalon ke jawab aapko milenge is Original Show mein jise sunne ke baad aap hacking aur IT field se jude kayi facts aur myths ko jaan jayenge.

title: Door To Success: The Quest Journey Of Alex Banayan
description: Hum khud ko motivate karne ke liye kuch na kuch dhundhte hain lekin kuch din baad vo motivation bhi gayab ho jata hai. Is mushkil se kaise nipta jaaye yeh sawal man mein rakh kar Alex banayan ne Bill gates, Warren buffett aur Lady gaga jaise successful logon ka interview lene ka safar shuru kiya. Lekin kya vo is safar mein manzil tak pahunch paaye? Aur kya vo sabhi successful logon ke interview le paaye? In sabhi sawalon ke jawab aap is show mein jaan payenge aur alex ke struggle ki kahani se khud ke success ke door ko bhi unlock kar paayenge. Chaliye shuru karte hain alex ke success ke door ko khojne ki is kahani ko.

title: Mini Habits : Smaller Habits, Bigger Results
description: "Chhoti - Chhoti Magar Moti Baatein". Aapne agar 90 ke dashak mein TV serial Shaktiman dekha hai to ye line bhi suni hi hogi. Aur ye bhi jaante honge ki chhoti aur acchi habits ka impact bahut bada aur accha hota hai jo aapko bade Aim tak pahunchane mein madad karta hai. Isilye KUKU Fm le aaya hai Stephen Guise ki likhi kitab Mini Habits: Smaller Habits, Bigger Results ki Audiobook vo bhi hindi mein.

title: Vishwash ka Bandhan
description: आज गुडिया का ब्‍याह है….सभी खुश हैं उसकी सहेलिया गीता और सोनिया उसे छेड़ने का कोई मौका नहीं छोड़ रही हैं कि तभी अचानक पुलिस पहुंचती है...सब हैरान है। चंद मिनटों में खुशियों की जगह मातम छा जाता है….क्‍या हुआ ऐसा? रहस्‍य और संवेदना से भरपूर कहानी विश्‍वास का बंधन सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Kaise Nikle Middle Class Life Se Bahar
description: Life ko upgrade karne ki pehli step hai Soch ko upgrade karna. Middle class trap se nikalna toh har koi chahta hai par Risk lene ki himmat har kisi mein nahi hoti. Mindset change ke lessons aur Risk lene ki ability ko badhaane ke liye suniye yeh audio show.

title: 100 Things Successful People DO
description: Aakhir aapki zindagi mein safalta ke kya maayne hain, Apni zindagi ke har chhote bade goal ko haasil karna, Ek acchi sehat pana ya apne mann ko hamesha shant rakhna? Par kya aap apne is lakshya ko pane mein safal nahi ho paa rahe? To aap bilkul bhi mat ghabraiye Kyuki is Audiobook “100 Things Successful People Do” ke har ek chapter mein aapko aise naye ideas milenge jo aapko success ke aur qareeb le jayenge.

title: Game of Love
description:
I love you, I love you so much.!!
Mumbai airport par Rohit, Riya ke khayalon mein khoya hua lounge ki taraf badh raha hota hai, ki tabhi ek anjaan ladki dodti hui uski or aati hai aur uske gale se lag kar usse kiss karne lag jaati hai. Waha khada rohit aur uske ghar wale ye sab dekh kar dang reh jaatey hai. Kyunki Rohit ka rishta bachpan se hi uski school friend Riya se tay ho chuka hota hai. Aur Riya Rohit ke dilo dimag par bachpan se chaayi hoti hai. Lekin kya hoga jab pata chalega Rohit ko apne hi bhai aur Riya ka sach? Kya apne hi bhai se haar jayega Rohit aur uska pyar? Aakhir kon thi vo ladki? Aur Kon hoga is game of love ki asli trophy ka huqdar? Janne ke leye sune Game of Love Season 1.

title: The Power Of Focus
description: Yadi aap apne jivana me kamayabi hasila karna chahate hain, to apko Power of Focus ke bare me jarur pata hona chahiye. Bina focus ke aap apne lakshya ko nahi pa sakate hain. Lekin Focus sahi direction me hona jaruri hai. aiye jante hain Focus ki takat ke bare me, jo apki kamayabi ke liye kyon hai jaruri? kuku FM par abhi sune 'The Power of Focus' full book aur apni Focus ki takata ko pahchane.

title: फौजी की आशिक़ी
description: Raajeev bhaarateey sena mein hai. is baar kee chhuttee mein jab vah apanee bahan se milane usake sasuraal aata hai, to bahan kee nanad sapana ko dil de baithata hai. sapana bhee dil hee dil mein chaahane lagatee hai lekin jaahir nahin karatee aur bina ikaraar ke hee raajeev ko lautana padata hai. aur jab p‍yaar ka ijahaar hota hai, to ek mishan ke dauraan raajeev laapata ho jaata hai, usakee dedee bodee bhee nahin milatee. lekin sapana ko raajeev ka intajaar hai. vo apane jeevan mein kisee aur ke baare mein sochana bhee paap samajhatee hai. k‍ya raajeev vaapas lautakar aaega? sapana ka intajaar khat‍ma hoga ya phir kisee aur ke sang jeevan kee dor baandhanee padegee? ek phaujee ka jeevan aur unaka parivaar kin paristhitiyon se gujarata hai is kahaanee mein kareeb se bataane kee koshish kee gaee hai. jaanane ke lie sunen pooree kahaanee.

क्या हो अगर आपको किसी की आवाज़ से हो जाए प्यार? पता हो सिर्फ उनका एक नाम और सुनने को मिलें वो दिन में सिर्फ एक बार? ऐसा ही कुछ होता है लखनऊ में रहने वाली आयशा के साथ जिसे प्यार हो जाता 24*7 FM के एक RJ सरस के साथ। क्या उसका ये प्यार रेडियो की फ्रीक्वेंसी से निकल कर असल ज़िन्दगी में उतर पाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनिए 24*7|

title: Dark Web: Live Murder, Rape aur Scams Ka Sach
description: Digital duniya ke is daur mein jahan technology ne humari life ko easy bana diya hai vahin hazaron crimes aur scams isi technology ki shadow mein kiye jaate hain. Aur isi shadow ko kehte hain Dark Web. Aakhir kya hai yeh dark web? Kaise yeh crime ki duniya ki neev ban chuka hai? In sabhi sawalon par se parda uthega iss show mein. Toh chaliye Dark Web ko gehrai se janna shuru karte hain.

title: Autobiography of a Yogi
description: Autobiography of a Yogi yeh kitaab Pramahansa Yoganandaji ki Adhyatmeek logon ke saath hone waale Purvi aur Pachimi deshon ke parichay ke baare mein batati hai. Pustak unake bachapan ke paarivaarik jeevan se shuroo hotee hai, unake guru ko khojane se lekar ek sadhu banane aur kriya yoga meditation ki shiksha ko sthaapit karane tak ke pure safar ko bohot hi acche se darshaati hai

title: Tere Liye
description: एक मासूम जिसे बेसब्री से एक प्यारी बहन का इंतज़ार था उसकी मन्नत जैसे खुद महादेव ने सुन ली। और प्रसाद के रूप में मंदिर के बहार उसे मिलती है फूल सी कोमल सोनम। सुने इस फूल सी नाज़ुक सोनम और उसे जान से ज़्यदा चाहने वाले उसके भाई की कहानी।

title: Why Exercise
description: Agar baat zyada jeene ki ho, to, yeh wo chiz hai jahan hum duniyabhar ki tarakki karne ke baad bhi pahuch nahi paaye hain. Jabki purane samay mein na itni tarakki hui thi, na insaano ki lifestyle mein koi khaas growth thi. Phir bhi tab log 100-150 saal aaram se bina kisi bimari ke je lete the. Wajah thi unka har waqt active rehna. Lekin aaj ka humara lifestyle aisa hai ki humein 10 tarah ki pareshaniyan rehti hain. Toh aakhir hum apni lifestyle ko sudhaare kaise? Aaiye jante hai iss audiobook mein.

title: Daliton Ke Utthan mein JJ Ram Ka Yogdan
description: Raja ka beta hi raja banega….yeh sirf kahawat nahi hai. Humare samaaj mein yeh kahawat sadiyon se chali aa rahi hai, tabhi toh, saare acche kaam unchi jaati ke logon ko karne ka mila aur sabhi nichle aur bure kaam, neechi jaat waalon ko. Aaj bhale samay badal gaya ho, lekin kuch log aaj bhi, unch-neech mein yakeen rakhte hai. Par, aaj se kuch saal pehle, aise hi samaaj ke ek insaan ne sabhi jaativad ki paramparaon ko piche chhodkar, apne samaaj aur apne logon ke liye nayi shuruaat ki thi. Uss hi shakhs, yani Jagjivan Ram ki kahani sunenge aap, humari iss audiobook mein.

title: Nafrat Se Mohabbat Tak
description: Apne Rajput Empire ko Number 1 banaane ke liye Avani Rajput ek aise ladke ke saath sauda karne par majboor ho jaati hai, jise ladkiyon se sakht Nafrat hai. Dusri taraf, apne papa ki baat maan kar, Abhimanyu Pratap Singh, ek aisi ladki se shaadi kar baithta hai, jo use bilkul nahi pasand. Kya ye Nafrat, Mohabbat mei badal payegi? Janne ke liye suniye Nafrat se Mohabbat tak.

title: अलख निरंजन
description: Dharma Ke Thekedar Karmakaand ke naam par Samaj ko murkha banate hei aur Thagte hei. Yaha Kahani Batati hei. Samajsyao se judte insaan inke Jaase mei asaani se aa jaate hei. Samaj ki sabse badi samasya hei ki in Sadhu santo ki kartut jaane ke baavajut log Annkhen bandhkar babaon pr vishwas karte hei

title: The Story Of My Experiments With Truth
description: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi, ek bete, ek pati aur ek pita....lekin uske baad bane Rashtrapita! Ye kaise hua iski khabar kisi ko nahi thi, sivayein unke. Khud kacchi umar mein shaadi karne ke baad bhi, unhone bal vivah ka humesha virodh kiya. Kyun? Aur kaisi thi unki is dauran journey? Kaisa ho agar is baat ka jawab aapko khud Mahatma Gandhi khud dein. Jee sahi sun rahe hain aap! Ye audiobook Mohandas Gandhi ki biography hai.Jisme unhone khud apni har journey ke baare mein bataya hai. Aaiye The Story of my experiements with Truth ki ye audiobook sune!

title: डिटेक्टिव दीपा
description: भारत की अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय खुफिया और गुप्‍तचर रॉ एजेंसी का मुख्‍य काम पड़ोसी देशो पर निगरानी, आतंकवाद को रोकना, गुप्‍त ऑपरेशन्‍स को अंजाम देना और जानकारी इकट्ठा करना है। यह कहानी देश‍भक्ति और रॉ इजेंसी के ईद-गिर्द बुनी गई है। जब रॉ पर कड़ी विपत्तियों का साया था और एक-एक करके सभी एजेंट मारे जा रहे थें। डिटेक्टिव दीपा की होशियारी और बुद्धिमत्‍ता ने उस विपत्ति का पूरी हिम्मत के साथ सामना किया और उसके आगे ढ़ाल बनकर तब तक खड़ी रही जब तक उसे जीत न मिल गई। जासूसी की दुनिया में कदम रखने और दीपा के बहादुरी के किस्‍से भी उतने ही दिलचस्‍प हैं। कौन है दीपा और कैसे उसने देश के दुश्‍मनों को धूल चटाया? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Side Hustle Kaise Karein?
description: Aaj ke Technology aur Internet ke time mein jahan ek taraf Opportunities bahut hain vahin dusri taraf keval ek Job se sapne sach karna almost impossible sa ho gaya hai kyuki mehangai bahut badh gayi hai.
