Iska seedha sa matlab hai ki humein apni regular Job ke sath Side Hustle bhi karna hoga jisse extra Income Source bana sake lekin kya ye itna aasan hai? Kya ise apni Regular Job ke sath kiya ja sakta hai? Kya Health, Family aur work ke beech mein balance banaya ja sakta hai? Aise aapke bahut sare questions ke answers aapko is AudioBook mein milenge. To chaliye humare sath is safar ki sair par sirf kuku fm par.

title: What Wikipedia Can't Tell You About Stock Market
description: Stock Market ek aisa bazaar hai jaha roz logo ki kismat banti aur bigadti hai! Kaafi logo ka ye Primary source of income hai...Trading ke shuruaati din kaafi confusing hoti hai aur jaise har skill ko sikhne ke liye ek mentor zaruri hota hai. ye audiobook bhi apke Stock Market journey ka aisa pehla mentor banegi jisse aap bazaar ki hulchul ko kaafi aasan language me samaj sakte ho...to chaliye sikhte hai Stock Market & Trading kya hoti hai aur kese savdhani se use sikha aur azmaya jaye...

title: Sansad Bhavan To Central Vista
description: Saal 1911, Tab British sarkar ke gulam Bharat ki capital Kolkata se Delhi Shift ki gai to zarurat padi Delhi mein aisi buildings ki jahan se sarkari kaam sahi se ho sake aur fir isiliye ek naya shahar New Delhi basaya gaya.Isi ke tahat banaya gaya tha hamara Sansad Bhavan .Kya hai sansad Bhavan ke banne ki aur fir aage aane wale saal 2026 mein bankar taiyar hone wale Central Vista ki puri kahani aur kyon zarurat padi Central Vista yani naye Sansad bhavan ki?Aapko sab batane ke liye ham le aaye hain “Sansad Bhawan to central Vista”.

title: Meditation and It's Practice
description: Yadi aap dhyan ya meditation practice karna chahte hai par aap ko pata nahi ki use kaise kiya jaye, to yeh audiobook aapke liye ek guide hai jo step by step iske baare mein samajhti hai. Yeh audiobook aapko dhyan ka abhyas karne ka ek exact idea deti hai aur saath hi saath meditation ki shuruaat mein aane wale challenges aur unke solutions ke baare mein bhi batati hai. Agar aapko Deepak Chopra dwara likhi gayi "Total Meditation" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Dreams To Dollar: Startup Adventures
description: Business mein apne dosto se mile dhoke ke baad Aman tut jata hai. New business shuru karne ke liye apne papa se help mangta hai lekin vo mana kar dete hai. Carless, nikamma Aman kaise khud ko proof karega ki vo jaisa dikhta hai vaisa hai nahi. Apne new business mein kya  Aman success ho payega. Bina finance ya funding ke kaise vo apne business ko sambhalega? Janane ke liye suniye kahani 'Dreams to Dollar: startup Adventures' sirf Kuku FM per.

title: Hiroshima Nagasaki
description: Little Boy aur Fat Man,  Kaise In do code words ne World War 2 ke dauraan Japan ke do bade shehron ko mitti ke dher mein badal kar rakh diya tha? Duniya ne jab pehli baar Atomic Bombs ki jhalak dekhi to kya hua tha?  Hiroshima aur Nagasaki par hi ye nuclear bomb kyon giraye gaye? Janne ke liye suniye ye khaas original show.

title: चक्रव्यूह
description:
पुलिस और राजनीति के गठजोड़ कैसे देश को प्रभावित करता है सुनिए इस किताब में 
writer: मोहन मौर्य
Voiceover Artist : RJ Nitin
Author : Mohan Mourya

title: Ishq Tamasha Zindagi
description: Sapno ki duniya mein gum Pankhuri ghar aaye NRI Rajan se kar baithti hai pyaar. Par Rajan ke sath engagement ke bad Pankhuri ki zindagi hamesha ke liye badal jaati hai. Wo usi raat Rajan ko apni behen Mehak ke sath bistar par paati hai. Kya is dhokhe ki maar, khtam kar degi pankhuri ka pyar ? Kya tooti Pankhuri de payegi apne sapno ko udaan? Sune Pankhuri ke pankh lagne ki kahani.

title: Fir Mulaqaat Hogi
description: Mumbai ke famous Medical College mein pyaar aur nafrat ke sath naye drame roz hi ho rahe hain. Jaha Arnika hai khubsurati aur ameeri ki misaal wahi Palak laa aa rahi hai uski zindagi mein bhuchaal. Par college president Aarav hai sabka saviour! Kya Palak ki nafrat ke aage khil payega Aarav aur Arnika ke pyaar ka phool?

title: Mission Sagarmatha
description: Karseva me police ki ho rahi beijjati se pareshan Vanshi ko Sanket ki lash milati hai jo karseva mein maare gaye logon se alag thi. Vanshi is ki tehkikat me lag jata hai aur milne wale surag Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose se jud jaate hain. Kaun hai Sanket ki maut ke peeche? Sanket kyon Netaji ke baare me janna chahata tha? Kya Gumnami baba hi Netaji the? Kyon KGB aur CIA bhi Netaji se judi diary hasil karna chahati hai? Aisi hi kayi saare sawalon ke jawab liye hazir hai KUKU FM ki sansanikhej peshkash, “Mission Sagarmatha”. Suniye “Mission Sagarmatha” aur janiye bharat ke itihas me chipi kayi unsuljhi kahaniyan jo aaj bhi hamare beech jinda hai!

title: The Mindful Way To Weight Loss
description: Doston ek healthy brain niwas karta hai ek healthy body mein aur body ko healthy banana matlab apne wajan par kaabu karna, agar aap bhi apna weight control karna chahte hain aur shape main aana chahte hain wo bhi bilkul naturally aur bina paise waste kiye .To abhi suniye yeh super informative content sirf KUKU FM par.

title: Jadoo Teri Nazar
description: Ladakon se nafarat karne vaali khaamosh tabiyat ki Piya jab Palash ko pehali baar dekhati hai to bina Palash ki marzi ke use jabaradastee kiss kar leti hai. Palash tilmila jaata hai, vo Piya se kahata hai ya to vo sexual hairasament ke liye Jail jane ko taiyaar rahe ya usakee sharten maane. Jail jane se bachane ke liye Piya Palash ki sharten maan leti hai. Lekin Palash ki sharten maanate hi Piya ki zindagi mein toofan aa jaata hai. Uska saamana Maya aur Radhika se hota hai jo Piya ko mitane ke liye kisi bhi had tak tak jaane ke liye taiyaar thin. Aisi kya sharten thi Palash ki jinhen manane ke baad Piya ki zindagi khatre mein pad jaati hai. Piya marate marate bachati hai aur jab Palash plan bana kar Piya se shaadi kar leta hai to Piya ke samne gayab hone ke alawa koi rasta nahi bachata. Kya Palash Piya ko khoj payega? Kahin Radhika aur Maya Piya ko khatm karne mein kamyab to nahi ho jayengi? In sab se kya Piya haar jayegi ya phir samne aakar mukabla karegi? Janne ke liye sunte rahein Jadoo Teri Nazar

title: Naukari nahin , Business idea dhoondho
description: 21st century me internet ke boom ke baad , har field me career opportunities badh gai hai. Apne bohot baar aisa suna hoga ke 21 saal ka ladka "billionaire" ban gaya , to ab samay aa gaya hai apni regular job se dusri regular jobs ke bajay , Nayi business opportunities ko dhundh ke Market ka experience lene ka .  Iss kitab me aapko kuch kahaniya milengi , jinhone apni regular jobs ko chhodkar ek business idea par kaam kiya aur successful hue , to chaliye sunte hai iss kitab ko aur shuru karte hai apne goals tak pohochne ka safar.

title: 500 करोड़ का मुर्दा
description: Sheher ke sabse Bade Rahis Ramchandra Goyenka ki Beti- Rama – jo ki 500 Crore ki malkin hei, aachanak se gayab ho jati hei. Usse Dhund ne ke liye ek Kabil Jasoos Anuj ko bulaya jaata hei. Yeh kahani ussi ke jasoosi aur ameero ke sath hoti Darindgi ki hei. Kya Rama anth mei milti hei? Kya usse kissi ne sahi mein Gayab kiya tha ya thi kissi ki koi bhayanak chal? Jaane  ke liye suniye yeh kahani- 500 Crore ka Murda

title: बड़े घराने की बहू
description:
नव्‍यम और कल्‍पना के शादी की सभी रस्‍में रामायणी पैलेस में होनेवाली है। सभी वहां 5 दिन पहले पहुंचते हैं। लेकिन परिवार से जुड़ी एक कटु सच्‍चाई सभी के सामने आती है। सबसे बड़ी बात अगवानी की रस्म के लिए दूध से भरे कलश में सैकड़ों कीड़े रेंगने लगते हैं और पूरा दूध काला पड़ जाता है। पैलेस पर शक्तिशाली बुरी आत्‍माओं का साया है, जो शादी के बाद भयानक तबाही मचाने के इंतजार में है। नव्‍यम का बड़ा भाई राहुल और कल्‍पना की छोटी बहन स्‍नेहा मिलकर इन आत्‍माओं का पता लगाने निकल पड़ते हैं। पैलेस की बुरी आत्‍माएं अपनी शक्तियों का प्रदर्शन करने लगती हैं। डरावनी घटनाओं और हवेली के रहस्‍मयी कमरों का क्‍या है राज? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी। 
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : आस्था जैन 'अंतस'

title: Meri Ardhangni Uski Premika
description:
सूरज एक ही है जो सफर पर है मगर सूरज को सुबह देंखे तो ऊर्जावान, दोपहर में तपता हुआ और शाम को अस्तित्व खोता हुआ दिखता है, स्त्री भी कुछ ऐसी ही है। हालात मेरे पक्ष में हो तो वफ़ा, ममता और त्याग की मूर्ति, विपक्ष में हो तो कुलटा, वेवफा, कुलनाशिनी... ऐसे ही पता नही कौन कौन से शब्दों में तरासा जाता है उसे? स्त्री के जीवन को पुरुष के इर्द गिर्द इस हद तक समेट दिया गया है कि कभी कभी लगता है उसका अपना स्वतंत्र अस्तित्व ही नही है। ऐसी ही प्रेम, त्याग, कुंठा, विवाह और तलाक के भंवर में खुद को तलाशती तीन स्त्रियों का की कहानी है मेरी अर्द्धांगिनी उसकी प्रेमिका! जो एक पुरुष के साथ अस्तित्व में आई और उसी के साथ कहीं गुम हो गयी।
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Voiceover Artist : Sarika Rathore
Author : Rajesh Anand

title: राज - एक रहस्य
description: एक नया नेवला जोड़ा शादी के बाद रहने आता है अपने एक नए घर में। इनका इश्क आसान था, लेकिन इश्क के रास्ते थोडे मुश्किल थे, और मुश्किल थी बेवजह होने वाली जुदाई। और शायद इस बार लंबी जुदाई हो जाएगी सिर्फ एक मासूम वजह से, जो वजह काफी थी अंकिता को दीपक से दूर करने के लिए। इन दोनों के बीच आ जाता है एक काला साया जब इसी नए घर के गार्डेन में मिलती है एक लाश! तो क्या था दीपक और अंकिता के बीच का वो काला साया? वो लाश किस की थी? जानें इस कहानी राज - एक रहस्य

title: Make Your Mind Perfect
description: Hum sab life mein kya chahate hain? Jawab hai “KHUSHIYAAN”. Lekin Kya hamesha Khush rahte hain? Nahin na. Kyu ki Khushi milti hai success se aur hum har baar Successful bhi nahin hote hain. To kaise apne dimag ko is kaabil banayein ki aap jo kar rahe hain usmen khush rahein. Success pane ke liye kin cheezon se bachein? In sawalon ke jawab aur kuch different techniques ka pitara hai "Make Your Mind Perfect" naam ka ye khas show.

title: 7 Day Course on How to be Focused
description: Kisi bhi kaam ko behtar karne ke liye focus ki zarurat hoti hai, suniye 7 dino mein focus ko behtar karne ke program ko aur jaaniye kaise sachet mann madad karta hai! Agar aapko "A Really Good Day" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko khoob pasand aayegi.

title: अदृश्य : बदला लेंगे हम
description: लड़कियों के प्रति अन्याय के किस्से बढ़ते ही जा रहे हैं पर जब बात इंसाफ की आती है तो सभी के हाँथ पैर ठन्डे पड़ जाते हैं।  जब इंसानों से कुछ न हो पाया तो कुछ अदृश्य शक्तियों ने ली ये ज़िम्मेदारी और लिया बदला। क्या हुआ ऐसा की अदृश्य शक्तियों को आना पड़ा बाहर? क्या वो अपने इस उद्देश्य में सफल हो पाएंगे? जानने के लिए सुनें प्रवीण सिंह नेगी द्वारा लिखित ये कहानी

title: Gustakhiyan
description: Ek salon mein hui galti ke baad, jise suhana kabhi dekhna bhi nahi chahti thi, halat use usi insaan ke aur nazdeek lane ki wajah dhoondh rahe the. Apne hi ghar mein sauteli hone ka dard har roz suhana ko maar raha tha, lekin apne bhaai ke ilaaj ke liye wo har dard khushi-khushi piye ja rahi thi. Kya Harsh ke aane se uski zindagi ki har mushkil aasan ho jayegi? Ya wo apne maa baap ke liye saude ka Zariya ban kar rah jayegi? Janane ke liye sunein “Gustakhiyan” sirf KuKuFM par

title: The Art of Selling
description: Bechna asaan nahi hai, magar 'You can sell' ki iss charcha ke baad aap aise principles ko jaan sakenge jo aapko sales hi nahi balki jeevan ke har pahelu mein successful hone mein madad karenge. Agar aapko "The Greatest Sales Man" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Mera Lahooluhan Punjab
description: Punjab! Yani ki vo jagah jahan 5 nadiyon ka pani milta ho. Wo jagah jahan se Harit Kranti ne janm liya, jisne desh ki bhookh ko mitaya. Aur wo jagah bhi jahan se sabse zyada army ke jawan niklate hain. To fir 70 aur 80 ke dashak mein aisa kya hua ki ye khushhal pradesh aatankwadiyon aur algaav wadiyon ki zamin ban gaya. Aaye din khoon kharabe hue aur fir yahin ke do ladko ne Prime minister ki hatya kar di. Poori kahani batayenge famous writer Khushwant Singh ki likhi is khash book "Mera Lahooluhan Punjab" mein"

title: Jhansi Ki Rani Lakshmibai
description: Yeh ek rani, ​​​​maa aur ek mahila ko shraddhaanjali hai jinki gaatha bhartiya svatantrata sangraam ki neev thi. Jhaansi ki Rani Lakshmi Bai ko 1857-58 ke bhartiya vidroh ke dauraan unki veerta ke liye yaad kiya jaata hai. Lakshmi Bai 1843 se 1853 tak Maharaj Gangaadhar Rao ke patni ke roop mein Jhansi ki maratha riyaasat ki mahaarani thi. Woh 1857 ke bhaaratiya vidroh ke pramukh hastiyon mein se ek thi aur bhaartiya raashtravaadiyon ke liye British Raaj ke pratirodh ka prateek ban gayi.Lakshmi Bai ne hamalaavar taakaton ka kada pratirodh kiya aur apanee antim saans tak kabhi bhi aatmasamarpan nahin kiya.

title: Meri Madat Karo
description:
अमावस की काली रात मेंं गांव के सबसे सुनसान और डरावने रास्ते से ये कहानी शुरू होती है। जहां एक लड़की मदद मांगती है। उसकी आवाज मेरी मदद करो।उस परिवार को सुनाई देती है। लेकिन उसे अनसुना कर वो आगे बढ़ जाते है। उसके बाद उनकी जिंदगी में एक के बाद एक बहुत डरावनी घटनाएं होना शुरू हो जाती है। उनके घर में भूत प्रेत होने जैसी घटनाएं होने लगती है। उसके बाद घर का बड़ा बेटा और बहू अपने बेटे के साथ गायब हो जाते है। उस परिवार की बेटी भी गायब हो जाती है। किसी को कुछ समझ नही आता है कि इन सब के पीछे कौन है। तब कहानी में डिटेक्टिव रूद्र आता है जो इन सब घटनाओं के पीछे होने वाले सच का पता लगाता है। अपने दोस्तों की मदद से वो अधूरे सच तक पहुंचता है। जिस इसांन को सब गुनहगार समझ रहे थे क्या वही इन सब के पीछे था या सच्चाई कुछ और ही थी? कहीं कोई अदृश्य शक्ति तो इसके पीछे नही थी या ये सिर्फ किसी का फैलाया हुआ एक मायाजाल था? क्या रहस्य था उस सुनसान जंगल में गूंजती हुई आवाज मेरी मदद करो का...?
Author : अभिषेक हाड़ा
Voiceover Artist : ASHUTOSH

title: Sandeep Maheshwari : How the boy of Delhi became a Source of Inspiration
description: Sandeep Maheshwari ko kaun nahi janta, Inki ek ek Videos mein itni inspiration hoti hai ki aap himmat to kabhi nahi haroge. Sabne inka Muskurata hua chehra YouTube par dekha hoga, Lekin Inki Life story bhi utni hi Inspiring hai. Ek Normal middle class insan ki tarah Padhai, fir Paiso ki ladai fail hona, uthna fir try karna sab kuch hai, iske sath sath apne andar ki awaaz aur Kuch bada karne ki chahat ne Delhi ke Normal Sandeep ko "Sandeep Maheshwari" bana diya. Aapne Biographies to bahut suni aur dekhi hongi lekin ye aapko aapke ek star se aur upar utha degi, aur aap bhi dil pe hath rakhkar ek baar to kahoge ki "Aasan Hai".

title: श्री कृष्ण : Heart of the Universe
description: “Shree Jagannath Mandir Puri” mei is waqt ha-ha-kaar macha tha. Duniya bhar mein andhera chaa gaya tha aur Antriksh se Dharti tak bhayanak aawazein aa rahi thi. Barish, toofan, bijli aur bhookamp se Dharti pareshan thi aur ek jhatke mei bijli ke dheron device dhwast ho gaye. 12 saal baad, aaj Bhagwan Shree Jagannath Ji ki moorti se wo “Brahma-Padarth” badla jaana tha, jise is poori duniya ka dil, Shree Krishna ka dil kaha jaata tha. Theek usi waqt Mandir ke Pujari se hui ek aisi galti, jisne poori duniya mein tabahi macha di. Shree Krishna ke dil se nikli wo “Brahma-Shakti” gayab thi aur us dil ko Shaitani taaqaton ne apne kabze mei le liya tha. Aakhir kya hai bhagwan Shree Krishna ke dil ka ye raaz, jiske gayab hote hi duniya Trahi -Trahi karne lagi?  Abhi sunein “श्री कृष्ण“: The Heart of the Universe”

title: The Happiest Man on Earth
description:
Holocaust survivor ke Hope ki kahani.
[New York Times Bestseller]

title: भूतिया चौराहा
description: Kisi ko kaha acche haalato mein jeene dete hai log, kisi ke prem ke swaroop ko na samajh paane ki usse sazza dete hai log khud apne zulm karte hai aur kisi begunah ko salakho mein kaid karwaate hai log warna yeh chauraha gaav bhi aaj gulzaar hota par kisi ke krutrutya karmo se us haste khelte gaav ko bhutiya chauraha banate hai log..

title: Luccha : Kon Banega Don
description: लुच्चा के ऊपर आन पड़ी है एक और मुसीबत। शहर का सबसे बड़ा डॉन पड़ा है उसकी फुलझड़ी के पीछे। क्या लुच्चा एक बार फिर है जाएगा गुंडागर्दी की दुनिया का शिकार? क्या बचा पाएगा अपनी फुलझड़ी को? जानने के लिए सुनते हैं प्रवीण सिंह नेगी द्वारा लिखित ये कहानी लुच्चा, कौन बनेगा डॉन?

title: वापसी
description: Do dost Neel aur Dev Malaysia jaane ke liye Thailand ka tourist visa lete hai. Unhe agent ne bataya tha ki Malaysia ka visa thailand jaate hi mil jaayega, to kya dono doston ko aage ka visa mila? Kya vah malaysia ja sake ya phir bane dhoke ka shikar? Jaan ne k liye bane rahiye Kuku FM k saath.

title: 7 Money Rules For Life
description: Ek survey ke according 50% se zyada log aise hain jinke pas future ke liye koi savings nahi hai aur takreeban 30% log aise hain jinke pas 5 lakh se bhi kam ki savings hain. Aur aaye din layoff ki khabarein sunna toh ab aam baat ho gayi hai. Aise mein ye audiobook humein wo 7 money rules batati hai jinko apni life mein laagu karne ke baad hum har din apne paise par control rakhkar difficult financial situations ke liye poori tarah se taiyaar reh sakte hain.

title: Tales From Vedas And Upanishads
description: Humne aur aapne aksar apne bade budhon logon se suna hai ki "Are Humare Vedon Mein Ye Kaha Gaya Hai, Vo Kaha Gaya Hai". Lekin Poori baat kisi ko bahut kam hi pata hoti hai. Isiliye Kuku FM aapke liye le aaya hai Vedon aur Upnishadon ki Kahaniyan. Vo bhi bilkul simple gyan ke sath. To Chaliye lagayein gota is gyan ke sagar ki kahaniyon "Tales From Vedas And Upanishads" ki Audiobook mein.

title: कबूतर वाला लड़का
description: इश्‍क और मुश्‍क छुपाए नहीं छुपता….कबूतर वाला उर्फ अभय और उजाला का इश्‍क भी नहीं छुपा था। एक अनजान मुलाकात... और सालों बाद अचानक मुलाकात... क्‍या ईश्‍वर की भी यही इच्‍छा थी कि दोनों मिले...लेकिन प्‍यार मिलना आसान नहीं होता...तो क्‍या अभय और उजाला का प्‍यार होगा पूरा या रह जाएगा अधूरा? जानने के लिए सुनें, पूरी कहानी कबूतर वाला लड़का.. केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Kama Sutra: Learn The Art of Erotic Love
description: Love making ke kitne tarike hote hain? Hum apne partner ko kaise hamesha khush aur satisfy kar sakte hain? Aakhir hum apne sexual life ko aur better kaise bana sakte hain? Ye sab janne ke liye aapko KamaSutra jaisi mushkil kitab padhne ki zarurat nahi hai kyunki hum aapke un sare sawalon ka jawaab lekar aaye hain hamare is Audio show mein jiska nam hai “Kama Sutra: Learn The Art of Erotic Love”.

title: Learn to Struggle with Pain - 7 Day Course
description:
सीखे दर्द से जूझना
Voiceover Artist : Apurva Lahoti

title: Alan Turing : Decrypting Germans
description: 2nd World war mein Hitler ki nazi army ne aadha Europe jeet liya tha, wajah thi ek secret code machine "Enigma", jiski wajah se England ki pareshani badhne lagi thi. Tab ek genius ne aisi machine banayi jis se raato raat saare nazi attacks fail hone lage. Iss Super Hero ka Naam tha " DR. Alan Turing ". Chaliye Sunte hai Artificial Intelligence ke Pita ki kahani jinki waje se world war 2 saal pehle khatam ho gaya aur humari mordern technology ka invension hua.

title: Detective Ajay - Katil aage Museebat Peeche
description: Teen raat lagatar hawaldar Mangatram ko teen admiyon ne apni maut ki khabar marne se pahle di is umeed me ki unki jaan bach jaye magar thodi hi der me unki lashen unke ghar me baramad hui aur dheere dheere ye mauton ka khel ek uljha raaz ban gaya jise suljhane aaya hai “Ajay ek Shaukiya Jasoos'' magar mandrane laga hai usi ki jaan pe khatra . Kya hai in mauton ka raaz ? Kaun hai Katil aur Kyu hai Jasoos Ajay ki bhi jaan khatre me ? Kya Ajay suljha payega iss case ko ya banegi uske bhi Murder ki case file ?

title: Emotions ko kaise control karein?
description: Humare Past mein kuch aise incident ho jate hai, jo humare dimag mein ghar kar jate hai, hum bahar se to thik lagte hain par andar hi andar vo humein weak karte rahte hai. Hum na chah kar bhi unhi thoughts ko baar baar banate rahte hai aur khul kar apne aap ko express nahi kar pate hai. Is series mein hum Healing par baat karenge jo in problems se bahar nikalne ka aur khud ko fir se nayi energy se bharne ka ek shandaar solution hai.

title: Gautam Buddh Aur Unke Updesh
description: Buddh ne kaha hai ki main tumhe kya sikhaun, satya kabhi sikhaya nahi jaa sakta, satya ko apnaya jata hai. Is audiobook mein Gautam Buddh ke dwara diye gaye wo Updesh hain jise sunkar shayad aapki zindagi badal jaye. Kuch aisi baatein jo hum jaante to hain par use khud par apply kaise karte hain wo nahi jaante. Kya hai Bhagwaan Buddh ke Siddharth se Buddha banne ki kahani?Aur kyun sab chhodkar wo chal pade the Nirwan ki raah par janne ke liye suniye ye Audio Book jiska naam hai "Gautam Buddh Aur Unke Updesh".

title: The Abandoned Son- Karna
description: Suryaputra hote hue bhi jise hamesha Sutputra ke naam se jana gaya, Maharani Kunti ka beta hote hue bhi jise  Radha Maa ne pala, wo shoorveer, hai Karna. Jiske Kul ke naam par kabhi Dronacharya ne shiksha dene se mana kiya, to kabhi Rajkumari Draupadi ne apmaan kiya, wo hai Karna. Par phir bhi, apne dost Duryodhan ko diye vaade ke liye jo Mahabharat ke yudh mein aakhiri sans tak khada tha, jisne apne bhaiyon par bhi vaar kiya, wo tha Karna. Is khas peshkash mein jaante hai, The Abandoned Son- Karna ki mahagatha.

title: Body Language
description: Kya apko pata hai hamaari 70% se zyada communication words se nahi hoti, balki body language se hoti hai. Agar aapko bhi us insaan ki tarah confident aur cool banna hai jo poore confidence ke saath stage par chadta hai aur ek smile ke saath niche utarta hai to yeh kitaab aap ke liye hai. Vinay Mohan Sharma Ji ki likhi hui "Body Language" Sirf Kukufm Par.

title: Apnaye Chanakyaneeti har roz
description: Hamare dainik jeevan ke saath corporate jeevan k prabandhan kaise kare, workplace aur ghar ka balance kaise banaye rakhe. baccho ke saath values kaise jode aur ghar ko kaise sambhale. Aise 360 degree mein margadarshan karne wali ye book summary zaroor sunein! Agar aapko "Chanakya In Daily Life" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: The Secret Diary of Kasturba
description: Pati mahatma, beta satyagrahi, in sabke beech mein khud ki zindagi bas qurbani. Yahi haal tha, Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi ki wife Kasturba Gandhi ka. Jo baal vivah ka shikaar hokar ek aise insaan ki patni ban gayi thi, jinke liye khud ki aatma-santushti hi important thi. Pati ke baad bete ka andaaz bhi aisa hi tha, jo khud desh ke liye satyagrahi aur mahatma ban gaye. Lekin in sabke beech Kasturba ne apni 62 saal ki zindagi apne alag-alag role nibhate huye bita di. Aaj bhale Kasturba ki maut ko kayi saal ho gaye hai, lekin The Secret Diary of Kasturba mein wo zinda hai. Ye audiobook humein batayegi ki 62 saal ki zindagi mein Kasturba ne kya kya kimat chukayi thi. Aaiye unke haal ko is audiobook mein jaane, sirf Kuku FM par!

title: Heart Attack Se Bachne Ke Tareeke
description: Aaj se kuch saalon Pehle humein Lagta tha ki sirf zyada age ke logon ko hi heart attack aata hai lekin aajkal toh poori tarah se physically Fit youngsters ko bhi Heart attack aa raha hai. Toh kya hai iska reason yeh janne ke liye aapko KUKU FM ka yeh original show sunna hoga, jismein heart attack se jude har ek sawal ka jawab milne wala hai, jaise ki achanak se heart attack kaise aa jaata hai aur isse bachne ka perfect tareeka kya hai?

title: Basic Indian Astrology
description: Indian Astrology ya Jyotish shastra keval bhavishya batane tak simit nahi hai isme bahut kuchh janne aur sikhne ke layak hai. Ye ek sabse purani scientific padhtti hai jiske madhyam se ham universe ko samajh sakte hai. Tare Sitare, Grah, Nakshatra kaise hamari life me role play karte hai aur ham apni Life ko or behtar tarike se kaise ji sakte hai Astrology hame sikhati hai. Is Series me hamne koshis ki hai ki ham aap tak Astrology ki basic jankari pahunchaye, jisse aap bhi iska labh utha sake.

title: Future Of Indian Agriculture Sector
description: Aaj ke waqt mein hum future technology ki baat kar rahe hain, Business, Industries, Infrastructure, Science in areas mein lagaatar humara desh aage badh raha hai. Lekin inn sabse bhi kahin zyada important agar kuch hai to woh hai humara Agriculture Sector jispar hum sab depend karte hain. To aakhir kya hai humare India ke agriculture sector ka future plan? Aur aane wale samay mein kaun kaun si technology Agriculture Sector mein use hone wali hai? Jaanenge humare iss Audio show "Future Of Indian Agriculture Sector" mein.

title: मौत आई दबे पाँव
description: बॉलीवुड की चकाचौंध अक्सर आँखों में धूल झोंक देती है।  कुछ अभिनेता इससे खुद को बचा कर बाहर हो जाते हैं तो कुछ इसकी चपेट में आ खुद को खो देते हैं।  ऐसा ही एक केस आया प्रशांत सिंह का जिसे सुलझाने पहुंचे आपके अपने डिटेक्टिव अनुज ! क्या वो इस केस को सुलझा पायेगा? या रह जायेगा ये एक ऐसा केस जिसे न सुलझा पाया डिटेक्टिव अनुज भी? जानने के लिए सुनिए अनिल गर्ग द्वारा लिखित ये कहानी "मौत आयी दबे पाँव"

title: Iron Will: The Jamshedji Tata Story
description: Pichhli sadi ke sabse bade philanthropist maane jaane wale Jamshedji Tata ne hamare desh ko wo sab diya jo aaj tak koi businessman nahi de paya. Chahe wo India ki top university ho ya sapne jaisa ek shehar - Tatanagar. Par ghulami, gareebi aur illiteracy se joojhte desh mein ek better India ka sapna dekhne wale Jamshedji ye sab kaise kar paaye? Aur kaise unhone Tata jaisi itni badi company banaai? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein.

title: Tuesdays With Morrie
description: Zindagi Aur Maut Ek Hi Sikke Ke Do Pehlu Hain Lekin Maut Ek Aisi Haqeeqat Hai Jise Hum Jaante Hue Bhi Svikaar Nahi Kar Paate. Kya Jaise Hum Jee Rahe Hain Wo Sach Mein Zindagi Jeene Ka Sahi Tareeka Hai? Aayiye Samjhte Hain Is Audiobook Mein.

title: Ghost Temple
description: भारतीय ऐतिहासिक सर्वेक्षण करनें वाली टीम एक विशेष प्रोजेक्ट पर काम कर रही है। उस प्रोजेक्ट का मकसद भारत के ऐतिहासिक मंदिरों का सर्वेक्षण करके इतिहासिक तथ्यों की पुष्टि करना है। इसी क्रम में रूद्र और उसकी टीम उत्तराखंड के एक ऐसें गाँव  में पहुचती है जहाँ  100 साल पहले पलायन हो गया परन्तु पलायन क्यों हुआ और कैसे यह आज तक किसी को भी नही पता। इसी की तलाश में उन्हें पता चलता है यह कोई आम मंदिर नही है बल्कि भूतों  का मंदिर है। इसी के बीच हो जाती है किसी से एक गलती, और सभी टीम मेंबर एक एक कर के लग जाते हैं मरने। रूद्र का क्या होगा? क्या  वह उस गलती को सुधार पायेगा? क्या वह वहाँ से बाहर निकल पायेगा या बस वह भी भूतों की दुनिया में समाहित हो जाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनिए ये कहानी Ghost Temple....

title: Buddh Nirvan Ki Rah Par
description: Kaise Kapilvastu ke rajkumar Siddhartha ban jate hain “Gautam Buddh”. Vo Buddh jinhone duniya ko shanti aur karuna ka aisa gyan diya jise aaj bhi log amit mante hain aur us rah par chalte hain. Bhagwan Buddh ke Buddh banne aur updeshon ki kahani batane ke liye Kuku Fm le aaya hai “ Buddh Nirvan Ki Rah Par” kitab ki ye khas audiobook. Agar aapko Buddha's Brain jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Stock Market Genius Baniye
description: Ek successful find manager  se share bazar ke liye , case studies, background information aur stock market genius banne ke liye aavashayak sabhi tools se bhari hui ye summary book aapko top investment opportunities ke baare meinn batayegi! Agar aapko "The Little Book that still beats the Market" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: शापित योद्धा - सीजन 1
description: मुंबई के चौपाटी इलाके कटी हुई तीन लाशें मिलने से पूरे मुंबई में खलबली मच जाती है। लेकिन पुलिस के लिए सबसे बड़ी पहेली है इन तीनों लाशों के सिर गायब है। दूसरी ओर कुछ दिन बाद मुंबई के प्रमुख अस्‍पतालों में सिलसिलेवार बम धमाके होते हैं। किसने इस हादसे को अंजाम दिया? मीडिया पुलिस पर सवाल उठाने लगती है। क्‍या पुलिस केस को सुलझा पाएगी? सिर कटी लाशें और सिलसिलेवार बम ब्‍लास्‍ट क्‍या दोनों केस आपस में जुड़े हुए हैं? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Ideas Factory - Generate Great Ideas Everyday
description: Kya aapko kabhi aisa mehsoos hota hai ke yeh insaan kitna genius hai, kaash main bhi aisa hota? Ya fir iske jaise ideas mujhe kyu nahi aate? Agar iska jawaab haan hai to yeh kitaab apke liye hai. Ache ideas sochna ek skill hai jisko practice kiya ja sakta hai. Agar aap bhi apne genius dost ki tarah ache ideas generate karna chahte hain to suniye "Ideas Factory" Sirf KukuFM par.

title: Reset Your Diet
description: Hum sabhi din-b-din apni health ko lekar kaafi alert hote ja rahe hai. Kyuki fit rahne ki khwaish to har kisi ke dil mein hoti hai. Par kya aapko pata hai, humari body ki health humare metabolism par sabse zyada nirbhar karti hai. Chaliye jante hai iss audio book se ki hum sahi metabolism kaise bana sakte hai aur kaise pro-metabolic foods ke zariye apne aap ko fit rakh sakte hai

title: नसीबों का लिखा
description:
पिता के देहांत के बाद काजल की सौतेली मां और भाई उसे घर से निकाल देते हैं। मरने से पहले काजल के पिता ने गांव के छोटे ठाकुर शौर्य से अपनी बेटी को संभालने का वचन लिया था इसलिए वे उसे अपने घर ले जाते हैं। लेकिन बुरा वक्‍त काजल का पीछा नहीं छोड़ता है। आखिर क्‍या होता है काजल के साथ? क्‍या उसके जीवन में सवेरा होता है?
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : Preeti Karn

title: History of Genghis Khan
description: Mongol ke kabeelo mein pala badha Temujin aage chalkar Genghis Khan ban jaayega, aisa bhala kaun soch sakta tha. The Great Alexander ka empire bhi Genghis Khan ke saamrajya ke saamne chota saabit hota hai. Mongol ke khule maidaano aur khatarnaak mahol se hokar yeh kabeelayi sardaar aakhir puri duniya mein sabse bada parcham haasil karega, yeh namumkin ko mumkin karne wali jeevani hi ho sakti hai. Toh aaiye sunte hai etihaas mahaan Changez Khan, jinki takdeer Temujin se badalkar har jung mein khoon ki nadiyaa bahadene wale Genghis Khan mein badal gayi!

title: Shiv se Shivata Tak
description:
शिव से शिवत्व तक | लेखक - आशुतोष
Voiceover Artist : Shrikant Sinha
Author : Ashutosh

title: The Curious Parent
description: Har roz hum bachon ke saath samay bitate hai. Hamara har bitaya hua samay bachon pe ek chhoti si chhap chhod deta hai. In choti choti chaapon se guzar kar bacha bada hota hai. Har chaap ka bachey par asar hota hai. Chaliye thodi baatein karte hai bacchon aur parenting ke baare mein. For any questions related to parenting, you may connect with Harpreet on Instagram at harpreet_thecuriousparent or write to him at hello@thecuriousparent.com

title: एजेंट मैरी
description: Bharat Pakistan aur Anya Padosi desho ke bich ka Takrav hamare desh ke liye Kahi bar Khatarnak Sabit hua hei. Unn Sajisho ko naakamyab karte RAW ke agent Marry ki bahaduri ki yeh kahani Sabhi Mei Desh Bhakti ki ek lahar laa degi.

title: Hanuman Chalisa
description: Hanuman ji ki aradhna se unke bhakton ke man mein ek alag si urja ka sanchaar hota hai jo kisi bhi prakar ki burai ka naash karke humein ek behtar insaan banne mein madad karti hai. Hanuman ji ke  bhakton ke liye Hanuman Chalisa bahut mayne rakhti hai isiliye KuKu FM par hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain Hanuman Chalisa Saar. Jahan hum har chaupai ka matlab samjhenge Aur Hanuman Ji ki mahima ko jaanege.

title: The Power of Connections
description: Agar zindagi mein koi humse pucche ki aap kaun hai, toh sabhi log main ke sath uss sawal ka jawab dete hai. Par hum yeh bhul jate hai ki humari zindagi mein har chiz ka credit sirf humara hi nahi hota. Isme humare aas paas ke logon ka bhi contribution hota hai. Lekin un logon se contact banaye rakhn humare liye time consuming hota hai, isliye, aage badhne ki race mein hum unhe picche chhod dete hai. The Power of connections ki book summary mein hum yahi janenge ki kin baaton par dhyan dekar hum apne social relationship ko majbut bana sakte hai.

title: Warren Buffett Ke Management Sootra
description: Top 10 billionaires mein se ek Warren Buffet ke baare mein hum sab jante hi hai, ve na sirf ek Long Term Investor hai par ek unique business manager bhi hai. In dono hi roop mein Buffet ki safalta ka mool mantra hai Sahi vyavsaay ko chunna. Inke Business Management ke yahi gyaan ko hum janenge is audiobook mein jise likha hai Pradeep Thakur ne. Agar aapko The Warren Buffet Way naam ki kitab pasand hai to is audiobook ko zaroor sunein.

title: Vampire Desires
description: Vampire's Kingdome ki salon purani bujhi aag me chingari ban kar dahak uthi hai do same blood ke vampires ke beech ki jang Ek taraf Humans ke beech me jahan ghul rahi hai in Vampires ki zindagi wahin mandra raha hai ek bade war ka khatra. Jang ka anjaam jo bhi ho magar is kingdome pe hai kisi ki buri nazar. Kya hoga jab is jang ka leader hi ghum ho jayega Meghna ke pyar me. Kahi  ek Vampire ka Love attraction , “Moonstone” ki is jung me kisi bade khatre ki ahat to nahi?

title: Comprehensive Computer Learning
description: Aaj ke daur mein jise computer nahi aata. Use daily life ki bahut saari cheezeon mein bahut mushkil ho sakti hai. Isliye Kukufm Aap ke liye lekar aya hai Yogesh Patel dwara likhi hui kitaab Comprehensive Computer Learning jisme aapko pata chalega ke computer darasal shuru kahan aur kabse hua aur kaise itni jaldi insaani jiwan ka imporant hissa ban gaya. Saath hi saath apko is kitaab mein computer ki madad se hone vaale basic kaam seekhne bhi milenge jaise ke email , google search, etc. To suniye Comprehensive Computer Learning sirf kukufm par.

title: The Leadership Mindset
description: Infosys ke founder Narayan Murthy ko aaj kaun nahi janta ? Unhone sirf 20 saal ki umar mein company ka bhar sambhala or company ko itni uchai par pahuchaya ki aaj uska revenue lagbhag 1 lakh dollar ke karib hai. Par sawal yeh hai ki Narayan Murthy ne company ko itna safal banaya kaise ? Narayan Murthi ek aise leader the jo apne aaspass ke logo ki buddhi ka upyog karte aur unka samman karte, un ki yogyata ko pehchante. Aaj hum isi vishay par charcha karenge aur samjhenge ki kaise ek successful leader ban sakte hai. Agar aapko Carol S. Dweck dwara likhi "Mindset" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko behad pasand aayegi.

title: Socrates
description: Aap me se shayad hi koi aisa ho jisne Sukraat ya Socrates  ka naam na sun ho. Yunaan ka vahi prasiddh darshnik jisne jeewan ke bade se bade rahasya ko apne quotes ke madhyam se logon ko samjhaya.Jisne Jeewan aur use jeene ka sahi maksad logon ko bataya.Jisne logon ko prem ka sahi matlb samjhaya.Aise mahaan Philosopher ki jeewani ham aapke liye Audio book form me laaye hain.To aaiye jaante hain  Socrates ke baare men kuch unjaani baaten.

title: Reporter Nidhi Chauhan : Khoon se Ranga Chaku
description: Raghav ne apni aukat ke bahar ja kar chalaya kisi Ameerjadi ladki se shadi ka chakkar, aur phans gaya apni hi patni ke murder case me !! magar apni begunahi ko sabit karne ke liye Raghav ne liya Crime Reporter Nidhi Chauhan ka sahara ! ab kaise pahunchegi Reporter Nidhi chauhan Poorvi ke asli Qatilon tak?? Kya mil payega Nidhi ko koi rasta ya Fansi ke fande ka shikar ho jayega Raghav bechara?? Janne ke liye Abhi sunein.

title: Shootout - The Bihar Chapter
description:
Bihar jail me orchestra se shuru hui ye kahaani raajneeti ke shikhar tak pahunch gyi. Bihar me is samay kuch aise kaand hue jo pehle kabhi nhi hue the. Apraadh aur Varchasv ki duniya me naya prayog karne wala tha Guddu Tiwari. Zafarpur ke ek middle class parivaar me paida hue Guddu ne kaise khoon aur badle ki aag se likhi apni alag daastaan?
Kaise teen bhaiyon ne bihar ke apraadh jagat me lahraya apna parcham? Ek aisa train kaand jiska kisi apraadhik itihaas me zikr nhi. Kuch aise kisse jinhein koi apni zubaan par bhi nhi laana chahta. Sunein Bihar ke zameen ki dil dehlaa dene wali kahani.

title: Khoon aur Paisa
description: Hindustan ke do aise gharon ki kahaani jo America se shuru ho kar, Mumbai ke Raheja Mansion mei khatam hoti hai. Jo humei seekhati hai ki 'Baap bada na bhaiya, Sabse Bada Rupaiya.' Properties aur Companies ki îs jhadap mei do purane dost, Shiv aur Gautam jaani dushman ban jaate hain. Aur dusri taraf, Reyansh ki Aashiqui aur Garv ke Startup ka sapna, is dushmani ki wajah se khatam hone wala hota hai ki tabhi ek Happy Ending ki shuruaat hoti hai. Toh is paheli ko suljhaane ke liye, aap tap kariye Episode 1 ko aur chaliye hamare saath America ki galiyon mei.

title: Price Action Trading
description: Agar Aap bhi Stock Market Ki Duniya Mein Naye Hain Lekin Trading Ki Alag Alag Techniques Ko Seekh Kar Paisa Kamana Chahte Hain Toh Ye Audiobook Aapke Liye Hain. Chaliye Seekhte Hain Price Action Trading Aur Jante Hain Trading Ke Unh Pillar Ko Jo Bnayenge Aapko Ek Successful Trader.

title: Detective Ragini - Ye Raat Badi Katil
description: Mujrim ko Phansi tak le jane wale Detective Anuj ko hi is baar lag gaya Choona kisi ki Maut ke ilzam ka. Anamika ki Qatil adaaon me ulajh kar phans gaye hain Anuj babu. Akhir kisne racha hai ye Qatilana khel Detective Anuj ke liye ? Kya Detective Ragini bacha payegi apne guru ko is baar ?

title: Personality Development Course
description: 30 din apni daily life ka 1 ghanta dekar aap is audio show se apni poori "Personality" change kar sakte hain. Is course me aap apni body language se lekar apne sochne tak ke tareeke me badlaav la payenge. Ab bas apni daily life se roz ek ghanta nikaal kar, lijiye pehla kadam apni "Personality" ko change karne ka.

title: Make The Right Choice
description: Hum sab life mein decision lete hain aur usi ka fal hame baad mein milta hai. Fir chahe vo carrier se related ho, life partner se related ho ya apni family se related ho. Lekin sabse zyada mayne rakhta hai ki aap kaise sahi cheezein choose karte hain . Ek galat choice bhi life ko kharab kar deti hai. Isiliye hum aapke liye le aaye hain "Make The Right Choice" Book ki Audiobook vo bhi Hindi mein. Jahan aap janege ki kaise sahi cheezon ko choose karein aur successful hon.

title: Super Shark Anupam Mittal
description: Kaun nahi jaanta Shark Tank India ko, startups main invest karte yeh sharks hain kaun? Ye, question aapko bhi aata hoga na? Inhi mein se aaj sabse witty Shark Anupam Mittal ki life journey par le challenge aapko. Anupam wahi hain jinhone Shaadi.com jaisi company banayi aur chha gaye worldwide. Jis zamane mein internet ka boom nahi tha us waqt internet par business kaise kiya shark Anupam Mittal ne? Kaise hai shark Anupam Mittal ko har ek field ki itni knowledge aur bhi bahut kuch juda unse jaanenge is exclusive audiobook mein taaki aap bhi unse inspire ho kar apna dhanda bana sakein.

title: नरपिशाचों कि बस्ती
description: Ek gaav jo saalo pehle ujad chuka hai aur ab Narpishaacho ka gadh hai. Is baat se anjaan ujjwal ke pita saalo baad apne gaav ki zameen behcne jaate hai. Jahan narpishaach unhe maar daalte hai. Apne pita ki talaash mein ujjwal apne do doston ke saath waha pahuchta hai, jaha use rahasymayi cheeze dikhaye deti hai. Madad ke liye wah police station jaata hai, lekin koi sahayta nahi milti. Raaste mein ek aghori milte hai aur yaha se shuru hota hai ek anjaan safar aur rahasymayi ghatnayo ka daur.

title: UPSC Success Story - Naveen Rattu
description: KukuFm Aaap ke liye laya hai Officer Naveen Rattu Ji Ka Exclusive interview Jisme yeh humein btaati hain UPSC Aur zindagi Ke Baare mein Bahut saari insightful baatein. Agar Aap bhi UPSC clear karna chahte hain to suniye yeh interview sirf KUKUFM par.

title: How To Start Career As A Freelancer
description: Corona pandemic ke dauran jab financial crisis ka period chala to kai companies ne apne shutter down kar diye, hazaro logo ki job chali gayi. Aise mein work from home ke naye trend ki shuruaat hui. Logo ne ghar beth ke naya business aur freelancing kaam karna shuru kiya. Lekin abhi bhi bahut aise log hai, jinhe freelancing ke baare mein knowledge nahi hai. Freelancing kya hai ? Ek freelancer ke taur par kaise kaam kiya ja sakta hai ? Kaun kaun se sites freelance kaam dhundhne mein madad kar sakte hai ? Yeh kuch sawal hai, uske baare mein hum aapko batayenge iss audiobook mein

title: Ghesu Chand Jasoos
description: घेसू चंद एक जीनीयस जासूस है और उसकी पार्टनर है इंस्पेक्टर रेखा यह दोनों मिलकर उलझे हुए केस सॉल्व करते रहते हैं चाहे वह केस मर्डर मिस्ट्री का हो।चाहे साइको किलर का किंतु पहली दफा यह दोनों ही मुसीबत में अलग-अलग फंस जाते हैं अपने दुश्मनों की साजिश का शिकार होकर। अब देखना होगा कि यह दोनों अपने दुश्मनों की साजिश का भंडाफोड़ करते हुए खुद को बचाने में सक्षम होते हैं या नहीं।या फिर दोनों ही अपने दुश्मनों की साजिश का शिकार होकर रह जाएंगे।

title: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar
description: Jai Bhim! Kalam aur shiksha ki taaqat se kya nahi haasil kiya jaa sakta hai, iska jeeta jaagta udaahran hai voh soch jinka naam hai Bharat Ratna Shri Bhimraoji Ambedkar. Bharat ka sanvidhaan inhi ki den hai. Harijan samaj mein janm lene wale yeh mahaapurush ka jeevan ek bahut badi aur anokhi prerna hai. Barabar jeene ka haq, equality aur apne adhikaaro ke liye kisi ke aage na jhukna aur aakhri saans tak apne karm ko karte jaana hi inke vyaktitva ki paribhaasha hai. Peshe se ek vakeel, mahavigyaani aur pichdi jaati ke lokneta - B.R. Ambedkar ek amar buland shakti hai jisne sabhi ko ek sareeka jeene ki umeed aur hausla diya. Aaiye jaante hai, inke aadarshvaadi jeevan ke baare mein.

title: Management Ke Mantra
description: Manager banna aur management karna do alag baatein hoti hai. Management ek aisi quality hai jiska manager se koi relation ho ya na ho, lekin har kisi ke personality se iska relation zaroor hai. Management ke 100 tarike log ek baar mein bata dete hai, lekin kya aapko unme se ek bhi sahi samay pe yaad hote hai? Nahi ! Inhi tarikon ko aapko asaani se yaad karwane ke liye, aur aapki life mein inki importance batane ke liye, pesh hai, Management ke Mantra ki ye audiobook!

title: Sacred Secrets: Erotic Art on Indian Temples
description: Brahmcharya ko pavitra mankar jeevan ke kendra mein rakhne wale Hindu dharm ke mandiron ke bahar bhi kyon aisi erotic murtiyan hain jinme sex positions dikhaye gaye hain? Aakhir kya hai is contradiction ka sach? Kya ancient India mein sex aur sex ko lekar baat karne ki azadi aaj se zyada thi? Ya in sculptures ke peechhe chhupa hai koi ‘sacred secret’? Jaante hain is show mein.

title: The Five W In Stammering
description:
The Five W in Stammering यानी हकलाहट के पाँच "क" यह किताब हकलाहट की समस्या के विषय को समर्पित है । अपनी इस किताब में मैने पाँच "क" , क्या ,क्यों , कब , कहाँ , कैसे
यानि
हकलाहट की समस्या क्या है ।
हकलाहट की समस्या क्यों पैदा होती है ।
हकलाहट की समस्या कब पैदा होती है ।
हकलाहट की समस्या कहाँ सबसे ज़्यादा यां कहाँ सबसे कम पैदा होती है ।
हकलाहट की समस्या को कैसे क़ाबू में किया जाए ।
इन सबका वर्णन करने की कोशिश की है ।
और इसके साथ हकलाहट के जीवन पर आधारित कुछ लोगों की कहानियाँ हैं। इन कहानियों में से कुछ कहानियाँ काल्पनिक हैं और कुछ सत्य जीवन पर आधारित हैं। और यह सब कहानियाँ हकलाहट के पाँच " क " को ध्यान में रख कर लिखी गई है। और साथ में इनके ज़रिये यह बताने की कोशिश की गई है की हकलाहट की समस्या से जूझ रहे व्यक्ति के जीवन कौन कौन सी समस्याएँ आती हैं और इस समस्या को कैसे क़ाबू में किया जाए ।
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Script Writer : Rohit Verma Rimpu

title: Network Marketing Ki Bhagwad Geeta
description: Mahabharat ke yuddh ki shuruaat me Arjun ko bohot saare confusions aur questions the aur Shri Krishna ne un sabhi ko solve kiya, jo bani Humari Bhagawat Geeta! waise he Network Marketing ki field me agar aap apna pehla step bhar rahe ho to aap ko bhi bohot saare questions honge, usi ko solve karne ke liye ye kitab aapki apne network marketing career me bhagwad geeta ke adhyay ke mutabik help karegi! to chaliye sunte hai

title: Control These Expenses- Spend Freely on Everything Else
description:
Kya Aapko har mahine apne bills pay karne aur savings karne mein problem ho rahi hai?
Kya aap salary to salary cycle se bahar  nikalkar har mahine jyada se jyada savings karna chahte hai? Yani ki kya aap money management seekhna chahte hai ? Taki abhi apne paise ko thoda thoda bachakar baad mein freely invest kar sake, agar han toh ise kaise asani se kiya ja skta hai ye janne ke liye is audiobook se perfect aur kuch nahi ho sakta. Kyuki ye aapko in sabhi savalon ke javab ekdam simple tarike se detail mein samjhayegi. Agar aapko 'Why Didn't they teach me this In School' jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Buffettology
description: Warren Buffett ki Investment Tips.

title: Defining You
description: Fiona Murden, ek behavior expert ke dwara likhi gayi is audiobook mein personal profile build karne ke questionnaires, 360 assessments aur self-reflection ki exercises di gayi hain, jo aapki madad karengi khud ka full potential pehchanne mein aur life mein successful hone ke liye. Yeh audiobook aapko behtar neend, spasht roop se sochne aur behtar mood mein kaise reh sakte ye samjhane mein bhi madad karegi. Inshort, yeh audiobook aapke liye ek guide ki tarah hai jiska istemaal karke aap apni life ko badal kar ise aur shandaar bana sakte hain. Agar aapko "A Really Good Day" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko khoob pasand aayegi.

title: Mansarovar - Aakhiri Heela
description: Mansarovar - Aakhiri Heela" ek prasiddh Hindi upanyas hai, jisme Premchand ne samajik bhedbhav ki baat ki hai. Is kahani mein ek paise wale businessman ki Zindagi ko bataya gaya hai, jiske jeevan ke uljhan aur samasyao ko kafi sahajta ke sath pesh kiya gaya hai.

title: The Story of Disrupters - Zerodha
description: Agar aap aaj minutes mein apne phone se hi apna paisa share market mein laga sakte hain to iska credit jata hai Zerodha ko. Zero aur Rodha se bane naam wali Zerodha company ne na sirf trading ko apni website aur mobile app ke zariye har hath mein pahunchaya, balki investing ke raste se har rodha mita diya. Par Zerodha ke founders Nitin aur Nikhil Kamath ne ye sab kaise hasil kiya? Aaiye sunte hain is show mein.

title: The Placebo Effect And How It Works
description: Agar aap se koi yeh kahe, ki aap apne dimag se bhi bimari ka ilaj kar sakte hai, to aap kya isko manenge ? Shayad nahi. Par hum aisa kar sakte hai. Aisa nahi hai ki hum uss bimari ko dimag se thik kar sakte hai par haan hum itna zaroor keh sakte hai ki dimag ki shakti ke bina koi dawai bhi humko kisi bimari se thik nahi kar sakti. Par aisa kaise ho sakta hai ? Janiye iss audiobook mein

title: How to stop Worrying and Start Living
description: Reasearch kehta hai ki physical illness ka sabse bada cause hai 'Worry'. Iss kitaab ke zariye kuch simple actionable technique ke saath aap iss Worry ko apni life se kam kar sakte hai. Suniye Dale Carnegie dwara likhit How to stop worrying and start living yeh audiobook

title: Suchna Ka Adhikar
description: Is desh mein sabhi tax bharte hai. Yahan gareebi rekha se niche rehne wala insaan bhi direct na sahi, lekin chizein kharidte waqt indirect tax zaroor bharta hai. Isi wajah se sabhi apne diye tax ka hisaab janna chahte hai. Wo janna chahte hai ki humari sarkar logon ke tax ka istemal kab, kaise aur kyun karti hai. Isliye democracy mein RTI yani 'Suchna Ka Adhikar' ek basic right hai, jispar sabka haq hai. Lekin iska istemal aap kaise kar sakte hai? Aur iske laagu hone ki wajah kya thi? Ise jante hai is audiobook mein!

title: Lijiye Behtar Financial Decisions
description: Aaj ke zamane mein ameer aur ameer aur gareeb aur gareeb hota ja rahe hai. Na hi hamara school hume aisi chize samajhne ke liye financial knowledge deta hai aur na hi koi trustworthy vyakti har kisi ko mil pata hai jisse ek common man ye information le sake. Ye show aapko tax se lekar kaise loan insan ko ameer bhi aur gareeb bhi bana sakta hai, aisi bahut sari financial jaankari dega jisse aap life mein behtar financial decisions le payenge. Agar Aapko "Financial Freedom" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Power of your Subconscious MIND
description: Avchetan man , ya subconscious mind ki power insaan ko jo chahiye wo dila sakti hai , jise hum inner power bhi kehte hai , " agar aap kisi chiz ko chaho , to puri kaaynaat use tumse milane ki sazish me lag jaati hai" ye dialogue to aapne suna he hoga . yahi hai subconscious mind ki power . to chaliye jante hai , kaise aap apne mind ki power se apke career, relationships aur health ko control karke ek achhi life jee sakte hai. Agar aapko "The Secret - Hero" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: OSHO: The Guru of Spirituality, Sex And Controversy
description: "Mai pagal hun aur jab tak tumhen pagal na kar dun tab tak ye dosti bani hi nahi". Ye shabd hain Osho ke, ek aisa insan jisne iss desh hi nahi puri duniya ko apne vicharon se hila kar rakh diya tha, ek aisa insaan jisne America mein jaake apne naam ka sheher basa diya, ek aisa insaan jo shadi jaise pavitra bandhan par bhi sawal khade karta tha, jisne sex aur spirituality ko alag dhang se pesh kiya. Aakhir kya hai isa Insan ki kahani? kyu aaj bhi log inke vicharon ko sunkar prabhavit ho jaate hain? aur aakhir kaise hui thi inki mrityu janne ke liye suniye “Osho: The Guru of Spirituality, Sex and Controversy” Ka ye Show.

title: Veg vs Non-Veg. Which is better?
description: Vegetarianism aur non vegetarianism mein kai sadiyon se debate hai. Magar aisa kyun hai ki kuch janwaro ko khaane ki society se maanyata milti hai magar baakiyo ki nahi? Kya hume ye decision lene ka adhikar hai? kYa hai dono ke fayde aur nuksan? Chaliye jaane

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description: Schools mein humara education system financial skills se zyada professional skills pe focus karta hai. Isi wajah se Log apne professional career mein accha success paane ke bavajood bhi financially strong nahi ho paate. Yeh book summary aapko apna dimaag aur waqt ka sahi istemaal karke apne investments aur business ke zariye wealth kamaane ke rules samjhaati hai. Is summary ko sun kar aap seekhenge ki kaise Aapke paise aapke liye kaam karenge naa ki aap paison ke liye. Chaliye sunte hain bestseller book Rich Dad Poor Dad jisse likha hai Robert Kiyosaki ki poori summary, sirf KuKu FM par! Agar aapko "Why We Want You To Be Rich" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Dark Secrets Of America
description: America duniya ka sabse bada desh hai, lekin kya ye sachmuch mein itna mahaan hai? Humare iss show "Dark Secrets of America" mein hum aapko batayenge America ke wo raaz jinhe aap pehle kabhi nahi jaante the. Yeh show aapko us America ke baare mein batayega jo aapne kabhi nahin suna hoga. Toh kya aap taiyar hain America ke raaz kholne ke liye ?

title: Kon hai Tere Andar
description: एक श्रापित नदी और दो नौजवान! यह कहानी है दो ऐसे नौजवानो की जिन्होंने लालच में आ कर एक ऐसा कदम उठा लिया जिससे उन्हें बनाना पड़ा खूंखार दानव. एक के बाद एक खून कर इन दानवों ने पुरे गांव में मचाया हड़कंप. क्या तांत्रिक अपनी शक्तियों से दिला पाएंगे नौजवानो को बेचैन आत्माओ से मुक्ति या फिर उनका गांव हो जायेगा बदनाम?

title: Shrimad Bhagwad Geeta: Samasyaon Ka Samadhan
description: Jeewan hai to samsya bhi hogi aur samasya hai to hal bhi hoga hi. Hum ye sab itne daawe se keh rahe hain kyuki humne sun li hai "SHRIMAD BHAGWAD GEETA: SAMASYAON KA SAMADHAN" ki bahut hi kamal ki Audiobook. Ismein Bhagwan Shri Krishna dwara diye gaye Geeta ke Updeshon se hamari aur aapki life mein chal rahi problems ka solution bataya gaya hai, Vo bhi kahaniyan sunakar. Chahe family problem ho, ya ho career problem ya life ka koi doubt. Sab ke milenge Jawaab .

title: The Leadership Sutra
description: Power ko zyadatar negative hi mana jata hai lekin power ek important tool hai jo kisi bhi vichar ke implementation ko influnce karta hai. Devdutt Pattanaik ki best seller Business Sutra se derive ki gayi yeh audiobook Hindu, Jain aur Buddh ki pauranik kathao se kahaniyon ka upyog karke power aur leadership mein chauka dene vale insights deti hai. Yeh audiobook pauranik kathao ko alag alag modern life incidents se jod kar hume yeh batati hai ki kaam aur personal life se kaise deal karein aur acche samadhan ke saath kaise aage badhein. Agar aapko "Start With Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunien.

title: जिंदगी की यही रीत है
description: College me Shweta ka pahla din hai, lekin ragging ke dar se wah college ke andar nahin ja rahi hai. Param ka group Shweta ki madad karta hai aur wah ragging se bach jaati hai. Lekin Shweta man me Param ke group ke prati kharab hi sochti hai aur doosre din baat na karne ka faisla karti hai. Wahin doosre din khud Param ka group  usse poori tarah anjaan behave karta hai. Shweta ko apni galti ka ehsaas hota hai aur wah unse dosti karna chahti hai. Lekin Param ke group se dosti karna mushkil hi nahin namumkin hai. Jab yah baat Shweta ko pata chalti hai, to wah thaan leti hai ki is group se dosti karke rahegi. Akhir aisa kyon hai ki Param ka group nae logon ko dost kyon nahin banata? Yah group jaruratmand logon ki sahayta to karta hai lekin kisi se judte nahin hai! to kya Shweta is group se dosti kar paegi? Agar dosti ho jati hai, to lya Param aur Shweta ka rishta dosti se aage badh paega? Janane ke liye sune poori kahani.

title: Raakh
description: Shahar me ek ke baad ek milti laashon ne police ke hosh faakhta kar diye. Katl kisne kiye aur kyun? jali laashein, ansuljhe rahasya aur lapata katil ki khoj me nikle Inspector Ranveer jise suraag paane ke liye karna pada maut ka chakravyuh paar aur jiske haath saboot ke taur par lagi sirf "Raakh".

title: Iron Mike: The Journey
description: "Mike Mike Mike” ring ke bahar yeh halla aur tv par live boxing show jahan bas dua ki jaa ri hai mike Boxing ka koi danw pench khele aur jeet jaye. Yeh Flashback Mike Tyson ki Boxing aur unke lie duniya bhar mein craze ko batane ke liye kafi hai. Lekin Boxing mein number one maane jane wale mike asal mein bachpan mein darpok the. Aur unka kaam chori aur daka dalna tha. Aap vishwas karenge? Lekin kehte hain Qismat aur Talent insan ki Zindagi palat kar rakh deti hai. Aur Mike Tyson bhi ek chor se ban gaye Boxing Champion. Yeh audiobook series apko Mike ke isi bachpan se rubaroo karwate hue unki liife ke har pehlu se mulakaat karwayegi aur aap mike tyson ki life journey ko aur bhi achhe se jaan paoge.

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hai Bharatvarsh : Shivaji Maharaj
description: Janiye Shivaji Maharaj ki jibankatha. Jab Delhi ka saltanat mein Mughal samrat apni shakti ke pradarshan kar rahe the, tab uski bipaksha mein pratirodh ki ek ag thi Shivaji Maharaj. Samgra Maratha Janajati ko unhone ekatma kar ke ladai ke ranbhumi par abatirna huye aur kadi jawab di Mughala saltanat ko. Aised hi birta se purna ek mahajiban ki kahani suniye kukufm par

title: Money Making League
description: Har kisiko entrepreneur banne ki iccha hai, har koi apna startup chahta hai. Stock market ko samjhna chahta hai, cryptocurrency mein invest karna chahta hai. Iss audio course mein aapko money related saare sawaalon ke jawaab aasani se milenge. Toh Paisa kamao aur paisa badhaao. Agar aapko "One Up On Wall Street" jaisi books pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Understanding of Metaverse
description: Kya aapne socha hai ki aap apne sofa pe baithke school ya office jaasakte hai, games khel sakte hai, store mein jaake shoping kar sakte hai. Bhagwaan ne is duniya ko aur insaan ko banaya par ab insaan apni hi ek nayi duniya banaraha hai. Aaiye jaante hai iss duniya ke baare mein

title: Will AI Or ChatGPT Take Our Job ?
description: Man vs Machine, yeh debate saalon se chalti aayi hai, lekin aaj woh sachaiyon ki roop mein saamne aa rahi hai. ChatGPT, ek artificial intelligence model, jo kam samay mein accurate kaam karta hai, kya woh sach mein humare liye khatra hai? Kya AI sach mein humare kaam ko affect kar sakta hai, humein replace kar sakte hai? Yeh duniya, jise hum sirf filmo mein dekhte hai, kya woh sach ho sakti hai? Kya machines hum insaano se bhi aage nikal jayenge? Toh iss audio show mein aaiye aur jaaniye, kya hai iska sach

title: शनि : प्यार पर टेढ़ी नज़र | लेखक - पंकज कौरव
description: Shani ki mahadasha se hokar gujar rahe software engineer Neerav Kant ke jeevan me ek jyotishi ki bhavishyawani jeevan me ek ladki ke ane par bhagyodaya hone ki thi lekin uske jeevan me aa dhamakti hain do ladkiyan Arpita aur Ragini. In dono me se kis ladki ke pas hai uski kismat ki chabi? Yahi Neerav Kant ke liya sabse badi paheli hai... Kya yah puzzle sulajh paegi???

title: Operation Smiling Buddha- Pokhran Nuclear Test
description: 18 May, 1974 ko Buddh Purnima ke din Bharat ne pehli baar atom bomb ki testing Pokhran mein ki jise 'Pokhran-1' ya 'Operation Smiling Buddha' kehte hai. Par ye Operation duniya hi nahi Bharat ke andar bhi kaafi khofiya tareeke se kiya gaya tha. Iski khabar Home Ministry aur Defense Ministry tak ko nahi thi. Is Operation ka puri duniya ne virodh kiya aur Bharat pe sanctions bhi lagaye, kyuki United Nations Security Council ka permanent member na hote hue bhi Bharat ne nuclear testing ki. UPSC mein aane wale aur bhi questions ke sawal jane is show se.

title: बदकिस्मत कातिल
description:
एक ही दिन में उसके हाथों दो क़त्ल हुए- एक उसके दुश्मन का दूसरा उसका जिसे वो पागलपन की हद तक प्यार करता था। वह एक बदकिस्मत कातिल था। पर उसकी किस्मत कुछ ऐसी थी कि जावेद-अमर-जॉन उसे अंत तक पकड़ न सके।
writer: शुभानंद
Voiceover Artist : RJ Manish
Author : Shubhanand
Producer : Saransh Studios

title: UPSC Success Story - IAS Komal Ganatra
description: KukuFm Aaap ke liye laya hai IAS Komal Ganatra Ji Ka Excludive interview Jisme yeh humein btaati hain UPSC Aur zindagi Ke Baare mein Bahut saari insightful baatein. Agar Aap bhi UPSC clear karna chahte hain to suniye yeh interview sirf KUKUFM par.

title: Ayurvedic Home Remedies
description: Explore kijiye ek anokha show jo aapke liye ek guide ki tarah kaam karega, aur aapko western treatment ke badle ayurvedic upayon ke ke baare mein batayega. Sardi, flu, gale mein kharash, muhase, high cholesterol aur anxiety jaisi aam bimariyon ke liye ayurvedic upaay kya hai? Ye jaane ke liye is special show ko zaroor sunein.

title: Panipat: The Battle Ground of Ancient India
description:
Panipat ki ladai kisne jeeti? Aakhir kyun shuru hui thi ye Jung? Aur kyu ki is ladai me lakho logon ne apni jaan. 
Panipat ki ladai ka zikr aye din hum kahi na kahi sun lete hai, lekin aaj is show mein apko batayenge is ladai se jude kuch aise raaz jinke khulte hi apke man mein panipat ki ladai ko le kar kai aur sawal jaag jayenge.

title: Karz Se Bahar Nikalne Ke Tareeke
description: "Dekhan mein chhote lagein, ghaav kare gambhir" yeh kahawat karz ko define karne ke liye kaafi hai. Aksar hum apni lifestyle ko behtar banane ke liye karzon ke trap mein fanste chale jaate hain aur humein samajh bhi nahi  aata ki ab in sab se bahar kaise nikla jaaye? Yeh Original series aapki inhi karzon ke trap se free hone mein help karegi, jise sunkar aap karz se bahar nikalne ke saare tareeke aur humesha karz se free rehne ki techniques ko bhi jaan jaayenge.

title: How to stay fit in our Busy Life
description: Kitni ajeeb baat hai ki apne 24 ghante ki life mein se humare paas 1 ghanta apni health ke liye nahi hota. Shayad yahi wajah hai ki pehle ke comparison mein ab bimariyan 70% badh gayi hai. Kyunki fitness ek aisi chiz hai jispar kaam sabhi karna chahte hai, lekin uske liye koi kaam karta nahi hai. Is audiobook ke zariye aaiye jante hai ki hum apni fitness par kaise kaam kar sakte hai.

title: Sewasadan
description: Humare samaj mein Mahilaon ko samman dene ki baat hoti hai, lekin sirf baat! jab baat aati hai ki vo ghar se bahar nikle kitchen chhod kar kuch aur kaam bhi kare tab sabki aankhen lala ho jati hain. Mahan writer Munshi Premchand ne bhi apne upanyas Sewasadan mein isi samasya ke baare mein likha ahai jo ek mahila ki kahani hai. Aur kya hai poori kahani suniye Is Audiobook mein.

title: Father's Pregnancy Guide
description: Kehte hai ki dharti par maa bhagwan ka roop hoti hai, jo ek jeevan ko janam deti hai. Par iss jeevan ke liye pita ka role bhi utna hi important hota hai. Dono saath milkar hi jeevan ke  iss padhao ko paar kar sakte hai. Toh kis tarah se as a husband aap would be mom ka khayal rakh sakte hai ? Kya pregnancy ke 9 mahine couples ek dusre ke saath sex kar sakte hai ? Kaunsa trimester risky hai ? Inn sab sawalo ka jawab aapko degi yeh audiobook

title: Haar Se Jeet Tak
description: "Haar Se Jeet Tak ", aapke liye aisa zariya ban sakti hai jisse aap apne failure se bhi bahut kuch seekh kar life ke goal achieve kar sakte hain.Ye Book bhi aapko isi ki jhalak dikhayegi ki writer ne kaise apni problems ko apna hatiyar banaya aur safal hue.

title: यादों की गिरफ्त में
description: एरिक की प्रेम कहानी की शुरुआत 9वीं कक्षा से होती है। क्रिस्चियन समुदाय के स्कूल में पढ़ने वाला एरिक जब एलीना को देखता है, तो उसे अपना बना लेने की चाह उसके हृदय में उमड़ने लगती है। परन्तु फिर 12वीं के बाद एलीना के माता-पिता दिल्ली में शिफ्ट हो जाते हैं। उसको एलीना का पता भी नहीं मालूम, ना उसके पास उसका फ़ोन नम्बर है। सोशल मीडिया से तो दूर-दूर तक नाता ही नहीं था। कारणवश दोनों को अलग होना पड़ता है। क्या ज़िन्दगी उन्हें दोबारा मिला पायेगी?

title: अलबेला - हिमयुग का महायोद्धा
description: Yeh Kahani aadiyug ki ankahi daastan hai, jiski har ghatna ke saath samay bhi apni karwat badalta raha! Aadikaal ke manushya ne apne maastishk mein ufante aajeebo gareeb sawalon ke jawab talash ne shuru kiye! Aadikaal ke manav ka jeevan ko kareeb se mehsoos karata hai yeh upanyas ussi Kraanti mein janma hua ek maamuli se dikhne waale insaan ka, jisne is himyug ki kahani badal kar rakh di, jo kahlaaya - 'himyug ka maha yodha - albela'. Kaun tha yeh Maanav? Aadiyug ka naayak tha ya koi aur? Jaan ne ke liye sune puri kahani!

title: The Cult of Che Guevara
description: "Che Guevara" The Guerilla warrior, The killing machine ya ek messiah? Kaun the Che Guevara jo aaj ki generation ke liye cult ban gaye.Wo icon jo lagbhag har kranti ka chehra hota hai aur Jise kai apna khuda mante hai lekin dusari taraf kayi bas ek sarphira khooni. Cuba men kranti laane wala ye insaan kaun tha? Kaise Che America ko aankh dikhane ka dam rakhta tha. Revolutionary Che ki kuch suni aur bahut saari ansuni kahani kukufm aapke liye laya hai is special show men.

title: As a Man Thinketh
description: Aapke actions aapke thoughts ka parinaam hai. Aap jaise apni duniya banaate hai waise hi aapko duniya banaati hai. Thoughts aapko young rakh sakte hai ya aapko jaldi se budha bhi bana skate hai. Agar aapko apni life ko master karna hai toh aapko power of thoughts ko samajhna bohot jaroori hai. Issi Power of thoughts ko aaiye seekhte hai iss audiobook mein

title: नफरत कभी बनेगी चाहत
description: Nimar behad talented, mehanati, sundar aur milansaar, seedha sada ladka hai. Uski life me twist tab aata hai jab use do alag-alag ladkiyon ne propose kiya. Ek uski MD to doosri colleague thi, ek pahle nimar se nafrat karti thi. Nimar yaha ek se hans bolkar baatein karta tha to wahin doosri se jhagda hota rehta tha, lekin aise waqt me wah  confuse nahi hota. Behad samajhdari se apna nirnay leta hai. Akhir Nimar kise apne jeevan sathi ke roop me sweekar karta hai? Sune poori kahani...

title: Finding Jobs in Pandemic Era
description:
This Is A Guide On "How To Get A Job In The Pandemic Era".
4 Categories Are Covered In This Audiobook
- Corona And Its Impact On The Job Market
- Job Kaise Dhoonde
- Sectors That Are Hiring And Sectors That Are Firing
- Some Pointers To Keep In Mind To Apply For The Job Digitally

title: Azad
description: Bhartiya Itihaas mein Chandrashekhar Azad ka naam suvarna aksharon mein ankit hai. Unke naam se bade bade british police adhiktar kaanp uthte the. Iss krantikaari ne apna jeevan desh par balidaan kar diya. Unhone azadi ka suryodav toh nahi dekha lekin ghulami ki kaali ghata ke khilaaf antt tak ladte rahe

title: The Curious Parent - Season 2
description:
Kaha jata hai "Bache bahut jaldi bade ho jaate hain" lekin yeh sirf parents ko lagta hai. Bachon ke liye to unka bachpan ek bahut khas aur lamba waqt hota hai. Unka yeh waqt behtar banane ke liye kya karein aur kya nahi? Agar yeh sawal aapke mann mein bhi aata hai to suniye parenting researcher Harpreet S. Grover ke dwara  khas aap ke liye tyaar ki gyi yeh audiobook sirf KukuFM par. 

For any questions related to parenting, you may connect with Harpreet on Instagram at harpreet_thecuriousparent or write to him at hello@thecuriousparent.com

title: Aankhein: The Blind Future
description: Ek taraf hai mahamari aur dusri taraf hai bhaai ko khojne ki jimmedari. Aise mein Dr. Saina ne tay kar liya hai ki wo apne bhai ko khojne ke liye kisi bhi had tak jane ko taiyar hai, phir chahe unhe maujooda sarkar se hi kyon na ladna pade. Aise mein uski mulakat hoti hai Masha se jo Kurenai naam kii sanstha se judi hai. Kurenai ek lambe arse se sarkar ke khilaf jung lad rahi hai. Masha Saina ko batati hai ki ye bimari Kurenai ne hi phailayi hai aur is bimari ko khojne wala koi aur nahi balki uska bhai hi hai. Kya Masha sach bol rahi hai? Kya Saina ka masoom bhaai koi bimari khoj kar use mahamari bana sakta hai? Kya ye sab sach hai? Kaun si duniya ki kahani hai ye? Janne ke liye sunein “Aankhein: The Blind Future”

title: The Power Of Education
description: Bill gates recommended yeh audiobook aapko samjhayegi ki Education aur Freedom kitna important hai aur kaise ek acche education se aap apna jeevan badal sakte hai. Kabhi na kabhi jeevan mein mushkil sabko aati hai jo ek Insaan ko puri tarah se tod deti hai, par un mushkilo se lad kar unpe jeet hasil karne wale ko hi sacha vijeta kehte hai aur aisi hi kahani ki charcha karenge hum is audiobook mein

title: Karma Chakra | Writer - Dr Vinita Rahurikar
description:
This is a thrilling, unbelievable story of five friends, who were unsatisfied with the way they had to live their life and relations. Then an unusual phenomenon happened, which turned their life around, and they came to know what life actually is and what true happiness is. This is a very uncommon but true story. Read how they find the way to happiness and satisfaction. 


Voiceover Artist : Rj ARV
Author : dr vinita rahurikar

title: Lord Parashurama
description:
Kya pata hai apko ki Parashurama ne kyun aur kaise kiya tha kshatriyaon ka vadh?
Is show mein apko pata chalega ki kaise ek sadharan dikhne wale Brahmin ne apni ek kulhadi se kai kitabon mein apna naam darz karwa diya.
Parashurama ko mile vardan, unki vidya, unki takat ki kahani hai apko ek romanchak safar par le jayegi..

title: GST Explained
description: GST lagu karna Sarkar ka ek aisa faisla tha jisne lagbhag iss desh ke sabhi businessman ko hila kar rakh diya. Shuruwat me ye itna complicated tha ki businessman isse samajhne ke liye aaye din GST house ke chakkar lagate the. Aakhir kya hai GST? Hume iski zarurat kyu padi? Kin kin chizon par lagta hai GST? Aakhir iske kya fayde aur nuksan hain? aur iss Tax system ke aane se humari zindagi aasan hui ya muskil? in sab ke baare me hum detail me batayenge aapko iss original Audio show me.

title: Paisa Ya Principles - How Company Can Be Great
description: Ek baar jo maine commitment kardi, phir to mein apne aap ki bhi nahi sunta. Yeh bolna bahut sahi lagta hai, par implement karne me utna hi mushkil hai, khaas kar ke tab, jab aap koi business chala rahe ho aur usko grow kar rahe ho. Kya iss success ke chakkar mein hum kisi tarike se apne principle aur core value ka dhyan rakh pate hai ? Agar nahi to, kaise rakh sakte hai ? Aur yeh zaroori kyon hai ? Jane iss audiobook mein

title: Poonia Murder Case
description: Paisa aksar khoon ke rishton ko bhi dav par laga deta hai, lekin Poonia Murder Case ek esa aitihasik case hai, jismein apno ki maut ka karan sirf paisa hi nahi, balki thi bachpan se jalti a rahi ek aag, ek esi aag jiski lapton ne ek raat mein hi poore Poonia parivaar ko maut ke ghat utar diya, akhir kya thi vo vajah jisne katil ko is darindgi ke liye majboor kar diya, akhir kyu nahi kanpe katil ke hath, aur kese katil ko mili saja ne is case ko aitihasik bana diya, janne ke leye sunein Poonia Murder Case.

title: वो कहते हैं हमसे बड़े नादान हो तुम
description: समर जॉब के लिए संघर्ष कर रहा है। अब तक 30-40 इंटरव्‍यू दे चुका है। परिवार में केवल भईया-भाभी है। आए दिन एक इंटरव्‍यू...रिजेक्‍शन... तो क्‍या समर को जॉब मिलेगी? समर जॉब लेस है लेकिन अंदर से एक अच्‍छा इंसान है। परिवार में कितना प्‍यार है...रिश्‍तों में बदलाव है...सुनें इसे कहानी में।

title: Stress Free Life Mantra
description: Kya aap bhi pareshan hai? Kya aapko bhi lagta hai ki zindagi ka bojh, tension, aur stress aapko daba rahe hain? Agar haan, toh "Stress Free Life Mantra" suniye aur apni zindagi ko stress-free banane ke tarike sikhiye. Is audioshow mein, hum aapko batayenge ki kaise aap apni zindagi mein sukoon, chain, aur khushi la sakte hain. Hum aapko relaxation techniques, mindfulness exercises, aur meditation jaise aasan upay batayenge, jo aapki life mein positive changes la payenge.

title: 25 Strategies To Motivate Yourself
description: Mahabharat ki ladai mein jab arjun kaurav ki sena se lad rahe the, tab shri krishna ne arjun ki madad ke liye koi hathiyar ka istemal nahi kiya tha. Balki unhone bina kisi hathiyar ke uthaye arjun ko kuch iss tarah motivate kiya ki arjun ki jeet hui. Isse hum samaj sakte hai ki agar humare paas sahi motivation ho to hum har ladai jeet sakte hai yani jeevan mein successful ho sakte hai aur yeh audiobook hume yahi batayega ki hum apne kaam ko lekar motivated kaise reh sakte hai aur kaise jyada productive ban sakte hai

title: Saadat Hasan Manto
description: Ek Kahani likhne wala kahanikar jo INDIA mein jiya aur dafan hua Pakistan ke Lahore mein.Jisne marne se pahle hi apni qabr par likh diya tha “Khuda Bada Ya Mai”.Jisne apni kahaniyan samaj mein satai gayin auraton ke naam likhin, Likh daale aise- aise words ki aadhi Zidngi court ke chakkar mein gujari aur aadhi logon ke taane sunane mein. Jail bhi gaye lekin sach likhna nhin chhoda. Film likhi to “National Award” jeeta.Aise Mahan writer “Saadat Hasan Manto” ki life ki kahani KUKU Fm le aaye hai aapke liye.

title: Shastriji's Death Mystery
description: “JAI JAWAN, JAI KISAN” ka nara dene wale India Ke doosre aur sabse saadharan Prime Minister "Lal Bahadur Shastri ji" ki Maut Ka rahasya aaj bhi fileon me aaur kuch logon ki yaad me chhupa rakha hai.Aaj tak koi poore bharoshe se nhin kah paaya ki shastri ji ki maut ka asli kaaran kya tha.Is Special Show men ham Aapke liye aise hi raaj se parda uthane ki koshish kar rahe hain.Ismen ham jaanenge ki aakhir Tashkand me Shastri ji ke saath kya hua tha.

title: My Bondage and My Freedom
description: "My Bondage My Freedom" Frederick Douglass ki aatmakatha hai jinhone slavery se nikalne ke baad khud ko ek bade lekhak aur speaker ke taur par saabit kiya. Kis tarah se slave pratha kaam karti thi aur kaise slave's jo ki aamtaur par Black log hote they unhe treat kiya jaata tha aayiye jaante hain is audiobook main.

title: A Guide to Traumatic Stress Recovery
description: Aap agar Traumatic stress ka ilaaj dhundh rahe  hain, Ya fir Traumatic stress ke baare mein janna chahte hain toh KUKU FM ki is audiobook se perfect aur kuch bhi nahi ho sakta hai. Kyuki Ismein bataya gaya hai ki kaise trauma aapki body aur brain dono ko reshape kar deta hai. Aur Isse nikalne ke liye kaunse innovative treatments karne hote hain.

title: YEH JO HAI ZINDAGI
description: “Haara wahi hai, Jo Lada Nhin Hai” ye line to aapne suni hi hogi aur mahsoos bhi ki hogi kyun ki shayd hi kabhi aisa waqt aata hota jab ham apni samsyaon ka saamna nhin kar rahe hote hain.Kabhi haarte hain, kabhi jeet jaate hain.Lekin sabse badi cheez hoti hai Ladna.samsyaon se ladne aur samaj ko samjhne ki kuch kamal ki tarqeebon ko batane ke liye ham laye hain kitab YEH JO HAI ZINDAGI.Jise likha hai famous Anchor aur writer Oprah Winfrey ne.

title: Baaton Se Karein Attract
description: Kya aap kafi time se single hain ya hamesha se single hain? Kya aapko kisi ladki ko approach karna bahut tough lagta hai? Kya aap bhi un logon ki tarah logon ko approach karna seekhna chahte hain jo har raat bina party ya saathi ke ghar nahin lautate hain. To ye kitab hai aapki sabse badi madadgaar. Ismen aapko milenge aise tariqe jinse aap kisi se bhi bin dare kah sakenge apne dil ki baat ya kar sakenge dosti ki shuruaat.

title: Impact Players of Twenty:20
description: Kisi ne golagappe beche to kisi ne Canada jaane ki kar le the tayaari, Kisi ne apne pita ke sapne ko kiya sach to kisi ke pita ne chhod di apne bacho ke khatir khud ki Naukari. Par kya hai in khiladiyon ki puri kahani, Kya hai inke safalta ka raaz aur kyun hain aaj ye sabki aakhon ka taara? Kyun inn jaise khiladiyon ke liye badal diya BCCI ne apna rule aue shuru kiya Impact playar ka naya chapter. Janne ke liye suniye ye khaas audio show "Impact Players of Twenty:20".

title: NYKAA Success Story: From Zero To Unicorn
description: Nykaa ki safalta ki kahani aisi hai jo business ki duniya mein apna ek naya naam kama rahi hai. Lekin is kahani ke peeche Founder Falguni Nayar ki himmat, lagan aur hard work ka yogdaan hai. Falguni ne na sirf critics se ladaai ki hai, balki har ups and down se apni company ko ubhaar kar unicorn banaya hai. Nykaa ke isi struggle aur success ki story ko hum is original series mein jaanege jo aapko prerna degi aur aapke start up ko successful karne ke liye tareeke bhi bataayegi.

title: निधी - द सीक्रेट क्रिमिनल (Volume 3)
description: Ek anjaan shaks raat ke andhere mein raashtrapati aur unke kaphile par hamla karta hai jismein rashtrapati to bach jaate hai, par unka kafila maara jaata hai. Is ghatna ke peeche kiska haath hai tamaam jaach agency-ya pata lagaane ki koshish karti hai, lekin kaamyab nahi ho paate. Ant mein is maamle ko space Academy transfer kar diya jaata hai agent Nidhi is case ko suljhaane ke liye aage aati hai. Nidhi kayi modo se gujarte hue case ke ek dusre hisse tak pahuchti hai jaha pata chalta hai ki ek na dikhnewala insaan hai is sabke peeche...kaun hai wo insaan...kya Nidhi rashtrapati aur unki beti ki jaan bacha paayegi...kya Nidhi is case ko solve kar paayegi. Jaan ne ke liye sune puri kahani.

title: Homi Jahagir Bhabha
description: Homi Jahangir Bhabha - Indian nuclear physicist, founding director aur Tata Institute of Fundamental Research mein Physics ke professor. Inhe India ko nuclear science ki race mein laane ka shrey diya jaata hai. Cambridge se apni padhai kar, India ke nuclear program ka chehra bankar inhone UN conference mein pehli baar peaceful uses of atomic energy par apna view rakha. Indian nuclear program inhi ki den hai. Bharat ko nuclear science ki den aur world map par laakar inki legacy amar hai. Chaliye inka adbhoot jeevan au tragic end se khudko educate kare.

title: History of Emoji
description: Pehle ke samay me adimanav apni baat kehne ke liye gufa me signs banate the , aaj hum apni baat kehne ke liye emoji bhejte hai , to chaliye jante hai ek aisi digital language ke baare me jise na to school me sikhaya jata hai na hi university me par fir bhi puri duniya ko aati hai , aur ek hi click par apki baato ko puri duniya tak pahuncha deti hai.

title: Apne goals ko paane ke Effective tareeke
description: Goals! Ye humein sikhata hai success ek methodical process hai. Is book summary ke mutabik success ka secret goals set karna aur unke liye kadi mehnat karna hai. Is principle ko apni life mein apply karne ke baad aap apne potential ko unlock kar apne success ke karib ek step aur pahuch jayenge.

title: 31 Financial Mistakes That Keep You Poor
description: Shayad 21 din mein paisa double jaisa kuch hota, par afsos aisa hai nahi, lekin haan kuch  financial principles hai jinhe regularly discipline ke saath follow karne se aap fortune ko zarur attract karenge. Yeh audiobook aapke liye financial guide ke taur par hai. Agar aap kabhi kisi money related problem mein faste hai, to yeh audiobook aapko uss problem se nikalne mein help karegi aur aapko financial independence ki aur le jayegi. Agar aapko "The Total Money Makeover : A Proven Plan for Financial Fitness" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Crime Capital
description: Desh ke sabse bade jail- Tihar Jail ke bahar koi tokri mein sirkatti lashein rakh raha tha . Ek parivaar ke saare 11 log ek sath fansi laga lete hai. Ek shrapit kuye ke paas se darjano bacche gayab ho jaate hai. Kahi MLA ka beta firing kar bar par khadi Jessica Lal ki jaan le leta hai. Toh koi tandoor mein apni biwi ki lash dal deta hai. Koi bus mein ladki ke sath gangrape kar road par phek deta hai, toh koi bacchon ka murder kar unhe pakka kar kha jata hai. Ye saare crimes aur kahi nahi desh ki rajdhani- Delhi mein hote hai, kabhi raat ke andhere mein to kahi dindahade. Jaanein Delhi ki sansanikhez crimes ke baare mein sirf- CRIME CAPITAL mein.

title: सूर्य मंजरी
description: Sunita singh dwara likhi gai Suryamanjari adbhut kahani sangrah hai. Kavitaon ki panktiyon mein prem, dard, virah aur dilon ko jodne wale marmik bhav hai, jo aapke dilo ko chu lenge. To abhi sune kavita sangrah Suryamanjari keval Kuku FM per.

title: Looteron Ke Bete
description: Chaar dost achaanak se giraft ho jaate hain ek aisi duniya me jiski kisi ne kalpana tak nhi ki thi. Lootero'n ki ye basti asal ki duniya se bilkul alag hai. Yahaan divya shaktiyaan saans leti hain. Yahaan ke log kabhi marte nahi hain. Maanav inke aahaar ban jaate hain. Kya hoga jab chaar aam insaan in khoonkhaar looteron se takraayenge? Ye looteron ke saamraajya ki ek aisi daastaa'n hai jahaan dehshat, mohabbat, rishte, zindagi aur maut sab saath hai. Maanavlok me hoga in shaitaani looteron ka ant ya phir inke khauf aur dabdabe se machega taandav? Janne ke liye sunein Kuku FM par ye Kahani.

title: Dilip Sardesai: Goa ke Renesa Purush
description:
1950 और 60 के दशक में भारतीय क्रिकेटर का जीवन बहुत आसान नहीं था. जब दिलीप पहली बार इंडिया के लिए खेले तो उन्हें प्रति टेस्ट मैच 250 रुपये मिला करते थे. 1956 में एक बार जब पांच दिन का टेस्ट मैच ख़त्म हुआ तो उनकी फ़ीस में से 50 रुपये काट लिए गए थे|
writer: राजदीप सरदेसाई
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Script Writer : Rajdeep Sardesai

title: अनजाने सफर पर
description: रज्‍जो बिन ब्‍याही मां बन जाती है। गांव उसे समाज से बाहर कर देता है। एक हवेली में उसे काम और रहने खाने को मिलता है। वो खुश हो जाती है, लेकिन बदनसीबी यहां भी उसका पीछा नहीं छोड़ती। बेटा 20 साल का हो जाता है। रज्‍जो मालिक और मालकिन के साथ कुछ दिनों के लिए बाहर जाती है। यहां मालकिन की मां लोचन पर हार चोरी का इल्‍जाम लगाकर बहुत जलील करती है और मुंह पर कालिख पोतकर पूरे सोसायटी में घूमाती है। इससे दुखी होकर लोचन आत्‍महत्‍या कर लेता है। 60 साल की उम्र में उसकी मौत लिखी रहती है, लेकिन वो 20 साल में ही मर जाता है। उसकी आत्‍मा सालों तक भटकती है। ऐसे में कई डरावनी घटनाएं होती है।

title: सर्जिकल स्ट्राइक
description: Sultan Fauji- Ek Kashmir Atakwadi. Usne Mumbai mei ek badi Atakwadi ghatna ko anjaam diya, Jisme Sekdorh Nirdosh mare gaie. Sultan Fauji Pakda gaya. Ek itihasik fesla mei usse 26 January ke din Fasi ki Saaja Di jaani thi, Taaki puri duniya dekhti ki hum Deshdrohi ke saath kya karte hei. Lekin Usse pehle hi sultan faugi jail todkar Pakistan bhaag Nikla. Tab yah mission saopa gaya Commander Karan Saxena Ko. Commander jisne Sultan Fauji ko pakistan mei hi ghuskar maara. Waahi apne haatho se fasi ki saaja di usse

title: Apollo 11: The Journey To The Moon
description: 1969 yeh vo saal tha jab NASA ne chaand par jaane wala apna mission successful banaya aur is mission ka naam tha Apollo 11. Is mission ke under chaand par kadam rakhne wale pehle insaan Neil Armstrong the yeh hum sabhi ko pata hai Lekin, is mission ki neev kaise rakhi gayi? Kya is mission ko successful karna sirf kehne jitna aasaan tha? Neil Armstrong ke liye vo pal kaisa raha jab unhein pata chala ki vo chaand par jaane waale hain? Yeh Sab kuch jaanege Kuku FM par is Original Show mein. Chaliye Shuru Karte hain Apollo 11 ke successful hone ka Safar.

title: Kuldhara Village - The Curse of the Past
description: Bhoot pret ki batein ham sabne apni life mein zaroor suni hongi. Rat ke andhere main agar halki si awaz bhi ho to lagta hai mano koi saya peeche khada hai. Aise hi ek kahani hai Kuldhara - The haunted village of India ki jahan aaj bhi shaam ko jana mana hai or aaj bhi uss gaon main koi nahi rehta. Kya hai iske peeche ki sachai? Aaiye jaante hai hamare iss khaas show mein.

title: Jaane apne Partner ki Love Language
description: Pyaar mein padna aasan hai, par use nibhana mushkil. Demands, struggles aur daily life ki boriyat ke beech apne rishte ko fresh aur grow kaise kare? Bohot saare aise secrets leke aayi hai ye summary book aapke liye!

title: Brainchip
description: Ek chip, jo brain me fit ho kar deti hai tabaahi ho gayi hai chori! RAW Agents lad rahe hain is mystery ko suljhane me. Kya woh samay par rok payenge us desh drohi ko?

title: Krantikari Subhash | Writer - Shankar Sultanpuri
description:
क्रन्तिकारी सुभाष Author:- शंकर सुल्तानपुरी 
Author : शंकर सुल्तानपुरी
Voiceover Artist : Raj Shrivastava
Producer : KUKU FM
