Subhash Chandra Bose, popularly known as “Netaji”, a great militant, freedom fighter, and patriot was born at Cuttack, Orissa on January 23, 1897, to Janakinath Bose and Prabhavati Devi. Janakinath was a well- known lawyer. Prabhavati Devi was a religious and God-fearing woman. Subhash Chandra was a brilliant student from the very beginning and was first in the merit list of successful students in the matriculation examination. Subhash Chandra was one of the greatest freedom-fighters and patriots and the Pride of Bengal. He became a legend in his lifetime as a great leader, fiery orator, and organizer.  He became the commander of the Indian National Army and freed the islands of Andaman and Nicobar and renamed them as Swaraj and Saheed Islands. To know more about the life story of Subhash Chandra Bose, listen to this inspiring audiobook in Hindi. This audiobook narrates the life story of Subhash Chandra Bose. Listen now!

title: Diabetes Ke Saath Swasth Jeevan
description: Is modern duniya mein India ki 40 percent population diabetes aur obesity jaise problems se joonjh rahi hai. Kharab hota lifestyle aur bad food habit iska main kaaran hai. Toh aakhir kaise paaye nijaat diabetes se aur kaise hota hai diabetes human body main. Jaanenge diabetes ki ABC is exclusive audio series mein.

title: Ishq after Marriage
description:
हस्बैंड  वाइफ  के रिश्ते में इंटिमेट होना कितना ज़रूरी है।  क्या अंतरंगता  रिश्ते के लिए प्यार से ज़्यादा ज़रूरी है 
Voiceover Artist : Rashmi Sharma

title: Uri Attacks
description: Jammu Kashmir mein 20 saalo mein Bhartiya Sena ko sabse zyada nuksan hua jab 18 Sitambar, 2016 ko 4 atankwadi bhaari hathiyaro ke saath ghuse aur Uri ke ek camp par grenade se hamla kar diya. Kaise hua ye hatsa? Kya hua hamare jawano ke saath aur kaise humne unhe muh tod jawab diya? Aaiye, sune ye dil dehla dene wali dastaan.

title: विषधर केतु
description: केतु के परिवार को जमींदार के बेटों ने मार डाला, लेकिन केतु बच गया। उसे बचाया था महानागों ने। जीं, हां सही सुना महानागों ने केतु के प्राण बचाएं। सभी महानाग केतु से उसके इस हाल के बारे में पूछते हैं। तब केतु उन्‍हें अपनी सारी स्थितियां बता देता है। कैसे जमींदार के बेटों ने उसके परिवार को खत्‍म किया। सभी महानाग मिलकर केतु को महानाग लोक की अनोखी विद्या सीखाते हैं, ताकि वह अपने परिवार का बदला ले सके। कुछ साल बाद केतु अब विषधर बन चुका है और बदला लेने अपने गांव जाता है। क्‍या केतु अपना बदला ले पाएगा? जमींदार की बड़ी बेटी केतु के खिलाफ कौन-सा षडयंत्र रचती है? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Khooni Saya
description:
राजस्थान का एक रसूख और इज़्ज़तदार परिवार । मगर बिल्कुल शांत पानी भी एक तूफान को दबाए रखता है। इस परिवार में भी है ऐसा ही कुछ। सभी के हैं अपने अपने छिपे राज। और अचानक से ही एक के बाद एक परिवार में शुरू होती हैं हत्याएं। परिवार वालो को डर है किसी रहस्यमयी साये का जो उनसे ले रहा है बदला। आखिर कौन हैं इन हत्याओं के पीछे ? कोई इंसान या फिर कोई साया?
Khooni Saaya Narrated by Rj Manish And Rj Saarika

title: Business ka Launch Plan
description: Aajkal har koi ek chota mota business shuru karke entrepreneur ban jaata hai magar unme se aadhe se zyada businesses chal nahi paate. Kya hai iske karan? Wo hai aise sawal jo hume ek business start karne se pehle sochne chahiye. Kya aapka business chalne layak hai? Kya aapke business idea mein dum hai ki wo market mein survive kar sake? Janenge is launch plan ke baare mein vistaar se. Agar aapko Gary Keller dwara likhi "The One Thing: The Surprisingly Simple Truth Behind Extraordinary Results" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Khamosh Mohobbat
description:
प्यार का एहसास ही इतना खास है, कि पतझड़ के मौसम में भी बहारों सी ठंडक देता है और गर्मी की तपन भी बारिश की बूंदों सी लगती है। कुछ ऐसा ही प्‍यार है क्रिया और पीयुष का। लेकिन इस बनते रिश्‍तों में कई बिखराव वाले पल हैं, जो दोनों के दिलों को दूर करते हैं लेकिन आखिर सच्‍ची मोहब्‍बत कामयाबी हो ही जाती है।
Voiceover Artist : Surabhi
Author : Kriya sharma

title: McDonald's Success Story
description: Duniya mein kuch hi brands aise hai jo har country mein pehchaane jate hai, Aur McDonald's bhi unhi chuninda brands mein se ek hai. Aur fir chahe vo globalization ka virodh karne wale samajik karyakarta ho, Sarkari svasthya adhikari ho ya fir bachho ke motape aur bimariyon ko lekar chintit rehne wale mata-pita , McDonald's in sabka pasandita raha hai. Lekin iske piche ka karan kya hai? aese kaunsi strategy hai jisne iss brand ko aaj safalta ki is uchai tak pahucha diya? Iska javab iss audibook se accha aur koi nahi de sakta hai. Kyuki isme McDonald's ki Success ke ek ek step ko bariki se samjhaya gaya hai.

title: Israel VS Palestine - The Cursed War
description: The Cursed War - Jews aur Arabs, pichle 70 saalo se ek aisi nafrat aur khooni ladai lade jaa rahe hai jiska koi ant nahi. World War 2 ke baad, jab saare Jew immigrants Hitler ke aatank se bachkar waapas apne promised land pohche, toh Britain controlled Palestine ke kuch hisso mein unhe aasra mila. Britishers toh laut gaye, magar yeh dono communities ek dusre ke kattar dushman ban gaye. Anek wars, peace accords aur confusing landmap ki vajah hai yeh cursed war jisme na jaane jitne yahudiyo aur Arabs ne apni jaan gavayi. Chaliye samajhte hai iska itihaas.

title: Rudraksh Series
description: रूद्र एक पैरानॉर्मल इन्वेस्टिगेटर जो लोगो की जान बचाता है उनके यादों में घुस कर , अचानक गन्धर्व किले के केस में फंस जाता है. क्या रूद्र का पिछला जन्म है इसका कारण? जानने के लिए सुने रुद्राक्ष सीरीज़

title: Behtar Planning, Behtar Kaam
description: Important task ko execute karne se zyada difficult hai unhe yaad rakhna. Getting Things Done ki yeh book summary aapko sikhayegi aap ek system kaise bana sakte hai to keep your list, reminders and weekly reviews ready. Toh suniye aur badhaiye apni productivity ko

title: Jal Bich Min Pyasi
description: कहानी की मुख्‍य किरदार पूर्वी का ब्‍याह बेमेल हो जाता है लेकिन वह हार नहीं मानती है। अपने प्‍यार को पाने और पढ़ाई पूरी करने के लिए कड़ी मेहनत करती है। लेकिन इस बीच वह पारिवारिक षडयंत्रों का शिकार होती है, जो उसने कभी सपने में भी नहीं सोचा होगा। लेकिन फिर भी वह बिखरे रिश्‍तों को एक माला में पिरोती है और खुद दर दर की ठोकरे खाती है। लेकिन समय बदलता है और किस्‍मत ऐसा खेल खेलती है कि उसका बिछड़ा प्‍यार उसके पास होता है लेकिन वह स्‍वीकार नहीं कर पाती है। रिश्‍तों के मझधार, प्‍यार और भावनाओं से भरपूर कहानी को बिना सुनें आप नहीं रह पाएंगे।

title: Indian Women Who Became Spies
description: VO ARTIST-RJ RASH-Hum jo chain se hamari zindagi guzar rahe hai, iska shrey kaasfi hadd tak desh ki sarhad par ladh rahe jawano ko jaata hai. Magar inke saath saath kuch aise log bhi hai, jo apne khufiya tarike se desh ko surakshit rakhne ka kaam karte hai aur pata bhi nahi chaltne dete. Kaisi hoti hai in jasuso ki zindagi? Aaiye jaane India ke kuch mashoor mahila jasuso ki kahani

title: A Life Of The Genius Ramanujan
description: 1729 - Hardy-Ramanujan Number! Haspataal ke bistar par beemar lete hue jis shaks ne is number ko khaas saabit karke amar kar diya, aise genius ka naam hai Ramanujan. Tamil Nadu ke nimna varg parivaar se nikalkar London Mathemetical Society ke member aur 'Fellow of the Royal Society' ka darza haasil kiya. Etihaas ke keval dusre bhartiya aur sabse kam umra wale bhi. "An equation for me has no meaning unless it expresses a thought of God". Yeh inke shabd the aur inka vishwaas ki goddess Namagiri se inhe ganit ka aashirwaad mila. Chaliye sunte hai, inki adbhoot jeevan gaatha.

title: मौत - एक रहस्मई कहानी
description:
यमलोक के बारे में आपने सुना तो बहुत होगा मगर इस कहानी में हम आपको सच मे यमलोक की सैर कराएंगे।और दिखाएंगे की कैसे एक सीधा-साधा इंसान यमलोक में फंस जाता है और कैसे मौत के मुंह से निकलकर बाहर आया..
Voiceover Artist: Shreekant Sinha
author: Karan Rajput

title: Ichchhamrityu
description:
Chhatrapati shivaji maharaj ko jab hazaro shatru sainiko dwara buri tarah gher liya tha. Unko niklane ka koi marg nahi bacha tha, Tab unhe bachane ke liye aage aaye Bajiprabhu aur unke 300 sathi. 300 marathon ne jab 12000 mugalo se yudhdh karke shaurya aur virata ki ek adbhut misal kayam kar di. 

(Ye ek kalpanik kahani hai. Kahani me aaye sabhi naam, ghatnayein lekhak ki kalpana par aadharit hain. Kisi bhi jeeveit ya mrit vyakti se kisi bhi prakar ka sambandh ek sanyog maana jayega.)

title: The Great Indian Bustard
description: Son Chiraiya ek aisa bird jo aaj kal to humare aas paas nahi dikhta  , lekin shaadi ke gaano me aur indian culture me iss bird ka mention kafi samay se hota aa raha hai! aksar ghar ki betiyon ko ghar ki son chiraiya kaha jata hai , kyu is bird ko chhod kar peacock ko national bird chuna gaya aur achanak ye chidiya kaise gayab ho gayi? chaliye jante hai KUKU FM original “The Great Indian Bustard” mein.

title: NCERT Class 9th History
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein achhi Rank laani ho, Shuruaat to NCERT book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap The French Revolution, Socialism in Europe and the Russian Revolution, Nazism and the Rise of Hitler jaise topics ko achhe se jaan jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: मोह मोह के धागे
description: भाई-बहन का प्‍यार और दोस्‍ती का अनोखा बंधन इस कहानी की जान है। शिवा, कल्‍पना और क्षितिज  का दुख भरा  अतीत है, जिसे वे तीनों कभी जाहिर नहीं होने देते। लेकिन मोहब्‍बत इतनी है कि जान छिड़कते हैं एक-दूसरे पर। प्‍यार और रिश्‍तों की गहराई की अनोखी कहानी, जिसे सुनें बिना आप नहीं रह पाएंगे।

title: सातवाँ फेरा
description: Har Ladki ke jeevan mei woh paal ata hei, Jab Ussr Jeevan saathi ko chunaa hota hei aut nirnay karna behes mushkil hota hei. UMA ke samne bhi yaha ek bada prashna tha ki samne Vikalpo ki kami nahi thi, lekin kisse apne jeevan sathi chune? Jaha jay ke pass pyar dene ke alava kuch nahi tha, wahi shankar ke tha jyo Businessmen tha aur uske paas Shano- Shaukat, Daulat Beshumaar thi. Uma Kisse apne Jeevan saathi chunegi? Uma ki kausati par khara utregi jay ya shankar? Jaane ke liye Suniye Puri Kahani.

title: Mera Piya pardesi
description: मेरा पिया  परदेसी ..कहानी शुरू होती है जब परदेश लाहौर से  आई खूबसूरत नूरजहां की मुलाकात देशी दिल्ली एनसीआर में रहने वाले शांत कॉपरेटिव जॉब करने वाले साहिल से फिरोजशाह कोटला स्टेडियम में होती हैं इंडिया और पाकिस्तान वनडे मैच के दौरान । पहली मुलाकात में दोनों के दिल में एक दूसरे के लिए जगह बन जाती है पर इस फीलिंग्स को दोनों अपनी अपनी वजह से नहीं स्वीकार करते । फिर शुरू होता है पहेलियों का दौर , यानि नूरजहां अपनी सहेली फिजा के साथ दिल्ली की प्राचीन इमारतों का दौरा करने आई  थी , वह साहिल के सामने पहेलियों का चक्रव्यूह रखती है जिसे सुलझाने पर अगली मुलाकात का स्थान पता चलेगा।क्या है ये पहेलियां?  पहली नजर में खामोशी से नूरजहां को दिल दे बैठे साहिल क्या इन पहेलियों को सुलझा पाएगा? क्या दोनों की प्रेम कहानी शुरू हो पाएगी? प्रेम कहानी में कितनी मुश्किल आती है ? कैसे दोनों पार करते है ? क्या होता है जब दोनों प्रेमी की राहें अलग हो जाती है?

title: Gond Dynasty
description: RRR film main aapne Bhim ke character ko khoob pyar diya, bheem ek khaas community se aata hai jo Gond kehlate hain, desh ke baaki tribes ke terha he gond iss dharati ke mool nivasi to hain he sath he saath wo courage ke bhi representatives hain, unka lena dena sirf junglon tak nahi hai, gond to ek samay mei takatwar aur samriddh samrajya hua karta tha jisme bade bade fighters nikale aur mughals ko kaye baar yuddh main haraya , seedhi saadhe dikhne wali yeh janjati asal main ek yuddh nipurna, takatwar aur deshpremi dynasty ke successors hain , inhe kudart ke saath taal mel bitha kar rehna bakhoobi aata hai,aur women empowerment jaise cheezein jo west par jabardasti thopi gye, iss samrajya main swatha he hain. Aaiye jaante hain iss audiobook main gond dynasty ka gauravshali itihas sirf KUKU FM par

title: Why I Write
description: Yeh Audio Book George Orwell ka ek essay hai jisme unhone lekhak banne ki unki personal journey ko bataya hai. Chahe rajneetao ke jhooth ko puncture karna ho ya yuddh ke baare mein sach batana ho Orwell ki kalam hamesha bina dare apna kaam karti thi. Unke essays aaj ke samay mein bhi utne hi zaroori hai jitne shayad beete waqt mein hua karte the kyuki ye na sirf Orwell ki soch se humein rubaru karwate hain balki ek naya nazariya bhi dete hain. Toh aaiye sunte hain yeh audiobook

title: Guide To Achieve 10,000 Steps Daily
description: 10,000 steps walk karna aapko ek healthy aur fit lifestyle de sakta hai but 10000 steps ka target achieve karne ki sabse badi problem hai inconsistency and lack of awareness, KuKu FM ke show mein aapko step by step guidance aur 10,000 steps achieve karne ki saari information milegi jo aapko easily ye target achieve karne mein help karegi. Toh lete hai pehla step humare pehle episode ke saath.

title: Lincoln The Unknown
description: Chaliye sunte hain, Abraham Lincoln ke zindagi ki aisi ansuni kahani jo 1932 me Dale Carnegie ne likhi thi. Unki family se lekar, White House tak ki struggles, dard bhari shadi aur south ki war aur Lincoln ke hatya ke baad ki unke zindagi ki puri kahani. To chaliye sunte hai, kaise ek kisan bana United States of America ka President.

title: Success Limitless
description: Kya ap apne business ko top par pahuchana chahte hain? Kya ap chahte hain ki apko har kadam par safalta mile? To abhi sune Success Limitless full book kebal KUKUfm par, jo apki safalta ke darwaje khol degi.

title: Aapka Schedule kaisa hona Chahiye?
description: Khana chhodna, jab conveninet ho workout kar lena fir chaahe wo koi bhi wakt ho, productivity badhane ke liye der raat tak kaam karna aur fir weekend par nind puri karna...kya aapko lagta hai ye hamari body ka natural cycle hai? Kya aap jaante hai ki aapke body mein bhi ek clock hota hai? Jaane apni body ke baare mein ayurved ki madat se

title: Safal Gharelu Ilaz
description: Yeh kitaab har trah ke marz ke safal gharelu ilaj bahut saleeke se btaati hai aur yeh likhi hai ayurved medicine ke bahut bade naam Hakeem R.P. Parashar ji ne. Kisi bhi chhote bade marz se raahat paane ke liye suniiye yeh kitaab sirf kukufm par.

title: Plane Crash : The Impossible Rescue
description: Sal 1972 mein 12 October ko , International rugby players ki team ko lekar jate hue Uruguayan Air Force ka plane Kharab mausam ki Wajah se , Barf se dhaki Andes ki pahadiyon mein Crash ho gaya. Fir 10 Hafton baad  Us plane mein Savaar 45 Passengers mein Se 16 Jinda Passengers ko dhunda gaya Vo bhi tab , Jab Un 16 mein se 2 passengers kisi tarah  himmat dikhakar pahadiyon se neeche utar kar aaye. Is Audibook mein plane ke crash hone se lekar bina Water , Food aur Shelter ke bitaye gay un 10 Hafton ki poori kahani hai, Jo Humein ye bhi sikhati hai ki agar hum Brave  hai toh impossible word humare liye nahi hai.

title: तेरा साथ है कितना प्यारा
description:
शैलेश और अनामिका की लव स्‍टोरी शुरू होती है स्‍कूल से, लेकिन आर्थिक असमानता सबसे बड़ी दीवार है इनके प्‍यार की। लेकिन अनामिका हार माननेवाले लोगों में से नहीं है। वो एक प्‍लान बनाती है, अपने प्‍यार को हासिल करने के लिए। क्‍या प्‍लान होता है? क्‍या अनामिका और शैलेश का प्‍यार कामयाब होता है? सुनें पूरी कहानी... 
Author : आशा शुक्ला
Voiceover Artist : आशीष  जैन

title: भूतिया सफर
description: Kuch ghatanayen aisi hoti hain, jinpar bharosa karna mushkil hi nahi naamumkin hota hai, kae ghatnaen jo hamaare rongate khade kar detee hain, kayi gaanv ya shahar ke baare mein hamne suna hoga ki vo jagah bhooton se bhare hue hai, ise tarah hamare kahani mein bhi bhootiya ghatnaon aur jagahon ka jikar kiya jaayega, kuch college Friends jo ghoomne ka program banaate hain aur yeh program kis tarah se unhein maut ke munh tak le jaayega, ek aisi bhootiya jagah jahaan jaane ke baad vahaan se vaapis lotana naamumkin hai, kya itni khataranaak jagah se yeh dost vaapis aa paayenge? ya ho jaayenge bhooton ka shikaar, jaan'ne ke liye suniye kahani bhootiya saphar.

title: Gyan Ka Jharna | Writer - R K Dogra
description: Yeh pustak kayi naitikataon, amarata aur anubhav se bhare vicharon se bhare choti kahaniyon ka sankalan hai jise har pidhi tak pahunchaya jana chahiye. Pustak ko iske sahityik mulya ke liye utsukata se khoja jaega kyonki yah vastav mein punya ka pratiman hai. kayi samagriyon ka sankalan pustak ko sarthak banata hai to chalie bade anand ke sath iska svaad lete hain.

title: कैसा ये इश्क़
description: अनाथ दीया की मुलाकत दीपक से होती है। काम, प्‍यार और तकरार के बीच इन गाड़ी हिचकोले खाते आगे बढ़ती है। तो क्‍या इनकी मोहब्‍बत होगी कामयाब? या कोई बनेगा इनके बीच दीवार? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Mafia Island
description: Pure desh mein safai se tijori khali karne ke liye mashoor Amar ko milta hai ek khatarnak mission. Gundo se bhare ek Island ki tijori ko saaf karne ka mission. Par apni girlfriend ko mission par sath le ja wo phans jata hai is Mafia Island pe. Kya uski girfriend banegi uske aur tijori ke beech ki duri ka vajah? Ya is island ke gunde le lenge uski jaan?

title: अगर तुम साथ हो
description: Kahte hai agar sahi logo ka saath ho to zindagi asaan ho jaati hai. Bachpan mei hi ek sache pyaar ko haasil kar liya tha Karan aur Bhaavna ne. Lekin phir aa gayi unke beech ki banayi banavti lakeere. Kya yeh bachpan ka pyaar javaani mein samjhauti kar lega ya kahenge ye ek dusre se "agar tum saath ho"

title: ABCD Of LIC
description: Agar main aapse puchu ki LIC Yani "Life Insurance" se aap kya samajhte hain to shayad aapka jawab hoga, isme samjhana kya hai ye to lene wali cheez hai jab time aayega hum bhi apni koi na koi LIC kara lenge, aur yahin hum galti kar baithte hain. Bina jaane, bina samjhe hum koi bhi LIC kara lete hain, isiliye hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain ek aisa show jisme aapko LIC ki har ABCD ke bare mein pata chalega aur aakhir mein aap jaan payenge ki, kab, kitni aur konsi LIC hai aapke liye hai best.

title: 10 Ways to Stay in Present
description: The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment is a book by Eckhart Tolle. Learn 10 exclusive lessons to a fulfilling life in this audiobook version of the best-selling book.

title: Tesla - Car of the Future
description: Steam se chalne wale engine se lekar , Electric Motor se daudti car tak automobile industry ne thode he time me bohot zyada development ki hai , Jinme se Elon Musk ki company "TESLA" ne aisi car banayi hai jo chalta firta robot hai , aisi car jo khud apne aap chal sakti hai aur single charge me sabse zyada duri tak jaa sakti hai , chaliye sunte hai kaise Tesla ek automobile company nahi par ek tech company hai jisne 5 he car banayi hai par fir bhi duniya me sabse popular company hai

title: Guidance To Achieve Success According To Your Rashi
description: Chahe hum maane ya na maane Life mein success humare hard work ke sath sath humare luck pe bhi utna he depend karti hai, Isiliye shayad hum apne Rashi ko lekar kisi na kisi se discuss karte rehte hain, Par aakhir kaise hume apne rashi ke according apna career chose karna chahiye in sab ke baare mein batayenge aapko humare is original show mein jiska naam hai Guidance to Achieve Success According to Your Rashi.

title: इश्क़ दोबारा
description:
ये कहानी एक ऐसे लड़के की हैं जिसने तक़दीर से लड़ कर अपने प्यार को हासिल किया ।
Voiceover Artist : ASHUTOSH
Author : अरुण प्रताप सिंह

title: Thackerays And Shiv Sena
description: 1960 mein Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru Ki sarkar ne Bombay Ka vibhajan Kiya aur isse bane do rajya. "Maharashtra" Aur "Gujarat".Lekin ye vibhajan hua Kyun? Kaise Mazdooron aur Daliton Ke liye ladne wale kuch logon ne ise andolan bana diya aur kaise ek kamre mein bani Maharashtra Ki political party Shiv Sena?Bal Thackeray to ek cartoonist the fir kaise ban gaye Maharashtra ke sher.Shiv Sena ke banne aur fir kuch kamzor hone se lekar Eknath Shinde ki bagawat tak sab batane ke liye ham le aaye hain "Thackerays And Shiv Sena".

title: The Vietnam War
description: Saal 1954 mein ek aisa yudh shuru hua tha, jiske ant ka intezar lakhon logon ki kurbaniyon ne kiya tha. 25 saal tak lagatar chal rahe is yudh ne logon ko apna ghar chhod jungalon mein rehne ko majbur kar diya tha. Is ankahe aitihasik yudh mein ek taraf tha South Vietnam aur North Vietnam ke bich chalne wala yudh, to dusri taraf tha America aur North Vietnam ke bich ka yudh. Jisne kul milakar 31 lakh logon ko maut ke ghat utara tha. Lekin is yudh ki wajah kya thi? Aur aakhir is yudh ke itne lambe chalne ki wajah kya thi? Jante hai humare is audiobook mein.

title: China Property Crisis
description: China mein kyon logon ko apni property se haath dhona pad raha hai? Ye samasya kitni badi hai? Kya iska India par bhi koi asar hoga? En sawalon ke jawab janne ke liye suniye ye audioshow.

title: Sirf Tumhari A.L.I.C.E.
description: Apni Girlfriend ke jaane ke baad, apna akelapan dur karne ke liye, Robotic Expert Arun ne banaya ek aisa robot, jo bilkul uski girlfriend jaisi dikhti aur behave karti thi. Jiska sirf ek hi maksad tha apne creator ko pyaar karna. Lekin Robot ki Artificial Intelligence ne khud ko is duniya ke according update kar liya. Is wajah se Alice ka Arun ko pyaar karne ka junoon, hadh paar kar gaya. Sabhi ki nazar Arun ki is qaatilana technology par thi, magar Arun ke liye ye sab ek khel tha. Is junoon se bhare khatarnak khel ko janne ke liye abhi sunein, “Sirf Tumhari A.L.I.C.E.”.

title: Golden Shooter Abhinav Bindra
description: Dehradun ke ek ladke ne bachpan se hi ek dream dekha tha. Bharat ko Olympics mein Gold jeetane ka sapna. Aiye jaante hai iss bacche ki kahaani, kaise woh ek athlete se ek successful business entrepreneur bana. Yeh hai Gold Medalist Abhinav Bindra ki kahaani

title: लाश का सच
description: Raajesh ko apni car mein apne patni Surekha ki laash milti hai... Surekha 3 Mahine se pregnant thi...lekin Police investigation se kuch aur hi baat saamne aati hai... kaun hai Surekha ka kaatil? Surekha maayeka jaane wali thi, wo Mumbai ke Vasai ilake mein kya kar rahi thi? Jaan ne ke liye sune puri kahani.

title: Stay Healthy and Happy with Yoga
description: Yun to Yoga aur hum Indians ka rishta sadiyon purana hai. Lekin modernisation ke chakkar mein hum sab ise kahin na kahin bhulte ja rahe hai. Jabki sahi maynon mein dekha jaaye to pehle Yoga ke zariye hi sabhi fit aur healthy rehte huye kayi saalon tak jeete the. Lekin agar aapko aisa lagta hai ki Yoga sirf ek age tak kiya jata hai, to aap galat hai. Is audiobook mein humne aise kayi aasan bataye hain jinhe koi bhi bade aaram se karke healthy aur happy reh sakta hai. Aaiye unhe kaise aur kyun karna hai use jante hai.

title: MH 370: Biggest Mystery In Aviation
description: Malaysian Airlines ki Flight MH370 ka gayab hona duniya ki sabse badi aviation mysteries mein se ek hai. Saal 2014 mein Kuala Lumpur se Beijing ja rahi ye flight achanak se radar mein dikhna band ho jaati hai aur uske baad ise dhundne ke liye 8 saal tak ek search operation chalaya jaata hai jismein  millions of dollars kharch kar diye jaate hain. Toh kya uske baad flight ko dhund liya jata hai? Ya ye pata chal pata hai ki aakhir flight ke sath hua kya tha?  Janne ke liye abhi suniye KUKU FM ka ye Original Show.

title: Share Market Shabdakosh
description: Kya aapke sath bhi aisa hota hai ki aapke kuch dost share market ke baare men baat karte hain aur aap bas unke bade bade angreji ke shabdon ko sunte reh jate hain. Abse aisa nahi hoga kyuki hum leke aaye hain aapke liye "Share Market Shabdkosh" ki Audiobook. Chaliye hamare saath gyan ki is audiobook mein dubki lagaate hain aur apne share market Shabdakosh ko badhate hain.

title: Vikramaditya - Universal King
description: Vikramaditya Ek Aise Maha Pratapi Chakravarti Smarat the Jinhone 100 Varso tak shasan kiya tha. Bhartiya Itihas ka sabse shaktishali Samrat jo apne Gyan aur Udarshilta ke liye jana jata tha. Itihas ke panno me aapko inka bahut kam hi zikar milega kyon ki Itihas ke thekedaro ne jinme se kuch log yeh nahi chahte the ki bhartiya sabhyata ki samridhhi aur mahanta ke bare me aane vali generation ko malum pade. Is Series ke madhyam se ham ek koshish kar rahe hai ki Samrat Vikramaditya ke kisse aur unke Shasankal ke jariye ham bharat ki vishal sanskriti ke darshan aapko karvaye.

title: The Chinese Astrology
description: Chinese Astrology bhi Indian Astrology ki tarah kaam karti hai, ismein bhi 12 Rashiyan hoti hain. Hum is show mein Chinese Astrology se jude interesting facts par charcha karenge aur sath hi janenge ki insan kis tarah se is universal science ka fayda utha ka aage badh sakta hai. Aaiye is show ke zariye Chinese Astrology ke basics ko samjhte hain.

title: ₹500 Se Karo Real Estate Investment
description: Aajkal investment ke bahut saare options hain lekin agar ek kum risk aur zyada profit dene wale investment option ki baat karein toh vo hai real estate. Bas Investment se pehle real estate se judi har ek jaankari aapke paas honi chahiye, Jo ki aapko KUKU FM ke is original show mein milne wali hai.

title: Evolution Of Gaming
description: Hum mein se sabhi ne life mein kabhi na kabhi video game khela hoga aur pasand kiya hoga. Par kya aapko pata hai video game ki shuruaat kahan se hui ? kisne humare games khelne ka tarike bilkul badal diya ? Pong se Super Mario se pubg tak gaming ki duniya mein kitna badlav aaya aur kya gaming mein career ban sakte hai ? In sawalo ke jawab jaan ne ke liye suniye yeh audiobook

title: 10 Rare Endangered Animals Soon to Extinct
description: Aapko pta hai ki Asian elephant, Blue Whale,Snow Leopard,Black Spider Monkey aur Saola, in sabhi animals mein common kya hai? Darasal ye sabhi is duniya se gayb ho jane ke risk par hain. Aur sirf yahi nahi aise kai aur animals hain jo aane wale kuch salon mein hume janglon mein nahi balki sirf kitabon aur documentaries mein hi dikhenge. Par kya aapne kabhi ye socha ki iski wajah kya hai? Aur kaise aap inhe bachane mein apna yogyadan de sakte hain . Ye Audio book aapko sirf Jaankari hi nahi degi balki is khubsurat nature aur in animals ko bachane ke liye kadam uthane par majboor kardegi.

title: 18 Ways to Enlighten Yourself
description: Pustak ke is sanskaran mein ek prabuddha jeevan ke lie 18 vishesh path sikhen. Hindi mein syang ko prabuddha karne ke 18 tarike, humare catalogue se hindi mein upalabdh sarvashrestha swa sahayata audiobook mein se ek hai. Yeh audiobook Raj Srivastav dwara banaye gayi hain. Yah 18 tariqe syang ko prabuddha karne ke liye audio apko jeevan jene ke tariqe ko swikar karne ke liye prerit karega.

title: Nithyananda: The Self Proclaimed God Man
description: Ek aisa Aadmi jo khud ko Insaan nahi Bhagwan batata hai, Ek aisa Insaan jisne apna ek alag Desh bana liya, Ek aisa Insaan jo kehta hai ki wo Bhagwan Shiv ka awtaar hai, Ek aisa Insaan jiska kehna hai ki wo Apni Aankhein band kar ke bhi sab kuch dekh sakta hai. Aur usi insaan par lage hai Hatya aur Rape ke aarop. Aakhir kon hai ye Insaan kya hai iski Sacchai Janne ke liye suniye humara ye Audio Show jiska naam hai “Nithyananda: The Self Proclaimed God Man”.

title: The Science Of Being Well
description: Kya wakai mein positive thinking ki shakti aapke swasthya ko  behtar bana sakti hai? Ye practical guide aapko swasthya ke siddhanto ka pata lagane mein madad karegi aur aapko ek swasthya, khush-haal jeevan ki aur le jayegi.

title: Become Your Own Best Friend
description: Bachpan mein school ki prayer mein to sabhi ne gaaya hoga “doosron ki jay se pehle khud ko jay karein”. Lekin bade hote-hote na hum khud ko pehle jay karte hain aur na hi khud se pyaar karte hain bas nikal padte hain doosron ko dost bana ke unki khushi ko apni khushi banane mein. Lekin kya yeh sahi hai? aur khud ke dost banne ke liye humein kya karna chahiye? yeh sab hum jaanege is original show mein. Chaliye shuru karte hain khud ke dost banne ka yeh safar.

title: Laut Aayi Chhaya
description: Parimal Ghosh aur Chhaya ki ek aisi prem kahani jise sunkar aapke rongte khade ho jaayenge. Ek aisi mohabbat ki daastaa'n jismein maut ke baad zindagi ki shuruaat hoti hai. Kya hoga jab prem kisi shareer se nahi aatma se ho jaaye? kya chhaya ki maut ke baad parimal ghosh ki duniya me kisi aur ka chhaya padega? Mohabbat ki is daastaa'n ko poora karne ke liye kya badal jaayega prakirti ka vidhi vidhaan ya phir parimal ki zindagi me laut aayegi chhaya?

title: Akhada : The Authorized Biography of Mahavir Singh Phogat
description: Agar aapne Kushti ,ya Wrestling ke baare me suna hai to aapko "Phogat Family" kaa naam pata hoga , Chaliye sunte hai kahani Wresling ke sabse achhe coach ki , ek pita ki jinhone apni zindagi me kai utar chadav dekhe par fir bhi samaj aur logo ki baate naa sunkar , khud ek kushti ka akhada banaya aur mehnat aur dedication se apni betiyo ko World class Wrestler banaya.

title: Tendulkar Ki Kahani Unhi KI Zubani
description: क्‍या आप जानते हैं कि क्रिकेट के इतिहास में विश्व के सर्वश्रेष्ठ बल्‍लेबाजों में गिने जाने वाले और भारत के सर्वोच्च नागरिक सम्मान भारत रत्न से सम्मानित सचिन तेंदुलकर को वड़ा-पाव बेहद पसंद है और उनकी इसी दिवानगी ने उन्‍हें क्रिकेट जगत का सम्राट बनाया! सचिन के बारे में ऐसे ही रोचक बातें जानने के लिए सुनें उनकी जीवनी केवल कुकू एफएम पर!

title: Kargil Ke Paramvir Captain Vikram Batra
description: Palampur Ka Ek Aam Sa Ladka Jisne 25 Saal Ki Umar Se Pehle Hi Apne Desh Ke Liye Shahadat De Di Aaiye Sunte Hain Us Veer Jawan Ki Kahani Is Audiobook Mein Aur Jaante Hain Indian Army Ke Shershah Ko Thoda Aur Kareeb Se.

title: Netaji Subhash ki Rahasyamaya Kahani
description: Yun to Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose ki maut 18 August 1945 mein, Bharat ko azadi milne se pehle hi ho gayi thi. Us dauran jab unki maut hui tab kayi aise raaz the, jinki sacchai duniya ke samne kabhi aa hi nahi paayi. Lekin agar itihaskaaron ki maane to Bose ki maut se jude kayi raaz hain, jinhe duniya ke samne kabhi laya hi nahi gaya. Is audiobook ko sunne ke baad un sabhi raazon par se parda uthana aapke liye aasan ho jayega. Aur Bose ki maut ka rahasya aapke samne hoga. Aaiye ise sunte hai.

title: Dongri Ka Don: Dawood Ibrahim
description: Ek imandaar police waale ka beta kaise bana duniya ka Most Wanted Don aur kaise banayi usne apni D-Company? Ye sab aapko sunne ko milega humare is show "Dongri Ka Don" mein. To chaliye shuru karte hai Dawood Ibrahim ki murder, extortion, targeted killing, drug trafficking aur terrorism ki kahani.

title: The Cold War Era and Its Politics
description: Second world war ke baad, U.S, Soviet Union aur unse sambandhit sahyogiyo ke beech Cold War start hua tha. World ki do SuperPower ke beech matbhed ne pure world ka Naksha badal diya. 1947 se 1991 tak Superpower banne ki Race mein Soviet Union khatam ho gaya aur America Eklota superpower bankar ubhra. Aaj ek bar fir se Cold war ke halat ban chuke hai, lekin is baar America ke samne Russia khada hai jo ki kisi bhi mamle America se kam nahi hai. America aur Russia ke beech is Cold war ka world par kya asar pad sakta hai aur India kaha exist karta hai. Is series sab kuchh janenge detail mein.

title: हौसला
description: Patjhad hai to basant bhi aaega. Garmi ki tapish ko barsat ki fuharen door karengi. Yahi jajba jeene ka hausla deta hai. Ummeed aur hausla jeevan ki neenv hain.

title: 12 Steps To Be Successful
description: Iss audio book mein 12 aasan kadam ki baat ki gayi hai, jisse aap apni zindagi mein kamyabi pa sakte hain. Apne sapne haqeeqat mein badal sakte hain. "12 steps to be Successful" ki yeh audiobook aapko sikhati hai ki apni zindagi ke liye plan kaise banaye aur goals kaise achieve kare. Isme aapko nayi skills aur naye perspectives ka gyan bhi milega, jisse aap apni zindagi mein nayi uchaiyo tak pahunch sakte hain

title: The Inner Secret : A journey of Self-Discovery in Search of Something Within
description: William Walker ka manna hai ki har ek insaan mein ek Inner Secret of Success and Personal Power hoti hai, agar aap usse pehchaan gaye aur aapko use use karna agaya toh aap kahi successful results achieve kar sakte hai. Iss audiobooks mein aap issi Inner Secret ke baare mein detail mein janenge. Agar Rhonda Byrne dwara likhi book The Secret pasand hai to aapko ye audiobook bhi pasand aayegi.

title: Gautam Buddha: Main Sanyasi Nahi
description:
Hamesha ahinsa aur karuna ka bhav sikhane wale, Bodh Dharm Ki sthapna karne wale Mahatma Gautam Buddha ne kaise kiya tha is gyan ko hassil?
Kaisa tha Gautam Buddha ka bachpan? Aur aisa kya tha jisne unhe moh aur maya se upar uthne ke leye prerit kiya? Gautam Budh ki rakhi gayi Buddhism ki neev kaise apki zindagi badal sakti hai, janne ke liye, Sunein Gautam Buddha: Main Sanyasi Nahi. Agar aapko Buddha's Brain jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Yoga : The way Of Life
description: Ham Sab Jante hain ki Yoga hamari life me bahut zaroori hai lekin karte fir bhi nhin.Kyu ki hame bas ye ek simple si exercise lagti hai.Lekin yahan aap galat hain.Yoga aapke jeewan ko poori taraf badal sakta hai aapke vicharon ko saaf kar sakta hai.Isiliye ham aapke liye laaye hain ek kamaal ki Kitab “Yoga : The way Of Life”. jo aapke dimag ki uthal puthal ko shant karne ke tareeqe batati aur sikhati aut tension se door rahna vo bhi yoga ki madad se.

title: बॉलिवुड विलेन्स
description: Kaise shadi karne ke bahane film shoot karne jaate the Prem Chopra. Prem naam hai mera film ne unhe pehchan di, wo film Bobby nahi karna chahte the.    Ranjit ko jab ghar walo ne dhamkaya to Rakhi ji  ko khud aana pada Ranjit ko bachane ke liye. Ranjit bhi the davedar Gabbar ke role ke liye.       Gulshan Grover kaise Ramleela ke ek chhote se role se pahunche filmon tak.     Shakti Kapoor ek klcar accident ne kaise badli kismat.       Pran apne struggling days me bhi Hotel Taj me rehne wale iklaute star jo ki highest paid, hero se bhi zyada.

title: Mansarovar - Aadhar
description: Premchand ne samajik muddon aur manviye bhavnao ke badehiya par focos karte hue likha mahan upnayas "Mansarovar - Aadhar". Is kahani mein ek dalit pariwar ki zindagi ka dardnak varnan hai aur unke sath-sath jati, dharma aur swatantrata ke muddon par bhi lambi baat ki gayi hai. Aur Kya baat ki hai vo janane ke liye suniye "Mansarovar - Aadhar" novel ki ye Audiobook.

title: Greatest Rivalries in Cricket
description: Kisi bhi Sport mein Cricket jaisi baat nahi hai. Early 1880s se Lekar Aaj tak Cricket ne Jis Tarah se audience ko apne sath joda hua hai, vo koi aur sport nahi kar paya hai. Aur iska ek karan Cricket ko khelne wali Teams aur Players ke beech ki Rivalry bhi hai. Ye Audiobook Sunke aapko cricket ki kuch aise hi Greatest Rivalries ke bare mein Pata chalne wala hai , jinko janne ke baad Cricket mein aap ki dilchaspi aur bhi jyada badh jayegi.

title: Zero Se Hero
description: इस सीरीज द्वारा में यानी की RJ Glenn आपको मेरी लाइफ की कुछ एक्सपेरिएंसेस और कहानिया सुनाऊंगा ताकि आप मेरी गलतियॉं से सीखे और लाइफ में कुछ नई गलतियां करें ताकि में आपसे सीख सकूँ हम और आप मिल्लर इस सीरीज में कुछ नया करेंगे और एक दुसरे से सींकेंगे |

title: Homage to Catalonia
description: Kisi bhi War ki kahani wahan maujood sainik se behtar koi nhi suna sakta. Theek usi tarah jaise is audiobook mein lekhak George Orwell ne Spanish war ke dauran hue apne un experiences ko bataya hai, jab vo 'POUM militia of the Republican Army' ke liye ladai lad rahe the. Aur sirf apne personal experience hi nahi, is kitaab mein unhone war ke dauran hui politics ko lekar bhi kai aise khulase kiye hain jo aapko hairan kardenge. Toh aaiye sunte hai KUKU FM ka ye show aur jaante hain Spanish war ki poori kahani.

title: Haariye Na Himmat | Writer - Shree Ram Sharma Acharya
description:
हमारे चैनल हारिये न हिम्मत - लेखक श्रीराम शर्मा आचार्य में आपका स्वागत है। आपके लिए हम निरंतर एपिसोड बनाते रहते हैं। अगर आपको हमारा चैनल पसंद आये तो इसे अपने परिवार और दोस्तों के Whatsapp पे ज़रूर शेयर करें।
writer: श्री राम शर्मा आचार्य
Author : Shree Sharma Acharya
Producer : Kuku FM
Voiceover Artist : Ankit Saraswat

title: Journey Of Indian Media
description: Aapke paas mobile hai aur aap jhat se duniya bhar ki sari khabren kuch minute mein jaan lete hain.Lekin ye khabron ka silsila shuru kaise hua? kaise pahuncha har ghar TV?Wo kaun sa gaon tha jahan se shuru hui television kranti?Kaise sirf 15 minute mein duniya bhar ki khabar batane wale show ab 24 ghante ke news channel ban gaye hain aur fir kaise digital media ne har apni pakad sabse mazboot kar li.Pura itihas janane ke liye hi to hai ye khas show "Journey Of Indian Media: From 15 Minute To 24*7".

title: The Man Eating Leopard Of Rudraprayag
description: Yeh kahaani Rudraprayag ke itihas ke us daur ki hai jab ek aadamkhor tendua vahan ke logon par kaal banke mandraane laga aur aaye din kisi insaan ka shikaar karne laga. Akhir kaise Rudraprayag ke logon ne is kaal se chhutkara paya aur kaise aadamkhor tenduye ka aatank vahan khatam hua. Jaaniye Kuku FM par Author Jim Corbett ki is full Audiobook mein.

title: Stress ko kaise kare Khatam
description:
DAY 1 -	Maansik tanaav ko kaise kam kare - 
Tanaav prabandhan ki series ke is pehle ank mein jaanenge ki tanaav kya hai aur kaise aap viprit paristhitiyon mein bhi tanaav pe niyantran paa sakte hai.  

DAY 2 -	Tann aur mann ka santulan kyun hai zaroori -
Manushya kisi bhi paristhiti se bahar aa sakta hai agar uske tann aur mann ke beech santulan hai. Suniye ye ansh aur jaaniye ki kyun zaroori hai tann aur mann ka samanjasya. 

DAY 3 -Tanaav aur bhavnao ka sambandh 
Tanaav ka hamare shareer ke saath saath hamari bhavnao par bhi asar padta hai. Tanaav aur hamari bhavnao ka sambandh bohot gehra hai. Suniye is ansh ko asur jaaniye kya aur kaisa hai bhavnao aur tanaav ka sambandh. 


DAY 4 - Khud se nahi kare negative baate - 
Hamare andar har tarah ke vichar umadte hai. Sahi, galat, acche, bure..har tarah ke, lekin tanaav ke karan hum aksar negative vicharon par dhyan dete hai. Jaaniye kyun nahi karni chahiye khudse negative baate aur ise kaise roke. 

DAY 5 - Paristhitiyon ka purv aanklan - 
Hum har paristhiti ka pehle se aanklan kar lete hai aur jab hamari soch anusar der se result aata hai, tab hum tanaav ke shikaar ho jaate hai. Kisi bhi paristhiti ka purv aanklan hume tanaav se bhar deta hai, suniye ye episode aur adhik jaankari ke liye 

DAY 6 - Samarpan ki kala -
Har paristhiti mein bhaavo aur vichaaro se ladhna aavshyak nahi, isse uljhan badh bhi sakti hai.Kabhi kabhi zarurat hoti hai samarpan ki, tann aur mann ki shaanti ke liye. Suniye ye episode aur jaaniye samarpan ka mahatva. 

DAY 7 - Tanaav mein rakhe sehat ka khaas khayal
Aksar tanaav mein hum sehat ko nazarandaaz kar dete hai. Hamari bhook se lekar nind tak sab tanaav se prabhavit hoti hai. Suniye ye episode aur jaaniye kyun hai tanav mein apni sehat ka khayal rakhna zaroori.

title: Rog Pahchanein Upchar Jane
description: Badhiya life ke liye sabse zaroori hai badhiya health. Agar Aapki health sahi hai to aap man lagakar kam kar paate hain. Success bhi paate hain aur paise ki bahut sari bachat hoti hai. Lekin ye jo bimariyan hain na ye hamari body mein dheere-dheere jagah banati hain aur fir achanak se samane aakar aapko pareshani mein daal deti hain.To kya hain sahi tareeke in saari bimariyon ko pahchan paane aur sahi ilaj ke? Kya karke aap inse door reh sakte hain? Yahi sab batane ke liye hum le aaye hain “Rog Pahchanein Upchar Jane” kitaab ki Audio Book.

title: Gun-Tantra
description: Dhananjay army se retirement lekar apne kheton ko naxaliyon se bachane ghar to aa gaya par jaldi hi apne poore pariwar se haath dho baitha. Ab Dhananjay ke jeevan ka ek hi maksad hai badla aur iske liye usne banayi Dhananjay Sena. Kya Dhananjay Sena naxaliyon ka khatama kar payegi? Kya Police is muthbhed ko bas dekhti rahegi ya kuch karegi bhi? Kya in sab ke peeche koi rajnaitik sajish bhi hai? In sab sawalon ke jawabon ke liye sunte rahein Bihar ki jatigat rajniti par adharit gatha “Gun-Tantra”

title: Usain Bolt
description: Kaun hai voh, jisne race ki duniya ke sabhi world records apne naam kiye? Jo jab bhi daudta hai, tab samay ruk sa jaata hai aur sabhi ki aankhein sirf usi par jami rehti hai? Jo insaan ke roop mein 9.58 is number se pehchaana jaata hai? Race track par Cheetah, aur finish line par jeet ki muskaan - Olympics mein Jamaica ka dominance, athletic race tracks par hukumat rakhne wala yeh runner sirf naye records nahi banata, balki apne hi records ko tod ek alag kahaani likh chuka hai. Chaliye jaante hai, Lightning Bolt ki raftaar se bhari jeevni!

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hai Bharatvarsh : Akbar
description: Bharat ke hazaro saal ke itihas men na jaane kitne Raja-Maharaja hue , lekin mahan shabd ka istemal keval do shasakon ke liye hi kiya jaata hai. Ek to Ashok aur doosre Akbar. Dono hi samrat, samrajya se zyada shanti ki baat karte the, sulah ki baat karte the, aman ki baat karte the. Agar aap un shakhsiyaton ke baare men jaanna chahte hai, jinhone is desh ki pehchan gadhi hai. To suniye audiobook 'Anuoam Kher prastut karte hain Bharatvarsh Akbar' hamare online platform par.

title: Kanyadaan ya Vidyadaan
description: देश के लाखों घरों की सच्‍चाई बयां करती कहानी ‘कन्‍यादान या विद्यादान’ लोगों के घरों में झाडू-पोछा का काम करनेवाली सुमन, उसकी बेटी मुनिया और मालकिन रीता के अनजान रिश्‍तों की अटूट डोर की कहानी है। एक गरीब की बेटी को पढ़ाने का प्रण रीता करती है, लेकिन समाज के लोग ही इस अच्‍छे काम को बुरा मानते हैं। गरीबी, बाल विवाह, भ्रष्‍टाचार जैसे सामाजिक बुराईयों और बेटी शिक्षा जागरूकता के बारे में बेहद ह्दय स्‍पर्शी कहानी सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Kingfisher Scam
description: Har acchi chez ka ant toh hona hi hai, King of Good Times- Vijay Mallya ka bhi 2016 mein Endgame ho hi gaya. Bharat ke sabse bade businessman se le kar Bharat ke sabse bade thug banane tak, Mallya ne Bollywood, Politics, Cricket, har kuch kar liya. Aur 2016 mein unhone Bharatiya banko ko 9000 crore ka chakhma laga kar desh chod diya. Sune is rangeen Businessman ki ultra rangeen kahani.

title: Jayalalitha
description:
थलावी अम्मा  जयाकुमार जयललिता उर्फ जे जयललिता । आजाद हिंदुस्तान की चुनिंदा सबसे पॉवरफुल वूमेन पॉलिटीशियन की बात करें तो उस लिस्ट में शायद इंदिरा गांधी के बाद नाम हो  जे जयललिता का,पर अगर  हम बात करें उन महिला शख्सियत की जिन्होंने दो विपरीत क्षेत्रों में अपना दबदबा कायम रखा तो बिना किसी संदेह के उस सूची में केवल एक ही नाम होगा वो है थलावी जे जयललिता का ।

Author : Sachin Goswami
Voiceover Artist : Rj Riddhi

title: Marilyn Monroe - The Blonde Bombshell
description: Marilyn Monroe - Ek American actress, singer aur model. Inkha khitaab 'blonde bombshell' inhe kai dumb-blonde aur sexy characters nibhaane par mila. America ki sabse mashoor sex symbols, 1950s aur 1960s ke dashak mein as an actress and photoshoot model, inka boht bolbaala tha. Ek aam parivaar mein Norma naam se janm lekar kaise yeh khubsoorat ladki voh phenomena bani jise aaj puri duniya 'Marilyn' ke naam se jaanti hai. Chaliye sunte hai inki legendary but tragic story.

title: Autobiography of A Yogi
description: Mastering The Kriya Yoga - Paramhansa Yogananda

title: Rare Gems from Bollywood
description: Bharat ke manoranjan maanachitra mein bollywood ek pramukh vyakti hai. Us Bollywood mein kaee kahaaniyaan phailee huee hain. Rishi Kapoor ya Kishor kumar kee nakalee maarkasheet ke saath jitendr kee ghadee ka aadaan-pradaan. Keval kukufm par jaanie bollywood sitaaron ke jeevan kee aisee majedaar ghatanaon ke baare mein।

title: Kisan Aandolan: Dasha Aur Disha
description: "Jai jawan, Jai kisan" ka naara to har bhartiya lagata hai lekin kya sach mein kisan aaj ke daur mein itne hi zaroori bane huye hain? Yeh sawal aaj bhi rajneetik, samajik, aarthik mudda bana hua hai. Isi sawal ke ird-gird ghumti hai Kuku FM par yeh khaas Audiobook "Kisan Aandolan: Dasha aur Disha". Jo aapko kisan aandolan ka sangharsh aur kisan rajneeti ka vikas, aur uski majbooti se gathan ke baarein mein bataayegi. Chaliye shuru karte hain kisanon ke sangharsh ko janne ka safar.

title: Napoleon Bonaparte
description: Ye kahani hai Europe ke sabse mahan military commander ki kahani , jinki zindagi ki shuruaat to aam family me hui , lekin dimag aur strategy ka use kar ke France ke Raja ban gaye. jinke power of desire ne unko wo mukam diya jo sapne se kam nahi. Chaliye sunte hai King Napoleon Bonaparte ke bare me jinhone 35 saal ki umar me khud ko france ka Raja ghoshit kar diya aur jo apne gale par zeher laga kar rakhte the.

title: How To Up Your Game
description: Agar aap apna game "Up" karna chahte hain aur duniya ko dikhana chahte hain ki aap asal mein kaun hain toh ye show aapko ye achieve karne mein help karne wala hai, is show mein aap jaanenge ki kaise aap ek individual aur ek team member ke taur par successful ho sakte hai aur saath hi baat karenge kuch aise mantras ke baare mein jo aapki madad karenge ek accha insaan aur apna better version banne mein. Toh der kis baat ki chaliye apna 2.0 version dhoodne ke safar par.

title: Maut ka Khel
description: उत्तराखंड के औली नामक जगह पर भीषण ठंडी और आबादी से दूर रह रहा एक छोटा क्रिस्चियन समुदाय| उन्ही के बीच विदेश से इस वीरान जगह पर छुट्टी मनाने आती है एक औरत और उसकी बेटी|  उनके यहाँ आने के पीछे है एक रहस्य जिसका किसी को पता नही है | एक शाम को भारी बर्फबारी के बीच उसी समुदाय के कुछ लोग खेलते हैं Ouija का खतरनाक खेल जिसके माध्यम से वो करते हैं आत्माओ से बातचीत | मगर वो खेल तब खतरनाक बन जता है जब उस खेल के दौरान Ouija के द्वारा उन्हें पता चलता है की उन्ही के समुदाय के एक व्यक्ति की हो चुकी है मौत| वो इसे एक मजाक समझते हैं मगर उनके होश तब उड़ जाते हैं जब उनको बाद में पता चलता है की Ouija के खेल के दौरान जिस व्यक्ति की मौत की भविष्यवाणी होती है वो सच निकलती है और जिस समय वो आत्मा उनको मौत के बारे में बताते है पोस्टमार्टम के अनुसार मौत उसी समय की निर्धारित होती है। शुरू होता है रहस्य और रोमांच से भरा एक खौफनाक सफर! आगे क्या हुआ जानने के लिए सुनिए दिव्यांशु त्रिपाठी द्वारा लिखित ये मौत का खेल।

title: Why I Am An Atheist
description: 23 Saal Ki Umar Mein Haste Hue Fansi Par Chadne Wale Bhagat Singh Jab Lahore Jail Mein The Tab Unhone Jail Ke Andar Se Likhna Shuru Kiya, Unke Likhe Essays Unhki Soch Ka Ek Aaina Hai. Akhir Kyu Ek Religious Ladka Itni Kam Umar Mein Nastik Ho Gya? Ye Sawal Humein Se Bohut Logon Ke Mann Mein Aata Hai. Bhagat Singh Is Soch Ko Kareeb Se Jaanne Aur Samjhane Ke Liye Suniye Unki Likhi Kitaab Ki Ye Audiobook.

title: कृशांगी- एक रहस्यमयी लड़की
description: दिल्ली नोएडा में बढ़ रहे हैं क्राइम, पुलिस भी नहीं पता लगा पा रही है कुछ हत्याओं का। कौन है ये रहस्यमई कातिल? वहीं दूसरी ओर है एक भोली सी रती, जो किस्मत की हालातों से हो गई है त्रस्त। क्या रती भी हो जाएगी किसी दरिंदगी का शिकार? या बनेगी एक मसीहा? जानने के लिए सुनिए ये कहानी कृषांगी - एक रहस्यमई लड़की

title: मेरा उकाब
description:
यह कहानी एक ऐसे लड़के के जीवन के इर्द-गिर्द घूमती है जो कि हकलाहट की समस्या से परेशान है | और अपनी समस्या की वजह से उसे कई प्रकार की दिक्कतों का सामना करना पड़ता है | उसे गाने का शौक है लेकिन उसके परिवार वाली खास करती है उसकी सौतेली मां उसके इस शौक को अनदेखा कर देती है और हर समय से किसी ना किसी प्रकार से प्रताड़ित करती रहती है | जिस वजह से उसका यह शौक उसका एक सपना बनकर रह जाता है | लेकिन वह हार नहीं मानता और अपने दोस्तों की मदद से वह किस प्रकार अपने मकसद में कामयाब होता है | यह जानना बहुत ही दिलचस्प होगा
Voiceover Artist : RJ Hemant
Author : Rohit Verma Rimpu

title: The Truth Behind Kalinga's
description: Kaling, jo aaj Odisha ke naam se famous hai, ek aisa samrajya tha jisne Samrat Ashok ko Prachand Ashok bana diya.  Kaling  ne Mahabharat ke yudh mein Kauravon ka sath bhi diya hai, aur dharti par Samrat Ashok ki wo ladai bhi dekhi hai jisme ek lakh log ki jaan chali gayi thi. Phir aisa kya hua Kaling ki dharti par ki Ashok ne jung ko khatam kar Buddhism apna liya? Kya sach mein Ashoka ne khoon kharaba dekh Buddhism apnaya tha? Ya iske peeche tha koi gehra raaz? Kaling ki dharti, dharm, vyapar, praja aur rajaon se jude aise kayi raaz jane is show mein.

title: Bhima Koregaon
description: UPSC ke Syllabus mein apne aksar Bhima Koregaon ke bare mein suna hoga. IAS aur PCS banne ki mehnat karne wale aaj humare desh ke har chotey bade atihasik kisson ke bare mein jante aur padhte hai. Lekin kya aap jante hai Bhima Koregaon ka pura sach? Kya aap jante hai is Pehchaan aur samaan ke huq ki ladai ke bare mein? Agar nahi toh abhi suniye Bhima Koregaon.

title: लुच्चा 'द ग्रेट लवर'
description: एक गुंडे और एक रहिस्जादी की ज़िन्दगी जब एक ही कहानी बन जाती है, तो बुराई जीतती है या अच्छाई? जानने के लिए सुनिए एक लुच्चे की कहानी।

title: Kaise Kholein Apni Dukaan
description: Hum kitni bhi acchi job kyu na karlen lekin Apna Khudka business kholne se jyada satisfying aur kuch bhi nahi hota. Fir Chahe vo ek dukaan hi kyon na ho, jiske   bare mein hum aksar sochte toh hai lekin khol nahi pate, kyonki uske liye humare pass iss show jaisa koi guide nahi hai. Ye show har us insaan ke liye bana hai jo apni khudki ek dukaan kholna chahta hai. Planing se lekar use kholne ke baad kaise profit earn karna hai iski ek ek jaankari isme di gai hai.

title: Sentinel Island - Uncontacted Island
description: Duniya ki ek aisi Place jaha ke baare achche se kisi ko kuchh nahi pata jise most Dangoures Island ke naa se bhi jana jata hai, aur vo koi dusre planet me nahi hai isi Earth me. Insano ka pichle kai hajaro salo me bada transformation hua ha, ham Janglon se shehro tak aa gye. Lekin is Island par rahne vale logo me koi changes nahi aaye, ye abhi bhi vaisa hi jeevan jee rahe hai. ise connect karne ki bahut koshish ki gai but baat nhi bani. is series me ham is Island ke sare secrets janege, to chaliye sunte hai is shandar series ko.

title: मी टू
description: Rakesh apne paarivarik jeevan mein khush tha. Hansata khelta Parivaar aur ek nanhe mehmaan Kilkaari pure aangan mein gunja karti thi. Lekin yah Ronak zyaada din tak nahi rahi. Grahan lag gaya

title: M-One Bank Crisis
description: Ek Commercial Bank ko bachaane ke safar mei, Randhir Walia apni hi biwi ko kho dete hain. Magar sachi ghatnao par aadharit ye kahaani, aapko Indian Banks aur unke peeche ke kaale sach ke baare mei kuch aise raaz batayegi, jise sun kar aap hairaan ho jayenge.

title: The Story Of Maya Angelou
description: Aisa kayi logon ke saath hota hai ki ek hi samaaj mein, ek hi jagah rehte huye bhi log unhein apne se alag maan bethte hain kyunki ya to unki caste alag hoti hai ya unka rang roop unhein doosron. Aisi hi kahani hai Maya Angelou ki, jinhe apne rang roop ki wajah se apni life mein kayi ladaai ladni padi. Saath hi ladki hone ki wajah se samaaj ki kayi restrictions aur sexual abuse ka bhi saamna karna pada. Is Exclusive series ke zariye hum Maya Angelou ke inhi struggles ke baarein mein jaanege aur yeh bhi jaanege ki kaise maya angelou apni har musibat par jeet ka parcham lehraati gayi. chaliye doston shuru karte hain maya angelou ke life ka yeh safar.

title: Blood Hunt
description: Delhi mein achanak se 6-14 age group ke bacche gayab hone lagte hai. Jab unki dead body milti hai to bus unke pure sharir se blood nikala huva rehta hai. Aur unki body per triangle ka mark bana hota hai. Akhir kaun kar rha hai ye sab? Delhi police bhi nakam hai iss case ko solve karne mein. to phir kaise hoga iss crime ka khulasa? Kaun hai in sab ke piche aur kyu masum baccho ki zindagi se khel rha hai? janane ke liye sune puri kahani 'Blood Hunt' sirf Kuku FM per.

title: इश्क़ एक इबादत
description: College Mei 5 Students ki Dosti aur fir Kab Dosti pyar mei badal Jaaati hei Madhav aur Meera ko Pata bhi nahi chalta. Dono ki Manzil ek hokar bhi apne pyar ko Jahir nahi kar paate. Kya inn premi jhodon ki kwahish puri hogi ya aduri reh jayegi? College ke din ki Masti aur Yaarana ki Dasta yeh kahani baya karti hei.

title: Night Owl se Banein Morning Bird
description: Theoretically toh hum sabhi jaante hai ki subah uthne ke kitne fayde hote hai. Magar jab uthne ki baari aati hai toh hum sabhi fail ho jate hai aur hamara alarm snooze hota rehta hai. Agar aap bhi isi biradari ke hai jo karna bahut kuch chahte hai life mein magar subah uthne ki aadat nahi laga paa rahe hai, toh ye show aap hi k liye hai! Agar aapko "Change Your Schedule, Change Your Life" Aur "The 5 AM Club" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj
description: Ek taraf jaha pita Shahji Bhosle Adilshahi ke Changul mein phase hai, wahi dusri taraf unhi ke bete Shivaji Hindvi swarajya ke sapne boonte hai. Apni bhoomi ko Mughal shasan se mukt karne ke is sapne mein laakhon maratha aur malve inke saath jud jaate hai aur saamna hota hai Auranzeb jaise kai khunkar shasako se! Jaane itihaaski sabse mahan gaatha, Chatrapati Shivaji Maharaj ki katha!

title: Bangladesh Se Kyu Bhaag Rahe Hain Hindu
description: Log apne ghar se dur rehne ka dukh nahi seh paate toh sochiye apne desh se dur jaane ka dukh sehna kitna mushkil hota hoga. Humari audiobook “Bangladesh Se Kyu Bhaag Rahein Hain Hindu” mein aapko jaan-ne ko milega ki kaise Hinduon par alag-alag tarah se zulm aur atyaachaar karke unhein apne hi gharon se nikalne ke liye pareshaan kiya gaya. Lekin kya kisi ne Hinduon ki madad ki ya in saari problems ka koi solution nikala bhi gaya? Ye sab jaan-ne ke liye shuru karte hai humara pehla episode.

title: Ravan: A Devotee Or A Demon
description: Raavan ke ghamand aur rakshas roop se to hum sabhi avgat hain magar yeh bahut kam hi log jaante hain ki Raavan ek mahagyani pandit bhi tha jisne apne tap aur bal se kayi vardaanon ko haasil kar ke  yamlok, prithvilok aur pataallok par raaj kar liya tha. Kuku FM par is original series mein hum janenge Raavan ke jeevan ki isi sampoorna gatha ko aur saath hi uske jeevan se hum kya seekh sakte hain yeh bhi  aapko batayenge.

title: Ek tha Raja ek thi Rani
description: ग्यारहवीं शताब्दी में अजयपुर में एक राजकुमार आदित्य वर्धन जन्म लेता है। जिसके बारे में ज्योतिषी भविष्यवाणी करते है कि वो एक दिन चक्रवर्ती सम्राट बनेगा। उसी दिन दूसरे राज्य कान्यकुब्ज में एक राजकुमारी सौन्दर्यप्रिया जन्म लेती है। बड़े होने के बाद एक दिन इत्तिफाक से राजकुमार और राजकुमारी की एक दुसरे से मुलाकात हो जाती है। पर दोनों ही एक दूसरे की असली पहचान नहीं जानते। धीरे धीरे दोनों दोस्त बन जाते है और अक्सर छिप कर मिलने लगते है। पर क्या इनका ये प्यार परवान चढ़ पाएगा? या राज्यों की ये राजनीति कर देगी इनके प्यार को खत्म? जानने के लिए सुनिए एक था राजा एक थी रानी।

title: The Power of Your Subconscious Mind
description: Subconscious Mind se bano Successful

title: Zindagi apne liye Jiye, Dusro ke liye Nahi
description: Log hume pasand kare ye kaun nahi chahta? Magar is chah mein hum apneaap par kai mayne ko limitations daal dete hai ki kahi hamare kuch karne se hume koi napasand karne lage toh? Magar hume hamari zindagi hamare principles se jeena ka pura adhikar hai, bina dusro ke judgement ki fikar kare. Ye book summary aapko usi cheez ka courage degi!

title: Iran Vs Iraq
description: Middle East aur Jung - Yeh kahaani boht puraani hai, magar iske ghaav aaj bhi unki awaam ke beech taza hai. Saddam aur Khomeini, do aise supreme leaders jo jann kranti se Iran aur Iraq ka chehra bane. Magar kyun lalach, taaqat aur siyaasat ke is bhadde se khel ne pure Irani-Iraqi belt ko war crisis mein daal diya. Oil corporations aur world politics ne kaise isme apna faayda uthaaya, Kuwait ke saath dhoka, America ka khela har daav aur ek tanashah ka anth. Sab samjhenge is audiobook 'Iran vs Iraq' mein.

title: Bhindranwale And Operation Blue Star
description: 31 October, 1984 ki subah, Pradhanmantri Indira Gandhi ko unke hi bodyguards 30 goliyon ki lagtaar firing kar maar dete hai, aur ghanto ke andar Delhi mein dange bhadak jaate hai, aur in sab ke peeche hota hai bas ek naam-Jarnail Singh Bhindranwale. Bhindranwale, jo Khalistan movement ko lead kar rahe the, unhe Indian army ne Golden Temple ke andar attack kar maar diya tha. Par ek alag desh- Khalistan ki maang aaj tak kyu jaari hai? Harbhajan Singh ne haal hi mein Bhindranwale ko Sant kyu kaha tha? Ek gurudware ke andar military operation ki permission Indian army ko kaise mili thi?

title: मिलियन डॉलर की हेरा-फेरी
description: विश्वप्रसिद्ध लेखक जेफरी आर्चर का रोचक-रोमांचक उपन्यास, जो किसी मसाला मूवी से कम नहीं है। पैसे के चक्‍करे में फंसे लोगों की क्‍या मन: स्थिति होती है, इसमें बखूबी बताया गया है। प्रॉस्‍पेक्‍टा ऑइल कारपोरेशन नाम की कंपनी धोखाधड़ी करके शेयर बाजार से पैसे लूटती है। कहानी का मुख्‍य नायक स्‍टीफन, जिन-पियरे, रोबिन और जेम्‍स ब्रिग्‍सले इस धोखाधड़ी का शिकार होते हैं। स्‍टीफन अपना पैसा वापस हासिल करने के लिए एक प्‍लान बनाते हैं, जो इस कहानी का सबसे रोचक मोड़ है। जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Apni Power ko Pehchanein
description: Hamare roz ki zindagi mein jaagrut kaise rahe? Meditation aur aisi kai saari simple techniques ki madat se ye show aapko kaise apne vicharo ko shaant karna hai, present mein duniya dekhna hai, aur jeevan mein halkapan rakh kar kaise solution dhundna hai ye bataegi. Agar aapko Deepak Chopra dwara likhi gayi "Total Meditation" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Toxic Parents
description: Toxic Parents ke sath rehna zindagi ka sabse mushkil task hota hai. Aur kai log  toh itna zyada pareshan ho jaate hain ki majboori mein unhein ghar chhod Kar parents se alag rehna padta hai jisse unke aur unke parents ke rishton mein daraar aa jati hai. Toh agar aap bhi apne toxic parents se pareshan hain lekin ghar chodhkar bhagna nahi balki problem ko solve karna chahte hain toh uske liye is audiobook se perfect aur kuch nahi ho sakta. Kyuki ye aapko step by step toxic parents se deal karne ke tareeke batati hai aur bataur parent bhi agar aapke behavior se aapke bacche preshaan hai toh kya aap apne hi bacchon ke liye toxic hain ye bhi aap is audiobook ke zariye samjh sakte hain aur problem ka solution pa sakte hain.

title: Hindustani Akhbaarnama
description: Bharat mein subha ki shuruaat chai aur akhbaar ke saath hi hoti hai. Jabtak subah-subah akhbaar padh ke desh duniya ki khabar ko jaan na lein tabtak din adhoora rehta hai. Magar duniya ki khabar apne panno par rakhne wala akhbaar bharat mein kab shuru kiya gaya aur usse pehle kaise khabron ko logon tak pahunchaya jaata tha? Akhbaar ne kaise azaadi ke samay mukhya bhumika nibhayi thi? Aaj ke daur mein akhbaar ka kya status hai? In sabhi sawalon ko hum jaanege humari is original series mein. Chaliye shuru karte hain akhbaar ke itihas ko janne ka safar.

title: Climate Change - A Bigger Problem
description: 2021 mein humare atmosphere mein carbon dioxide ki matra sabse zyada payi gayi. 2010-2020 ka dashak pichle 1,25.000 saalon mein sabse garam raha. Hum 1.2 trillion baraf har saal kho rahe hai. Dhire Dhire humne humare unwanted desires ke karan earth ko bahut hu nuksan pahuchaya jisse ab pichhe jana mushkil hai. Isse bachne ke liye ab kya kiya jaye ? Kya koi rasta hai bhi ya nahi ? Jante hai iss audiobook mein

title: How to Develop Willpower and Self-Discipline
description: Anushaasan se hi shaasan hai. Discipline aur will power kisi bhi insaan ke jeevan ke architects hai. Jeevan mein safalta aur popularity aapki mehnat aur aapke pratibha se aati hai. Magar inki dhaar ko sharp banaaye rakhne ke liye discipline aur will power ka hona boht zaroori hai. Kyunki agar yeh nahi toh aap lambi race ke ghode nahi ban sakte. Agar jeevan mein door tak jaana hai apni kabiliyat ko har waqt nikharte hue, toh discipline aur will power ki chaabi hi har taale ko khol sakti hai. Aaiye aur sunte hai, Jeff Carter ki pustak ka saaransh KuKu FM par! Agar aapko "The Power of Self-Discipline" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: दिव्य शक्ति
description:
ठाकुर महेंद्र अपनी बहन कमला और उसके पति के षडयंत्र को समझ नहीं पाते हैं और उसमें फंसकर उनका हंसता खेलता परिवार बिखर जाता है। ठकुराईन अपने गुरूदेव की सहायता से अपनी बेटी के साथ अनजान जीवन जीती है। ठाकुर महेंद्र की बेटी दिव्‍या को दिव्‍य शक्ति की प्राप्ति है। जिसके कारण उसे भविष्‍य में घटने वाली अनहोनी का पहले ही पता चल जाता है। दिव्‍या कैसे इन घटनाओं से लोगों को बचाती है और 17 साल बाद अपने पिताजी को अपनी बुआ के चगुंल से छुडाने में कामयाब हो पाती है, जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी ।
Author : Pinky Paul
Voiceover Artist : Ruby Pareek

title: How To Master Any Skill?
description: Doston hum jab koi career option choose karte hain toh hamari poori koshish rehti hai ki hum us field mein mastery haasil karein, lekin kya hamesha aisa hota hai? Shayad nahi, kyuki jab hum field mein utarte hain tab humein real-time challenges ka saamna karna padta hai aise mein bahut zaroori hai ki hum khudko groom karte rahein aur apni learning ko jaari rakhein. Aaiye sunte hain ye audiobook jo humein mastery hassil krne ke safar pe le chalegi.

title: Engineers Jinhone Badli Duniya
description: Kahawat hai ki Bengaluru shahar mein agar aap hawa me pathar uchaloge to wo jaakar kisi na kisi Engineer ko he lagega, kehne ka matlb ye hai ki us shahar mein bauth he jyada sankhya mein Engineers hain. Agar aaj se kuch salon pehle ki baat kare to har 2 mein se ek bacha yhai kehta tha ki use bhe Aage chal kar Engineering he karni hai. To chaliye le chalte hai aapko "Engineers Jinhone Badli Duniya"  ke Audio Book ke safar par jisme  duniya ke un tamam Engineers ke baare me zikar kiya gaya hai jinki wajah se aaj humari zindagi bauth he aasan ban chuki hai.

title: Upgrade Your Life
description: Kitna Sahi hota na agar life mein vahi sab hota jata jo hum chahte hain. Success simple lifestyle se mil jati agar to? Lekin aisa hota kahan hai. Success ke liye Karna padta hai "Jatan" bole to "Effort" vo bhi poora. Aur effort galat tareeqe se kiya to vo bhi waste. Hum aapke dost hain isliye to jaante hain ki aapki Life ki gaadi kahan atki hai aur kyun aap success se bas thodi door rah jaate hain. To ham nibha rahe hain apni dosti ka dharm aur le aaye hain aapke liye life ko aasan aur kamyab banane ke nayab tareeqon se bhari kitab “Upgrade Your Life”. Jisme hain jeevan ki samsyaon ka samadhan.

title: Paisa ye Paisa
description: Ek khoobasoorat aurat kee chaahat chaid vintar ko kuchh aisa karane ke liye prerit karatee hai jo usake hisaab se ek paraphekt mardar tha . haalaanki mardar karana jitana aasaan hota hai use chhipaana utana hee mushkil…suprasiddh kraim lekhak jems hedalee cheiz ke upanyaas ‘di sakar panch ka jitendr naath dvaara kiya behatareen hindee anuvaad

title: Detox And Heal Your Health
description: Har koi chahta hai ki wo healthy rahe. Par Kaise ? Aaj ke time mein, poisonous pathogens humare food mein hi hote hai, jo humare janam se pehle hi humari health ke liye khatra paida kar dete hai. To aise mein hum kaise apni health ka khyal rakhe jo hume internal level se cleansing mein help kar sake ? Yahi janenge hum iss audiobook mein. Iske alawa hum intermittent diet, food combinations aur health ke liye kya suitable hai un sab ke bare mein janenge

title: Trikaya
description: Kya MBBS ki padhai karne wali Anamika ko sach mein bhoot-pret mein yakeen hai? Kya uske bachpan mein hua hadsa ek sach tha?? ya darawana sapna jo samay ke saath sach lagne laga? Anamika aur uske friends inhi sab baaton ka pata lagane ke liye nikal pade hain Timarpur. Timarpur aur uske aaspass ke gaanv mein Trikaaya ka khauf bana hua hai aur koi bhi timapur nahi jana chahta hai. Aise mein kya Anamika aur uske friends kisi musibat mein fansne ja rahe hain? Kya sach mein trikaya hai aur kya wo anamika aur uske friends ko marna chahti hai? Kya Anamika aur uske friends bach kar laut payenge? Janne ke liye sunte rahiye Kuku FM ki behtreen horror drama- Trikaya.

title: The Future Of Health And Wellness Industry
description: Aaj ke samay mein jahan par hum tarah tarah ke revolution ke saath aage badh rahe hai, isme ek industry hai jo ki iss century mein ek bahut bade revolution ke saath aage badh rahi hai aur wo hai health industry. Subah uthne ke saath istemal hone vale toothbrush aur toothpaste se lekar humare khane tak, sab kuch aaj is industry ka hissa hai jo boom par hai aur audiobook mein hum sikhenge ki kis tarah se hum log sirf user na banke iss mein entrepreneur ki tarah shamil ho sakte hai, kaise invest kar sakte hai aur kaise apne existing business ko badha sakte hai

title: Indian Education System : Beginning and Development
description: Sabse bada daan shiksha daan....yeh slogan bhale adhunik ho, lekin hum Indians iss slogan ko itihaas se hi follow kar rahe hai. Tabhi to duniya ko zero se lekar trignometry tak sab kuch humne hi diya hai. Yahi nahi, humare granthon mein universe ko lekar jo baatein batayi gayi hai, usse ab NASA jaise bade research centre bhi sahi maan rahe hai. Toh agar humara education system shuruaat se hi itna strong raha hai, phir aakhir kyun aaj duniya ki top literate countries mein India ka naam nahi hai? Kya iski wajah humari gheesi-petti policies hai? Agar nahi, toh India Education system mein kya-kya badlav aaye hai? Janne ke liye suniye humari yeh audiobook.

title: Kasba : Ek Mahashakti
description: Prithvilok par basa ek aisa kshetra jismein mahashakti ka vaas hai. Is kshetra me aise kai aaqa hain jo duniya ko apne ishaare par nachaana jaante hain. Aghori babaao'n se lekar baahubaliyon tak ko is mahashakti ki talaash hai jisse wo dharti par raaj kar sake. Is Jung me jab zameen aur aasman bhi takraayenge to nazara behad khaufnaak hoga. Kya hoga jab in divya shaktiyon ke beech ek anjaani si mohabbat bhi saans legi? Janne ke liye sunein Kuku FM par ye kahani!

title: Win more Customers by Less Marketing
description: Aaj ke zamane mein marketing sirf business ki nahi hoti, humein apne aap ko bhi market karna padta hai tab jaake humein serious liya jata hai. Is naye daur mein sirf marketing kaafi nahi, ab content marketing ke bina har marketing adhoori hai. Magar kya hai ye content marketing? Kaise iski madad se zyada customers attract kiye jaa sakte hain? Chaliye jaante hai.

title: Abhagan
description: रचना एक नन्‍हीं मासूम बच्‍ची उसे नहीं पता उसकी गलती क्‍या है, जो उसके पापा उसे प्‍यार नहीं करते, देखना तक पसंद नहीं करते। मां ने जन्‍म देते ही दुनिया को अलविदा कह दिया। ममता और अपनों के प्‍यार से दूर मासूम रचना की जिंदगी में क्‍या प्‍यार के गुल खिलेंगे? या फिर तरसती रह जाएगी अपनों के प्‍यार के लिए…? रिश्‍तों की अनकही दास्‍तां बयां करती कहानी ‘अभागन’ सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Ravana: The Untold Story Of A Shiv Bhakt
description: Kya aapko pata hai Ramayan mein Sita haran karne wale Ravan ko Sri Lanka mein aaj bhi puja jaata hai. Sri Lanka mein aaj bhi unhe ek vidvan, ek mahan raja, aur sabse bada shiv bhakt mana jaata hai. Ravan ne 100 saalon se bhi zyada shiv ki tapasya kar unse vardaan liya tha. Aisa kya vardaan mila tha Ravan ko janane ke liye sune ye show.

title: Raj Kapoor: The Greatest Showman
description: Kisi ki muskuraahato pe ho nisaar, kisi ka dard mil sake toh le udhaar, kisi ke vaaste ho tere dil mein pyaar, jeena isika naam hai. Shabd kam pad jaayenge inki legacy ko bayaan karte hue. Toh aaiye sunte hai, hindustaani Charlie ki kahaani unki filmo ki zubaani. The Greatest Showman - RAJ KAPOOR!

title: Albert Einstein
description: E=M(C)square. Is formula ne puri duniya ki history badal kar rakh di. Albert Einstein, the great scientist , unhone ise pehli baar izaad kiya tha jise aaj tak duniya bhar mein log nuclear warheads banane ke kaam mein laate hai. Bachpan se hi sabse alag, mathematics aur physics se mohabbat karne wala is bade sar ke ladke ke peeche puro duniya deewani thi. German-American citizen, Israel ki umeed se lekar duniya ke liye acchi soch rakhne wala ek accha insaan. Kahi inpe shaq kiya ki yeh Hitler ke jasoos hai yaa future Jewish leader. Sab sunenge aur inki life ka equation solve karenge, KuKu FM ke saath. Yeh hai kahaani - ALBERT EINSTEIN.

title: Somalian Pirates
description: Saal 1960 mein jab Somalia independent nation declare hua toh wahan ke log machhli pakadkar bechne ka kaam krte the. Lekin sabka ek jaisa kaam hone ki wajah se earning kam hoti thi toh zyadatar logon ne piracy ko kamai ka zariya banana sahi samjha. Isiliye aaj bhi poori duniya mein Somalian pirates ka khauf hai. Toh kaise karte the vo ships par attack? aur phir kis tarah se diya jata tha loot ko anjaam? Janne ke liye suniye KUKU FM ka ye original show.

title: लौट आओ ना
description: Adhi Aduri Baatein Sunkar Sumi Bina Samjhe aur Jane Apne pati aur navjaat Sishu ko chodkar chali Jaati hei. Saalo baad jab achanak sumi apne pati shlok se milti hei, toh Sachaie jankar usse apni bhul ka ehsaas hota hei aur Fir Se Apne Jivan ki naie Shruvat karti hei

title: Tota Maina of Hindi Cinema Featuring Dharam & Hema
description: Hindi filmo ke asli He-Man. Dharmendra Ji ki tarah kyon banna chahate the Dilip Kumar? Hema Malini ke sath waqt bitane ke liye anginat retakes diye Dharmendra Ji ne. Vo waqt bhi tha jab Dharam ji ke paas khane tak ke bhi paise na the. Javed Akhtar ko kyon daanta Dharmendra Ji ne? Dharmendra aur Hema Malini ki shadi ka kissa

title: Kesariya Ishq
description: Gundo se bachti Priya ja pahunchi Millionaire Businessman Rahul Sharma ki baahon me. Raat sang bitane ke baad jab Priya bin kuch kahe chali gayi tab Rahul ne thaan liya usey wapas paana. Kya Priya ki life me aayengi nayi mushkile ya shuru hogi uski bhi ek love story? Janne ke liye sune Kesariya Ishq sirf Kuku FM par.

title: Charles Sobhraj - The Bikini Killer
description: Ek aisa killer jiske crimes par documentaries aur na jaane kitni movies ban chuki hai, interviews liye jaa chuke hai. Ek aisa killer jo har jail se nikal bhaagne ka paitra jaanta tha, jiske looks se koi use criminal nahi maan sakta tha. Jisne 1960s ke hippie culture ka rukh badal kar rakh diya aur itne muyrders kiuye jiska use khud aakda yaad nahi. Kya hai iski kahani? Kaha hai ye abhi? Jaanenge is dilchasp audiobook mein

title: Maximizing your Productivity
description: Business karna to kaafi log chahte hai, lekin business karte waqt kin chizon ka dhyan rakhna hota hai, ye sirf chuninda logon ko hi pata hota hai. Jabki business ko create karna aur use maintain karna ek aisa art hai jo sirf wahi entrepreneur jaante hai jinhe business manage karna aata ho. Issi art ko sikhane ke liye hum ye audiobook lekar aaye hai. Ise sunne ke baad aap business ki sabhi barikiyon ko seekhkar apne business ko aur bhi successful bna payenge.

title: Aao Jyotish Seekhein
description: Humari abaadi ka 25% hissa Astrology mein bharosa karta hai. Yahi nahi kuch log to jyotish vidya par is tarah yakeen karte hain ki woh use seekhna tak chahte hain. Par sahi guide na mil paane ki wajah se wo ise seekh nahi paate. Lekin agar aap bhi jyotish vidya ko maante hain aur ise seekhne mein thode bhi interested hai to hamari ye audiobook aapke liye hi hai. Ismein aap kundli banane se lekar use padhna tak sab kuch seekh sakte hain. Aaiye ise sunna shuru karein.

title: Artificial Intelligence - Friend Or Enemy
description: Kya aapko pata hai ki yeh jeevan aage kaise badha ? Kaise ek chhote se jeev se itni badi civilization ka nirmaan hua ? Aur kaise ab hum ek nayi civilization ki aur aage badh rahe hai ? Yahi jaan ne ke liye suniye yeh audio book jisme hum janenge Artificial Intelligence ke baare mein aur humare bhavishya mein Artificial Intelligence kya kirdar nibhayenge aur kaise yeh duniya ki kaya palat karegi

title: Successful Leader kaise banein?
description: Imagine kare ek aisi duniya jaha lagbhag har koi kaam pe jaane ke liye excited hai, saara din workplace pe valued feel karta hai aur ghar bhi ek acchi complete feeling ke sath lautta hai. Ye koi unrealistic imagination nahi hai, kai successful organizations mein great leaders ek aisa atmosphere bana rahe hai jo ek badi wajah hai un companies ke succesful hone ki - Leaders! Aaiye jaane kaise...

title: Banein ek acche Sales Leader
description: Imagine karein ki ek workplace hai...bina kisi dar, stress, ya chinta ke chal raha hai smoothly. Infact, aisi jagah jaha aap valued feel karte ho, jaha aapko khushi mile aur jo balanced life de. Ajeeb lag raha hai? Magar ye possible ho sakta hai aur kai organizations mein aisa hi hai. Magar Sales leaders ko ek alag tarah ke coaching ki zarurat hoti hai jo kahi nahi milti. Ye show aapko apne team ko kis tarah ki leadership deni chahiye, ye batayega.  Agar aapko "The Greatest Salesman In The World" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: आघात
description:
इस उपन्यास की नायिका हमारे समाज की शिक्षित, संस्कारयुक्त, कर्मठ और परिवार के प्रति समर्पित परम्परागत भारतीय स्त्राी का प्रतिनिध्त्वि करती है । परिवार का प्रेम और विश्वास ही उसके सुख का आधर है परन्तु उसकी त्याग-तपस्यापूर्ण उदात्त प्रकृति तथा पति के प्रति एकनिष्ठ प्रेम ही उसके सुखी जीवन में अवरोध् बन जाता है । उसका स्वच्छन्दगामी पति उसकी त्याग-तपस्या और निष्ठा का तिरस्कार करके अन्यत्र विवाहेतर सम्बन्ध स्थापित कर लेता है और अपने पारिवारिक दायित्वों के प्रति उदासीन हो जाता है ।नायिका को पति का स्वच्छन्द- दायित्व-विहीन आचरण स्वीकार्य नहीं है , फिर भी वह अपने वैवाहिक जीवन के पूर्वार्द्ध में सामाजिक संबंधों के महत्त्व और आर्थिक परावलम्बन का अनुभव करके तथा जीवन के उत्तरार्द्ध में अपने संस्कारगत स्वभाव के कारण पति के साथ सामंजस्य करने के लिए स्वयं को विवश पाती है ।
Voiceover Artist : Sarika Rathore
Author : Dr. Kavita Tyagi

title: Pavitra Ramayan se 11 Seekh - Shri Ram Ki Aadarsh Vani
description: Ramayana bharatiya mahakavyon mein sabse mahatvapurna granthon mein se ek hai aur bharatiya  katha parampara ka ek chamakadar udaharan hai. Yahan is ramayan ke 11 mahatvapurna tips die gayi hain jo apako jeevan mein age badhne mein madad karenge.

title: Aurangzeb: The Most Hated Emperor
description: UPSC preparation ho ya History ke exams, TV news ho ya internet ki most hated personalities mein ek naam, Aurangzeb ke bare mein hum sab ne suna aur padha hai, lekin waqt ke sath kuch chizen yad rehti hai toh kuch hum bhool jatey hai. Apki History ki isi knowledge ko refresh karne ke liye hum lekar aye hai Aurangzeb se jude har chote bade fact ko ek bhut hi entertaining tarike se. Toh boring History ko interesting tarike se smjhne ke liye abhi sunein Aurangzeb: The Most Hated Emperor.

title: Dil Beparwah
description: Teen saal baad Aarohi Delhi lauti hai apne parivar aur fiance ko surprise dene. Par Delhi ki sard raaton mein use mil jata hai ek ajnabi bridge ke pass.  Us ajnabi ki jaan bachane pahunchi Aarohi ko wo achanak kiss kar leta hai. Us ajnabi ki is harkat par Aarohi ko bahut gussa aata hai aur tabhi vahan achank teen gunde bhi aa jate hai. Aur agli subha jab Aarohi ki neend khulti hai toh vo us ajnabi ko apne bistar par pa kar shocked reh jaati hai. Surprise dene pahunchi Aarohi ke sath ye ek hi raat mein kya hua? Kya uske ghar mein bhi kar raha hai uski zindagi badal dene wala sach, intezaar?

title: Mansarovar - Aasuonki Holi
description: "Mansarovar - Aasuon ki Holi" Premchand ka HIndi bhasha mein likha sabse achcha upnyas mana jata hai, jisme wo samaj ke anek pehluo ko dikhate hain. Is kahani me Premchand ne Holi ke tyohar ko ek anokhe andaaz me pesh kiya hai, jisme dard aur dukh se bhare jeevan ki tasveer dikhayi gayi hai. Poori Novel sunein Audiobook form mein sirf KUKU fm par.

title: Chanakya Neeti
description: Buddhi se paisa kamaya ja sakta hai na ki paise se buddhi hasil ki ja sakti hai. Agar buddhi ki baat ki jaye to Chanakya se behtar aur kaun ho sakta hai ? Aur Chanakya ji ke pass to iska bhandar hai. Life mein kisi bhi problem ko kaise solve kiya jaye aur success ko khud apne paas kaise laya jaye, yeh audiobook aapko inhi ke raaz batane wali hai, Chanakya ke diye gaye sutron se. Agar aapko "Chanakya In Daily Life" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: The Everything Store : Jeff Bezos and the Age of Amazon
description: Amazon ki shuruaat book home delivery se hui thi par founder Jeff Bezos is cheez se satisfied nahi the! wo chahte the ke Amazon me sab kuch mile! jisme price lower ho aur ekdam sahuliyat se bhara experience ho! ye audiobook aapko aisi intresting secrets batayegi jise aaj tak koi bhed nahi saka! to chaliye jante hai Amazon kaise ek chhote se startup web se ek bada retail legend bana aur humare jivan ka tarika badal diya

title: Nambi Narayanan - A Victim of ISRO Spy Scandal
description: Ye ek Aise Insan ki Kahani hai jo ISRO ke Great scientist mein se ek reh chuke hai, Inhone NASA ke offer ko thukra kar apne desh ke ISRO ko chuna, Inka Naam bhale hi aap shayad pehli baar sun rahe ho lekin aaj, humare space research centre ISRO ki success mein bahut bada yogdan inka bhi hai. Dr. Nambi Narayanan ko jhute spy Scandal mein fasa diya gaya tha, jiski vajah se inka career hi khatam ho gaya. Aaiye jaante hai inki kahaani

title: Amma: Jayalalitha Kaise Bani Ek Filmi Sitare Se Siyasat Ki Sartaaj | Writer - Vaasanthi
description: Tamil Filmon ki glamour girl se lekar siaysat ki sartaj banne tak jaylalita ki kahani ek mahila ki aisi natakiya kahani hain jo apman , kendra aur rajnitik parajayo se uvarkar bar bar uth khadi hoti hain aur mardon ke dabdabe bali tamilnadu ki rajnitik sangaskriti ko chunoti dete huye char bar rajya ki mukhyamantri banti hain.

title: Sidhu Moosewala - A Criminal Or A Revolutionary
description: Kuch log duniya mein bijli girne ki tarah aate hain aur chale jaate hain, Duniya sochti reh jaati hai yeh kya hua ? Kuch uske haq mein bolte hain aur kuch uske khilaaf, lekin jaane vala ja chuka hota hai ek controversial figure bankar. Dosto KukuFM aap ke liye laya hai Original show "Sidhu Moosewala - A Criminal Or A Revolutionary" jisme hum Shubhdeep Singh Sidhu urf Sidhu Moosewala ki zindagi kareeb se discuss karenge aur jaanenge ki Sidhu wakai mein criminal the ya krantikaari.

title: Diet Plan To Lose Weight - With Nutritional Expert
description: Busy Life mein weight loss karne aur khud ko fit aur healthy rakhne ke liye Gym jaane se zyada important hai healthy diet lena. Is Original series mein aap Nutrition & Fitness Expert Varnit Yadav ki help se kuch aise hi tips aur knowledge jaan jaayenge jisse easily aap healthy way mein weight loss bhi kar sakte hain aur saath hi ek healthy life bhi jee sakte hain.

title: Kisan Credit Card
description: Kya Aap kheti karte hain? Ya fir karne ki soch rahein hain? Agar haan, to ye khaas audio show “Kisan Credit Card” zaroor sunein. Yeh show aapko batayega ki kaise behad kam interest rate par aap government se kheti ke liye fund yani paise ki help sakte hain. Is fund ko lekar aap apni kheti se jude expenses pe bachat bhi kar sakte hain. Aapko yeh guide karega ki kaise aap apne local bank mein Kisan Credit Card ke liye apply kar sakte hain. Saath hi aap samajh payenge un saari formalities aur documents ke baare mein jo aapko ye fund dila sakti hai

title: Spy Princess: The Life of Noor Inayat Khan
description: Shrabani Basu Dwara likhi gayi yeh kitaab "Jasoos Shehzaadi" Noor Inayat Khan ki Biography hai jinhe France aur Germany Ke Yuddh ke dauraan dhokhe se taseehe dekar maar diya gya tha. inke pita Hindustani the aur inki maa amreekan. Suniye aakhir yeh massom ladki bag mein pistol lekar kyu ghoom rahi thi. "Spy Princess" ki Audiobook sirf KukuFM par.

title: Falcon: Journey Beyond The Galaxy
description: Kehte hain ki Folchraydous naam ke planet ke jeevon ke liye Prithvi kisi zehreele gole ki tarah hai. Phir bhi hyperspace se ek naya ajnabee; Falcon, ek khaas cheez ki talaash mei prithvi par aaya tha. Prithvi se nafrat karne ke bawajood Falcon kaise survive karega yahan? Aakhir kis maqsad ko poora karne ke liye use is nayi duniya mei aana pada? Jaaniye Falcon ka safar aur uska sach. Sirf Kuku FM par.

title: Black Tiger
description: Pakistan ki Aankhon mein Mission Nuclear Power ka bhayanak sapna tha. Lekin use mitti me mila dene  Hindustani sher Black Tiger aya jisne Pakistan ki nak ke neeche se unke is plan ko nestanabud kar diya aur desh ke liye wo kar dikhaya jiski kalpana matra se hi kisi ki rooh kaanp jaye. Suniye India ke sabse khatarnak SPY ki  wo kahani jisme desh ke liye mar mit jane ka junoon hai aur Bharat maa ke liye ek anokha pyar bhi “ Black Tiger ''.

title: Seeking Support: A Guide to Therapy
description: "Psychologist Toh Dimaag Padh Skte Hai!"  "Inki Life Mein Toh Koi Problems Hoti Hi Nhi Hongi" Aur Unhe Depression Kaise Ho Skti Hai, Vo Toh Khud Ek Therapist Hai?" Ek Therapist Aapke Aur Meri Tarah Insaan Hi Hote Hai. Unki Life Mein Bhi Low-Moments Aate Hai. Lekin Ab Sawal Ye Hai Ki Ek Therapist Jab Ek Doosre Therapist Ke Paas Jata Hai, Tab Kya Hota Hoga? Ek Therapist Ke Pass Kis Kis Tarah Ke Log Aate Honge? Apni Zindagi Ko Ek Raat Mein Bikharta Dekh Kya Lori Apne Aap Ko Kbhi Normal Kr Payengi? Aapki Ijazat Ho, Toh Ye Safar Shuru Karein?

title: रूप की रानी चोरों का राजा
