description: महाराज विशाल केसरी के पुत्र समर सिंह और शक्ति सिंह गुरूकुल से शिक्षा पूरी कर महल आते हैं। राजा अपने पुत्रों से उनकी शिक्षा के बारे में पूछते हैं। जवाब में उनका छोटा पुत्र शक्ति सिंह बताता है कि उसने चोरी करने की विद्या में महारत हासिल की है। इस पर राजा बहुत क्रोधित होते हैं और अपने मंत्री से सलाह करके शक्ति सिंह को चोरी करने की चुनौती देते हैं। जिस बात पर महाराज खुद क्रोधित थे उसी बात को उन्‍होंने स्‍वीकार क्‍यों किया? इस मुहिम के साथ शुरू होता है कहानी में रहस्‍य और रोमांच का सफर... महाराजा ने शक्ति सिंह को किस चीज की चोरी के लिए भेजा और क्‍यों? इस काम के दौरान शक्ति सिंह को कई धोखेबाज और गद्दारों का भी पता चलता है.. कौन है ये गद्दार? सुनें पूरी कहानी!

title: Bin Phere Shaadi
description: Apne bachpan ke pyaar SHAAN ko dhoondane ke liye ISHIKA apni shaadi ke din  ghar se bhaag jaati hai. Usi raat ISHIKA ko SHAAN mil bhi jaata hai, par ISHIKA ko wo pehchaan nahi pata. ISHIKA gusse mein zabardasti SHAAN ki dulhan ban kar SHAAN ke  sath uske ghar chali jaati hai. Kaise react karenge SHAAN ke ghar waale ISHIKA ko vaha dekh kar? Kya hua aisa jisese SHAAN bhool gaya hai apni ISHU ko?

title: How to choose a stream after 10th
description: Kya aap khud ke liye ya apne bachche ke liye ek achhe career ki talaash mein hain? Ek aisa career jiske raaste par chalne ke baad kabhi regret na ho? Toh abhi is audiobook ko suniye aur apne dream career ke raaste par chalne ke liye perfect stream select kar lijiye. Ye audiobook naye-puraane, har tarah ke careers ke liye ek ultimate guide hai jismein har field ki detailed information ke saath usmein safalta haasil karne ka roadmap hai. Yaad rakhiye perfect stream selection yaani successful Career ki guarantee.

title: Effective Employee Kaise Banein
description: Ye baat sach hai ki koi bhe insaan maa ke pet se he ek Effective Executive ka hunar lekar paida nahi hota, chahe us insaan ka dimaag kitna bhe tej ho par unhe ek honhaar Exicutive banne ke liye wo kala sikhni padti hai, chahe wo kisi bhe field me kaam kar rahe ho. Ek Exicutive har chez ka faisla bauth he soch samajh kar leta hai aur unka yahi faisla lena ka tarika unhe aur logon se alag banta hai. To agar aap bhe ek ache Exicutive ki tarah soch rakhna chahte hain, apne har faisale ko bauth he soch samajh kar aue uske postive aur negetive side ko dekh kar lena chahte hain to ye Audio Shoe "Effective Employee Kaise Banein" bilkul aapke liye hai. Aap bhi ise apne life me apply kar ke ek Creative aur Effective Executive ban sakte hain.

title: Hindu Hone Ka Dharma
description: Hindu hona Kya hai? Kya samaj ko bantna hi Hindu hona hai ya samaj ko jodna? Kya BJP aur RSS hi Hindutva Ke thekedar hain ya koi bhi Hindu Dharma Ka thekedar nahin ho sakta? Kaise Dharma ke naam par aapas mein logon ko ladwaya jata hai aur kaise saari political parties sirf apne fayde ke liye desh ko Dharma ke naam par todti hain. Sab janenege famous writer Prabhash Joshi ki likhi is kitab "Hindu Hone Ka Dharma" ki Audiobook mein.

title: Droupadi Murmu - The President of India
description: Agar Aapse koi Adivasi samaj ki mahila jo ki ek Gareeb parivar se samabandh rakhti hai Kahe ki ek din Main Bharat ki Rashtrapati banungi to aap kya kahenge? Sayad Aaj aap Droupadi Murmu ki safalta dekhne ke baad aasani se keh de ki Haan aap jarur banoge. Lekin agar thoda ruk kar socha jaye to samajh aayega ye bahut mushkil hai Jo kar dikhaya hai Droupadi Murmu ne. Is Series mein ham janenge unke sangharsh ki kahani, kaise hasil kiya itna bada mukam?

title: Dinesh Karthik: The Comeback King
description: Aapne "Yeh Jawaani Hai Dewani" film ka ye dilogue to suna he hoga, Mai udna chahta hun, daudna chahta hun, girna bhi chahta hun bas rukna nahi chahta. Kuch aisee he kahani hai India ke Star player Dinesh Karthik ki, Waise to iss Khiladi ke success ki kahani hum sabhi jaante hain, Par kyu Inhe har baar underestimate kiya gaya, Yaha tak pouchne ke liye inhone kitni mehnat ki, Kitne utaar chadao aaye, Inke personal life ki Controversy aur khud ke khaas dost ne inhe kyun diya dhokha jaanenge humare iss show "Dinesh Karthik: The Comeback King" mein.

title: Dark Side Of YouTube Industry
description: Youtube se logon ki life change hone ke kayi kisse sune honge aapne lekin Youtube se kaise kayi zindagiyan barbadi ke taraf mud gayi wo kahaniyaan aapko sirf is show mein sunne ko milengi. Kaise ek galat video upload karna kayi Youtubers ko bhari pada aur raato raat kaise wo aasmaan se zameen par aa geere ye saare kisse aapko humare show "Dark Side Of YouTube Industry" mein pata chalenge, to aaiye shuru karte hai.

title: Kyuki hum Best Friends hai
description:
आपने ये तो बहुत बार सुना होगा कि एक नौजवान लड़का अपने पूरे घर की जिम्मेदारी उठाता है। वह घर खर्च चलाता है। लेकिन क्या आपने ये सुना है कि एक नौजवान लड़की अपने घर की जिम्मदारी उठाती है। अपने बड़े भाई और पिता के होने के बावजूद पूरे घर का खर्च चलाती है। शायद नहीं..! 
कोई बात नहीं। हम आपको मिलवाने जा रहे हैं, जोधपुर जिले के एक छोटे से गाँव की एक 25 साल की लड़की सृष्टि से । जो एक निजी स्कूल में पढ़ाती है।  लेकिन उसकी जिंदगी पढ़ाने तक ही सीमित नहीं होती है। गाँव के बेईमान सरपंच के नाक में दम करवाके गाँव वालों के सामने उसकी सच्चाई उजागर करनी हो या फिर हर गलत बात पर अपने परिवार वालों से  भी उलझ जाना हो। गलत के खिलाफ लड़ाई करना तो उसकी आदत बन जाती है। खडूसपने में तो वो सबकी नानी थी लेकिन उसकी जिंदगी के लक्ष्यों को तब नई दिशा मिलती है जब उसकी जिंदगी में उसके स्वभाव के उल्ट स्वभाव के लड़के विराट का आगमन होता है। क्या विराट उसके सपनों को पंख दे पाएगा? क्या वह अपने दोस्त विराट के बलबूते पर एक पिछड़े रेगिस्तानी गाँव को सुधार पाएगी? क्या वह मुबारक खान जैसे सरपंच को हरा पाएगी? 
ऐसे ही सवालों के जवाब मिलेंगे आपको इस कहानी में।

title: Field Marshal Sam Manekshaw
description: Field Marshal Sam Hormusji Framji Jamshedji Manekshaw - Humare apne SAM BAHADUR! Bharat ke pehle Field Marshall aur hindustan ke kai warfronts par leadership ki pehchaan. Sam Manekshaw ka jeevan aur kaaryakaal ek romaanchak safar jaisa tha, bilkul abdbhut! 1971 ke Indo-Pak war ke dauraan Indian Army Chief jinse Indira Gandhi har dusre pehlu par salaah mashvara karti aur dushman sipahi tak izzat karte. Aisi khyaati ka naam hai Field Marshal Sam Manekshaw. Attention, chaliye Sam Bahadur ki jeevan gaatha sunkar prerna le.

title: Investment in Precious Metals & Gemstones
description: Kya aapko bhi Stock Market investment se dar lagta hai, kyuki ye investment method aapke risk appetite ko suit nahi karta? Agar aap ye risk lena nahi chahte aur koi safe aur accha return dene wala investment ka tareeka dhund rahe hain, toh ye show aap hi ke liye hai. Stock Market ke mushkil niyamo se alag ek aisa investment ka zariya jo sadiyon se chala aa raha hai. Chaliye ise acche se samjhte hain. Agar aapko One Up On Wall Street jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: डाल के बिछड़े
description: Reena ki shaadi England me base Ram se hoti hai, to use use yah sab swapn lok jaisa lagta hai. Lekin jab wah England jati hai, to wahaan hone wale Bhartiyon ke prati vyavhar aur bhedbhav se use kadam-kadam par apmaan ka saamna karna padta hai. Pardesh me kya itna sab log keval paise ke liye sahte hain? Kya isiliye sahte hain ki apne desh me sage-sambandhiyon ke beech apni sapannata ka raub dikha sake. In sawaalon ne Reena ko bechain kar diya. To kya Reena wapas apne desh Bharat aaegi ya fir samay ke sath samjhuta kar legi?

title: Learn Bangla Through Hindi
description: Kya aap bhi 'Bangla' seekhna chahte hain lekin ise seekhne ka koi aasan tareeka nahi dhoondh pa rahe hain? To aapki samasya ka samadhan aapko milega kuku fm ke is khaas show mein jahan hum aapko Bangla bhasha ke saare basics samjhayenge jiske baad aap bhi bina kisi mushkil ke Bangla bol payenge. Toh chaliye shuru karte hain.

title: Confidence Booster For Creative People
description: Kuch log hote hain hai jo khud ko bohot busy dikhate hai aur smart samjhte hai. Aur kuch log lazy hote hai,unhe yaad dilana padhta hai. Par kai baar wo lazy insaan us Smart aur Intelligent insaan se hume acha aur behtar result deta hai. "Being busy and being Intelligent doesn't mean being productive or Creative". Hume lagta hai ki ek insaan bachpan se he Creative hota hai par aisa bilkul bhi nahi hai iisliye is Audio Show mein humne un sare points ka zikar kiya hai jo aapko Creative banane me help karegi aur aapka Confidence bhi boost karegi.

title: Wealth kaise Attract karein?
description: Kehte hai ki jitna zyada paisa utna zyada tension. Toh fir kya kare? Kya paisa stress ko attract karta hai? Aur agar haan, toh self development kaise ki jaaye? Kaise success ko attract kiya jaye aur kaise chune paise kamane ki sustainable raah jo aapki health bhi sambhale? Janenge is show mein. Agar aapko "Coffee Can Investing: The Low Risk Road To Stupendous Wealth" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook  zaroor sunein.

title: Rich Nahi Wealthy Banein
description: Paisa Kamane se zyada mushkil hota hai, paison ka sahi dhang se istemal karna. Ab yeh show aapko paisa kamana to nahi sikha sakta, par yeh aapko paise ko sanjona zaroor sikha sakta hai. Yeh show aapko paise manage karne ke kuch aise tarike batayega jiski madad se aap lower middle class ki limited life se nikal ke rich logo ki limitless life mein jeena seekh sakte hain

title: Earn Cash: Through Your Passion
description: Is duniya mein shayad he koi aisa hoga jo apna passion follow na karna chahta ho par aksar hum kisi majboori, Society ya Parents ke dar se aisa nahi kar paate hain. Ab sawaal ye hai ki aakhir kaise hum apne passion ko follow kar sakte hain? kaise apne passion ko apna profession bana sakte hain? Aur agar main aapse kahun ki aap apne passion ko follow kar achhi khasi kamai bhi kar sakte hain to kya aap yaqeen karenge. Is Audio show mein wo sare tips diye gaye hain jise follow kar aap ye sab sach kar sakte hain.

title: Haunted House
description: गुरू और नेहा मंसूरी में नया घर लेते हैं, लेकिन रोज रोज नए नए अजीब घटनाएं होने लगती है। क्‍योंकि वह घर भूतिया होता है। गुरू के साथ एक अधजली गुड़िया साथ आती है। क्‍या है उस गुड़िया का रहस्‍य? गुरू उस गुड़िया को हमेशा बस एक टक देखता रहता है। ऐसे ना जाने कितने सवाल थे नेहा के दिमाग में जिसके जवाब गुरु के ही पास थे। उसे दुःख होता न जाने  क्यों वह उसे उस गुड़िया के पीछे की कहानी नहीं बताना चाहता? न जाने उस जली हुई गुड़िया का ऐसा क्या राज था  जो वह चाहकर भी अपनी पत्नी को बता नहीं पा रहा था।

title: Creation of Israel
description: 19th century mein jab Europe ki Christian community, Jewish community par attacks kar rahi thi, jisse unka jeena mushkil ho raha tha, tab kuch jewish ne apni khud ki country banane ka tay kiya, jaha wo azadi ke saath apni zindagi khul ke jee sake. To kaise Jewish community ne khud ki alag country banayi aur kaise Israel jo ek chota par aaj ki date mein technology se lekar military tak duniya mein sabse badi countries mein ek mana jata hai uski rachna kaise hui, jaan ne ke liye suniye yeh audiobook

title: Mushkile Mohobbat Mai
description: राज जिस स्‍कूल में पढ़ाता है वहां कि स्‍टूडेंट प्रिया को पसंद करने लगता है…इस प्‍यार में त्‍याग है, मर्यादा है, समर्पण है और समाज के युवक और युवतियों के लिए संदेश है कि प्‍यार होना और उस रिश्‍ते की मर्यादा को बनाए रखना कितना मायने रखता है। राजेश और प्रिया का परिवार इस प्‍यार को स्‍वीकार करेगा?

title: Better Sex, Better Life
description: Long term rishton mein passion kyon kam ho jata hai? Kya shaadi ke saalon baad bhi same energy zinda rakh paana mumkin hai? Kaise relationship mein wo beauty wapas laayi jaa sakti hai? Suniye ye show aur jaane apne relationship ke foundation ko stronger banane ke secrets!

title: एक मोहब्बत ऐसी भी
description: Mayank aur rachna mein bilkul nahi jamti, lekin phir bhi dono mein pyaar ho jaata hai. Lekin ek dusre se jaahir nahi karte hai. Rachna ke pita bachpan mein hi chodkar chale jaate hai. Mayank aur rachna apne pyaar ka ijhaar karte hai aur shaadi ki tayaari shury ho jaati hai. lekin shaadi ke din hi Mayank suicide kar leta hai. Aakhir aisa kyun hota hai? Yeh suicide hai ya murder? Jan ne ke liye sune puri kahani.

title: Sun - The Creator of Astrology
description: Ham sabhi ne kabhi na kabhi apni kundli Pandit ji ko jarur dikhai hogi or Pandit ne koi na koi grah ka dosh bhi nikala hoga. Par kya aapko pata hai ki agar hum apni zindagi mein Surya dev ya Sun ko mana le to hamari kundli ke sab dosh dur ho sakte hain? Surya agar aapki rashi main sudhar jae to aapke zindagi mein na to paise ki kami hogi, na hi rishton mein koi man mutav ayega. To apni zindagi ko aasan banane ke liye chaliye jante hain Surya se jude kuch khaas batein.

title: Aarya and Dream Darkness
description: Andhero ke numaindo ki khoj mein Aarya pahuchta hai mayavi sapno ki duniya mein... jaha shaitani shaktiyan banati hai chhal ki duniya... iss khatarnak aur jaanleva maya jaal mein Aarya fhans jata hai... kaise khud ko bachayega Aarya aur iss duniya ko andhere ke khouf se? jaanane ke liye sune puri kahani sirf Kuku FM per.

title: A Guide To Find Inner Peace
description: Kya aap abhi jo hai, usse behtar banna chahte hain? Agar haan, to suniye hamara ye show jis mein hum baat karenge ki aap apne negative work patterns ko kaise badal sakte hain aur kaise nayi aadatein apna sakte. Iske alawa hum janenge ki past mein hue hadse se kaise bahar nikla jaye aur apni zindagi ko kaise pehle se behtar banaya ja sakta hai

title: Guptchar
description: गुप्तचर देशभक्ति और देशप्रेम की एक ऐसी कहानी है जो दिखाती है कि किस तरह एक देशभक्त अपने देश को अपनी भावनाओ से, अपने रिश्तों से, अपने जीवन से , अपने आप से ऊपर रखता है और संघर्ष की सभी सीमाओं को पार करके अपने देशप्रेम को अमर बना देता है। इस संघर्ष की शुरुआत होती है कौशल नाम के एक साधारण लड़के से जो अनजाने में ही भरत नाम की एक दैवीय शक्ति को एक खण्डहर किले से आज़ाद कर देता है, लेकिन भरत से भी पहले आज़ाद हो चुकी हैं कुछ शैतानी शक्तियाँ जो आतंकवादी संगठनों के साथ मिलकर अखंड भारत की जड़ों को हिलाने का षडयंत्र रच चुकी हैं, शैतानी शक्तियों और आतंकी हैकर्स के कारण देश पर आए दोहरे संकट से कैसे निबट पाएंगे भरत और उसके साथी, क्या कौशल , ऋत्वि , भरत और प्रोफेसर चौहान कर पाएंगे भेदक के बनाये शैतानी वायरस का सामना और बचा पायेंगे हिंदुस्तान की सीक्रेट एजेंसी की गुप्त जानकारियों को, क्या सदियों पहले बुने गए अखंड भारत के स्वप्न को टूटने से बचा पायेगा गुप्तचर, जानने के लिए सुनिए पूरी कहानी

title: Katil Baaz
description: 'The Law of Action And Reaction' Ke Karma Ki Dil Dehla Dene Wali Daastaan. Ye Kahaani Hanumaan Ji Ke Brahamchaari Bhakt Ke Ird Gird Ghumti Hai, Jiski Rahasyamayi Tarike Se Maut Ho Jaati Hai, Chasmdeed Gawah Ke Mutaabik Ek Baaz Jo Kaafi Dino Se Un Par Ghaat Lagaye Baitha Tha, Wo Hi Kaatil Hai. Yeh Sach Hai Yaa Yaa Mangadhant Kahani? Jab Is Kahaani Ki Haqeeqat Saamne Aati Hai To Sabke Hosh Ud Jaate Hain. Aakhir Kaise Ek Baaz Katil Ho Sakta Hai? Kyon Wo Us Bhakt Par Apni Nazar Tikaaye Baitha Tha? Kahin Uska Koi Peechle Janm Ka Naata To Nahi...? Suniye Kai Sawalo'n aur Rahasyo'n Se Ghiri Ye Kahani.

title: The Heartfulness Way
description: Jab hum zindagi ka asal matlab samajh jaate hain tab zindagi kaafi asaan lagne lagti hai. Kabhi kisi sadhu, sant ya faqir ko dekh kar socha hai ki kaise inke paas kuch na ho kar bhi sab kuch hai? Unke chehre ka noor hamare wajood par sawaliya nishaan laga deta hai. Doston agar aap bhi apni zindagi ko aur bhi behtar dhang se jeena chahte hain toh ye Audiobook aapki madad karegi Heartfulness ke concept ko samajhne mein aur meditation ke zariye aapko seekhayegi relax rehna aur inner cleaning karna. Toh chaliye apne is safar ki shuruaat karte hain.

title: Jawan Rakhne Wala Amrit
description: Kya kabhi apke man mein yeh khayal aaya hai ki kaash aapke pas mein koi aisa jaadu hota ya amrit hota jis se aap humesha jawaan bane rehte, healthy bane rehte to doston apko jankar hairani hogi ki yeh jaadu, yeh amrit apki body mein pehle se hi present hai bas zaroorat hai use samajhne ki aur yeh Original Show apko isi jaadu ke baarein samajhayega jis se aap bhi jawan aur healthy bane reh sakte hain.

title: How to File FIR: Get Your Voice Heard
description: FIR file karna ek aisi situation hai jismein hum mein se koi bhi shayad kabhi nahi padna chahega but life ka koi bharosa nahi shayad kal ko kabhi khud ke liye ya kisi aur ke liye FIR file karni pad jaaye? Aur isse bhi bura to ye hai ki aap ke against FIR file hogayi to aap us situation mein kya karenge? Agar aap bhi aisi situations ke liye ready nahi hain toh ye show aapke liye hi hai kyuki achhe waqt me toh har koi kaam aata hai lekin bure waqt ke liye KUKU FM hi aapko tayaar karta hain. Chaliye shuru karte hai FIR ko lekar humari ek deep conversation.

title: Adhuri Mohabbat - Ek Toote Dil ki Daastaan
description: आरोही पूल के बाहर आई, जो पूरी गीली थी। अर्नव बिना पलक झपकाए आरोही को देखे जा रहा था। करीब 4 साल बाद आरोही और अर्नव मिल रहे थे और जब वे मिले तो एक-दूसरे की आंखों और पुरानी यादों में जैसे खो से गए। अर्नव की गर्म सांसे आरोही के दिल में हलचल मचा रही थी। अर्नव जो थोड़ी देर पहले उसे बड़े ही प्यार से देख रहा था, अचानक उसका चेहरा लाल हो गया और चिल्‍लाकर बोला, " मेरी इस अधूरी मोहब्बत में बर्बाद होने के लिये तैयार हो जाओ आरोही । जो दर्द तुमने मुझे दिया है वही दर्द अब मैं तुम्हें सूत समेत लौटाऊंगा।" आखिर आरोही ने अर्नव के साथ ऐसा क्‍या किया था? क्‍या आरोही बेवफा है? अर्नव क्‍या करेगा आरोही के साथ? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी अधूरी मोहब्‍बत-एक टूटे दिल की दास्‍तान केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Khudke Liye Kaam Karo
description: Aaj ka youth sochta hai ki sirf paisa hi safatla ka maanak nahi hai, balki apne naam ko bada banana aur duniya ke saamne ek accha example set karna success ka sahi matlab hai. Magar kya ye kar paana kisi aur ke liye ki gayi naukri se mumkin hai? Shayad nahi. Magar khud ke liye kaam kaise kiya jaaye? Kahan se hoti hai iski shuruaat aur kaise layein ismein discipline? Bataega ye show! Agar aapko "The Power of Self-Discipline" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Kuch Nahi
description: Humara Atit aksar humare vartman pe havi hona chahata hai. Par Mahesh ke saath jab yahi hota hai to kya woh apne atiti ke atoot bandhan ko chunta hai ya vartman ki sachchai ko??

title: America 2020: Ek Banta Hua Desh
description: America, Duniya ka sabse purana Loktantra aur sabse ameer desh. Fir bhi kyun ye kayi tareekon se banta hua hai? Kya Barack Obama ke hatne ke baad yahan fir se Musalmano par nayi talwar latakne lagi? 9/11 Ke baad kaise America ne khud ko aur mazboot kiya aur fir saal 2020 tak bhi kya-kya nahi badla. Sab janiye Avinash Kalla ki likhi kitab America 2020 : Ek Banta Hua Desh ki is Audio Book mein.

title: How To Breathe
description: Jab bachcha Janam leta hai to Doctor sabse Pehle kya dekhte hain? Yahi ki bachcha saans le raha hai na? Aur fir us bachche ki life shuru hoti hai.Saans hamare liye sabse Zaroori hai ye to hame pata hai lekin kya ye pata hai ki saans zinda rakhne ke saath- saath hamein mental aur physically roop se swasth rakhne mein sabse zyada kaam ki cheez hai. Aapne kabhi Socha hai Saans kya-kya aur karti hai aur iske peechhe kaun sa Science hai? Saans ki isi Science ko aasan bhasha mein samjhane ke liye ham le aaye laye hain “How To Breathe” ki audiobook.

title: A Guide To Build Unicorn
description: Aapka agla kadam kya hoga? shayad isi mein success ka ek bahut bada raaz chupa hai! Ek successful entrepreneur ya student banane ke liye zaruri hai ki wo bilkul chess grandmaster ki tarah kayi moves aage ki strategy soch kar chale...kaise banenge yeh moves aur kya hain yeh moves, jaanenge is book summary mein, only on KUKU FM.

title: Improve your Digestive System with Yoga
description: Tanav bhari humari zindagi mein, agar stress ka asar sabse zyada kahin hota hai, to woh humara pet hai. Bade buzurg kehte hai ki agar insaan ka pet sahi hai, toh uska mood sahi hai. Lekin agar kisi insaan ka pet ya uska digestive system hi upset hoga, toh duniya ki koi chiz usse khushi nahi de sakti. World data ke anusar, America mein 5 se 1 insaan, digestive system se judi bimariyon ka shikar hai. Lekin, agar aap apna naam is list mein shamil karne se bachna chahte hai, ya apne digestive system ko permanently thik kana chahte hai, toh Yogasana uska sabse sahi ilaaj hai. Kaise? Aaiye jante hai humari audiobook mein.

title: Mukherjee Nagar
description: Mukherjee Nagar Mehez Ek Kahani Nahi, Ek Aisi Daastaa'n Hai Jise Sunkar Mehnat Aur Shiddat Jaise Lafzo'n Par Aapko Yaqeen Ho Jaayega. EK Chote Se Gaao'n Me Rehne Wala Bhuvan Jab Dilli Ke Mukherjee Nagar Me Rehkar UPSC Ki Taiyaari Karne Ka Faisla Leta Hai Tab Zindagi Shuru Karti Hai Apna Khel. Sapno'n Ke Is Safar Me Kya Gareebi se Pareshan Bhuvan Apni Jeet Pukhta Kar Paayega Ya Ho Jaayega Hataash? Kya Bihar Ke Ek Khetihar Mazdoor Ka Beta, Mukherjee Nagar Me Apne Sapno'n Ki Udaan Ko Pankh De Paayega? Aspirants Ke Beech Mukherjee Nagar Ka Ek Rang Aisa Bhi Hai. Ek Yuvak Ke Sangharsh Aur Jaddojahad Ki Daastaa'n Jo Aapko Aadi Se Ant Tak Baandhe Rakhegi.

title: The Life Of Swami Vivekananda
description: Poori duniya mein Bharat aur Hindu dharm ka danka bajane wale Swami Vivekananda jitna vishwas bhagwan mein karte the utna hi vigyan mein. Kya aapko pata hai Swami Vivekanand ko khud cricket khelna pasand tha? Ekbar jab unko ek foreigner woman ne shaadi ke liye propose kiya to unhone kya answer diya? Unke kaun se lessons aapki life aur desh ka future dono badal sakte hain? Jaaniye is show mein.

title: The Talent Sutra
description: Yeh audiobook Devdutt Pattanaik ke influencer best seller Business Sutra se derive ki gayi hai jo workplace pe Creativity, Talent aur Teamwork ke importance ke baare mein baat karti hai. Isme lekhak real life example aur mythological stories ke examples se kai aise techniques batate hai, jo life mein successful hone ke liye humari help kar sakti hai

title: Detective Vikram: Khooni Panne
description: Ek shatir serial killer jo kitabo ka sahara lekar logon ko utaar raaha maut ke ghat aur dusri taraf Vikram ka dost Tushar bhi ho chuka lapata. Kya Tushar bhi ban baitha us serial killer ka shikaar ya iske piche chhupa hai koi bada raaz? Detective Vikram kaise suljhayega ye anokha case? Janne ke liye sune Detective Vikram: Khooni Panne sirf kukufm par… sune jo man chahe.

title: विक्रांत... दुनिया तेरी मेरी एलियन
description: Ab shuru hoga, ek naya khel...khud jaal mein phansa Vikrant, kaise bachayega Pruthvi ko? Ab shuru hoga ek Yudha, jo lada jaayega ek alag hi Duniya mein....jaha hogi alien ki sena aur akela Vikrant... Begaani Urja waale alien ab kya karenge? Vikrant ke saamne aa khadi hui hai ek badi samasya...kya nipta paayega Vikrant? Jaan ne ke liye sune puri kahani keval Kuku FM par.

title: Mossad"s 10 Dangerous Operations
description:
Aaj duniya ke sabhi deshon ke paas apni ek khufiya security agency hai jo desh ke andar aur aas-paas hone wali har choti-badi movements par nazar rakhti hai. Lekin
kai Dashakon se Israel ki  khufiya security agency Mossad ko world ki sabse successful agency mana jata raha hai. Aur iska karan hai Unh khatarnak aur bade - bade missions ko anjaam dena jo kisi bhi aur desh ke liye karna namumkin tha. Toh kaise diya gaya unh sabhi missions ko anjaam? Janne ke liye is audiobook se perfect aur kuch bhi nahi ho sakta kyonki  Is mein hai unh sabhi impossible missions ki kahaniyan.

title: Small Businesses ko Fail hone se kaise Rokein?
description: Ye kalpana ki chhote businesses shuru karne wale log entrepreneurs hi hote hai, ya ye dhaarna ki jise thoda bohot bhi technical knowledge ho wo ek tech based business chala sakta hai. Aisi kai saari galat dharnao se hum ghire hue hote hai jiske karan hum mein se kai log business tricks samajh nahi paate. Inhi dharnao ko clear karegi ye book summary.

title: How To Start Food Business At Home
description: Sochiye agar hum maa ke haath ka swadisht khana banane ke hunar ko business mein badal de to? Ghar baithe baithe hum apna business kar payenge. Bas ek Chhota sa effort, ek badhiya business plan, food ki acchi quality, achi managing skills aur kuch chhoti chhoti baaton ko dhyan mein rakhna hoga, jise hum discuss karenge is audio book mein jo aapki madad karega apna khud ka home based food business shuru karne mein

title: Invest According To Your Rashi
description: Agar main Aapse Puchun ki aapko apne Rashi ke hisab se kab, kitna aur kahan Invest karna chahiye to shayd aap soch mein pad jaayen, isilye apni Rashi ke Hisab se Invest Karne ke liye tayyar ho jaieye kyuki iss Audio Show "Invest According To Your Rashi" mein aapko pata chalega ki kaise Rashi influence karte hai humare investment choices ko aur kya hai stock market aur stars ke bich ka connection.

title: विक्रांत - रेत बनेगी दुनिया,,
description:
वैज्ञानिकों के एक दल ने मिलकर ऐसी मशीन बनाई, जो पलक झपकते ही चीजों को राख में तब्‍दील कर देती है। वहीं दूसरी ओर पुलिस ऑफिसर पायल के पास एक नक्‍शा है, जो मंदिर के तहखाने से मिला है और उस पर 30 साल से शोध चल रहा है। लेकिन कोई उस नक्‍शे को नहीं समझ पाया है। मंदिर में एक सफेद पत्‍थर है जिसका वर्षों पुराना रहस्‍य है। क्‍या है नक्‍शे पर बनें मंदिर, सूर्य, चंद्रमा, रेत, समुद्र, कच्‍छ का रहस्‍य? क्‍या सफेद पत्‍थर का रहस्‍य इससे जुड़ा है? मशीन, मंदिर और नक्‍शे की पहेली क्‍या हल हो पाएगी? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Author : प्रवीण सिंह नेगी
Voiceover Artist : RJ Manish

title: Sigmund Freud - A Controversial Genius
description: Kya Aapne kabhi socha hai hum apne girlfriend ya boyfriend mein apne maa baap jaisi khubiyan kyu dhoondte hain ? Apne Parents ke saath humaare itne Ego Clashes kyu rehte hain ? In Sawaalon ke jwaab humein diye the Sigmund Freud ne jisne ek aisi theory duniya ko di, jise bahut saare logon ne galat thehraya lekin aaj tak koi galat prove nahi kar paya. Suniye is German Scientist ki Gaatha Jise Hitler Khud Marvana Chahta tha lekin Marva nahi paya. Aakhir kya th aisa is insaan mein. Jaan ne k liye Suniye yeh Audio Book Sirf KukuFM Par.

title: Think And Grow Rich
description: Kaisa ho agar duniya ke tamam safal logon ki sikh aapko ek sath, ek hi jagah par mil jaaye? Lottery!! Jee haan! Is book mein writer ne un life lessons ke baare mein bataya hai jo unhone khud safal logon se baatchit ke dauran sikhe the. Aur ye aapke liye kisi lottery se kam nahi hai. Isliye agar aapko bhi apni zindagi mein safal hona, to aapko Think & Grow Rich ki ye audiobook zaroor sunni chahiye.

title: How To Deal With Tough Times
description: Aap sirf apna problem bataiye aur yeh Original Show aapko uska solution batayega. Jitne bhi problems kyun na ho aap apne aap ki self image kaise bana sakte hain yeh aap iss show ko sun kar sikhenge. Unemployment, poor  health, loneliness, jitne bhi problems zindagi mein aaye aap apna highest potention life mein achieve kar sakte hain.

title: दोस्ती और मर्डर
description: Jay Veeru, Munna Circuit ke kis se to bahut sune honge, par ye kahani hai do aise jigri doston ki jo bachpan mein hi ek dusire se alag alag shehro mein alag alag pesho mein ye bade ho jaate hai. Panatu dono hi apna yaarana nahi bhulte. Saalo baad ek baar phir jaane anjaane mein kismat inhe milti hai par is baar dushmano ki tarah. Aur iska anjaam hota hai maut. Kya wo ek dusre ko pahchaan paayenge? Kya hota hai aisa un dino ke beech mein jaan ne ke liye sune Praveen Singh Negi dwaara likhit kahani dosti aur murder...!

title: Safaltam Salesman
description: Kisi Bhi Business Ko Successful Bnane Ke Liye Sales Ka Ek Kaafi Aeham Role Hota Hai. Ek Chhoti Si Dukaan Se Lekar Kisi Bhi Multimillionaire Business Ko Agar Market Mein Profitable Bane Rehna Hai Toh Unhe Apne Products Aur Services Ki Sales Pe Dhyan Dene Ki Bahut Zaroorat Hoti Hai. Magar Kabhi Kabhi Dhyan Dene Ke Baad Bhi Business Munafa Nahi Kma Pate Hain. Is Audiobook Mein Janiye Successful Salesman Banne Ke Kuch Shaandar Secrets.

title: How To Be An Exceptional Achiever
description: Chump jiska matlab murkh hota hai, agar aap usme se "U" nikal kar "A" jod dete hai, to vo Champ ban jata hai yani vijeta. Yeh audiobook aapke andar ki kami ko nikal kar usme acchai bharne ka kaam karegi aur aapko Champ banane mein help karegi. Aapke andar ke vijeta se rubaru karwayegi. Yeh audiobook aapko wo sare tarike batayegi, jo kisi bhi insaan ko top par pahuchne mein madad kar sakte hai

title: NCERT Class 8th Political Science
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein achhi Rank laani ho, Shuruaat to aapko NCERT book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. Lekin bookish language ko samajhna thoda sa mushkil ho jata hai. Kuku FM par yeh Original Series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Indian Constitution, Judiciary, Marginalisation aur Law And Social Justice jaise topics ko bahut hi achhe se samajh jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: मृगा - तलाश अभी बाकी है
description:
यह कहानी भाई बहन के अनोखे बंधन की एक खूबसूरत दास्तां है। जीवन के द्वारा ली जा रही परीक्षा को कैसे डट कर लड़ना है, यह आप मृगा और मृगेष की कहानी से सीख सकेंगे।
Author : Reena Ashok Kumar
Script Writer : Rj Aarzoo

title: The New BJP
description: 1984 mein PM Rajiv Gandhi ne Atal Bihari Vajpayee jo chidhate hue kaha tha ki, “Parivar Niyojan ka palan to BJP ne sabse achcha kiya hai. Kyunki tab BJP ke bas 2 hi sansad the. Ab ki aur tab ki BJP mein zameen aasmaan ka antar hai. BJP desh ki sabse badi party hai. Lekin ye sab hua kaise? Ek raat mein to nahi hua hoga na. Kaise Narendra Modi ne RSS ke saath milkar pura khel hi palat diya? Aur kaise Amit shah ne is sangathan ko sabse bada bana diya? Sab janenge “ The New BJP” ki is Audio book mein. Agar aapko India after Gandhi jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: K ( A mysterious Mission)
description: कुछ ऐसे लोग भी होते हैं, जो किसी ओहदे पर न होते हुए भी देश की सेवा के लिए हमेशा तैयार रहते हैं। सरकार की निगाह में वे क्रिमिनल या भगौड़े होते हैं, लेकिन वास्‍तव में होते हैं एक देशभक्‍त। ऐसी ही कुछ कहानी है वीरांगना की, जिसे एक खास मिशन में शामिल किया जाता है। लेकिन कुछ लोग अरमान शेखावत भी होते हैं, जो चंद पैसों के लिए देश से गद्दारी करते हैं। एक गुप्‍त मिशन पर निकले देश के स्‍पेशल टास्‍क फोर्स के जाबांज ऑफिसर्स के जासूसी और हैरतअंगेज कारनामें से भरपूर सुनें पूरी कहानी केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Ashvamedha
description: Ye Kahani hai Ashwin Jamwal Ki Jise Raajneeti Mein Apne Maqsad Aur Mahatvakaanchhao'n Ko Poora Karne Aur Poori Duniya Par Niyantran Ki Chhahat Ke Liye Istemaal Kiya Jaata Hai. Jis Tarah Ashvamedh Yagya Ke Poorn Hone Par, Ashvamedh Ghode Ki Bali Chadha Di Jaati Hai. Kya Usi Tarah Raajneeti Ke Is Yagya Me Ashwin Ki bhi Bali Chadha Di Jaayegi Ya Wo Khud Ko Iska Shikaar Hone Se Bacha Paayega? Raajneeti Aur Power Ka Ye Khel Ab Hoga Aur Bhi Interesting aur Thrilling.

title: Kaise Milegi Entry Level Jobs - Apna jobs ke sath
description: Dosto India me 66% of population filhal 35 years se niche ki age ki hai, aur sabhi ko ek job chahiye. kayi baar logo ko apne skills ke according entry level job role nahi milte ,Ya phir unhe achhi Jobs ke application ke liye Platform nahi milta ,  yahi confusions dur karega ye show jaha par 10th pass students se lekar HR, B.com , IT graduates ko Jobs ke liye milegi Tips and Proper Guidance in association with Apna Jobs. Aap bhi Apna Jobs par register karke apni job hunting ko smooth bansakte hai. Register karne ke liye login kijiye at https://l.apna.co/KukuFm

title: 12 Jyotirlingas in India
description: Devo ke dev Mahadev, jinko aap alag alag namo se jante hai Hindu dharm mein Astha ka sabse bada Kendra Bindu hai. “Na Sammaan ka Moh Na Apmaan ka bhay” Himalay Mein, Parvato Mein, Gufaon Mein vas karne vale  aur apne bhakt ke sachce dil se pukarne par chale aane vale, Bhagwan shiv ka sthan sabse upar hai. Hindu dharm Grantho Mein, Purano Mein, Kathao Mein jarur milta hai, chahe vo Treta Yuga ki baat ho jaha Khud bhagwan Ram ne Shivlinga ki pooja ki ho, Chahe DwaparYug Mein Bhagwan Krishna ne Shiv ki aradhna ki ho aur chahe SatYug Mein Bhagwan shiv ko anginat logon ne Prasann kiya ho. Agar aap Mahadev Shiv ke Mahatva aur Prabhav ko janna chahte hai to Apko 12 Jyotirlingas ke bare jarur janna chahiye. Is Series Mein hum Janenge 12 Jyotirlinga ki Kahani jinka Jikra Pauranik Kathao mein milta hai.

title: How to Make Money on Dream11?
description: Bhagwan Jab bhi deta hai, Chappar Phad ke deta hai. Agar aapko ispar yakeen na ho to zra ekbar Dream-11 Fantasy game khel kar dekhiye. Lekin han , sirf khelne se hi kaam nahi chalega , Jeetna bhi padega . Aur Jeetne ke liye aapko fantasy ke bare mein sari jankariyan honi chahiye , Jiske Liye Ye Audiobook Ekdam perfect hai. Kyon Ki isme aapko Dream-11 Fantasy ki history se lekar use khelne ke tarike, Jeetne ki tips aur India mein ye  Legal hai ya nahi? . Ye sari jankariyan mil jayengi .

title: How To Justify Your Own Salary
description: Kya Aap apni Salary Badhana chahte hain? Ya Aap Jitna earn karte hain usse zyada earn karna chahte hain? Aap kahenge kaun nahi chahta, par sawal ye hai ki Kaise aur kya karne se Income badhai ja sakti hai? Dekhiye is Audio Show mein kuch Universal aur Natural laws bataye gaye hain jinki help se aap kisi bhi field mein apni value badha sakte hain. Lekin ek shart hai aap is Audio Show ko ek ache Student ki tarah sunenge aur apni Life mein ise Apply bhi karenge. To chaliye shuru karte hai is safar ko.

title: Maa Ganga
description: Kya aap jaante hain ki Bhagwat Puran ki ek katha ke anusar Maa Ganga Saraswati Mata ke shraap ke karan dharti par nadi ban kar aai? Lekin Maa Ganga ka shrap insano ke liye vardaan sabit ho gaya. Purano mein Maa Ganga ki kai kahaniyan hai. Sabse rochak kahaniyan, aaiye sunte hain is show mein.

title: High IQ: What Is Your IndiaQuotient?
description: Ramblings with the IQ team about the India opportunity. While most cynics always look backward while evaluating India, and while most investors get it wrong stretching India to western income levels, we try to look at it from the lens of an entrepreneur who is 'Creating' the market.'

title: NCERT Class 10th Geography
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein achhi Rank laani ho, Shuruaat to NCERT book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Resources and Development, Agriculture, Manufacturing Industries jaise topics ko achhe se jaan jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: फरेब
description: Apne hi uncle ka murder kar Nazia pahuchati hai Shelter home. Jaha uski dosti hoti hai Kamla, Rajjo, Rukhsana aur Priya se. Aur ye sabhi Shelter home se bhag nikalti hai ! lekin Nazia pakdi jaati hai. Inka plan hai Murder karne ka !! lekin kiska? Akhir kyu Shelter Home se bhagti hain ye 5 Ladkiyana? Inspector Chouhan kaise karenge is case ko solve? Janne ke liye sune puri kahani ! sirf Kuku FM par.

title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
description: If I Can do It, You Can Do It

title: ब्योमकेश बक्शी की रहस्यमयी कहानियाँ
description:
ब्योमकेश बक्शी की रहस्यमयी कहानियाँ
writer: सारदेंदु बंद्योपाध्याय
Voiceover Artist : Harish Darshan Sharma
Script Writer : Sardendu Bandopadhyay

title: Maximize Your Potential
description: Aaj Hum sab ki life ka yahi goal hai ki humein apni -apni field mein Maximum Success ko achieve karna hai, Kyuki uske bina hum apni Man pasand life nahi jee sakte.  Aur isiliye aaj  humari life ka struggle bhi pehle se jyada badh gaya hai. Lekin bahut sare log kafi mehnat karne ke baad bhi maximum success ko achieve nahi kar pa rahe hai. Kya vo capable nahi hai ? Nahi aeysa nahi hai. Darasal vo capable toh hain lekin shayad unka process sahi nahi hai,shayad unhe ye nahi pata ki iske liye pehle unhe har ek step plan karna hoga aur fir step by step chalna hoga. Aur in steps ko kaise plan kiya jay ? Kaise apni life ko ek sahi process ke through aage badhaya jay isko janne ke liye is book summary se perfect aur kuch nahi ho sakta. Kyuki ye book summary psychology, religion, philosophy, business, economics, politics, history, aur  metaphysics se liye gay proven principles par based hai.

title: The Father of Hindutva - Veer Savarkar
description: Yeh kahaani hai ek aise freedom fighter ki jinhone congress se 20 saal pehle complete independence ke naare lagaaye but Quit India Movement mein shaamil nahi hue. Yeh kahaani hai unpe hue angrezon ke atyaachar ki, unke kalam se nikali kavitaon ki aur ek sacche Hindutva ki.

title: Story Of India's 2007 World Cup Victory
description: 24 September 2007, Vo din jab Young Indian Cricket Team ne South Africa mein hue pehle T20 World Cup ko jeet kar itihaas racha. Is jeet ki ummeed na toh Indian fans ko thi aur na hi khud indian team management ko kyuki usi saal ODI World Cup mein mili sharmnaak haar ke baad Sachin Tendulkar aur Sourav Ganguly jaise bade khiladiyon ne is tournament mein khelne se mana kar diya tha, isiliye ek naye captain aur zyadatar young khiladiyon se bani indian team jisne gine-chune T20 matches hi khele the toh unse koi kaise jeet ki ummeed laga sakta tha. Lekin phir bhi Team India ne kaise vo trophy apne naam ki? iski poori kahani aapko is audiobook mein janne ko milegi.

title: Harmanpreet Kaur: The Untold Story
description: Kya aapko pata hai ki Indian women’s cricket team ki Captain Harmanpreet Kaur ka sapna ek leading bowler banne ka tha. Lekin usmein nakaamyaabi milne ki wajah se use badal kar Women's World Cup mein century lagane wali pehli indian batswomen banna hi unhein india ki most inspiring female cricketer banata hai. Toh kaise unhone is safar ko tay kiya, Aaiye jaante hain KUKU FM ke is original show mein.

title: Jharkhand Mein Vidroh Ka Itihas
description: Is Full Audio Book "Jharkhand me Vidroh ka Itihas" me 1767 se lekar 1914 angrezo ke khilaf hue ladai ka zikar hai. Jharkhand me sekdon salon se Aadiwasi samaj ke log niwas karte aa rahe hain aur British sarkar ne inpar khub atyachar kiya hai. Aur waha ke bauth sare krantikari ne is Vidroh me apni jaan gawai hai par afsos ki baat ye hai ki itne bade andolan ke bawajood bhe logo ko is itihas ke baare me kuch nahi pata hai. Virsa Munda, Tikka Manjhi jaise bauth se mahan krantikariyon ka zikar milega aapke is Full Audio book me jo is desh aur apne haq ki ladai ke liye Sahid ho gye.

title: पुरानी हवेली - एक अफसाना
description: समर हॉलिडे में कहां घूमने जाया जाए….और प्‍लान बनता है दोस्‍त के गांव जाना। मुंबई के कॉलेज में पढ़नेवाले अभिनव, सानवी, दक्ष, नित्‍या, तनय और प्रियांस अपने दोस्‍त सुरेश के गांव पहुंचते हैं। सभी आनेवाले खतरे से अनजान है। गांव की पुरानी हवेली का रहस्‍य उन सभी दोस्‍तों को खींचता है लेकिन सुरेश उन्‍हें वहां जाने से रोकता है। लेकिन एक दिन सभी दोस्‍त छुपकर पहुंच जाते हैं। दक्ष गायब हो जाता है अब आगे क्‍या होगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: How Tupperware Became Every Household's Need
description: Jis Tupperware ka kho jana aapke liye shamat ban jata tha, aapko pata hai us tupperware ke mil jaane ki wajah kya thi? Ya use kis maqsad se banaya gaya tha? Most importantly, mahilaon ko aakhir Tupperware se itna lagaav kyun hai? Darasal iski wajah judi hai ek mahila se. Wahi mahila jo agar nahi hoti to Tupperware humari mummiyon ke dilon par raaj nahi kar raha hota. Par kaun thi wo? Aur aakhir Tupperware aur auraton ka kya naata hai? Janne ke liye suniye Kuku FM ka ye khas show - How Tupperware Became Every Household's Need

title: Stocks Se Paise Kamane Ke Simple Rules
description:
Aaj ke waqt mein Investment karna to sab chahte hain par jante nahi hai ki use kaise karna hai, aur agar aap Investment ke jariye Paise kama bhe lete hain to use long term mein kaise continue rakhna hai aur usse aur jyada profit kaise kamana hai ye nahi jaante.
Aaj ke time mein Investment ko lekar har koi debate kar raha hai aur actively invest bhi kar rha hai lekin iske liye aapko accurate knowledge hona bauth zaruri hai. Is Audio Book ke jariye aapko investment ki sahi aur proper jaankari milegi, to chaliye le chalte hain aapko Investment ki duniya mein Safal banane.

title: The Mindful Way to a Clear Mind
description: Hum Sab Kabhi Na Kabhi Apni Haalat Se Pareshan Aa Kar Apni Kismat Ko Kosne Lagte Hain. Humein Lagta Hai Ki Buri Kismat Ki Vajah Se Hi Hum Depression Mein Hai Aur Isi Ke Chalte Humara Kaam-Kaj, Rishte-Naate Sab Nakamyab Ho Rahein Hain Lekin Agar Hum Aapse Kahein Ki Aapki Har Pareshani Ka Karan Aapke Khud Ke Vichaar Hain Toh Aap Kahenge Ki Maine Kabhi Aisa Kuch Nahi Chaha. Suniye Ye Show Aur Janiye kaise Aapke Vichaar Aapki Zindagi Bnate Hain.

title: Focus & Relax - Sound Meditation
description: Is vyast jeevan shaili mein, hamare saath aao aur prakriti ke aashcharya aur shaanti ka anubhav kare. Prakriti ki aavaz vastav mein tanaav ko kam karke hume behtar nind mein madad kar sakti hai. EK saath hum dhyan mein saantvana paa sakte hai aur ek adbhut din banate hai

title: The Stranger Alien
description: Dharti par aliens ne kohraam macha rakha hai, aliens insaano ko maarkar kha rahe hai. Is kahani ka paatra paranormal investigator raaghav ajeeb cheezo ke baare mein investigator karta hai. Raaghav apni ek team banata hai aur alien se ladne aur unke dharti par se baghaane ke liye unko tayaar kar raha hai. Yeh kahani hai khaufnaak alien ki khatarnaak planning aur unki khukhaar karkati ki. Yeh alien kaun se mission ke liye dharti par aaye hai aur dharti ke insaano aur jaanwaro ko maut ke ghaat uaar rahe hai? Kya insaan bhi ismei shaamil hai? Ya hai koi dusri duniya ki saajish? Jaan ne ke liye suniye hamari kahani The Stranger Alien.

title: The Nagaland Controversy
description: Nagaland ki Khonoma gao mein ek memorial par aaj bhi kyu likha hai-'Nagas are not Indians?' Dogra regiment ke convoy par 2015 mein hua blast kisne kiya tha? Azad Bharat ka hissa Nagaland aaj bhi kyu independent state ki demand karta hai? Indian government ko Nagaland ko baar baar 'disturbed area' kyu declare karna padta hai? AFSPA kya hai? Nagaland ko Kashmir se bhi lambi insurgency kyu kaha jata hai? Aise hi kayi sawalo ke jawab milenge is show par

title: Oil, Power and War
description: Yeh kahani ek aise vastu ki hai, jiski khoj apne aap mein itihaas hai. Lekin iss aetihasik vastu ki khoj mein na jaane kitni politics huyi thi. Yeh ek aisi vastu hai jiske naam par aaj bhi duniya mein logon ko exploit kiya ja raha hai. Yeh vastu Oil hai jiski khoj ne yun to duniya ko aadhunik banaya, lekin iski khoj ne hi logon ko dominate karna bhi sikha diya. Humari iss audiobook mein oil ke naam par huyi politics, culture change, duniya mein chhide World War I aur World War II jaise bade-bade wars, in sabhi ka zikra hai.

title: Porus
description: Poori Duniya  ko jeetne ka sapna liye hue jab “Alexander the Great”  ki nazar ka agla nishana bana  “Bharat” to use usi ke iradon me harane ke liye apne poore samarthya aur aatmvishwas ke sath samne aya Bharat Ma ka Mahan beta aur Sarvashreshtha Yodha “Porus” . Magar apnon ki saazish ka shikaar ho kar bhi Porus har baar kaise bana Alexander ki Haar ,  aur Kyun jeet kar bhi haar gaya Alexander is Baar ? Sune Abhi !

title: History Of Hazrat Musa
description: Apne Bhatke Hue Bandon Ko Sahi Raste Par Laane Ke Liye Allah Ta’ala Ne Waqt Waqt Par Apne Paighambaron Ko Is Duniya Mein Bheja Taaki Wo Logon Ko Zindagi Aur Aakhirat Ki Haqeeqat Se Rubaroo Karvaye Aur Sahi Galat Ka Fark Samjhaye. Hazrat Musa Ki Zindagi Hum Sabhi Logon Ke Liye Ek Misaal Hai Jisse Hum Bahut Kuch Seekh Sakte Hain. Suniye Hamari Ye Khas Peshkash Aur Jaaniye Hazrat Musa Ko Kareeb Se.

title: India's Space Programme
description: India's Space Programme, ek Complete series hai joh India ke space me pahunchne aur vaha pe jhande gadne tak ki kahani baya karti hai.. Pahla Satellite kaise launch ho paya? Iss mission mein kiska Yogdan raha hai? Vikram Sarabhai, APJ Abdl kalam aur ISRO se judi bahut si interesting jankari aapko iss show mein milne vali hai.

title: Productivity Badhane Ke Tarike
description: Har pal yahan ji bhar jiyo, jo hai sama kal ho na ho !!! Yeh baat shahrukh khan ne humein pehle hi bata di hai, par phir bhi hum ise baar baar bhul jate hai. Hum present mein jee nahi paate. Past ka burden aur Future ki chinta ke beech jhulte rehte hai. Yeh show isi ke baare mein hai, ye aapko aaj mein aur abhi mein jeena sikhaega, jisse aap apni life mein productive ban sakein aur success haasil kare paye.

title: Job Mein Jaldi Promotion Pane Ke Tips
description: Agar aap chahte hain ki aapki job mein aapka jaldi se promotion ho jaye, toh 'Job mein jaldi promotion pane ke tips' aapke liye perfect hai! Iss audio show mein aap jaan payenge har wo step, jisse aap promotion ko haasil kar paaye, jaise ki apne skills ko kaise develop karein, apne boss ke saath kaise communicate karein, aur kaam mein apna confidence kaise badhayein. Yeh show aapko aapke career growth ke liye behtar tarike batayega, jisse aap apni professional zindagi mein success paa sakte hain.

title: Discomfort Ko Kahein Bye- Bye
description: Ek Kahawat suni hai aapne, “Chinta Chita Ke Samaan Hoti Hai”. Chinta matlab tension. Bole to aapka kisi se Discomfort. Yahi vo feeling hai jo aapke bane banaye kaam, rishte aur career ko bigaad deti hai. Lekin hum aapko batate hain ki aap isi Discomfort ko apna sabse bada hathiyar bana sakte hain jaisa pahle bhi kai successful logon ne kiya aur safalta payi. Kaise? Isi sawal ka jawab dene aur safalta ki raah aur saaf karne ke liye KUKU Fm le aaya hai "Discomfort Ko Kahein Bye- Bye".

title: Color Code se logon ki Pehchan
description: Kuch logon ki baatein aapko zaroor bore karti hongi aur kabhi kayi baar aap khud ko hi sabse sahi mankar logon se argue karte honge. Yahi nahi bahut baar aapko logon ki baatein gusse mein aag babula tak karti hongi. Lekin kya aapne socha hai ki aisa kyun hota hai? Ya kyu kuch log bas khud ko sahi saabit karne mein lage hote hai? Kuch log to sahi ko sahi aur galat ko galat bolne ki bhi himmat nahi rakhte hai. Par kyun? Aur aise sabhi logon se kaise deal kiya jaaye? Iska jawab hai humari is audiobook mein. Aaiye ise jante hai.

title: Agent Vyom: From Russia with Love
description: Ek khaas mission ke chalte ek R&AW agent, KGB spy aur Telepathic bachchi family ki tarah ek saath rehne lagte hain. Lekin unke piche padi hai duniya ki sabse khatarnak Terrorist Organization. Kya teenon sahi salamat apne mission ko poora kar payenge? Janne ke liye sunein Agent Vyom: From Russia with Love, sirf Kuku FM par.

title: निधी - द सीक्रेट एजेंट (Volume 2)
description: जासूसी वह क्षेत्र है जहां हर कदम फूंक फूंक कर रखना पड़ता है...यहां विश्‍वास किस चिडिया का नाम और कब उड जाए कुछ पता नहीं। जासूस की दुनिया में अपना सिक्‍का जमा चुकी निधि अब एक और नए केस को सॉल्‍व करने निकल पड़ी है। रहस्‍य और रोमांच से भरी कहानी निधि सीक्रेट एजेंट सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर

title: The Joshi-Abhyankar Murders
description: Aaj se kareeb 40 saal pehle, Pune shahar ki hawa mein khauf ki lehre faili thi. Weekend ho ya public holiday, har insaan apne ghar se bahar kadam rakhne se katrata tha. Aakhir kya hua aisa jisme Police bhi jaldi kuch na kar saki? Kya tha in bhayanak murders ke piche ka raaz? Janiye ye dil dehla dene wali real life crime story!

title: The Victorious Attitude
description: Your altitude is defined by your attitude - Jaisi soch, vaisa hi life aapko returns deti hai. Jeetna koi ittefaq nahi, balki ek aadat si hoti hai. Aur is aadat ko lagane ki sahi chaabi ka naam hai - Victorious Attitude. Matlab jeetne ki aadat aur soch ka positivity ki taraf jhukaav. Agar aap ucha sochenge, toh baaz ki hi tarah ucha udenge. Lekn agar aapka attitude haar yaa negative vichaaro ki taraf jhuka ho, toh koi udta hua cheel aapka shikaar kar le jaayega. The attitude of victory separates winners from losers. Chunaav aapko karna hai aur kaise, voh yeh audiobook samjhaayegi.

title: Kareena Kapoor Khan's Pregnancy Bible
description: Agar aap pregnant ho ya aapke aas paas koi pregnant mahila hai to aap ke mann me bahut saare questions honge , chaliye sunte hai Kareena Kapoor Khan ki pregnancy experiences saath hai unko mile expert ki salah , jisse aap bhi apni nanhi jaan ko welcome karne ke liye taiyar rahe.

title: झुक गई नफरत
description: फौजी सूरज ने एक गरीब घर की लड़की सपना को अपना हमसफर चुना। इस बात से क्रोधित होकर ठाकुर जनरैल सिंह ने अपने बेटे को घर से निकाल दिया और सपना को बहू के रूप में स्‍वीकार नहीं करते हैं। लेकिन नियति को कुछ और ही मंजूर था। सूरज शहीद हो जाता है और जब यह बात जनरैल सिंह को मालूम पड़ती है तो वे पूरी तरह से टूट जाते हैं। अब सपना के जीवन का क्‍या होगा? क्‍या जनरैल सिंह सपना को अपने घर की बहू स्‍वीकार करेंगे? सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Improve your Sales with Smart Calling
description: Aapko pata hai “Telecalling” marketing ka ek aise effective way hai jo leads and customers ko reach karne ke liye 1990s se chalta chala aa raha hai and still shayad hi aise koi industry ho jaha telecalling ka use na hota ho, so in saari baaton se aap ek baat to zaroor samajh gaye honge ki Telecalling ek aisa zariya hai jo aapke career aur business dono ke liye hi kaafi profitable saabit ho sakti hai and agar aapko telecalling se related A to Z jo kuch bhi jaan-na hai to wo aapko "Improve your Sales with Smart Calling" ki audiobook ke andar milega, to bina time waste kiye shuru karte hai.

title: माया - एक पहेली
description: Maaya! Uski laash is waqt uske ex husband ke saamne padi thi. Maaya jiski zindagi ek paheli ke saaman thi. Jab uski hatya ki wajaho ki parte pyaaj ke parto ki tarah utarne lagi to jisma ki aag aur daulat ke laalach ki aisi khaufnaak daastaan ubhar kar saamne aai ki usne sabhi ke hosh uda kar rakh diye.

title: डायन भूतनी की दहशत
description: चार रईसजादे कामी, लोभी, छगन और सोनू तारा को किडनैप कर उसके संग गलत काम करते हैं और उसकी हत्या कर देते है। जज कामी, लोभी और छगन को फांसी की सज़ा सुनाता है, किंतु सोनू के नाबालिग होने के कारण उसको सुधार गृह भेजने का हुक्म देता है।  तभी अचानक आकाश में अंधकार छा जाता है। काले बादल छा जाते हैं। बिजलिया चमकने लगती है। मौसम डरावना हो जाता है। लाइट गुम हो जाती है। जज अपनी कुर्सी छोड़ कर हवा में लटक जाता है और कोर्ट रूम में एक भयानक डायन भूत का प्रवेश होता है। और जज, वकील  और पुलिस के सामने वो सोनू की छाती को अपने पैने नाखूनों से चीर देती है। उसका दिल और जिगर निकालकर कच्चा चबा जाती है। और उसकी गर्दन में अपने दांत गड़ा कर उसका खून पी जाती है। अब आगे क्या होगा.? क्या कामी, लोभी और छगन को फांसी होगी..? या उन्हें भी डायन भूतनी अपना शिकार बनाएगी..? यह जानने के लिए आपको सुननी होगी बेहद खौफनाक हॉरर क्राइम कहानी-"डायन भूतनी की दहशत..

title: Sea Hawk: Safar Maut Ka
description: Apne business ko loss se bachane ke liye Mr. Batra Old ship ko new Cruise ship mein transfer karte hai. Lakin ye ek Shapit Ship hai jo tabahi ka tufan lekar aati hai. Iss baat se anjaan log New year ki party Celebrate karne phuchte hai Sea Hawk ship per aur phir shuru hota hai khaufnaak ghatnaye aur maut ka khel. To kya hoga jab siren karegi sab ka sikar? Bech samundra mein kaise bachayenge log khud ko? Jaanane ke liye sune puri kahani ‘Sea Hawak: Safar Maut ka’ sirf Kuku FM per.

title: Free to Focus
description: Zyada mehnat karne par to sabhi ko zyada fal milta hai. Lekin kya aapne kum mehnat ke sath zyada fal ki baat suni hai? Darasal ye saara khel aaapki productivity ka hota hai, jise aksar log apne khali time se jod lete hai. Jabki productivity ka matlab time aur apne kaam mein balance banana hota hai. Is audiobook mein aapko aise hi 9 tarikon ke baare mein bataya gaya hai, jise jankar aap apne goals,  apne relationships, apni health sabke liye sahi tarike se, poori productivity ke sath kaam kar payenge.

title: The Dark History of the Goa Inquisition
description: Goa Inquisition, Jisme Roman Catholic Church ke dwara banaye gaye niyam anusar unki astha ke alawa baki sari Prathaye Hypocrisy Mani jati thi. Aur Jo iss hypocrisy ko mante the unhe search karke mara jata tha. Iss original audio show mein Goa ke Inquisition ki poori detail mein charcha ki gai hai.

title: MBBS 1st Year
description: Kanpur se ek Middle Class parivaar ka ladka Rohan, apne sapne poore karne Delhi ke sarvshreshtha medical college mei admission leta hai. Lekin, wahan use uska bichda pyaar, naya pyaar aur kuch aise bure log milte hain jiski wajah se uska ek saal us college mei tikna bhi namumkin sa ho jaata hai.

title: Mansarovar - Aabhushan
description: "Mansarovar Aabhushan" Premchand ki ek lokpriya kahani hai, jisme vishesh roop se nari shiksha aur nari samman ko bataya gaya hai. Is kahani me ek mahila ka talent aur power ki importance batayi gayi hai. Sune is famous book ki Audiobook Sirf Kuku Fm par.

title: Thackeray Bhau
description: Ye Saal 1960 tha. Maharashtra  ek alag rajya bana aur fir yahan shuru hui asli rajneeti. Fir kaise shuru hue uttar bharat ke logon ko Maharashtra se nikalane ke liye aur marathi logon ko job dene ke liye pradarshan? Kaise bani Shivsena aur kaise Bala Saheb Thackeray ban gaye ek bada naam. Thackeray pariwar ki poori kahani bata rahe hain "Thackeray Bhau" kitab ki is audiobook mein.

title: Diamond Necklace Strategy Of India
description: Hum hamesha sunte aa rahe hai ki “china apni debt trap me gareeb desho ko fansa kar, India ke aas paas military position bana raha hai," Lekin future superpower India bhi china ko usi ki game me fasane ki puri planning kar chuka hai. Chaliye jante hai India ki Diamond Necklace Strategy ke baare mein.

title: Kaise Badlein Apni Buri Aadatein?
description: Hum sabne suna hai Achhi Habits banao, Achhi Habits hume successful banati hai. Lekin jab inhe sach me build karne ki bari aati hai to Jyadatar log fail ho jate hai, iska sabse bada karan hai ki hum khud ko theek se jan nahi pate hai. Starting me hi humari expectation bahut high ho jati hai, lekin jab vaisa result nahi aata hum quit kar jate hai aisa isliye hota hai kyonki, aap kis Type ke insan hai? aapka kya mental status hai? Strength kya hai? ye sab ki jankari hi sahi se nahi hoti. Is Original Audio Series me aap kuch strategies ki Help se asani se Achhi Habits bana payenge aur khud ko samjhne me aapko bahut madad milegi.

title: Kaise Banayein Apni Life Ko Perfect
description: Doston humein apni life se koi na koi shikayat rehti hi hai. Hum sochte hain ki humari life perfect kyun nahi hai, hum kyun utne successful nahi hai jitne aur log hain. Is situation mein aap apne aapko blame na karein balki aapko zaroorat hai humare is Original Show ko sunne ki. Is Show ko sunne ke baad aap apni life ko ek alag nazariye se dekhenge aur apne daily routine mein kuch badlaav karke success ki taraf apne kadam badha sakenge.

title: Agniveer
description: Kongka Pass me Atankwadi sangathan Lashkar-e-Tauba ke shikanje me fanse desh ke ek bade mantri ko bachane rescue mission par nikle sena ke 5 jaanbaz Agniveer commando jo ja takraye ek aise dushman se jo na insaan tha aur na is grah ka. Jiska maksad tha manav jati aur prithvi ka khatma! Khoonkar monsters aur apne super powers se usne lalkara Agniveero ko. Kya Agniveeron ke rehte apne maksad me wo kaamyab ho paya? Janne ke liye sune Agniveer sirf Kukufm par.

title: Ambedkar’s India
description: Bharat Ke Samvidhan Ki Reedh Ki Haddi Kahe Jane Wale Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar Ne Na Sirf Humein Hamara Constitution Diya Balki India Ko Ek Behtar Civilized Society Banne Ke Liye Buniyadi Cheezein Bhi Sikhai. Aayiye Sunte Hain Ye Audiobook Jahan Unhki Likhi Kuch Behad Zaroori Speeches Ko Hum Qareeb Se Sunenge Aur Samjhenge.

title: इतर
description: Amerika mein rhne vale bhartiye logo ke jariye writer Sushm Bedi ne pandit, pujariyon ke jhuthe karm kaand ko ujaagar kiya hai. Padhe likhe log bhi kaise Tantr mant ke chakkar mein fhans jaate hai writer ne apne upanyas Iter mein ujagar kiya hai. Kuku FM per sune upanyas Iter.

title: Dulhan On Run
description: Nivanya khush hai kyunki uski pasand ke ladke se uski shaadi ho rhi hai. Dulhan bani Nivanya aaj phere lene ke liye bekarar hai lakin agle hi pal vo shaadi ka joda utaar black hoodi mein ghar se bhaagne ke liye tyaar hai aur iss kaam mein uski madat karte hain Kaali charan ji. Jab sab kuch  Nivanya ke iccha ke anusaar ho rha tha to kyu ghar se bhagi vo? koun hai Kaalicharan, aur kyu  bhagne mein madat ki? Janane ke liye sune puri kahani 'Dulhan on Run' sirf Kuku FM per.

title: Kali Chudail aur Mysterious Child
description: काली चुड़ैल और शैतानी बच्चा | क्या होगा जब ख़ज़ाने के खोज में आए  पुरातत्व विभाग के अफसर टकराएंगे एक भागती  हुई लड़की और उसके बच्चे से? क्या वो समझ पायेगा तंत्र मन्त्र के लिए सिद्ध गांव का राज़? या काली चुड़ैल की शक्तियां कर देगी उसे ख़तम?

title: Blind Eyes of Bhagalpur
description: 1980 ke dashak Mein Bihar Rajya Mein Crime apne Peak Par tha, Police Laachar thi, Pura Political System Corrupt tha. Is Daur mein Bihar Rajya ke Bhagalpur Distric mein ek aisi ghatna hui jisne pure desh ko hila kar rakh diya jise Ankhfodwa Kand bhi kaha jata hai. Police ne Jail mein band 33 Kaidiyo ki Ankh Fod kar unme Tejaab dal diya tha. Akhir Police ne Aisa kyon kiya? Vaha ke logo ka kya reaction tha? sab kuch detail me discuss karenge.

title: First Hindu PM of Britain - Rishi Sunak
description: 2022 ki Diwali ki sabse badi khabar ki ek Hindu bana Britain ka Prime Minister, lekin baat yahi khatam nahi hui sawaal utha ki akhir Rishi Sunak ek Indian hai bhi ya nahi? Is sawaal ka jawab aur Rishi Sunak ki inspirational kahani dono hi aapko is show mein sunne ko milegi. To chaliye shuru karte hai.

title: A-Z of Standup Comedy
description: Kya aapko lagta hai aap logo ko hasa sakte ho? Aur kya isse aap apna career bana sakte hai? Kaise banega career? Kya kuch cheezon ko sikhne ki zarurat hogi? Aaiye jaane A-Z of standup comedy!

title: Bipin Rawat
description: Desh ke pehle CDS, jinki na sirf position adbhut thi, balki, unki veerta, unki bahaduri aur dushmano ko unki nani yaad dila dene wala unka jigra dekhte huye, unki service ko bhi badhaya gaya tha. Yeh shaksh koi aur nahi Bipin Rawat the. Lekin, yahan sawal yeh hai ki desh ke pehle CDS, jis helicopter mein safar kar rahe the, usse India ke safest aircraft mein se ek mana jata hai. Toh aakhir uss helicopter durghatna mein CDS Bipin Rawat ki maut kaise huyi? Kya udaan bharne se pehle, helicopter ka safety equipment check nahi hua tha? Aaiye Bipin Rawat ki zindagi se lekar, hadse se judi sabhi baaton ko jante hai.

title: India's Biggest Scams
description: Political Corruption se lekar financial scams tak, is audio series mein hum India mein hue kuch bade ghotalon ke baare mein detail mein charcha karenge aur sath hi samjhenge in ghotalon ka humare Desh par kya prabhav hua hai. To chahe aap history ke baare mein janna chahte ya sirf apni aas pass ki duniya se informed rehna chahte hai, is show mein sabhi ke liye kuch na kuch hai.

title: Turning Obstacles into Opportunities
description: Apne attitude mein ek simple change laane se kab badi se badi mushkilein opportunities mein badal jayengi aapko pata bhi nahi chalega. Iska seedha example is kitaab ke lekhak Ryan Holiday khud hai. Jinhone 19 saal ki umar mein, aadhi padhai karne ke baad hi  apne college ko alvida keh diya tha aur aaj vo Billion-dollar brands ke Media consultant hain. Ye book hume sikhati hai ki  ek mushkil jo success tak pahuchne ke humare raste ko rok rahi hai vo kaise humare liye  ek naya aur behtar rasta ban sakti hai. Agar aapko "Who moved my cheese" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: स्वर्ण कमल
description: Pandit Bramhadutt apne dono putron ke sath raat me ek beehad jungle se gujarte hain aur achanak ek ghatna unke jeevan ko badalkar rakh deti hai. Unka bada beta raakshas ban jata hai. Swarna kamal aur rang badalne wale kamal ke rochak ghatnaen kahani ke rahasya ko banae rakhti hai. Kya rakshas bana putra kabhi wapas insaan ban paega? Janane ke liye sune poori kahani...

title: The Science of Getting Rich
description: Ameer banne ka formula jaante ho? Agar nahi maloom aur pata karne ki iccha rakhte ho toh abhi suniye, is vigyaan ke gyaan ko. Wallace D. Wattles ki likhi yeh bestseller 100 saalo se bhi zyaada aaj tak logo ko ameer banane ka vigyaan samjha rahi hai. Jaldi kariye, kahi aap is formula ko samajhne mein peeche na reh jao, aur aapki jagah koi aur ameer banne ki raah par nikal pade. Agar aapko "Rich Habits: The Daily Success Habits of Wealthy Individuals" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: The Curse Of Slavery
description: Maanavta mein sabse bada gunah hai kamzor logon ko apna gulam banana aur unka fayda uthana. Lekin ye gunah sabse zyada hua America jaise desh mein. Jahan logon ko khareeda jata, janwaron ki tarah kaam karwaya jata aur maar diya jata tha. America Azad hua aur fir shuru hua iska virodh. Isi muhim ke tahat famous reformer "Frederick Douglas" ne Slavery ke khilaf di ek speeches jo hum le aaye hain khaas aapke liye. Chaliye sunte hain aisa kya khaas tha in speeches mein jo duniya ko aaj tak yaad hai.

title: प्रतिशोध
description: 10 हॉरर कहानियां का संग्रह 'प्रतिशोध' आपके रोंगटे खड़ा कर देगा। ये कहानियां अलग-अलग घटनाओं और व्‍यक्ति से जुड़ी हैं। तो देर न करते हुए ट्यून करें कुकूएफएम और सुनें खौफनाक कहानियां।

title: Heavenly Life
description: ham mein se bahut se log is vishvaas ke saath jeete hain ki ham svarg ya param shaanti aur khushee keval afterlife mein hee praapt kar sakate hain. ham mein se bahut se log maanate hain ki svarg ek aisee jagah hai jo prithvi se bahut door hai. Halaanki, James Allen iss book ke dwara humme samajhaane ki koshish kar rahe hai ki svarg aur narak donon yahaan prithvi par hain aur ve hamaare apane bheetar hi basse hain.

title: Increase Your Financial IQ
description: “Rich Dad Poor Dad” se liabilities ko kaise asset mein badlein yeh to aapne samajh liya lekin stock market mein paise doobne se ya bachat karne ke bawjood bhi hone wale loss se apne aap ko kaise bachaayenge? Isiliye zaroori hai ki aap apne financial IQ ko badha lein taki financial turbulence se bach sakein . Par yeh kaise karna hai? Iske liye aapko humari yeh audiobook sunni padegi. To chaliye Financial IQ ko badhaane ki study ko shuru karte hain.

title: Evergreen Stocks For Life
description: Aaj ke waqt mein hum sab stock mein investment ke zariye paise kamana chahte hain par sabse bada sawal ye hai ki aakhir kaun se stocks hamare liye best hain? Konse stocks hume zyada se zyada profit denge, aur aakhir kaha se aur kaise pata chalega ki ye Stocks hamare liye best hai? In saare sawalon ke jawaab jaane ke liye suniye ye show "Evergreen Stocks For Life".

title: The Story of My Experiments with Truth
description: Gandhiji ki Biography

title: Detective Ajay - Chupna Mushkil Hai
description: Veerbhadra gaon ke Purane mandir se achanak ho gai keemti Shiv Pratima ki chori. Ittefaq se Ajay aya hai usi gawon me apne pariwar se milne. Magar Shiv pratima ki chori ke baad gawon ke pradhan ke sath 3 murders ke case se gaon me mach gaya hungama aakhirkar Ajay ne phir se utha liya apne hi gawo ke case ki jasoosi ka kaam . Kaise dhoodhega ab Ajay mashoor keemti Shiv pratima ke sath Teen hatyawon ke katilon ko ?

title: Aakhiri Kitaab Jo Aapki Zindagi Badal De
description: Ek insan Zindagi me bahut kuchh karna chahta hai, kamyab hona chahta hai par jab paristhitiyan uske hisab se nahi hoti to vo pareshan ho jata hai, khud ko akela mahsus karta hai, aise me yadi use koi sahi margdarshan de aur ye samjhaye ki ab aage kya karna hai to fir se khada ho jata hai, aur fir se Try karta hai. "Aakhiri Kitaab Jo Aapki Zindagi Badal De" Ye AudioBook aapke sare question solve kar degi aur aapko Real Practical raste sujhayegi.

title: Making Life a Masterpiece
description: Hum failure se aksar darte hai. Humme aisa lagta hai ki failure is a dead end. Iss audiobook mein aap sikhenge ki failures stepping stones hai aapke achievements tak pohochne ka. Hum successful tabhi ban sakte hai jab hum pehle failure se mil chuke hai.

title: NCERT Class 12th Geography Part  2
description: Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT Geography book ka complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Population, International Trade, Land Resources and Agriculture  jaise topics ko achhe se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: History of NATO vs Russia
description: Capitalism banaam Communism! 2nd World War ke baad duniya sirf in 2 ideologies ke beech faskar reh chuki thi. U.S.A aur Soviet Union, duniya ke sabse mazboot desh bankar ubhre. Aur jaha world dominance ki baat aati hai, toh in dono ka etihaas boht ghamaasan kisso se bhara hua hai. Cold War ke dauraan 1949 mein ek organisation bani jise kaha gaya NATO - North Atlantic Treaty Organisation. Inka agenda Soviet Union ke badhte kadam ko rokna. Toh aaiye jaante hai 40 saal se bhi zyada lade gaye Cold War, U.S.S.R ka tutna, Berlin Wall ka girna aur aaj bhi Ukraine ke saath Russia ke yuddha mein NATO ka stand kya hai.

title: Rani Ahilyabai - The Forgotten queen
description: Ek Accha Raja vo hota hai jo Apna Bhala Bura na dekhkar Praja ki unnati or tarakki ke bare mein soche, Bharatiya Itihas mein Aise bahut se Parakrami Raja hue hai Jinhone Apni Praja ko hamesha aage rakha hai. Aaj ki Hamari series hai sadi ki sbse jyada Nyaypriya or Shahsi Rani ki Jinhe Devi ka darja diya gaya hai. Apne sasur aur pati ki maut ke baad Kaise ek Rani ne Indore Holkar Rajya ko sabhala, Janenge detail me.

title: The Cases that India Forgot
description: I will see you in court.....yeh woh chand shabd hai, jise nyay pe bharosa rakhne wale sabhi insaan ne kabhi na kabhi kaha hoga. Kyunki humara constitution hi India ke sabhi citizen ke rights ko protect karta hai. Halanki jab constitution bana tab isme kayi loopholes the. Unhi challenges mein aise cases shamil hai, jisne na sirf Supreme Court ko, balki pure India ko uss law ke against sochne par majbur kar diya tha. Unhi kuch cases ke baare mein janenge hum iss audiobook mein.  Agar aapko "India after Gandhi" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Apne IKIGAI ko Talaashe
description: Life mein agar ye clear na ho ki aap kya karna chahte hain, aapka Purpose kya hai, tab aap sirf yun hi bas jeete chale jate hai, life average bankar reh jati hai, zyadatar log aise hi jee rahe hai. Agar aapko apni life se pyar hai ya aap kuch bada karna chahte hain to aapko apne IKIGAI yani Purpose of Life ka pata lagana hi hoga, is charcha mein aap apne IKIGAI ko achce se samajh payenge aur use paane ke kafi kareeb pahunch jayenge.  Agar aapko popular book "Ikigai" pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Vishkanya
description: विषकन्या एक फ़साना है या हकीक़त? क्या होगा जब एक के बाद एक लोग मरेंगे ? कभी एक स्पर्श से तो कभी एक किस से।  जानने के लिए सुने - विषकन्या

title: FD vs SIP
description: Jab bhi hum investment karne ke baare mein sochte hain to bahut saare investment options humare man mein aane lagte hain, jaise SIP karein ya FD? Koi kehta hai ki SIP mein accha interest milega to koi kehta hai FD mein paisa safe hai? Ab aap kya choose karein? Is sawal ka jawab milega is Original Show mein. Toh der kis baat ki, chaliye sahi investment option choose karne ki tarafh badhte hain.

title: NCERT Class 9th Economics
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyaari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein acchi Rank lani ho, Shuruaat to book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. Lekin bookish language ko samajhna thoda sa mushkil ho jata hai. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap People as Resource, Poverty as a Challenge aur Food Security in India jaise topics ko bahut hi achhe se samajh jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyaari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: Learn Marathi Through Hindi
description: "MUMBAI" Sapno Ka Shahar. Jahan har insan ek bar zaroor jana chahta hai aur kuch vahin bas jana chahte hain. Na sirf Mumbai, poora Maharashtra India ke lakhon logon ko jobs deta hai. Lekin vahan rahne ke liye aapko aani chahiye Marathi language. Kyunki uske bina wahan survive karna thoda muskil hai boss. Isliye aapke sapano ko udaan dene mein sabse basic madad karne ke liye Kuku Fm le aaya hai "Learn Marathi Through Hindi" ki behatreen Audiobook. To Chaliye seekh lijiye ek aur language.

title: Dr. A.P.J Abdul Kalam
description: Experience the journey of India's most favorite President and a scientist. Get inspired and motivated from the life journey of Dr. A.P.J Kalam

title: How To Invest In US Stocks
description: Aaj kal log Investment ke baare mein khoob baatein kar rahe hain, baaten he kyun Logon ke Invest karne ka ratio bhi din badin badhta ja raha hai ab chahe wo Stocks ho Mutual Fund ho ya Real estate  log market mein grow to kar rahe hain. Ab agar main aapse kahun ki kukuFM bhi aapke liye Investment ka ek naya tarika le kar aaya hai, aap kahenge aakhir wo kya hai? To wo hai “How To Invest In US Stocks”. Jee haan ab Indian market ke sath sath aap US ke Stocks mein bhi Invest kar sakte hain, aakhir kya hai US market ka khel aur aakhir kaise karein US Stocks mein Invest Janne ke liye suniye ye Audio Show.

title: How to Plan a Successful Day | Time Management Course
description:
Learn Time Management and become time rich.
In this 3 lecture audio course series learn how to plan a successful day. 
Aap Hindi me seekhenge ki apane din ko successful kaise banaye. Time kaise manage kare. Ye course apane un dosto ke sath jarur share kare jinko aap successful hote hue dekhna chahate hain.

Follow me on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/sevenandahalf/

title: The Story of Drug Lord EL Chapo
description: Pure World mein Drugs ka Zehar Gholne wale Drug Lord El Chapo ki ye kahani kisi film se kam nahi hai. Sirf ek ya do nahi balki dashko tak EL Chapo ne duniya ke chote se chote aur bade se bade desho mein Drugs ki Smuggling ki . Jisme se cocaine, marijuana, heroin, meth, aur fentanyl ki smuggling sabse jyada rahi. Sirf yahi nahi chapo ne apne is dhandhe ko chlane ke liye apne virodhiyo ke khilaf Mexico mein jung shuru kardi thi , aur hayrani ki baat ye rahi ki us jung mein mexico ki kafi janta unka sath bhi de rahi thi. Iske sath sath EL Chapo do bar is trah se jail se bhaga ki use sadi ki sabse badi jail break bhi kaha ja sakta hai. Aur ye sabkuch kab aur kaise hua, ye is audiobook mein ekdum bariki se bataya gya hai.

title: Afterlife: What Comes Next ?
description: Kya aapne kabhi socha hai ki marne ke baad humari soul kaha jati hai? Usse bhi zaroori yeh ki kya soul jaisa kuch hota bhi hai? Agar nahi to phir yeh energy kaha se aati hai ? Aur baar baar recycle kyun hoti hai ? Universe se jude bahut gehre raaz decode karenge is audio series main jise sun kar aapki human advancement aur spirituality se jude sari hi curiosities par lagega purn viraam.

title: Investment - Ek Lifestyle
description: Kya aap bhi investment ki aadhi adhuri jaankari hone ki wajah se invest karne se katraate hai? Ye book summary aapke liye guide hai jo na sirf aapko stock market samjhayegi balki investment ko apne lifestyle mein add karke cashflow or returns kaise badhaye ye batayegi. Aaj hi sune!

title: Neeraj Grover Murder Case
description: Neeraj Grover Murder case un High Profile Murder cases mein se ek hai, jinka sach abhi tak clear nahi hua hai. Neeraj ek Television Executive ke taur par Mumbai mein Work kar rahe the, May 2008 mein ek din Subah Neeraj ki achanak death hogayii, Police ka shak Neerak ki Girlfriend Maria par gaya, par case bahut uljha hua tha kyonki Saboot pure mita diye gaye the, Koi bhi eye witness nahi tha. Is case ko kaise solve kiya gaya? Aisa kya hua Neeraj aur Maria ke beech jiske karan Neeraj ki jaan chali gai? Is series mein sab vistar se janenge.

title: दलदल
description: प्रकाशचंद्र मेहनती, जिम्‍मेदार और सम्‍मानित सरकारी अधिकारी है। घर और बाहर सब अच्‍छा है लेकिन फिर भी प्रकाशचंद्र के कदम बहक जाते हैं और सहयोगी सीमा से गलत संबंध बन जाता है। इसके चलते ऑफिस और घर दोनों जगह उसका सम्‍मान गिरने लगता है। दूसरी ओर सीमा भी अपने पति से झगड़ा करके अलग हो जाती है। प्रकाश की पत्‍नी निर्मला भी घर से गायब रहने लगी है। अब प्रकाश चंद्र जीवन के दलदल में बुरी तरह से फंस चुका है। क्‍या प्रकाश इस दलदल से निकल पाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: हलाला और अन्य कहानियां
description: Halala aur anya kahaniya, kahaniyo ka sangrah hai, jahaan mahilaon ke jeevan se prerit hokar kuchh kahaniyon ka sangrah apke beech pesh kiya jaa raha hai.

title: Conceive It! Achieve It!
description: Biswas kisi bhi jeet ki pehli jaroorat hain. Tabhi ap kisi bhi asamvab kam ko samvab bana sakte hain. Kya ap bhi apne asamvab kam ko samvab banana chahte hain? To kukufm par abhi sune ye audiobook aur apne jeevan mein ek naya sabera lekar aye.

title: हूल के नायक
description:
अंग्रेजी हुकूमत और जमीदारों के बढ़ते अत्‍याचार ने लोगों की कमर तोड़ डाली थी। सभी इसे चुपचाप सहते रहते हैं, लेकिन लेकिन चुन्‍नू माझी के चारों पुत्र इस हुकूमत के खिलाफ आवाज उठाते हैं और लोगों को लड़ने के लिए तैयार करते हैं। देश की जनता भी पूरा साथ देती है। इस तरह एक नए इतिहास को रचा जाता है।
Author : Arun Gupta
Voiceover Artist : Shreekant Sinha

title: Chandrakant Jha - Delhi's Most Brutal Serial Killer
description: "Agar mujhe es murder mein pakad sake to pakad kar dikhao"  Delhi Police ko ye dhamki di thi khaufnaak serial killer Chandrakant Jha ne. Ek ke baad ek murder karke woh police ko challenge karta tha. Kaise bana Chandrakant serial killer aur woh kaise pakda gaya? Janne ke liye suniye ye special show!

title: Gullak: Save Money Everyday
description: Kya aap salary to salary cycle se bahar nikal kar har mahine savings karna chahte hain? Thik usi tarah jaise hum bachpan mein gullak mein paise ikattha kiya karte the Taki abhi apne paise ko thoda thoda bachakar baad mein freely invest kar sakein. Agar haan, Toh kaise aasani se apne bachat ke Gullak ko Bhara ja sakta hai, Ye janne ke liye abhi suniye KUKU FM ka ye original Show. Agar aapko "Why Didn't they teach me this In School" jaisi books pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Safal Businessman Kaise Banen?
description: Business ek aisi journey hai jaha par logo ko bina thake aage badhna padta hai , KUKU FM par aapko Dinanath Jhunjhunwala ki likhi iss audiobook me kuch aise sutra aur Safal businessman ki kahaniya milengi , jiski madad se aap bhi ek safal businessman ban ne ke motivation aur tips se ek Safal businessman ban sakenge ,to chaliye sunte hai...

title: Detective Vikram
description: Shahar mein achanak maut ka koharam mach gaya hai. Ek hi pariver ke logon ko utara ja raha hai maut ke ghat. Serial Killer ke khooni tandav se har taraf machega hahakar ya phir detective vikram ke master plan se sach aayega samne? Kya hai serial killer ki asli pehchan aur kya hogi uski aakhri manzil? Janane ke liye sune Kuku FM par yai Suspense bhari Kahani.

title: Magic of Compounding
description: Paise kamana to sabhi sikhate hai, lekin compounding kar us paise ko badhana kaise hai yeh kisi Educational insitute mein nahi batate. Yeh show aapke is aadhe-adhure knowledge ke liye vardan hai. Is show ko sunne ke baad aapko pata chalega ki investment ke process ko sikhte kaise hain, use implement kaise karte hai aur usse profit kaise kama sakte hain. Kyunki yeh show aisi hi secret knowledge ka combination hai. Toh chaliye hum bhi ameer bante hain. Agar aapko "Why We Want You To Be Rich" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Simple Strategies For Perfect Lifestyle
description: Kya aapne kabhi ye jaanne ki koshish ki hai ki Science ka hamari lifestyle mein kya mahatva hai? Aakhir humein apne lifestyle ko perfect banne ke liye kin kin chezon ko follow karna chahiye, Aakhir humara routine kaisa hona chahiye ki jisse hum ek balance life ji sakein, Aaiye jaante hain ki aakhir kya hai humari life mein Science ka Mahatva aur kaise hum ise follow kar ke apni life ke easy bana sakte hain. Humare is Audio show  “Simple Strategies For Perfect Lifestyle” mein aise 200 sawalon ke jawaab hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain jise shayad aapki zindagi aur bhi behtar ho jaaegi.

title: How to get Free from Social Media Addiction?
description: Aaj har ek Indian ka screen time 7 ghante se bhi zyada ho gya hai, Jisme zyadatar samay social media par bitaya jata hai. Toh koi doubt nahi hai ki social media hum sabki life ka sabse bada addiction ban chuka hai. Isi addiction ke chalte aaj bahut se logon ko alag alag mental health issues ka saamna karna pad rha hai. Is show mein jaaniye ki kaise is buri aadat se chhutkara haasil karke aap apni life mein ek healthy balance laa sakte hain. Agar aapko "How to Live a Calm Life in The Age of Internet" jaisa show pasand aaya hai to ye bhi zaroor suniye.

title: The unsolved Mystery of Sneha Philip
description: Sneha Philip - EK aisa jiske baare mein ye tak nahi pata chal paaya ki aakhir wo zinda bhi hai ya uski maut ho chuki hai. Ye hai kisi ke gayab hone ki dastaan jo aaj tak sabke liye rahasya bana hua hai. Ek NRI shaadishuda ladki jo theek 9/11 ke haadse se pehele gayab ho jaati hai aur jsika pata police kabhi laga nahi paayi. Aakhir kyun? Kya hua tha us din? Kya Sneha ki koi dark kahani hai? Chaliye jaante hai.

title: Shiv Se Shivatav Tak (Dwitiya Khand - Neelkanth) | Writer - Ashutosh
description: इस बुक में भगवान शिव के प्रारंभिक जीवन का वर्णन है, जब न उनके पास अलौकिक शक्तियां थीं और न उनके मस्तिष्क पर चंद्रमा। किताब धार्मिक विश्वास की वैज्ञानिक व्याख्या करती है और बताती है कि देवों के देव महादेव क्यों महत्वपूर्ण हैं? लेखक आशुतोष ने भगवान शिव के जीवन का एक अलग तरह से वर्णन किया है।

title: Dyer's Bloodbath: Jallianwala Bagh 1919
description: 13 April, 1919 ko General Dyer ne Amritsar ke Jallianwala Bagh mein Baisakhi ki khushiyan manane aaye Bhartiyon ko apne ek order par khatam kar diya. Par kya aapko pata hai, Bharat ke itihas ke iss khoonkhar villain ko British Government ne kabhi 'Patriot' ka samman diya tha? Itna hi nahi, aaj tak na toh Buckhingham Palace ne na hi British sarkar ne is hatyakaand ki maafi mangi hai. Itne logo ko maarne ke bad bhi Dyer shaant nahi hua tha, Wo Amritsar se aur bada badla lene ko taiyaar tha. Jane kya thi uski saazish aur kaise hua tha uska ant?

title: Truth behind the city of Dwarka
description: Ek aisa shehar joh hazaron saal pehle samundar mein doob gaya tha, lekin uske avshesh aaj bhi maujud hai. Yeh shehar hai Shri Krishna ki karmbhumi Dwarka, jise basaya bhi Shri Krishna ne hi tha. Dwarka Hinduon ke prasiddh char dhaamon mein se ek hai. Isse waise toh Shri Krishna ke Yadav vansh ke aakhri chiraj Vrajbhan ne banwaya tha. Lekin aakhir aisi kya wajah thi jisne Shri Krishna ki banayi karm aur dharm bhumi ko dooba diya tha? Aisa kya hua jis wajah se unke vansh ke aakhri chirag ko smarak ke taur pe rajya ki jagah mandir banwana pada tha? Aaiye jante hai....

title: Secrets to Improve Your CIBIL Score
description: Kya aap loan lena chahte hain? Kya aap isse apne sapnon ko poora karna chahte hain? Agar haan, to loan lene ke liye sabse pahle aapko apna CIBIL score sudharna hoga. Tabhi koi bank aapko loan dega. Lekin kya hota hai ye CIBIL Score? Aur Kaise aap ese accha kar sakte hain? Aise kai zaroori sawalon ke jawab janne ke liye suniye ye khaas audiobook!

title: Integrated Solutions for your Business
description: Ye ek aisi audiobook hai, jisme ek entrepreneur ki kahani ki madad se logon ko sahi business decisions lene ki importance ko samjhaya gaya hai. Is audiobook mein jinka example diya gaya hai agar aap unke sath huye kisson ko dhyan se sunenge to apne business mein hone wale losses se khud ko bacha payenge. Itna hi nahi, ho sakta hai humare is show ko sunne ke baad business ki duniya aapke liye ekdum crystal clear ho jaaye aur aap bhi naami entrepreneurs ki tarah apne business ko nayi unchaiyon tak le jaayein. Kyunki isme aise aise solutions aapko diye gaye hai jo fully proven aur tested hai. Aaiye un solutions ke baare mein janne ka ye safar shuru karein.  Agar aapko Gary Keller dwara likhi "The One Thing: The Surprisingly Simple Truth Behind Extraordinary Results" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: How India became a nuclear power?
description: Smiling Buddha ke naam se nuclear desh banne tak ka safar, wo bhi...chhupte chhupate. Duniya se nazre bacha ke. Kaise ban gaya Bharat ek nuclear power desh? Kya chhupna pada aur kya zarurat thi desh ko nuclear power ki? Suniye is audiobook mein

title: For My Country: Sardar Udham Singh
