description: Jallianwala Bagh mein hui rooh dehla dene wali ghatna se janme Sardar Udham Singh ne apni zindagi ke kai saal sirf aur sirf Britishers se apne desh Bharat ke badle me samarpit kar diye. Apne akhiri din tak unhone apni ankho ke samne se vo khaufnaak manjar jane nahi diya. “For My Country”  Punjabi Sikh Revolutionary Sardar Udham Singh ki puri dastan unhi ki jubaani aap tak leke ayi hai, sune aur jaane ki kese Sardar Udham Singh ne apne badle ko anjaam dete hue shaan se apni akhiri sans li.

title: Shark Tank Ka Gunda - Aman Gupta
description: Boat Founder Aman Gupta ko aapne Shark Tank mein as an Entrepreneur, Investor aur as a Celebrity toh zaroor hi dekha hoga lekin Dilli sheher ka ek aam ladka kaise is mukaam par pahuncha? Aakhir kaise Aman Gupta ne apni company Boat ko Duniya ki 2nd Largest wearable brand aur India ki No.1 audio brand banaya? ye sab aapko jaan ne ko milega humare show "Shark Tank Ka Gunda - Aman Gupta" mein. Toh chaliye shuru karte hain Aman ki life ko jaan ne ka safar.

title: द ब्लैक डीमन
description: प्रोफेसर जावेद अपने असिस्टेंट अब्दुल के साथ मोहन नगर के काले जंगलों में भटकते हैं। उन काले जंगलों में जहाँ कभी काले राक्षसों का राज हुआ करता था। प्रोफेसर और अब्दुल उन जंगलों में भटकते हुए राक्षसों के महल तक जा पहुँचते हैं। वहां उन्हें एक स्याह काला ताबूत मिलता है, जिसे प्रोफेसर अपनी लैब ले आते हैं। इस घटना के पन्द्रह माह गुज़रने के बाद एक दिन कुछ ऐसा होता है की प्रोफेसर को अरेस्ट कर लिया जाता है। लेकिन क्यों?  क्या किया था प्रोफेसर ने ऐसा? इस कहानी में एक और कड़ी जुड़ती है, जेम्स-बॉन्ड का इतिहास। वो इतिहास जो था उन राक्षसों का काला इतिहास था। रहस्‍य और रोमांच से भरी इस कहानी को आप सुनने के लिए उतावले हो जाएंगे।

title: Microsoft Success Story
description: Yeh Kahani Hai Bill Gates Aur Unke Dost Paul Allen Ki Jinke Computer Ke Prati Prem Aur Junoon Ne Ek Multinational Company Ko Established Kiya Jiska Naam Hai Microsoft .Aur Computer ki Duniya mein ek naya Evolution Create Kiya.lekin Kya Apni Soch Ko Sach Banane Ka Bill Gates aur Unke Dost Ka Yeh Safar Asaan Raha? Aur kyun Baad mein Paul Allen ne Microsoft se Naata Tod Diya ? Yeh Sab Jaanege Aap Is Audiobook “Microsoft Success Story” mein Sirf Kuku FM Par.

title: Everest Par Tiranga
description: World ka sabse uncha parvat, jaha har Parvtarohi ka sapna hota hai ki ek baar to vaha jarur jay. Har sal saikdo Adventures log Parvat par chadne aate hai lekin kuchh hi log safal ho pate hai. inka safar bahut mushkilon se bhara hota hai, jaan ki baji lagani padti hai. Is AudioBook me Shuruwat se lekar Manjil tak pahunchne ki sachci kahani detail me sunai gai hai. kitni mushkilo ka samna karna padta hai?  parivar ki kya bhumika hoti hai? kin kin Trainings se gujarna padta hai? sab kuchh. AAp bhi is safar me hamare sath jud sakte hai aur jankari hasil kar sakte hai. duniya ki sabse Adventures Trip ka.

title: The Diary Of A Young Girl
description: Second World War Ke Dauran Hilter Ki Tanashahi Ke Chalte Jewish Community Par Hue Zulmon Ke Bare Mein Kaun Nahi Jaanta. Apni Jaan Bchane Ke Liye Bohut Se Jews Parivar Apna Ghar-Bar Sab Chhod Kar Safe Jagahon Par Jakar Chhup Gaye The. Anne Frank Ki Is Diary Ki Shurwat Uske 13th Birthday Par Hui Aur Fir Achanak Anne Ke Parivaar Ke Pakde Jaane ke Baad, 1 August 1944 Mein Ye Diary Khatam Ho Gayi. War Ke Us Daur Mein Jews Logon Ki Zindagi Kaisi Thi Aayiye Jaante Hain Is Full Book Mein.

title: Imarat-E-Shah Jahan: Unknown Facts
description: Ek aisa Badshah jisne apni mohabbat ke khatir Hindustan ko bahut kuch diya. Ek aisa Badshah jisne apni hukumat ke liye apne bhaiyon tak ko nahi chhoda. Jab tak uske jism me takat thi tabtak Hindustan par kisi ki buri nazar nahi padi. Lekin phir aisa kya hua ki inke apne hi inke khoon ke pyase ho gye, Aakhir aisa kya hua ki is Badshah ko ghut ghut kar marna pada janenge humare is Audio show Imarat-E-Shahjhan mein.

title: The Life and Tragedy of Charlie Chaplin
description: Sar par kaali topi aur pehne hue kaala coat. Haatho ki ungliyon mein ghumti hui ek chhadi aur apne atrangi karnaamo se logo ko hasa-hasa kar lotpot kardene wale is kalakaar ko puri duniya - Charlie 'The Tramp' Chaplin ke naam se pujti hai. Bade sitaare aaye aur naa jaane kitne aayenge, magar Chaplin jaisa visionary aur daring artist naa toh kabhi tha aur naa hi hoga. America ki film industry ko mazboot shuruaat dene wala yeh England born immigrant boht hi takleefo aur parivaarik pareshaaniyo se joojhkar aisi shaksiyat bana jiski zindagi ka drama unke marte dum tak unke saath raha. Bina kuch kahe puri duniya ko hassaya aur apne ek monologue se Hitler aur capitalism ke khilaaf jung chedi. Chaliye sunte hai is legendary creative genius ki jeevan gaatha.

title: राखी
description:
कृष्‍णा और राखी दोनों भाई बहन है। दोनों की जान एक दूसरे में बसती है।  कृष्‍णा केवल एक आदर्श भाई ही नहीं बल्कि मां- पिता, दोस्‍त सबकुछ है राखी का।  बचपन कब निकल जाता है पता ही नहीं चलता लेकिन भाई बहन का प्‍यार समय के साथ और गहराता जाता है। पढ़ाई के लिए राखी को घर से दूर जाना पड़ता है, कॉलेज में प्‍यार होना लेकिन चाहकर भी राखी इस प्‍यार को अपना नहीं पाती है। प्‍यार और रिश्‍तों की नई परिभाषा बताती यह कहानी आपको भावुक कर देगी। 
Voiceover Artist : RJ Swati
Script Writer : Mehak Suthar

title: Pehla Kadam
description: Humara Bollywood ke saath itna gehra rishta hai ki agar kisi insaan ko kuch samjhana ho toh unhe Bollywood ke dialogue se ya scene se samjhana aasan hojaata hai. Toh sochiye agar Investment jaisi difficult aur boring cheez ko agar Bollywood ke example deke sikhaya jaaye toh kitna sahi hoga? Toh chaliye seekhte hai Investment ke Funde, Bollywood Style mein

title: Chola Dynasty : Dynasty that inspired Ponniyin Selvan
description: Ponniyin Selvan Kaun hai? Maurya vansh ho ya Mughal saltanat , North india ke kayi samrajyo ne south india ko jitne ke liye kayi baar koshish ki lekin wo jeet nahi paye , wajah "Chol Vansh" aur "Ponniyin Selvan" yaani "Raja Raja chola" jo chol vansh ke sabse favourite raja the , ye vansh ke baare me hume textbook me nahi sikhaya gaya , lekin Bharat ki sabse best navy ke sath chol vansh ne 1500 saal raaj kiya , chaliye sunte hai "Ponniyin Selvan" ki kahani unhi ke time me ja kar.

title: How America became a Superpower
description: United States of America - The land of Opportunities. Duniya ka sabse shaktishaali desh aur aadhunik vigyaan ki race mein sabse advanced. Azaadi se jeena, apne haq ke liye sangharsh karna aur namumkin ko mumnkin kar dikhana is desh ki khaasiyat hai. World's oldest democracy jisne apni azaadi Britain ke khilaaf jung kar haasil ki aaj world politics mein iska sikka sabse mazboot bolta hai. George Washington ke president banne se lekar Barack Obama pehle colored president bane, aise etihaasik pal America ne duniya ko diye hai. Science, sports, cinema aur warfare sabhi mein avval number par apni jagah banaye hue aaye jaante hai ki yeh sanyukt raaj kaise bana vishwa shakti - A Super Power!

title: Nano - The Forgotten Car
description: India me aapne baar baar ye nazara dekha hoga ke ek bike par 5 jan ki family jaa rahi hai , aisa he ek scene Padma Vibhushan Ratan Tata ne bhi dekha tha aur decide kar liya ke indian family ke liye Tata motors ek aisi car design karenge jo sabse sasti hogi. Nano ka naam india ke logo ko to kya Us Precident Barak Obama ko bhi pata tha. to chaliye jante hai nano ki making , planning aur wo galtiya jinki waje se aaj nano ka production bandh ho gaya aur kya Nano wapis india ke rasto par ayegi?

title: प्यार का ये नया रंग
description: Nikhil, Neha aur Honey ki Dosti Sahaj nahi thi. Nikhil ne kabhi kissi ladki se dosti nahi ki. College mein uska apna alag hi Mijaj tha. Neha aur Honey ek dusre ki paki saheli thi. Lekin college mei yeh dosti Traingle love mei badal jati hai. Toh kya Neha aur Honey ek dusri ki pakki Saheli se jyada Dushman ban gaye? Kiska pyar hota hai mukammal aur kisse hona padta hei judha …? Jaane ke liye Suniye puri kahani keval KUkU FM par.

title: Kanshi Ram - Bahujan Nayak
description: Kanshiram – Dalit samaj ko Ek Rajneetik Samaj Inhone banaya, Kashiram kahte agar Dalit samaj ka Udhhar karna hai to Power to lani hogi aur Power satta me aane se milti hai. BSP Yani Bahujan Samajvadi, BAMCEF Jaise bade bade samudayo ki inhone sthapna ki Aur Dalito ko ek Pahchan di. Inki Life ka Ek hi Lukshya Tha Dalit samaj ka Vikas jiske liye inhone apna sab dav par laga diya. Ambedkar ke bad inhe Dalit samaj ka mashiha kaha jata hai. Is Journey me aap Kanshiram ke Apar sangharsh aur unke Jeevan hare k pahlu ko janege.

title: How to Stay Focused
description: Is Audiobook mein life ki uhn red lights ko ignore karne ke baare mein bat ki gai hai jo aksar humein kuch alag karne se rok deti hain. Is audiobook ka main subject creativity hai , Jo ki har insaan ke Andar kisi na kisi way mein hoti hai. Lekin Usko pehchaane ke liye aur society ke logon ko ignore kar ke Aage Badhne ki inspiration kaise milegi uske liye aapko ye Book Summary jarur sunni chahiye.Agar aapko "A Really Good Day" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko khoob pasand aayegi.

title: 0 to 1 Complete Baby Care Guide
description: Kisi bhe insaan ke liye parents banna ek bauth badi khushi hoti hai, Parents banne ke ehsaas aapko ek nayi zindagi ki taraf lekar jata hai, wo kehte hain na ki bacche bhagwan ka roop hote hain aur aisa isliye kaha jata hai kyuki jab ek baccha Janam leta hai tab wo hume duniya me sabse pyara lagta hai har koi use pyar karna, uske sath waqt bitan aur khelna chahta hai. Lekin baccho ka dekhbhal karna koi aasan kaam nhe hai ek bacche ko sambhalne me raaton ki neend udd jaati hai, Ek parents ko apne baccho ka care karte waqt bauth sari chezoo ka dhyan rakhna padta hai isliye hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain Audio Book "0 to 1 Complete Baby Care Guide" jisme aapko ek bacche ke duniya me aane se pehle aur uske is duniya me aane ke baad tak ki puri tayari ke baare me bataya gaya hai.

title: Sheena Bora Murder Case
description: Aksar kaha jata hai ki bacche ko takleef me dekh kar Sabse zyada dukh Maa ko hoti hai, Ek Maa hee hoti hai jo hume iss duniya mein sabse zyada pyar karti hai wo bhe bina kisi laalach ke, Lekin tab aap kya kahenge jab aapko pata chalega ki ek Maa ne hee apni masoom beti ka khoon kar diya. kuch aisi hee kahani hai "Sheena Bora Murder Case" Ki. Aakhir kon thee Sheena Bora aur kyun uski hee Maa ne uska khoon kar diya, Aakhir kya wajah rhai hogi is qatal ki, Aur aakhir kya faisla sunaayaa cort ne is case ki Culprit Indrani Mukherjee par janne ke liye suniye humari ye khaas Audio series "Sheena Bora Murder Case".

title: Maneater Devil Of Champawat
description: Kya aapko pata hai, hindustan ke pahadi state main 19 we sadi main ek aise royal bengal tigress ne aatank machaya tha, jiska naam aaj tak ke unbroken guiness world of records main shaamil hai, aur yeh record hai sabse jada insano ko maarne ka , 7 saal main is baaghin ne 1 ya 2 ya 10 nahi poore 436 logon ke jaan li, yeh uss samay aur aaj tak ke sabse bhayanak maneater hai, aakhir aisa kya hua iske saath jo yeh insani khoon ke pyasi ban gye , kaisa tha iska aatank ka samrajya, kaise hua iska anth, iss mystry se bhari hui original kahani ko suniye sirf KUKU FM par.

title: Morarji Desai
description: Desh ke pehle aise rajneta jo bina congress party ke support ke  Prime Minister bane. Unka naam tha Morarji Ranchhodji Desai. Mahan Gandhiwadi aur freedom fighter se lekar PM banane tak ke Morarji Desai  ke safar ko batane ke liye kuku Fm le aaya hai ye special show. Jisme unke bachpan se lekar Indira Gandhi se adavat aur janta party ke banane se lekar tootane tak ki poori kahani detail mein batayi gayi hai.

title: Kahani Innovations Ki
description: Socho ki agar Light bulb, Wheel, Telephone, Computer, Cars in sab ka innovation na hua hota to? Innovation sabse bada kaaran hai ki hum aaj ek behtar life jee paa rahe hai. Par in sabhi innovations ke piche ki kahani kya hai? Innovation kaise kaam karti hai? Aur in innovations ka credit kise diya jaaye? Kya sirf ek hi insaan ko kisi cheez ka poora credit dena sahi hai? Chaliye jaante hain is show mein.

title: Wo Boond si
description:
कॉलेज के दिनों का प्यार। सीनियर - जूनियर की तकरार और लाड। इन सभी से मिश्रित ये कहानी आपको अपने कालेज के दिनों में वापिस ले जाएगी।
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : Ashok Kumar Bhatt

title: Neel
description: मोहब्‍बत में टूटे नील को जब नलिनी का सहारा मिलता है तो उसके जीवन में एक नया रंग भर जाता है…. लेकिन रिश्‍तों के अधेड़ बुन में उलझा नील का जीवन मझधार में गोते खा रहा है। क्‍या सच में नील को नलिनी से मोहब्‍बत है? या फिर दर्द को भुलाने के लिए वह नलिनी का पेन किलर की तरह इस्‍तेमाल कर रहा है? आज के आधुनिक समाज में रिश्‍तों की अहमियत को कितना बदल दिया है जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Ulti Ginti
description: Covid ka daur wo daur tha jo bhulaye se bhi kabhi bhulaya nahi ja sakta. Is dauran na jane kitne aise log the jinke rozgaar unse chheen gaye the. Natijan log apna ren-basera chhod, apne gaon jaane ke liye majboor ho gaye the. Is sabka asar na sirf logon par, balki, humari economics pe bhi pada tha. Ulti Ginti ki ye audiobook wo aaina hai, jo aapko ye dikhayega ki aaj 3 saal baad humari situation kya hai? Kya humara desh wakayi samay ke sath aage badh raha hai ya wo ab bhi kahin picche chhut raha hai. Aaiye ise sune.

title: Jeena Sikha Dengi 100 Kahaniya
description: Kahaniyaan humme rasta dikhaati hai. Ek kahaani apne aap mein ek guru hoti hai. Kahaniyaan haste aur rote hue humme kuch aise life lessons sikhaati hai joh apne jeevan ko asaan aur mahaan banadete hai. Aiye sunte hai aisi hi kuch kahaaniyaan iss kitaab ke jariye.

title: The Space Killer
description: एक 16 साल का लड़का...एक स्पेसशिप... एक सफर...एक मिशन... कई सारे अनसुलझे रहस्य... कहानी...द स्पेस किलर... क्या 16 साल का एक लड़का सभी मुसीबतों से निपट पाएगा...? क्या वो स्पेस मिशन पूरा कर पाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनिए कहानी The Space Killer - Season 1

title: Gorkha Regiment
description: Jab aap duniya ke sabase achchhe sainikon ke baare mein sochate hain, to shaayad aap Amerikee Nausena ke seel ke baare mein sochate hain jo Atyaadhunik Takaneek ka upayog karate hain, ya Roosee Sainiko ke bare me, ya british Sainiko ke bare me. Lekin aapko bata de ki duniya ki sabse khatarnak saina me aate hai Nepal ke Gorkha Sainink jinhone apne jajbe se dushmano ke chhakke chudaye hai. Gorkha's ke bare bahut sari kahaniya famous hai, bahut sari ladaiyan inhone ladi hai aur jeet ke jhande gade hai. Kuku FM ki is series me ham aapko Gorkha's ke bare puri jankari vistar me denge. Jud jaiye hamare sath aur janiye ek aisi fearless cop ke bare me jisse puri duniya khauf khati hai.

title: Kashmir: The Beginning Of Terror
description: Ye kahani hai kashmir ki, Duniya ke swarg ki. Swarg, jise kuch logon ne kashmiri panditon ke liye nark bana diya tha. 1990 ke daur mein panditon ko ek dharm ke naam par sare aam mara gaya aur unhein unki zameen chhodkar jaane par mazboor kiya gaya. In sab sachhi kahaniyon aur itihas ko sametkar hum aapke liye laye hain kashmir se nikaale gae hazaron pariwaron ki kahani is khas show Kashmir: The Beginning Of Terror mein.

title: हैकर
description: हैकिंग शब्द सुनते ही सबसे पहले ज़ेहन में आता है लैपटॉप पर बैठकर कीबोर्ड पर तेज़ी से उंगलियाँ चलाता एक रहस्यमयी व्यक्ति.... फिल्मों से लेकर टीवी सीरीज़ में ऐसे हैकर दिखाए जाते हैं जिन्हें कोई हरा नहीं सकता, जो सिर्फ कीबोर्ड पर उंगलियां चलाकर ट्रैफिक लाइट्स तक काबू में कर सकते हैं लेकिन क्या असल जिंदगी में ऐसी हैकिंग संभव है? क्या होगा अगर कुछ कॉलेज स्टूडेंट्स सिस्टम के खिलाफ खड़े होने के लिए हैकिंग का सहारा लेंगे? रहस्य, रोमांच और प्रेम के ताने बाने में बुनी एक ऐसी कहानी जो हैकिंग को लेकर ना सिर्फ आपका नज़रिया बदल देगी बल्कि समाज के कई और पहलुओं पर भी रौशनी डालने की कोशिश करेगी।

title: निधि - द सीक्रेट आइडेंटिटी
description:
जासूसी एक ऐसा काम है, जिसमें इंसान अपनी पहचान पूरी तरह से खो देता है और पकड़े जाने पर कोई साथ नहीं खड़ा होता, साथ होती है तो केवल मौत। 10 साल की बच्‍ची के माता- पिता की हत्‍या हो जाती है आखिर क्‍यों? बड़ी होने पर वह बच्‍ची जासूस बनती है। अपना पहला मिशन पूरा करने वह ईराक जाती है। वहां उसकी मुलाकात बचपन के बिछड़े दोस्‍त से होती है। दोनों नदी के दो किनारे हैं, दोनों का काम जासूसी है, दोनों की रग रग में ईमानदारी और वफादारी भरी है लेकिन दो अलग   
Voiceover Artist : RJ Chaitali
Script Writer : Aman A J

title: काल भैरव का रहस्य
description:
Kaal bhairav ka rahasya written by Shiva Ji Soni Narrated by Arjun Dev
Voiceover Artist : Arjun Dev
Author : Shiva Ji Soni
Producer : Saransh Studios

title: Hadse ki Raat
description: दिल्ली के एक मामूली ऑटो रिक्शा ड्राइवर की किस्मत ने बड़े ज़बरदस्त अंदाज़ में पलटा खाया और उसके हाथ 24 कैरेट शुद्ध सोने की 6 एंटीक मूर्तियाँ लग गयीं, जिनकी कीमत 10 करोड़ रुपये थी! लेकिन मूर्तियाँ मिलने के बाद उस ऑटो ड्राईवर के जीवन में तबाही, आतंक और बेहद चौंका देने वाली घटनाओं का ऐसा खौफनाक सिलसिला शुरू हुआ कि वह त्राहि-त्राहि कर उठा। जानने के लिए सुने "एक हादसे की रात!"

title: Bargad Ka Ped
description: Pichle janam ki adrishya shaktiyon ke karan gao ke do ladke pad jaate hai Bargad ke ped ke maya jaal mein. Isi Bargad ke ped ke dehshat mein hai pura gao. Kya ye do ladke bacha paenge apne gao ka astitv? Ya ye Bargad ka Ped khatam kar dega ek pura gao. Janane ke liye sune kahani, "Bargad ka Ped"

title: NCERT Class 11th History
description: Yeh Class 11th ki NCERT History book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Early Societies, Empires, Changing Traditions jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Successful Hone ke 7 Rules
description: Humare Thoughts aur feelings agar humare attitude ko hard bana dein ya badal dein, aur vo bhi kafi lambe samay ke liye toh humare andar ek secondary mindset, yaani ki wrong mindset develope ho jata hai. Ye mindset humein ek alag raste par chalne ko kehta hai , lekin  hum use ignore karke apne andar 7 aeyse mindsets develope kar sakte hai jo humein success ke raste par lekar jayenge taki hum ek extraordinary life jee sake. Aur ye kaise hoga? janne ke liye aapko ye audiobook sunni hogi.

title: The Perfect Murder
description: 2048 ki Crime free duniya mein ho gaya hai Murder! Wo bhi us shaqs ka jisne is World ko Crime free banaya tha. Kya Vijay Gupta qaatil ko pakad payega? Kaise hua hoga ye murder jahan crime ke thoughts detect hote hi alarm generate ho jata hai? Kaun hai in sab ke peeche? Janne ke liye suniye…. The Perfect Murder!

title: Career Kaise Badlein?
description: Agar aap jo kaam kar rahe ho usse satisfy nahi ho to kya karna chahiye? “Log kya kahenge?” ye soch kar kya apne bhi apne career options ko taal diya hai? to ye show aapke liye hai , jaha par aapko career change, portfolio building  , job search se lekar  salary negotiation tak ki puri jankari milegi jisse aap bhi bina kisi dar ke apne career ko aage badha sakte ho!

title: Why Is The Most Lovable Animal Going Extinct ?
description: Kya aapne kabhi apne phone par funny Panda videos dekhin hain ? Kya apko pata hai itna pyara aur cute sa jaanwar darasal lupt hone ki kagaar par hai ? Lekin Kyu ? KukuFM Apke liye lekar aya hai "Why Is The Most Lovable Animal Going Extinct" Giant Pandas ke upar ek aisa show jise sunkar aap hairaan reh jayenge. Ayiye Suniye is pyaare se jaanwar ke baare mein hairat bhare facts sirf KukuFm par.

title: NCERT Class 12th Geography Part 1
description: Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT Geography book ka complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap The World Population, Human Settlements, Primary and Secondary Activities jaise topics ko achhe se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: NCERT Class 7th History
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyaari karni ho, Shuruaat to book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. Lekin bookish language ko samajhna thoda sa mushkil ho jata hai. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Delhi Sultans, Mughal Empire, Tribes, Nomads and Settled Communities jaise topics ko achhe se jaan jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyaari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: फ्लाइंग शूज
description: America ke scientist Lucifer aur Rubesca Milkar flying shoes ka aavishkaar kar rahe hai, lekin jaise hi shoes taayar hote hai waise hi vo gaayab ho jaate hai, scientist pareshan hai ki flying shoes kaha gaayab ho gaye, kya koi un shoes ka galat istemaal kar raha gai, dono scientist khufiya tarika apnakar shoes dhundne ki koshish kar rahe hai, kya unhe shoes mil payenge? Flying does kisne chori kiye honge? Kya wo kisi galat haatho mein lag gaye hai aur koi unka galata istemaal kar raha hai, jaan ne ke liye suniye hamari kahani The Flying Shoes.

title: Babylon Ka Sabse Amir Aadmi
description: Aap jitna kamaate hai uska 10 percent hissa aapko humesha save karna chahiye. Yeh kitaab aise hi kuch Paison ke baare mein 7 simple rules aapko samjhaati hai. Yeh timeless rules har koi apna sakta hai aur financial freedom pa sakta hai.

title: Game Plan For Dividing India
description: February 1947, British Prime Minister Clement Attlee apne office men baith kar India ke viceroy Mountbatten ko chitthi likh rahe the. Chitthi India pahunchi aur usi chitthi men likhe order ke baad Mountbatten ne eilaan kar diya ki Bharat Ko Azad kar diya jayega. Kya likha tha us chithi men? Kyu British sarkar ne jaldibazi men Bharat ko chhodane ka plan banaya? aur kaise jaane se pehle poori planning ke saath India ko do tukdon men baant diya gaya? Ye sab aur iss planning ka poora itihas bataane ke liye hum le aaye hain “Game Plan For Dividing India”. Agar aapko The Discovery of India jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook behad pasand aayegi.

title: Story of Acharya Prashant: From IIT, IIM & UPSC To Spirituality
description: Ye Biography hai Acharya Prashant ki jinhone wo sab haasil kiya jo ek aam insaan apni life mein achieve karna chahta hai. Lekin itna sab achieve karne ke baad bhi aakhir kyu unhone ye saari achievements ko kinare kar ke Spirituality ka raasta chuna? Sirf itna hi nahi unhone apne saath-saath kaise Social Media par ek aisi community create ki jiske baare mein shayad kabhi kisi ne socha bhi nahi tha. KuKu FM ki ye Original Series na keval aapko Acharya Prashant ke jeevan ke baare mein batayegi balki aapko aapke jeevan ko kaise jeena chahiye uski bhi direction degi.

title: Bageshwar Baba Ki Sachai
description: Bageshwar Baba social media ka ek woh naam jo aaj har ghar mein jana jata hai, har news channel par dekha jata hai, aur Bageshwar Dham mein puja jata hai. Unhi Dhirendra Krishna Shastri ki zindagi mein kuch baatein aisi bhi hain ki unhe sunkar aapke hosh ud jayenge. Unke anubhav aur gyaan se bhari kahaniyan aapke dil ko chu jayengi aur aap unki upasana mein khud ko talashenge. Ye show aapke man ko shaanti aur aatmikta ka anubhav hi nahi, balki kai sawalon ke sath chod jayega.

title: Diabetes Control
description: Diabetes control karna bahut hi challenging ho sakta hai, par yeh audiobook aapki madad kar sakta hai Diabetes ko acche se samjhne aur use control karne mein. Iss audio book se janiye ki kaise aap apne blood sugar levels ko manage kar sakte hai.  Apni overall health ko improve kar sakte hai. Saath hi, kuch practical advice apni diet ko manage karke apne diabetes ko control mein rakhne ke liye

title: Vaad Vivad
description: Doston, yeh Audiobook bahut he khaas hai kyuki ismein hai 70 se bhi zyada current topics ke upar content, yeh debate ka ek anokha audio collection hai jise sun kar aapka opinion banega har topic par mazboot aur aap ban jayenge ek informed person. Chahe 'Lokpal' ho ya 'Monetization' ya ho 'Cable Tv Digitization' jaaniye sikke ke dono pehlu is show ki madad se. Abhi suniye yeh collection of current topics debate only on KUKU FM.

title: Live Like Bill Gates
description: Class scheduling system banane se lekar microsoft ka nirman karke duniya badal ne tak, Bill Gates ki life hum sab ke liye ek inspiration hai. Iss audio book mein hum unki isi inspirational life ke baare mein janenge aur unki tarah kaam karne ke kuch tarike ke bare mein sikhenge taki hum bhi success ki tarah kadam badha sake

title: बिन फेरे हम तेरे
description:
प्रभात के नीरस जीवन में सीमा सावन की फुहार और हरियाली लेकर आती है। एक आदर्श प्रेमिका बनकर प्रभास की बिखरी जिंदगी को संवारती है। लेकिन डॉक्‍टर समीर दोनों के प्‍यार का दुश्‍मन बनकर आता है। सीमा न चाहते हुए भी समीर की हर बात को स्‍वीकार करती है और प्रभात के जीवन से दूर चली जाती है। लेकिन प्रभात सीमा को कभी भुला नहीं पाता है। और सालों बाद सीमा और उसकी बेटी सिया से प्रभात की मुलाकात होती है। प्रभात अपने प्‍यार को स्‍वीकार करता है लेकिन क्‍या वो सिया को भी अपनाता है??? जानने के लिए सुनें एक अच्‍छी और सच्‍ची लव स्‍टोरी बिन फेरे हम तेरे...
Author : Vidhya Sharma
Voiceover Artist : Ruby Pareek

title: Javed Iqbal - The Pakistani Monster
description: Pakistan police ko ek confession letter ne hila kar rakh diya tha. Us letter mein Javed Iqbal ne 6 se 16 saal tak ke 100 bachchon ka murder kubool kiya tha.  Itna hi nahi usne in bachchon ko gala ghotkar mar dalne ki detail aur acid se unki bodies jala dene ki technique tak likhi thi. Aur aisa confession usne pehli baar nahi kiya tha, par tab Pakistani police ne use arrest nahi kiya. Log kehte hai Javed pe buri aatma ka saya tha, varna seedha-sada dikhne wala Javed 100 bachchhon ka rape kar unhe jaan se kyu marta? Kya Javed ek serial killer tha ya uspar sach mein koi saya tha? Pehli baar mein kyu nahi pakda gaya tha wo? Kya Pakistani police use finally pakad payi?

title: Toyota Success Story
description: Toyota Jaisi Lokpriya Company Jise Desh Videsh Mein Itna Samman mila. Jisne Aam Working Class Logon Ka VIshwas Jeeta. Aakhir kya Kahani Hai Us company ki ? KukuFM aap Ke liye lekar aya hai yeh Audio Book "Toyota Success Story" Jisme aap jaan sakte hain ke kya kya faisle liye is comapny ne Jo Ke aaj bhi Japan Ki Arthvyvastha Ka Ek Itna Bada Hissa Bani Hui hai.

title: Money : Know More, Make More, Give More
description: Kya aap wakayi financially independent hai? Ya kya aapko bhi apne paise se paisa banana aata hai? Kya aap financial independence ke us stage par jana chahte hai jahan se aap apni aur apni family ki sabhi desires ko poora kar sake? Agar aapko lag raha hai ki iska jawab savings hai, to wo nahi hai. In sawalon ka jawab chhupa hai is audiobook mein. Isme writer ne khud apne personal experiences se bataya hai ki kaise aap independent wealth bana bhi sakte hai aur usko banaye bhi rakh sakte hai. Aaiye ise sunte hai!

title: आधी दुनिया का पूरा सच
description:
आधी दुनिया का पूरा सच उपन्यास बारह-तेरह वर्ष की रानी नाम की एक नाबालिग लड़की की कहानी है, जो छतरपुर , मध्य प्रदेश के एक निर्धन परिवार की बेटी है । अपनी माँ की प्रतीक्षा में स्कूल के बाहर खड़ी रानी को उसके ही एक पड़ोसी अंकल उसकी माँ को गम्भीर चोट लगने की मिथ्या सूचना देकर घर छोड़ने के बहाने बहला-फुसलाकर अपनी गाड़ी में बिठा लेते हैं । रानी को जब पता चलता है कि वह अपनी नादानी के कारण फँस चुकी है , तब वह दिल्ली में स्थित एक अंधेरी कोठरी में स्वयं को पाती है, सुनिये क्या है पूरा माजरा|
Author : Dr. Kavita Tyagi
Voiceover Artist : Shreya Awasthi

title: The Girl Who Escaped North Korea
description: Azadi hum Indians ke liye kitni mayne rakhti hai ye humse zyada kaun hi jaan sakta hai, lekin aaj ka show ek aisi ladki ke baare me hai jisne khud ko aazad karne ke liye duniya ki sabse dangerous country North Korea se 17 saal ki umar me bhaag nikalne ka decision liya, kaisa tha ye azadi ka safar aur kaun hai ye ladki ye janne ke liye aapka is show ko pura sunna bahot zaruri hai. To bina time waste kiye shuru karte hain.

title: How To Overcome Procrastination
description: Zindagi ki bhag daud mein hum apne sapnon se samjhota kar lete hain ya apne sapnon ko yeh keh kar chhor dete hain ki yeh to poora hona ab possible nahi hai. Is Original Show mein apko apne sapno ko sochne se lekar unhe poora karne ki sari tricks milengi jinhein sunkar apko yeh aehsaas hoga ki sapne sirf dekhe nahi jaate balki unhe poora karna bhi asaan hai bas zaroorat hai to sapnon ko haqeeqat banane ki recipe ki.

title: Kya Hai Porn films ka Sach?
description: Porn Addiction dheere - dheere bahut common hota ja raha hai aur vo bhi zyadatar teenagers mein. Kyuki aaj sabhi ke pas mobile aur internet bahut easily available hai. Ek Media Report ke according ab log pornography ko real process of love making bhi samajhne lage hain jo ki aage chalkar sabhi individuals aur couples ke liye kafi harmful sabit ho sakta hai. Lekin agar aap is porn addiction se bachna chahte hai toh is audiobook se perfect aur kuch nahi ho sakta kyuki ye aapko porn ke aise myths batati hai jinko janne ke baad aap khud ko porn se door karte chale jayenge. Agar aapko "Your Brain on Porn" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Tiger Ravindra Kaushik : India's Best Spy
description: Sochiye agar Pakistani Army ka ek Officer Indian Spy ho toh? Hum mein se kisi ko bhi is baat par yakeen nahi hoga lekin humein yakeen karna padega kyunki 1979 mein Pakistani army ka ek Major Rank holder officer India ke Rajasthan ka rehne wala Black Tiger urf Ravindra Kaushik tha. Lekin Kaise vo rajasthan ke ek chote gaav se pakistan pahuch gya ? Kaise mili use Pakistani Army mein Entry? Aur apna kaam karne ke baad kya Black Tiger wapas India a paya ? Janiye India's Best Spy Ki poori kahani is show mein.

title: I Came Upon a Lighthouse
description: "Tasmai shree Guruve namah" ye shlok sare indians ne bachpan se suna aur bola hai , Jiska matlab GURU ko naman karna hai . Chaliye Jante hai Shantanu Naidu ki kahani , Jo india ke sabse experienced aur inspirational vyakti Shri Ratan Tata ke Manager hai , aur Pura din Unke sath bitate hai , fir swabhavik hai ke jab aap light house me kaam karenge to aapke jivan me bhi bohot prakash ayega aur jab Guru khud Ratan Tata ho to kya he kehna , to chaliye jantne hai ke kaise , hum aap jaisa ek aam insan Ratan Tata ji ka itna khaas hua aur unse kya sikh le paya.

title: Mental Chemistry
description: Aap aur aapke vichaar aapke aas-paas ki duniya ko kaise shape dete hai aur aap apne life mein hone waali ghatanaon ko control karane ke liye apni maanasik kshamataon ka upayog kaise kar sakte hai.Complex theories ko iss book mein bohot hi asaani se samjhaya hai. Aur isse padke aap ek positive zindagi ki taraf aapki journey shuru kar sakte hai

title: Hero ki Kahani: Chaar Bhaiyon Ka Audhyogik Chamatkaar
description:
Ye kahani unn bhaiyo ke bare me hai jinki company ka naam har indian ko pata hai “Hero” , 4 munjal bhai jinhe partition ke baad pakistan me apna ghar chhod ke india ana pada, bank se loan lekar cycle ke parts ka buisness shuru kiya aur kadi mehnat se apne buisness aur india ki automobile industry ko mazboot kiya , to chaliye sunte hai
”HERO” ki kahani

title: Learn the art of doing Nothing
description: Aksar hum khali baithe logon ko aalsi kehte hai. Lekin agar science ki maane to khali baithe log sabse zyada productive aur creative hote hai. Yahi wajah hai ki humein bhi khali baithne ki is kala ko sikhne ki zaroorat hai. Lekin yahan aapko bata dein ki khali baithna matlab sirf apne body ko aaram denanahi hai, balki apne dimag ko bhi aaram dena hai. Jo kaise karna hota hai, ye aapko humari is audiobook mein janne milega. Aaiye khali rehne aur baithne ki kala ko janna shuru karte hai!!

title: Master Ji
description: Gharwalo ke virudh jaakar apne sapne ko pura kar Adarsh ban gaya teacher par Dhatura aakar mili usey nayi musibatein. Kaise padhayega wo us school me jahan chhat se tapakta hai paani aur na bacche aate hain aur naa aati hai uski salary? Har kadam par corruption, dhokha, aur musibato se ladta Adarsh kya bana payega gaon walo ko apna dost jab puri school staff aur panchayat ban chuki hai uski dushman? Janne ke liye sune Master Ji sirf kuku fm par. Sune jo man chahe.

title: Gujarat Ki Gaddi: 1960 Se 2022 Tak Ki Chunavi Kahani
description: 1960 mein Bombey toota to bane Maharashtra aur Gujarat. Vahi Gujarat jo Mahatma Gandhi aur Sardar Patel jaise logon ki janmbhoomi hai. To Kya hai iski Politics? Kaise yahan se nikaale gaye do neta “Narendra Modi” aur “Amit Shah” desh ke sarvochh padon par pahunche? Kyu Indira Gandhi ko isi Gujarat ne lohe ke chane Chabwa diye the? Aur kaise bana industry hub? Sab batane ke liye Kuku FM le aaya hai Gujarat Ki Gaddi: 1960 Se 2022 Tak Ki Chunavi Kahani”.

title: Story Of Sundarbans
description: Ek aise jagah jaha Nadi sirf har din 6 ghanto ke liye dikhai deti hai aur phir agle 6 ghanto ke liye gayab ho jaati hai. Jahan Chandramma din ke 4 bje se he dikhai padne lagta hai. Sundarbans, jiske baare me sabne suna toh hoga aur socha bhi hoga ki kitni khoobsurat jageh hai par kya aap iss sundarban ke khaufnaak aur daraavne sach ko jaante hain? Aakhir kyu yaha ke log har din apni kismat ke bharose jite hain. Aakhir kyu Jangal ke bahari log yaha aane ki koshish to karte hain par Waapas nahi Jaa paate. Kya hai is Sundarban ki kahani jaanenge hum iss Orginal Audio show "Story Of Sundarbans" me.

title: Ek Rahasyamai Yudh
description: अमर और विजय ख़ज़ाने की खोज में एक ऐसे जंगल में निकल जाते है जहाँ एक महल में काली शक्तियों का साया है. महल के अंदर उनको मिल जाती  है दो कालों के बीच का द्वार जिसे पार कर वो पहुंच  जाते है मायावी राजनगर जिसकी राजकुमारी एक शापित चुड़ैल है. क्या यह दोनों राजकुमारी को मुक्त कर पाएंगे इस श्राप से? या तांत्रिक शक्तियों से वो दोनों मन जायेंगे हार?

title: The Source
description: THE SOURCE, Famous writer Dr. Tara Swart ki likhi ek aisi Kitab jo hame batati hai ki kaise apne Dimag ko ek machine hone se bachaya ja sakta hai? Kaise apne kaam mein bhi peace mil sakti hai? Aur kaise aap apne dimag mein aane wale thoughts ko control karke ek bahut achchi life ji sakte hain. Mind ke kaun se aise source hain jinhe control karke aap Success bhi pa sakte hain aur peace bhi. Chaliye Jaante hain in sabhi sawalon ke jawab THE SOURCE" ki is Audiobook mein.

title: Mai Tere Pyaar Mai Pagal
description: सच्‍ची दोस्‍ती का रिश्‍ता खून से भी बड़ा होता है। और इसकी मिसाल थे, जानकी-प्रभास और वर्तिका । कॉलेज की दोस्‍ती, दिलसे जुड़ गई और आगे चलकर जानकी प्रभास हमसफर बन जाते हैं। यशवीर और वर्तिका भी एक दसरे का हाथ थामते हैं लेकिन अलग हो जाते हैं। आखिर ऐसा क्‍या हुआ जो यश ने वर्तिका का साथ छोड़ दिया? दोनों में से कौन था बेवफा? दोस्‍ती को रिश्‍तेदारी में बदलने की तैयारी है….तो क्‍या यह नया रिश्‍ता कायम होगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी मैं तेरे प्‍यार में पागल केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: विक्रांत - रेडमार्क( ब्लाइंड लव)
description: Vikrant jail pahuchta hai, Jahaan uska saamna Cobra gang se hota hai. Lekin kis jurm me Vikrant jail ke salakhon ke peeche pahucha hai? Ya koi khas maksad hai? Wahin doosri or Red (ladki) ek party ke liye drugs aur ladkiyon ki supply karti hai. Kahani har kadam par ek nayr rahasyon se bhari hai. Iske liye apko poori kahani sunani padegi. Poora yakeen hai ki aap poori kahani sune bagair khud ko rok nahin paenge.

title: Indian Army ki Sachhai : LT. GEN. KJS Dhillon
description: Chaliye sunte hain ek aise insaan se jinki kahani apko inspire karne ke saath saath hairaan bhi bahut kregi. Hum baat kar rahe hain India ke ek aise hero ki jisne apni life ka zyadatar samay Kashmir mein bitaya. One and the Only, Retd. Lt. Gen. KJS Dhillon Sir. Aaj is audiobook mein vo apne jeevan ke kuch khas pehlu hamare saath share karte hain aur baat karte hain apni kitaab “Kitne Ghazi Aaye, Kitne Ghazi Gaye” ki.

title: How To Priorities Things In Personal & Professional Life
description: Agar mai aapse kahu ki aapka workaholic hona ya apne kaam se bahut zyada obsessed hona and yahi same behavior apne aas paas walo se expect karna aapki professional life ke saath saath aapki personal life bhi damage kar sakta hai! To kya aap yakin karenge? “How Priorities things in Personal & Professional life” ki is audiobook mein Mr & Mrs. Chawla ki kahani ke through bahut ache tarike se ye samjhaya gaya hai ki kaise aap apni professional life me kuch changes laake apni aur apne saath-saath dusro ki life ko behtar bana sakte hai.

title: NCERT Class 8th History
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein achhi Rank laani ho, Shuruaat to NCERT book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Trade to Territory, Tribals, Dikus, Women, Caste and Reform, The Making of the National Movement jaise topics ko achhe se jaan jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: Paisa hi Paisa hoga
description: Riyaz, Sachin aur Vinay apni personal problems ke chalte, ek successful company se toxic brotherhood ki journey par kab pahunch jaate hain, unhe pata hi nahi chalta.

title: Vyaktitva ka Sampoorna Vikas
description: Ravindra Nath Tagore ne ek baar kaha tha yadi aap Bharat ko janna chahte hain to Vivekananda ko padhiye. 39 year's ke apne Jevan kaal me Swami Vivekananda jo kaam kar gaye wo shayad aane wali peedhi na kar paaye. Wo kewal ek sant nahi the, Ek mahan Deshbhakt, ek ache speaker, ek ache writer aur ek achi soch rakhne wale insan bhi the. Swami Vivekanandaji ka Bharat desh ko ek naya Bharat banane me kitna yogdan raha hain insab ke baar me aapko Puri jaankari milegi is full Audio book me jiska nam hai "Vyaktitva Ka Sampoorna Vikas"

title: The Subtle Art of Intraday Trading
description: Intraday Trading Ek Aisa Zariye Hai Jahan Se Aap Roz Paisa Kma Sakte Hain Lekin Bahut Se Log Intraday Ki Sahi Techniques Na Aane Ki Wajah Se Ismein Bahut Paisa Gva Bhi Dete Hain Toh Chaliye Is Audio Book Mein Jaante Maine Intraday Se Judi Kuch Zaroori Baatein Aur Saath Hi Saath Seekhte Hain Money Management Ke Kuch Aeham Rules.

title: The Genius of Walt Disney
description: The Genius of Walt Disney - Jiski imagination ne janam diya Mickey Mouse ko, jinka jeevan aaj Disneyland mein har din celebrate kiya jaata hai, jaanvar aur insaano ke beech emotions aur kahaniyo ko jodkar is kalakaar ne Animation Industry ko apni pehchaan di. Apne drawing brush aur sketch pencil ki  taaqat se Disney World banane wala yeh Shaks - Walter Elias Disney, ek American pioneer hai. Multiple Academy Awards aur ek unforgettable legacy ke saath aaj bhi hum inke banaye hue animated cartoons aur movies ke deeewane hai. Chaliye jaante hai inka khubsoorat aur inspiring safar, bilkul inki kahaniyo ki tarah.

title: Samvidhan Sanshodhan
description: 15 August 1947, India azad hua aur bana iska mahan "Samvidhan". Jise banane walo ne ismein vo sab add kiya jo desh ko vikas ka rasta dikhata. Lekin unhe pata tha ki aane wale samay mein jab samaj badlega tab agar samvidhan nahi badla to ye bas ek kitab bankar rah jayega. Isliye Unhone ise badlane ki taakat desh ki sansad ko di. To Kya sansad sab kuch badal sakti hai? Aur ab tak kitni baar hue hain samvidhan mein changes. Poori kahani batane ke liye aa gaya hai information se bhara ye khas show "Samvidhan Sanshodhan".

title: Exercise Karo Na with Glenn
description: Children are more energetic than adults because they jump and play throughout the day. The mind of the elder becomes sharp but the body is filled with laziness. Listen to this episode and know how you can take a step towards good health along with your daily chores.

title: Mushkil Bada Ye Pyaar
description: Viraj ki zindagi ulat jaati hai jab uske upar uski pregnant premika, Mansi ko jaan se maarne ka aarop lagaya jaata hai. Na chahte huye bhi Viraj Mansi ke murder ke ilzaam me ulajh jata hai. Viraj ki bachpan ki dost Latika jo peshe se ek Vakeel hai, Viraj ko insaaf dilana chahti hai. Kya Latika apne is maksad me kaamyaab hogi? Kaun hai vo jisne Mansi ka murder kiya hai? Aakhir kyun Viraj ne hatya ka ilzaam apne sir le liya? Kahaani me bahaut hi twists aur turns hain, toh abhi suniye poori kahaani keval Kuku FM par!

title: Tuesdays With Morrie
description: An old man , a young man and life's greatest lesson

title: अदृश्य हत्यारा
description: Kahani ki shuruwaat hoti teenegar ke suicide se, parantu kya sach mein ye sirf suicide hai. Inspector ka hai shaq. Kyunki issi ke baad jald hi shuru hota hai aatmahatya ka bhayaanak khel, ek ke baad ek teeneger suicide kar rahe hai aur sabke suicide karne ka tarika bilkul ek hi hai. Kya hai yeh suicide ya e sab ke peeche koi adrushya hatyaara? Jaan ne ke liye suniye hamari kahani.

title: Share Market Guide
description: Aaj ke waqt me har koi share market me Paisa lagana chahta hai par har kisi ko iske baar me puri tarah se knowledge nahi hai. Share Market me kab paise lagana hai, Kab shares ko khareedana hai use kab bechna hai ye hum mese bauth se logon ko bilkul bhe pata nahi hai. Uske sath sath Mutual Fund kya hota hai, SIP kisi kehte hain in sab ki jaankari dene ke liye hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain Full Audio Book jiska naam hai "Share Market Guide" is book ko sunne ke baad aap bhe apne paison ka sahi istemaal kar payenge or apne shares ko kab khareedana aur bechna hai in sab ko acche tariker se jaan paayenge.

title: Why You Need To Slow Down?
description: Kya aap bhi har faisala zaldibaji mein karte hain? Kya aapko bhi duniya ki race mein peeche chhoot jane ka dar satata hai? Kya aap bhi samjhte hain ki tez bhagna hi safalta paane ka raasta hai? To aapke liye ye audiobook sunna zaroori hai. Ise sun kar aap seekh payenge ki life mein tez hone se zyada thahraav ka importance hai. Ise sun kar aap khud mein ek alag energy aur shanti mehsus karenge. Fast paced duniya mein bhi aap clam aur pahle se kahin behtar nazar aayenge. To suniye is khaas audiobook ko aur seekhiye kaise slow rah kar bhi aap khud ko apne sapnon ki manzil tak pahuncha sakte hain.

title: Ten Days That Shook The World
description: Iss audiobook mein John Reed ne 1917 ki Russia ki October kranti ke baare mein baat ki hai jo first world war ke baad 20th-century ki agli mahan ghatna thi. Ek tarah se dekha jaye to Reed ki ye kitaab Russia mein hui kranti ki sachi kahani batane mein ek safal koshish hai, us samay ki bhavnao ko pakadte hue, Reed ne Bolshevik netao ke saath janta ka mood, Netao ke bhashan ki report, aur darshako ki commentary, sainiko, kisano, sarkar ke patan, winter palace par hamle, inn sab vishyon ke baare mein charcha ki hai

title: वो रास्ता
description: डरावनी कहानियां कुछ ऐसी होती हैं, जिन्हे हम पसंद करते हैं भले ही सुनते वक्‍त कितना भी डर क्यों ना लगे। कुछ हॉरर कहानियां सच्ची घटनाओं पर आधारित होती है जबकि कुछ इंसान की मनगढ़ंत रचनाएं मात्र होती है। आज हम आपके लिए लेकर आए है ऐसी ही एक रहस्य कथा, जो सालों से अनकही, अनसुनी और रोमांचकता से परिपूर्ण है। इस हॉरर स्टोरी का नाम है "वो रास्ता"। कहानी में दीवान सिंह नाम के एक प्रोफेसर, हॉरर स्टोरी और इंसिडेंट्स में बेहद दिलचस्पी रखते हैं जिस वजह से वे हर रोज़ अपने घर एक सुनसान रास्ते से होकर जाते हैं। लेकिन एक दिन सुनसान रास्ते में उनके साथ एक खौफनाक वाकया होता है। ये किस्सा आपको भीतर तक झकझोर देगा। इसे आज ही सुनें

title: Shahjahan: The Rise and Fall of an Empire
description: Kya Shahjahan ka Taj Mahal banwana Mughal dynasty ki sabse badi galti thi? Taj Mahal mein khoye Shahjahan ko na hi shahi khazane ka dhyan raha, na hi apne beton ka. Kya hua jab Shahjahan ke beton ne hi kar di bagawat? Kaise mili Aurangzeb ko gaddi? Kaise hua Mughal Empire ka ant? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein.

title: Apple Success story
description: Sabke Chaheete Mobile Aur Laptop Brand "Apple" Ke Peeche ki Success Story Bahut Hi Romanchak Hai. Apple ko Successful Hone ke liye bahut zyada badi team ki zarurat nhi padi. Naa hi Bahut Zyada paise Kharch krne ki. Lekin Fir Kaise Bnaya Apple ne itna bada brand Jo ki DUniya Bhar Ka Chaheeta Ho gya. Suniya AudioBook Apple Ki Success Story Sirf KukuFM Par.

title: Love Trap
description: एक ही कॉलेज में पढ़ने वाले आर्यन, श्वेता , मयंक और अंशिका के प्यार के है अलग अलग रंग और ढंग। कुछ कैसुअल है तो कुछ बहुत ही सीरियस। जहाँ मयंक और अंशिका फ्रेंड्स विथ बेनिफिट होने के लुत्फ़ उठा रहे है, वहीं दूसरी तरफ आर्यन और श्वेता बारिशो को अपनी पहली मोहब्बत का सौगात बना रहे है। क्या होगा जब प्यार और हुकअप से भरे कहानी के बीच गिरेगी एक लाश ? क्या होगा जब प्यार और सेक्स से भरी इस कहानी में निकलेगा धोके का ट्रैप? जानने के लिए सुने कहानी -Love Trap

title: Kedarnath : The Ancient Marvel
description: Aastha aur dharm ka pratik Kedarnath mandir kisne banaya hai? Kya iska jawab hai aapke paas? Nahi....Accha aap ye to zarur jante honge ki is mandir ke liye ek samay aisa aaya tha, jab mandir pure 400 saal barf mein daba tha. To ispar se barf ki chadar kisne hatayi? Yahi nahi, floods ke baad, aakhir mandir ko dobara kuch hi dinon mein kaise shuru kiya gaya? Aur Kedarnath mandir se jude kaunse kaunse raaz hai, jinke baare mein koi nahi janta? Aaiye unhe jante hai humare is audiobook mein.

title: Radhakishan Damani : Investor To Entrepreneur
description: Radhakishan Damani ek aise insaan hain jinhone stock market me sirf paisa hi nahi ek bada naam bhi kamaya jiski wajah se aaj bhi unhe ek inspiration ki tarah dekha jata hai, aur sirf itna hi nahi Radhakishan Damani ne Investment ke baad Entrepreneurship me bhi ek bada mukam hasil kiya jiski kahani sunn-na aap bilkul bhi miss nahi kar sakte.To bina intezaar kiye shuru karte hai.

title: Mansarovar - Aaga Picha
description: "Mansarovar - Aaga Picha" ek samajik upanyas hai, Jise mahan Kahanikar Munsi Premchand ne likha hai. Iisme wo jati vyavastha aur manav adhikar ke muddon par baat karte hain. Is kahani mein ek garib pariwar ke logon ki zindagi ke saath-saath, unke sahyogiyon ki zindagi ko bhi bataya gaya hai.

title: Budhape Ki Taiyari
description: Ek kahawat hai ki " Budhapa ek aisa kadwa sach hai jise har kisi ko apnaana hi hota hai" lekin old age mein aajane ke baad bhi aap kayi pareshaniyon ko kaise khud se dur rakh sakte hain yeh sab jaanege hum is original series mein jise sunkar aap apni old age ko kaise gale laga ke hello keh sakte hain aur kaise pehchan sakte hain ki aap young hokar bhi old age ke qarib aa rahe hain. To chaliye jaante hain kya hai kahaani old age ki.

title: गर्लफ्रेंड
description:
प्यार तो कोई भी कर सकता है और प्यार में जान देना कोई बड़ी बात नही है।आप अगर प्यार मे ही नही ज़िंदगी में त्याग करना सिख गए तो यकीन मानिए ज़िन्दगी बहुत ही खूबसूरत सी लगेगी।और आप खुद पर नाज करेंगे।इसलिए कौशल और नेहा नही शोभा बनके देखिए अच्छा लगेगा।
Voiceover Artist : RJ Saloni
Author : SK

title: Jeevan ki Zaruratein
description: Life is god's greatest gift. Jeevan mein jitna hum positive sochte hai utne hi positive raastein khul jaate hai. But iss busy life mein hum jeevan ki basic jaruraton ko bhul se gaye hai, aaiye iss audio se jaante hai ki kya hai joh aapki basic life ko better bana sakta hai

title: The SBI Story: Two Centuries of Banking
description: Bhart mein banking ka itihas kab shuru hua? Kis tarah hota tha pehle paison ka len den? Kab hui thi humare sabse pasandida Bank SBI ki shuruat? Kon the SBI ke sabse pehle Chairperson? Aakhir kitne Scam aur kya kya kahani rahi hai SBI ki? Janne ke liye suniye ye Audio book jiska naam hai “The SBI Story”.

title: India vs Pak - 1971
description: Itihaas mein sabse khunkhar yuddhon mein se ek maana jaata hai 1971 mein hua India vs Pakistan ka war. Kyun hui thi ye ladai? Kya the iske karan, parinaam aur gaatha? Aaiye jaane India vs Pak 1971 battle ke baare mein. Agar aapko "India after Gandhi" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Anna Hazare
description: Insaan ke roop mein aandhi, maano jaise dusra Gandhi. Anshan aur protest ki aatma ko dobara zinda karne wale is parakrami lokneta ke baare mein jitna kaho utna kam hai. Jantar Mantar se apne sandesh ko pure desh tak pohchaate hue inhone sarkaar ki jade hila di thi. Ek aam naagrik ko unki taaqat ka ehsaas dilaaya. 'Lokpal' aur 'Satyagraha' inki do sabse badi taaqat. Desh aur samaaj ki seva hi inka dharm. Chaliye sunte hai, Anna Hazare ka jeevan aadarsh!

title: NCERT Class 8th Geography
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyaari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein acchi Rank lani ho, Shuruaat to book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. Lekin bookish language ko samajhna thoda sa mushkil ho jata hai. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Resources, Natural Vegetation aur Minerals jaise topics ko bahut hi achhe se samajh jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyaari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: Business Mein Success Ki Chabi Hai Technology
description: Aapka Business Chahe kisi bhi prakar ka ho Lekin Usko successful banane ke liye Sirf ek Chiz ki jarurat hoti hai , Aur Vo hai Technology. Aajke Yug mein Jaha lagatar Logon ke Andar patience ki kami hoti ja rahi hai , Toh Aese mein Technology ke sahare se hi har kam ko Minto mein kiya ja sakta hai. Aaj Internet ki Wajah se Kisi bhi tarah ke Business ko Duniya ke Kisi bhi kone tak pahuchaya ja sakta hai. Aur Ye Audiobook Hme Yahi Samjhati hai ki alag alag parakar ke business kaise technology ke chalte Badi Asani se Uchaiyon ko Chu Sakte hain.

title: Detective Ajay -  Maut ka Khel
description: Maidam Kavya ke Murder case mei Detective Ajay ki entry kya hui Gangster ne Ajay ki maut ki planning hi kar daali. Top most Gangster ne Ajay ko is baar chaaron taraf se gher liya. Ab na to is case ki mystery Ajay solve kar paa raha hai aur na wo ye samajh paa raha hai ki aakhir ye gangster hai kaun ? Abhi Suniye poori kahani Detective Ajay: Maut ka Khel.

title: Bawra Mann
description: जिस बिट्टू के वजह से झलक अपने पुरे परिवार से दूर हो गयी उसे ही हमारी झलक अपनी दुनिया मानती है। सुने इस दुनिया की सबसे छोटे और अनोखे परिवार की कहानी - बावरा मन

title: Ek Laash or 100 Dushman
description: क्या होगा जब एक नंगी लाश जिसके नीचे दबी है किसी की पैंटी बनेगी डिटेक्टिव अनुज की नयी मर्डर मिस्ट्री?  क्या होगा जब अनुज को मिलेंगे उस लाश के एक से ज़यादा दुश्मन? क्या वो खोज पायेगा उस लाश के असली कातिल को?

title: The Leader In You
description: Hum mein se har ek vyakti ek accha leader ban sakta hai/ Bohot se logon ko abhi bhi leadership ki sahi se samjh nahi hai. Leadership humesha leader banne ke baad shuru nahi hoti, leadership ki shuruaat bohot pehle se hi insaan ke andar hoti hai jab woh safalta ki seedheyaan chadhta hai. Iss kitaab mein aap aise hi leadership lessons aur manav sambhandhon ke baare mein sikheng. Agar aapko  "The CEO Next Door" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: PPF Nahi SIP Karo
description: Warren Buffett ka kehna hai ki agar aaj aap kisi ped ki chhaanv mein baithe hain to saalo pehle kisi ne us ped ke beej ko boya tha, Aur iska matlab ye hai ki agar aap bhi aane wale waqt mein sukoon ki zindagi jeena chahte hain to uski shurwat aaj se hi karni hogi. Aur us khushi ki shuruaat aap SIP se kar sakte hain. Ab aap puchenge ki SIP kise kehte hain? Aakhir SIP karte kaise hain? Kitne tarah ke SIP hote hain? Isse hume kya fayda hone wala hai? Aur aakhir aane waale waqt mein hum isse ameer kaise ban sakte hain? Aapke in saare sawaalon ke jawab hai humare iss show mein jiska naam hai "PPF Nahi SIP karo".

title: Finding Calm In The Storm
description: Kehte hain aadmi chahe kitna bhi sukhi ho jaaye, jab tak uska mann shant nahi rahega, tab tak use kisi bhi sukh ka koi ehsaas nahi hoga. To phir kyu, sab kuch hote huye bhi insaan ka mann shant nahi rehta? Aakhir aisi kya chiz hoti hai jo use aantrik khushi hasil karne se rokti hai? Iska jawab chupa hai humari is audiobook mein. Jise sunne ke baad aapko ye ehsaas ho jayega ki jis chiz ki talash mein hum sabhi dar dar bhatakte hain, wo chiz humare apne hi andar hai. Der hai to bas use pehchanne ki.

title: You Are My Soulmate
description: Abhinav apni bachpan ki friend aur fiancé Naina ko surprise dene Mussorie jata hai. Naina apne aur Abhinav ke ghar par solo aur recreational trip ka bol kar aayi thi. Par jab Abhinav ne bouquet and chocolates liye Naina ka door knock kiya to Naina ne bahut der bad sirf towel mein darwaza khola. Kya Naina ke sath andar koi aur bhi hai? Kya Naina Abhinav ko cheat kar rahi hai? Janane ke liye sune kahani 'You are my soulmate' sif KUKU FM par.

title: French Revolution
description: Ek tha Raja, Ek thi Rani dono mar Gaye khatam kahani, Kuch aisa he kissa hai French Revolution ka. Lekin Aaj ke waqt mein jab hum France ka naam lete hain to humare dimag mein sabse pehle Paris sheher ka wo Eiffel Tower saamne aata hai. Par kya aapko pata hai ek waqt par France ke Raja khud ko iss Dharti ka bhagwan bataate the, desh ke haalaat itne kharab the ki yaha par log roti ke liye ek doosre ki jaan lene ko bhi tayaar the. Aakhir aisa kya huwa ki France ki janta mein Kranti ki chingari bhadak uthi, Aur kaise khatam hui French Revolution ki kahani jaanenge hum iss Original Audio show "French Revolution" mein.

title: मास्टरमाइंड
description: क़त्ल और देशद्रोह के इलज़ाम में सीक्रेट सर्विस का देशभक्त जासूस जावेद खान जेल की सलाखों के पीछे पहुँचता है. इस गुत्थी को सुलझाने निकले अमर और जॉन के सामने आती है एक ऐसी साजिश जो भारत के नक़्शे को बदलने की क्षमता रखती है. क्या थी वो साजिश? और कौन था उसका...मास्टरमाइंड?

title: Ghost Spy Gaurav Tiwari
description:
LISTEN AT YOUR OWN RISK.!! 
Aapka swagat hai bhooton ki duniya mein, jahan satya aur rahasya ek saath mein jiye jaate hain. "Ghost Spy Gaurav Tiwari" yeh dilchasp aur bhayanak show aapko vichitra ghatnaon ke kaafi kareeb le jaayega. Yahan par bhooton ki gatividhiyan hain jaha ek andhakaar se ghire hui aatma ke hone ka sanket milta hai.
Gaurav Tiwari, jo khud ko bhooton se contact karne ka dawa karte the, kahani mein unse aur unki rahasyamayi maut se jude hue kai sawal aur unke jawab hai, Lekin show ke pehle hi bhag mein...kuch aisa hai jo apko hairan kar dega.

title: 11 Important  Lessons of Lord Shiv - Secret to a Successful  Life
description: Srushti ka aarambh inse - Srushti ka anth yahi.OM NAMAH SHIVAY! Shiv bhagvaan ki 11 seekh, Jisse janenge aap ek safal jeevan ka rahasya. Abhi suniye aur badal dijiye apna jeevvan hamesha ke liye. Bholenath ki mukhvaani aashirwaad se.

title: Dholavira: Secrets Of A Lost City
description: 5000 saal pehle jo shehar Indus Valley Civilization ka grand city hua karta tha, achanak kaise tabah ho gaya? UNESCO ki world heritage sites mein shumar Dholavira ko iske architecture, water management system aur urban design ke liye poori duniya mein jaana jata hai. Par aakhir aisa kya khas tha is sheher mein? Kaise the iske log? Kaisi thi iski technology, language aur life? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein

title: लॉयड्स बैंक डकैती
description: Insaan ke haathon hone waali Apradh ki sachaie kahaniya ko baya karta yaha Upanayas rahasya aur romanch se bhara hei.

title: 1914: Hil Gaya British Raj
description: Khudiram Bose aur Praful Chaki ki maut ke baad se hi Shirish ne thaan liya tha ki wo krantikariyon ke liye hathiyaaron ke ek bade jakheere ka intjaam karega taki angrejon se hone wali muthbhed mein unhe hathiyaaron ki kami ka samna na karna pade. Aur phir viceroy par hamle ke nakaam hone ke baad uska irada atal ho gaya tha. Shirish Paul ne Shirish Mitra ki madad se Rodda & Co. mein sendh lagane ki koshish ki. Kya Paul hathiyaaron ko lootne mein kamyab ho payega? Kya Calcutta CID ka main head Charles Tegart ek baar phir Shirish aur uske sathiyon ko nakamyab karne mein safal ho payega? Kya hoga jab aayenge Tegart aur Shirish Paul amne-samne? Inhi sab rochak aur sachchi ghatnaon ke baarein mein vistaar se janne ke liye sunein 1914: Hil Gaya British Raj.

title: खूनी शहर
description: नकुल और खुनी शहर | नौकरी की तलाश में आये एक भोले भाले  लड़के को शहर में बहुत लोग नौकरी देना चाहते है। वो शुरू में इन सब को देख कर खुश हो जाता है, पर जल्दी ही उसे एहसास होता  है की हर जगह वो गुंडों से घिर जाता है।  क्या वो इन गुंडों से इस शहर को मुक्ति दिला पायेगा? या फँस जाएगा इस शहर के खुनी जाल में?

title: The Art Of Prayer Healing
description: Is Original show mein hum aapke liye laaye hai proven techniques of praying jiske use se duniya ke kayi logon ko madad mili hai. Isme aapko real-life examples se yeh samajh aayega ki sahi tarike se pray karke logon ne apne toote ghar ko sambhala hai, dukh se bahar nikle hain aur chhote-mote problems ko bhi solve kiya hai

title: भार्गव - एक आदिनायक की महागाथा
description:
युगों से चला आ रहा एक युद्ध जिसका कार्यभार एक महान वंश को दिया गया है। वहीं, एक ऐसा दुश्मन जो चार युगों से अजेय है। तो आखिर कैसे जीता जाएगा यह युद्ध? ये युद्ध क्‍यों हो रहा है और इसका क्‍या रहस्य है? इस युद्ध का रहस्‍य छुपा है एक आदिग्रंथ में। तो क्‍या इस रहस्‍य से पर्दा उठ पाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Voiceover Artist: RJ Manish
author: आशुतोष मालवीय

title: The Art of War
description: Yuddha ki kala, isme jeet usiki jo is kala mein maahir! 2000 saal se bhi zyada purani Sun Tzu dwaara likhi yeh kitaab aaj bhi sena ke bade bade generals aur commanders ke liye kisi bible se kam nahi. Yuddha ke maidaan mein jeet kaise haasil ki jaati hai, kam se kam nuksaan aur dushman ko mooh ki haar kaise dikhaaye yeh sab sawaalo ke javaab is kitaab mein aapko milenge. Jeevan ke maidaan mein bhi in techniques ka aap istemaal karkar, life ke war mein is kala ko utaar sakte hai. Chaliye mehsoss karte hai - The Art of War!

title: Winning Strategies for a New Era of Business
description: Aaj ke zamaane mein hum owner nahi bus user banna chahte hain, aur apni sahuliyat ke hisaab se kisi bhi product ya service ko jab tak man chahe aur jitna chahe bus utna hi use karna chahte hain, aise mein kaise badal rahi hai humari aas paas ki duniya, aur kaise netflix aur zoom cars jaisi companies subscription model se humari zindagi aasaan bana rahi hain, jaaniye is Original Show mein. jise sunne ke baad aap bhi apne business mein subscription model kaise apply kar sakte hain yeh samajh paayenge.

title: AMVEKA
description: Hill Station mein ho rahe hain mysterious murders. Narbhakshi jeev, Jungle Mafia aur Videshi taakaton ne bhi macha rakha hai kohram. Raja Prithviraj ke mahal mein bhatak rahi hain shaitani roohein aur shak ki sui aa tiki hai us Khaufnaak Haseena par jo mar chuki hai 20 saal pehle. Kya wo wapas aagayi? Ya in hatyaon ke piche hai koi gehra raaz? Janne ke liye sune Pyaar, Dhokhe aur Khauf se bhari kahani “Amveka” sirf Kuku FM par.

title: Dream girl Hema Malini
description: Gulzar Saheb the har heroine ki pehli pasand, Hema ji ke bhi par kyon? Hema ji ka love letter pahucha unke school fir kya tha hua? Jab sach me garm chattanon par nachi Hema Malini. Kaise mili pahli film 'Sapno ka Saudagar'? Dharam ji ki ek hi wish madrasan pat jae. Kyon B-grade films bhi sign karni padi? Ek aisi film jiske paise kabhi kharch nahi kiye Hemaji ne. Hemaji ko lagta hai oonchai se dar, film ke set par kya hua?

title: Tips And Tricks For Anti- Aging
description:
Ye baat sach hai ki jab hum kisi se milte hai to hum sabse pehle use insaan ki aankhein aur Chehra he dekhte hai, Par aaj ke is pollution se baher door mein ek umar se pehle he humare chahre ki ronak jaane lag gai hai, waqt se pehle he hum anti aging ke shikar hone lag gye hain.
Lekin is Audio Book me humne un sare tips and tricks ke bare zikar kiya hai jo aapko anti aging ki samasya se chutkara dilayega aur is tricks ko apply kar aap apne chehre ko aue nikhar sakte hain.

title: नीली आँखों वाली
description: Sangam aur Raadha ek dusre se pyaar karte hai aur shaadi karna chahte hai. Dono ke gharwale bhi raazi hai, lekin neeli naam ki ladki, jo ek daayan hai is pyaar ke beech aati hai. Yah kahani Punarjanam ke pyaar aur badle ki hai. Khaufnaak ghatnaao se bharpur yah kahani aapke rongte khadi kar degi.

title: नशे में दुनिया
description: ड्रग्स की लत से इस वक़्त हर कोई परेशान है।  भले ही वो कोई आम आदमी हो , स्कूल कॉलेज के बच्चे हों या फिल्म इंडस्ट्री के लोग।  ड्रग्स का नशा ही ऐसा है जो न ही देखता है कोई रंग , लिंग न ही ओहदा वो तो बस सबको अपने में आकर्षित कर लेता है।  ये कहानी भी ऐसे ही लोगों की है जिनकी दुनिया में ड्रग्स ने तबाही मचा दी है।  इस कहानी में आपको सुनने को मिलेंगे ड्रग्स की दुनिया के खतरनाक सच और क्यों लोग इसके आगे अपने घुटने टेक देते हैं !

title: Creation of Bangladesh
description: 26 March 1971 ko elaan kiya gaya tha ki, bangladesh ab ek swatantra desh hai. Par kya unhe swatantra mili ? Agar haan to kaise ? Swatantrata milne se pehle kya hua tha ? Aakhir Bangladesh banne ki kya wo wajah thi ? Wo kaun tha jisne Bangladesh ki neev rakhi ? Yeh jaan ne ke liye suniye creation of Bangladesh ki yeh kahani !

title: How To Save More Money In 2023
description: Apni daily life mein agar aap extra savings karna chahte hain toh ye show aapke liye hi hai. Humari daily life mein kayi aisi habits hoti hai jo humse extra expenses karwati hain but agar hum un extra expenses ko sahi se track kar sakein toh yahi extra kharch humari savings ban sakti hai. Toh chaliye bina deri ke hum apne pehle episode ki taraf badhte hain.

title: Politically Yours
description: Politics mein Love? ya Love mein hai Politics? jaisa bhi ho, haarna toh hai kisi ek ko. Pyaar mein doobi MLA Dhaani ki beti Rashmi ho jaati hai apne lover Raghu ke sath faraar! Par ilzaam lagta hai ki Raghu hai ek terrorist jo 26 January ko karne wala hai Prime Minister par jaanleva hamla! Kya hai yeh sach ya koi badi saazish? Raajneeti aur pyaar ki is jung ko kaise jeetega MLA ki beti ka pyaar?

title: Manavta ke Dushman
description: ड्रग्स का एडिक्शन आज के युवाओं में एक बीमारी की तरह फैला हुआ है। पर क्या इसके लिए सिर्फ वहीं ज़िम्मेदार हैं? असली मुजरिम तो वो हैं जो इसको बढ़ावा देते हैं और युवाओं तक पहुंचाते हैं। इसी कड़वी सच्चाई को पेश करने वाली काल्पनिक पात्रो से सजी यह स्टोरी ऐसे ही उन दरिंदों की कहानी जो है मानवता के दुश्मन!

title: Mental Toughness Badhane Ke Asaan Tareeke
description: Life aur Career mein Successful hone ke liye Apka Mentally tough hona bahut zaroori hai lekin kya hoti hai yeh mental toughness? Aur kaise isko apne andar develop kar ke aap stress aur failure ko Tata Bye-Bye keh sakte hain? Is Original show ko sunne ke baad apko mental toughness se jude saare sawal aur unke jawab mil jayenge sath hi kuch exercise bhi milengi jinhein apply kar ke aap bhi mentally tough ban sakte hain.

title: ChatGPT Se Kaise Banayein Kaam Ko Aasaan
description: ChatGPT apko job mein replace nahi karega balki ChatGPT ko effectively use karne wale log aapko jobs mein replace karenge. Isiliye aaj ke time mein isko kaise effectively use kiya ja sakta hai, yeh pata hona humare liye bahut important hai aur beneficial bhi. Kyunki yeh na sirf aapke kaam ko asaan banata hai balki aapko easily bahut saara paisa kamakar bhi de sakta hai. Lekin kaise? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein.

title: Aakhiri Sapna
description: Kya hoga jab aapke darawane sapne hi aapki wo sachayi ban jayenge, jisse aap humesha bhaagne ki koshish karte ho? Jiya ki kahaani bhi kuch aisi hi hai, jo har subah ek daravane sapne ke saath uthti hai aur phir din mei, usi sapne ko jeeti hai. Jiya ke is sapno ke shehar mei judne ke liye, abhi sunna shuru karein, Aakhiri Sapna urf The Last Dream.

title: Jamtara : Phishing Capital Of India
description: Ye kahani hai Un Phishing Scammers ki jinhone bollywood superstars , government servants , political leaders aur lakhon aam logon ke bank accounts ko sirf apne ek phone call se khali kar diya. Aur ye call hindustan ke sabse pichde ilake se aata hai, jaha smartphones aur computers ki jankari sirf gine - chune logon ko hi hai aur vo bhi poori tarike se nahi. Lekin Jamtara ke naam se jana jane wala Jharkhand ka ye ilaka  ab india mein 80% se jyada phishing attacks  Karne ke liye apni pehchan bana chuka hai. Toh aakhir kaise hui Jamtara mein is cyber crime ki shuruaat , India ke kaun kaun se VIP's bane is attack ka shikar aur kyu in attacks par ab tak nahi lag paya hai full stop. In sabhi Questions ke answers aapko milenge is audiobook mein.

title: Start Over
description: Sahi guidance ke kami se youth mein confidence ki kami paayi jaati hai aur wo hamesha ek confused state mein jeete hai. Aise mein sahi faisle nahi liye jaate. Ye book summary yuvao mein aatmavishwas bharti hai aur unhe unki shaktiyon aur capacities se parichit karvati hai, taaki ve jeevan mein aage badhne ke liye sahi disha mein prayas kar sake.

title: Martial Arts Champion Bruce Lee
description: Jeet Kune Do Ke Founder Ke Naam Se Jaane Jaane Wale Bruce Lee Jo Bachpan Mein Ek Professional Dancer Banna Chahte The Unhe Zindagi Kisi Aur Muqaam Pe Lekar Jana Chahti Thi. Apne Kaam Se Duniya Ko Apna Fan Bnane Ke Baad 32 Saal Ki Kam Umar Mein Unhone Duniya Ko Alwida Keh Diya, Lekin Aaj Bhi Wo Apne Fans Ke Dilon Mein Zinda Hain. Chaliye Sunte Hain Bruce Lee Ke Shangharsh Se Shikhar Tak Pohanchane Ki Kahani.

title: Safar Pyaar ka
description: माही और नैना के बीच कहने को तो दोस्‍ती का रिश्‍ता है लेकिन दोनों एक दूसरे पर अपनी जान झिड़कती हैं। नैना के दिमाग में न जानें किस बात का भय बैठा है, जो हर जगह उसका पीछा करता रहता है। लेकिन एक दिन अचानक एक इंसान आता है, जिसे माही अपना पति बताती है। नैना इस बात से हैरान है कि आज तक तो ऐसी कोई बात ही नहीं थी, तो आज ये अचानक पति कहा से आ गया? तो क्‍या सच में माही शादी शुदा है? क्‍या है माही का अतीत? क्‍यों दूरी बना रखी है उसने अपने रिश्‍तों से? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी, केव कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Your Guide To Teenage Parenting
description: As a parent, hum sabse zyada concerned rehte hain apne teenage bacchon ki parvarish ko lekar, kahin wo kisi galat sangat mein na pad jayein, unka jhalla kar baat karna, khud ko isolated rakhna. Aise bahut sare concerns hain maa-baap ke aur utne he concerns hai bacchon ke jinhe lagta hai ki unke parents unhe nahi samajh rahe hain, ya unhe zyada control kar rahe hain. Yeh sari baatein dono he parties ko pareshan karti hain. Toh chaliye is ice ko break karte hain aur jaante hain inh problems ke solutions ko.

title: How To Live A Great Life On Low Salary
description: Kya aap apni kam salary se pareshan hain aur behtar zindagi ka sapna dekhte hain? Chaliye, sochiye, ek aisi duniya jahan paison ki kami aapki khushiyan nahi rok sakti. Yeh Original Series apki isi soch ko sach karne ke qareeb lekar jaayegi. Is show mein aapko apni salary ko lekar aisi practical strategies janne ko milengi jisse aap aapke financial limitations ke bandhan se mukt ho sakein aur asli khushi ka matlab khoj sakein.

title: The Power of Spoken Words
description: Humaare shabdon mein humaare jeevan ko badalane ki shakti hai. Hum kaise bolate hain, aur isiliye hum kaise sochate hain, iss par adhik dhyaan dekar, hum apanee paristhitiyon ko behtar bana sakte hain. The Power of the Spoken Word aapko madat karenge aapke jeevan mein positive changes laane mein joh aap humesha se chahte the.

title: Simple Marketing Plan For Small Businesses
description: Kya aapne bhi apne dimag mein kai baar 'Chalo koi business shuru karte hai' wale khayal ko dimag mein hi maar diya hai? Business shuru toh kar denge magar usko sahi tarike se market kaise kiya jaaye is competition ki duniya mein...kya ye khayal aapko bhi satata hai? Aap ka jawab hai, ye show! Suniye chhote se chhote business ko smartly market karne ke badhiya ways is show mein

title: How to attract wealth this Diwali : The astrological way
description: Diwali ka tyohar bharat main bahut dhoom dham se manaya jata hai or ye bhi mana jata hai ki iss din Maa Lakshmi hamare ghar aate hain. Par kuch simple tips se ham Maa Lakshmi ko prasann kar sakte hain jisse hamare ghar mein samridhi a sakte hai. Kya hai wo baatein jisse Maa Lakshmi aap par kripa kar sakte hain, ye janne ke liye suniye hamara ye show.

title: The Science of Getting Rich
description: Discover the Secrets to Wealth

title: फँस जाओ मेरे लिए
description:
औरत कभी उधार नहीं रखती। मौहब्बत,इज्ज़त,नफ़रत,वफ़ा सब दोगुना करके लौटाती है। ऐसी ही रीटा सान्याल थी। वह जितनी खूबसूरत थी, उतनी ही खतरनाक भी। अपनी माँ की तबाह हो चुकी ज़िन्दगी का बदला लेने के लिए उसने अपने दिमाग की बदौलत कई सारे ऐसे मर्डर की प्लानिंग रच डाली कि पोस्टमार्टम तक में साबित न हो पाया कि वह मर्डर है। कानून ने भी उन्हें साधारण मौत समझा।

आखिर मैडिकल साइंस, पोस्टमार्टम रिपोर्ट्स और पुलिस इन्वेस्टीगेशन को कैसे चकमा दिया उसने? आपने सोचा भी न होगा कि किसी के मर्डर की इस तरह भी प्लानिंग रची जा सकती है।

दिमाग का ज़बरदस्त चक्रव्यूह।

यह बेहद शानदार थ्रिलर है, जिसे आप बार-बार सुनना चाहेंगे।

title: Mastering The Art of Network Marketing
description: Digital duniya ke is daur mein jahan network marketing 9 to 5 job ke culture ko beat kar rhi hai vahin humein apne mann mutabik kaam karne ki bhi ijazat deti hain. Yeh ek aisa business hai jahan na to koi kisi ka boss hai aur na hi kaam ki bandishein. Lekin ismein har koi aasaani se master nahi ban pata hai. Kuku FM par is Original Series mein aap network marketing mein master banne ki inhi tactics ko seekhenge aur is mein kaise successful ban sakte hain yeh bhi jaan jayenge.

title: Agni Si Paavan : Siya
description: Kya aapko pata hai ek aisa bhi Ramayan hai jisme Maa Sita ko Ravan ki beti mana jata hai? Ek aisa Ramayan jahan Sahastra Ravan ka vadh Shri Ram nahi balki Bhadrakali ka roop le kar Maa Sita karti hain? Kehte hai Shri Ram ne anant bar janam liya hai aur anant baar Ramayan likha gaya hai, par har Ramayan mein Sita Mata hi hain jo utni hi majboot, saumya aur swatantra hain. Maa Sita ki adbhut kahani, aaiye sunte hain Kuku FM ki is khas peshkash mein!

title: Story of Bear and Bull
description: Stock Market Duniya ki sabse competitive Field mani jati hai. Aur tabhi is field mein Kadam rakhne se pehle hazar bar sochna  padta hai. Lekin A Random Walk Down Wall Street, Paise Se kharidi ja sakne wali Stock Market ki ek sabse acchi investment guide hai. Isko Sunke aap  badi Aasani se 'Wall Street' ki basic terminology ko sikh sakte hain. Iske sath  ye aapko user-friendly, long-range investment strategy ki madat se Street ko navigate karna bhi sikhati hai.

title: The Art of War
description: Duniya ki Most Famous Warfare Strategies.

title: Qaatil Mera Aashiq
description: Is Sheher Par Varun Shukla Naam Ke Ek Khatarnaak Gangster Ka Hai Raaj. Sheher Ki Hawayein Bhi Varun Shukla Ke Naam Se Khaati Hain Khauf. Logon Ke Seene Mein Dar Aur Dehshat Paida Karne Wale Varun Shukla Ki Zindagi Ko Tabaah Karne Ke liye Hoti Hai Is Khaas Shakhs Ki Entry. Gangster Ki Beti Banegi Iski Hathiyaar Aur Nishaane Par Hoga Varun Shukla. ACP Kirti Ke Tevar Se Aa Jaayega Is Kahani Mein Naya Mod. Pyar, Dhokha, Khoon, Dar Aur Badle Ki Is Kahaani Mein Kiski Hogi Jeet? Kya Hogi Qaatil Ki Asli Pehchaan? In Paheliyo'n Ko Suljhaane Ke Liye Suniye Ye Kahaani.

title: तुझ संग प्रीत लगाई
description:
हरियाणवी छोरा भौतिक शहर में पढ़ाई करने आता है, जहां उसका सामना कॉलेज और हॉस्‍टल लाइफ से होता है। भौतिक को शलिनी से प्‍यार हो जाता है, लेकिन कुछ ऐसा होता है और दोनों की राहें अलग हो जाती हैं। सालों बाद फिर वे मिलते हैं लेकिन इस मिलन में किसी अनजान लड़की का योगदान है। कौन है ये लड़की? किस कारण भौतिक और शालिनी अलग हुए थे? प्‍यार, दोस्‍ती, दुश्‍मनी और रहस्‍य से भरी यह कहानी आपको झकझोर कर रख देगी।
Voiceover Artist : Mohil
Author : मनीष पांडेय 'रूद्र'
Script Writer : मनीष पांडेय 'रूद्र'

title: Train Your Brain To Think Better
description: Aapko jankar hairani hogi ki duniya mein sirf do tarah ke log nahi hote. Balki unka mindset bhi do tarah ka hota hai. Tabhi to kuch log apne mindset ka istemal kar leader ban jate hai, to kuch bas unke followers bankar reh jate hai. Sawal yahan ye hai ki leader bane logon ke mindset mein aisa kya anokha hota hai, jo humare paas nahi hai. Iska jawab hai Train your Brain to think Better ki is audiobook mein. Ye audiobook aapko batayegi ki kaise sirf apne mindset se aap aadhi jung jeet sakte hai. Agar aapko "Moonwalking with Einstein" jaisi books pasand to ye audiobook aap zaroor sunein.

title: Grahakon Ko Khush Rakhna Seekhen
description: Kisi Bhi Business Ko Successful Bnane Ke Liye Customers Ko Khush Rakhna Bahut Zaroori Hai. Lekin Aaj Ki Is Bhagti-Daudti Duniya Mein Har Customer Ko Proper Attention Dena Aur Unse Lambe Samay Tak Acche Rishte Bana Kar Rakhna Mushkil Hota Ja Raha Hai. Chaliye Is Audiobook Ke Zariye Jaante Hain Customers Ko Khush Rakhne Ki Wo Sari Tips And Tricks Jo Aapke Business Ko Growth Karne Mein Aapki Madad Karengi.

title: Decoding Universe
description: Bachpan se Aapke man me bhi aasman ko dekhkar ye sawal aata hi hoga ki kaise bana hai hamara universe? Tare kya hote hain? Prithvi kyu ghoomti hai etc. Aur in sab sawalon ke jawab mile aapko Science mein. Lekin abhi bhi universe se jude bahut se jawab aap ko nahin pata honge isiliye to hum aapke liye laaye hain Decoding Universe  ki book summary. To fir aaiye, jaante hain apne sawalon ke jawab.

title: Jesus Christ - The Son of God
description: Jesus, ek yahudi nav-yuvak jisne first century mein aise chamatkar dikhaye jinke baare me soch pana bhi mushkil tha. Insano ko ishwar se milwaya aur unko negativity se door kiya. Jesus ne ek mare hue ko zinda karke ye saabit kiya ki wo ek aam insaan nahi the. Yahudio ne jo dharm ki paribhasha banai hui thi uske khilaf awaaz uthane wale Jesus Christ hi the. Aaj Christianity sabse zyada follow kiya Jane wala religion hai. Aakhir Jesus ne yahudi religion ke khilaf awaz kyo uthayi aur kaise itne bade religion ko nakar ke ek naye religion ki neev rakhi? Jesus, Jesus Christ kaise bane? Janenge in saare sawalon ke jawab is audiobook me.

title: Positive Thinking
description: Positive Thinking main apki safalta ke darwaje kholne ki taqat hain. Nepolean Hill dwara likhi gayi Positive Thinking book nakaratmak vicharon ko chhor age barne ke lliye prerit karti hain. Safalta ke liye PMA ka niyam behad jaroori hain.Kya ap apni safalta ke liye PMA ka fanda janna chahte hain. To abhi sune Positive Thinking full book keval kukufm  par aur jivan mein uchi udaan bharne ke liye taiyaar ho jaiyye. Agar aapko "The Secret - The Power" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Aakhiri Cheekh
description: Zindagi aur maut se badi sachchai ko kabhi mehsoos kiya hai aapne? Jo janm leta hai wo marta zaroor hai magar yahaan to bhagwaan ke us niyam ko bhi chunauti de diya gya hai. Ek aisi cheekh ki shor me duniya lipti hui hai jisse koi baahar nahi aa sakta. Is poore safar me aapke saath honge 5 Virtues ke sach. Kya aap ise sambhal paayenge? Kya hoga jab insaani duniya achanak se shaitani duniya ban jaayegi? Ufff!! Aage ka raasta mushkil hai. Himmat hai to saath chaliye "Aakhiri Cheekh" Sunne.

title: प्रभात वेला
description: Prabhat vela

title: The Richest Man in Babylon
description: Inspiring Ancient Wisdom for Wealth

title: Ghar Kharidne ki Guide
description: Metro cities mein ghar kharidna koi aasaan baat nahi hai. Humare mann mein kayi saare sawaal aate hi hai jaise, kya ghar jahan le rahe vo area thik hai? Kahin kaagazon mein koi gadbadi to nahi hai? Jo property hum le rahe hain us par koi dispute to nahi chal raha? Toh ab ghar kharidne ke samay mann mein aane wale aise sabhi sawaalon par full stop lagayiye. Kyunki yeh original series apke inn sabhi sawaalon ka jawab hai, jise sun kar aap ghar kharidne ki planning se le kar legally kaise proceed karna hai yeh jaan payenge.

title: History of Hazrat Yusuf
description: Insaan Jab Bahut Si Mushkilon Se Ghira Hua Hota Tab Aksar Uska Allah Par Bharosa Kam Hone Lagta Hai Lekin Wo Log Jo Is Zindagi Aur Duniya Ko Sirf Ek Aazmaish Ki Tarah Dekhte Hain Wo Allah Ka Daman Kabhi Nahi Chhodte. Hazrat Yusuf Alayhi Salaam Ki Zindagi Humein Seekhati Hai Ki Aazmaishon Ka Saamna Kaise Kiya Jaye. Chaliye Sunte Hain Aur Seekhte Hain Zindagi Jeene Ka Sahi Tareeka.

title: India vs China (1962)
description: "Hindi Chini bhai bhai" ye quote to sab ne suna hoga, par jab wahi bhai aapki zamin hadapne ki koshish kare to? indo sino war ek bure sapne ki tarah aaj bhi sare indians ko yaad hai. chaliye dekhte hai itihaas ke wo panne jaha china ne apna aasli rang dikhaya aur indian political confusions, late decisions , leadership changes ne humari army ko confuse kiya par fir bhi humare veer javano ne apne aakhri saans tak jung ladi.

title: 10 Tips To Boost Your Bank Balance
description: Agar aap padhai kar rahe hai to aapko har mahine kuch pocket money milti hai aur har mahine aapke kharche hote hai. Agar aap kahi naukri kar rahe hote hai to aapko har mahine salary milti hai aur har mahine kharche hote hai. To sawal ye hai ki aakhir isme bank balance badhaye kaise ? Humein maloom hai aap bhi chahte hain ki aapka bank balance badhe aur iss audio show mein hum lekar aaye hai '10 Tips to boost your bank balance', jisme hum aapko batayenge kaise aap apne finances ko handle karen aur apna bank balance badhaye

title: Chota Business Bada Profit
description: Apne Chote se Business ko profitable banane ke liye hum humesha se Conventional accounting ka istmal karte aaye hain , Yani ki Sales - Expenses = Profit. Jo ki ek logical formula hai. Lekin yaha problem ye hai  ki chote businesses zyadatar humans dwara hi chalaye jate hain aur hum humans har baar logical nahi hote. Toh aise mein apne chote  business se bada profit nikalne ke liye humein apne andar ek nai tarah ki approach develop karni hogi taki hum har samay sirf is formulae ke hisab se hi na sochte rahen. Aur is approach ko develope karne  ke liye is book summary se accha kuch bhi nahi ho sakta, kyuki ye humein sikhati hai ki kaise hum apne business par attack karne wale in cash eating monsters ka khatma karke apne chote business se bahut bada profit earn kar sakte hain.

title: Get Rich Without Earning More
description: “Get Rich Without Earning More” audiobook ki main character hai “Zoey” jinke paas ek acchi naukri hai ek acchi family hai but still unhe ye feel hota hai ki financially wo accha nahi kar rahi hai aur na kabhi kar payengi, kya aap Zoey ki situation se relate kar paa rahe hai? Iss audiobook “Get Rich Without Earning More” sun kar aapko pata chalega ki kaise hum apni har khwahish ko pura kar sakte hai chahe humari income jo bhi ho. Saath hi saath aap ko pata chalega ki kaise Zoey ne apni life me small changes kar ke apne liye ek financial freedom wali life create kari.

title: Patanjali Aur Ayurvedic Yoga
description: Is Duniya mein badhte shor ke beech humare liye zaroori hai ki hum apne aap ko badhte stress aur kharab health se bacha kar rakhein. Isiliye KUKU FM par suniye Patanjali Aur Ayurvedic Yoga kitab ki is Audiobook ko. Jo aapko Patanjali Yoga aur Ayurveda ki importance samjhayegi aur aapki body ko bimariyon se mukt aur khud ko healthy rakhne ki tips bhi batayegi.

title: Aarushi Talwar - The Most Mysterious Murder Case
description: “Aarushi Case" naam toh aapne suna hi hoga. Ye ek aisa case hai jisse hum sochne par majboor ho jaate hain ki asal gunehgaar kaun tha? Kya Aarushi ke maa-baap ne Aarushi ko mara tha ya phir Hemraj ne? Poora sach janne ke liye suniye ye khaas audioshow.

title: An Intimate Story of Zivame - Richa Kar
description: Black polythene mein chhipa kar bechi jane wali ladies undergarments ab aap online kharid sakte hain, iska credit jata hai Richa Kar ko, jinhone apni revolutionary website Zivame.com se lingerie shopping ko online aur comfortable bana diya. Par iske liye Richa ko kya kya problems face karni padi? Unke is decision par unke parents ka kya reaction tha? Kabhi Bra-panty bechne wali ladki ke naam se badnam Richa Kar kaise bani star entrepreneur? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hain Bharatvarsha: Gautam Buddha
description: Gautam buddha inka janm Lumbini me 563 isa purv Ikshvaku vanshiya kshatriya Shakya kul ke raja Shuddhodhan ke ghar mein hua tha. unki maa ka nam Mahamaya tha, Buddha ke jeevan tyag ki ek badi misal hain. Unke jieevan kayi kathinayi ayi , parantu unhone kabhi satya ki marg nahi chora. Janiye unke anubhab aur kathaye is audiobook par

title: कटी पतंग | महेन्द्रनाथ रामचंद्र प्रभु
description: Kanchan ne rishton par ankh band kar vishwas kiya aur uska parinaam poori jindagi bhugatna pada. Gareebi ke kaaran apni bachchi ka sahi parvarish nahi kar pai. Sab theek ho jaega ki chah me galti par galti hoti gai. Sune poori kahani, jo bikharte rishton ki sachchai bayaan karti hai.

title: The Journey Through Multiple Lifetimes
description: 1980 Mein famous Psychiatrist Doctor Brian Weiss Ke Pass 27 Saal Ki Catherine Naam Ki Ek Ladki Aayi. Jisse Milne Ke Baad Doctor Brian Ki Zindagi Poori Tarah Se Badal Gayi.
