Politics ne sach me aaj ke waqt mein aisa roop le liya hai ki aaye din hume news par Netaon ke bade bade karname dekhne ko milte hai, lekin kahin na kahin aaj bhe hum Indian politics ke baare mein puri tarah nahi hai jaante hain isiliye hum aapke liye lekar aaye hai bilkul original content jiska naam hai "Election Process in India". Is Audio book se aapko har uss Election process ke baare mein pata chalega jo ki shayad abtak aap nahi jaante honge.

title: Detective Ajay - Secret Suicide
description: Jasoos Ajay fas gaya hai ek hi college se judi teen mauton me. Kya yeh teen mautein aapas me judi hui hain? Aakhir inka kya hai raaz? Log kehte hain yeh hain suicides, par Ajay soongh sakta hai door se hi crimes! Kya secret hai in suicides ka?

title: Apne Paise Ko Kaam Par Kaise Lagayein?
description: Life ko enjoy karne ke liye ameer hona zaroori nahi hai, wealthy hona zaroori hai aur wealthy kaise ho sakte hain yeh apko janne ko milega Kuku FM par is Original Series mein, jismein aap wealth kaise bana sakte hain Aur Life ko enjoy kaise kar sakte hain yeh sab kuch seekh paayenge.

title: Ashtavinayak Mandiro ki Kahani
description: Ashtavinayak ki yatra ko hamare Bharat mein sabse pavitra yatrao mein se ek mana jata hai. Magar kya aap iska karan jante hai? Kyun in 8 hi mandiro ka mahatva hai? Kya hai inki kahaniyan? Chaliye jaane!

title: Paison Ka Sahi Istemaal Kaise Karein
description: Iss duniya me aisa kon nahi hoga jo bauth saare paise kama kar khoob ammer aur successful banna chahta hoga, Par log paisa to kama lete hain par usee kaise manage karna hai, Kitni savings karni hai, Kaha kitna invest karna hai aur hume apne zaruraton ko kaise Kam karna hai shayad ye har koi nahi samajh pata. Lekin ab aap bilkul mat ghabraiye kyuki hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain "Paison Ka Sahi Istemaal Kaise Karein" Ki ye audio book jise sun kar aap apne paiso ko sahi tarike se manage kar uska sahi istamal karna sikh paayenge.

title: Mossad - The Greatest Mission of the Israeli Secret Service
description: Jasooso aur khufiya sevao ki duniya humesha se hi parde ke piche, duniya se dur rahi hai. Unke operations aur thikane humesha khufiya hi hote hai. Par yeh audio book "Mossad" The Greatest Mission Of The Israeli Secret Service" iss khufiya agencies ki andheri duniya ko expose karti hai. Iss audio book mein hum Israeli Gupt Seva, Mossad aur unke alag alag peheluo, khufiya gatividhio ke baarein mein janenge saath hi Syrian Atom Service ke naash, Black September aur kaafi prasiddh aur mulyavan Adolf Eichmann par kaise kabza hua Iss ke baarein mein bhi janenge.

title: Business Secrets
description: Business Secrets Ki is AudioBook bahut hi anokhe tarike se design kiya gaya, jaha aapko jyada Theory part nhi milega balki kuch aisi kahavte aur statements milegi jo aapki life ko ek alag hi disha dikha sakti hai. Writer ke alag believe hai is lekhan ko leakr, vo kahte hai ki kabhi kabhi kuch famous statements logo ke liye trigger ka kaam kar jate hai aur Action ho jata hai. isme aise bahut sate Suktiyo yani Axioms ko sajha kiya gaya hai, kuchh famous successful logo ki hai aur kuchh khud writer ke dwara likhi hui. aaiye is AudioBook ka lutf uthaiye.

title: Lights, Camera, Action : Indian Cinema
description: Jis cinema ne kabhi apne tickets chand paison mein beche the, ussi Indian cinema ka revenue aaj 90 billion INR ho gaya hai. Aaj ke samay mein aapko duniya ke kone-kone mein Indian movies release hoti dikhai deti hai. Kayi baar toh South Indian films bhi, Marvel studios se zyada ka kamai kar jati hai. Yeh sabhi jankariyan news ya social media mein bhale bahut quick lage. Lekin, is safar ko tay karne mein Indian Cinema ko pure 126 saal lage hai. Aaiye humare cinema ke issi journey ko jante hai, humari iss audiobook mein.

title: Apni Baaton Se Logon Ko Influence Kijiye
description: Life mein sab kuch kitna easy ho jata hai na jab aap ko yeh malum hota hai ki kaise aap kisi se apni baat ko manwa sakte ho lekin kya aisa har kisi ke sath hai? Haan Bilkul!  KUKU FM par yeh Original Audiobook apko yahi batayegi ki kaise aap kuch words ke her-pher ko samjh kar har baazi ko apne kabze mein kar sakte hain. Aur kisi se bhi apni baat ko manwa sakte hain.

title: Indian Banking System
description: Kabhi Socha hai ki Bank dher saara Paisa kyu nhi chaap dete? Kyu sarkar ek baar mein he saara paisa chaaap kar logo mein baat de sari problem he solve? hai naa?  Jab Paisa Paper ka bana hai aur Machines se chaapa jata hai to kyu sare desho ke economy patri par nahi aasakti ek hi jhatke mein? Aise hi kai atpate sawaal aapko bhi aate honge na jab aap paisa , lenden, forex reserve, bank yeh sare heavy terms sunte hain. Aakhir kaise  chalti hai Desh ki Economy ? Kya hai Banks ka role ? circulation of money kis chidiya ka naam hai? Aise he sare saawalo ka jawab aapko milega iss informative audio series Indian Banking System mein .

title: Finding New Leaders in Your Company
description: Agar aap kisi bhi organization ke leader hain toh ek leader hone ke sath sath aapki ye bhi responsibility honi chahiye ki mujhe jitne ho sake utne aur bhi potential leaders ko taiyaar karna hai. Taki aapke organization mein, jarurat padne par achanak kisi nay leader ki talash na karni pade aur lagatar growth hoti rahe. Lekin humein in leaders ko taiyaar karna kaise hoga? Toh Iske liye ye book summary ek perfect guide hai. Jo ki humein apne aas-pas ke aur leaders ko develope karne ke liye proper planning karna , sahi samay par sahi decisions lena aur strategies banana sikhati hai. Agar aapko "Start With Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Marketing ki ABCD
description: Zamane ka saath saath marketing ke daayre bhi badle hai. Toh sikhe aisi marketing jo aapko 2023 se relevant rakhegi aur aapke brand ko top par layegi!

title: Kaise Bechein Apne Products Online?
description: Kya aap ek online business shuru karna chahte hain ? Ya fir apne chhote business ko bada bnana chahte hain ? Kya aap facebook instagram ka istemal karke apne customers tak pahuchhna chahte hain ? Lekin apko nahi pata shuru kahan se karein ? To yeh course aap ke liye hai. Desh Bhar mein mashoor Ayurveda brand Dr. Vaidya's ko online build karne vaale Arjun Vaidya aur unki co-founder Trisha Rajani KukuFM ke saath milkar aap sab ke liye ek exclusive course lekar aaye hain "Kaise Bechein Apne Products Online?" Jisme aapko Website se lekar Funding Tak ek ek cheez Dr. Vaidya's ko build karne ke personal experiences ke saath batayi jayegi. So dil thaam ke baithein aur enjoy karein yeh course sirf KukuFM par.

title: Monopoly Business Kaise Create Karein?
description: Kya aapke paas koi "Business Idea" Hai? Agar haan! To kya wo idea market me monopoly create kar sakta hai? Kya wo existing competition ko face kar paayega? Kya wo successful business ban paayega? Agar ye saare sawaal aapke bhi dimaag me ghoomte rehte hai to aapko "Monopoly Business Kaise Create Karein?" ki audiobook me aapke saare sawalon ke jawaab mil jaayenge, aur kya pata aapka business idea bhi ek successful business ban jaaye.

title: Hashimpura 22 May
description: 1987 mein Meerut ke Hashimpura ilaaqe mein dange huye the jahan police ne 50 musalmaano ko goliyon se bhoon diya tha, lekin aisa kya tha is case mein ke Supreme Court tak Is case ko anjaam dene mein 30 saal lag gye? Jaan ne ke liye Suniye Vibhuti Narain Rai Dwara likhi gyi kitaab Hashimpura 22 May ki Audiobook Sirf KukuFm Par.

title: Shri Ram
description: Tretayug mein sampann hui ramayan aaj kalyug mein hindu dharma ki neev hai. Shri Ram, Laxman aur mata Sita ke vanvaas ki kahani bhale hi sab log jaante ho lekin ramayan ke kayi patra aur vanvaas ke dauran ghatne wali kayi ghatnaaon se hum aaj bhi vanchhit hain. Is audiobook mein aap shri ram ke jeevan aur ramayan ki sampoorna katha ko jaan payenge aur shri ram se jude har patra aur unki kahani ko bhi samajh sakenge. Chaliye shuru karte hain maryada purushottamshri ram ki sampoorna katha.

title: Elon Musk Ke Success Secrets
description:
The real life Iron Man - Elon Musk! Yeh audiobook listeners ke liye ek vishesh blueprint hai jo Elon Musk ke rahasyon ko jaanna chaahte hain aur unki pratibha ki antardrashti seekhna chaahte hain. Elon Musk ek entreprenuer aur business magnet hain. Wah SPACE X ke FOUNDER, CEO aur chief engineer hain.

Tesla ink. ke ek praarambhik charan ke niveshak, CEO aur product architect. Wah 'The Boring Company' ke sansthaapak aur Neuralink and OpenAI ke co-founder bhi hain. Ek karodpati, Musk duniya ke sabse ameer logo mein se ek hai. Aaiye jaante hain unki kahaani aur mangal par maanavta ko lekar unka sapna.

title: दिल से दिल तक
description: Shivam Ma ka ladla aur gussail Mijaj ka hai. Kahani mein entry hoti hai Ananya ki, jo seedhi saral aur samajhdaar ladki hai. Ananya ki sautli ma aur behan hai, jo use pareshan karti hai. Shivam aur Ananya ki mulakaat hoti hai, lekin behan Riya ko pasand nahi aata, kyunki vah Shivam ko pasand karti hai man hi man. To ab Kahani mein kya hoga? Shivam ke gussail Mijaz ko Ananya jhel payegi? Inki love hemistry  mai kya twist aayega? Janne ke liye sune puri kahani.

title: Marriage Deal
description: Bholi Bhali Ananya jis insaan se koson door bhagti thi, Lekin takdir ne usse hi, Uska life partner bana diya. Ek deal ke tehat hoti hai Anaya aur Amar ki Shadi ! To kya yai deal kabhi pyaar mein badlegi? Janane ke liye sune puri kahani sirf Kuku FM par.

title: पराई आत्माओं का शरीर
description: Shivam ke Sarir mei athmayo pravesh karne lagti hei. Vaha kissi bhi atma ko apne sharir mei 6 ghante tak rak shakta hei. Uss Atmao ko vash mei karne bhi aata hei aur yaha daravana kam vaha apne hostel mei suru karta hei. waha Hostel ke kahi atmao se sampark karta hei. Iss kam mei shivam ko maja aata hei. Haunted Hostel mei Shivam aab kya karega? Jannr ke liye Sunne Puri Kahani.

title: The Communist Manifesto
description: Marx ki ideology se panpi yeh vishwa prasiddha jeevan shaili bade bade etihaas ke pal aur naye desho ke nirmaan ka kaaran rahi hai. Originally, yeh Communist Party ke manifesto ke roop mein saamne aaya, jab jo do German philosophers Karl Marx aur Friedrich Engels ne ek pamphlet ke roop mein in vichaaro ko chapvaaya tha. Labour class ka parcham, unka sanvidhaan aur unke symbol par bane auzaaro ki buniyaad hai communist manifesto. Capitalism ki sabse badi takkar 'Communism' ke roop mein hi rahi jo global dominance, cold war aur world ideologies ke roop mein takraayi.

title: Unusual Villages of India
description: Bharat Gaanvon ka desh hai jahan 80% se zyada abaadi gaanvon mein hi rehti hai. Lekin kya aapne kabhi kisi aise gaanv ke baaare mein suna hai jahan sab judwa hon? Ya, fir sab crorepati hon? Agar nahi to yeh audiobook aap ke liye hai. Suniye "Unusual villages of India" yaani bharat ke ajeebo gareeb gaanv sirf KukuFM par.

title: Mann Ke Rahasya
description: Insaan ka mann apne aap mein ek brahmaand hai. Ek aisa brahmaand jiski ab tak hum sirf parat hi choon paaye hai aur jiski gehraai ka aadam zaat ko ab tak koi andaaza nahi. Theek usi tarah humare mann ki gehraaiyo mein bhi aise anginat rahasya chupe hai, jinhe jaan aur samajhkar insaan ek naye jeevan ke darwaaze ko khol sakta hai. Suniye is naayab audiobook ko, jise likha hai Dr. Abrar Multani ne. Jaaniye, 'Mann ke Rahasya'.

title: Jhulan Goswami: Story of Chakda Xpress
description: Ladkiyan Cricket nahi khel sakti, Bengal ke Chakda mein rehnewali Jhulan Goswami ke liye ek vo samay tha aur ek aaj jab vo world ki sabse zyada wickets lene wali women's cricketer hain. KUKU FM ke is original show mein janiye Unki, Jhulan Goswami se Chakda Xpress banne ki kahani.

title: How To Sleep Better
description: Aapne kabhi yeh notice kiya hai ki, jab aap raat ko kam soye ho, to dusre din aapko bhukh badh jati hai ? Ye koi coincidence nahi hai. Hamare andar ek hormone hota hai, jo hamare brain ko signal deti hai ki bas, ab pet bhar gaya hai. Agar hum thik se nahi sote to ye hormone ka level gir jata aur pet bhar jane ke baad bhi hum khate rehte hai ? Itna hi nahi, achi neend na mil pane se aur bhi bahut nuksan hote jaise hamari immunity, hamari memory weak hoti hai. Hum thik se kaam nahi kar pate, hamara metabolism weak ho jata hai. To inn sab ko rokne ke liye aur ek achi neend kaise ki jaye, iske fayde kya hai ? Janne ke liye, suniye yeh audiobook

title: Positive Effects of Trusting People Around You
description: Is baat se koi inkaar nahi kar sakta ki duniya sirf bharose aur vishawas par chal rhai hai, Chahe hum kisi rishtey ki baat karen, Kisi team, Pariwar ya is Desh ki he baat kar lijiye sabkuch bharose pe he to chal rha hai, Aur shayad bharosa he hata diya jae to sab  kuch ek pal me bikhar sakta hai aur is Audio Book " Positive Effects of Trusting People Around You" mein hume inhe chezoo par discuss Kiya hai, Ki aap kaise kisi par bharosa kar sakte hain, kaise kisi ka bharosa Jeet Sakte hain aur aapko aise kon kon se habits apnani chahiye jisse log aap par bharosa kare. Aur sath he sath us bharose ko kaise barkarar rakhna hai un sabke bare mein zikar hai is Audio show mein. Agar aapko "The Secret - The Power" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Samrat Prithvi Raj Chauhan
description:
Bharat ke itihasa mein Samrat Prithviraj Chauhan ke raj ka samay kuch esa likha hai, ki aaj bhi unse judi baatein har Hindustani ka seena garv se choda kar deti hai. 
Is show mein apko shoorveer yoddha Samrat Prithviraj chauhan ki zindagi se judi kayi esi baatein pata chalengi, jo apko apne Bharat ke itehaas par garv karne ke aur bhi jyada prerit karengi.

title: How To Improve Your Focus
description: Humara dimag humare sharir ka software hai, aur jis tarah se computer ka software jitna accha aur advance hota hai, utna hi computer fast aur accurate kaam karta hai. Theek usi tarah se agar humara dimag jitna humare control mein rahega aur jitna sahi disha mein kaam karega, humari life utni hi behtar hogi. Aur yeh audiobook aapko aapke dimag ko behtar banane mein help karegi. Aap na sirf yeh janenge ki humara dimag kya kya kar sakta hai, balki yeh bhi janenge ki hum apne dimag ke sath kya kya kar sakte hai

title: The Confusion Free Life
description: Kya aapne kabhi kisi interview mein kisi insan ki life ki situation ko suna aur kaha hai  "are yeh hubahu mere sath bhi tha lekin mujhe samajh nahi aaya ki main us situation mein kya karun?" To yeh Original Show apke liye hi hai jismein hum aapko alag-alag logon ki problems ke letters ko unke solution ke saath batayenge jinmein apki life ya love story bhi kahin chhupi mil jaayegi. To chaliye shuru karte hain letters ke is safar ko aur jaaniye kiski Life Story ya letter apka bhi letter hai.

title: 10 Things That Keep You Poor Forever
description: Aksar aapne yeh suna hoga ki "ameer aur ameer ban raha hai aur gareeb aur gareeb banta ja raha hai." Lekin iska reason aur solution kya hai? Yeh sab kuch aap jaanege humari is Original series mein. Jismein hum Indians ki kuch aisi aadaton ki baat ki gayi hai jo shayad aap bhi jaane anjaane mein karte honge. To chaliye ab samay hai in aadaton ko sudharne ka aur ek better financial future taiyaar karne ka.

title: Mahatma Gandhi: Rashtra Pita ki kahani
description: Rastra Pita - Mahatma Gandhi, itihas me un logon mein se hain jinke vichar duniya ke har kone mein apnaye jaate hain. Par fir bhi nayi generation kahin na kahin aadha sach sunkar unki “leadership, Political, Ahinsa” ki ideology ko nakar deti hai. Chaliye jaante hain Naresh Dadhich ki likhi is kitab mein, Gandhi ji ke struggle se lekar humein azadi dilane tak ki poori journey ko. Jisse hum bhi nayi genration ko humare rastra pita ke baare me bata sake.

title: Gaadi Chalaao Aur Paisa kamaao
description: Aapko agar driving ka shauq hai toh aap isko bahut aasaani se monetary benefit mein badal sakte hain. Phir chahe aap pehle se hi ek working professional kyun na ho, lekin roz office time ke baad aur weekend mein jo gap aata hai usmein part time driving ki jaa sakti hai. Cab driver ke taur par kaam karna shayad aapki career list mein naa ho lekin is line mein profit ka level bahut high hai. Jiski poori jaankari ke liye abhi suniye KUKU FM ka ye original show.

title: Good Night Darling
description:
Hotel ke room me ek raat Anvesha ka rape ho jata hai. Use lagta hai ki uska rape serial killer “hairdresser” ne kiya hai par Anvesha na apna rape saabit kar paati hai aur naa hi apne room me us serial killer ki mauzoodagi. Apne padosi ko uska package dene gai anvesha aise haalaaton me ghir jaati hai ki vo apne padosi ko hairdresser samjh pahle uska  phir apne pati Akash ka katl kar deti hai.
Is apradh kii saja se bachane ke liye Anvesha ke uncle aur vakeel  Neeraj use mental asylum bhej dete hain. Par wahan maujood psychiatrist Dr. Purab Anvesha ko uske zurm ki saja dilwana chahte hain.. Kya Neeraj Anvesha ko bacha payenge? Kya Purab anvesha ko faansi ki saja dilwa  payega? Akhir kaun hai hairdresser killer aur uska kya rishta hai Anvesha se? Janne ke liye sune Good Night Darling sirf KukuFm par.

title: Baniye Money Management Mein Master
description: Aaj Kal humari paisa kharch karne ki aadat bahut hi jaldi badal rahi hai, kyunki humare paas easily transaction karne ke liye options available hai, jaise ab market mein credit card aasani se mil jata hai, ghoomne ke liye bhi loan milta hai, no cost emi aa gayi hai aur upi payment bhi hai. Inn sab se hume feel nahi hota ki actual mein hum kitna paisa kharch kar rahe hai. To Aise mein apne paiso ko kaise bachaye ? Kaise unhe invest kare aur kaise humari mehnat se kamaye gaye paise ko acche se manage kare? Janne ke liye suniye yeh audio show. Agar aapko Why Didn't they teach me this In School jaisi book pasand hai to aapko ye audiobook zaroor pasand aayegi.

title: Kaise Rakhein Apne Dimaag Ko Control Mein ?
description: Hum sab jaante hain ki Chimpanzee se he hum manav jati ki nirmaan huwa hai aur ab to Scientist ne bhe is baat ko Maan liya hai. Usi tarh humara dimaag bhe do hisson me bata huwa hai shayad aapko sunkar ye atpata lag raha hoga par is Audio Book mein Writer ne bade he ache tariker se is baat ko samjhane ki koshish ki hai. Aakhir hum achanak se khus se naakhus kyu ho jaate hain, kyu hum achanak se pareshan ho jaate hain. Kyu hum achanak se Depression me chale jaate hain, Ye sab humare dimaag ka kheel hai. Aur aapko bhe janna hai ki insab ko kaise control karna hai to ye Audio Book bilkul aapke liye hai.

title: Startup Ko Successful Banane Ke Easy Steps
description: Jab bhi hum Entrepreneurship aur Business ke baare mein sochte hain to sabse pehle humare man mein khayal aata hai ki aakhir kis cheez ka Business kiya jaaye jo sabse alag aur hat kar ho, Aakhir kaise uss Business ko aage badhaya jae aur aakhir kaise hume usme success milegi, Agar aapke man main bhi yahi saare confusion hain ki konsa Business karna chahiye, Kitne paise lagana chahiye, Aur Business ko aage kaise badhana  chahiye to ye "Startup Ko Successful Banane Ke Easy Steps" ki ye Audio Book bilkul aapke liye hai.

title: Mahabharat
description:
Mahabharat, Hindu dharm ke pramukh grantho mein se ek. Dekha jaye toh Mahabharat sirf ek granth hi nahi, balki woh itihaas hai jo har kisi ke kal aaj aur ane wale kal ka hissa hai. 
shree Krishan ki sikhaye uddesh, Mahabharat me hone wala har ek vakya hume zindagi jeene ke kai trike sikhata hai. 
Usi mahan granth ki gatha le kar pesh hai kuku FM aap sabhi ke leye ek romanchak trike se.

title: Detective Ragini- Bachna Hai Mushkil
description: Detective Ragini haazir hai! Apne boss Detective Anuj ki kami ko pura karne aur ek bahut uljhi murder mystery ko suljhane aa rahi hai Delhi ki one of the best private investigator- Ragini. Detective Ragini ke hath laga hai apne parivar ke murder ke ilzam mein jail mein band Shweta ka letter. Kaise suljhayegi Ragini uljhe hue rishton ka khooni affair? Kya investigation se sach samne ayega? Ya Ragini ke pehle case par hi milegi kisi begunah ko gunah ki saza??

title: Maratha Empire in India
description: Jai Shivaji - Jai Bhavani!! Yeh jaighosh jaha jaha, Maratha vaha vaha. Marathi zubaan bolne wale, puran poli aur bhaakri khaane wale aur ghaat ke kinaare rehne wale yeh shoorveer Marathe, waqt aane par dhaal aur hathiyaar dono utha sakte hai. 1674 se Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj ke rajyabhishkeh ke saath Maratha Empire ke golden era ki shuruaat hui, jisne Shahu Maharaj aur Peshwai vanshaj ko janm diya. Bharat ki dharti par kesariya jhande ka sabse bada pratik, deccan ke yeh veer maratho ne Mughal, Angrez aur Portuguese sabhi se apne Swarajya ke haq ke liye ladte reh aur asli Maratha kya hota hai yeh puri duniya ko batlaaya! Chala aiku yaa gaatha 'Maratha Samrajaanchi'!

title: Business mein customers ko kaise retain karein?
description: Ye book summary economics ke theoretical knowledge ke beyond jaa kar aapko business ke practical insights degi. Ki kaise real mein bade bade businessmen apne companies ko behtar banane ke liye kai methods ka istemaal karte hai aur jaan lete hai ki naye customers ke saath saath purane customers bhi kaise retain kiye jaaye. Agar aapko "Built To Last" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: How To Use Instagram To Promote Your Business
description: Kya aapko pata hai aap ghar baithe baithe apne product ya dukaan ke order 10 guna tak badha sakte hain ? Kaise ? Instagram se. Ji haan, Vohi Instagram jise aap free time mein entertainment ke liye istemaal karte hain. Aap us se apna business bhi boost kar sakte hain. KukuFM aap ke liye laya hai yeh audio book jise sunkar aap asaani se apna ek instagram business account set up kr sakte hain aur apne dhandhe ki marketing kar skte hain.

title: Finland: Happiest Country In The World
description: Finland duniya ki ek sabse khushhaal country hai, Yahan ke log apni zindagi bade mast tareeke se jeete hain. Wahin agar aap baaki countries ko dekhe to zyadatar aaj stress, anxiety, depression aur unemployment ka shikar hai, to Finland Country mein aisa kya hai? Wahan ka culture kaisa hai? Wahan ke logon ki education structure kaisa hai? vaha ki government kaise work karti hai? Aise bahut sare questions ke answers aapko is series mein milenge. To fir chaliye apni seatbelt bandh lijiye, chalte hain Finland ke safar mein sirf kuku fm ke saath.

title: तुम मेरी हो
description: Apne Bhai Raghav ke liye ladki dekhne gaie Aman aur uski Maa ko neha ke Saath Uski Behen Saloni bhi pasand aa jati hei. Aman saloni ko propose karta hei. saloni ke dil mei bhi haa hei lekin apni chahat ko jahir nahi karti. Usske Iss vyavahar se Aman ki Maa behed aahad hoti hei. Iss bich ek ke badh ek kahi ghatnaie hoti hei, jyo Tootein parivaar ko ek dusre ke Sath aur bhi kharib laati hei. Aman Ko Saloni ka pyaar ek naya roop mei hasil hota hei.

title: NCERT Class 11th Geography Part-1
description: Yeh Class 11th ki NCERT Geography book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap The Earth, Landforms and Ocean Water jaise topics ko achhe se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: LTTE and Prabhakaran
description: Bharat na apne ek kabil politician Rajiv Gandhi ko LTTE or Prabhakaran ke hathon kho diya tha. Par sawal ata hai ki civil war toh Sri Lanka main chal raha tha, aur Prabhakaran ne LTTE ki sathapana Sri Lanka main ki thi, toh aisa kya hua ki bharat ko apna ek neta khona pada? kyon iss civil war main bharat ne apni Indian Army ko Sri Lanka bheja? aur aakhir kiss tarah Sri Lanka main iss khooni ladai ka ant hua,? Aaiye pata lagaate hai iss audiobook se. Agar aapko India after Gandhi jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: रिफ्यूजी कैंप
description:
‘रिफ्यूजी कैंप’ भारत के लोगों की एक अद्भुत यात्रा है, जो अपनी तकलीफों के अंत के लिए चमत्कार की राह देखते हैं, पर यह नहीं समझ पाते कि वे खुद ही वो चमत्कार हैं। जब तक लोग खुद नहीं जगेंगे, तब तक कुछ नहीं बदलेगा। मुझे पता है, उम्मीद की इस कहानी को लिखने की प्रेणा लेखक को उनकी बेटी से मिली है, जो यह जानना चाहती थी कि क्या वह अपने पुरखों की धरती कश्मीर की घाटी में लौट पाएगी?
writer: आशीष कौल
Voiceover Artist : ASHUTOSH
Author : Ashish Kaul

title: Master The Art Of Creative Thinking
description: "Aree bhai itna tough bhi nahi hai yeh kaam koi Rocket Science thodi hai ke samajh na aaye ." Kya aapne socha hai ki yeh rocket science itna mushkil subject kyun hai? Earth par reh kar moon ke equations solve karo aur galati ka koi scope nahi, aakhir kaise hote hai wo log jo bante hain rocket scientist ? Kya wo bhi hum aur aap jaisa hi sochte hain ya unka sochna thoda sa quirky hai ?  Aakhir what makes them decipher the toughest science on earth, sunnaa chahenge aap ? Toh Suniye yeh amazing book jo ke likhi hai Ozan Varol ne jisse aap soch sakte hain waisa jaisa sochte hain Rocket Scientists .Toh sune yeh Audiobook Summary KUKU FM par.

title: The Ventilator Project : How IIT Kanpur Saved India
description: Saal 2020,  China ki  Wuhan city se nikala corona virus lagbhag poori duniya mein fail chuka tha. Charo taraf hahakaar macha tha. India bhi poori tarah Lockdown mein tha. Saare hospitals medicines , ventilators aur oxygen ki kami se joojh rahe the. Tab Desh ke kaam aaya IIT Kanpur. Jahan ke logo ne itni tezi se deshwasiyon ko bachane ke liye ventilators banaye jo ek record bana aur lakhon logon ki jaan bachi. Lekin kaise hua ye kaarnama? Batane ja rahe hain Is Audiobook "The Ventilator Project : How IIT Kanpur Saved India" mein.

title: Success Habits
description: Kya aap daulat, shohrat aur khushiyan hasil karna chahate hain? Kya aap chahate hain ki kamyabi aapke kadam choome, har koi aapko salaam kare? To jane kaun si wo aadate hain, jo aapko yah sab dila sakti hain. Abhi sune 'Safalta ke liye 13 sarvashreshth aadaten' audiobook keval Kuku FM par. Agar aapko "Rich Habits: The Daily Success Habits of Wealthy" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: University - Patna, Politics aur Pyaar
description: 1990 Ka wo daur jahaa'n bihar me student politics apne poore varchasv par tha. Kai Bade Bade Raajnetaaon Ki dukaan bhi Chhatra Rajneeti se hi chalti thi. Yahi wo waqt tha jab bihar ke patna mein jaatiwad jaisi bimari khuli hawa mein saans le rahi thi. Isi dauran lower middle class aur caste discrimination se tabaah 21 saal Ke Suraj ki entry hoti hai Patna Janta Vishwavidyalaya mein aur phir shuru hota Hai Rajneeti ka ganda khel. University ne Suraj ke marzi ke bina hi use student politics ka Poster Boy bana diya tha. Kaun tha is University Ka King aur kis pyade ne macha di poore system mein Khalbali? Kya Suraj ki Mohabbat bhi jaati vyawastha ka shikhar hogi? Kya Suraj jaisa ordinary student is pratishodh ki mehengi Raajneeti ko karara jawab de payega? Suniye Chhatra-Rajneeti Ki Mind Blasting Political Thriller Kahani Jisme Suspense, Romance, Action, Addiction aur Revenge Ka lga hai Bharpoor Tadka. Aaiye Chalte Hain University Ke Andar!

title: Sarabjit
description: Bharat Pakistan border ke pass Tarn Taran district ka Sarabjit 30 August, 1990 ki raat ko galti se chalte hue Pakistan seema par kar jata hai, jahan use Pakistani army arrest kar leti hai. Aur kuch dino ke andar hi Bharat ka Sarabjit, Pakistan ke liye kabhi RAW Agent, to kabhi Pakistani terrorist Manjeet Singh, toh kabhi deshdrohi Khushi Mohammad ban jata hai. Par kabhi zinda vapas Bharat nahi aa pata. Kya sach mein Sarabjit koi RAW Agent tha? Ya tha wo sadharan sa kisan?

title: लड़की अनजानी सी
description: Pehli Bar Jab Usne apne naie makan malkin pr nazar Gadaie, Jyo ek Vidhva aur usse Ghyarah Saal badi hei, toh usse ek mauka dikhaie padta hei. Uske Paas Ameer baneka ka ek plan hota hei aur waha usse puri karne ke liye kadi mehnat karta hei, jab tak ki uski mulakat Pihu se nahi hoti. Waha ek Aprepakva Teenage  hei, Jyo neel ko chahatein hei aur Aankh mund kar maan leti hei ki waah ek farishta hei, jyo usse uski zindagi ki saari Mushkil dur kar degi. Bewajah Ki iss chahat aur plan ka kanta banati pihu  se neel  nafrat karta hei. Lekin Neel ko behetar Insaan banane ke Pihu ke jidd neel ko andar tak jinjorh deti hei. Kya Pihu usse badal payenge? kya Jyo insaan hadho ko paar kar chuki hei, uska hrydya badla?

title: तुझ संग प्रीत लगायी सजना
description: Samar ko seedhe behenji type dikhne waali Neetu paheli najar mein hi pasand aa jaati hai. Gharwale dono ki shaadi tay kar dete hai lekin Neetu ki chachi Renuka aur uski beti ke sasuraal waale ki wajah se Neetu khud apni shaadi tod deti hai. Property ki laalach mein Renuka ne yeh sab kiya hai. To kya Samar aur Neety ka pyaar adhura rah jaayega? Kya Neetu ki Ma jo bachpan mein chodkar chali gayi thi, wapas aayegi kya renuka ka pardafaash ho payega? Rishto ke utaar-chadhaav aur pyaar ki dor se bandhu sune kahani Tujh Sang Preet Lagaayi Sajhna.

title: The Dark Side of Silicon Valley
description: Har koi apni life main successful, ameer or famous hona chahta hai or kabhi kabhi ye chahat kae logon ko galat kam karne pae bhi majboor kardete hai. Iss audio main aap sunenge Elizabeth Holmes kae bare main jiss main successful hone kae sare gun the par patience nahi tha, tabhi jaldi ameer hone ki cha main unhone racha Silicone Valley ka sabse bada scam. Kya tha aisa scam, kaise thi unki journey or aj kahan hain Elizabeth Homes ye sab janne kae liye suneye The Dark Side of Silicone Valley.

title: Sarabjit Singh Ki Ajeeb Dastan
description: Ek galti ki saza kitni badi ho sakti hai kabhi socha hai aapne? Saza aisi ki sirf naam ke confusion se aapko faansi ki saza suna di jaaye aur uske saath-saath apne desh bhi na lautne diya jaaye. Yahan tak ki aapka vaqeel aapke liye hi stand na lein toh kya aisi saza koi insaan seh paayega? Aisa hi kuch hua India ke Sarabjit Singh ke sath lekin  kya thi unki poori story? Yeh sunne ko milega aapko humare is show "Sarabjit Singh Ki Ajeeb Dastan" mein. To chaliye shuru karte hain.

title: NCERT Class 11th Political Science Part-2
description: Yeh Class 11th ki NCERT Political Science book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Political Theory, Citizenship, Nationalism, Secularism jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Undisclosed Stories Behind 5 Star Restaurants
description: Agar aapko Masterchef show pasand hai ya fir aapka ek restaurant business kholne ka sapna hai to ye show ko aapke liye hi bana hai. Food industry ke peeche ki haqeeqat ho ya fir ek chef ka struggle aapko saare qisse is show me sunne ko milenge. Waise is show ko  agar aap cooking karte hue ya khaana khaate hue sunenge to aur bhi maza aayega, to chaliye shuru karte hai.

title: Veer Hanuman
description: Jai Shri Ram ka jaap jiske jeevan ka arth ho, Jiske Jeevan ki har kathinai ka hal swayam shri Ram ho. Unhi Pavanaputr Veer Hanuman ki gatha aap tak le kar aye hai hum. Kya apko pata hai ki aaj bhi kai log aisa mante hai ki Hanuman Bhagwan aaj bhi jeevit hai? Veer Hanuman se jude aise hi kai sawal aaj bhi logo ke man mein hai. Unhi kuch sawalon ke jawab apko milenge is show Veer Hanuman mein.

title: Path Towards Kindness
description: Doston, duniya mein agar kise ne asal main ishwar ko paaya hai ya keh lijiye ke satisfaction ko prapt kiya hai wo log humesha he karuna se bhare log rahe hain. Chahe wo maryada purusottam Ram ho ya humare pyare Krishna dono main aseem prem hai. Bhagwan Buddha bhi toh kitne karunamayi hain jinhone is duniya ko meditation se salvation ka rasta dikha diya. Kya kaaran hai is karuna ka, is pyar ka, hriday pyar se bhara hua ho toh aapki apni life main kya kya badlaav aayenge? Chaliye jaante hain hamari is khaas peshkash mein. Agar aapko Buddha's Brain jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: कुछ अनकहे अलफ़ाज़
description: Ayushi aur Rajiv jab das saal baad ek dusre se milte hei, toh purani yaado Taaja ho jaati hei. Dono college mei bahut ache dost hua karte the. Waqt ne dono ko ek dusre se alag kar diya. Kuch baatein reh gaie Aan kahi si. Kya Aab donno ek dusre se apne maan ki baath kar payenge??? Dil ki adhuri Tamanna....Kuch Aankahi baathein....Adure lamhe ko kya donno pura kar payenge vartaman mei????

title: The National Debt: Sach Ya Jhooth
description: Kya aapko pata hai ki sarkaar jaan bujhkar desh mein mehangayi ko badhaati hai? Agar aapko international politics aur economy mein interest hai to yeh show aapke liye hai. Is show mein apko jaanne milega ki neta kaise economy kharab hone ka reason kisi na kisi cheez ki deficit yani kami ko bataate hain lekin yeh sach nahi hota. Yeh sab world bank ke saamne khud ko debt mein dikhane ke liye kiya jaata hai. Jaaniye international economy kaise kaam karti hai? Hamare is show mein. Agar aapko "Principles For Dealing With The Changing World Order" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Rise of China
description: China aaj duniya ka tezi se ubharta hua desh ban chuka hai. Har kshetra mein China aage nikal raha hai aur ek badi economy ke roop mein ubhar raha hai par china ka origin kaise hua ? Kaise china ek gareeb desh se ek shaktishali desh ke roop mein develop hua ? China kaise ek badi economy ban gayi janiye iss audiobook mein

title: Bhagat Singh
description: Ek yuva jisne sabka Freedom ki taraf dekhne ka nazariyaan hi badal diya. Ek ladka joh sirf krantikaari hi nahi, ek padha likha patrakaar tha, jiski lekhni se nikalne waale saare shabd kisi goliyon se kam nahi the. Jisne bohot hi kam umar mein apni jaan iss desh ke liye tyaag di. Aaiye sunte hai Bhagat Singh ki kahaani.

title: Apne Passion ko Pehchano
description: Aaj kal har koi kehta hai "follow your Passion" but kya ye sahi hai?! kaafi log passion follow karne ke path par jane ke liye apna sab kuch daav par laga dete hai. Passion wo nahi jo waqt ke sath badal jaye! passion wo hai jo kai saalo ki mehnat aur practice se banta hai , Log aksar iss baat se confuse ho jaate hai! So Good they can't ignore you book summary me aap kuch aise rules jaan sakte hai jinse apne aapko inta behtar bana sakte hai ke Success apke piche piche dodti ayegi.  To chaliye sunte hai....

title: Value of Money
description: Shayad ye hum sab jaante hain ki aaj ke waqt mein paise se zyada valuable cheez kuch bhi nahi hai. Paise se lagbhag har wo cheez kharidi ja sakti hai jiske baare mein hum soch bhi nahi sakte. Par ye paisa aata kaha se hai? kya hai aisa jo paise ko itna valuable banati hai? Paisa banne ke piche ki kya kahani hai? Paise ka len den ek desh se dusre desh main kaise hota? Aur aakhir kaise hum is paise ko kaam par laga kar aur bhi zyada paise kama sakte hain? Aise hi kai sawalon ke jawaab aur bahut sare Principle’s ke baare mein bataya gaya hai is Audiobook mein. Agar aapko "Why Didn't they teach me this In School" jaisi books pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: How to control your mind through Meditation
description: Research kehti hai jyadatar bimariyan humare dimag se judi hui hoti hai, humara zaroorat se zyada sochna, Relationship ka stress, career ka stress, jyada paise kamane ka stress in sabki jad humare thoughts se shuru hoti hai, jiske result ke taur par aajkal Health issue badh rahe hai. Meditation yahan bahut important role play karti hai ye humein inner peace ke sath sath humare dimaag ko bhi rest dene ka kaam karti hai. Is AudioBook mein hum janenge Meditation kya hai aur ise kaise apne busy lifestyle ka hissa banaya ja sakta hai. Is AudioBook ki Inspiration Osho ke dwara bataye huye Meditation ke tareeke se li gai hai, to chaliye is safar ki shuruaat karte hai Kuku FM ke sath. Agar aapko Deepak Chopra dwara likhi gayi "Total Meditation" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Stock Market mein Risk kaise lein?
description: Ye book summary stock market mein chal rahe myths se parda uthane ke liye, traders ko apne judgement se pare dekh paane ke liye aur asli maaynbe mein risk aur probability kya hoti hi ye samjhane ke liye hai! Agar aapko "The Little Book that still beats the Market" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Khwabon ka Dream11
description: 25 billion dollar ki fantasy gaming industry ke boom ka credit jata hai Dream11 ke founders Harsh Jain aur Bhavit Sheth ko, jinke big dreams ne almost har cricket fan ka fantasy sports ka shaukeen bana diya. Aaj Dream11 8 billion dollar ki company hai aur fantasy sports duniya ka fastest growing sector. Par Harsh aur Bhavit ne kaise hasil ki ye safalta? Aur iske liye unhe kin mushkilon aur controversies se gujarna pada? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein

title: कातिल हसीना
description:
एक गरीब परिवार की बेटी गरिमा आईएस बनना चाहती थी लेकिन समाज और कानून के ठेकेदार लोगों की दरिंदगी और परिस्थितियों के कारण गरिमा बंदूक उठाने पर मजबूर हो जाती है। आगे चलकर वह बीहड़ की कुख्‍यात डकैतों की मुखिया बन जाती है और अपना बदला लेती है, जिन लोगों के कारण उसे डकैत बनना पड़ता है। चंबल की घाटियों और कुख्‍यात डकैतों की कहानी है।
Author : प्रतिभा सिंह राठौर
Voiceover Artist : RJ Saloni

title: Bhopal Gas Tragedy
description: BHOPAL, is shehar ka apna ek alag hi mizaz hai. Nawabiyat se bhara itihas aur harfanmaula shaukin log. Magar isne ek aisi kaali raat dekhi, jisne iski khubsurti ka gala ghont diya aur pure desh par ek kala saya sa chaa gaya. Voh waqt tha 2 December, 1984 ka jab Union Carbide India Limited pesticide plant se leaked 'Methyl isocyanate' zehrili gas se bekhabar soye hue Bhopaliyo ko hamesha ke liye maut ki need sula diya. Saans nahi li ja rahi thi, khoon ki ulti ho rahi thi. Aisa manzar jo kisi ne bure se bure khwab mein nahi socha hoga. Sarkar aur aam janta dono lachar mehsoos kar rahe the. Aakhir kon tha zimmedaar is haadse ke peeche aur gayi masoom jano ka kya? Kaise yeh shehar ek sath khade hokar is dardnak tragedy se ubhara, aaiye samajhte hai is show mein!

title: Swasth Rahne ka Vigyaan
description: Hamare bade- budhe ek seekh de gae hain ki Sabse pahle apni Sehat apne Swasth ka khayal rakho.To bas apne bujurgon ki baat maante hue ham bhi aapke liye laye hai lekhak “Wallace D Wattles” ki likhi kamaal ki kitab "Swasth Rahne Ka Vigyan" Audio book form me.Is kitab men aapki sehat ko achcha banae wali vo sab tarkeeben batai gayi hain jo aapki madad lambi umr aur achcha swasth pane men karegi. To der kis baat ki hai chaliye jaante hain “Swasth Rahne Ka Vigyan”.

title: Annihilation of Caste by Dr. Ambedkar
description: Ye audiobook actually Ambedkar dwara likha gaya ek undelivered speech hai. Unhone Unhone Lahore mein ho rahi ek baithak ke liye ye jaati vinaash ka speech likha tha magar iskafirst draft padhne ke baad baithak ke organisers ne controvoery ke tehet Ambedkar ko invite karne se mana kar diya. Aisa kya tha us speech mein? Aaiye jaane

title: Mystery of Kohinoor
description: Kohinoor, jiski chamak par puri duniya deewani hai, tweeter par kabhi na kabhi aapne “Kohinoor wapis karo” ka trend dekha hi hoga, ek aisa diamond jiski kahaniyan Bhagwan Shree Krishna ke sath jodi jati hain, chaliye jante hain duniya ke sabse popular diamond ke baare me aur kohinoor se jude ek aise shraap ke baare mein jo logon ko kangaal kar deta hai.

title: Geeta Gyan
description: Dharm insaan ki sabse zyada madad tab karta hai jab practical duniya mein aapko aapke sawalon ke jawaab ya toh mil nhi paata hai aur agar milte bhi hain toh aap us jawaab se santusht nahi hote hain. Aise waqt mein dharmik gyaan na sirf humein sahi disha deta hai balki hamare akelepan mein hamara sahara bhi banta hai. Insaan chahe kitni bhi tarakki kyu na karle Ishwar ke liye uska lagav use lagataar aage badhte rehne mein madad karta hai. To doston aaiye Geeta gyaan ke saath apne vichar, karm aur apni zindagi ko sahi disha mein le jayein.

title: Sangham Sharanam Gachchami
description: 27 September 1925, desh ke sabse bade social organization RSS yani ki Sangh ki sthapana hui thi lekin kya aapko pata hai ki iska naam "Rashtreey Swayam Sevak Sangh" kab pada? Aur kab  Dr.Hedgewar bane iske pehle Sarsangh chalak? Kaise teen bar ban lagne ke baad bhi aaj desh ki nitiyon par RSS apni raay deta hai? Kaise isi RSS ne aaj ki BJP ko sabse majboot party banaya aur kya hain is sanghathan ke positive aur negative points? Sab janenege famous Writer Vijay Trivedi ki likhi is kitab Sangham Sharanam Gachchami ki audiobook mein.

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hai Bharatvarsh : Maharana Pratap
description: Maharana Pratap ka janma Mevar ke kumbhalgar main hua tha, Maharana Pratap ke sasankalmain sabse rochak tathya yeh hain ki Mughal Samrat Akbar bina yuddha ke pratap ko apne adhin lana chahhta tha isliye akbar ne pratap ko samajhne k liye char rajdoot kiye . Lekin Rana Pratap charon ko nirash kiya. Is tarah rana pratap ne mughlo ki adhinata swikar karne se mana kar diya jiske parimanswarup haldighati ka aitihasik yuddha huya.

title: Tumhe Marna Hoga
description:
कल निर्भया थी, फिर आशिफा! आज कोई और है.. कल कोई और होगी। आखिर कब तक हमारे देश की लड़कियां सिर्फ शिकार होती रहेंगी? किसी ना किसी को तो पहल करनी ही पड़ेगी। ऐसे ही हमारी इस कहानी में भी एक रूबी है। जिसके साथ भी वही खौफ़नाक दरिंदगी हुई। पर हमारी रूबी बहुत बहादुर है। वो यमराज से भी लड़ आती है और
बन जाती है रेपिस्टों माफियाओं की दुश्मन! रूबी,  जिसने संकल्प लिया है, कि वो किसी भी बलात्कारी और दुर्दांत अपराधी को जिंदा नहीं छोड़ेगी..!उन्हें मौत की नींद सुला  देगी...! और इस कार्य को अंजाम देने के लिए उसे ईश्वर से वरदान प्राप्त है और कुछ विशेष शक्तियां भी उसे मिली है, जिससे कानून के फंदे से वो खुद को बचा सके और हर स्थिति में दुश्मन  के नापाक मंसूबों को नाकाम कर सके..! यह सब वो किस चतुराई से करती है और कैसे संकल्प लेती है कि ""तुम्हे मरना होगा!"" जानने के लिए सुनिए ये कहानी...

title: Pakistan Crisis: Is This The End Of Pakistan
description: Pakistan mein Economical Crisis ki wajah se hazaaron log sadkon par aa gaye hain. Desh mein ek-ek roti ke liye maramaari chal rahi hai. Aise mein pakistani military abhi bhi badi shaan ke saath apni life jee rahi hai. Kyun Pakistan ka crisis wahan ki military tak nahi pahunch saka? Aur aaj Pakistan ke aise halaat kyun hai? Is Original series mein aapko in saare sawaalon ke jawab mil jayenge. Chaliye samajhte hain Pakistan Crisis ki poori kahani ko.

title: Super Spy Ajit Doval
description: Sahas , Shaurya aur Veerta , kisi ek vyakti mein in sabka hona mushkil hota hai. Lagbhag namumkin. Lekin India ke National Security Advisor Ajit Doval mein ye teeno hai. Ajit Doval ko James Bond Of India bhi kha jata hai. Unhone ek se badhkar ek khatron se bhare hue operations mein hissa lekar desh ko surakshit rakhha. Fir chahe vo Golden temple ka Operation blue star ho, Kandahar hijack ho  ya Pakistan mein 7 sal Ek jasoos ki tarah rehkar India ke khilaf rachi ja rahi sajishon ka pata lagana ho. Is Audiobook mein aapko Ajit doval ke bachpan se lekar unke NSA banne tak ke safar ki puri jankari milegi jisme unke sabhi jasoosi operations bhi shamil hai.

title: The Rise of China and India
description: 1947 Me India Azad hua Aur 1949 me China Azad hua, In dono countries me ek lambi gulami ke baad Bahut sare up and down dekhne ko mile chahe vo political level pe ho ya Economical level par. Jaha India ek Democratic desh hai vahi China Ek Communist  itni Asamantao ke bavjood india china me kaafi kuch similarities hai. China- India aaj world level kaha stand karte hai? Inhone aisa kya kiya ki aaj Asia ki emerging power ban gai? Aise bahut sare point par discussion kiya gaya hai.

title: फ्रॉम वेड्स टू वर्सेज
description: Yah kahani ek aise patra ke jeevan par adharit hai jo haklahat ki samasya se peedit hai aur apni is samasya ki wajah se kai prakaar ki samajik samasyaon ka samna karna pada. Kahani ke ant me usne apni sabhi samasyaon par kaise vijay prapt ki yah janana dilchasp hoga.                                                                                Note: Yah kahani likhne ka mukhya uddeshya samaj ko haklahat ki samasya ke prati jagruk karna hai.

title: The Handbook of Emergencies
description: Medical emergency kabhi puch kar nahi aati. Aise situation mein ambulance bulana best choice hota hai magar 1 arab se bhi zyada aabadi wale desh mein samay par uska pahuchna kaafi mushkil hai. Aise samay mein hum kya kar sakte hai jab tak ki medical help patient tak pahunch nahi paati? Disaster management hamare school syllabus mein nahi hota magar aise situations mein kya kiya jaaye iska knowledge hona har kisi ke liye bahut zaroori hai. Aise hi kai medical situations ko handle karna sikhayega aapko ye show!

title: Aap bhi IAS ban sakte hai
description: UPSC humare desh ki sabse Hard exams me se ek hai , Log UPSC ki tayyari me saalo laga dete hai , 3 level ke iss examination ko par karke aap bhi ek IAS officer ban kar desh ki seva kar sakte ho ye baat IAS Mukesh kumar ne kaafi achhe se explain ki hai , chaliye jante hai kaise aap , prarambhik pariksha , UPSC mains aur Interview ko clear karke ye mt. everest ko paar kar sakte ho aur IAS officer ban sakte ho.

title: Spirituality Ki Khoj
description: Hum sabhi ki life mein kabhi na kabhi ek aisa waqt aaya hai jab humne koi galat kaam kiya ho aur upar wale se prathna ki ho ki bas is baar bacha lo, dobara jeevan mein kabhi yeh galti karunga. Kai logo ka to yeh roz  ka kissa hota hai. Bhagwan hume baar baar maaf kar dete hai, par  hum sudharte nahi. Aisi hi kahani hai yeh audiobook ki jo do sawalon se shuru hoti hai. Pehla, Kya aap mere antim sanskar mein speech denge ? aur dusra, ishwar kya sirf aaj raat aap meri raksha karenge ? Inn dono sawalo ke jawab dhundhne ke liye yeh audiobook

title: A Guide to Self Discovery
description:
Is bat ka aapki life mein kitna fark padta hai, ki aap vo nahi ban pae jo banna chahte thy?
Ye ek bhut hi Personal Saval hai jiska Javab  aapko ye Book Summary Sunne ke baad badi hi Asani se mil jayega . Ye ek Aaise Ladke ki kahani hai jo Bachapan se hi  ek Carmelite monk banna chahta tha, Usne iske liye Apna ghar bhii chodh diya tha  lekin Bad mien Vo ek civil Servant ban jata hai. Aur ek Monk banne ke safar ne hi use ye rasta dikhaya.

title: मुझे पिशाचिनी से बचाओ
description: Jamindar Ke Bete Madhav Ki Patni Chitrawale ke  Ghar mein Sakshat Lakshmi ka Roop lekar Aati hein, Lekin uski ek khas Vidya Uska Dampatya Sansaar Tabaah Kar Deti hei. Uska Pati Usse Peshachani Manta hei.....Lekin Chitrawaali Haar nahi manti hein aur Apne Khoye hui Pati ko Dhoondti hei. Aakhir Kon si Vidya hein Chitrawaali ke pass? Jaane ke liye Suniye Puri Khani.....

title: हॉरर फाइल्स
description: योजन अपने दोस्त जयपाल के घर जाता है और खेल खेल में जयपाल को पता लगता है की सारे दोस्त पहले ही मर चुके है।  क्या योजन का सच सामने आएगा ? या जीवाधारी जैसा अन्धविश्वास हमेशा के लिए ख़त्म हो जाएगा ?

title: राज कपूर क्यों हुए धर्मेंद्र से नाराज़?
description: Kaha Jata hain ki ek event main dharmendra ji se Raj kapoor sahab naraj ho gaye the. sath hi meshur gayika  Uma Devi bad mein Mashur Comedian Tuntun mein dadal gayi. janiye aise kuch anokhi bollywood ki kahani ke barein mein   sirf kukufm par.

title: Yogasana And Sadhana
description: Aaj ki is busy life mein hun apne sharir or apni health ka dhyan rakhana shayad bhulte ja rahe hain, Hum ye bhul chuke hain ki humari asli wealth humara paisa nahi humara sharir hai. Is modern or fancy life ko sundar banane ke liye humne Gym to jana shuru kar diya hai par isse bhi zyada agar kisi cheez mein fayda hai to wo hai Yoga. Par sawaal ye hai ki shuruaat kaise ki jaye to aapke inhi sawalon ka jawaab hum lekar aaye hain hamari is book mein jiska naam hai Yogasana Aur Sadhana. Toh chaliye shuru karte hain.

title: बकुर नारायण  ज़िन्दगी XXL
description:
हमारे देश में दो चीजें बहुत तेजी से बढ़ रही हैं—एक टेक्नोलॉजी का रोग और दूसरा मोटे लोग। पूरी दुनिया में सबसे ज्यादा मोटे लोगों में हम भारतवासी तीसरे नंबर पर आ गए हैं। कहते हैं लगभग 135 करोड़ लोगों में 10 प्रतिशत लोग मोटे हैं, यानी 135 लाख लोग और ये कहानी इन 135 लाख लोगों में से ही एक ‘बकुर नारायण पांडे’ की है। बकुर बेढोल शरीर और असाधारण रूप का एक ऐसा इनसान है, जिसके शरीर में कैल्शियम, आयरन से ज्यादा आत्मविश्वास की कमी है, वो समाज और संसार के नजरिए से बन चले आदर्शवादी जीवन में कहीं ठीक नहीं बैठ पाता। इन वजहों से बकुर की जिंदगी में हास्य से लेकर गंभीरता तक अनेक परिस्थितियाँ पैदा होती हैं। हर क्षेत्र में असफलताओं के झुंड में घिरे बकुर को, उसका परिवार, मोहल्ला, सब—एक बार सफलता की चौखट तक पहुँचता देखना चाहते हैं, जो बकुर के लिए लगभग असंभव है। कोई इनसान जब सामान्य इनसानों के आदर्शवादी ढाँचे से किसी भी मायने में अलग होता है तो या तो उसका मजाक बनता है या फिर वो इनसान आदर्श बनता है। इसी ऊँच-नीच से भरी बकुर की जिंदगी में पैदा होती अनेक परिस्थितियों की रोमांचक और अत्यंत पठनीय कहानी है 
Script Writer : Abhishek Manoharchanda

title: Ramayan
description: Maa Sita aur Prabhu Shri Ram ki adbhut mahagatha hai Ramayan. Pehli baar kaise mile Sita aur Ram? Ram kyon kehlaye maryada-purushottam? Sita ko kyon deni padi agni pariksha? Hanuman hain kis dev ka avtar?  Jaane is khas peshkash mein

title: अनुभव
description: Woh Kahne lage, Miya Purane ho gaie hoHum bole, Anubhav ka khazana ho gaya heiJhu jhi Umrah Badti gaieAnubhav mei ijafa hota gaya

title: Secret Door to Success
description: Kya adhyatm se samruddhi paayi jaa sakti hai? Kya gyaan se mukti aur positive affirmations se life successful ban sakti hai? Spirituality aur uske kai siddhant se roobaroo karvaegi ye kitab, Secret Door To Success!  Agar aapko "The Secret" jaisi books pasand hain, to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Main Ramta Jogi
description: Abhimanyu Khurrana,  India ka youngest, most famous, most handsome business shark hai. Business mein apne competitors ko buri tarah beat karne wala Abhimanyu apne past mein hue ek hadse ke karan, pyaar ki race mein bahut peeche hai. Ladkiyon se nafrat karne wala ye businessman aksar ladkiyon ke bistar mein paya jata hai. Aakhir aisa kaun sa raaz dafan hai uske zindagi mein? Kya hoga jab Haridwar ki nagri mein anath Pavitra pe aa jayega Abhimanyu ka dil? Kya Pavitra bhi banegi Abhimanyu ke liye ek raat ka khilauna? Ya Abhimanyu ko ho jayega usese saccha pyaar? Ya Pavitra ke pass hai Abhimanyu ke barbadi ka raaz?

title: How To Manage Your Work Load
description: Hum subha jaldi kaam par jaate hain aur shaam hote-hote frustrate ho jaate hain. Humein lagta hai ki hum itni mehnat karte hain lekin phir bhi kaam ka load roz ban jaata hai. To humein sabse pehle kaam ko kaise karna hai yeh samajhne ki zaroorat hai. Kuku FM par is original series ko sun kar  aap  apne kaam ko sahi direction aur guidance ke saath kar ke apni aur company ki productivity badha sakte hain. Saath hi aap kaam ko sahi tarike se karna seekh jayenge aur apne aap ko khush bhi rakh payenge.

title: Bollywood Scandals
description: Bollywood star Jacqueline Fernandez kaise padi thug Sukesh ke pyaar mein? Kya Jacqueline ne bhi diya tha Sukesh ka sath? Apne bete Aryan Khan ki arrest par kya kiya Supertar Shahrukh ne? Sanjay Dutt ne drugs kaise choda? Sanjay Dutt ke kya sach mein underworld se links the? Film 'Hum Sath Sath Hai' ki shoot par kya sach mein Salman ne chalayi thi black buck par goli? Shilpa Shetty ke pati Raj Kundra par Sherlyn Chopra ne kyu lagaya soft porn banane ka ilzam? Janiye filmon mein apni acting se croron dilon pe raaz karne wale inn stars ki personal life ka scandalous sach.

title: History of Alexander
description: Macedon ke Alexander III, jinhe Alexander the Great ke naam se bhi jaana jaata hai, ne akele hi ek decade se bhi kam samay mein Pracheen Duniya aur uske iteehas ko badal diya. Alexander ko Militar geniys maante the aur woh humesha example se lead karte the, haalaanki jaan ki chinta na karte hue woh aksar apane aur apane sainikon ke jeevan ke saath laaparavaah the. Aaiye sunte hai issi great leader ki kahaani

title: Pablo Neruda: Ek Qaidi Ki Khuli Duniya
description: 'Pablo Neruda' ek aisa naam jise duniya ek kavi aur communist ke taur par jaanti hai. Pablo neruda ka jeevan humesha vivadon mein ghira raha lekin vahin sahitya premiyon ke dil mein vo humesha ek khas jagah banane mein safal rahe. Unke jeevan ki isi bikharti kahaani aur unki kavitaaon mein chhipe vichaaron ko janiye is audiobook mein.

title: The Rise and Fall Of Longterm Capital Management
description: Bade Bujurg kehte hain ki Jo Admi ghamand mein choor hua vo samjho chaknachoor hua. Aisi hi kahaani hai John meriweather ki jinhone longterm capital management ki shuruaat ki aur use kayi aur businessmen ke saath milkar safal bhi banaaya lekin aisa kya hua ki LTCM loss ke qarib aa gaya, aur Aasman se sidhe zameen pe aake gira. Yahi sab kuch is show ke zariye hum jaanege jise sunkar aap LTCM ki kahaani ke saath-saath  business ke khel ko bhi samajh paayenge aur business aur stock market ki sahi planning kar payenge. Chaliye shuru karte hain Kuku FM par LTCM ki jeet aur haar ki kahani.

title: Victorian Era
description: Khud ko queen victoria samajhti hai yeh toh....yeh wala dialogue humme se sabne hi apne zindagi main kise na kise ladki ke upar try jarur kiya hoga jo hume thoda bhi magroor lagi, ya keh lo uss ek insan ko to bola hoga jo rajaon ke se shok paalta hai, india ke kone kone mein yeh naam utna he penetrate kiya jitna ke aalo aur aam, sirf hum he nhi humari pichli peedi unki pichli peedi sab iss naam" Victoria "se wakif hain, pr kya asal mein koi victoria ko jaan paaya ? ya bss wo ek jumla bn kr reh gye humari bol chaal mei, aakhir kaisa tha unka victorian era, kya condition thi aurton ke aur society ki, in sab par detail main baat karenge iss original audio series main , only on KUKU FM

title: ह्यूमन 2.0
description: आदर्श एक ऐसा युवा साइंटिस्ट था जिसका सपना था कि वह कोई ऐसी चीज बनाये जिससे इंसान अमर हो जाए । अपने इस सपने को तो वो साकार न कर सका पर फिर उसने एक ऐसा अनोखा प्रयोग शुरू किया जिसने कुदरत के नियमों को चुनौती दे दी। लेकिन मुश्किलें तब शुरू हुईं, जब इस प्रयोग के साइड इफेक्ट सामने आने लगे, पर जब तक कोई कुछ समझ पाता यह एक साइलेंट किलर की तरह अपने पैर पसार चुका था। क्या हुआ आगे? जानने के लिए सुनें सोम जायसवाल द्वारा लिखित ह्यूमन 2.0 सिर्फ Kuku FM पर।

title: Thaliava God of South
description: Shivaji Rao Gaayakavaad se Rajnikant aur fir Thaliava banne tak ke safar ki kahaani, ek aise insaan ki kahaani jinke chahne waalo ne unko bhagwaan ka darjaa diya, ek bus conductor se superstar Rajnikant aur Superstar se ek politician Rajnikant, aise kahi saare roop aur sune unsune kison ko suniye iss biography mein

title: Ameer nahi, samriddh banein
description: Agar hum ameer banna chahte hai toh hamari personality kaisi honi chahiye? Hamari mentality kaisi honi chahiye? Kya aap financially secure banna chahte hai? Middle class jeevan mein kharcho ke saath saath savings kaise badhayi jaaye? In saare sawalon ke jawab milenge aapko is audiobook mein! Agar Aapko "Financial Freedom" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Behtar Zindagi Ka Raaz
description: Hum Sab Apni Poori Life Paisa, Shauharat aur apni Zarooraton ko poora karne mein guzaar dete hain. Apni Khushiyon ke liye itne matlabi ho jaate hain ki dusre ki khushi ki parwah nahi karte. Yeh Original Show aapko yahi batayenga ki aap apni khushiyon ki jo mountain climb karne ki soch rahe hain vo asal mein chhalawa hai asli khushi khud mein nahi doosron ki help karne mein hai. Chaliye shuru karte hain Behtar Zindagi ko janne ka safar.

title: Chhath Puja: Bihar Ki Pehchan
description:
Indian culture mein tyohaaron ki kya ahamiyat hai ye hum sab jaante hain. Tabhi to UP, Bihar mein manai jane wali Chhath puja aur uske geet aaj desh ke har kone mein sunai dete hain. Puri duniya ka ek matr aisa Parv jismein ugte suraj ke sath sath doobte suraj ki bhi puja ki jati hai.
Cultural values ke sath sath iski kai scientific importance bhi hain. Akhir kyu manaya jati hai Chhath puja aur kya hai is parv ka mahatva iske bare mein detail mein janenge humare is special show "Chhath Puja: Bihar Ki Pehchan" mein.

title: Ruhani Mohabbat
description: Apni shadi ke din ruhi ghar se bhagne ko bekarar hai magar uske ashiq Akash ne de diya dhokha …Majboori me akhir ho hi gai ruhi ki shadi avinash se…Ek doosre se anjaan in dono ke rishton me aag bhadkane ka kaam kar raha Akash jiska maksad hai Avinash se apne  dad ka badla lene ka kya is sajish me majboori ki shadi ke baad bhi hoti mohabbat ko grahan lagne wala hai ?                                                        `

title: Banu mai Raaja ki Raani
description:
अवनि के माता-पिता नहीं है, काकू ही उसकी सब कुछ हैं। अवनि के जीवन में राजा नाम के लड़‍के की एंट्री होती है, जिसके बारे में अवनि कुछ भी नहीं जानती लेकिन अपना पूरा जीवन उसके साथ बिताने के लिए तैयार हो जाती है। लेकिन होनी को कुछ और मंजूर होता है। अवनि राजा समझकर मंडप में जिससे शादी करती है, वो कोई और होता है। ऐसा कैसे? अवनि ना चाहते हुए भी इस रिश्‍ते के भंवर में बंधती जाती है और खुश भी है। लेकिन राजा कहां गया? क्‍या राजा मिल पाता है अवनि को? या अनजान रिश्‍ता ही उसका सबकुछ बन जाता है?? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी बनूं मैं राजा की रानी!
Author : Mehak Suthar
Voiceover Artist : Shreya Awasthi

title: Option Trading Guide
description: Option Trading guide new traders ke saath saath Option trading pehle se use karne waale traders ke liye kaafi useful hai. Jinhe lagta hai ki Option Trading ek risk hai unka confusion bhi yeh audiobook dur karegi aur profit kamaane ke chance badhayegi. Chaliye investment ki iss safar par

title: Savitribai Phule
description: Ek Dalit ghar mein janmi ladki jise janam ke baad hi Peshva aur Brahamano ki baat par unke pita khatam kar dena chah rahe the, aage chal kar apne pati ko mukhagni deti hai. Ladkiyon ke liye school kholne par gobar se maar bhi khaati hai, par rukti nahi hai. Savitribai Phule desh ki pehli mahila teacher thi, aur apne pati, Jyotiba Phule ke sath mil kar unhone 3 school khole the. Savitribai ne jaatiwad par hatiyar to uthaya, par wo hatiyar kalam ka tha. Jane unke zindagi aur sangharsh se jude kayi raaz.

title: The Gandhi Family Curse
description: Kehte hai jo jitna upar hota hai, girne par, utna zyada jor girta hai. Kuch aisa hi hua Gandhi Parivaar ke sath, jo Indira Gandhi ke pradhanmantri banane par bahut upar gaya, phir ek ke baad ek ghatnao aur durghatnaon se ghira hi raha. Bahut se log ise kisi shraap ka asar maante hai ki pehle Indira ke pati Feroze, phir pita Nehru ki mrityu hogayi. Par ye ghatna durghatna ka silsila yahi nahi ruka, isne Sanjay, Indira, aur Rajeev tak ki jaan le li. Kya in durghatnaon ka aapas mein hai koi connection? Kya sachmuch shaapit hai Gandhi parivaar? Agar aapko "India after Gandhi" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Pratham antariksh yatri yuri gagrin | Writer - Rakesh sharma
description: Apni mahan upalabdhi hasil karne me matra do ghante hi lage, lekin iske peechhe vvarshon ki mehnat aur kathin sadhana thi. Matra 27 varsh ki umra men safalta ka kirtiman sthapit karne wala yah mahanayak matra 33 varsh ki alpayu men sansar se vida ho gaya. Anjane antariksh ko janne ki lalak ne Yuri Gagarin ko antariksh abhiyan ki or pravritt kiya. Aur wah bhi pahli baar antariksh me jaane ki kalpana karna hi dil ko dehla dene wali thi. Wahan pahuch bhi paenge aur pahuch bhi gae to kya jeevit dharti par laut paenge? In sabhi savalon se pare Yuri Gagarin ne antariksh me pahunchkar manav jeevan ko ek nayi unchai di aur bhavishya ke antariksh abhiyanon ka marg prashast kiya. Sune adbhut jijeevisha aur apratim sahas ke dhani Yuri Gagarin ki prernaprad jeevani.

title: कहानी वीर सोनी की
description:
बचपन का प्यार समाज और परिवार के कारण एक दूसरे से मिलने के लिए तरसते थे,, छः साल का अंतराल,, प्यार में तड़प रहे दोनों ने अपने जीवन को पढ़ाई और खुद की पहचान में लगा दी,, वीर रेलवे में उच्च पद पर और सोनी एक एयर होस्टेज थी,, वो भी दिल्ली में ही पर दोनों ने कभी भी एक दूसरे को मिलने या बात करने का प्रयास नही किया। लेकिन सालों बाद गांव में जब वापस मुलाकात होती है तो समाज और रूढिवादी सोच की बेडियों को तोड़ते हुए भागकर अपने जीवन की शुरूआत करते हैं। 
Script Writer : Shailesh Singh 'Shail'
Voiceover Artist : ARV Arvind Singh

title: Marketing Strategies for your Business
description: Business humesha profit aur loss ki probability par kiya jata hai. Lekin yeh profit aur loss bhi tabhi result deti hai jab kisi business ki marketing sahi aur anokhe tarike se ki jaaye. Is marketing shabd mein shamil hoti hai strategies, jise apne business plans mein apply karke products ka promotion karna possible hota hai. Par ye strategies har business ke liye alag hoti hain aur uska result bhi zahir hai alag hota hai. Aaiye is audiobook mein unhi alag alag strategies ke baare mein jante hai, jinki madad se aap bhi apne business venture ko aage badha sakte hain.

title: The Psychology of Money
description: Aksar hamare mann mein ye sawal aata hai ki bill gates itne ameer kaise hue? Kaise warren buffett ne apni jyadatar wealth 50 se 60 ki age mein bnai? kya inh logon ne iske liye mehnat ki ya fir ye log sirf lucky the? Aur ameer banne ke liye humein kya karna hoga? Aaiye sunte hain is book summary ko aur jaane kaise sirf apna behaviour badalne se aap ameer ban sakte hain.

title: My Billionnaire Mom
description:
Desh ki Billionaire Mom apne hi award function mein kyun hai akeli?

Madan Group of Industries ki maalkin Devika Madan ko award function mein  'Buisnessman of the Year' aur Billionaire Mom ka title mila hai.  Function mein naa to parivaar ka sath hai na bacchon ka.  Phir kyun poora desh kar raha hai jiski badai wo ho rahi hai apne hi ghar mein parayi? Janane ke liye sune- My Billionaire Mom.

title: Apne Business ko Bechna Seekho
description: Covid ke baad se Startup Industry mein naye naye Idea's bahut dekhne ko mil rahe, Jyadatar log Startup shuru karna chahte hai, Business kholna chahte hai. Startup karna, Khud ka Business kholna bahut achcha bhi sound karta hai lekin kya aap jante hai 95% se jyada business pahle 3 salo mein hi band ho jate hai. Iski badi vajah hai, Sahi Time par sahi Execution ka na hona hai, agar Business ki foundation hi weak hogi to uska grow hona bahut mushkil hai. Is Series mein hum Startup aur Business Foundation ke bare mein achche se janenge ki kaise hum apne Business ko valuable bana sakte hai jisse ki hum bhi ek successful business khada kar paye. Agar aapko Gary Keller dwara likhi "The One Thing: The Surprisingly Simple Truth Behind Extraordinary Results" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Arundhati Bhattacharya
description: Kya aapko pata hai Bharat me sabse jyada jis sector me Job Application bhare jate hai vo hai Banking Sector aur Banking Sector me sabse successful mahila jinhone apni safalta ke jhande gade hai unka naam hai Arundhati Bhattacharya. Inhone apne Career ki shuruvat Bank PO ki Job se ki thi aur haal hi me abhi SBI Women Chairperson se Retire hui hai. Forbes ki List me Sabse Powerful Mahila ki List me bhi shamil ho chuki hai. Lakho Females ke liye Inspiration ban chuki Arundhati Bhattacharya ne ye safar kaise tay kiya janenge is series me.

title: Mayawati
description: Sarvajan Hitaay Sarvjan Sukhaay ka naara deke UP mein chaar baar CM reh chuki Shree Mayawati ji ki kahaani bohot hi inspirational hai. Equality ke liye unka struggle aur unki political journey ko experience karte hai iss audio mein

title: Jungle - Khel, Kahani or Mout
description: कॉलेज के ६ दोस्त, ट्रिप के लिए कसोल निकलते हैं। और वहां घटती हैं उनके साथ ऐसी चीजें जो उन सभी का जीवन बदल देती हैं। ये कहानी विभिन्न कहानियों में तब्दील होती जाती है। एक ही हॉरर स्टोरी में आपको सुनने को मिलेंगे अनेक और हॉरर स्टोरी! क्या ये छे दोस्त कसोल के जंगलों से ज़िंदा निकल पाएंगें? या इनकी कहानियां ही बन जाएंगी इनकी मौत? जानने के लिए सुनिए ये कहानी जंगल - खेल, कहानी और मौत!

title: Rising Careers In Gaming
description: Is new age ke digitalisation ne kaafi kuch badal kar rakh diya hai. Agar aapka kaccha gaming ko leke bohot passionate hai aur saara din gaming mein busy hota hai, toh kya kabhi aapne socha hai ki shayad uska career calling yahi ho? Ji haan, ab gaming ki duniya bhi itni badi ho chuki hai ki isme kai saare career options available hai. Magar kya hai ye? aur kya ye reliable hai? Jaanenge aise hi kai saare details gaming ko lekar is audiobook mein

title: Vibhajan 1947
description: Bure sapne, garibi aur lachari ki hakikat se joojhte UPSC student Aryan ko mili Kalpana jisne bheja usey ek special mission par jo tha Bharat ka batwara hone se rokna. Time travel karta Aryan ja takraya kroor british officers, time terrorists aur bhavishya ke Badshah se. Akhir kyun Aryan ko chuna gaya is mission pe? Kya chahta hai Badshah usse? Kya Aryan ban ke rah jayega ek mohra ya kamyab hoga wo rokne me ye Partition? Janne ke liye sune Partition sirf kuku fm par.

title: How to Move to the US for Studies
description: USA - The land of Opportunities, yahan study karna Indian Students ka sapna hota hai, agar aap bhi US mein study karne ka mann bana rahe hai to ye Audio show aapke liye ek guide ki tarah work karega aur aapke har ek doubt ko bhi clear karega. Study karna kitna mehenga hoga? Visa Process kya hogi? Application Process aur vahan ka different culture kaisa hoga? Hum sabko pata hai US mein padhne ke kya career benefits ho sakte hain unko aur detail mein yaha aap jan sakte hain.

title: Arun Gawli: Mumbai Ka Don | Writer - Sheela Raval
description: पत्रकारिता के मेरे कैरियर में गवली वह पहला गैंगस्टर था जिससे शीला रावल की मुलाकात हुई थी. उसका नंबर एक वरिष्ठ क्राइम रिपोर्टर ने दिया था. उन्होंने उसे फोन कर मिलने का समय मांगा. आगे क्या हुआ और मुलाकात के दौरान एक समय शीला रावल को ऐसा क्यों लगा कि उन्होंने एक भारी गलती कर दी है, सुनिए पूरी रिपोर्ट|

title: Love Marriage - एक प्रेम व्यथा
description:
लव  और  मैरिज ये दो शब्द हर किसी ने ज़िंदगी में देखे , सुने और उपयोग भी किए होते है। अक्सर जवानी में सबका अफेयर होता है, चोरी छुपे डींगे भी हांकते है।
लव अफेयर चोरी चुपके सब कर लेते है। लेकिन जब कोई लव मैरेज की बात  करता है तो तूफान टूट पड़ता है, लगता है दैत्य रूपी समाज  के रस्मो रिवाज़ और रूढ़िवादिता की ईटो से बना महल टूट जाएगा। और समाज का हर आदमी उसको बचाने के लिए आगे आ जाता है। हमारे दिल और मंजीत ने  भी समाज के इस दैत्य रूपी महल से टकराने की नाकाम कोशिश की, लव अफेयर तो हर कोई करता है बहुत कम ही लव मैरिज करने की हिम्मत करते है। वहीं हिम्मत दिखाई हमारे लव बर्डस ने... उधार के पैसे से समाज को टकराने निकल पड़े। ये  प्रेम का रास्ता  जितना सरल दिखता है उतना होता नहीं। घर से निकलने के बाद कैसे उनको भूखे रहने तक की नौबत आ गई। कैसे पग पग पर उनको ठगा गया, समाज की निजी स्वार्थ की पूर्ति के लिए बनाई गई संस्थाओं ने कैसे उनको पैसे के तराज़ू में तौला। धार्मिक संस्थाओं, कोर्ट , वकील , पुलिस ने हर पग पर पैसे के लिए उनको ठगा। पर क्यों ? कैसे बालिग होते हुए भी हमारे कानून ने उनको ना बालिग बना प्रताड़ना का भोगी बना दिया। चंद पैसों के लिए बिकने वाले पुलिस वाले क्या अपनी गलती सुधार सकते है? कैसे कदम कदम पर कानून ने उनके रास्ते में कांटे बिछाए। जबकि कानून को तो उनकी मदद करनी थी। क्या हमारे कानून में  इतने छिद्र है कि कानून का नाजायज फायदा उठा लिया जाता है? आखिर लव मैरिज जैसे मुद्दे को दिलाबर सिंह मंजीत के पापा, और बिट्टू दिल के मामा जैसे पढ़े लिखे लोग क्यों अपनी इज्जत का सवाल बना लेते है? और बिट्टू कैसे एक अधेड़ उम्र के  गंवार गुंडे। "" पाली "" को अपना दमाद बनाने को तैयार है पर एक शिक्षित युवा  और प्रेमी को नहीं , पर क्यों? मंजीत के पापा एक हेड मास्टर थे, बिट्टू एक पटवारी , आखिर शिक्षित वर्ग ऐसे कट्टर रूढ़िवादी विचारो से आज तक आज़ाद क्यों नहीं हो पाया ? क्या आज की शिक्षा भी रूढ़िवादी विचारो के आगे नतमस्तक है? गांव की पंचायत जैसी संस्थाओं को किसी का मौलिक अधिकार छीनने का हक किसने दिया? क्या ये संस्थाएं कानून से ऊपर है? यां हमारा कानून इतना कमजोर है कि इन संस्थाओं की मूछों  के आगे नतमस्तक है। जीते या हारे ....  देखने के किए बने रहे हमारे साथ....
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : Surya Goldi

title: Mastering The Marketplace
description: "Mastering the Marketplace" Is Original Series mein kuch Business case studies share kiye gaye hai jo business build karne me kaafi madad kar sakte hai. Business ko Shuru karne mein aur Profitable banane mein kaafi alag approach lagti hai, alag mindset aur alag learning ki Zaroorat hoti hai. Aapko Humari ye series Past ke practical experience se bahut kuch sikhayegi jisse aap apne business mein Successful ban sake aur Yadi aap History ko samajh kar business ki shuruvat karenge to un galtiyo ko aap dobara nahi karenge jo already ho chuki hai.

title: Yamraj: Mrityu Ke Devta
description: Kya aapko pata hai Yamraj ki bhi mrityu hone wali thi? Par kaun lena chahta tha Yamraj ki jaan? Sabki mrityu nischit karne wale Yamraj kaise bane the Mrityu ke devta? Kyon Yamraj nahi le paye Rishi Markandeya ke praan? Aur kis kisne haraya tha Yamraj ko? Aaiye jaante hain is khas peshkash mein

title: How to live on 24 hours a day
description: Ek din mein 24 ghante ki seema mein koi kaise bas reh nahi balki jee sakta hai? In 24 ghanto mein kaise hum swasthya, sukh, dhan, chhot chhoti khushiya, sanman aur apni aatma ke vikas ka khyala rakhe? Jaane 24 ghanto mein jeena ka rahasya is audiobook mein!

title: शैतानों का बादशाह  “Lucifer”
description: Shaitanon ke Badshah “Lucifer” ne Yamraj ke khilaf wo jung chhed di thi, jiska anjam sirf aur sirf vinash tha. Badi mushkil se qaid hua “Lucifer” ek baar phir aazad ho chuka tha aur is baar ki aazadi Yam-Lok ke sath sath, Mrityu-Lok ko bhi tabah karne aayi thi. Aakhir kya hoga, jab Shaitan ke Badshah “Lucifer” aur Maut ke devta Yamraj aamne samne honge? Sunein abhi!

title: रोबोटिक आतंक सीज़न 1
description: Technology hamein nipun banati hai ya hum technology ke gulaam hote jaa rahe hai? Sochiye agar aisa ho ki is duniya mein insaan se zyaada robot ho jaaye to kya hoga? Ek aisi duniya jaha ladne ke liye chahiye robot. Yah kahani hai 2041 ki, jab US mein insaano se zyaada robot nazar aayenge aur robot insaano ke upar hukumat karenge, kahani ka villain hai Alex jo ki ek khatarnaak robot hai. Duniya bhar ke scientist is robot se yudha karne ke liye robot tayaar kar rahe hai. India ke scientist bhi robot ka saamna karne ke liye apni robot sena bana rahe hai jo ki crur robot Alex ka saamna kar sake. Kya insaan dwaara banaye gaye robot insaano ka khaatma kar denge? Kya ye duniya inhi roboto ke haatho chalegi? Ya insaano ki budhimata ek baar phir jeet jaayegi? Jaan ne ke liye suniye kahani Robotic Aatank.

title: Google My Business Par Listing Kaise kare
description: Google my Business par aap apne Business, Product aur Services ko List karke Free mein apne Clients tak directly pahuncha sakte hai. Iske aapko jyada kuch nahi karna hai bas is AudioBook mein bataye gaye instructions ko follow karna hai aur un mistakes ko karne se bachna hai jo Zyadatar log karte hai. Chaliye Safar ki shuruwat karte hai KUKU FM ke sath.

title: Tax Benefits of Real Estate Investing
description: Aajkal investment ke bahut saare options hain lekin agar ek kam risk aur zyada profit dene wale investment option ki baat karein toh vo hai real estate. Bas Investment se pehle real estate se judi har ek jaankari aapke paas honi chahiye jaise ki Tax Benefits by Investing in Real Estate, Jo ki aapko bahut saara paisa bacha ke de sakta hai. Lekin Kaise? Janne ke liye abhi suniye KUKU FM ka ye Original Show.

title: नकली चेहरे प्यार के
description: Lekhak Raj ke Upanyas sachi ghatnao pe aadharit hoti hein. Ek hateyari ki kahani likhne ke silsilay mein roz Mumbai aate hain, jaha uski zindagi me ek Uncle aur ek Ladki aati hein. Unke zindagi ka Ansulja aatit hei, jisse suljane ki chakar mein roz musibath mein faste hein. Toh kya Lekhak Raj unki zindagi ka Aatit sulja payegaa? Uncle ke bete ne ka Athmatya ki thi ya Murder tha? Sunne, Rahasya aur Romanchak se bhari Kahani “ Nakli Chehre Pyar Ke”

title: जिनी पुलिस
description: Lohit Bansal, ek teki hai, jo America mein apni company ka headquarter kholkar, duniya ke amir logo mein shumar hona chahta hai.Trusha Datta behtarin school teacher hai, jo India mein hi rahkar students ko kaabil banana chahti hai.Dono mein pyaar ho jaata hai, lekin unki shaadi se thik pehle vo hota hai jiske liye dilli badnaam hai.Suniye, Kuku FM pe aapki sabse pasandita kitab "Hai Dil Ka Kya Kasoor" ke lekhak Apartit Agarwaal ki nayi Audiobook "Geenie Police". Yeh jaan ne ke liye ki kaise ek khusmijaaj ladka apni million dollar company ko daav pe laga kar banta hai ek hero, aur ek villain, is system se ladne ke liye, aur apraadh ko jod se khatam karne ke liye.

title: Wo Ishq
description: कॉलेज में युवा दिलों की धड़कन पढ़ाई में कम प्‍यार में ज्‍यादा धड़कता है। वाणी और वर्षा जब कॉलेज में अपना कदम रखती हैं, तो उनकी मुलाकात होती है सीनियर्स से….आपको क्‍या लगता है सीनियर्स उनके साथ कैसा बर्ताव करेंगे? रैगिंग होगी या प्‍यार की बौछार होगी? कौन किसके दिल को चुराएगा? कहानी में क्‍या नया मोड़ आएगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी ‘वो इश्‍क ’ केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Multi Crore PF Scam
description: PF, PPF, SIP toh Kabhi Mutual Funds, har middle class insaan apni salary ka ek hissa acche se acchi return policy mein invest karta hai. Kabhi Tax Save karne ke liye toh kabhi future planning ke liye, lekin kya hota hai jab apke hi vo paise jisse aap jarurat ke liye invest karte hai, wahi apke na rahe toh? Kya hota hai jab badi badi companies karti hai Multi Crore Scam jaane ke liye suniye Multi Crore PF Scam.

title: Sankshipt Ramayan
description: Ramayan Prabhu Ram ki ek aisi adbhut gatha hai jise hum sab bachpan se sunte aa rahe hai, jab jab Prabhu Ram ka zikr humare aas paas hota hai man prasannta se bhar jata hai. Bhartiya Itihas ke is mahan granth ko humare purvajo ne bade sahej kar rakha hua hai, Jahan ek taraf Prabhu Ram ek manushya ke taur par shreshth Jeevan jeene ka udahran hai, vahi dusri taraf burai par achchai ki jeet ka ek vishwas hai. prastut sankshipt Ramayan ka moolasrot Vaalmeekikrt ‘Ramaayan’ aur Tulaseedaasakrat ‘Raamacharitamaanas’ granth hee hai, lekin jahaan raamachatimaanas mein saat kaand hain, ‘sankshipt raamaayan’ mein aath kaand samaahit hai. katha mein ramayan ka aadhar bana rahe, isake liye shuru se akhir tak katha ke mukhya prasangon ke shlokon ka beech-beech mein zikr kiya gaya hai.

title: How To Start Content Writing
description: Aaj ke time mein "Content Writing" ek growing career option hai jiski requirement har industry mein hai, "How To Start Content Writing" show aapko is field ki A to Z knowledge provide karega aur ek road map ki tarah is field se related har aspect ko clear karega. So agar aapka bhi dream career "Content Writing" hai to bina der kiye shuru karte hai. Agar aapko "Bird by Bird" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: How To Become Self-Motivated
description: Kya aapko apni life me "khushi" wala part missing lag raha hai? Kya aapke din ki shuruaat to bahut achhi hoti hai but kuch der baad hi aap fir se negativity ke khyaalon me kho jaate hain? Agar haan to humari audiobook "How To Become Self-Motivated" aapko batayegi ki kaise hum apni life me constantly Khush reh sakte hain chahe baat work, career, relationships ya parenting ki ho ye audiobook aapki life ke har hisse mein khushiya laane ka kaam karegi.

title: How To Achieve Financial Success Automatically
description: Jaane anjaane mein har koi paison ke peeche bhaag raha hai, sawaal yeh hai ki kya aap jeet rahe hain? Bhale hi aap khud indisciplined ho, is Original Show ke zariye aap step by step plan banakar disciplined investment ke tareeke seekh sakte hain.

title: English Seekhein Aur Safal Banein
description: Aaj Ke Is Badalte Daur Mein Zindagi Mein Growth Haasil Karne Ke Liye English Bol Pana Ek Bahut Zaroori Skill Ban Gya Hai Aur Bina Kisi Mistake Ke English Bolne Ke Liye Zaroori Hai Ki Humein Grammar Ki Poori Knowledge Ho. Toh Fir Der Kis Baat Ki Chaliye Is Audiobook Ko Sun Kar Apni English Ko Ekdam Perfect Bnate Hain

title: European Union Crisis
description: EU CRISIS : Eurozone yaa European debt crisis ki vajah thi bhugtaan-santulan sankat. Asaan bhaasha mein keh lijiye, balance-of-payments crisis. Jo aise desho mein foreign funding achaanak band hone se hui kyunki in par kaafi ghaata chad chuka tha aur keval foreign nivesh yaa udhaar par hi nirbhar the. Yeh crisis tab aur badtar ho gaya, jab desh ki sarkaare apne national currency ki value ko deduct yaa kam karne mein asaksham saabit hui. Chaliye samajhte hai is EU Crisis ko jisme Greece ko economically sabse zyada maar jhelni padi, jiske kaaran voh Union se bahar hona chahta tha. Agar aapko Principles for Dealing with the Changing World Order jaisi books pasang hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Zubeda Begam
description: जुबैदा के पति असलम और सास ने इसलिए उसे घर से निकाल दिया क्‍योंकि उसने 3 बेटियों को जन्‍म दिया। उसके बाद पति ने कोई खोज खबर नहीं ली, बल्कि दूसरी शादी कर ली। जुबैदा ने खुद को मजबूती से खड़ा और हर मुश्किलों का सामना डटकर किया। तीनों बेटियां बड़ी हो गई और बेटों की तरह अपने फर्ज अदा करने लगी। सालों बाद पति असलम जुबैदा से मिलने आता है…अपनी गलतियों को सुधारना चाहता है… एक नए रिश्‍तें की शुरूआत करना चाहते हैं। क्‍या जुबैदा अपने पुराने जख्‍मों को भुलाकर इस रिश्‍तों को स्‍वीकार करेगी? जुबैदा की बेटियां क्‍या अपने पिता और सौतेली मां और उनके बच्‍चों को स्‍वीकार कर पाएगी? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Badle Din Subah ke 6 Min mein
description: Doston zara sochiye ki aapko kaisa mehsus hoga jab ek din aap subah uthein aur aapki zindagi mein sab kuch badal chuka ho. Aapki zindagi aur behtar ho gayi ho. Aap apni zindagi mein zyada khush ho, swasthya ho, aur stressed bhi nahin ho. Aisi Miracle wali subah ke liye aapko kuch acchi aadton ke baare mein janna hoga. Aapko seekhna hoga ki subah zaldi uth kar uska sahi istemaal karne waale log zyada khush kyon rahte hain. In baaton se judi sabhi jaankari hum aapko is audiobook mein denge. Agar aapko The 5 AM Club jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: The Positive Intrapersonal Communication
description: Aaj 70% se jada logon ke thoughts negative hain. aur un sabhi thoughts ko apne mind se erase karna sabhi ke liye kafi jyada mushkil hai. Lekin Sirf Tabtak, jabtak aapne ye Audiobook nahi Suni hai. Ye book hame self-management ke baare mein batati hai, ki kaise hum khud se bat kar sakte hain aur apne andar ke negative thoughts ko khatm kar sakte hain. Aur aapko ye bhi pata chalega ki jaane- anjaane mein hum aisi kaunsi mistakes kar baithte hain jo humein negative thoughts se bhar deti hain. Agar aapko "How to Talk to Anyone" jaisi books pasand hain, to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Bombay Talkies
description: Apna Cinema yeh Bombay Talkies - Lights, Camera, Action ka voh jadoo jisne Bombay ko 1930 se 1950 ke dashak ke beech maayanagri mein badal diya. Sapno ka shehar aur Hindi film industry ki yeh anokhi duniya ki shuruaat hui thi ek studios se jiska naam tha Bombay Talkies! Pati-Patni ke is creative jodi ne, Ashok Kumar, Dilip Kumar, Raj Kapoor, Dev Anand aur Madhubala jaise sitaaro ko celluloid par larger than life superstars bana diya. Chaliye chalte hai Hindi cinema ke classic daur mein aur jaante hai hindustaan ke pehle advanced film making studios ki kahaani.

title: The Hitler Way
description: Ek aisa vyakti jiski vajah se duniya ko itihaas ki sabse badi jung dekhne ko mili... EK mamuli sa ladka jo bada hokar ek bereham dictator ban jaata hai, kaise kiya usne ye? Kaise puri duniya ko apni edi ke nok par laa kar rakh diya tha is dictator ne? Jaanenge itihaas ki ye kahani is show mein

title: Kaun Hain Bharat Mata?
description: Kaun Hain Bharat Mata? Kuch saalon pehle Bharat mein ek sawal utha ki aakhir kyun sab log bole "Bharat Mata Ki Jai"? Kuch ko unka dharm allow nhin karta aur kuch apni vichardhara ke karan ye nhin bolna chahte the? Lekin sabse bada sawal ki aakhir hain kaun Bharat Mata? Aur kyun ? Kya Pandit Nehru ji ko sab cheezon ke liye Doshi batana sahi hai? In sabhi sawalon ke jawab aur itihas ka bahut sara gyan hai Purushottam Agrawal ki is kitab "Kaun Hain Bharat Mata" mein. Suniye poori audiobook sirf KUKU Fm par.

title: अक्षरा
description: Aksharak ek aisi ladki hai jisne kabhi haar nahi maani, hamesha haalat ka saamna kiya vo bhi datkar. Usne purush pradhan samaaj ki soch ka saamna kiya, apne khud ke pita ke khilaaf gayi. Beta na hone par pita ne pachpan mein hi unhe akela chod diya tha. Maa ne hi parvarish ki. Kaustubh ke roop mein saccha pyaar paakar shaadi jaise bandhan par se uth chuke vishwaas ko usne waapas paaya.

title: Inside Tihar Jail
