description: Hum sab ne kabhi na kabhi Asia ki sabse badi jail yani ki Tihar Jail ke kisse jaroor sune ya  padhe honge. Aur kabhi kabhi toh tihar jail ke andar ho rahe kuch aise karname pata chalte hain jo humein bilkul hairan kardete hai. Jaise ki kai Kaidiyon ka jail ke andar se apna gang chalana aur bahar ki duniya mein crime karte rehna. Lekin kya Tihar jail ke andar ho rahe ye karname 100% sach hai?  Aur kaisi hoti hai tihar jail ke kaidiyo ki zindagi ? Tihar jail se jude aise sabhi sawal ab sawal nahi reh jayenge kyuki is audiobook ko sunne ke baad Tihar jail ke andar ki poori tasveer aapke samne hogi .

title: The Millionaire FastLane
description: Wealth Code: Live Rich Forever

title: The Interview: Afzal Guru
description:
13 December 2001 ko Indian Parliament par hue attack se kaun anjaan raha hai? Lekin kya us attack ke peeche ka asli reason jante hai aap? Kya jante hai us attack ke peeche ke mastermind ka raaz? Aur kya jante hai ki Afzal Guru ne kaise diya tha is sab ko anjaam? Agar nahi, toh is khas peshkash mein jantey hai Afzal Guru ka pura sach, Afzal Guru ki hi jubaani. 

Disclaimer: Is show mein facts ko apke entertainment ke liye dramatized trike se kaha gaya hai. Isme kahi ya boli gayi baatein kisi ek paksh ke sahi ya galat hone ka dawa nahi karti hai.

title: M.S.Dhoni Captain Cool
description: Dheeraj rakho, aasan hone se pehle sabhi cheezen mushkil nazar aati hai, kisse pata tha ki ek mamuli parivaar ka mamuli sa ladka Shaikh Saadi ki iss baat ko apni zindagi mein utaarkar cricket jagat mein halchal paida kar dega. Par iss halchal paida karne se pehle uss mamuli se ladke ko khud kai gair mamuli halchalon se guzarna pada. Aaiye iss audiobook mein experience karte hai aisi hi adbhut captain cool M.S.Dhoni ki kahaani ko

title: Bhagvadgeeta ke 11 Paath - Jeevan ko Dijiye Nayi Disha
description: If you want success in life, then adopt the knowledge of Gita. The mantra of success in life is hidden in every verse of Bhagvad Gita. Hear 11 priceless sermons of Bhagavad Gita on Kuku and fill your life with happiness.

title: Unsolved Mysteries of India
description: Ek Raaz ki baat batau? Aisa hum na jaane kitni baar sunte hai. Aise unsuljhi raaz ki baatein, jise na aap sach maan sakte hai aur naa hi jhooth nakaar sakte hai. Inke peeche koi science nahi, sirf inka vajood hai jo sadiyo se logo ne sirf mehsoos kiya hai. Aiye sunte hai aise hi kuch 'Unsolved Mysteries of India'

title: Ye Pagli Pagli Kya hai
description: रमा, सीमा, शिवानी और सोनिया चारों सहेली हैं और सामान्‍य जीवन जी रही थी। रमा का बलात्‍कार होता है जिसमें उसका प्रेमी नीरज भी शामिल होता है। अब चारों लड़कियां खुद इसका बदला लेने की सोचती हैं, क्‍योंकि उन्‍हें कानून पर भरोसा नहीं है। इस काम में उनका साथ देता है शिवानी का प्रेमी आलोक। समाज और उसके रवैये से त्रस्‍त लड़कियों का मसीहा बनती हैं रमा, सीना,‍ शिवानी और सोनिया।

title: ये इश्क है
description: Sheetal ko jo bhi ladka dekhne aata tha, Sheetal ko pasand na karke, choti behan Priya ko pasand karta tha. Aisa pehli baar hua hai jab Priya ko Dekhne aaya ladka Nitin Priya ki bajaye Sheetal ko pasand karta hai. Lekin Nitin ke pitaji is shaadi ke khilaaf ho jaate hai. Dono hi behene dekhne mein sundar, sushil aur gunvaan hai, lekin phir bhi sheetal ko na pasand karne ka kya karan tha? Kya Sheetal aur Nitin ki shaadi ho payegi? Jaan ne ke liye sune puri kahani.

title: Women Who Took India To Mars
description: Aksar log yeh kehte hain ki space science females ke liye nahi hai. Lekin Mars orbiter mission ke zariye India ke best scientist ne ye prove kar dikhaya hai ki space science mein females ke liye bhi utni hi jagah hai. Aur iss audiobook mein hum un mahilao ki baat karne wale hai jinhone India ko pehli baar Mars tak pahuchne mein bahut hi aham bhumika nibhai hai

title: Architect of Modern India- SARDAR
description: Sardar Patel, Azad Bharat ke hone wale pehle Pradhanmantri the. Par, unhone Gandhi ji ke ek ishaare pe Pradhanmantri pad ko tyag diya aur chal pade 565 tukdo mein bante desh ko jodne ki koshish mein. Kahi baat cheet se Rajwado ko bharat mein milaya toh kahi army ka istemal kar Hyderabad ke Nizam se ladai ki. Kashmir ke liye toh Nehru se matbhed bhi kiya par bharat ko tukdo mein batne se rok liya. Desh ke liye itna kuch tyagne wale Sardar ko Gandhi ji ne kyu nahi banane diya Pradhanmantri? Kyu ek chithi mein Gandhi ji ne unhe bhadkau bhashan ke liye fatkar lagayi? Kya sach mein Patel dange bhadka rahe the? Sardar ne kaise kiya tha Bharat ko ekjut? Vallabh Bhai Patel kaise bane the Sardar? Agar aapko "India After Gandhi" jaisi books pasand hain, to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: IIT Zombay
description: IIT Bombay ke campus me macha maut ka toofan. Insaan banne lage adamkhor Zombies. Zinda lashe badhne lagi Pawai lake ki taraf jahan se milta hai pure shahar ko peene ka pani. Jahan students bachane me lage hain apni jaan wahin puri Mumbai banne wali hai Kabristaan. Kaun rokega in zinda murdo ko? Janne ke liye sune IIT Zombay sirf kukufm par

title: Who Killed Jessica?
description:
Kya kisi ki jaan ek peg jitni sasti ho sakti hai? 
Is desh mein ho sakti hai. Jessica Lal, hatyakand mein na to sirf ek peg ke liye Jessica ki jaan li gayi, par gaddavar Congressi neta ke bete Manu Sharma ne is case se jude 300 se zyada gavah ko khareed liya. Par Jessica ko insaaf milta hai apni behen Sabreena ki jidd aur media ke sath se. Jane kaise ye case bana UPSC exams mein aane wale topic "Media Trials" ka sabse bada example.

title: The American Civil War
description: 1861 aur 1865 ke beech North America Mahaadveep par bhadake Amerikee grhayuddh mein kisi bhi dusre yuddh ki tulana mein Jyada Amerikiyon kee Jaan gai thi,ye America ke  poore itihaas ki sabse bhayanak  ladai thi. ek Insan ko sampatti ke roop mein rakhane ki naitikata  ke samarthan mein aur amerikee adaalaton aur satta mein virodh karane vaalon ke beech kanuni ladaee ban gai.Aur jabaki ladaee lambe samay se khatm ho gaee hai, par America mein aaj bhi sanskrti aur nasl jaise muddon par grhayuddh ke prabhaav ko mahasoos kiya ja sakta hai. to, aaie ham America ke itihaas ke us kaale adhyaay ko janenge jisme kaiyon ka khoon samaya hua hai.

title: बड़ी जासूसी कहानियाँ
description:
विश्‍व प्रसिद्ध लेखकों द्वारा लिखी गई जासूसी कहानियों का अनोखा कलेक्‍शन है ‘बड़ी जासूसी कहानियां’। ओ हेनरी, जी.के.चेस्‍टरटन, आरनॅल्‍ड बेनेट, रॉबर्ट बार तथा अन्‍य लेखकों द्वारा लिखी गईं चयनित जासूसी कहानियां पाठकों को बेहद पसंद आएंगी। रहस्‍य और रोमांच से भरपूर ये कहानियां आपका भरपूर मनोरंजन करेंगी। सुनें पूरी कहानी।
writer: भविष्य कुमार सिन्हा
Voiceover Artist : RJ Nikhil
Author : Bhavishya Kumar Sinha

title: How to file Tax?
description: Tax ka naam sunte hi logon ke hosh ud jate hai. Wajah? Unhe iss baat ki awareness hi nahi hoti ki Tax wakayi mein hai kya? Aur ise kab kab aur kin kin logon ko chukana padta hai. Kyunki agar log aware hote to unhe ye acche se pata hota ki Tax koi naye zamane ka bojh nahi. Balki yeh saalon se chali aa rahi humari responsibility hai. Issi baat ko samjhane aur logon ko Tax ke baare mein aware karne ke liye, sune humari ye audiobook. Jisme Tax se jude sabhi sawalon ke jawab dene ki humne koshish ki hai.

title: Dil Bechara
description: Nashe mein Sonal se vo ho jata hai, jiske baare mein usne kabhi kalpana bhi nhi ki hogi… Aur ek raat mein Sonal ki zindagi puri tarh se badal jati hai. Apne bachpan ke pyar ko chod ek unknown person ke sath shaadi ke bandhan mein bandh jaati hai, lakin ye shaadi sharton per thiki hai… Akhir kyu Sonal ne aisa kiya? Kya hai vo shart? Kya sonal ko succha pyaar milega? Aur bhi hai kai sawal, jiske liye chaliye sunte hai story Dil Bechara sirf Kuku FM per!

title: Meditation Tricks For Self Analysis
description: Hamari aaj kal ki modern lifestyle thodi si difficult hai aur thodi si mazedaar. Bilkul ek roller coaster ki tarah jisme maza bhi aata hai aur dar bhi lagta hai. Lekin ab is ride mein ghabraane ki zaroorat nhin hai. Bilkul bhi nhi. Kyun ki hum aapke liye laaye hain “Meditation Tricks For Self Analysis” kitab. jo batayegi apko ki kaise apne dar se paayein nizaat. To chaliye sunte hain.

title: मेरी बीवी को प्यार हो गया
description: अक्सर जो हम सोचते है वैसा होता नहीं, लाख जतन करने के बाद भी होता वही है जो हाथ की लकीरों में लिखा होता है। कुछ ऐसा ही हुआ आर्यमन औऱ सुकीर्ति के साथ,ऊपर वाले ने विपरीत परिस्थितियों के चलते उन्हें विवाह के पवित्र बंधन में बांध तो दिया पर आगे क्या होगा? सुकीर्ति की चाहत आर्यमन ही है ,या कोई और? क्‍या आर्यमन इस शादी को स्‍वीकार करेगा? सुकीर्ति उससे प्‍यार नहीं करती यह जानकर वह कोई बड़ा फैसला लेगा? सब कुछ जानते हुये उसने सुकीर्ति से शादी करने का फ़ैसला लिया ही क्यों ? कहानी में कई मजेदार मोड़ आते है और कई जगह हमारी आंखें भी नम होती है। जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी...

title: Political Knowledge Required In UPSC
description: Kehte hai, aap bina political knowledge ke Civil Services Exams paas karne ke baare mein soch hi nahi sakte. Lekin ye aasan nahi hai, kyuki Bharat jaise desh mein aapko har gali-nukkad par Cricket, Bollywood ka expert mil jayega magar Law aur politics ke expertise ke liye bina constitution ke baare mein jaane maharath haasil karna mushkil hai. Ye Audiobook aapko UPSC mein zaruri Political knowledge degi.

title: Jaago Ayodhya Jaago
description: टैक्‍सी में एक लड़की भूल जाती है अपना मोबाइल और अगले ही पल सरेआम होता है उसका मर्डर। किसने किया यह मर्डर? टैक्‍सी ड्राइवर के पास है उस लड़की का मोबाइल, तो अब क्‍या होगा? क्‍या करेगा टैक्‍सी ड्राइवर? पुलिस के पास जाएगा या फंस जाएगा किसी मुसीबत में? एक अनजान शख्‍स की नजर हमेशा उस ड्राइवर को फॉलो करती है, कौन है वो इंसान? मर्डर मिस्‍ट्री और रिश्‍तों के प्रेम की कहानी बयां करती जागो अयोध्‍या जागो सुनें केवल Kuku FM पर।

title: Dhunde apne Jeevan ka Maksad
description: Hum sab kabhi na kabhi hamare jeevan ke purpose ko jaane ki koshish karte hai magar jaan nahi paate. Zindagi bilkul sahi chal rahi hoti hai fir bhi kuch kami mehsoos hoti hai. Kho jaane aur idhar udhar bhatakne ki ye bhavna aksar bina kisi wajah ke aur isse kaise deal kare ye samajhne ke liye, ye book summary aap hi ke liye bani hai!

title: Achieve More Succeed Faster
description: Career me success paane ke liye log saalo ki mehnat aur personal time laga dete hai, par safalta paane ke liye ek aisa tested mantra hai jo kum samay me aapko wahi safalta dila sakta hai.aapka career ek marathon hai but marathon ko aap kese ek sprint race ki tarah intresting bana kar jaldi se apni position le hai . Success ki sidi par pehla kadam lene ke liye suniye ye audiobook "Achieve more suceed faster".

title: Solve Your Modern Problem With Vedas
description: Chaar Vedon ke naam to aaj kal sab ko pata hote hai, lekin Chaar Vedon mein likha kya hai ye to hum mein se bahut kam hi logon ko pata hoga. Humare show "Solve Your Modern Problem With Vedas" mein aapko Chaaro Vedon ke baare mein to jaanne ko milega hi lekin uske sath-sath ye bhi pata chalega ki kaise aap vedon ki madad se aaj ke samay ki pareshaniyon ko samajh kar unhein kaise solve kar sakte hain.

title: Dil Hai Ki Manta Nahi
description: ये कहानी है टॉल, हैंडसम एंड मोस्ट एलीजीबल बैचलर आदित्य की जो बहुत सालो बाद अपने गाँव मानपुर लौटा है , वो भी एक मकसद के साथ । मकसद अपने  दादा सा की  मौत का बदला लेने का , मकसद अपनी दादी सा की हवेली उन्हे लौटाने का। क्या होगा जब आदित्य को प्यार हो जाएगा उसी हवेली की मालकिन प्रीति से ? क्या इस नफरत की दीवार को प्रीति अपने प्यार से तोड़ पाएगी ?

title: Habits To Change Your Life
description: More than 40 percent of the actions you perform each day aren’t actual decisions, but habits. Habits shape your life far more than you probably realize. Understand their importance and learn how to use these habits to change your life

title: 9 Financial Steps To Get Rich
description: Agar aap apne financial goal achieve karna chahte hai aur financially independent hona chahte hai to suniye yeh audiobook jise likha hai Vivek ne. Vivek, The Money Book ke author hai aur unhone National Editor, Consumer Affairs, CNBC TV18 ke saath kaam kiya hai. Unhone Economic Times, Business Standard, Financial Express and India Today ke saath bhi kaam kiya hai. Inke baare mein aur janne ke liye aap iss website par jaa sakte hai https://www.moneypaathshaala.com/en

title: Pradhan Mantri
description: Pradhan Mantri ki maut ke baad sawal ye tha ki ab desh ke jimmedar pad par kise baithaya jaye. Kaun hoga wo naya Pradhan Sevak jo is desh ke Tirange ko vikas aur baki paymanon par aasman se bhi uncha le jayega. Par ye sab to tab ho pata jab Desh ki rajneeti me deemak bani gandi rajneeti hone deti. Pradhanmantri ke marte hi sab apne aap ko agla Pradhan Mantri banane ke liye har koshish me jut gaye , Delhi me Atankwadi hamla aur Desh me Sampradayik danga bhi chid gaya magar Pradhanmantri ki kursi kisi ki nazar se utri hi nahi. Kaun bana kiska virodhi ?  Kiske hath lagi satta ? Aur kiska hua jail daura in sab sawalon ka jawab janne ke liye abhi sunein poori kahani !

title: फल बेचने वाला बना Filmy सितारा दिलीप कुमार (भाग-2)
description: Bollywood mein realism lane ke liye jane vale, anubhabi film kimvadante Dilip kumar ke show business mein ek sarahani yatra rahi hai. abhineta, jise tregedy king ke naam se jaana jaata hai, ne varshon se yuva kalakaron ke pedhiyon ko prabhabhit kiya hai. unke barnan bhi kiya gaya tha. mahan film nirmata satyajit re dwara "The Ultimate method actor" ke roop mein. Dilip Kumar sabse bade bharatiya film sitaron mein se ek hain aur bharatiya cinema ke agrani hain.aiye ek najar dalte hain unke ghatanaapurn jivan ke kuch dilachast kisson par."

title: Virat Kohli: Nayi Sadi Ka Shahanshah
description:
विराट कई मायनों में युवा भारतीय का एक रूप हैं. इस नए इंडिया का साहस इसके सफल होने की चाहत के बराबर है. यहां परम्परावाद को उतनी तरजीह नहीं दी जाती बल्कि नए विचारों का स्वागत किया जाता है. एक क्रिकेटर के तौर पर विराट मास्टर बल्लेबाज बन चुके हैं और इस पीढ़ी की मशाल लेकर चल रहे हैं|
writer: राजदीप सरदेसाई
Author : Rajdeep Sardesai
Voiceover Artist : RJ Paritosh

title: How to Think Creative
description:
Kya aapko pata hai ki aap apni life mein jo bhi achieve karna chahte hain uspar rok lagane wala koi aur nahi balki aap khud hai?
Darasal koi ek insaan ho ya poori organization, decision making sabke liye humesha ek  bada task hota hai aur agar vo perfectly kar liya jae toh ek naya business start karna , business ya job mein progress karne ka naya tarika dhundhna ya fir apni personal problems ko solve karne jaise har ek kam ko quicker, easier aur better tarike se kiya ja sakta hai. Lekin hum perfect decision isliye nahi le paate kyuki hum apni life ko usi nazariye se dekh rahe hain jisse baki poori duniya, jabki  humein toh har ek situation mein vo positive dekhna chahiye jo baki koi aur na dekh pa raha ho, tbhi toh perfect decision lekar quicker and better action kiya ja sakta hai. Lekin kaise ? Iska Jawab aapko is audiobook mein milega.

title: द लास्ट हार्टबीट
description:
कहते है कि मोहब्बत अपने बन्दे खुद चुनती है और अजय और रिया को भी मोहब्बत ने ही चुना था । अजय लोवोलोजिस्ट था लोगो की अधूरी प्रेम कहानी को पूरी करने में मदद करता था । पर वह उस लड़की से प्यार कर बैठा जिस लड़की को मोहब्बत से सख्त नफरत थी । क्या हो पाएगी पूरी अजय की प्रेम कहानी जानने की लिए पढ़िए  मेरी रचना "द लास्ट हार्टबीट"
Author : Aryan Suvada
Voiceover Artist : Surabhi

title: ओनली यू अंडरस्टुड माय ड्रीम
description: शशि और सनोज की दोस्‍ती में इंट्री होती है लड़की रिया की। दोनों दोस्‍त अपने करियर और सपने को साकार करने के लिए हर संभव प्रयत्‍नशील हैं। शशि रिया को पसंद करने लगता है। क्‍या वक्‍त के साथ दोस्‍ती के मायने बदल जाएंगे?  रिया क्या शशी और सनोज की जिंदगी में मुसीबत बन के आती है? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Stock Market Me Nivesh Aur Trading Ke Secrets
description: Stock Market Kamai ka ek Aisa Jariya Jisne lakho logo ko Farsh se Arsh pe Pahuncha diya, aur kuch logo ko Arsh se Farsh pe patak diya. Leki aaj yadi sharemarket ko sahi Jankari ke sath kiya jay to ye ek achcha source ho sakta hai. Jaisa ki aap jante hai Jyadatar log jinka sirf ek income source hota hai unhe bahut dikkato ka samna karna padta hai. Yadi aap Share Market ki barikiya janna chahte hai aur ise Ek ultimate source of income banana chahte hai to is Audiobook me aapke liye bahut kuchh hai.

title: Behtareen jeevan jeene ke raaz
description: Life mein 4 principals bohot his important hote hai khush rehne ke liye, personal life, relationships, work life aur social contribution. Inn chaaron mein balance rakhna bohot jaroori hai, iss balance se aap apni zindagi mein values aur khushiyaan add kar sakte hai. Issi ke baare mein baare mein iss book summary mein bata rahe hai Guar Gopal Dasji. Aaiye suntte hai

title: My Mafia Boyfriend
description: Do raahon pe phansi Kiyara, mafia gang se khud ko azaad karana chahti hai, lakin Nik use apne pyar ke bandhan mein bandhna chahta hai. Koi aur bhi hai jo Kiyara ko puri shiddat se chahta hai, per Kiyara iss baat se bilkul anjaan hai. Mafia aur Mohabbat ke bech phansi Kiyara apni zindagi kaise bacha payegi ?…Aakhir kaise Kiara karegi halaton ka samana? Milega usye saccha pyaar ya phir ho jayegi Mafia ka shikaar…? Janane ke liye sune puri kahani sirf Kuku FM per!

title: पर्ल बक की चुनिंन्दा कहानियाँ
description: पर्ल बक अमेरिकी लेखिका थी। उन्‍होंने अपनी कहानियों के माध्‍यम से समाज, परिवार और रिश्‍तें की अहमियत को बताया है। ‘पर्ल बकी की चुनिंदा कहानियां’ आपके भीतर पॉजिटीव ऊर्जा को भर देगा। आसमान, विज्ञान और सितारों की दुनिया के सफर पर आप खुद को जमीन से जुड़ा पाएंगे। एक अनोखी कहानी सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Tum hi ho
description:
अवनि और अक्षत की अनजान मुलाकात में न जाने कौन सा जादू होता है कि अवनि अपने आपको रोक नहीं पाती और न चाहते हुए भी अक्षत की ओर खींची चली जाती है। वो उसका अतीत जानना चाहती है, उसकी हमसफर बनना चाहती है लेकिन कहानी में और भी कई ट्विस्‍ट है।
Author : Arun Pratap Singh
Script Writer : Mohil

title: Cleopatra
description: Yeh Kahani hai Misr par raaj karne wali us queen ki jiska naam duniya ke itihas mein likh chuka hai. Queen Cleopatra,  jinhone apni akalmandi aur rajneetik sujhbujh se egypt par kai salon tak raaj kiya aur apni Ptolemy dynasty ko aage badhaya . Inki kahani rajneetik chakravyuh aur love triangle se bhari hui hai. Julius caesar aur Mark antony ke sath inke rishte aaj bhi egypt ki galiyon mein gunjte hain. Is Audiobook mein inki isi kahani ke bare mein jaanege shuruaat se ant tak.

title: 5G Crimes
description: Siddharth Verma, who starts intra-day trading in lockdown and earns good money. He gets into insider trading and resorts to all illegal ways to secure their family future until Thapriya Brokerage Firm scares him and then Siddharth ends up in jail because of it but leaves a money-making platform for his son, Poorab Verma.

title: Detective Ajay : Insaaf Hokar Rahega
description: Qaatilon ne #Detective Ajay ko gumrah karne ki poori koshish ki hai. Taalab me ladki ke kapdo mei mili Chandan Kumar ki laash aur phir chehre se kharab padi ek aur ladki ki laash ne #Detective Ajay ko is baar uljha kar rakh diya hai.

title: फल बेचने वाला बना Filmy सितारा दिलीप कुमार (भाग-1)
description: Kaun the wo pahle hero jinhone Method Acting ko Hindi filmon me aazmaya, apne abba se kaun sa raaz chhupa rahe the Dilip Kumar, kaun the wo jinhone Dilip Kumar Sahab ko sabak sikhaya zindagi ka , kya tha Dilip Kumar ka pehla pyar, Dilip Kumaar ki safalta ke peeche bhi ek aurat ka hi hath tha, wo kaun thi?   Naam me kya rakha hai... bahut kuchh... kaise pada naam Dilip Kumaar?   Achha actor banne ki recipe...Dilip Kumar, Hindi film ka One of the best romantic scene, success ka koi shortcut nahin hota...Dilip Kumar.

title: India Uncovered
description:
INDIA UNCOVERED - Kho jaaye aur dhoondh nikaliye raaz itihaas ke, kinhi aise panno se jin par aaj tak dhool jami thi aur kabhi parda uthaaya nahi gaya, lekn ab aur nahi! 

Sardaar aur Nehru
Tirupati Mandir aur Baal daan
7 Sisters of India 
Naxalbaadi kaise bane Naxalites


Stay tuned to Uncovered India for more such insightful podcasts by Raj Shrivastava.

title: Indian Origin - Global Takeover
description: Sundar Pichai, Satya Nadella aur ab Parag Agrawal. Kahi Indians ab Global companies mein CEO ki position handle kar rahe hai. Par kisine socha hai ki iske peeche ka reason kya hai? Kya yeh isiliye hai kyunki hum bakiyon se zyada smart hai, ya isiliye kyunki humaari population hi itni hai? Aaiye jaante hai inn saare sawaalon ke jawaab

title: The Story Of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj
description: Chhatrapati Shivaji ek aisi personality hai jinka naam aapne zaroor hi suna hoga, lekin kya kabhi aapne jaanne ki koshish ki, ki kaise “Shivaji” bane "Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj" ? Kaisa tha unka bachpan kaise unhone Maratha samrajya banane ki shuruaat kari, unki vichardhara kya thi agar aapke paas in sab cheezo ki knowledge nahi hai to ye audiobook aap hee ke liye hai. To chaliye shuru karte hai kahani "Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj" ki aur jante unki puri life story.

title: आर्या
description: Aarya ek saadharan se ladke ki asaadharan kahani, jisne na kabhi apni parwaah ki aur na kabhi apne khushiyo ki parwaah hi parwaah ki, balki sab ko khushiya di, aaiye sunte hai uski alokik duniya ka safar.

title: Improve Your Communication Skills
description: Effective communication life ke har aspect mein kaam aata hai, jaise ki personal relationships, workplace ya public speaking mein. KUKU FM ke is original show mein, doosron ke saath effective communication karne ki apni ability ko badhane ke liye engaging exercises aur practical examples ke zariye hum aisi valuable strategies aur techniques seekhenge jinse common communication barriers ko aasaani se hatakar ek confident aur successful communicator bana ja sakta hai. Agar aapko "How To Talk To Anyone" jaisi books pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: मौत की घाटी
description:
Collection of Stories
writer: विश्व बुक्स
Voiceover Artist : Rashmi Sharma
Script Writer : VISHVA BOOKS

title: डैनी दिखना चाहते थे अमिताभ से बेहतर!
description: Kya ap jante ho ki Danny Amitabh bacchan se behtar dikhna chahte the. Kyon madhubala ko char kilometer gehre pani main paidal chalkar shooting ke liye jana para. Suniye aisi hi kuch ankahi kahaniye is audio mein aur bane rahe kukufm ke sath

title: Tum Hi Aana
description: देवों की भूमि बनारस और उसी भूमि पर जन्मी एक प्रेम कहानी, यह प्रेम कहानी तो थी पर एक तरफा थी, इंसान अपने सपने को पूरा करने की जिद में इस कदर और इस हद तक गिर जाता है कि उसे दूसरों के दुख तकलीफों का एहसास होना बंद हो जाता है, कुछ ऐसा ही हुआ था इस प्रेम कहानी में ,पंडित अंबर शास्त्री जो कि बनारस के अस्सी घाट पर पूजा पाठ करके अपना जीवन यापन करता था और एक गरीब इंसान था, अंबर को प्यार हो जाता है एक अमीर लड़की अवनी अग्रवाल से जो एक सिंगर बनने का सपना अपने दिल मे लिए घूम रही है,और यह प्यार कोई ऐसा वैसा प्यार नहीं था ,जब अंबर पहली बार अवनी को देखता है तभी उसे अपना दिल दे बैठता है और उसके लिए अपनी जान भी खतरे में डालता है पर क्या अवनी भी अंबर को उस हद तक प्यार कर सकती है जिस हद तक अंबर अवनी को करता है...? क्या अंबर को अपना प्यार मिल पाएगा...? क्या अंबर अपने प्यार का इजहार अवनी से कर पाएगा ...? और क्या अवनी अंबर के प्यार को अपना लेगी...? क्या अवनी अपने सपनों को भुलाकर अंबर से प्यार करने लगेगी ...? या फिर अवनी के मन में और कुछ चल रहा है...? इन सब सवालों के जवाब के लिए आप सुनिए लकी शर्मा द्वारा लिखित एक अद्भुत प्रेम कहानी जिसका नाम है तुम ही आना सीजन 1 सिर्फ कुकू एफ एम पर...!!!

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
description:
Iss book ke baare mein toh sabko pata hai!
[International Bestseller]

title: NCERT Class 7th Political Science
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyaari karni ho ya competitive exam mein acchi Rank laani ho Shuruaat to book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. Lekin bookish language ko samajhna thoda sa mushkil ho jata hai. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Democratic country ki importance, Fundamental rights, aur Government ke role ko bahut hi achhe se jaan jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: JNU: Achcha Ya Bura
description: India ki best universities mein se ek hai “JNU” Naam to suna hi hoga? Aur sune honge iske saath jude dher saare vivaad. Kya hai JNU ke banne ki kahani aur kaise ye “Gyan Ka Mandir” Left wing ka Makka ban gaya? Kyu aur kab Indira Gandhi ne ise shutdown kar diya tha? Kaise yahan se nikle students ne desh-videsh mein apne talent ka jhanda gada? Poori kahani lekar aa gaya hai “Kuku FM” is special show “ JNU: Achcha Ya Bura!” mein.

title: Simple techniques to boost writing, learning and thinking
description: Hum kai baar apneaap ko communication ya likhawat mein kamzor paate hai. Kya koi jhatpat tarkeeb hai jisse hum sudhar laa sake? Bilkul nahi, there is no shortcut to success. Magar smartly hum apne aap mein communication ko leke chhote choote sudhar laa sakte hai. Kaise? Aaiye janein. Agar aapko "Bird by Bird" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Indian River System Explained
description: Bharat main kul kitni nadiyan hain? kaun kahan se nikalti hai ? Ganga ki kya importance hai? Hydropower projects kaun se hain? yeh saare hi questions aapko bhi bother karte hain na? class 6th se lekar ab tak humne apni Geography main Indian drainage system bahut baar padha hai, ratta lagaya hai par yaad hi nahi rehta. Isi problem ka solution lekar aaye hai hum is show mein jahan par aap kaam karte karte aaram se samajh payenge Bharat ka complete river system. Kyunki jo information aap sunte hain wo zyada lambe samay tak yaad rakh paate hain. To Padhai hui ab aur bhi aasan KUKU FM ke saath. Abhi sunein yeh knowledge se bhara hua show.

title: Wo Khooni Dastan
description: बलमा और उसकी बीवी को पुलिस पकड़ लेती है और वे जेल में जाने वाले होते हैं। क्या वो सच में चले जाएंगे जेल? या हो जाएंगे फरार? फरार होने के बाद भी क्या होगी उनकी ज़िंदगी आसान? या भागते रहेंगे दोनों सबसे छुप बार बार? इन सवालों के जवाब जानने के लिए आइए सुनते हैं अनिल गर्ग द्वारा लिखित वो खूनी दास्तां|

title: The Best : How Elite Athletes Are Made
description: Aapko jankar hairani hogi ki South Africa mein 5 lakh Rugby players hain. Lekin unme se sirf ek Siyamthanda Kolisi hai jinhone 2019 mein apni country ko Rugby world ka title jeetaya tha. Aakhir unme aisa kya khas hai? Aur kisi bhi sports mein best banne ke liye kya karna hota hai? Iski jankari mili aapko humari is audiobook mein, jisme poore duniya ke best athletes ne alag alag sports mein best banne ke liye tips and tricks share ki hai. Aaiye ise sunkar hum sab The Best bane!

title: Safalta Ke Liye 13 Sarvasreshth Aadatein
description: Life mein har koi successfull hona chahta hai par uss success ko haasil kaise kiya jaye ? Kaise hum apni aadaton mein badlav la sakte hai ? Yahi hum janenge iss audio book mein jise likha hai Napoleon Hill Ne. Yeh audio book aapko apni aadaton ko sudhar kar jeevan mein safal hone ka vyavahrik gyaan dengi.

title: Area 51
description: Aliens kya sach mein hote hai ? America ke Area 51 mein, kya sach mein aliens hai ? Aur America us pe kaam kar rahi hai ? Kya waha sach mein UFO dekha gaya tha aur kyon waha pe abhi bhi chhup kar kaam kiya jata hai duniya se. Janiye es audiobook mein.

title: Mukti Bahini
description: Apne pyar ki talash mein Binoy bina halaat ki chinta kiye purvi pakistan pahunch jata hai, jahan is samay yuddh jaise halat bane huye hain. Binoy Mukti Bahini ka hissa bankar purvi pakistan pahunchta hai aur is dauran use jung ka bhayanak roop dekhne ko milta hai. Binoy apne is safar mein har kadam par apne sathiyon ko khota ja raha hai. Kya Binoy apni Abha se kabhi mil payega? Kya Abha abhi bhi jinda hai? Kya, apne pyar ko khojta binoy RAW ya apne desh ke kisi kaam aa payega? Kya Binoy yuddh ke ant tak bach payega? Aise hi kayi sawalon ke jawab ke liye aur 1971 ke yuddh ki ansuni kahaniyon ke liye sunein Mukti Bahini.

title: Detective Ajay- Kab Tak Chupega Qaatil
description: Mahanagar ke sabse bade college me hui Professor DK Verma ki maut ke turant baad unke secretory Satish kumar ki maut ab college me dar aur dehshat ka mahaul bana chuki thi . Har koi in do  maut ko murder to kah raha tha magar kisi ko bhi maut ka reason nahi mil rha tha . Police bhi ab haar man chuki thi magar Ajay ke hanthon me aate hi ye case ab mysterious banta chala gaya. Kya sach me DK Verma & Satish kumar ko mara gaya ya phir inki maut ka kuch aur hai dilchasp karan ? Kya is baar Detective Ajay apni maut ki banti sajishon ke beech sahi salamat Murdrer tak pahunch payega ? Kya hoga is  case ka anjam gunehgar ko Saza ya Ajay ki Maut ?

title: Kargil War Saga
description: 1971 mein Bharat se buri tarah haarne ke baad bhi Pakistan ne sabak nahin seekha, aur 1999 mein phir se humare veer jawanon ko lalkaarne ki himmat ki. Badle mein Bharatiya sena aisa muh-tod jawab diya ki itihaas mein veerta aur parakram ka ek naya adhyay likha gaya. Kya kiya tha Pakistan ne aur kaise unki sena ko hamare jawanon ne ghutne ke bal chalne par majboor kiya? Jaanne ke liye suniye Bharatiya sena ke shaurya aur parakram ki anokhi gaatha, "Kargil War Saga."

title: Shrimad Bhagwad Geeta: Business Ka Gyaan
description: Sabse best Business Guide hai humaari Bhagwad Geeta. Par iske gyaan ko business wisdom ke drishtikon se dekhne ki kala honi chahiye. Suniye yeh special audioshow aur paaiye business ki saari mushkilon ke samadhan.

title: 11 Days Towards Positivity
description:
Aaj ki tanavpurn duniya mein, hum vibhinna stroto ke madhyam se lagatar nakaratmakta ke sampark mein hai. Kuch samay nikale aur apne mann ko tanav aur nakaratmakta se mukt kare!
Ye dhyan aapko jeevan ke prati sakaratmak drishtikon rakhne ke liye madat karega.

title: 1947 Ke Baad Ka Bharat
description: Bharat ko Azaad huye 70 se zyada saal ho chuke hain aur 1947 se lekar ab tak bahut lamba safar teh kiya hai hamaare desh ne. Is Kitaab 1947 ke Baad Ka Bharat mein aapko Swantantra Bharat ki har Major Ghatna ki Soochi Year-wise Praapt Hogi. Aisi Aisi cheezein apne desh ke baare mein jo shayad aapne kabhi kahin padhi suni nhi hongi. Ayiye Suniye Yeh Audio Book SIrf KukuFM Par.

title: रिश्ता दिल से
description:
रिश्‍तों की डोर बेहद नाजुक होती है और किसी के बहकावे में आकर हम अपना ही हंसता-खेलता परिवार तबाह कर देते हैं। मीना जी भी लोगो की बातों में आकर अपने ही बेटे सक्षम का तलाक करा देती हैं। तो क्‍या सक्षम के जीवन में खुशियां कभी वापस आएंगी? सुनें पूरी कहानी...
Author : Jyoti
Voiceover Artist : Sarika Rathore

title: Maa Kahti Thi | Writer - Mumtaz Khan
description:
Maa Kehti Thi Written By Mumtaz Khan Narrated By Ashish Jain. 

अतीत जैसा भी हो उसकी स्मृतियाँ मधुर होती हैं। यदा-कदा ये स्मृतियाँ अमूल्य धरोहर बनकर जीवन का निर्माण करती हैं। इस काल खण्ड में वर्तमान भौतिकवाद के प्रभाव में आकर पूंजीवाद की भेंट चढ़ता प्रतीत होता है । लोक संस्कृति जो जीवन दर्शन के रूप में अपने बड़ों के अनुभव से पीढ़ी दर पीढ़ी प्राप्त होती थी निरंतर ह्रास की ओर अग्रसर है। 
मेरे अतीत की स्मृतियों में, वे सीख वाली लोक कथाएँ भी है जो मैंने माँ से सुनी थी। बातें साधारण थीं पर उन बातो में संपूर्ण जीवन प्रतिम्बिबित था। लोक कथाएँ जो बड़े-बूढ़ों द्वारा पीढ़ी दर पीढ़ी संतानों को सुनाई जाती रही हैं|
writer: मुमताज खान
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : Mumtaz Khan

title: Kaise Bana Earth: The History Of Earth
description: Pehle Murgi aayi ya Anda iske peeche ki conspiracy toh saalon sa chalti aa rahi hai but Earth kaise form hua aur kya thi iske peeche ki poori history from Zero to Today, ye sab jaan-ne ko milge aapko humare iss Original show mein. Toh chaliye shuru karte hain.

title: एडवेंचर्स ऑफ़ परकाया प्रवेश
description: Rajkumar Rudra ko ek Sapna Hamesha Aata hei, jyo Unke Bhavisha se judi hei. Mantri aur uske Putra Kesari ki kutanitiya se Raaja aur Rajkumar anjaan hei. Rajkumar Rudra aur Kesari Parkhaya vidya prapt grahan karte hei. Chhal se Kesari rudra ka sharir hatiya leta hei aur Rajkumar kabhi toota toh kabhi hathi mei apni jaan bachate firte hei. Akhir kaise rajkumar apni sachaie Baya kar paate hei? kya drut kesari ki sachaie samnhe aati hei? Jaane ke liye suniye puri kahani....

title: How They Killed Osama Bin Laden?
description: Ek hi jhatke mein poori duniya  mein apna khauf paida karne wala, abtak ka sabse khatarnak aatankwadi, jise america ki intelligence services aur special forces das sal tak dhundhti rahi Lekin uske khabriyon tak  ka pata bhi nahi laga pai,Us Osama Bin Laden Ke encounter ki inside story janne mein agar aapki dilchaspi hai toh ye audiobook sirf aur sirf  aapke liye hi hai. Is Audiobook mein Osama ke ek super intelligent engineer se terrorist banne ke safar aur fir 9/11 ke hamle ko anjaam dekar duniya ka sabse khatarnak terriost banne tak ki poori kahani hai. aur ye bhi ki kaise America 10 sal ke search operation ke baad  Osama ko Maut ke Ghaat utarne mein kamyaab ho paya.

title: Saddam Hussein
description: Duniya Ke Sabse Kurur Dictators Mein Se Ek Saddam Hussein Jiske Naam Se Logon Ki Rooh Tak Kaamp Uthti Thi, Jise Logon Ko Maut Ke Ghaat Utaarne Ke Liye Faansi Di Gyi, Aise Shaqs Ke Baare Mein Jab Sochte Hain Toh Lagta Hai Ki Ismein Daya Bhawna Naam Ki Cheez Hogi Hi Nahi Lekin Kya Yahi Haqeeqat Thi? Kya Vaqai Saddam Itna Bereham Tha? Ya Uski Personality Ke Kuch Aur Bhi Hisse The Jo Kabhi Bahar Na Aa Sake Jaante Hain Is Exclusive Show Par.

title: Hitler Ka Yatna Griha
description: Hitler ke atyachar se aakhir kon waakhif nahi hai. Ek aisa dictator jisne apni taakat ka galat istemal kar aise aise zulam dhaaye ki aaj bhi log uske naam se khauf khaate hain. Lekin isse bhi khaufnak agar kuch tha to wo tha Hitlar ke dwara banwayi gayi wo jagah jise kaha jata tha Hitler Concentration Camp. Par kya thi is jagah ki kahani aur kyu ise kaha jata tha itna khaufnaak. Janne ke liye suniye ye Audio book jiska naam hai “Hitler Ka Yatna Griha”.

title: Why I Killed Gandhi
description: Har Indian jaanta hai ki Nathuram Godse ne 30 January 1948 ko Mahatma Gandhi ki hatya kar di thi. Crime scene par hi arrest kar liye jaane ke baad ek saal tak chale mukadme ke wakt Nathuram Godse ne ye kitaab likhi jisme uske statement hain. Jiske baad use fansi ki saza sunai gayi. Aakhir Kyun ki Godse ne Mahatma Gandhi ki hatya? Sab janenge is audiobook mein.

title: How To Make Money On Rummy Circle
description: Kya aap jante hai ki iss digital duniya mein E-sports ki shuruaat ho chuki hai ? Aaj E- sports tezi se grow karne wali industry ban chuki hai. Aur aisi hi ek popular hui game Rummy circle hai. Rummy circle ek aisa game hai, jise khel kar hum ghar baithe baithe prize jeet sakte hai. Aaj ki audiobook mein hum aapko iss game is judi har chhoti badi baat batayenge aur aapke sawalon ka  jawab dhundhne ki koshish karenge

title: Ghar Kharido, Kam Salary Mein
description: Low income wale logo ke liye ek ghar kharidne aur home owner banne ki raah mein bahut sari difficulties aati hai. Kyuki uski down payment ke liye hi paisa bachana aasan nahi hai. Khasskar jab aap rent pe reh rahe hote hai. Par aap niraash na ho. Hum aapko batayenge ki kis tarah se aap apne ghar ke down payment ke liye paise bacha sakte hai jo aapki madad karenge apne sapno ka ghar haqikat mein badalne mein. Kyuki kam salary mein bhi sahi money management se yeh sapna sach ho sakta hai

title: Mere Humsafar
description: Middle class Avani ke pairon ke niche se jameen us waqt khisak jaati hai jab jute churane ke badle mein uske Jiju Kartik, Avani ko apne dost Saransh se shaadi karne ke liye vachan mangte hain. ye jaante huve bhi ki vo Lakshy se pyaar karti hai. Akhir majbur Avani ko shaadi ke liye tayaar hona padta hai. Lakin kya Avani iss shaadi ko dil se apna payegai? Kya hai Avani ki majboori? ye shaadi koi sajish to nhi? Zindagi ke do rahe per khadi Avani kya apne pyaar Lakshy ko hasil kar payegi? Janane ke liye sune puri kahani sirf Kuku FM per.

title: NCERT Class 12th History Part-3
description: Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT History Part-3 book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap "Colonialism, Rebels and The Raj and Framing The Constitution" jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Government Policies for Women in India
description: Aaj India mein small scale businesses mein mahilaon ki tadaad badhte hi jaa rahi hai aur Indian government bhi is koshish mein piche nahi hai. Mahilaon ko saksham aur apne pairon par khada karne ke liye gorvernment ne banks ke saath mil kar kai tarah ki scehmes banai hain magar sahi jankaari na hone ki wajah se inka fayda logon tak nahi pohnch pata hai. Ye show aapko aisi hi kai schemes aur policies ke baare mein batayega jinki madad se aap apni zindagi behtar bna sakte hain.

title: Killer Sisters
description:
Saal 1990 se 1996 ke beech Kolhapur, Pune, Nashik, jaise kayi shehron mein 40 se zyada bacchon ko kidnap kiya gaya. In bacchon ko kidnap karne ke bad inse kayi apraadh karwaye gaye, aur kaam pura hotey hi inhe rongte khadey kar dene wali maut ke anjaam utar diya gaya. Akhir kyu ek maa ne apni hi betiyon ko is darindgi ke andhere me dhakel diya? 
Aur akhir kaise dono beheno ne is khooni khel ko anjaam diya?
Jaane in maa betiyon ke hila kar rakh dene wale apraadh ki kahani humare show Killer Sisters par.

title: “रक्षक” : Duty After Death
description: India - China border pe jab us raat china ki taraf se achanak hamla shuru karne ka plan bana to  neend me doobe bhartiya sipahiyon ko ek aatma ne hamle ke pahle hi savdhaan kar diya. Itna hi nahi china ki bhayanak saazish ko is aatma ne tabah kar diya , aur Indian Army soldiers ki ladai jeetne me help ki. Ab bas ek hi sawal tha ki kaun hai ye aatma jo marne ke baad bhi kar rahi hai  bharat ki Aan - Baan - Shaan ki raksha ?  Janne ke liye abhi sunein poori kahani !

title: Bharat: Ghulami Se Azadi Tak
description: 15 Aug 1947, Jai hind ke naare lagate huye har hindustani ke liye vo garv ka samay tha jab bharat angrezon ki hukumat se azad ho gaya. Lekin kya yeh azadi bahut hi aasaan si thi ? .kis tarah angrezon ne bharat mein pair pasarne shuru kiye the? aur kab har bharatwasi ke dil mein gulami se azad hone ki chingari jaag uthi thi ? yeh sab jaanege Kuku FM par is exclusive original series mein jismein bharat ke shuruaati daur se lekar azadi aur azadi ke baad india ke har achievements ko cover kiya hai . chaliye chalte hain itihas ko phir se dauharane ke is safar par.

title: Kaise Banein SIP Se Crorepati
description: Agar main aapse kahun ki mere paas ek scheme hai jisse aap rato raat Ameer ban sakte hain to shayad aap meri baat par yakin na karen, lekin jab mai aapse kahunga ki Rich Dad Poor Dad book ki tarah mai bhi aapko wo sare upay bataunga jisse aap ameer ban sakte hain tab shayad aap meri baat par zaroor yakin karenge. Hum sab jante hain ki Investment se ye sab mumkin hai lekin sath he agar aap SIP Mutual Fund ke kuch rules ko follow karenge to aapko jaldi he ameer banne se koi nahi rok sakta. Is Audio Book " Kaise Banein SIP Se Crorepatir" mein hamne un sare formula ke bare mein baat ki hai jo aapke Crorepati banne ke Journey mein aapki madad karegi.

title: Currency Ka Khel
description: Hum sabne world wars ke bare mein to suna hai, magar kya aap jante hai usse bhi khatarnak ek aisa war hota hai jo sab kuch tabah kar deta hai, bina kisi ki jaan liye. Vo war duniya bhar ke deshon ki sarkar ladte hain, shatranj ki chaalon ki tarah aur usse kehte hain, Currency Wars, jise agar control nahi kiya to janiye iska impact kya ho sakta hai

title: Yaaro ki Yaari
description: ये तो आप सभी ने सुना होगा कि यारों की यारी दुनिया पे पडती है भारी। और अगर यही यारी 16 दोस्तों की हो जाए तो कहानी भी और भारी हो ही जाती है। यह कहानी ऐसे शरारती बहादुर दोस्तो की है जो सभी को अपने साहस और चतुराई से प्रभावित कर देते हैं। इस कहानी के अहम पात्र हैं देव और मीरा। मीरा और देव की लव स्टोरी में उतार-चढ़ाव भी खूब आते है यहा मीरा रिच फैमिली से है तो देव भी अच्छे घर का पर गांव का छोरा है। तो क्या मीरा के घरवाले उनकी इस मोहब्बत को स्वीकार करेंगे? इन सभी की ज़िन्दगी में ऐसे कौन से खलल आएंगे जो सबके जीवन में खलबली मचा देंगे? जानने के लिए सुनिए सिमारप्रित सिंह की ये कहानी यारों की यारी!

title: गौरतलब कहानियां (कहानी संग्रह)
description: Gautalab kahaniyon ' kahaniyo ka sangrah hri jisme 17 chuninda kahaniya shamil hei. Kahaniyan ki sabse badi Khubi hri Ki ve Listers ko nirash nahi karegi. Inn Kahaniyon mei samaj, Rishtey, Parivaar, samajik Sanskar, Rudiya, sikh shamil hei, jyo listerners ko Unsr Jodta hai

title: The Star is Back
description:
वीजे..! बॉलीवुड का वो चमकता सितारा जिसने अपनी सिंगिंग के दम पर 2 सालों तक म्यूजिक इंडस्ट्री पर राज किया। लेकिन एक ही साल में वो अर्श से फर्श पर आ गया। क्या शराब, घमण्ड, और सेक्स ने किया था उसका करियर बर्बाद या फिर हुई थी उसके साथ कोई साजिश! 
जानने के लिए सुनिए राजेन्द्र कुमार शास्त्री द्वारा लिखित The Star Is Back. आपके अपने फेवरेट Kuku Fm पर। सुनें जो मन चाहे!

title: Multiply Your Money With Fixed Deposits
description: Ek survey ke anusaar 95% Indian households aaj bhi Fixed Deposit mein invest karte hai. Kyon Fixed Deposit aaj bhi itna relevant hai? Kai saare high return investment options aaj market mein available hain, fir bhi zyadatar log Fixed Deposit hi kyon chunte hain?  Kyon Fixed Deposit aaj bhi ek safe investment option hai? Janiye iss original show mein

title: The Great Salesman
description: Kehte Hain Sales Ek Aisa Skill Hai Jo Har Insaan Ko Aana Chahiye. Hamari Poori Zindagi Mein Kabhi Na Kabhi Kuch Sell Zaroor Karte Hain. Jaise Ek Acchi Job Haasil Karne Ke Liye Hum Saamne Wale Ko Apne Skill Bechte Hain, Koi Deal Karte Waqt Hum Apne Ideas Ko Bechate Hain Aur Agar Baat Ki Jaye Business Ki Toh Ye Kaam Seedha Seedha Juda Hota Hai Hamare Products Aur Services Ki Sale Se Toh Chaliye Jaante Hain Kaise Ban Sakte Aap Ek Great Salesman?

title: Jee Le Zara
description: Delhi ke sabse mashoor strip club ki sabse famous stripper Raasha ne apne jalwo se kayi logo ko apna deewana banaya tha. 'Rasha' ki asli pehchaan 'Rashi' duniya se chippa ek gehra raaz tha, jise ek ameer businessman Siddhant apne faayde ke liye istemaal kar raha tha. Wo uske sath ek Contract Marriage mein phans jaati hai. Kya Raasha ki zindagi is contract mein qaid ho jayegi?

title: Rashtrapati : Bharat Ke Mahamahim Ki Kahaniyan
description: 15 August, 1947. Azadi ke saath shuru hua is desh ke liye aage ka rasta taiyar karne ka kaam. Bana Bharat ka Samvidhan aur bana desh ka sarvochch pad “Rashtrapati”.Aur fir shuru hui is pad tak pahunchane ki rajneetik daud.Is daud mein jo jeeta vahi bana “Mahamahim”.May, 2022 tak ye desh 14 Rashtrapatiyon dekh chuka hai.Aur in sab ke bachpan se lekar Delhi ke Rashtrapati bhawan tak pahuchne ke dilchasp qisse lekar “KUKU Fm” aur “The lallantop” milkar le aaye hain is audio book mein.1st president Dr. Rajendra Prasad se lekar Shree Ram Nath Kovind ji tak sabke qisse jaan lene ki aa gayi hai baari.Chaliye fir itihas ke is safar mein KUKU Fm ke saath.

title: Pehla Pehla Pyaar Hai
description: अपनी आगे की पढ़ाई पूरी करने के लिए इशिता पहुंचती है माउंट आबू । इस अनजान शहर में होती है दोस्‍ती और वंश के रूप में उसे  मिलता है सच्‍चा प्‍यार। खूबसूरत वादियों के बीच बढ़ता है वंश और इशिता का रोमांस लेकिन आता है ऐसा मोड़ जहां हो जाती है दोनों की राहें जुदा। अपनी मोहब्‍बत को दिल में दफन कर दोनों करते हैं समय से समझौता लेकिन कहानी यहीं खत्‍म नहीं होती है बॉस! आपको क्‍या लगता है जुदा हो जाएगा इनका प्‍यार?  या फिर प्‍यार की तड़प ले आएगी इन्‍हें साथ? किस्‍मत क्‍या नया खेल खेलेगी जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी पहला पहला प्‍यार है सिर्फ कुकू एफएम पर।

title: Chauri Chaura Andolan
description: Chaura Chauri Andolan ? and not an incident, aisa shayd he kise ne suna ho, jis ghatna ko humne apne History books mein ek Violent Incident samajh kar padha,  kya sach mein wo bas ek incident tha ya usse kahin jyada tha? aakhir kaise seedhe saadhe Kisaan itne violent hogaye ke unhone poora Police Station hi jala daala ? Gandhi jee ke iss incident par kya rai thi? Kya wakai jo hume padhaya gaya wo he sacchai hai? inn sab questions ke aapko detail mein jawab milenge humari iss informative audio series mein.

title: मोहब्बत है तुमसे
description: Yaari, dosti, pyaar-vyaar kuch aise hi kahani hai "Mohabbat hai tumse" ki aur oyaar ki kahani mein villain na ho to kahani adhuri lagti hai. Rohan Sana, Aazam-Alfiya, Karan-Nisha, Ayaan-Zoya ke couple ki love story mein villain hai Aashish aur Jannat. Kahani mein kayi dilchasp mode aur dil ko gudgudane waale pyaare pal hai.

title: Love Conspiracy
description: प्यार के शिकंजे में फंसी हैं तीन जानें। हरमन नीतू और किरण। पर क्या यही रचा रहे हैं अपने प्रेम का खेल या कर रहा है कोई साज़िश इनकी मोहब्बत की?

title: अगर तुम ना होते
description: सुने एक लेखक की ऐसी कहानी जिसके कहानी के सारे कलाकार असल ज़िन्दगी के उलझे रिश्ते के प्यादे बन जाते है। अपनी ज़िन्दगी में आगे क्या होगा जानने के लिए इस कहानी के आगे पड़ाव  बेचैन यह किरदार कैसे संभालेंगे अपने रिश्ते ?

title: RAW ke khufiya duniya ki jhalak
description: Research & Analysis Wing, Bharat ki bahari khufiya agency - Desh ke sabse kam samjhe jaane wale sansthano mein se ek hai. Kya hai ye sangathan, iski sarachna, bhoomika aur vision kya hai? Aakhir ye kaam kaise karti hai aur kyun ki gai sthapit? Ise chalane wale log kaise reh paate hai gumnaam aur kya hote hai inke kaam? Aaiye, jaane.

title: बीच हाउस
description: Goa ka beach house... jo rahasya aur romanch se bhara hai. Uski sacchai kya hai aaj tak koi nahi jaanta. Lekin is haunted house ke taar Vedika ke parivaar se juda hua hai. Ajnabee kabeer ke saath vedika pahuchti hai beach house, jaha pahle se kuch log pahuch chuke pahle se kuch chuka hai. Kaun hai ye log? Kya Vedika sachai jaan paayegi? Kabeer kaun hai aur wah Vedika ki madad kya karna chahte hai? Beach house se aati khaufnaak cheekhe kiski hai? Jaan ne ke liye sune puri kahani keval KuKU FM par.

title: खूनी तख़्त
description:
हुसैनाबादी सल्‍तनत की गद्दी पर जो भी विराजमान होता था उसकी मृत्‍यु हो जाती थी। शहज़ादे मुस्तफ़ा की रूह के कारण हुसैनाबाद की गद्दी खूनी तख़्त बन गई है। नए हवलदार रुस्तम को यह समस्‍या हल करने की जिम्‍मेदारी सौंपी जाती है। तो क्‍या रुस्तम हुसैनाबाद के तख्‍त को मुस्‍तफा की खौफनाक रूह से आज़ाद करा पाएगा?
Script Writer : Mohil
Author : एकांत

title: Buffettology
description: Top 10 Billionaires mein se ek Warren Buffett ka naam to aapne suna hi hoga. Warren Buffett duniya mein sabse successful investors mein se ek hai aur hum sab ko kabhi na kabhi yeh prashna to hua hi hoga ki kya hai unke trade secrets ? Kis stocks mein unke investment hai ? Unka approach kya hai ? Kaise bane wo vishwa ke dhani mein se ek ? Yeh sawalo ke jawab aap ko milenge iss audiobook mein. Agar aapko "The Intelligent Investor" jaisi books pasand hain, to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Maa Kali
description: Adi shakti ka sakshat roop, samay aur mrityu ki devi hain Maa Kali. Sare jagat ki mata maa Jagdamba ko kyon lena pada Maa Kali ka roop? Maa Durga ke sath kyon hoti hai Mahishasur ki bhi pooja? Kyon Devta bhi kanpte hain Maa Kali ke naam se? Aakhir kyon Maa Kali ne rakha tha Mahadev ke seene par apna pair? Aaiye jaante hain Maa Kali ki sabse rochak kahaniyan is show mein.

title: The Way of Peace
description: Jeevan mein ek insaan ko aakhir saare anubhav bhogne ke baad kya chahiye - Shaanti! Mann ki shaanti hi param shaanti hai. Shaanti ki praapti parmeshwar ke dwaar kholti hai. Dhyaan aapke andar shaanti ke niswaarth aur param punya abhaav ke vyaktitva ko ujaagar karega. Agar jeevan mein shaanti ka marg chahiye, toh aaye hum sab sune is audiobook ko jo hame dikhaayegi - The Way of Peace!

title: Reasons to Stay Alive
description: Duniya mein har 5 mein se ek insaan depression se jujh raha hai, unme se ek Matt Haig bhi the. Lekin, unhone depression ko apne aap ko khatam nahi karne diya. Ulta Matt ne har roz, har minute, iss bimaari se ladayi ladi. Apni iss kitaab mein, writer ne yahi bataya hai ki, kaise depression hone ke baad, aapke paas sirf 2 choices hoti hai, ya toh aap usse khud ko puri tarah conquer karne de, ya fir usse ladkar, apne aap, chhoti chhoti khushiyon ke liye zinda rakhe. Chaliye jante hai ki, iss impossible ko Matt Haig ne kaise possible kiya.

title: Detective Ajay - Asli Qatil Kaun
description: Bedroom me Kamini Saxena ki khoon se sani dead body dekh kar uske Bhai aur Ma ka dil dahal gaya , Wahin usi waqt  Kamini Saxena ke Business partner Robert D'souza  ki patni  Julie D'souz apne pati ki talash ke liye Police aur Detective Ajay  se madad mangti hai.  Ek hi waqt  par Kamini ka Murder aur Buisness Partner Robert D'souza ka lapata hona aakhir kaisa coincidence hai . Kaun hai Kamini ka Asli Qatil ? Kya Detective Ajay is baar bhi ye case asani se solve kar lega ya phir kahani me honge abhi aur Murders ? Janne ke liye Abhi sune !

title: NCERT Class 12th History Part-2
description: Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT History Part-2 book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap "Bhakti Sufi Tradition, Imperial Capital Vijayanagara, Peasants Zamindar and The State" jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Mindfulness Ki Best Exercises
description: Yeh Original Show aapko Mind and Body ke beech ke Connection ko Explain Karta Hai. Aur batata hai ki hamare Past Experiences, hamare Present ke Behaviour ko kaise Effect karta hai.  Ise Sunne ke bad aap khud se aur connected feel karne lagenge, aap apne kaam ko mindfulness ke sath karne lagenge aur Apne Mind ko kaise balance rakhein, seekh sakte hain.

title: 10 Benefits of Thinking Big
description:
The Magic of Thinking Big, first published in 1959, is a self-help book by David J. Schwartz.
According to Forbes, it is one of the greatest self-help books. 

Thinking big widens your horizons, taking you out of the ordinary and into the extraordinary. Practice putting this thinking into effect, and take action. Put no limits on your goals. Go for bigger and better, and have the passion, drive and energy to make your dreams into reality.

Go, listen to this audio course now!

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hai Bharatvarsh : Samrat Ashok
description: Samrat ashok ki mrityu karib 2300 sal  gujar chuke  hain, lekin unke bichar apko har jagah dikhai denge. Humare tirenge ka chakra, char singhmukh wala humara rashtriya prateek,ahingsha ke prati humara runjhan, hamari dharmnirpeksh vyavastha, in sabhi mein ashok ki chhap milti hain.

title: रहस्मय टापू
description: Prastut upnyaas "Rahasyamay Taapu" angrezi ke prakhyaat lekhak Robert Luis Stevenson ke prasidh angrezi upnyaas "Treasure Island" ka Hindi rupantaran hai. Upnyaas ka naayak jin jis prakar samudra ke beech khajaane ki khoj mein nikalta hai wo ise aur romanchak bana deta hai. Kahani mein Jim ek Nirjan Taapu par khunkar daakuon ka saamna karta hai aur kadam kadam par kayi kathinayo ka saamna bhi karta hai. Is baalak ke kaarnamo ko sun kar aapke rongte khade ho jayenge. Sune Ramesh Neyar dwaara rupantrit ye pustak Hindi mein aapke apne Kuku FM par. Sune jo man chahe!

title: Modern Science Aur Hamara Universe
description:
Modern Physics se aap kya samajhte hain? Kya aane wale waqt mein hamara modern science is duniya ki tabahi ka karan banega? Ya hoga koi aur revolution, aise bahut se sawal honge aapke man mein aur aapke inhe sawalon ka jawaab dene hum aapke liye lekar aaye hain Quantum Physics ki jaankari. Es show ko sun kar aap Quantum physics aur Modern Science se jude kai important questions ka jawab de payenge. Modern Physics aur humare Universe ko samajhne ke liye suniye yeh khaas audio show. 
Special Thanks to Research Scientist "Kishor Bharti" for providing valuable insights for this special show.

title: Free To Focus
description: Zyadatar log sochte hai ki productivity samay dhundne ka bachane ke baare mein hai. Lekin aisa nahi hai. Hamara samay hamare liye kaise kaam kaam karta hai, us baare mein hai. Is book summary mein aap ko milenge kaam par jeetne ke 9 proven tarike taaki ant mein aap jeevan ke baaki hisso mein safal hone ke liye swatantra ho..jaise health, relations, hobbies aur bohot kuch!

title: Robots VS Humans
description: Digital yug me hum har din ek technology shift dekhte hain jo roz khud apne aap ko behtar bana rahi hai. Einstein, Stephen Hawking, Elon Musk, Google ke researchers ka kehna hai ke Artificial intelligence yani Robots ka dimag insan ka sabse bada dushman hai. Chaliye sunte hain Insaan ke sabse bade dushman ki kahani aur kaise karega wo insaano ki jobs, career aur humanity ka THE END.

title: Naina
description:
Insaan aur icchadhari billi ke bich ki ek aisi prem kahani jisne poore catland ko hila diya. Dogland, Bhediyaland aur Prithvi bhi isse bach nahi paaye.
Sacche prem, dhokhe, chhal-kapat aur kroorta se bhari ek anokhi romanchak daastan. Kya hai Shilpi ke sapno ka raaj? Kaun hai Reva aur wo kyun kaid hai shraap me? kya Naina apne purnjanm ke pyaar ko pa saki? Kya icchadhari khoonkhaar janwaron ke bich fansi Naina bacha payegi khud ko aur apne premi ko?  ya is prem aur yudh me tabah ho jayega poora Catland? shuru ho raha hai ek nayi duniya ka safar jo dega action, romance aur suspense ka bharpoor dose!

title: The Science Of Success
description: क्‍या आप सफल होना चाहते हैं? क्‍या आप चाहते हैं कि दुनिया में आपकी अपनी एक पहचान हो? तो कुकू एफएम पर सुनें, फुल बुक ‘सक्‍सेस के वैज्ञानिक सूत्र’ और जानें कामयाबी का शानदार फॉर्मूला।

title: Tilismi Khajana
description:
Band Khandhar ke Darwaze mei, Tilismi Khazana kar raha hai, Sadiyon Se Intezaar! Ankhir Kya hai rahsya, Khandhar mei bhikre Nar Kankalon ka? Aur Kisko Bula Rahi hai Khandhar se Aati Awaaz? Do Veer Yuvak, 'Arjun Aur Pandit' Nikal Pade hain Tilismi Khazane ki talash mei! Kya Pariyon Ka Nritya dekhne ke Baad woh unke maya jaal se baach payenge? 
Kya bhed Payenge Apni Budhi Aur Bal se Khajane ka Rahsya...?

title: कालचक्र को चलने दो
description: Jo manusya beta rehta hei, Uska Saubhaagya bhi ruka rehta hei. Jyo Utha Khada hota hei, uska Saubhaagya bhi ussi  prakar utha hei. Jyo Pada rehta hei, uss ka Saubhaagya bhi sao jaata hei. Aur jyo Vicharan me lagta hei uska Saubhaagya bhi chalne lagta hei. Isliye Tum vicharan hi karte raho.

title: Dharm Rakshak : Yudhishthir
description: Dharmraj kehlane wale Yudhishthir ne na keval apne bhaiyon ke jeevan ki raksha ki, balki unhone Mahabharat ke yuddh mein dilai dharm ko vijay. Par wo kyon chup chap dekhte rahe Draupadi ka cheer haran? Kyon kiya unhone Dronacharya ke saath dhokha? Aur in aaropon ke baad bhi wo kyon kehlaye Dharmraj? Aaiye jaante hain is show mein

title: The Gift : 12 Lessons to Save Your Life
description: ZIndagi sukh dukh ka combination hai jaha sab apne purane bad experience ko humesha sath le kar chalte hai . Ye kahani holocaust survivor Edith Eger ki hai ke kese unhone apna bachpan nazi concentration camps me bitaya apne aapko sambhala aur psychology padhkar dusro ki madad ki , ye kitab ek ultimate healing guide hai , jo aapke liye ek achhe dost ki tarah apko zindagi ki positive side dikhayega, to chaliye sunte hai...

title: Management Lessons From Iconic Brands Of India
description: Aaj India mein har koi start up karna chahta hai magar iska success rate kaafi kam hai. Toh kaunse aise points hai jo young Indian Entrepreneurs miss kar jaate hai? Janenge hamare apne kuch brands se jo India mein bane aur success ki sidhi chadhte chadhte duse desho tak pohoch gaye! Suniye is audiobook mein...

title: Ajab Sa Ishq
description: Zindagi ke sach se anjaan, jaha Kaajal apne ateet ko bhula kar paanch saal baad ek nayi shuruaat ki aas mein apne chote chote do bacchon ke sath Delhi wapis aati hai. Wahin Armaan Oberoi, Kaajal ki shakal se anjaan un do bacchon ka sach jaanne ke baad uski duniya uthal puthal karne ki har mumkin koshish karta hai. Aur isi beech khulta hai paanch saal pehle ki us raat ka ek raaz jise dono hi kahi dafan kar baithe the. Ab kya is raaz ka sach dono ko aur nazdeek laayega ya ek dusre ke liye hui is nafrat ko aur badhayega?

title: 8 Financial Secrets For Entrepreneurs
description: Business karna ek art ki tarah hota hai. Jisme har koi apne alag dhang se kaam karta hai. Aur yeh bhi sach hai ke har art kuch specific skills ko milakar banta hai jo skills seekhe parkhe jaa sakte hain. Kuch skills aise hote hain jinki zarurat har tarah ke businessman ko padti hai. Is audiobook mein Author Apurva Parikh aisi 8 cheezon ke baare mein baat karte hain jo beginners se lekar veteran businessman sab istemal karte hain. Agar aap bhi ek business shuru karna chahte hain ya fir shuru kar chuke hain to yeh kitaab aap ke liye hai. Suniye 8 Financial Secrets for Entrepreneurs Hindi mein sirf Kukufm Par.

title: Thok Denge
description: Aadhi raat ko jab 8 Police walon par achanak goliyan barsi to agle din poore Uttar Pradesh me Dhirendra Shukla ke naam ka atank fail gaya. Na sirf Police headquarters & Political residences me hadkamp macha balki News channel se le kar sadak par Junta ka Aakrosh bhadak utha. Har koi sirf Dhirendra ko salakhon ke peeche dekhna chahta tha kyunki bahadur police jawanon ki maut ka badla har kisi ko chahiye tha. Par Police ek baar phir fail ho gai thi kyunki Dhirendra Shukla jane kahan farar ho chuka tha. Kaun hai ye kukhyat gangster Dhirendra shukla jiske Apradhon ki list me ab police ki bhi hatya shamil ho chuki hai. Kaun dhoondhega  Dhirendra ko aur kaise lega police department milkar  ,  8 shaheed police walon ki shahadat ka badla ? Janne ke liye Abhi sunein poori kahani !

title: What If?
description: Corona iss duniya se kabhi khatam hi na ho toh? World War 3 kal agar shuru ho jaaye toh? Internet hi band ho jaaye toh? Aise kahi sawaal hai joh humesha apne dimaag mein ghumte rehte hai. Iss series mein hum aise hi sawaalon ke jawaab leke aaye hai. Toh aaiye chalte hai Possibilities ki duniya mein

title: Detective Ajay- Jungle ke Shikari
description: #Detective Ajay Vs #Jungle ke Shikari ll #Village Dev Pura me lagatar milti Jawan lashon ne gaon walon ki neend uda di. Usi gaon ke #Jungle me ho rahi hai dardnak #Animal_Hunting Par Kyun ? Kya hai Jungle aur Gaon  ka #Murder  connection ?  Kya Ajay Junglee janwaron ke khatre ke beech rah kar dhoond payega Qatilon ko is baar  ? Aur sabse bada sawal : Kaise bachayega Ajay dushmanon ke failaye maut ke jaal se khud ko ?  Abhi Suniye ! Detective Ajay : Jungle Ke Shikari.

title: Rise of ISRO - The Pride of India
description: 1963 ka ek desh Bharat, jo Azadi ke bad apna sar uthane ki koshish kar raha tha, ISRO jiska Cycle se shuru hua ye safar aaj, Mangal, Chand se hota hua puri duniya me apni alag Pehchan bana chuka hai. Kaise INDIA aaj world ke Top 10 Space countries me shamil ho paya? Kaise aaj Pure World ke liye sabse cheapest Space Launch center bana? SLV. PSLV, GSLV kaise bani? 1963 se 2022 tak pahunchne ka safar easy nahi tha, aapko is series mein hum sab kuch batayenge vistar se.

title: Goa Mukti Sangram
description: Kya aap manenge ki bhartiya azaadi ke 14 saal baad tak Goa akhand bharat ka hissa nahi balki Portugal ka hissa tha. 1961 mein ek jung chidhi, jise naam diya gaya 'Operation Vijay'. Bhartiya sena ne Goan Dictatorship, Salazar Regime par halla bola diya. 17- 19 December tak ladi gayi is jung mein aakhikaar Goa azaad hua. Goa ke kraantikaariyo ne bhi is sangram mein bhartiya sena ka saath diya. Nehru se lekar VP Menon aur Ram Manohar Lohia jaise leaders ne kaise Goa ki azaadi ka naksha racha, jaanenge is KuKu Original series mein.

title: Kaise Karein Influence?
description: “INFLUENCER” shabd sunte hi aapke dimaag mein Instagram ki kuch profiles jinko "Chamchamata Blue Tick Mila Hota" hai ya kuch bade naami You Tubers ka chehra aankhon ke saamne dikhne lagta hai na? Aap bhi chahte ho na ki duniya aapse INFLUENCE ho. Aapko log apna idol manein aur aapke jaisa banana chahein? Aakhir Kaun nahin chahata. Lekin Kaise? To bas aapke isi kaise ka jawaab dene aur aapko INFLUENCER ke beech apni pehchaan banane ki sateek tips dene ke liye hi to aapka "KUKU Fm" le aaya hai “Kaise Karein Influence"?

title: चंद्रकांता
description: चन्द्रकान्ता, सरल भाषा में एक प्रेम और घृणा के बीच जूझती कहानी है। विजयगढ़ की राजकुमारी चन्द्रकान्ता और नवगढ़ के राजकुमार वीरेन्द्र विक्रम को एक दूसरे से प्रेम हो जाता है। परन्तु इन दोनों ही राजघरानों में दुश्मनी है। इस कहानी का आकर्षण है तिलिस्मी और ऐयारी के अनेक चमत्कार जो आपको विस्मित तो करेंगे ही, साथ ही एक रहस्य के जरिए रोचकता भी प्रदान करेंगे।

title: हिडन वॉरियर्स
description: Manali Mein Achanak Dheere- Dheere Dharmik guru, Sant aur gaon ke log gayab hone laagete hei. Yaha kam ek khoonkhar praniyo ka hei, lekin kon hei yeh prani? Kaha se aaya hei? Yeh ko sajish hei ya hadsaa koi nahi samaj paa raha hei. Iss rahasya ka paata karne patrakar Pratik aur Kruti manali ke Rakcham Gaon Pohacte hei. Unki mulakat waha ke Inspector Shamsher se hoti hei. Kruti Hidden Warriors Group ki Sadsya rah chuki hei, Iss baat se Pratik anjaan hei, Lekin Shamsher janta hei. Toh kya yeh teeno uss khatarnak prani ko maar payenge? kya rahasya se pradha utega???? Janeke liye Sunne Puri kahani Hidden Warriors.

title: Sports Management
description: Sports me career ki Opportunities bahut sari hai lekin kya aap jante hai ki Player ke alava bhi aap sports me achha khasa career bana sakte hai, aaj sports me gajab ki growth or popularity dekhne mil rahi hai, IPL ho, Hockey ho ya Kabaddi league ho fan following badti hi ja rahi hai aur market bhi. iska ek sabse Important part hai Management are jaha demand bahut hai pr awareness km hai. yadi aap games me ya sports me interest rakhte hai to aapke liye ye Hamari series bahut helpful rahegi.

title: Behad
description: Bachpan me Eva ki aankhon ke samne uske parents ki goli maar kar hatya karne wale wo log aaj bhi Eva ki aankho me dushman ban kar nachte hain, aur isi trauma ki wajah se eva khel rahi hai apni hi zindagi se... magar Eva ko jaan se jayada chahne wala Ruhan uski safety ke liye kar leta hai usse shadi !! aur uske baad samne aata hai Ruhan ka ek aisa sach jisne Eva ke dil me laga di Ruhan ke liye ek nafrat ki aag!!  Kya hai ye sach? aur ab kya hoga inke salon purane pyar ka? Sunein Abhi !

title: Financial Independence Paane ki Recipe
description: Kam samay mein zyada paisa kamane ke liye step by step guide, taaki aapke paas apni pasandida cheezon ke liye adhik samay ho aur retire hone tak rukne ki zarurat na pade! Agar Aapko "Financial Freedom" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Bermuda Triangle - An Ancient Mystery
description: Bermuda triangle se judi aapne kai kahaniyo ko suna hoga, Ye Smudri duniya ka ek Aisa raj hai jaha 2000 se jyada Jahaj aur 200 se Jyada Viman isme dfan ho chuke hai. Unme se bahuto ka to Namo Nishan bhi nahi mila. Is series me Bermuda Triangle se judi har ek jankari aap tak pahunchayenge  aur is Mysrery se parda uthayenge. Akhir kitna sach hai is kahani me aur kitna jhunt? Janenge detail me.

title: Tata Steel Ka Romance
description: Ek film ka dialogue jisme kaha gaya hai ki Babumoshai zindagi lambi nahi badi honi chahiye aur ye dialogue Tata Company ke malikon par kya khoob baithta hai. Aaj agar hum apni zindagi ke kisi bhi hisse ko utha kar dekh len to usme Tata ke kisi na kisi Product ka istemal hume zaroor milega, ab chahe wo Tata ki namak ho ya Tata ki gadiyan. Par Aakhir kaise hui Tata ki shuruat,?Kisne rakhi thi Tata ki neev? Kyun kaha jata hai Tata ko Backbone of India? Aur kya hai Tata steel ke Romance ki kahani janne ke liye suniye R.M. Lala ki ye Audio Book.

title: Mindsets And Practices Of Excellent CEOs
description: Jab hum kisi company mein job karte hai, to hum yahi sochte hai ki hum apni job mein progress karte jaye aur ek din aisa aaye, jab hum company ke sabse unchi profile par pohch jaye, CEO ban jaye. To iss audio book mein hum janenge ki CEO banne ke liye humare andar kaun kaun si qualities honi chahiye aur kaise hum khud ko ek excellent CEO bana sakte hai. Saath hi hum janenge excellent CEO ke 6 mindset ke baare mein

title: Izzat ka Dhanda
description: एक शहर और उससे गायब होती लड़कियां. यह कहानी है एक ऐसे शहर की जहाँ जवान लडकियां हर जगह से एक के बाद एक गायब हो रही है और पुलिस हाथ पर हाथ धरे बैठी है. पुलिस की ख़ामोशी कही उन पर ही भारी ना पड़ जाए? क्या होगा जब पुलिस की बेटी होगी गायब?

title: Jung Apne Ego se
description: Ek baar jab hume safalta mil jaaye toh hamara ahankar hume andha bana sakta hai aur isse bachna bado-bado se sambhav nahi hua hai. Ego humesha cheezen destroy karta hai, magar iski pehchan kaise ki jaaye? Kiase bache hamare ego se? Aaiye jaane

title: Being to becoming Buddha
description: Aakhir kaise ek raj-parivar mein janma balak sinhasan ko chhodkar dharm ka maarg apnata hai? Kaise ek naye dharm ki sthapna karta hai jiski khyati desh-videsh tak pohochti hai? Jaanenge is audio mein! Agar aapko 'Buddha's Brain' jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Untouchable's Life
description: Sochiye agar aapko school mein class shuru hone se pehle jhadu lagaane ko keh diya jaaye ya fir khaane mein chawal ka paani pee pee ke guzarna karna pade to kya aap aisi zindagi jeena pasand karenge? Aap ka jawaab "Na" hi hoga lekin kya aapko pata hai isse bhi buri haalat mein ek untouchable ki poori zindagi beet jaati hai. Aaj ke humare is show me aapko hum ek untouchable ki zindagi se rubaru karaenge aur hum yakeen se keh sakte hain ki kuch qisse sun ke shayad aapki ankhon me aansu bhi aajayein. To chaliye shuru karte hai.

title: ज़ुनून – ऐ मर्डर मिस्ट्री
description: डबल मर्डर की एक ऐसी गुत्थी, जो पुलिस प्रशासन के सुलझाए न सुलझ रही थी। क्या ये कोई ड्रग एंगल था या कुछ और? लालच, महत्वाकांक्षा और ज़ुनून की एक ऐसी रहस्यमय गाथा, जो आपको झकझोर कर रख देगी। ऐसे में क्या जासूस अश्विन ग्रोवर कामयाब हो पाता है कत्ल की इस गुत्थी को सुलझाने में? तो सुनिए अश्विन ग्रोवर की रंगीन दुनियां और सुलझाते हैं कत्ल की इस गुत्थी को जहां है तो बस सिर्फ ज़ुनून।

title: Rent vs Buy in 2023
description:
Roti aur kapde ke baad agar insaan ki koi zaroorat hai toh wo hai - Ghar. Magar ab khud ka ghar hona pehle jitni aasan baat nahi rahi. Real estate ke market ka utaar chadhav humein confused rakhta hai ki rented ghar sahi rahega ya khudka ghar khareeda jaaye? 
Jaane dono ke fayde, nuksaan aur fir karein apne liye faisla, sunein ye show!

title: Become A Smart Investor
description: Stock Market ek aisi market hai jise samajhna koi asaan baat nahi hai, saalon ka experience rakhne waale traders bhi apne aap ko ek learner hi kehte hain aur market ko khud se bada batate hain. Lekin jo is market ko samajh lete hain unke liye stock market mein profit earn karna koi badi baat nahi. Aise hi logon ko hum aksar "Smart Investor" bulate hain. Humare is Original Audio Show mein aap jaanenge ki aap bhi kaise ek "Smart investor" ban sakte hain aur market ko samajh sakte hain. Agar aapko 'Intelligent Investor' Jaisi books pasand hain to ye show zaroor sunein.

title: Courage of pursuing your Dreams
description: Sapne sabhi dekhte hain, lekin unhe pura karne ki himmat chuninda logon mein hi hoti hai. Jo log aisa nahi kar paate, wo log iski sabse badi wajah apne dar ko batate hain. Aur ye sahi bhi hai. Har kisi ko kisi na kisi chiz ka dar rehta hai, jis wajah se wo apne mann ka kaam nahi kar paate. Lekin iska ye matlab nahi hai ki jab tak dar rahega tab tak aap apni iccha ka kuch bhi nahi kar sakte. Iske liye aapko kuch chizon ko follow karna hoga, jo pata chalega aapko humari is audiobook mein! Aaiye ise sunkar apne dar ko dur bhagaiye.

title: Ranga Billa
description: Ranga Aur Billa. Jurm ki duniya ke do aise naam, jinki darindagi ne pure dilli ko itna naraz kar diya tha ki, insaaf ki is ladai me naraz dilli walon ne Atal Bihari Vajpayee par bhi patharon ki barsat kar di thi.  Aakhir Ranga Billa the kaun? Aakhir aisa kya kiya tha ranga billa ne jo unhe pakadne mein lag gaye the 140 police wale?

title: Satta Bazaar
description: Dubai Mafia Gang ki Satta Bazaari ke dhandhe ko khatam karne ke liye Dharavi ka Nikhil aur uski gang ek plan banaati hai, jis mei Inspector Preeti se le kar, bade bade Satte Bazaar se jude log jaise Javed bhi mile hote hain. Lekin is bazaar ka sabse bada badshah KingPin Nikhil ko maaf nahi karta.

title: Learnings From 2008 Great Recession
description: Kehte hain laalach buri bala hai. Saal 2008 mein vo laalach hi to tha jo America ke logon ki zaroorat mein shaamil ho gaya aur jiske result mein poori duniya ko mila ‘The Great Recession’ wala daur. Jisse poori duniya ki arthvyavastha ladkhada gayi. Kya hai yeh recession? Iske aane ke peeche kya wajah thi? Kaun-Kaun shaamil tha is recession ko laane mein? Kaise palak jhapkaate hi kayi badi companies kangaal ho gayi? Kis tareeke se poori duniya ne is recession ka saamna kiya? Aur hum us bure waqt ko jaankar apne aaj ko kaise sahi kar sakte hain? In sabhi sawaalon ke jawab aapko milenge is Original Show mein.

title: सार्थक: एक कृत्रिम मानव
description:
प्रोफेसर कौशल का एकलौता बेटा विकी गायब छप चुका है जव्हार की उन सुनसान वादियों में जो तरह तरह के रहस्यों से भरी हुई है। मीडिया में फैली है एक भयानक प्राणी की खबर जो मवेशियों को उठा ले जाता है। आख़िर ये घटनाएं आपस में क्या संबंध रखती हैं? जानने के लिए अवश्य सुनें सार्थक एक कृत्रिम मानव। 
Voiceover Artist : Shreekant Sinha
Author : संवर्त हर्षित

title: Inteqam Ki Raat
description:
Jahan Ek traf haveli me saalon bad Varish ke ane ki khusi ka jashn manaya ja raha tha. Wahi dusri traf ek kala saya sare gaon ko khud me samete ja raha tha. Kya hoga jab thakur ko pata chalega bacche ke gayab hone ke peeche ka raaz?
Kya hoga jab dayan ka inteqaam lega ese hi kai aur masoomo ki jaan aur mita kar rakh dega pure gaon ki pehchaan. Jaane ke leye sune “Inteqaam Ki Raat”

title: Battle of Barki
description: 1965 main Bharat Pakistan ke yuddh ke beech hone wali sabse important ladai hui Barki ki. Is yuddh main ek se ek yoddha nikal kar aaye , unhe mei se ek they Brig. Kawaljeet Singh jinhione is yuddh main hissa lia aur use anjaam tak pahuchaya . Kis terha lada gaya barki ka yeh nirnayak yuddh. Kin mushkilon ka saamana kiya Bharta ki jaanbaaz fauj ne yeh sari he kahani sunenge is audioseries mein.

title: Ganbatte - The Japanese Art Of Always Moving Forward
description: Kya aapko bhi lagta hai agar mere paas yeh hota to main yeh kar leta ? Wo hota to kitni asaani hoti grow karne mein ? Agar lagta hai to yeh kitaab aap ke liye hai. "Ganbette" ek jaapani philosophy hai jiske tehet aapko, jitna hai utne mein aage badhne ki tarkeeb sikhayi jaati hai. Bharat Aur Cheen ke saath saath Japan mein bhi bahut ache philosophers huye hain. Isliye ise aap simple words mein Japan ki geeta bhi keh sakte hain. To datt ke baithiye hamare saath aur suniye "Ganbatte - The Japanese Art Of Always Moving Forward" Sirf Kukufm par.

title: Babas And Indian Politics
description: Baba jisne England ki ek neta se kaha ki tum Prime Minister banogi aur aisa hua bhi. Ek aur Yogi jo hathiyaron ki factory chalata tha lekin police ne use kabhi nahi pakda. Aisa kya tha in dono baba ke pas? Kaun sa tantra- mantra tha jisse desh ke Prime Minister bhi har baat mein inki salah lete the. Ek baba ka naam Chandra Swami aur dusre ka “Dhirendra Brahmachari”. Dusron ki kundali banane wale in dono babaon ki poori kundali aapke samane le aaya hai “Kuku FM” ke is khaas show mein.

title: Nitin Gadkari - The Father of Expressway In India
description: Nitin Gadkari India ke un gine chune Politicians mein se ek hai jinhe System mein sahi kaam karne ke Tarike aur Law ki samjh hai, BJP Party ke National President bhi reh chuke hai, Inhone apne kaam se apna naam banaya hai. Aaj aap jis Road par Safely apni gadi bhagate hai unko banane vale aur ek nai Heights par le jane vale koi aur nahi Nitin Gadkari hi hai, Inhone itne flyover bridge banvaye hai jisse ki inhe India ka Fly-Over men bhi kaha jata hai. Inka sapna hai ki 2025 tak India mein World class highways banayenge, Hardwork aur Honesty ke sath work karna inki pahle priority hai. Is Series mein hum Nitin Gadkari ke bare mein vistar se janege, unki Ideology, Bachpan kaisa tha, RSS ka safar kaisa tha sabkuch.

title: Ghar Baithe Sikho Meditation
description:
Hamare saath is 11 din ki meditation yatra pat aaye aur uski shakti pata lagaye. Hamare is tez aur aswasthyakar jeevan shaili mein ek break le le aur apne bheetar ke aatm ka pata lagaye. 
Apne mansik swasthya ka dhyan rakhe aur ekaant paaye. Agar aapko Deepak Chopra dwara likhi gayi "Total Meditation" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: 10% Better
description: 10% Better AudioBook aapki day to day life mein bahut help kar sakti hai. Ye audioBook unke liye bahut jyada beneficial hai jo apni khud ki life ko observe karna chahte hai ki kaha mistake ho rahi hai aur use sudharne ke liye vo changes karne ke liye bhi ready hai. Yahi nahi  ye AudioBook aapke Stress door karne, achche se sochne mein, healthy rehne aur kisi bhi goal ko achieve karne mein aapki madad zaroor kar sakti hai. Agar aapko Robert Greene dwara likhi The 48 LAWS OF POWER jaisi books pasand hain, to ye audiobook aapko aur bhi pasand aayegi.

title: Kitne Ghazi Aaye Kitne Ghazi Gaye
description: Pulwama attack ke baad kaise hui revenge lene ki planning? Kaise Article 370 aur 35A hatne ke baad army ne rakha Kashmir ko shaant? Aur ek Fauji ke kandho par zimmedari ke kitne sitaare hote hain? Sab batayenge LT. Gen K.J.S. Dhillon (Retd.) ki likhi Kitab "Kitne Ghazi Aaye, Kitne Ghazi Gaye" ki is Audiobook mein.

title: The Almanack Of Naval Ravikant
description: Poori duniya is baat ko maanti hai ki "Wealth aur Khushi" donon ko paane ke liye jitni help is kitab "Almanack of Naval Ravikant" se milti hai utni kisi book se nahin milti. Isliye KUKU FM laya hai is Bestseller Title ki Hindi Audiobook. Ye khas audiobook sirf Success ka raasta nahin batati balki us par chalna bhi sikhati hai. Aaj hi ise sunien!

title: Joseph Stalin
description: World War 2 mein agar Hitler kisi se kabhi dara toh voh tha Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin, ek Georgian revolutionary, Soviet political leader aur ek merciless Dictator. Lenin ke baad jisne Soviet Union ko 1922 se lekar WW2 mein jeet dilakar, 1953 tak apni aakhri saans tak raaj kiya. Soviet Union ka General Secretary, Communist Party aur Chairman of the Council of Ministers ke audhe se inhone aaj ka Russia aur Communism ko duniya ke nakshe mein apni jagah dilaayi. Jiski ek nazar hi kaafi hoti thi saamne wale ke mann mein apna darr baithaaney, aise Dictator aur popular Soviet Hero ke baare mein jaante hai jiske liye izzat, darr, pyaar aur nafrat sab mehsoos kiya jaata hai.

title: Badshah Of Bollywood
description: Yeh kahani hai uss middle class ladke ki jisne sapne dekhne ki himmat ki aur uss sapne ko pura bhi kiya aur yeh sabit kar diya ki kisi cheez ko shiddat se chaho to puri kaynat tumhe usse milane ki koshish mein lag jati hai. Yeh kahani hai Shahrukh Khan ki. Delhi ki galiyon se bollywood tak ki inki journey hume sapne dekhne ki himmat deti hai aur inki isi journey ko hum janenge iss audiobook mein

title: Future Ki Karein Taiyari
description: Bhagwan Krishna kahte hain “Jeevan Mein Badlav Zaroori Hai”. Jisne badlav ke sath Khud ko badla use Success milti hai lekin jo badlav se samjhauta nahi kar paate, unka kya? Unke liye hai ye khas show “Future Ki Karein Taiyari”. Yahan aapko milenge apne sawalo ke jawab Ki kaise future mein hone wale badlav ko predict karke aap future planning kar sakte haihn. Chaliye jaante hain kaise change se dosti karein aur fir success ke liye kaam karein.

title: Jenabai Daruwali - First Mafia Queen of Mumbai
description: Jenabai Daruwali - First Mafia Queen of Mumbai Ek Aisi sachhi kahani hai jo Aapko Mumbai ke un dino ki yaad dilayegi jab Mumbai ko Bambai kaha jata tha. Bambai me underworld ke shuruwati dino me Jenabai ko Godmother bola jata tha. Jiske samne bade se bada don bhi salute thokta tha, Daud Abraham se lekar Haji mastan tak sab inhe bahut ijjat dete the. Aise bahut sare majedar kisse or Jenab se Jenabai daruwali banne ka safar aap janenge is Amazing Show me.

title: Life Without Bees
description: Albert Einstein kehte the, ki duniya se agar madhumakhi khatam ho gayi, to agle kuch saalo mein iss dharti par koi bhi zinda nahi bachega !! Aapko shayad sun kar thoda ajeeb lag raha hoga, ki kya yeh sach hai ? Aisa ho sakta hai ? Itni si madhumakkhi agar dharti par se khatam ho jati hai, to isse insaniyat bhi khatam ho jayegi ? Janiye iss audio book mein

title: Chakravarti Samrat Ashoka
description: Kya aapko pata hai, Bharat ke itihas ke sabse bade raja Chakravarti Samrat Ashok ke pita unhe raja nahi banana chahte the? Yaha tak ki Ashok par unke khoon karne ka bhi arop hai. Ashok ki dasiyon ne jab unke pass aane se inkar kar diya toh Ashok ne unka gala katwa diya tha. Phir aisa kya hua ki krur, chand Ashok ne yudh tyag diya? Unhone dharm ka marg kyon apnaya? Aise hi UPSC mein puche jane wale sawalo ke jawab sune.

title: सूरजबाला की कलम
description: Kya hua jab ek bachi ne kho di apni inaam mein jeeti ek kalam? Phir wo gayi jawan aur uske liye rishta aaya usi kalam chor ka... aaj us pen chori ke lagbhag pachas saal baad... aakhir asli pen chor khud saamne aakar apna gunha kabul karta hai.. jisse dekhkar Surajbala hairan reh jaati hai. Kaun hai wo pen chor? Jaan ne ke liye suniye puri kahani.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
description: Paan Sigh Tomar ki kahani ho sakta hai aapne suni ho, dekhi ho ya padhi ho Lekin is Hamari Series " Paan Singh Tomar" ke Jariye Chambal ke ek vo chhote se bachche Pana ke bachpan se lekar Dakait banne tak safar vistar se janne milega. Unke parivar ka kya kehna tha unke bare me, Army me unke colleague kya sochte the aur unka sath kisne kisne diya aur vo ek Desh-bhakt se Daku kaise bane? sab kuchh to is safar ka maja lijiye aur suniye " Paan Singh Tomar" ki series.

title: Acchi Job Paane ke Secrets
description: Ek job interview ke liye kaise taiyari kar sakte hai ? Interview mein kaise sawal puche jate hai ? Resume kaise banaya jata hai ? Agar aapke mann mein yeh sawal hai ya aap kisi job interview ke liye taiyari kar rahe hai to yeh audiobook aapke liye hai. Iss audio book mein hum sahi career choose karne se lekar interview kaise crack kiya jaye aur kaun se questions aam taur par puche jate hai, un sab ke baare mein baat karenge

title: नादान दिल
description:
पहला प्‍यार भुलाए नहीं भूलता...प्रीति का भी यही हाल था लेकिन उसकी गलती यह थी कि यह प्‍यार एक तरफा था, दूसरे, दूर के रिश्‍तेदारी में मामा-भांजी लगते थे। मनोज ने  प्रीति को बहुत समझाया लेकिन नहीं मानी। जब प्रीति के माता-पिता को यह पता चला तो उन्‍होंने भी बहुत समझाया। बाली उमर का अल्‍हड़ प्‍यार था। लेकिन कहते हैं ना हालात इंसान को सब समझा देते हैं। प्रीति के साथ भी वही हुआ।
Voiceover Artist : Rashmi Sharma
Author : Santosh Bhatt

title: Porn Dekhne ki Aadat Kaise Chhodein?
description: Is Original Audio Series mein hum Porn ke Harmful effect ke bare me baat karenge. Porn Addiction baki sare Addiction me sabse jyada common hai lakho logo ko bahut buri tarah se prabhavit kar raha hai aur jydatar Teenagers iski vajah se apni life ko out of the track pe le aate hai. Daily Activities me less energetic feel karna, fear, depression, less focus aur misguided jaise na jane kitni sari problems ko face karna padta hai. Agar aap apni is Aadat ko door karna chahte hai ya apno ki isme help karna chahte hai to chaliye jud jaiye humare sath sirf kuku fm par.

title: Disturb Your Depression
description:
Disturb your depression is related to our very basic and root-level causes of Depression, which has eventually become our everyone's best friend. I have tried to give all such common but important reasons for Stress, Anxiety, Nervousness, Tension, Overthinking, and Depression. Mental Disorders are the outcomes of all these problems. This audio will help us to solve such problems by our own efforts and Self Motivation. Very easy and simple steps have been shared so that it can help each and every age group of Depression to overcome the problem and Lastly can Disturb their Depression.
It is very important to share these kinds of messages and audio with our loved ones too. Thank you.

title: Say No to Crash Diet
description: Better life ki chahat mein aaj kal sabke paas dieting ka shortcut hai. Jiska result ye hota hai ki dieting crash diet mein badal jati hai.
