Par kya sirf dieting karna hi acchi lifestyle ke liye zaroori hai? Bilkul nahi! Agar dieting karne ke baad bhi aap khud ko khush aur healthy nahi rakhenge, to is dieting ka bhi koi fayda nahi hoga. To aise mein humein dieting ke alawa acchi lifestyle ke liye aur kya kya karna chahiye? Aaiye sunte hai humari is audiobook mein!

title: How to Turn Your Ideas into Reality
description: Aap chahe ek company ke Malik ho ya kisi company ke ek employee, Apne har Kaam se accha result nikalne ke liye us kaam ko khud karne ya kisi se karwane ka tarika pata hona aur uske liye sahi log chunna bhut zaroori hai.  KUKU FM ki is Original Audiobook mein strategy, leadership development, aur innovation jaise Disciplines ki baat ki gai hai, Jo ki successful banne ke liye Most Important hai. Agar aapko "The Power of Self-Discipline" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Rise of Indian Women’s Cricket Team
description: Cricket ka naam sunte hi aapke dimag mein kaun se khiladi ka naam aata hai? Shayad aapke kisi favorite male Cricketer ka hi naam zehen mein aaya hoga, Par kya aapke zehen mein kabhi kisi female Cricketer ka naam aaya? Ya kabhi aapne ye jaanne ki koshish ki hai ki kaun thi wo 1st Indian Female Cricketer jisne pehli baar Century maari thi, Ya Kab shuru hui thi women’s cricket ki journey aur aakhir kis female cricketer ko Sachin Tendulkar se compare kiya jata hai. Aapke saare sawalon ke jawaab hain humare is Audio show mein jiska naam hai “Rise of Indian women’s Cricket Team”.

title: SKY 360: Suryakumar Yadav
description: Ek aisa khiladi jisne cricket ki dasha aur disha dono ko badal kar diya. Ek aisa khilaadi jiske liye risk lena maano jaise koi mazaak ho. Ek aisa khiladi jo ball ko sidha to maarta hi hai sath he saath use stadium mein kahin bhi maar sakta hai, Tabhi to use kehte hain Surya 360. Par kya hai is khiladi ki kahani aur aakhir wo kaun kaun sa record darj hai is khiladi ke naam? Janne ke liye suniye SKY 360: Suryakumar Yadav ka yeh audioshow

title: Hai Dil ka Kya Kasoor
description: Mumbai mein huye Bomb blast ne Sidharth, Suchi aur Rahul ki zindagi ko puri tarh se badal diya. Iss Love triangle mein Sidharth haar kar bhi Suchi ka Dil jeet jaata hai. Rahul Jeet kar bhi haar jata hai  Vo kaise? Janane ke liye sune puri kahani ‘Hai Dil ka kya kasoor’ sirf Kuku FM per!

title: दाऊद नहीं रहा
description:
जब एक भारतीय-इज्राइली मिशन दाऊद इब्राहीम को पकड़ने के अभियान पर नाकाम रहा, तो ऑफिसर नीलोफर खान डॉन की कैद में छूट गईं. एक दूसरे मिशन ने उन्हें छुड़ा लिया और दाऊद को मार डाला. लेकिन जब भारत इसका जश्न मना रहा था, पाकिस्तान ने दावा किया कि डॉन अभी भी ज़िंदा है और अपने सबसे बड़े हमले की योजना मना रहा है|
writer: अवीक दावर
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : Avik Davar

title: How To Open A Restaurant
description: Hum mein se har kisi ne ek na ek baar apna khud ka ek restaurant kholne ka socha hi hoga. Magar kabhi is thought ko anjaam tak pahunchane ka inspiration nahi mila…right? Ye show aapke liye wahi inspiration banega aur agar aap wakai ek restaurant kholna chahte hai toh aapko ye step by step guide karega! Aaj hi sune

title: Words Of Wisdom
description: Aapne yeh suna hi hoga ki, “Jab bhi aap life mein confuse ho jaye, tab hawa mein ek sikka uchal ke dekhe. Isliye nahi ki aapka decision aasan ho jayega, par isliye ki sikka jab hawa mein hoga, tab aapko pata chal jayega ki aapka Dil kya chahta hai. To Dil ki awaaz sun ne ke liye taiyar ho jaye kyuki yeh audiobook aapki problems dur karne mein aapki madad karegi aur apni zindagi ko shandar tarike se jeene ka nazariya dikhayegi jiska rasta dil se jata hai

title: How to become a PUBG PRO
description: "Ye Pubg wala hai kya?" Prime minister ke iss  saval ne pure desh ki janta ko bata diya ke ye game ke baare me aaj bachcha bachcha janta hai, india me aaj 68% population youth hai aur shayad he kisi ne ye game kabhi khela nahi hoga, lekin PUBG ek Esport bhi hai aur iss game me apna career bhi banaya ja sakta hai , to chaliye jante hai ek normal player ye E sports professional kaise bana jaa sakta hai aur jante hai kuch unknown facts, tips and tricks jo apko PUBG ya BGMI me PRO banayega.

title: Positive Soch Ka Jaadu
description: Kehte hain ki Positivity ek aisa astra hai jiske saath hum life mein har wrong ko right bana sakte hain aur career mein nayi uchaayion ko paa sakte hain. Yahi baat aapko Kuku FM par is Original Series mein jaanne ko milegi jisko sunkar aap positivity ki value samjhenge aur use apply kar ke apne career mein ek successful insan ban ke ubhar sakte hain.Agar aapko Rhonda Byrne dwara likhi gayi "The Magic" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: The Suspicious Lover
description: क्या होगा जब शादी के एक दिन पहले संजना गायब हो जाएगी? लियो जो देश का मोस्ट वांटेड अंडर कवर एजेंट है वो आएगा इस केस को संभालने,पर पड़ जाएगा एक सुस्पेक्ट के प्यार मे । जानने के लिए सुने Suspicious Lover.

title: The Archer
description: Is Duniya mein aisi koi bhi cheez nahi hai jis se hum seekh nahi le sakte hain. band ghadi bhi humein din mein do baar sahi waqt dikhati hai. Author Paulo Coelho ki is Audiobook mein bhi hum teer aur dhanush ko chalane ki qala ko seekhenge jismein cheepe hain humari life ke vo lessons jinhein jaan kar hum apni life mein, career mein successful ban sakte hain aur us success ko umarbhar maintain karke bhi rakh sakte hain. Chaliye seekhna shuru karte hain apni life ke ek behtareen teerandaaz banne ki qala ko.

title: Sports Nutrition
description: Agar aap apni physical training start karne ko soch rahe hain ya aap apni training ki limits ko push karne ko soch rahe hain toh sirf nai strategies banane se aur nai exercises include karne se  kaam nahi chalega, ek naya aur perfect diet plan bhi jaruri hai. Aur iske liye Sports Nutrition ek perfect  guide hai.  Isme har sports ke athletes ke liye latest nutrition concepts included hai. Ye Audio book aapko meals , energy- nutrients pe advice toh degi hi iske sath sath pure din mein energy balancing kaise karni hai?  Iske tarike bhi aapko milenge.

title: Trading Psychology - By Ahmad Ali Khan
description: Ek achhi physique banane ke liye aapko 20% workout aur 80% diet ki need hoti hai, similarly ek achaa trader banne ke liye 20% strategy and 80% psychology ki zaroorat hoti hai aisa kehna hai hamare Stock market expert Ahmad Ali Khan ka. Is show me humne Trading Psychology se jude aise important aspects ko discuss kiya hai jo aapko ek "Casual Trader" se "Professional Trader" banne me aapki madad karenge.

title: Honda Vs Hyundai
description: Automotive industry mein supremacy ki ladai kabhi khatam nahi hoti. Aur is ladai mein sabse aage jin do companies ka  naam aata hai , vo hain Hyundai aur Honda. Ye dono companies market mein ek dusre ko takkar dene ke liye lagatar alag alag features wali gadiyan launch karti rehti hain.Ek taraf Honda Apni high-quality aur reliable cars ke liye famous hai toh dusri taraf Hyundai ki long-term warranties aur   quality  customers ko attract kar rahi hai. Lekin in dono mein se kaunsi company jyada acche products bana rahi hai , ye janne ke liye aapko Honda vs Hyundai sunni padegi. Agar aapko "Built To Last" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Apne Business Ko Badhane Ki Winning Strategy
description: Kai log apna business start to karte hai lekin bahut jaldi hi ve log apna sab kuch haar kar baith jate hai yani unke paas jo hota hai wo bhi kho dete hai kyuki unko sahi business strategy malum nahi hoti. Kya aapke saath aisa hua hai Ya phir aap apna business acche se shuru karna chahte hai ? To suniye yeh audiobook jo aapko kuch aisi business strategy ke baare mein batayegi jo badalte samay ke sath mein rehne mein aapki madad karegi. Agar aapko Gary Keller dwara likhi "The One Thing: The Surprisingly Simple Truth Behind Extraordinary Results" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Aiyaash CEO
description: Aiyaash Anuj Shekhawat ki galat aadatein, uske saath uski banayi hui sabse ajeez cheez, PromiseInk naam ki marketing company ko bhi barbaad kar deti hai. Jo log Anuj ko duniya ke us taraf bhejne ka plan kar rahe the, unhe kya pata tha ki wo is samay bhi kahin baitha hua un par hans raha hoga. Is confusion se parda hataane ke liye suniye Aiyaash CEO sirf KukuFM par.

title: जैक (दि क्लॉक राइडर)
description: Professor Ken ki lab me hua ek din aisa haadsa ki Professor Ken ho gaye gayab. 14 saal gujarne ke baad unke bete jack ko pata chala apne pita ka ye sach! Jack ne aarambh ki apne pita ki khoj... jo use le pahuchi apne pita ki khufiya lab me, jahaan use pata chalta hai ghadiyon ki ek ajeeb duniya ka jo hai is duniya se bilkul alag. Khufiya lab me mili ajeeb ghadi kya thi... kya Jack pata laga pata hai apne gumshuda pita ke baare me. Kya wo unhe wapas la paya? Ek rahasyamayi ghadi deewar ke us par basi... jaadu se bhari hui duniya ka ek anokha aur romanchak safar- Jack, Christine aur Daniel ke sath...!

title: Kama Aur Kamasutra Ka Gyan
description:
Sex Education, Mutual Pleasure, Foreplay jaise shabd dhere dhere duniya bhar mein ek charcha ka vishay bantey ja rahe hai. Sex Education ki importance ko aaj puri duniya smjh rahi hai, kahin schools mein extra subject ke zariye toh kahin workshops ke. 
Lekin aaj jab puri duniya sex eduction, Mutural Pleasure ya foreplay jaise process ko smjhane ke leye sahi trike dhundne mein lagi hai, wahi Bharat ne sex education ki importance ko smjhte hue kai dashak pehle hi Kamasutura ke gyan ki rachna kar di thi, ussi kama aur kamasutra ke gyan ko aap sabhi tak saral aur asaan bhasha mein leke hazir hai ye show.

title: NLP Dwara Unlimited Success
description: NLP-  Ek Scientific Proven Formula jiske madhyam se aap apni Life ko completely Transform kar sakte hai. Ye Apki Health ko, Personal and Professional Life me Balance ke liye, Relationship aur Life ke har ek Area ko jise aap Improve karna chahte hai Aapki Madad kar sakta hai. Ye AudioBook aapko apni sari problems khud kaise handle karna hai bina kisi or par depended hue bahut achce se sikhayegi. Life mein aap NLP ka Use karke Unlimited Success Achieve kar sakte hai.

title: Story Of Baba Who Inspired Steve Jobs & Zuckerberg
description: Uttarakhand ke Nainitaal main situated hai ek aisa ashram jo sirf india he nahi balki world main ek special status hold karta hai,  mystery toh yeh hai ki aakhir kyu ek bahut he maamuli, tough himalaya ke godh mein base iss remote ashram mein duniya bhar se log aate hain ? aur kyu yeh jagha unhe attract karti hai?  aakhir kyu iss mamooli se jagha ko duniya ke brilliant tech minds ne visit kiya ? chahe Steve Jobs ho ya Zuckerberg ya phir Larry Page ya eBay ke founder Jeffrey Skoll. Aaiye jaante hain kya hai iss ashram aur guru se judi kahani sirf KUKU FM par .

title: कैसे लिखू उजली कहानी
description:
कैसे लिखूं उजली कहानी' में महिला प्रधान 21 कहानियां हैं, जो नारी समस्‍या, पारिवारिक रिश्‍तें और नारी के प्रति सामाजिक नजरिए के बारे में बताता है। इस संग्रह की कहानियाँ बयान करती हैं कि स्त्री से लोकतांत्रिक रिश्ता बनाए बगैर पुरुष स्त्री-देह तो पा सकता है, प्रेम नहीं। मानवीयता, संवेदना और भावना से लबरेज इन कहानियों की नायिकाएँ स्त्री-व्यक्ति-सत्ता के प्रति सचेत हैं; साथ ही किसी भी प्रकार के समझौते के खिलाफ भी। 
Voiceover Artist : Rashmi Sharma
Author : डॉ. रंजना जायसवाल

title: बदलाव
description: परिवार में बड़े खुद को बहुत सख्‍त और आदर्श दिखाते हैं, लेकिन उनके भीतर भी एक दिल होता है, जो आदर्शों के आगे झुकना पसंद नहीं करता। वहीं आज के बच्‍चे उम्र में भले ही छोटे हो, लेकिन समझदारी में काफी आगे निकल चुके हैं। 60 वर्षीय कुणाल की शादी 55 वर्षीय कामिनी से तय होती है, तो उनके छोटे भाई रोहन और उनकी पत्‍नी को झटका लगता है। लेकिन उनके बच्‍चे इस बात को सही मानते हैं। बच्‍चों का कहना है, लाइफ अकेले नहीं जी जा सकती है। इस परिवार में कुछ बिखरे हुए रिश्‍तें हैं, जिन्‍हें कामिनी बच्‍चों के साथ मिलकर संवारना चाहती है… तो क्‍या इस परिवार में बिखरे रिश्‍तों में प्‍यार की मिठास आएगी? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: दोषी कौन
description: Deepak ke saath Nisha ki shaadi mahaj ek dhong tha. Deepak ne kabhi Nisha ko sweekar nahi kiya aur Deepak ki ma ne Kabhi Bahu nahi maana. Nisha ne samay ke saath samjhota kar liya tha. Nisha apni har baat apni saheli sandhya se share karti thi. Lekin achanak ek din Nisha aur uska pura parivar gaayab ho jaata hai. Koi sampark nahi. Sandhya bechain ho uth ti hai. Kuch saalo baad Nisha aashram mein Sandhya ko milti hai. Kya hua tha Nisha ke saath? Nisha ki saas pagal ho chuki hai...Deepak kaha hai? In sabhi uljhano ko karne ke liye sune puri Kahani.

title: Relationship 101
description: Hamari zindagi mein bahut sare rishte hote hai aur har rishte ko banaye rakhne ke liye pyaar ki sabse jyaada zarurat hoti hai. Par aajkal pyar ka matlab badal sa gaya hai or har taraf rishte bikharte ja rahe hai. To is show mein hum janenge ki kaise apne relationship ko happy or jawan banaya ja sakta hai. Agar aapko "The Seven Principles of Making Marriage Work" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Modern Letter Writing Course
description: Ab sikhiye aise letter likhna jo sabko pasand aaye! 'Modern Letter Writing' ki yeh audiobook aapko batayengi, ki kaise aap sabhi mauke ke liye acche patra taiyar kar sakte hain. Yeh audiobook aapko vyaktigat jeevan, vyapar sambandhit patra aur kayi prakar ke patra kaise likh sakte hain yeh sikhayegi. Ismein aapko sabhi tarah ke patra likhne ke nuskhe milenge. Haan, Prem patra ke bhi. Agar aapko "Bird by Bird" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Negative Thoughts Se Kaise Bachein
description: Khali dimag shaitan ka ghar hota hai, aakhir kyon hum aksar apne hi negative khayalon ke shikar ban jaate hain ? Kya hum us toxic aur khud ko neeche aur bilkul akela kar dene wali feeling se bach sakte hain? Ji haan, beshak, aur yeh audiobook is vishay par hi hai. Agar aapko Can't Hurt Me jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko behad pasand aayegi.

title: 4 Steps Towards Happier Life
description: Integrity ka matlab samjhe to, Imandar hone aur strong moral principles rakhne ka gun aur iss audiobook se hum sikhenge ki Integrity ke sath life kaise jee jaye. Iss audiobook se hum janenge ki kaise hum apni life ko ek rediscovering life bana sakte hai aur kis tarike se apne real version ko find karke ek aisi life jee sakte hai jo hum actually mein jeena chahte hai. Hum yeh bhi samjhenge ki kaise Elon Musk, Milkha Singh ne apne iss gun ke saath apne liye ek alag way of life banai aur life mein success of hasil kiya. Agar aapko "The Rudest Book Ever" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Economic History of Developed Countries
description: Developed countries mein Economic transformation kaise hua? Income Inequality ka mamla kya tha jiski vajah se pichle 200 salon  mein kai andolan huye? Aisi bahut si jaankari aap is series mein jaan sakte hain. Agar aap Economic History ko janne mein interested hain aur aap ye jaanna chahte hain ki aakhir ek country, Developed Country kaise banti hai aur aap aaj ki world economic situation ko acche se janna chahte hai to is series mein aapko sab milega. Toh der kis baat ki, suniye hamari ye khaas peshkash.

title: Political Love Story : Jayalalithaa & MGR
description: Tamil Nadu cinema ka ek superstar, jo acting ke sath neta ban gaya aur janta se itna pyar mila ki actor se Chief Minister ban gaya.Aur is Chief Minister ne apne se bahut kam umar ki actress se pyar kar liya.Pyar bhi aisa kiya ki antim dam tak sath rahe aur fir uski premika bhi bani Chief Minister. Neta ka naam tha “Marudhur Gopalan Ramachandran” urf  "MGR". Aur premika ka naam “Jayaram Jayalalithaa” urf Amma. Kya thi in dono ki prem kahani jisne Tamil Nadu ki rajneeti ko hamesha ke liye badal kar rakh diya. Aaiye sunte hain Political Love Story : Jayalalithaa & MGR.

title: Khoobsurat Umrao Jaan Rekha
description: Hindi filmon ki asli khoobsurat Umrao Jaan, log jinka faida uthane ki koshish karte the. Amitabh aur Rekha ka pehla sath, Amitabh Bachchan aur Rekha ke pyar ka silsila, Rekha ji ki khoobsurati ka safar. Apni acting ka loha manva hi liya Rekhaji ne kaise? Kal bhi khoobsurat, aaj bhi khoobsurat. Jo kabhi Rekhaji ka makeup nahi karna chahte the aaj taraste hain. Rekha jaisi khoobsurati chahiye? To yah suniye.

title: Discover Your Potential
description: Safalta aur asafalta dono ke hi apne apne patterns hote hain, aage badhte hue in patterns ko dekh pana bahut zaroori hai. Aur inhi patterns ko dekhna sikhati hai yeh audiobook. Yeh audiobook aapko sikhayegi ki kaise aap apne aas paas hi chhipe ideas dekh sakte hain. Kya hai vo traps jo humein aage badhne se rokta hai aur aap unse kaise nikal sakte hain aur bna sakte hain ek successful business.

title: Pele - The Ginga Striker
description: Pele 20th Century ke Brazil ke ek great Sportsperson aur Football Player the aur unhe apne alag khelne ke style ke liye jana jata tha. Unhe King of Football, Magician of Football jaise naam se bhi jana jata tha. Pele ne 1363 matches mein 1281 se bhi jyada goal kiye hain jo apne aap mein ek adbhut record hai. Pele ke khel ke diwane aaj har jagah mil jayenge, jab jab football ka zikr hota hai usmein Pele ka naam zaroor aata hai. Is Audio show mein hum Pele ki Life se judi har ek chiz cover karne wale hai, jaise unki schooling, childhood, career, Name-Fame, Achievements, jinko janne ke baad aapki Football ke prati diwangi aur badh jayegi.

title: Meri Mohobbat ka Safar
description: मोहब्बत तो बहुत लोग करते हैं लेकिन जो मोहब्बत बचपन से ही किसी के सीने में जगह बना लेती है वो कुछ हटकर ही होती है। सुने मेरी भी मोहब्बत के सफर की एक ऐसी कहानी कहानी जो कही पर आपको गुदगुदाएगी तो कही पर आँखों को नम कर देगी।

title: चुनौती
description:
अंधेरी रात में, धमाकों के बीच, अपने ही साथियों की आंख में धूल झोंक कर गंथर भाग निकला… चलने-चलते उस ने पे-मास्‍टर सार्जेंट को घायल कर दिया और रूपयों की तिजोरी अपने साथ ले ली। लेकिन गंथर ने ऐसा क्‍यों किया? एम जर्मन सैनिक की सच्‍ची कहानी जिस ने अपनी सेना के विरूद्ध जिहाद छेड़ा।

Publisher - Vishv Books
Writer - Ganther Bahneman

title: Free to Focus
description: Achieve more by doing less

title: Hinduo Ke Vrat-Parv Evam Teej Tyohar
description: Bharat ek Adhyatmik Bhumi hai jisme hazaro salo se sanatan hindu dharm ka ullekh milta hai, Hindu dharm shuru se hi apni ishwar ke prati vishwas aur manyataon ke liye jana jata hai jisme bahut se parv, vrat aur tyohar sammilit hai. Is AudioBook mein aap un sab ke bare mein sahi jankari prapt kar sakte hai jaise, Gangaur/Gauri Tritiya, Nirjala Ekadashi, Guru Poornima, Sri Krishna Janmashtami, Navratri/ Durga Pujan, Karva Chauth, Ahoi Ashtami, Devotthani Ekadashi, Mahashivratri, Sri Satyanarayana Vrat Katha aur Hindu dharm ke Tyohar jaise Holi, Diwali, Dussehra, Rakshabandhan, Shivaratri, Ganga Snan, Chatt Puja Ityadi.

title: NCERT Class 9th Political Science
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein achhi Rank laani ho, Shuruaat to aapko NCERT book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. Lekin bookish language ko samajhna thoda sa mushkil ho jata hai. Kuku FM par yeh Original Series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Democracy, Constitutional Design, Electoral politics aur Working of institutions  jaise topics ko bahut hi achhe se samajh jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: The Inventions Of Nikola Tesla
description: Duniya ke sabse famous inventors aur greatest minds mein se ek Nikola Tesla ki inventions humari modern technology ki neev hai . Lekin kaise rakh di thi Nikola Tesla ne itne saal pehle iski neev ? Kaise kaam krta tha unka mind aur kab hui thi iski shuruwat ? Unki Life se jude har sawal ke javab aapko milenge is audiobook mein. Iske sath-sath Croatia mein unki inventions ki shuruwat se lekar  Thomas Edison ke sath unka collaboration aur unki ,un sabhi discoveries ko bhi detail mein btaya gya hai jinhone is poori duniya ko badal diya.

title: Azad Hind Sarkar: Dream Of A Warrior
description: Kya aapko pata hai 1947 se pehle bhi desh ke baahar ek sarkar bani thi jiska naam tha - Azad Hind Sarkar? Bharat se hazaro kilometere door is sarkaar ke pass apni fauj, apna bank, aur apni government thi. Subhash Chandra Bose hi Bharat ke is pehle azad sarkar ke, pehle Pradhanmantri, Videshmantri aur Rakshamantri the. Netaji ki sena- Azad Hind Fauj se British Sarkar kanpti thi. Netaji ki leadership mein is sena ne na sirf Britishers ko kayi baar haraya, unhone Bharat ke ek bahut bade tukde ko aazad bhi karwaya tha. Aakhir kaun sa rajya tha wo? Desh se baahar kaise bani thi ye sarkar? Kya tha Netaji ka apni sena se sapna?

title: A Guide To Sex Education
description: Kaafi lambe samay se sex ke baare mein baat karna taboo maana gaya hai, kai schools mein toh teachers reproduction ka chapter hi miss kar dete aur youth aadhe adhure knowledge ke saath zindagi ke race mein lag jaate hai. Adhura knowledge sabze zyada ghatak hota hai. Ye audiobook aapko sex education ke basics samjhaegi

title: 15 Aadatein Jo Banayengi Aapko 2023 Mein Successful
description: 3 Idiots movie ka vo dialogue to aap sabhi ko yaad hoga “Excellence ke pichhe bhaagiye, Success khud aapke picche aayegi”. Kuku FM par is Original Series mein bhi hum aapko yahi bata rahe hain ki sahi aadaton ko apnaane ke pichhe bhaagiye Success khud aapke pichhe aayegi. Is show mein aap kisi naye Resolution ke baarein mein nahi balki apni daily life ki kuch aadaton ko sahi karne ke baarien mein jaanege taaki apke din ke 24 ghante aapke liye productive saabit ho sake aur aap 2023 mein Success ke naye shikhar ko haasil kar sakein. Agar aapko "Change Your Schedule, Change Your Life" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Sangeet Ka Jaadu
description: आजकल संगीत दवारा बहुत सी बीमारियों का इलाज किया जा रहा है | चिकित्सा विज्ञानं भी यह मानने लगा है कि प्रतिदिन 20 मिनिट अपनी पसंद का संगीत सुनने से रोज़मर्रा की होने वाली बहुत सी बीमारियों से निजाद पाया जा सकता है | यह शो इसी विषय पर है | आप जानेंगे कि किस राग द्वारा किस रोग का उपचार संभव है और रागो को समझने का भी प्रयास करेंगे |【 Note: Kindly use headphones for Music 】

title: Theranos
description: Aj ka waqt startup's ka waqt hai, aj startup industry badi tezi sae boom kar rahe hai, or aisa hi ek startup tha Theranos, jisne duniya ko chaunkaya bhi or ek bahut bada scam bhi diya. Iss startup ki founder Elizabeth Holmes ki chah nae unhe arsh sae farash par la giraya, par kya tha ye startup or kaisa bana ye duniya ka ek sabse bada medical scam, to ye janne kae liye sunte hain Theranos ki kahani.

title: अंजान मोहब्बत
description: Aditi aur Harsh ne char saal mei ek alag ho zindagi ji li, jisme unhone bahot kuch sikha.....Sachi dosti, Sacha Pyar, Tyag, Samarpan, Sahayog, Vaada, Saman, Firkara, Kadar, Jimedari, Vishwas, Imandari, Aur sabse badi badh Sahanshilta. Aur akhir Anth mei unke pyar ko manzil mil hi gaie.

title: Mann Ke Liye Amrit Ki Boondein
description: Hamara swasthya is par nirbhar karta hai ki hum kaisa sochte-vicharte hain. Jis tarah sakaratmakta haume khushi se bhara aur utsahit rakhti hai, nakaratmakta uska ulta kar deti hai. Jaane maane chikitsak Dr. Abrar Multani is audiobook mein swashtya rehne ke behtareen nuskhe batati hai.

title: Successful Billionaires ki life journey
description: Jockey aur Asian Paints jaisi kuch companies us list mein aati hai jinhone kam se kam apne 500 competitors ko haraya aur list mein sabse upar aaye. Kaise kiya in compaies ne ye haasil? Aur kyun dusri companies ye nahi kar paati? Kya alag kar rahe hai ye? Aaiye jaanein. Agar aapko "Built To Last" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: The Power of Cold E-mailing
description: Kya aap jaante hain ki aap duniya mein kisi se bhi connect kar sakte hain bas ek e-mail ke dum par? Aur yeh ek e-mail aapke liye sunehre avsaron ke raaste khol sakta hai. lekin wo e-mail kya hona chahiye, use kaise likhna hai aur kaise bhejna hai, yeh bahut zaroori hai aur is original show mein hum inhi muddon par charcha karenge.

title: Black Box Thinking
description: Zindagi Mein Koi Bhi Fail Nhi Hona Chahta Hai Aur Isi Ke Chalte Log Apni Asafaltaon Pe Parda Daalte Rehte Hain Lekin Successful Hone Ke Liye Failures Ko Dhyaan Se Samjhna Zaroori Hai. Ek Insaan Se Lekar Kisi Bhi Badi Organization Ko Successful Hone Ke Liye Apni Galtiyon Se Seekhne Ki Zaroorat Hoti Hai. Is Audio Book Mein Suniye Kuch Bohut Hi Interesting Kisse Jo Na Sirf Aapko Motivate Karenge Balki Saath Hi Saath Duniya Ke Ek Alag Chehare Se Rubaroo Bhi Karvaenge.

title: History of Royal Enfield
description: Aapko jankar hairani hogi ki aap sabki favourite motor cycle company Royal Enfield joh bhale aaj India ki sadkon par shaan se ghumte nazar aati hai, lekin originally ye Indian company nahi hai. Balki, iske nirmata to woh hai, jinhone pehle suyi banane se apni shuruaat ki thi. Aur phir dekhte hi dekhte, iss company ne World Wars ko survive karte huye, khud ko, duniya ka leading motor cycle brand bana liya. Par ye sab Royal Enfield ke itihas ki ek jhalak thi. Sui banane se motor cycle banane aur India mein sabke dilon mein apni jagah banane ka iska yeh safar kafi romanchak tha. Aaiye chalte hai Royal Enfield ke safar pe.

title: Aalim sir ki English Class
description: Koi bhi Bhasha sikhna aasan ban sakta hai , aur isi baat ke liye Aalim sir kaafi popular bhi hai. Iss audiobook me aap Basic english aur vakya rachna sikh sakte hai aur wo bhi ekdam filmy tarike se. Let's learn.

title: Vastu Shastra se Badle Apne Zindagi
description: Vastu Shastra kya aapki zindagi ki samasyaon ka hal ban sakta hai? Kya hai vastu shastra ke peeche ka itihas aur logic, janenge KUKU FM ki iss original series mein jahan hum charcha karenge ki kaise aap apne ghar, office aur relationships mein vastu ki kuch simple tricks ke sath sudhar la sakte hain!

title: The Secret Game Of 20's
description: Bade bujurg humesha humein yahi kehte the “Beta abhi shuruaati dino mein mehnat karlo phir tumhari life set hai”. Lekin aaj ke is daur mein hum is baat ka matlab nahi samajh paate hain. Humein lagta hai ki abhi 20’s ka yeh samay to life ko enjoy karne ka hai hum abhi se itni zimmedariyan kyun lein. Lekin doston 20’s ka daur humari life mein sabse zyada mayne rakhta hai yahi vo daur hai jab hum apni life ko ek naya mod de sakte hain, use bana sakte hai ya bigad bhi sakte hain. Isi baat ko aap is Audiobook mein samajh paayenge aur apne 20’s ko apni life mein useful decade bana paayenge.

title: Tips & Tricks To Handle New Born Baby
description: Agar aap naye parents hain ya fir zaldi hi parents banne wale hain to ye audioshow aapke liye hai, "Bacche ko sahi dhang se handle karne ka tareeka kya hai? Kin baaton ka hamein bacchon ke saath zyada khyal rakhna chahiye aur kin chizon se apne bacchon ko bachana chahiye? Aise kai saare sawalon ke jawab aapko es special show milenge.

title: Get Started with Blockchain
description: "Blockchain technology" aaj kal yeh word, hum apne aas paas sunte hi rehte hain, yahan tak ki Narendra Modi ne bhi apne ek bhashan mein iska zikr kiya tha aur kaha tha ki, "Yeh technology bharat ko ease of doing business mein upar lane ki kshamta rakhti hai. Par aakhir yeh blockchain technology hai kya? Kya cryptocurrency hi blockchain hai? Agar nahi to, iska use kaha aur kaise hota hai? Yeh technology kaam kaise karti hai aur isme aisa kya khaas hai ki aaj zyadatar tech giants isko aur samajhne ki koshish kar rahe hain? Kya yahi hai future? Chaliye jante hain

title: Telgi Scam: 20 Hazar Crore Ka Scam
description: Aapne kabhi na kabhi kisi ghotale ke baare meihn padha ya suna hoga, par kya kabhi aapne itne bade scam ke bare me suna hai jo itna bada ho gaya ke aage chal kar bharat sarkar ko legal banana pada? Chaliye jante hai kahani, Abdul Karim Telgi ki jo ek fruit seller tha par fake stamp paper banakar usne 20 hazar crore ka scam kiya.

title: Sharab Ka Itihaas
description: Daru nahi re baba, dawai hai !! Bas yahi humare mind ka sabse bada flaw hai. Aaj ki generation stress mein dubi rehti hai, uske liye intoxicants yani nashili cheez consume karna dawai jaisa lagta hai par ye bahut hi badi dikkat hai. Aakhir nashe mein aisa kya hai jo wo har jagah har waqt kisi na kisi roop mein hum insaano ko apna deewana bana leta hai? Kyu aur kaise liya sharab ne janam aayiye jante hai hamari is khas peshkash mein

title: The Teachings of Ramana Maharshi
description: Log aksar apne aap ko janne me salo laga dete hai par phir bhi ye safar adhuri reh jati hai. Shri Ramana Maharshi india ke kaafi jane mane spiritual leader hai jinko 16 saal ki umar me enlightenment hua tha! Iss audiobook me aap kuch aise khaas conversations ko sunenge jo Maharshi aur unke followers me hue hai jisme mann ki shanti ,Bhagwan ke swabhav aur self awareness aur spiritual awakening jaise subject hai…

title: Guru Nanak Dev Ji
description: Samaj Ki Kuritiyon Se Pareshan Ho Kar Ishwar Ko Talashne Wale Guru Nanak Dev Ji Ka Jeewan Manavjati Ke Liye Ek Misaal Hai. Is Audio Book Mein Suniye Unke Jeewan Ki Kuch Aisi Kahaniyan Jo Aapko Bhi Apna Astitva Talashne Pe Majboor Kar Dengi.

title: Unsung Warrior Sehmat Khan
description: Saal 1971 mein jab India aur Pakistan ke bich tanav chal raha tha, usi waqt ek college jane wali ladki Sehmat ne apne desh aur apne pita ki aakhri icha ke liye apne sapno aur apne prem ki kurbani de kar apna jeevan desh ke naam kar diya. Kaun thi wo ladki ? Aur kaha se us mein itni himmat aayi ki pure desh ke liye wo akeli lad gayi aur itihas ko badal kar rakh diya ? Jane iss audiobook mein

title: A Guide to Effective Leadership
description: Ek Company Ya Community ko successful hone ke liye Humesha  ek acche leader ki zaroorat hoti hai. Aur ye zaroori nahi ki Leader wahi ho jisne us Group ko banaya ho. Hum sab leader ban sakte hain. Lekin humein koi banayega nahi balki uske liye humein Leadership ki Qualities ko apne andar develope karna hoga aur lead karne ki ek choti si opportunity ko bhi miss nahi karna hoga. Aur agar aapko ye lag raha hai ki ye sirf Aasan lagta hai lekin aeysa krna kaafi jyada mushkil hai toh abhi Suniye KUKU FM ki ye Audibook. Kyuki ye humein Sikhati hai ki agar aapke andar leadership ka passion hai toh aajke  modern world mein aapko leader banne se koi nahi rok sakta.

title: Nehru: Innocent or Guilty?
description: Internet ke zamane mein agar kisi rajneta ya kisi Pradhanmantri par agar sabse zyada keechad uchala gaya hai toh wo Nehru hai. Internet par udti khabron ko dekh kar lagta hai Bharat mein aisi koi samasya nahi hai jiski jad mein Nehru nahi hain. Kashmir se le kar China tak, school se le kar berozgari tak, har problem ke liye Nehru ko zimmedar thehraya jata hai. Par kya sach mein Nehru har samasya ke liye zimmedar hain? Kya Nehru sach mein sabse bure pradhanmantri the? Jane kya hai sacchai Nehru par lage aaropon ke.

title: NCERT Class 12th Political Science Part-2
description: Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT Political Science Part-2 book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Challenges of Nation-Building, India’s External Relations, Challenges to and Restoration of the Congress System, Regional Aspirations, Recent Developments in Indian Politics jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: रसरंग
description: Holi ki tauhar pure bharatbarsha mein ek prasiddha festival ke taur par mana jata hain. Pura desh ke har ek prant par isko manaya jata hain. Rangon ka is tauhar ke barein aur bhi kuch janne ke3 liye suniye is audiobook only on kukufm par

title: लाजो
description: एक भारतीय संस्कृति में पली-बढ़ी मध्यम परिवार में रहनेवाली लड़की की जीवन-कथा है। इस उपन्‍यास में बताया गया है कि किस तरह भारतीय लड़कियां अपने मां-बाप द्वारा चुने लड़के से ही शादी करती हैं, बाद में कैसी भी परेशानी आने पर उनके विचारों में किसी दूसरे के प्रति रुझान नहीं रहता। भारतीय परिवारों के जीवन-आदर्शों और एक नारी की सहनशीलता, दृढ़ता, कर्तव्यपरायणता, पति-प्रेम की कहानी बयां करनेवाला एक रोचक उपन्यास।

title: How to Achieve Goals with Patience
description: Humein Life mein palak jhapkaate hi success mil jaye aisa nahi hota.  Success ko paane ke Liye hard work aur excellence ke saath-saath patience ki bhi zaroorat hoti hai. Aur KUKU FM par yeh original series yahi Patience ko samajhne aur use develop karne mein aapki help karegi. To chaliye shuru karte hain patience ki paathshaala .

title: A life without Self-Doubts
description: Kya aapko pata hai ki aap apni life mein jo bhi achieve karna chahte hain uspar rok lagane wala koi aur nahi balki aap khud hai? Han ye bilkul sach hai aur isko detail mein samajhne ke liye aapko sunni hogi ye audiobook. Kyuki ye aapko ek aisi psychological aur emotional journey par lekar jaane wali hai jiske dauran aapke sare self-doubts clear ho jayenge aur aapka potential bhi poori tarah se unlock ho jayega. Yani ki ye audiobook aapki personal growth ke liye ek ultimate guide hai.

title: Positive Attitude se success paane ki Techniques
description: Vo log jo aapne jeevan mein thak gye hain, jinhe self motivation ki jarurat hai, ese logon ke liye Success Through A Positive Mental Attitude book ek guide ki tarah kaam karegi. Iss kitab mein positive aur negative vicharon ko lekar kayi example diye gye hain aur bataya gya hai ki kaise do logon ke pass kaam ek samaan hi hai lekin positive motivation ke sath kaam karane vaala vyakti har kaam ko achhi tarah se kar sakta hai. Isme PMA or NMA  ko leker ese principle btaye gye hain jinko jaanane ke baad aap kaam karane ke Approach ko sahi tarike se sahi disha mein lga sakate hain. Yah ek best self help type kitab hai.

title: Sardar Patel Tatha Bhartiya Musalman
description: Sardar Patel ne apne poore jivan mein Bharat ko sanyukt desh banane ki koshish ki. Wo humesha chahte the ki hum sabhi ke beech bhaichara yunhi bana rahe. Lekin azadi ke waqt jab Hindu - Musalman ko alag kiya ja raha tha, us dauran unki ye soch kitni rang laayi? Kya Bharat aur Pakistan ko alag nahi karne ke liye Sardar Patel ne wakayi sangharsh kiya tha? Aur aakhir kyun unka naam itihaas mein bahut sochne ke baad yaad aata hai? Janenge is audiobook mein.

title: Ahom Dynasty
description: Humne school ki kitabon mein humesha Mughal Badshah ke bare me padha hai , lekin yeh kahani aise logon ke baare me hai, jinhone sirf ek ya do baar nahi balki 17 baar mughalo ko haraya hai , Ye ansuni kahani India ke North East ke Ahom Rajao ke baare me hai jinhone logo ke Dharma aur culture ke liye badi sena ko baar baar haraya.

title: क्या मोहब्बत ज़रूरी है - Season 1
description: भावार्थ और व्याख्या … जैसे नाम वैसे ही भोले दो लोग जो इश्क़ के एक अनजाने सफर का हिस्सा तो हैं पर फिर भी पूछते हैं एक दूसरे से "क्या मुहब्बत ज़रूरी है?" क्या हुआ इनकी स्कूल वाली नादान सी प्रेम कहानी का? जानने के लिए सुनिए इनकी ये कहानी आपके अपने Kuku FM पर।

title: रहस्य
description:
हिमालय के पास स्थित ग्‍वाड़ गांव के समीप एक भूतिया हवेली थी, जहां कोई नहीं जाता था। लेकिन शहर से घूमने आए कुछ कॉलेज दोस्‍तों ने इस बात को गंभीरता से नहीं लिया और वे उस भूतिया हवेली में पहुंच जाते हैं। और रहस्‍मयी किताब को पढ़ने लगते हैं। उस महल में कैद शैतान धीरे-धीरे जागने लगते है और फिर शुरू होता है दिल को दहला देनेवाला खौफनाक मंजर। शैतान पूरे गांव में अपना आतंक मचाते हैं। तो क्‍या फिर इन शैतान का आतंक हमेशा के लिए रहेगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Voiceover Artist: Shreekant Sinha
author: देवेंद्र गमठियाल

title: Tips To Earn Extra Income in Recession
description: Recession ka samay hai, lekin aapki kamaai band nahi honi chahiye. Issiliye hum lekar aaye hain kuch aise tips jisse aap recession mein bhi extra paisa kama sakte hain. Ghar baithe, kam samay mein aur bina investment ke ! Toh suniye yeh audiobook aur janiye kaise ho sakta hai possible extra paisa kamana, kyunki aaj ki mehnat hai kal ka safe future

title: The Golden Age Of Gupta Dynasty
description: Gupta Dynasty ko Indian history ka golden period mana jata hai. Gupta Dynasty ke dauran maths, science, history, medicine, astronomy mein bahut bade developments hue the. Pie ke invention se le kar, navratano ke khoj tak. Jane aisa kya kiya tha Gupta Dynasty ke rajaon ne? Kya tha Gupta Dynasty ke itihas mein sabse upar ja kar sabse neeche aane ki kahani? Jane UPSC mein Gupta Dynasty pe puche jane wale sare sawalon ke jawab.

title: Hair care Remedies
description: Apne Balo ka khayal ham sab apne apne tarike se rakhte hai, Tarah Tarah ke Shampoo, Hair oils, Hair colors Aur Medical Treatments jisse ki ham apne balo ko achche se achcha lambe samay tak rakh paye. Lekin aisa aaj kal nhi ho pa raha hai, kam umra balon ka jhadna, safed hona ganjapan ye bahut common ho gaye hai. iski bahut si vajah ho sakti hai, Is "Hair care Remedies" Series ke jariye ham bahut se bolon se related myth aur Hair Care ke bahut sare upay aap tak pahuchayenge. Chaliye to is series ko enjoy kariye aur apne balo ka khayal rakhiye.

title: Best Comeback Stories in Sports
description: Safalta haasil karne ke liye humme lagaatar koshish karni padti hai. Lekin kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai ki ek thoke ke baad hum ruk se jaate hai aur usse apne safalta ka antt maante hai, lekin woh antt nahi shuruvaat hoti hai ek nayi kahaani ki. Iss show mein suniye aatmavishwaas ki kuch best kahaniyaan joh aap mein ek naya josh aur vishwaas paida kar degi.

title: आंसू के कण
description:
मध्यम श्रेणी परिवार में जन्मी, पली-बढ़ी, डॉ॰ श्रीमती तारा सिंह को बचपन से ही नृत्य, संगीत एवं कविता लेखन से विशेष लगाव रहा। स्कूल और कालेज दिनों में ये कई बार अपनी कविताओं तथा साहित्यिक वाद-विवाद में श्रेष्ठ प्रदर्शन के लिए प्रशंसा-पत्र व पुरस्कार पाने में अग्रणी रहीं। इनकी प्रमुख कृतियों में से एक आंसू के कण सुनिये आप सिर्फ KUKU FM पर|
Script Writer : Sikha Singh
Author : Dr Tara Singh

title: How To Stop Oversharing?
description: Kabhi apne socha hai ki aapka zyada bolna kaise aapki baat ki value aur respect dono ko hi kam kar deta hai, hum mein se zyadatar log apne aapko extrovert maan kar apni zyada bolne wali habit ko ek positive habit ki tarah dekhte hain lekin asal mein zyada bolna humein "Oversharing" ki taraf le jaata hai. Oversharing karne se humein kis kis tarah ke losses ho sakte hai aur kaise hum "Oversharing" ko control kar sakte hai ye aap humare is show "How To Stop Oversharing" me janenge. Toh ab "Muh" ko band kariye aur "Kaano" ko kholiye aur suniye humara ye show.

title: BJP Then And Now
description: BJP aaj duniya ki sabse strong aur sabse zyada paise kharch karne wali political parties mein se ek hai. Par kya hai kahani is political party ki? Kya shuruaat se hi BJP itni strong thi?  Kaise shuru hui thi is political party ki journey? Kisne rakhi thi BJP ki neev? Aakhir kin-kin leaders ka yogdaan hai is Political party ko banane mein?  Aur kya hai rishta BJP ka RSS se? In saare sawaalon ka jawaab jaanne ke liye suniye "BJP Then And Now" ka ye Original show.

title: The Science Of Happy Living
description: Aap khud ko janana chahte hain? aap khud ko lables na dekar ek aise soch develop karna chahte hain jo aapko ek pehchan degi aapki apni nazaron main? To suniye yeh mind changing Original Show jo aapko khud ko samajhne main help karegi.

title: Mr and Miss perfect
description: अनुज-प्रभा की मुलिकात़ फेसबुक पर होती है। मिलते-मिलते इनके संबंध इतने गहरे हो जाते है कि वे एक-दूसरे के घर के सदस्य जैसे बन जाते है। तभी अनुज की लाइफ में एक लड़की आती है 'आशीष', जो अनुज की गलफ्रैंड बन जाती है।अनुज के साथ प्रभा का होना आशीष को खटकने लगता है, तो वहीं दूसरी ओर प्रभा को अनुज के साथ आशीष का होना खटकता है। अनुज अब दो पाटन के बीच फंस गया था। अनुज कैसे इस समस्‍या को दूर करेगा? इस लव ट्रायंगल में किसका प्‍यार जीतेगा और कौन होगा दूर? अनुज का दिल किसके लिए धड़कता है? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी। .

title: Unusual Temples Of India
description: Bharat deviyon devtayon ka desh hai. Yahan ki aastha aur yahan ke teerth asthaano jaisa duniya mein kuch nahi. Yeh show aapko ek aise anokhe safar par lekar jayega ke aapki hairat ka koi thikaana nahi rahega aur saath hi saath aapko aastha ke tamaam rangon se rubaru bhi karvayega. Is show mein hum darshan karenge Bharat ke aise 10 anokhe mandiron ka jinmein se koi apne prasad ki vajah se anokha hai, to koi apne pooja ke tareeke ki vajah se, aur koi bas mandir ke peeche ki kahani aur maanyta ki vajah se. Yakeen maaniye yeh safar aap sab ke liye ek badi yaadgaar hoga. To dil thaam kar baithein aur chalein hmaare saath bharat ke anokhe mandiron ke safar par.

title: सांझ सवेरा
description: Ganv ka ek seedha-sada Gopal naukari ki talash me Delhi pahuchta hai. Jahaan uski pehli mulaqat aur dosti Suhani se hoti hai. Suhani ek ameer ghar ki bindas type ki ladki hai. Gopal se milkar Suhani ki zindagi dheere-dheere badalne lagti hai. Gopal ko naukari lagti hai aur dheere-dheere khud ko wo Delhi shahar ke mahaul me adjust karta hai. Gopal poori tarah se dehati hai. To kya ek ameer aur bindas Delhi ki chhori ganv ke madhyam vargiya bhole-bholr chhore ke pyar me dubegi? Kya Gopal ke mata-pita aur Suhani ka parivar is rishtey ko sweekar karega? Kya yah pyar sahi match hai ya keval akarshan? Sune poori kahani.

title: Savyasachi : Chhal aur Yudh
description: Kaustubh jise apne janm se adhik priye naam Savyasachi tha. Vishwa shanti ke liye Meghpuram ko apna lakshya banakar nikal pada wo ek hairatangez safar par jahan uska saamna hua rahasyamai mayaviyon aur khoonkaar vanvasiyon se. Khoobsurat sarovar, yudh bhumi, aur dusht sainiko ko cheedta Kaustubh kya apne lakshya ko pa saka? ya dushmano ke shadyantra ka ban gaya shikar? iska jawab dega ek hi vyakti jo hai Savyasachi.

title: चार्ल्स डिकेंस की लोकप्रिय कहानियाँ
description: Lokpriye jasusi writer Charles Dickens Ki lokpriya kahaniyan 20 romanchak kahaniyon ka sangrha hai. Kuku FM per abhi sune rahasy aur romanch se bhari jasusi khaniya.

title: Swami Vivekanand
description: स्‍वामी विवेकानंद ने युवाओं के मन को जितना प्रेरित किया, शायद ही किसी और ने किया हो। उनके अनमोल विचारों से हम बहुत कुछ सीख सकते हैं। विवेकानंद के विचार ऐसे हैं, जो निराशा में आशा की लौ जगाते हैं। तो आइए, स्‍वामी विवेकानंद के महान विचारों को सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर!

title: द डबल ए आर्मी
description: Ladkiyoh ko injection kuch hi samay baad sabhi ladkiyan jaambhi ki tarah ek dusre ko maare kaatne lahi.. kya tha is injection mein? Kaun hai jo is maasum ladkiyo ki zindagi se khilwaad kar raha tha. Jaan ne k liye sune Action aur romanch se bharpur kahani 'The Double A Army' kewal Kuku FM par.

title: 7 Money Rules for Life
description: Ek survey ke according 50% se jyada log aise hain jinke pas future ke liye koi savings nahi hai aur takreeban 30% log aise hain jinke pas apne retirement ke liye 10 lakh se bhi kam ki savings hain. Ye audiobook humein wo 7 rules  batati hai jinko apni life mein laagu karne ke baad hum har din apne paise par control rakhkar future ke liye poori tarah se financially taiyaar reh sakte hain. Agar aapko "One Up On Wall Street" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: अधूरी सांस
description: Bachpan mein hi vaishali k sir se maa baap ka saaya uth gaya tha. Gair hokar bhi aavinash avasthi ka parivaar vaishali ke liye pura parivaar hai. Bachpan kab jawaani ki dahleej par kadam rakhta hai, pata hi nahi chalta. Do dil ki dhadkane kab ek ho jaati hai, kab koi apna ho jaata hai aur ek naya rishta jud jaata hai, yah ahsaah dil ko gud guda jaata hai. Rishto mein pyaar aur tyaad ki kahani hai adhuri saas. Sune keval kuku FM par.

title: Manchahe lakshya Prapt Karne ki Jadui Pustak
description: Aksar humne logo ko kehte hai suna hai ki "Apki safalta apke hath aur apke mann me hoti hai" , aap jaise sochte hai wahi apke jivan me bhi hota hai, to chaliye sikhte hai kaise hum kuchh chizo ko sikh kar , kuch chizo habits ko develop kar ke aur daily Affirmations ke sathMann chahi safalta hasil kar sakte hai.

title: Chamkila - Elvis Of Punjab
description: 1980s mein emergency ka kaala daur punjab ko ghere huye tha. Logon ki aazadi par sarkar ne pehra laga diya tha. Aise mushkil waqt mein bhi Punjab mein ek aisa singer tha jisne society ka sach likhna, aur gaana band nahin kiya. Wo apni patni ke saath stage par perform karta aur logon ka dil jeetta tha. Lekin ek din achanak use aur uski wife ko din dahaade goliyon se khatam kar diya gaya. Kuch waise hi jaise haal-filhaal mein Siddhu Moose Wala ke saath hua tha. 28 saal ki umar mein Singer Amar Singh Chamkila 100 se zyada gaane bana chuka tha aur apne bebaak andaaz ki vajah se poori duniya mein mashoor ho chuka tha. Aakhir kyun itni chhoti umar mein use maut ke ghat utaar diya gaya aur kisne saazish ki thi uski maut ki ? Jaanne ke liye suniye Kuku FM original Chamkila - Elvis of Punjab.

title: From 565 Princely States To One India
description: India ko azadi mili to 15 August ko lekin iski ladayi lambi chali thi aur sabse bada kaam to azadi ke baad baki tha. Kaam 565 chhoti-badi riyasaton ko milakar ek Bharat banane ka. Aur is kam mein sabse badi pareshani the Pakistan ko banwane wale Muhammad Ali Jinnah. Lekin Jinnah ke saamne the desh ke 2 mahan Insaan “Sardar Patel Aur VP Menon”. Kaise in dono ne saath milkar Pakistan aur jinnah ki har chal ko nakaam kiya aur kaise 565 riyasaton ko milakar banaya Ek Bharat. Sab batane ke liye hum le aaye hain khas show " From 565 Princely States To One India".

title: Bimbisara: The King Of Magadha
description:
Bimbisara ek aise samrat ki kahani hai jisne Bharat mein Magadha ko ek sabse shaktishali rajya ke roop me khada kiya. Jisne Buddha aur Mahavira se kamaye gyan ko kabhi vyarth nahi jane diya. Jisne apne rajya ke hit ke liye apne jeevan ko nyochaawar kar diya. 
Aaj bhi Magadha ke itehas ki har kadi kese Bimbisara se jaa kar mil jaati hai, jaane ke liye sunein Bimbisara: The King Of Magadha.

title: Secrets Of Sales
description: Hamme se bahut logon ko sabse zyada paresani kisi aur se apni baat manwane men hoti hai aur uske liye ham kai tariqe apna lete hain.Kabhi- Kabhi fir bhi success nhin ho pate.Aisa hi kuch hota hai Salesman ke saath.Is line men jiske paas skill hai, Vahi sabse badhiya sale kar paayega aur jiske paas nahin hai vo ghar jayega.To ghar kyu jana? kyunki ham aapke liye laaye hain sale karne ke secrets se bhara pada ek khazana.Suniye "Secrets of Sales" kitab ki summary aur sale ki duniya men chha jaiye.  Agar aapko "The Greatest Salesman In The World" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Aap Kaisi Life Chahatein Hain?
description: Aaj har koi apni life ko balanace karna chahta hai aur uske liye hum alag alag logon se unke suggestions lete hai, youtube par videos dekhte hai aur sab kuch plan bhi kar lete hai, but jab baat aati hai inn saari cheezon ko apni real life me execute karne ki to hum khudko aur zyada confused paate hai, "Aap Kaisi Life Chahatein Hain" audiobook aapke inn saare confusions ka ek clear cut answer hai. Aap har episode ke saath apni life ko balance karna aur khush rehna dono jaan jaayenge.

title: Nanda Devi Peak And Nuclear Mystery
description: Kya aap jante hain Uttarakahnd ki sabse badi choti main gum hain ek nuclear device. Jiski capacity Hiroshima aur Nagasaki ke atom bombs se bas jara si aadhi hai. Agar yaha se nuclear radiation leak hua to uska kya parinaam hoga? Aur sabse important sawaal yeh hai ki wahan tak nuclear device kaise pahucha? aur kyun is news ko daba diya gaya ? kya hai uske peeche ki poori mystery ? In sare he questions se parda uthega is exclusive audioseries main.

title: How To Say No
description: How to say "NO" Ek self-empowerment guide hai jo aapko motivate karti hai aapke professional aur personal potential ko unleash karne main, yeh show aapko batayega ki kis tarha positive feedback aapki personal and professional growth ko shape deta hai? Kis tarha feedbacks aur critical analysis aapko hard truth ko face karne ke liye ready karta hai taki aap mediocrity se nikal kar excel kar paaye. Toh suniye yeh hard hitting show sirf KUKU FM par. Aur sikhiye polite NO bolna.

title: तुम चली जाओ
description: प्रकाश को एक दिन अचानक एक लड़की मिलती है और हालात कुछ ऐसे होते हैं कि वह उससे शादी कर लेता है। लेकिन प्रकाश की पत्‍नी एक आत्‍मा है और वह अपना बदला लेने आई ये कोई नहीं जानता है। प्रकाश क परिवार में सभी खुश हैं लेकिन एक दिन रात को कुछ ऐसा होता है कि सबके होश उड़ जाते हैं और फिर घर में खौफनाक घटनाएं घटित होने लगती हैं। कोमल अपने पति प्रकाश और परिवार के साथ क्‍या करेगी?

title: Happiness And Money
description: Kisi ne bahot sahi kaha hai "Paisa Insaan Ko Upar Le Ja Sakta Hai Par Insaan Paisa Upar Nahi Le Ja Sakta Hai" ye line 100% sahi hai isme to koi shak nahi, lekin still hum insaano ka paise se ek alag rishta juda hua hai jo ki humein sukh or dukh dono hi deta hai aur hum chah kar bhi paise se apna ye rishta nhi samjh paate ki aakhir kitna paisa hona humein humesha ke liye khushi de sakta hai, in saare sawalo ka jawaab aapko "Happiness And Money" ki audiobook ke andar mil jayega jisme aapko pata chalega ki Paise sirf Paise nahi ek "Emotion" hai.

title: Shyamli
description: वैवाहिक जीवन में दोहरे चरित्र से संघर्ष करती लड़की की कहानी ..जिसे मायके ने सशर्त पनाह दी ...उसके बच्चों ने उसे मां का दर्जा देने से मना कर दिया... ऐसे में उसका सम्बल बनकर उसकी राह आसान करता उसका प्रेम ...असमंजस की स्थिति में लाकर खड़ा कर देता है ... अपने अंतर्द्वंद से जूझ रही  लड़की की कहानी है श्यामली..

title: Neil Armstrong - The Moon Walk
description: "That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind." - Yeh woh alfaaz hai, jinhe Neil Armstrog ne chaand par kadam rakhte hi kahe the. Yeh pehle insaan bane jinhone chaand par kadam rakha. NASA aur American government ne International Space Race mein ek naya mukaam haasil kar liya. Aur yeh mumkin hua tha is naujaavan ke jazbe se jiska safar ek aeronautical engineer, naval aviator se hokar Korean War mein ek fighter pilot aur aage chalkar legendary Astronaut par aa ruka jisne maanav itihaas mein apna naam hamesha ke liye darz kara liya. Chaliye jaante inka chaand tak ka safar.

title: Masalon se bhi Treatment Possible hai
description:
Kabhi aapne socha hai ki aapki dadi ne chhole ubalte samay pressure cooker mein ek teabag khun chhok diya? Yaa tumhari maa ne kuch measure karne ke liye apni index finger ka kyun istemaal kiya? Ek chutki bhar namak aapki kheer ko aur swaadisht kaise bana deta hai? 
Cooking kuch aur nahi, ek chemical reaction hi hai jise samjhe bina khana pak toh jaega, magar shayad swaad ka rahasya samajh nahi aayeha. Suniye ye book summary aur banaiye apne kitchen experience ko lajawab!

title: Extraordinary Tips to Increase Your Income, Wealth And Lifestyle
description: Paise se bhale hi har khushi na aati ho par paisa har uss cheez ke liye zaruri hota hai jisse khusi aati hai. Shayad aapne bhi apni zindagi me kabhi na kabhi to paiso ki kami jarur mehsoos ki hogi. Par is Audio Book mein Author ne bohot sare aise tips ko share Kiya hai jise use kar aap apne job ke sath sath aur bhi alag alag tarikon se paisa kama sakte hain aur sirf paisa he nahi balki apne health ke kis tarah se dhayan rakhna hai un topics par bhi charcha ki hai. Agar aapko "Coffee Can Investing: The Low Risk Road To Stupendous Wealth" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook  zaroor sunein.

title: Chanakya Niti
description: Chanakya niti wo kitaab hai, jise sun kar aap paisa, power aur respect pa sakte hain. Chanakya ne apni niti ke zariye bataya hai ki kis tarah aap khud ko positive rakein aur apne dimaag ka sahi istemaal kar badi se badi jeet haasil kar sakte hain. Agar aap chanakya niti ki baaton ko follow karte hain toh safalta aapke kadamon mein hogi. Toh chaliye sunte hain ye audiobook aur badalte hain apne jeewan ko.

title: Network Marketing Kya Hai?
description: Network Marketing Ke Baare Mein Hum Sabhi Ne Kabhi Na Kabhi Toh Zaroor Suna Hoga. Ye Ek Aisa Topic Hai Jiske Baare Mein Abhi Bhi Bohut Se Logon Ko Poori Knowledge Nahi Hai. Is Audiobook Mein Aap Janenge Isse Judi Sabhi Aeham Baatein Jaise Ki Ye Exactly Kya Hai? Kya Humein Ise Karna Chahiye Aur Akhir Ye Itni Badnaam Kyu Hai? Toh Chaliye Jante Hain Apne Sabhi Sawalon Ke Jawab.

title: Imtehan Mohobbat ka
description:
पिया के पिता अरनब ने बचपन में उनका साथ छोड़ दिया और मां भी कुछ समय बाद गुजर गई। पराए रिश्‍तों से पिया को सगे से भी ज्‍यादा प्‍यार और अपनापन मिला भाई रणवीर से। लेकिन पिया की जिंदगी इतनी आसान नहीं थी। पिया और अभय एक-दूसरे को पसंद करते हैं लेकिन उनके प्‍यार के बीच समय सबसे बड़ा दुश्‍मन बनता है। वहीं दूसरी ओर सालों बाद पिया का अतीत उसके पिता अरनब से मुलाकात होती है। क्‍या होगा अब? क्‍या अरनब अपनी बेटी को पहचान पाएंगे? पिया और अभय का प्‍यार कामयाब हो पाएगा? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी केवल Kuku FM पर।
Author : फरहीन राजपूत
Voiceover Artist :  RJ Sarika

title: How to achieve Impossible Goals
description: Kya aapne bhi impossible ko achieve karne ka sapna dekha hai? Shayad woh ek goal joh impossible laga ya sapna joh kabhi pura nahi ho paya. How to achieve  impossible goals humme sikhaata hai ki aap unn sapno ko ya unn goals ko kaise achieve kar sakte hai. Toh aaiye sunte hai iss kitaab ki audio book summary

title: How To Live A Peaceful Life
description: Kya aap apni life se satisfied nahi feel karte, kya aap ye sochte rehte hai ki aapne apni life me jo decisions liye hai wo sahi hai bhi ya nahi ya aapko aisa feel hota ki aapse koi pyaar hi nhi karta, agar ye saare sawaal aapke dimag me ghumte rehte hai to inka jawab aapko is audiobook me milega aur aapke in sawalon ka jawab denge teen "Guru's" jinse aapki mulakat alag alag episodes me hogi. To bina time waste karein shuru karte hai.

title: जज़्बात कुछ अधूरे से
description: Prem apratyashit hai. Hum hamesha sacche pyaar ke liye daudte hai. Hamari kahani mein ek ladka Ravindar Sengar hai jo chote sheher mein rehta hai aur ek army officer hai. Aur ek ladki Shubhangi Raghuvanshi army doctor hai. Dono ek hi vishwavidhyalay mein padhte the. Unhone kabhi baat nahi ki thi par college ke aakhri dino mein dono ne baat karna chaalu ki thi. Wah is 21 vi sadi mein kuch badlaav chahte the kyuki wah shudha prem mein vishwaas karte hai. Koi nahi jaan ta, do ajnabee ek dusre ke liye kaise saathi hai. Pichle kuch saal mein aisa kya hua jisne unke jeevan mein mahatvapurna bhumika nibhai aur do ajnabiyo ko ek dusre ke liye dil ke saathiyo mein badal diya? Kaise ve ek dusre ke saath hamesha khade rahe aur kaise unhe apne pyaar ka eksaas hua jo apratyashit hai? kaise wah uske liye vishesh mehsus karte hai? Jaise ki ab dono ke irdgirdh ghumti hai jismein kuch anhoni hone ke bawajood bhi ye dono ki desh ki seva karte hia aur zindagi ki mushkil paristhitiyo ka saamna kar unhe avsar mein badalte hue ek dusre ka saath nibhate hai.

title: NCERT Class 10th Economics
description: Yeh Class 10th ki NCERT Economics book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Development, Sectors of the Indian Economy, Money and Credit, Globalisation, Consumer Rights jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Mahavir
description: Doston sanatan dharm hamesha se hi sprituality ka centre raha hai, yani agar cosmos se kisi ne aatma ko connect karaya hai to wo hai sanatan dharma. Aise he sanatani aur mahaan Jain muni Mahavir Swami ne duniya ko kaise kaivlaya ka paath padhaya. Kya hai Jain dharm ke fundamentals? Kaise jain dharm ahinsa ka sandesh deta hai. Aaiye jaante hain Mahavir Swami ke Vardhaman se sabse bade Teerthankar bananne ki journey is exclusive audio series MAHAVIR main.

title: A Guide to Child Development
description: Aaj Sabhi Parents Apne Bachhe ko aane wale waqt ke liye taiyar karna chahte hai. Taki Vo Apni life ki har problem ka solution khud nikal sake aur zindagi mein kamyabi hasil kar sake. Aur iske liye aapko pehle apne bachhe ki personality ko achhe se samajhna hoga tabhi aap use sahi direction de payenge . Lekin ye itna easy nahi hai, iske liye aapko ek child development programme ko follow karte hue aage badhna hoga. Aur us programme ko samajhne ke liye is audiobook se behtar aur kuch nahi ho sakta. Kyuki ye aapko child development programme ke sath-sath ye bhi  sikhayegi ki kaise apne bachhe ko stress aur depression se bachaya ja sakta hai.

title: Devil's Advocate
description: Devil's Advocate ki iss audio book mein aap sunenge Karan Thapar ke jeevan ke kuch khaas kisso ke baarein mein jinki unhone vistar se charcha ki hai, jaise university mein baad mein Benazir Bhutto ke saath unki dosti, Charles Douglas Home ke sanrakshan mein the times of ke saath ke videshi samvadata ke roop mein unka role. Iske alawa, Karan Thapar. samachar, television mein unka pravesh kaise hua aur kyu BJP ka koi aadami un ke show mein aane ke liye raazi nahi hai iske baare mein baat karte hai

title: Chatrapati Shahuji Maharaj
description: Chhatrapti - Yeh shabd jinke naam ke saath jud jaata hai, unhe Loknayak aur Devta swaroop pooja gaya hai peedhi dar peedhi Maratha gaurav ke etihaas mein. Chhatrapati Shahuji Maharaj ka jeevan bhi prerna aur janseva ka prateek hai. Kolhapur ki aan-baan aur shaan inhi se hai. Dr. Baba Saheb Ambedkar ke saath milkar, harijano ke liye aarakshan se lekar toh Bhartiya khel kushti ko uska samman dilane mein yeh kabhi peeche nahi hate. Apne antim saans tak inhone apni saupi gayi mahaan viraasat ko puri zimmedaari se sambhala aur 'Chhatrapati' is padvi ka sahi mayne mein kartavya nibhaaya. Chaliye jaante hai inki jeevni only on KuKu FM!

title: Say 'NO' To Fake Motivation
description: Jab bhi hum kabhi mayus hote hain humein zaroorat hoti hai thode motivation ki par kya har bar motivation humare liye sahi hota hai? Iska jawab apko milega is Original Show mein. Jismein apko farzi motivation aur sahi motivation ke beech ka antar bataya jayega. Sath hi aap motivation ki sahi definition ko samajh paayenge aur apni situation ke hisab se phir apne aap ko sahi motivate kar paayenge jis se aapke liye aane wala raasta ekdum clear ho jayega.

title: Types of Jobs in the Film Industry
description: Ek film ke superhit hone ke piche bahut se logon ka haath hota hai magar aksar public saara credit bas actors ko de deti hai. Ek film ke background mein chalne wale jobs aur job roles kaafi important aur high paying bhi ho sakte hai magar afsos aam insaan ko iski jaankari nahi hoti aur hum inhe pursue karne ke baare mein sochte bhi nahi hai. Is show mein janenge aise hi kuch zaroori job roles ke baare mein jo film industry mein maujood hain.

title: TRP: Media Mandi ka Mahamantra
description: Aksar humne TV par ye toh suna hai ki kisi show ki TRP acchi ya buri hai. Lekin yeh TRP kya hoti hai? Kyun hoti hai? Aur TV industry mein apne content ko chalaane ke liye kaise iske saath golmaal kiya jaata hai? Yeh sab kuch aap is Audiobook ko sunne ke baad jaan jaayenge. To chaliye TRP ke har ek raaz se parda uthaana shuru karte hain. aur sunte hai TRP : Media ka Mahamantra

title: History Of Gulf War
description: Ek Taanashah ki taanashahi, Persian Land se Islamic Replublic of Iran aur Kuwait ki zameen par oilfields ki laalach mein direct ground attack. Etihaas ke har pehlu ko aapke saamne laakar, jung, darindagi aur aam janta par hue dardnaak sach ko aapke saamne pesh karta hai 'The Gulf War'. Khaadi yuddha ke baare mein sab jaaniye is audiobook se. Saddam ki dadagiri aur galtiyaa, Shah se hatkar Khomeini ka Sharia kanoon wala Iran aur is par kheli gayi matlabi world politics. Abhi sune aur samjhe - The Gulf War.

title: Panama Papers Explained
description: Panama Papers ek esa sach jisne 3 April 2016 ko, 1 crore 15 lakh ese documents ko duniya ke samne la kar rakh diya tha, jisse sirf aam insaan hi nahi balki, desh videsh ki kai jaani mani hastiyaan bhi hairaan reh gayi thi. International Journalists ke banaye gaye ek secretive group ne is investigation ko kuch is trah anjaam diya ki isme aane wale naam aur isse farq padne wali companies aaj bhi ubhar nahi pai hai. Panama papers se Jude har naam, corruption aur dusre gair kanooni sach ko janne ke leye sunne, “Panama Papers Explained” Sirf KUKU FM par.

title: अनामिका.....
description:
बदरीपुर एक छोटा-सा शहर। वेद बदरीपुर पुलिस एकेडमी में ट्रेनिंग ले रहा था। लेकिन कुछ ऐसा होता है, कि वह कभी भी पुलिस फोर्स नहीं ज्‍वाइन कर सकता है। वेद का दोस्‍त उसी शहर में सब इंस्‍पेक्‍टर बनकर आता है। पोस्टिंग होते है दो दिन में दो मर्डर होता है। पहला मर्डर शहर के मशहूर होटल अनामिका  के मालिक का होता है, जो सभी के कान खड़े कर देता है। वेद भले ही पुलिस फोर्स में नहीं है लेकिन वह इस केस को पर्सनली इंवेस्‍टीगेशन करता है और कई ऐसे राज सामने आते हैं, जिनमें से एक राज यह भी होता है कि वेद को पुलिस फोर्स से क्‍यों निकाला गया था... सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Voiceover Artist : Harsh
Author : Akash Pathak

title: Bhooton Ki Rasoi
description: हर एक देश हर एक शहर की रसोई कुछ अलग ही जायके से सजी होती है लेकिन पेसिरो के खूबसूरत शहर में बने ह्यूमन रेस्टोरेंट में आपको दुनिया का हर स्वाद मिल जाएगा …… लेकिन ….. जरा संभलकर, क्योंकि इस रेस्टोरेंट में आपको नूडल्स के साथ अपनी आँते, चीज पिज्जा में अपनी उंगलियां, चॉकलेट आइसक्रीम में अपनी किडनी और अपने फेवरेट बर्गर में अपना लिवर रखा मिल सकता है। कौन बनाता है ह्युमन रेस्टोरेंट में ऐसा खाना और कौन चुराता है कस्टमर्स के बॉडी ऑर्गन्स, कौन है ह्युमन रेस्टोरेंट की रसोई में , मुंबई से पेसिरो पहुँचे नितिन और सेमी क्या पता लगा पायेंगे इन सवालों के जवाब या फिर वो दोनो भी ह्युमन रेस्टोरेंट की रहस्यमयी रसोई की तरह एक राज़ बनकर रह जाएंगे। जानने के लिए सुनिए थ्रिल की कढ़ाई में हॉरर के तड़के से बनी कहानी " भूतों की रसोई "Bhooton ki rasoi, Narrated by Sarika,Asish jain,Mann,Priyanka

title: Slice Of Life
description: Collection of heart warming motivational stories inspired from day to day experiences of a common person

title: Marvel Vs DC
description: Jab Superheroes ki baat hoti hai tab sirf 2 studio ke naam logo ki zubaan par aatein hai , Marvel vs DC. Dono ki khud ki kuchh specialties hai , Dono hi ek dusre ko 50 saalo se takkar dete aayein hai, to Marvel aur DC me behtar Studio kaunsa hai ? Kaunsi story ya super hero baaki sabko takkar de sakta hai ? Ye Competition sirf Movies ya Comics ki nahi , unke pichhe ki puri team ki hai , to chaliye decide karte hai , Who is the best Marvel or DC?

title: Acharya Shri Vidya Sagar Ji
description: Jain Community jisne bharat ke cultural development aur Spiritual Growth me Vishesh Bhumika nibhai hai. Jain Community ke bare me baat ho to Present me "Acharya Shri Vidyasagar ji" ek aisa Naam jiske bare sayad hi koi hoga jisne na suna ho. Is Audiobook me ham Acharya shri ke Jeevan ke Prakash Punj se khud se Aatma ka sakshatkar karne ka prayas karenge. Acharya shri jinhone apne kathor tap aur tyag se manav jeevan ke uththan ke liye marg asan kar diya hai. Aur is Audiobook ke jariye ham Jain dharm ko bhi janenge.

title: लव by चांस
description: Ruhaan aur Aakansha ki Mohabbat by chance hi shuru hoti hai. Online game khelne aur naye design ban ne ke shauk ne dono ko milaya. Online partnership mein game khelte khelte kam pyaar ho gaya pata hi nahi chala. Man ko gudgudanewale behad romantic kahani.

title: इश्क़ की कश्मकश
description: Arranged marriage mein bandhano waale do log apne bhoot kaal ko bhula kar ek nayi kahani ki aur badhne wale hai.

title: मज़हबी बचपन
description: Kabhi kabhi kuch seekh aise hoti hai jo hamein maasum bacche sikha jaate hai, baccho se zyaada naadani kabhi kabhi bade kar rahe hote hai, dharma ke naam par bhedbhaav aur daayre bana diye jaate hai lekin baccho ka man kaha maan ne waala hai in bandisho aur daayro ko, chatti class mein padhne waale Rahul aur Shaaheen jo ki alah alag mahjab ke maasum baic, kahani mein hum sunenge ki yah chote se bache kis tarah se apne badon ko bahit badi seekh de denge. Sune Mahjabi Bachpan aapke apne KUKU FM par.

title: How to Become a Writer?
description: "On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft" Stephen King ne is book me writing ki Techniques aur Success Formulas bataye hai jo ek writer ko apni skills ko professionally grow karne liye bahut helpful hai. agar aap writer hai ya writer banna chahte hai to aapko ye book summary jarur sunna chahiye.  Agar aapko "Bird by Bird" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Pregnancy Tips: Do's and Don'ts.
description: “Maa Banne Ka Ehasaas Hota Hai Sabse Khas”. Aur isi ehsaas ko aur surakshit banane ke liye hum laaye hain “Pregnancy Tips: Do's and Don'ts. Yahan aapko un 9 mahinon ke rahan sahan ke baare mein bahut detail me bataya gaya hai ki kaise aap apna khayal rakh sakti hain aur bache tatha khud ki dekhbhaal kar sakti hain. Aap ki Pregnancy ke samay ke liye healthy diet se lekar sahi exercise tak sab ke notes hamne kar diye hain taiyar, to ab aapko hai kis baat ka intzaar. Chaliye suna jaaye..

title: Mahatma Gandhi
description: Aaj ek ladhai jeetne ke liye desh kitne saare ammunitions aur weapons use karte hai. Par ek insaan jisne Ahinsaa aur Satya ke sidhaanton par khade hokar Angrezon ke khilaaf ki jang jeet li. "Jahaan Satya hai wahan ahinsa hai aur jahan ahinsa hai wahi ishwar hai". Suniye aur jaaniye Baapu ke baare mein joh duniya ke anginat logon ke prernastotra bane.

title: UPSC Notes: A Brief History Of Chola Dynasty
description: UPSC ka history syllabus aakhir kise asaan lagta hai, lekin agar usi history ke syllabus se Chola Dynasty jaise bade topic ko koi briefly aap tak pahuncha de, woh bhi asaan language ke sath toh kya kahenge aap? UPSC Notes: A brief history of Chola Dynasty, apko knowledge ke sath sath dega ek entertainment wala break.

title: India's Bandit Queen
description: Chambal ke beehad se joojhti hui yeh baaghi, jinhone Behmai Hatyakaand kar apne upar hue shoshan ka badla liya aur aage chalkar Samajwadi Party se chunaav ladkar saansad bani, yeh rongte khade kar dene wali kahaani hai Phoolan Devi ki! Ek 11 saal ki biha di gayi masoom ladki se, daako bankar devi hone tak ka safar. Hindustan ki pehli mahila daako jinpar aage chal Shekhar Kapoor ne film banayi. Aaiye jaante hai safar - India'a Bandit Queen!

title: How beauticians Can Start Online Home Services
description: Badalte daur mein aaj kal sabhi ko har service ek click mein chahiye. Is service ko dene mein wo log picche reh jate hai, jinke liye online service dene ka process rocket science ke barabar hai. Is list mein especially humari parlour wali didiyan shamil hain. Jinhe lagta hai ghanton kaam karne ke badle bas unke parlour tak zyada se zyada clients aa jayein. Aisi sabhi hardworking beauticians ki madad karne ke liye, humne is show mein un sabhi baaton ko bataya hai, jisse ab unke bhi ek-ek click par, unke salon mein clients ki line lag jayegi. Aaiye ise sunte hai!

title: Tere Liye Phir Se
description: Shy aur introvert Amit ki zindagi mein aati hai sweet si Sonam par Sonam to already married hai. Aur Sonam ka peecha krte huye Amit ko ISI agents pakad lete hain. To kya Sonam aur Amit ka ISI se koi sambandh hai? Ya Sonam koi raj chupa rahi hai? Kya Amit ISI ke attack se India ko bacha payega? Kya Sonam aur Amit ka koi bhavishya hoga? Janne ke liye sunte rahe, “Tere Liye… Phir Se”

title: Detective Ragini : Maut ka bhanwar
description: Lagatar 5 suicide ek hi ghar me ek hi tareeke se hone par ye case Detective Ragini ke hanthon me aa fansa ,  Ameer ghar me ho rahi maut ke sach ko janne ke liye Ragini ko  apni Ijjat aur Jaan  tak daw pe lagani pad gai . Aakhir me Ragini ke hanth laga ek aisa sach jise jaan kar khud Ragini bhi Hosh kho baithi aur Phans gai ek trap me. Aakhir kya hai in ho rahi mauton ka sach ? Kya kar  payegi Ragini sach ka pardafash sab ke samne ya phir trap me phans kar haar jayegi Detective Ragini is baar.

title: Track Your Progress Daily
description: Apne food parcel se leke apne parcel tak hum sab track karte hai but life mein apne progress ko kaise track kare? Is Original Show mein aap seekhenge ki apni company ka ya aapka khudka progress kaise record karein, accountable kaise banein aur apne goals ki taraf badhna asaan kaise banayein. OKR is bohot hi amazing technique ko aap is audio mein seekhenge.

title: Masti - Lover at Gunpoint
description:
Masti ki karnamo ka silsila hazir hai!
Hamara albela "Masti" is bar atka hai do haseena aur ek lash ke beech. Kya ye lash hai uski kahani ka the end?  Ya ye lash kholega Masti ke liye koi nayi tijori?

title: Awadh Ka Kisan Vidroh
description: Karodon ki abadi mein kayi baar kayi kisse ankahe reh jate hai. Azadi ke baad humare desh ka bhi yahi haal tha. Yahan ki gareebi, bhookmari, badhaali, se humare pehle PM poori tarah anjaan the. Us waqt Awadh mein huye Kisan andolan ne unhe Bharat ko samajhne aur samjhaane ka mauka diya. Aur aaj ye mauka is kitaab ke zariye humein mila hai. Modern India ki baatein to duniyabhar ke writers ne ki hai, lekin, agar hum humare itihaas ko dekhenge ko usme bahut si aisi baatein hai, aisi seekh hai jiska zikra aapko is audiobook mein milega!

title: मौत के हमसफ़र
description: Rajastha ki Maru Bhumi mein apradh ki ek sansani khej kahani, jismein aapka har dil ajij jaasus Anuj har pal har kadam par ek ajeeb se jaal mein ulajhta chala jaata hai. Padhiye kaise ek anjaan haseena uske maut ki hamsafar ban jaati hai. Kya Anuj us jaal ko bhed paayega?

title: पारो
description:
किसान हरिया और सुखिया दो जिस्‍म, एक जान थे। दोनों की दोस्‍ती बेहद गहरी थी और इस दोस्‍ती को रिश्‍तेदारी में भी बदलने की तैयारी हो चुकी थी। हरिया का बेटा शिवा और सुखिया की बेटी पारो एक-दूसरे से बेहद प्‍यार करते हैं। दोनों के घर वाले भी खुश हैं इस रिश्‍ते से। लेकिन गांव के सबसे धनी रामव्रत की बेटी कुंती शिवा को दिल बैठती है और यही से शुरू होती है, बदले की लड़ाई। जबकि गांव के ठाकुर वीरपाल के बेटे दुष्‍यंत से कुंती की शादी तय हो चुकी है। प्‍यार की लड़ाई में हरिया, वीरपाल और रामव्रत के आपसी पुराने रहस्‍यों से पर्दा उठता है...क्‍या कुंती की शादी शिवा से हो पाएगी? पारो का क्‍या होगा? आखिर कौन-सा ऐसा रहस्‍य है, जो इस लड़ाई के पासे को पूरी तरह से पलट कर रख देता है? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Author : अनुराधा चौहान
Voiceover Artist : RJ Simmi

title: Aazadi Ka Laal Rang - Jallianwala Bagh
description: 13 April 1919 ko, "Jallianwala Bagh Hatyakand" ne humare desh ke itihaas mein gehre dard ke nishaan chhod diye. Angrezon ki goliyon ne masoom logon ki zindagi ko chheena, aur ek andhkaar mein humein chhod diya. Lekin kya un angrezon ne kabhi bhi apne zulm ke liye maafi maangi hai? Aakhir kya tha iss hatyakand ke piche ka karan, janiye iss audioshow mein

title: Simple Techniques For Glowing Skin And Looking Younger
description: Iss digital world mein har koi apne photos upload karne ke liye  Sundar aur jawan dikhna chahta hai. Par iss pollution aur market mein moujood chemical products ke istmaal se hum kahin na kahin waqt se pehle he anti- aging ke shikar hote ja rahe hain. Lekin ab aapko fikar karne ki koi jarurat nahi hai iss Original show me hum aapke liye wo sare gharelu tips and techniques lekar aaye hain jo aapke chehre ko bedaag, Sundar aur jawan banane me madad karega aur aap humesha khubsurat aur Confident dikhenge.

title: रोबोटोपिया
description: Vikshit Hote technology ek din aise staar par aa jayegi ki manusha aur Robot mei antar khatam ho jayega. Manusya aur Robot ka yeh milan bhavisya mei sahi hoga ya galat, yah toh bhavisya ke gram mei hei, lekin doono ke milan ka lekar jyo Kahaniyon rachi gaie hei woh wah aap ' Robotopic'  mei sunn sakte hei. Iss kahaniyo ke sangrah mei kul 9 kahaniyaa hei. Rojina ek robot hei, kya ek robot se balatkar sambhav hei? kya uske liye apradhi ko kananuni saaaja di ja sakti hei? Manusya aur Robot ke aise Sambhando ko ughgar karti hei 'Robotopic'. Sunne iss adbhut kahani sangrah ko ke al KUKU FM par.

title: NCERT Class 11th Political Science Part-1
description: Yeh Class 11th ki NCERT Political Science book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap Rights in the Indian Constitution, Election and Representation, Local Governments jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Kaise karein Lakshmi Pujan?
description: Diwali par sabhi ke man mein jo sawal ghar kar raha hota hai woh hai Lakshmi Pujan karne ki sahi vidhi. Sabhi chahte hai ki us din unse koi bhi aisi bhool na ho, jiski wajah se Lakshmi Mata unse naraz ho jaaye. Aapke man ke isi sawal ka jawab aur aapki pareshani ke hal ke roop mein hum lekar aaye hai yeh audiobook. Jise sunne ke baad aapko Lakshmi Pujan se judi kahaniyan, unki pujan vidhi aur unka mahattva sabki jankari milegi. Aaiye shuru karte hai yeh safar!!

title: Game Game Boom Boom
description: "Game Game Boom Boom" kahani hai Suryav Rathor ki jo ek doosre Surayav Rathor ke jism mein pravesh kar jati hai. Suryav- jo paida toh ladki ki tarah hui thi, par usko kisi ladke ki tarah pala gaya tha. Is soul swap ke baad logon ke saamne ek nayi Suryav aati hai, jise dekhkar saari ladkiyon ke hosh ud jaate hain. Nayi Suryav sirf dikhne me hi smart nahi hai balki ek professional hacker bhi hai aur gaming ki duniya se bhi achchi taraf se waqif hai. To jab wo Force ban kar gaming ki duniya mein kadam rakhti hai to uska samna hota hai Shivay se. Shivay gaming ki duniya ka betaj badshah tha aur suryav ko dekhkar wo bhi hairan reh jata hai. Kya Suryav ki asliyat samne aa payegi? Kya Suryav aur Shivay mein takrav hoga? Kya Suryav aur Shivay ki mulakat ek naya rang layegi? Janane ke liye sunate rahein Game Game Boom Boom, sirf KukuFm par.

title: दो दिलों को पूरा करे वही तो इश्क़ है
description: Kamyab writer Shreya aur Commander Shekhar ki love story mein Kanika twist lekar aati hai. Aur ek aise group  ka khulasa hota ahi jo manav taskari karte hain. Sune poori kahani...

title: Aarya and The Mystery of Black Wand
description: Anguthi ke hole se Aarya pahochta hai Ek Anjan Duniya mein, Jaha woh kisi ko nahi pehchanta. Waha use milti hai Hina, Jisase uski hoti hai Dosti. Kaun hai hina? Kali chhadi aur Kali Gufa ka kya hai Rahasya? Aarya phas jata hai khatarnak musibat mein, Kaise bachega Aarya? Janane ke liye Sune Kahani "Aarya and The Mystery of Black Wand" Kuku FM par!

title: Air India
description: Haal Hi Mein Air India Ki Ghar Vapisi Hui Hai Aur Duniyabhar Ki Nazarein Tiki Hui Hai Tata Group Par, Har Koi Is Waqt Soch Raha Hai Ki Kya Air India ko Wapis Indian Aviation Industry Mein Wahi Muqam Mil Payega Jo JRD Tata Ki Leadership Ke Daurana Air India Ke Pass Hua Karta Tha? Chaliye Kuch Waqt Peeche Chal Kar Air India Ki Kahani Ko Shuru Se Sunte Aur Samjhte Hain Saath Hi Jaante Hain Kyu Aur Kab Bani Tata Airlines Air India?

title: Aapki Neend Important hai!
description: Hum sote kyun hai? Hum kyun asani se so nahi paate? Sone ke kya fayde hai aur na sone ke kya nuksan? Hamari health aur life ka sone se kya taluq hai? Hum sapne kyu dekhte hai? Kya Sleeping pills lena sahi hai? Technology ka sleep quality par kya asar padhta hai? Chaliye inh sabhi sawalon ke jawab jaante hain is audiobook mein.

title: अपने पराये
description: Ladki ki shaadi hote hi aur uske sasuraal chale jaane par kis tarha apne paraye ho jaate hai, rishte ke is bhanvar ko Beena na samajh saki. Aur uski nasamjhi ne pati panti ke beech darare aa gayi. Unke phulo se sukhad jeevan mein kaaton ki chubhan paida kar di. Yah baat Beena ko bahut der se samajh mein aayi ki uske daampatya jeevan mein katuna laanewaali koyi aur nahi uski apni maa hi hai. Choti choti baato mein gruhasta jeevan mein kis tarah vishwa ghulta hai aur kaise is se bacha ja sakta hai... is upnyaas mein badi rochkata se bataya gaya hai...

title: Ek Safar Aashiqui ka
description:
यह मात्र एक कहानी नहीं एक ऐसा रोमांटिक सफर है जहाँ आप इबादत और अदब के साथ इश्क़ को महसूस करोगे और जानोगे उसके अहसासों की गहराई के बारे में, समझोगे कि इश्क़ हमे positive एनर्जी देता है, बेहतर सोच देता है, motivate करता है और हिम्मत पैदा करता है कि ना डरो, ना मरो, बस केवल इश्क़ करो... 
इश्क़, इबादत और अदब की एक रोमांटिक प्रेम कहानी – एक सफर आशिकी का…….

title: The Autobiography of Charles Darwin
description: Darwin ek aise insaan jo naturalist, geologist, aur  biologist they aur jinki evolution ki theory hum sab ke beech me bahut popular hai , ye audiobook me aap unke mind aur character development ki  yaado ke baare me sunenge , to chaliye sunte hai , unki kahani unhi ki zubani.

title: तृष्णा.... एक बूंद चाह की
description: Model ban ne ki chah mein Trushna pyaar aur 5 din ki duhdmuhi bacchi ko tukhraar sapne ke shehar Mumbai aa gayi. lekin use kya mila... har kadam par chal, dhoka, samjhauta... lekin Trushna ke liye paisa hi sab kuch tha aur is paise ke liye usne na jaane kitne rishte jode aur tode... lekin kya sach mein Trushna ko sab kuch wah milta hai, jo wah chahti thi...? Parde ki chakachaund ke peeche ki kaali duniya mein kya hota hai ek aaurat ke saath? Rishte aur bollywood ke chakachaund ki sacchai bayaan karta kahani trushna ek bandu ki chah ki, sune keval kuku FM par.

title: Safalta Ka Raaz: Leadership
description: Kisi bhi jung ko jeetne ke liye sahi plan aur sahi leadership ki zaroorat hoti hai nahi to haar pakki hai lekin kya aapko maloom hai Leadership sirf sarhad ki ladaaiyon mein ya company ko chalaane mein hi kaam nahi aati life ki race ko jeetne ke liye bhi sahi leadership ki zaroorat hoti hai aur is show mein  hum aapko Leadership ki importance aur ek leader kaisa hona chahiye yeh samjhayenge taaki aap apni life aur career mein successful hone ke mission ko poora kar paayein. Agar aapko "The CEO Next Door" aur "Start With Why: How Great Leaders Inspire Everyone" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Development Of A Serial Killer
description: Kabhi socha hai aisa kya beet ta hoga un logon ke saath jo bewajah katal krne pr utr aate hain ? Jaaniye Bharat aur duniya bhar ke Sainkdon Serial Killers ke baare mein aur jaaniye ke aakhir aisa kya tha unke mann mein jo unhe logon ko maarne par majboor krta tha. Suniye KukuFM Originals ‘Development of a Serial Killer’ sirf KuKuFM par.

title: Phoolan Devi- Chambal se Parliament Tak!
description: Bandit Queen, Chambal Ki Rani, Beehad ki Devi aur aise kitne hi naamo se pehchani jaane wali Phoolan Devi ki kahani atyachar, sangharsh, jurm, aur vidroh se bhari hai. Kisi ke liye Phoolan jaati sangharsh ki masiha hai to kisi ke liye maut ka farman. Rape survivor se lekar Bandit Queen banne aur jail se wapas aakar Parliament mein chune jane tak, Phoolan ki zindagi kisi action film se kam nahi. Suniye Phoolan Devi ki kahani Kuku FM ki is khas peshkash Phoolan Devi: Chambhal se Parliament Tak mein

title: Goddess of Indian Playback Singing Lata Mangeshkar 2
description: Lata Mangeshkar,prasiddha Bharatiya Parsha Gayika, apni bisist awaz aur mukhar range ke liye bikhyat hain, jo tin se adhik saptak tak faili hui hain. Unka carrer lagbhag Chay dashak tak chala, aur unhone 2000 se adhik bharatiya filmon ke soundtrack ke liye gaana record kiye. unki asadharan yatra ke liye kukufm par ko sune aur bane rahe.

title: Negotiation Se Safal Banein
description:
Ghaate Ko Munaafe Mein Chahate Hain Badlna To zaroori Hai Ye Show Sunna.
Aapne kabhi Negotiation yani mool-bhaav kiya hai? Kiya hi hoga.Ya apni mummy ko sabji wale se ya market mein karte dekha hoga. Kabhi baat ban jaati hai aur kabhi- kabhi nahin banti. Isi na banne wali baat aur aapko ghata khane se bachane ke liye hi to hum laaye hain aapke liye "Negotiation Se Safal Banein". Jismen aapko batayeinge Negotiation ke best tareeqe aur kuch aisi tips ki saamne wali party aapki Deal ko na nahin bol payegi.

title: Insani Shaitan
description: लंबे लंबे नाखून खूंखार चेहरा! यह कहानी है एक ऐसे हैवान की, जो इंसान को कच्चा चबा रहा है। यह हैवान लोगों की आंखें निकाल कर खा रहा है! जब इंसानों से भी इसकी भूख नहीं मिटी तो जानवरों और मछलियों की भी आंखें नोच कर खा गया! इसकी हैवानियत की वजह से पूरा शहर दहशत में है। दूसरी तरफ एक लड़का जिसकी शादी होने वाली थी वो गायब हो गया है। क्या उसे भी हैवान ने अपना शिकार बना लिया है? क्या रहस्य है इस हैवान के इस तरह हैवानियत दिखाने के पीछे?

title: लावण्या
description:
