लावण्‍या एक बेसहारा लड़की जिसे अपने ही सौतेले बाप ने साहूकार के पास बेच दिया था। बचपन भयंकर यातनाओं के बीच गुजरा। गांव के एक नि:संतान दंपत्ति अपने घर ले आए लेकिन ज्‍यादा दिनों तक खुशियां यहां भी नसीब नहीं हुई और 15 साल की उम्र में ही अनाथ हो गई। दूसरे गांव का अंश नाम का लड़का ना जाने क्‍यों लावण्‍या की ओर खींचा चला जाता है। लावण्‍या भी उसे चाहती है लेकिन वह अपना प्‍यार प्रदर्शित नहीं करता। यह कहानी रिश्‍तों और प्‍यार के भावुकता के साथ बंधी है। लावण्‍या और अंश का प्रेम केवल दैहिक नहीं है बल्कि दो आत्‍माओं का पवित्र मिलन है।
Author : अर्चना ठाकुर कनक
Voiceover Artist : RJ Manish

title: Rekha: Kaisi Paheli Zindgani | Writer - Yasser Usman
description: Abhinetri Rekha ko aksar ek paheli, Bollywood ke Great Garbo ke rup mein jana jata hai. Use aksar kunvara kaha jata hai aur woh apne alagav ke liye jane jate hai. Afsos ke baat hai ki inme se koi bhi prasang uske pratibha ya uske vyaktitva ke taqat ke sath nyay nahin karta hai. Sankshep mein, abhineta ek vidrohi bana hua hai jisne ek behad galat aur pitrisatmattak duniya par ladai lade aur jeet hasil ki. Is audiobbok ek najar unke jeevan ke kayi sangharshon, durbhagya aaur chunautiyon par dala hain . Suniye Abhinetri Rekha ki kahani KUKUfm par.

title: Be your own Sunshine
description: Samay ke sath aage kaun nahi badhna chahta, lekin aage badhne ke liye, insaan ko kayi chizon se ladna padta hai. Jiske kayi tarike hai, aur inhi tarikon ko chaar alag alag kitaabein mein bataya gaya hai.Inki sikh, zindagi mein agar amal ki gayi toh humari zindagi mein roshni bharne wala aur koi nahi, hum khud honge. Unhi kitaabon ka saar milega humein ek kitaab mein, jiska naam hai Be your own Sunshine. Iss audiobook mein diye gaye moral ke adhaar aur bataye gaye tarikon se hum apne jivan ko vyavsthit, insightful aur balance kar sakte hai.

title: Arjun: Krishna Ke Parth
description: Mahabharat ke maidan me mili Krishan se seekh ne Arjun ki hi nahi balki Geeta ko padhne wale har insaan ki zindagi badal di hai. Agar aap aaj bhi anjaan hai Geeta ki seekh se, Krishna ki seekh se toh abhi sune dosti ki misaal par adharit show Arjun: Krishna Ke Parth.

title: Oscar winner Satyajit Ray
description: Kya aapne kabhi kisi film director ko apni insurance policy bechkar film banate suna hai? Sunenge bhi kaise? Itihas mein aise ek hi director ne janm liya tha, jinki shraddha film making ki taraf itni zyada thi ki, apni filmon ke saare kaam wo khud karte the. Yahi wajah hai ki unke direction mein bani 36 mein se 32 filmon ko national award mila hai. Satyajit Ray ek aise director jinhone film aur art ke taraf apne junoon ko kabhi kum nahi hone diya, aur apne aakhri waqt tak unhone apne iss junoon ke liye kaam kiya. Aaiye unke issi junoon bhari film making wali zindagi ko jante hai, is audiobook mein.

title: Positive Approach Ka Jaadu
description: Ye show un sabhi ke liye hai jo apne negative thinking ko chhodne aur apne mann chahe lakshya ko prapt karne ke liye positive aur action oriented outlook ko apnane ke liye taiyar hai. Ye ek aisa show hai jo kai logo ke jeevan mein safalta ki kahaniyon ke piche ka raaz ban sakta hai. Professional, marital, social ya personal. Agar aapko "The Secret - The Power"  aur Rhonda Byrne dwara likhi gayi "The Magic" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Successful Banane Wali Aadatein
description: Waqt ke sath rishte badal jate hain, kyunki badalna to sansaar ka niyam hai. Lekin is niyam ko hum kyun nahi samajh paate yeh sabse badal sawaal hai. Is Original Show mein hum apko yahi samjhayenge ki apko apne aap ko badalna kyun zaruri hai aur khud mein changes laa kar aap success ke kisi bhi shikhar ko araam se paa sakte hain. To chaliye shuru karte hain apne apko badal kar success ko paane ke is safar ko.

title: Successful Life Ka Blueprint
description: Hum Sabke Andar Ek Hero Chhupa Hota Hai Jo Rozmarra Ki Uljhano Mein Kahin Kho Jata Hai. Aapne Bohut Baar Suna Hoga Ki Insaan Jis Cheez Ko Bhi Dil Se Chaahe  Wo Use Hassil Kar Sakta Hai Lekin Ye Baatein Humein Bohut Hi Filmy Si Lagti Hain Aur Hum Maan Lete Hain Ki Hum Khudko Aur Apni Zindagi Ko Nahi Badal Sakte. Aayiye Is Book Summary Ke Saath Apne Andar Ke Hero Ko Jagane Ki Koshish Karte Hain.

title: ज़हर का नुस्खा
description:
जब श्रीनगर के सबसे आलीशान सैलून के हेयरड्रेसर की आंखों के बीच में गोली मार कर उसकी हत्या कर दी जाती है, तो फारूक रेशी पुलिस बल में अपने शुरुआती बरसों को याद करने पर मजबूर हो जाता है...
writer: प्रवीण स्वामी
Author : Praveen Swami
Script Writer : Sikha Singh

title: Untold Stories from the Indian Army
description: Indian Army, Ye un bahadur veeron ki fauj hai jinki wajah se bharat ka har ek vyakti har waqt apne aap ko surakshit mehsoos karta hai. Ye unki veerta aur sahas ka hi nateeja hai ki Indian Army ko world ki top 5 strongest armies mein se ek mana jaata hai.. Toh aaiye aaj KUKU FM ke is original show mein milte hain un real super heroes se jinke kaarname unke desh prem, strong will power, extra ordinary courage aur bharat ki dharti par mar mitne ke jazbe ka saboot hai.

title: Mansur Ali Khan Pataudi: Gantantra ke Nawab
description:
मैदान पर और मैदान से बाहर, बुरी खबरें टाइगर का इंतज़ार किया करती थीं. लेकिन हर बार वो उन सभी से तब तक लड़ते थे जब तक सब कुछ सामान्य नहीं हो जाता था. ये बताता था कि वो अंदर से किस कदर मज़बूत इंसान थे. पढ़िए राजदीप सरदेसाई की जबानी भारतीय क्रिकेट की कहानी|
writer: राजदीप सरदेसाई
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : Rajdeep Sardesai

title: The Russia Ukraine Conflict
description: Russia aur Ukraine, aakhir kyu chal rahi hai in dono Deshon ke bich Ladai? Kya hai iss war ki asli wajah? Aakhir kab khatam hongi salon se chalti aa rahi ye Ladai? Aur iska kya asar hoga India par? Janne ke liye suniye ye Audio show “The Russia Ukraine Conflict”.

title: Azim Premji : The Man beyond the Billions
description: Dil se samaj sevak aur dimag se businessman, ye Azim Premji ke wo gun hain, jinhone unko humesha limelight se dur rakha. Kyunki unka manna raha hai ki insaan ko apni life jitni ho sake utni personal rakhni chahiye. Apni isi moral value ko unhone apni company Wipro mein aur usmein kaam kar rahe logon ki life mein bhi shamil kiya. Azim Premji hamesha se chahte the ki unhone jo kamaya hai, use wo apne logon ko lauta sake. Tabhi to apni kamayi ka lagbhag 70% unhone government ko social cause ke liye de diya hai. Par kyun? Kya unhone apni family ke liye kuch nahi rakha hai? Azim Premji ke jivan se judi aisi aur bhi kayi baatein hai, jinhe aap janenge is audiobook mein. Aaiye ise sunein!

title: Bavandar
description: एक रेप पीड़िता थी गोवा अंडरवर्ल्ड के 3 बड़े दादाओं की हवस का शिकार बन गयी । उसके बाद "गॉडफादर" ने उन तीनों दादाओं को जिस बेरहमी से सज़ा दी, वह सबक था इंसानी समाज के लिये। उनके मर्डर चौंका देने वाले थे।

title: Eli Cohen- Mossad's Master Spy
description: Aapko kaisa lage agar koi dusre desh ka spy aapke desh mein Vice-President ban jaye ya aapke desh ki yuddh mein haar ki main wajah h? Vo aapke liye galat insaan hoga lekin apne desh mein hero hoga na? Israel ka aisa hi ek spy tha "Eli Cohen" jise aaj Israel mein pooja jaata hai kyun ki usi ki bahaduri se Israel ne ek saath 6 deshon ko yuddh mein akele hara diya tha.Duniya ke sabse bade spy kahe jaane wale Eli Cohen ki kahani ham le aaye hain. To der kaisi, Chaliye sune jayein Eli ke karamati mission.

title: Jai Jawan, Jai Kisaan
description: Desh ke doosre Pradhanmantri - Lal Bahadur Shastri, jo sirf 18 mahino ke liye Bharat ke Pradhanmantri rahe the, unhone logo ke dilo par hamesha raaj kiya.  Shastri ji ki ek lalkar par poore desh ne ek din ka upvaas shuru kar diya tha. Pakistan ne panga lene ki koshish ki toh unhone Lahore ke muh tak sena ko utaar diya. Aur phir ek din Allahabad ki rally mein unhone "Jai Jawan, Jai Kisaan" ka naara diya jo hamesha ke liye amar hogaya. Par phir desh ke aise veer ki jab Tashkent mein, Pakistan ke sath peace treaty sign karne ke bad achanak maut ho gayi, toh Indira Gandhi ne inquiry kyu nahi hone di?

title: Flipkart vs Amazon
description: Sachin aur Binny Amazon chodkar India ki Amazon banane chale hain. Par iske liye fund kahan se aayega? Kya Sachin aur Binny ka sapna sirf sapna reh jayega ya unki company sahi mein Amazon ko takkar degi? Janne ke liye sunein Flipkart vs Amazon.

title: Thug Behram
description: Apko Pata Hai Duniya Ka Sabse Khatarnaak Serial Killer Humaare Apne desh mein hua hai jiska naam hai Thug Behram. Angrezo ke Waqt mein Is Thug Ne 10 nhi 50 nhi 100 nhi poore 931 Murder Karke Apna Naam Guinness Book of World Record mein darj karvaya. Lekin Aisa Kya tha Is Insaan Mein jo isne bina Maksad Bina Kaaran Itne Saare murder kr diye ? Kya yeh Pakda gya ? Agar Pakda Gya to Kaise ? KukuFM Aap Ke liye Lekar aya Hai Itihaas ke panno ki Ek ansuni Kahani. Ek Thug Jisne Angrezo Ke naak Mein Damm Kr diya tha. Suniye SIrf Kuku FM Par.

title: सेंटिआगो 513
description:
भारतीय मूल के नैंसी और उसके पति ड्रैको जर्मनी के निवासी हैं। ड्रैको ऑफिस के काम से ब्राजील जाता है। वापसी में प्‍लेन सेंटिआगो 513 गायब हो जाता है। प्‍लेन कहां गया कोई अता-पता नहीं चलता। इस हादसे के बाद सेंटिआगो एयरलाइन्‍स बंद हो जाती है। 35 साल बाद एक हैरतअंगेज कारनामा होता है। गायब हुआ सेंटिआगो 513 प्‍लेन एयरपोर्ट पर लैंड होता है। सभी हैरान है। उस समय ड्रैको का बेटा सैम भी एयरपोर्ट पर मौजूद होता है। प्‍लेन में जब अंदर जाकर चेक किया जाता है, तो और भी आश्‍चर्यचकित करनेवाला सीन होता है। सभी 90 यात्री, कोच, पायलट के केवल कंकाल है प्‍लेन…तो आखिर प्‍लेन कौन चला रहा था? इसका क्‍या रहस्‍य है यह जानने के लिए नैंसी अपने बेटे ड्रैको के साथ इंडिया आता है। तो क्‍या नैंसी गायब हुए प्‍लने और उसमें पाए गए नर कंकाल का रहस्‍य जान पाएगी? जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Voiceover Artist: Shreekant Sinha
author: अनुराधा पचवारिया

title: 100 Crores Bank Heist
description: Bank Robbery ki kahaniyan to aapne bohot suni hongi aur shayad Money Heist web series bhi aapne zarur dekhi hogi. Par kya aapne iss desh ke sabse bade Bank Robbery Ki kahani suni hai, Aur iss mastermind ke piche kiska haath hai, kya ye jaanne ki koshish ki hai? Humare iss Original show "100 Crores Bank Heist" mein aapko ek aise Bank Heist ke baare me jaanne ko milega jo shayad kisi Hollywood film ki kahani se kum nahi hai.

title: Kaise Rakhein Apne Brain Ko Fit?
description: Brain Hamare Sharir Ka Wo Hissa Hai Jo Poori Body Ko Control Karta Hai, Lekin Kya Hamara Brain Hamare Control Mein Hai? Kya Hum Ise Poori Tarah Se Istemal Kar Rahe Hain? Kya Insaan Apne Brain Ko Samjh Kar Ise Aur Tez-Tarar Bna Sakta Hai? Inhi Sare Sawalon Ke Jawab Lekar Aaye Hain Hum Is Book Summary Mein, Jahan Aap Sunenge 12 Aise Brain Rules Jo Aapki Madad Karenge Ye Samjhne Mein Ki Aapka Brain Kaise Kaam Karta Hai Aur Saath Hi Janenge Ki Ise Aur Efficient Kaise Banaya Ja Sakta Hai.

title: भाई एक्टर हैं हम : नवाज़ुद्दीन सिद्दीक़ी
description: Bhai Actor hain hum Nawazuddin Siddique ki Jivan par adharit hain. janiye Nawazuddin Siddique ka security gurad se bollywood tak ka anoukhi safar. sirf KUKUfm par.

title: Ek Ghante mein paiye Gehri Neend
description: Hamare dimag aur sharir donon ko neend ki bahut zaroorat hoti hai. Neend se ham agle din ke liye maano charge ho jaate hai. Suniye ye show aur janiye ki neend ke liye kya-kya hai zaroori.

title: Bill Gates Ke Management Sutra
description: 20 saal ki umar ne jiss ladke ne duniya ki sabse badi companiyon mein se ek ki sthapana ki. 30 saal ki umar mein joh sabse kam umra ke arabpati bane aur 39 saak ki umra mein unhone tab ke sabse amir vyakti Waren Buffet ko peeche choda. Bill Gates kabhi aapke aur mere jaise ek sadharan vyakti the, lekin unhone apni pratibha aur kadi mehnat ke bal par microsoft ki sthapana ki aur tab unhe wah sabkuch mil gaya, jiski ve haqdaar the, Dhan, Shakti aur Vishwasaniyata

title: Govind Dholakia : Diamond king
description: Diamond king kahe jane wale Govind Dholakia aaj hazaro crore ki company Shri Ram Krishna exports ke chairman hain, Jinhone apne jivan ka safar kheti karke shuru kiya lekin Mehnat, Manifestation aur Dharm ko ek karke aaj India ke top buisnessman bane , Chaliye jante hein unka safar unhi ki zubani.

title: How Robots Will Steal Your Jobs
description: Imagine kijiye ki aap ek Interview dene gaye hain aur us interview mein ek aur candidate maujood hai aur wo insaan nahi ek Robot hai, Jo har kaam aapse pehle aur bilkul perfect kar ke de sakta hai, Us waqt kya hoga aapka reaction?  Hamara aane wala future shayad kuch aisa hi hone wala hai, Par kya sach mein ye Robots hum insaano ki jobs ko khatre mein daal rahe hain? Kya aane wala future Robots ka hai jaanenge hamare is show "How Robots Can Steal Your Jobs" mein.

title: अगर तुम साथ हो
description: Lieutinant Aradhya ke pados mein Dr. Tashree rahne aati hai. Tashree ke mata-pita nahi hain. Pahli nazar mein hi Aradhya Tashree ka deewana ho jata hai. Aradhya ki maa Nandini aur pita Harshveer bhi Tashree ko pasand karte hain. Pyar ki kahani dheere-dheere aage badhti hai aur dono ek-doosre se apni chahat ka izhaar karte hain. Lekin kahani itni asan nahin hai. Army mein Lieutinant hone ke karan Aradhya se khar khae ek smuggler Tashree ko agwa kar leta hai. Ab kahani mein kya mod aaega, janane ke liye sune kahani.

title: Communicating Your Way To Success
description:
Zaroori nahi ki communication skills inborn ho. Ye baad mein bhi acquire kiye jaa sakte hai. Bas zarurat hai toh willingness determination ki. 
Ye audiobook aapke maukhik aur likhit communcation ko behtar banae ke rannitiya banatyegi jo aapke jeevan ke har pahelu mein safalta ki aur badhne ka ek bada kadam hoga.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo: CR7
description: Ek aisa khiladi jise logon ne, media ne kisi bahari desh ka nahi balki kisi bahari duniya ka bataya, Ek aisa khiladi jo apni unchai se doguna zayda uper jump kar sakta hai, Ek aisa khiladi jise bachpan mein doctor ne khel-kood aur bhag-daud karne se ye keh kar mana kar diya tha ki use dil ki bimari hai lekin wo phir bhi bhaga aur phir bhi khela aur us khiladi ko aaj hum "Cristiano Ronaldo: CR7" ke naam se jaante hain, Aakhir kya hai is khiladi ki kahani aaiye sunte hain humare is original show mein.

title: The Murdered Bride: Jassi Sidhu
description: Kehte hain Ishq me kahan koi usool hota hai, Agar Ishq ho gya to yaar chahe kaisa bhe ho haar haal me wo qubool hota hai. Aapne aisi bauth saari love story suni hogi jo kavi puri nahi ho paai, Aisi bahut saari love story jiski shuruwat to achi hui par ant bauth he dardnaak raha Aur kahin na kahin us pyar ke dushman koi aur nahi humare apne he hote hain, Mano jaise pyar karna is duniya ka sabse bada crime ho. Aaj ke is original Audio show me hum aisi Prem kahani ke baare me zikar karnege jisme premika ne apne pyar ko bachane ke liye apni aakhri saans tak ladai ki, Aur kis tarh ladki ke ghar wale he uske pyar ke dushman ban gaye, Aur kaise aaj bhe Premi Mithu apne pyar ke justice ka intzar kar rha hai.

title: जोकर
description: Ek patni Puriwaala Seher ke sabse Amir Shaksh Chaudhari sahab ki beti ko Kidnap kar lete hei. Unkhai pohach mantri taak tak hei aur ghar mei kadi suraksha bhi teenat hoti hei, fir bhi yaha sab ho jaata hei. Kidnapper bachi ko koi nuksaan nahi pochate hei aur waha uska dost bhi ban jaate hei. Lekin kidnapping kyo hui hei yaha koi nahi Janta?

title: Mat Rahna School Ke Bharose
description: Kya school mein top kar lene se aapka ya aapke bacchon ka future set ho jaega? Kya school mein zindagi mein kamyab hone ki sabhi zaroori tarkeebein sikhai jaati hain? Aaiye jaante hain Dr. Abrar Multani ki likhi is kitaab mein.

title: Charles Babbage : Father Of Computer
description: Agar aapse koi puche ki aap kis cheez ke bina nahi reh sakoge? Aapka jawab hoga aapka mobile phone ya computer , Right? Dosto agar computer na hota to duniya ka vikas utna nahi hota jitna last 50 salon me hua hai , Lekin ye machine banane ka idea ek great mathematician ko kaise aaya? Kaunsi dikkat unhone 1830 ke aas paas face ki jisne hamari zindagi easy banadi? Chaliye sunte hai “Father of Computer - Charles Babbage” ki iss kahani mein.

title: The Assassinated Ones
description: Itihaas hamein batata hai ki Jab do vichardhara yaani alag-alag opinion ke logon ke beech disagreements badhte hain, to wo ek khooni roop le lete hain. Es series app sunenge kuch aisi hi sachhi kahaniyan jinmein darz hain itihaas ke wo qisse jahan aawaz ko dabane ke ke liye Assassination yani qatl ka raasta chuna gaya.

title: Shirdi: The Miracle City of Sai Baba
description: Sai Baba, ek sant aur adhyatmik guru, Shirdi ki nagari mein 50 saal se adhik samay tak rahe. Unke pravachanon mein pyar, daya, aur nirbalon ki madad karne ki shiksha thi. Baba ke bhakton ko vishwas hai ki unhone apne jivan mein anek chamatkar kiye, jaise ki rogiyon ko thik karna, bhookhe logon ko khana khilana, aur pareshaniyon se mukti dilana. Aaj, Shirdi ek tirth sthal hai jahan karodo log Baba ke aashirwad aur margdarshan ke liye aate hai. Unki virasat zinda hai aur unke bhakt duniya bhar mein pyar aur daya ki shiksha ko phailate hain. Kya hai Shirdi se jude chamatkar, jaanenge  KUKU FM ki is exclusive audio series main.

title: Shaheed Udham Singh
description: Yeh kahaani hai ek revenge ki. Jiss revenge ka janam hua Jallianwala Baug Hatyakand se. Kaise Uddam Singh ne British Empire ke jad tak jaakar yeh badla liya aiye suntte hai issi rochak audio biography ko

title: How To Select A Perfect Insurance
description: Zindagi mein kuch bhi permanent nahi hai. Badhti bhag daud bhare jeevan mein Zindagi ka to jaise koi bharosa hi nahi reh gaya. Aise mein zaroorat hoti hai paiso ke sahare ki jo mushkil samay mein financial help to kar sake. Aur wo help milti hai ek acche aur safe Insurance se. Par kaun sa Insurance acha aur safe hai ? Insurance lete waqt kin cheezon ka dhyan rakhna chahiye ? Kitne prakar ke Insurance hote hai aur humare liye kaun sa Insurance sabse best hai ? Jane iss audiobook mein

title: जानलेवा सफर
description: Kya koi kalpana bhi kar sakta hai ki uska safar itna jaanlewa ho sakta hai? Kahani ki shuruwaat hoti hai saat dosto se jo apni pareshaniyo se door bhagne ke liye apne parivar ko bina batae Laddakh ghoomne nikal padte hai, shuruwaat me inka safar kaafi dilchasp lagta hai lekin ek waqt ke baad inka safar itna bhayanak ban jaata hai ki jiski kalpana bhi inhone kabhi nahi ki thi, yah sabhi aisi jagah fas jaate hain jahan fasne ke baad yah sabhi pachhtate hain ki inhone ghoomne ka faisla kyon kiya, situation itni naajuk ho jati hai ki inka bachkar nikal pana bhi mumkin nahi lag raha hai, shayad hi itne bhayanak safar ki inhne kalpana ki thi, kis tarah se inka suhana safar badal gaya janleva safar mein, janne ke liye suniye kahani 'Janleva Safar".

title: How to become an Air Hostess
description: Aaj ke samay mein har kisi ko career ki chinta hoti hai. Lekin ek golden opportunity hai jo 12th pass ke criteria par bhi aapko luxurious life de sakti hai. Bas dikkat ye hai ki is field mein entry kaise karein ye hum mein se zyadatar log nahi jaante. Toh aaiye is field ke bare mein is show mein detail mein samjhein.

title: हिंदी फिल्मो के पहले चुम्बन की कहानी
description: Hindi film Trishul par pehla on screen Kiss ka pradarshan hui thi, Ap janke hairan ho jayenge  ki Hindi filomon ke pehle mahantam Gayak tha K L Saigal. janiye aise hi kuch akrashak fact and kahani ke barein mein is audiobook mein.

title: Success Through A Positive Mental Attitude
description: 100 successful logon ko interview karne ke baad Napollean Hill iss kitaab se Happiness aur Dream life jeena ka secret share kar rahe hai. Toh is classic self help audiobook ko abhi sunein. Agar aapko "The Secret - The Power" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: History Of Climate Change
description: 2021 mein humare atmosphere mein carbon-dioxide ki matra sabse zyada payi gayi thi. Dhire dhire humne humare unwanted desires ke karan earth ko bahut hi nuksan pahuchaya jisse ab pichhe jana mushkil hai. Par iss sab ki shuruaat kahan se hui ? Kab hume pata chala ki hum humare earth ko nuksan pahucha rahe hai ? Kab humne yeh jaan ki isse thik karna ab namumkin ki barabar hai ? Climate change, Global warming kya hai ? Iske karan aage kya hona hai ? Janiye iss audiobook mein

title: Gehri Chaal
description: एक औरत जो एक  गहरा और डरावना राज जानती है वो एक मंदिर के पुजारी को  कुछ लोगो के नाम बताती है और फिर उसकी मृत्यु हो जाती है। इसमे से कुछ नाम ऐसे होते हैं जिनकी मृत्यु हो चुकी होती है और कुछ शायद अभी भी जिंदा हैं। मगर वो पुजारी उस बारे में कुछ कर पाता उससे पहले ही उसकी  हत्या हो जाती है। इंस्पेक्टर भारत भूषण को उस पुजारी के पास से उन सभी नामों की एक सूची मिलती है जो उस औरत ने उस पूजारी को दिए थे। जांच के दौरान भारत को पता चलता है एक ऐसे समूह के बारे जो काले जादू का प्रयोग कर लोगो को दे रहा है मौत। क्या उन सबकी मौत जुड़ी है इस काले जादू से या कहीं छुपा है एक गहरा राज़? जानने के लिए सुनें दिव्यांशु त्रिपाठी द्वारा लिखित ये कहानी "गहरी चाल"

title: घर और वर
description: Her kisi ko kabhi na kabhi kisi parivarik bandhan mein bandhna padta hai. Ghar aur Var ek aisi kahani hai jismein parivarik rishton aur kamjor hoti rishton ki buniyad ko bakhubi bhavnatamak tarike se bataya hai. Naari ka saubhagya aur durbhagya, ghar ki samasya ko batya hai. Rishton ko aaina dikhati Umesh pandit ki Ghar aur Var upanyas abhi sune Kuku FM per.

title: Tandoor Kand
description:
Aftab Poonawalla aur Shraddha Walkar ka case apko tandoor kand ki yaad jaroor dilata hoga. Tandoor Kand, Naina Sahani naam ki ek esi aurat ki kahani hai, jiski maut ka sach apka dil dehla dega. Kyuki Naina Ko point blank par shoot karne ke bad, usse jaltey hue tandoor mein jhonk dene wala insaan koi aur nahi balki ussi ka pati, Congress Youth Leader, MLA Sunil Sharma tha.
Suniye kya hai 27 saal purana tandoor Kand? Kaise pakad mein aya tha Sunil Sharma? Aur akhir kyu mili Sunil ko jail se Azadi?

title: History Of Tipu Sultan
description: Tipu Sultan ko apne samay ke sabse khunkhar Raja ke roop mein maana jaata hai, kya sachme Tipu ne Sher ko maat di thi? Aakhir kyun Angrezon ke liye ve ek krur attyachari the, lekin apni praja ke liye ek buddhiman aur nyanpriya raja the? Unke sahsi karnamo se lekar unke controversial shasan tak, ye audiobook aapko us samay mein jeena ka anubhav degi.

title: Your Guide To Investment
description: Investment word ham sabne apni life main bahut baar suna hoga, or shayad hum mein se kuch logon ne usse start karne ke bare main bhi socha hoga but sahi knowledge na hone ki wajah sae abhi bhi kai log available investment opportunities ka sahi fayda nahi utha paye honge. Par iss show mein aap janenge har ek investment opportunity ko, usse jude risks and profits ko, sath hi ye samajh payenge ki aapko kaha invest karna hai. To chaliye shuru karte hain investment journey ka ye safar. Agar aapko "One Up On Wall Street" aur "What Every Indian Should Know Before Investing" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: एक प्यासी रूह
description: Kissa ye jaadu ki nagri ka hai. Jungle mein ghumne aaye log ped-paudhe ko todte hai aur jaanvari ka sikhar karte hai. Ek Sher ke bache ki Maut ho jaati hai, Iss se dukhi hokar sherni karte hai. Ek sher ke bache ki maut ho jaati hai. Isse dukhi hokar sherni

title: Bachchon Se Baat Karne Ke Effective Tareeke
description: Aksar parents ko lagta hai ki vo apne bacchon ko ache se samajh rahe hain lekin aisa nahi hota. Lihaza Bacche unki baat manna band kar dete hain. Is Original series mein aapko kuch aisi parenting tips ke baarein mein batayenge jinhein Sunkar aap bacchon ke sath apne bond ko aur strong kar sakte hain aur bachchon se apni baat agree karwa sakte hain.

title: Freedom 251 : Sasta Smartphone Scam
description: India me smartphone aur internet ki kranti 2016 me saste internet ki wajeh se aayi. tab ek aisi company bhi popular hui jisne sabko promise kiya tha ke "Hum duniya ka sabse sasta smart phone launch karenge jo ₹251 ka hoga , jis se india me harr hath me ek smartphone hoga" par jaise hum sab jante hai ke wo ek ponzi scheme thi , chaliye jante hai kaise hua itna bada scam jisne india ki janta,technology industry aur communication department ko shock me daal diya"

title: The Amazing Secrets of the Yogi
description: Ek spiritual journey ka dwaar sirf ek click door hai. Aisa saaransh jo aapko apne shareer, mann aur aatma ko santulan mein laana seekhayega. Swasthya se jude har chote se lekar bade rahasyo ko aapke saamne ujaagar karega. Suniye Charles F. Haanel ke kalam se nikli aur Rj karan Sharma ki aawaaz me kewal kuku fm par. Saans andar le, saans bahar nikale aur sawaar ho jaaye is adhyaatmik safar par. Agar aapko Autobiography of a Yogi jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Dosa Murder: Adhure Sach Ki Puri Kahani
description: Saravana Bhawan ka Dosa toh hum sabhi ne khaya hoga, lekin kya us Dosa ke peeche ke Dosa King ki Kahani jante hai aap? Agar nahi toh aaj is show mein hum apko batayenge Dosa King yaani ki Saravana Bhawan ke Malik P. Rajagopal ke bare mein. Ussi P. Rajagopal ke bare mein jiske andhvishwas ne unhe ek pal mein tycoon se criminal bana diya. Ek ladki se milne wale inkaar ko na seh pane par apne hi Dosa menu mein murder likhva diya. Aur apko batayenge ek aesi tasveer ka sach jo aapke agli bar Saravana Bhawan jane par apka dhyan jaroor kheenchegi.

title: Positivity Badhane Ke 10 Secrets
description: Aksar hum life mein aane wali pareshaniyon se deal karte-karte yeh bhul jaate hain ki hamare andar se positivity khatam hoti jaa rahi hai.  Hum duniya se to negativity khatam nahi kar sakte lekin apne nazariye ko badal kar apni reality khud create kar sakte hain kyuki hamari zindagi ki haqeeqat hamari soch se hi to banti hai. To chaliye is Original Show ke zariye khudko positivity se bharne ki koshish karte hain aur seekhte hain ki kaise negativity se bach kar humein life ko khushnuma banana chahiye.

title: The Secret Congress Radio
description: Azadi ki ladayi mein 1942 bahut important hai kyuki isi saal Gandhi ji ne Quit India Movement chalaya. Lekin ise logon tak pahunchane ka kaam kiya ek chhupi sanstha ne vo bhi radio se. Ise kiya tha naujawan ladkiyon ki ek toli ne jise lead kar rahi thi Usha Mehta. Kaise angreji hukumat se chhup kar alag alag jagahon se is radio ne logon mein azadi ki ladayi ki bhawana jagayi aur kaise Usha Mehta aur unki young brigade ne banaya “Secret Congress Radio”. Sab bata rahe hain “The Secret Congress Radio” mein.

title: अदभुत प्रेम की विचित्र कथा
description: Danny ke jeevan mein  jab Girija ka pyaar aya tha to usye lagta tha ki vah duniya ka sabse khushnaseeb insaan hai. Lakin naukari aur bade banane ki chahat mein Danny haqeeqat se door hote ja rha tha. Ek sacche pyaar aur premika ke makhamali aagosh mein bite huve pal ki kahani hai Adbhut Prem ki Vichitr katha. Abhi sune Kuku FM per.

title: होटल कायनात
description: Hotel Kayanaat mein ho rahe hai naye haadse. Is khabar ne pure shaher mein sansani faila rakhi hai. Aur Haalat ye ban pade the ki jisse dekho wah har shaqs hotel mein hui is nahi hatya ke peeche ki wajaho par tarah-tarah ki atakle laga raha tha. Koi in sabhi hatyaao ke peeche kisi serial killer ka haath bata raha tha to kisi ka maan na tha ki us hotel mein koi shaitani rooh thi jo us hotel mein logo ki hatya kar rahi par jo sabse sawaal thi wah thi ki kyun aur kaun? ... Aakhir kyun koi lagaatar ek hi hotel mein teen logo ki hatya karega? To is sawaal ka jawaab jaan ne ke hotel mein teen logo ke hatya karega? To is sawaal ka jawaab jaan ne ke liye sune hotel kayaanat ki kahani...

title: Good as Gold
description: Apka atmavishwas aur apke bhitar chhipi hui shaktiya apki safalta ki chabi hain.Nepolean Hills dwara likhi gayi book 'Adhiktama Safalata' main un mahtwapurna baton ke bare main bataya gaya hain, jinka prayog kamyab log karte hain. Kitab mein di gayi un vishesh baton ko apnakar ap bhi kamyab aur sukhi insaan ban sakte hain. To der kis bat ki abhi sune 'adhiktam safalata' full book keval kukufm par

title: मेरी बीवी की तलाश
description:
अपने ललुआ की बीबी हो गई लापता और फिर। .... 
Author : Anil Garg
Voiceover Artist : Harish Darshan Sharma

title: रक्षक
description:
राज को किसी अनजान ग्रह से आये महान योद्धाओं 4J ने अपना रक्षक बताकर अपने ग्रह पर ले जाते हैं। वहां रक्षक को उसके अतीत और उसके माता पिता के बारे में बताया जाता है, गुरु जीवा उसे अंधेरे के बेटे और उसके पिता के ‘लहू’ बनने तक कि कथा सुनाते हैं, तब राज अंधेरे के बेटे से तुरंत  लड़ने को तैयर हो जाता है। राज उस अनजान ग्रह पर है लेकिन उसके घर कोई राज बनकर रह रहा है। कौन है वह? क्‍या राज अपने युद्ध में विजयी होगा? अनजान ग्रहों की रहस्‍मयी घटनाओं को जानने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Author : मनोज कुमार
Voiceover Artist : Abhinav Sharma

title: The Mughul-e-Azam
description: Mughul-e-Azam jo tha sabse behtar wohi laya gaya yaha tak ke jutiya bhi. Ek apne jamane ke sabsi mehangi ticket wali film kahani Mughal e Azam ke sish mahal ki kaise bana hindi filmon ka sabse famous gaana Jab Pyar Kiya to Darna kya. Mughal E Azam kaise larai ke shots ke liye Indian Army se bhi sainik bulaye gaye. Janiye aisi hi kuch exciting detail is audiobook mein.

title: Captain Anuj Nayyar: Kargil Hero
description: Kargil - Yeh naam sunkar aksar seena garv se chauda ho jaata hai, magar saath-saath aankhein bhi bhar aati hai. In dono ke peeche kaaran sirf ek hai. Har sena ke jawaan ki di gayi shahadat aur unka wo lahu jo Kargil ki azaadi ke liye kurbaan hua tha. Unhi mein se ek bhartiya sena ke jawaan Captain Anuj Nayyar, jinka balidaan aur jeevan har bhartiya ke liye ekprerna hai. Chaliye sunte hai inke bachpan se lekar army ke dino tak ka safar. Aur kyun yeh amar hue is naam se - The Tiger of Drass!

title: How To Earn By Making Memes
description: Beete kuch saalo mein meme making sirf ek shauk hi nahi reh gaya hai, balki ab yeh ek profession ke taur pe bhi seriously liya ja raha. Kabhi sirf entertainment ka part rahi meme, aapke samne ab ek meme creator ke profession ka darwaja bhi khol rahi hai kyuki aaj har badi company memetic marketing ko apna rahi hai. To agar aap creative hai aur meme banana jante hai to iss talent ko profession mein kaise convert karna hai, janiye iss audiobook mein

title: Mansarovar - Balak
description: Hindi ka ek prasiddh upanyas hai Mansarovar - Balak" jise likha hao femous writer Munshi Premchnad ne, Iisme Premchand ne bachpan aur parivar ke rishton ke bare me likha hai. Is kahani mein mukhya Kirdar Hori ki jindagi hai jismein uska nature aur vikas dikhaya gaya hai. Suniye poora upanyas sirf KUKU Fm par.

title: My Love Affair With The Share Market
description: Kya aapne kabhi socha hai kuch log badh rahi share market se paisa kmaate hain lekin kuch gir rahi market dekh kar khush hote hain. Aisa kyu hota hai ? Kya hai aakhir share market aur isme paise kamaane ka raaz kya hai ? suniye "My Love Affair With Share Market" jisme aapko asaan bhasha mein share market se jude har swaal ka jawaab milega sirf KukuFM par.

title: Bhavishya Janne Ki Saral Vidhi
description: Yeh Audiobook Insan ke janam ke samay, graho ki sthiti ke kundli par asar ki vistar se charcha karti hai. Iss Audiobook mein 891 Yog ya Graho ki arrangements ke baare mein jankari di gayi hai, jo insan ke jeevan ke alag alag hisse jaise, dhan, career, shaadi aur parivar par asar dal sakte hai. Ismein jeevan mein aane wali problems ko solve karne ke liye bhi solutions diye gaye hain aur vo bhi aasan bhasha mein, toh chaliye apne graho ke khel ko samajhte hain

title: ऑपरेशन जिन्ना
description: Kashmir ke pahalgaam mein ek ladki ko ek Pakistani atankwadi ne agwa kar liya hai. Lekin yah koi mamuli ladki nahin hai. Na hi uska apaharan karne wala koi mamuli shakhs hai...

title: Love Beat
description: Apne Bachpan Ke Sapno Me Rang Bhartey Ye Doctors internship ke liye desh ke sabse bade hospital Chiranjeevi Tak To Phuch Jatey Hai. Lekin Pehle Hi Din Unka Samna Hota hai Ek Ese controversial case Se Jo Unki Zindagi  Ka Faisla Tay Karega. Akhir kya karenge ye doctors? Kya Ye Nayi Shurat Leke Ayi Hai Kisi Ant Ka Sath?

title: Yuktahaar
description: Kya aap is baat se pareshaan hain ke kisi bhi tarah ki diet ya exercise follow karne ke bawajood apka weight kam nahi ho raha? Ya fir aap bhi Tapsee Pannu jaisi actresses ki body ko dekh kar sochte hain unhone yeh kaise maintain ki hogi? Agar haan to yeh kitaab aap ke liye hai. Tapsee Pannu ki dietician Munmun Ganeriwal ki likhi is kitaab mein aapko har wo raaz ki baat pata chalegi jo aaj tak kisi bhi diet mein nahi batayi gayi. Suniye "Yuktahaar" Ki Audiobook exclusively KukuFM par.

title: Step by step guide to your own Start up
description: Startups toh kai launch hote hai magar successful chand hi ho paate hai. Aakhir aisa kya hai jo successful startups failure startups se alag karte hai? Kya elaborated plan hona zaroori hai yaa hamare vision ko lagatar change karne ki aavashyakta hai? Jaanenge is book summary mein!

title: मेरी गर्लफ्रेंड की शादी
description: Vinni aur Suraj ka bachpan kab Jawani ki dahleej per phuchgaya unhe ehsaas hi nhi huva. Aur jab dosti ke aage inki kahani bani to pure gaon mein tahalka mach gaya. Bachpan ki dosti mein ladte thye per sath thye, lakin pyaar ne unhe alag kar diya. To kya inki love story hogi puri ya phir rhe jayegi adhuri. Jaane ke liye sune puri kahani Meri Girlfriend ki Shadi sirf Kuku FM per.

title: क्या मुझे प्यार है ?
description:
सात वर्षों से चला आ रहा एक तरफा प्‍यार क्‍या दोनों तरफ होगा या अधूरा रह जाएगा? क्‍या दोस्‍ती प्‍यार में बदल सकती है या सिर्फ दोस्‍त ही बना जा सकता है? प्रेम और अंतरंगता के ताने-बाने में बुना बेहद रोचक उपन्‍यास है।

Writer -  Arvind Parashar

title: Wajood Aur Parchhai : Ek Aatmakatha | Writer - Dilip Kumar
description: Dilip kumar bharatiya upamahadesh mein filmee duniya ke sabse pasandida abhinetaon mein se ek hain. yah kahani unke safalata aur sangharsh ke kahani ke sath-sath unke jivan ke kayi antarang palon ke yaden bhi darj karte hai...

title: Mahabharat ka Maharathi - Veer Abhimanyu
description: Adharm ke viruddh ladhi gayi ye dharm ki kahani, aakhir kyun ek balak ke parakram ko itna maanti hai ki use Veer bulati hai? Kaun hai Abhimanyu aur kaisa tha uska parakram? Jaanne ke liye zaroor sune.

title: Pyar, Paisa Aur Relationship
description: Aapne ek baat Suni hogi ki “ Paisa Kamane Se Zyada Badi Baat hai Paise Ko Sahi Se Kharch Karna”. Aur ye baat ek dam sahi hai kyun ki jo insan paisa save karna nahi Janata vo kabhi Success nahi pa sakta. Aur KUKU Fm ka to yahi maksad ha ki aap sab safalata ki raah par aage badhein isliye ham le aaye hain ek kamal ki kitab “Pyar, Paisa Aur Relationship". Ismen aapko bataye gaye hain aise nayaab tareeqe jinki madad se aap apna paisa save bhi kar sakte hain aur fir uska sahi upyog bhi. Agar aapko "The Seven Principles of Making Marriage Work" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Mantra Rahasya
description: Duniya mein kayi tarah ke rahasya hain, jaise Ishwar hain ya nhin , Duniya kisne banayi, etc. Aur Aise bhi rahasya hain ki kaise aap khud ko healthy aur energetic rakh sakte hain. Kaise yoga aur mantra ki madad se apni mental health ko fit rakh sakte hain. Aur Indian vedon ka kya hai saar? sab batayenge is Audiobook "Mantra Rahasya" mein.

title: Gangs Of Birmingham: Real Story That Inspired Peaky Blinders
description: "Gangs of wasseypur" ye film to aapne zarur dekhi hogi aur gangs jaise Shabd hume zayada tar filmo mein he sunne ko milta hai. Lekin aaj ki ye kahani ek aise gang ki kahani hai jiska naam sunte he log dar se kapne lagte the, jiska dar pure sheher mein kaale badal ki tarah chah chuka tha, Akhir kon the wo log aur kya thee uss gang ki kahani, Jis gang mein bachhe tak shamil the, Aur aakhir aisee kya power thee uss gang ke paas ki jisse pollice wale bhe control nahi kar paate the. Jaane ke liye suniye humara ye Audio show "Peaky Blinders: The Real Story".

title: Achhe Anko Se Pariksha Pass Karne Ke 7 Rahasya
description: Exams humari life me bahut bada role play karte hai , sirf padhai ke waqt nahi aage jakar career me bhi ye experiences help karte hai , par koi school ya institution kabhi bhi exam me achhe marks lane ki techniques nahi sikhata , chaliye sikhte hai aisi 7 techniques ko iss audio book me , jo preparation se lekar exam hall tak apki help karegi aur ache mark lane me aapki help karegi.

title: Make Your Way To The Life You Deserve
description: 20’s mein aate-aate life aur career ki jung shuru ho jaati hai lekin samajh nahi aata kya karein? kahan jayein? kaise career aur life mein settle ho jayein? Kya pados waale sharma ji ka beta jis company mein job kar raha hai vahin join karlein ya kuch aur try karein? Aise hazaaron sawal humare man mein roz aane lagte hain.Aise mein humein sach mein kya karna chahiye jisse hum success ke darwaaze ko khol sakein, inhi sab sawaalon ke jawab apko milenge is Original Show mein jise sunne ke baad aap apne career aur apni life ko aur achhe se samajh paayenge aur kya karna chahiye yeh bhi jaan paayenge. Chaliye chalte hain apni life ko behtar banane ke raaste par.

title: दोस्ती से ज्यादा प्यार से कम
description: Raajeev, Saahil aur Deepa ki dosti, dosti se zyaada aur pyaar se kam hai... Deepar ne hamesha Rajeev ke bheetar ek sacche dost se kuch zyaada hi chaha, lekin Raajev is baat ko is baat ko kabhi mahsoos nahi kar paata... jab use mahsoos hot hai to bahut der ho chuki hai. Saahil ne hamesha Deepa ko chaaha lekin apni dosti ke khaatir kabhi is baat ko jaahir nahi kiya. Dosti aur pyaar ke utaar-chadhav se bhari yah kahani aapke dil ko chu jaayegi... zaroori sune kahani dosti se zyaada aur pyaar se kam.

title: Kia Motors - How It Entered Indian Market
description: Ek taraf jahan automobile companies apne shutter gira rahi thi, wahi Kia India mein apna production badhane ke tarike dhund rahi thi. India mein entry lete hi Kia motors ekdum successful ho gayi. To aakhir Kia ne India mein aisa kya kiya ? jisse vo itne successful hue aur baki automobile companies ki nind uda di, janiye is audiobook mein.Agar aapko "Built To Last" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Death Served Cold
description: iss show me aapko aisi stories sun ne milegi jo aapko sochne par majboor kar degi , “kya aisa sach me hua hoga?” , kuch dangerous women ki kahani jo apko mumkin na lage, to chaliye sunte hai pyaar , affair , passion ,zidd aur murders se bhari ye stories , Sourabh Mukharjee ki likhi “Death served cold” ki audiobook mein.

title: Find Your Own Talent
description: "Hamare Padosi Ka Bachha Ekdum Dumb Tha Lekin Kamal Kar Gya” Aapne kai baar ye baat suni hogi. Lekin us bachche ne kamal kiya to kaise? Aur Aap ya Aapke bachche kaise apna chhipa talent pahchane? Ye sawal bhi aapke man me aata hi hoga.To Doston! Aapke in sawalon ke jawab aur Aapke andar ke talent ko baahar nikalne ke kai tareeqon se bhari “Find Your Own Talent” book hum Aapke liye hi to laye hain.

title: Shree Krishna Vani - Samasyaon Ka Samadhan
description: Har roz zindagi humare saamne ek naya problem rakhti hai, hume roz uss problem ka solution khojna padta hai. Aur shayad Shree Krishna insaano ke jeevan mein aane wali har samasyaon ke baare mein jante the issiliye unhone humare sare mushkilo ke hal pehle hi khoj rakhe the. Iss audioshow mein unhi samasyaon ke hal ko janenge.

title: Ranveer Allahbadia: Alcoholic To Entrepreneur
description: Kehte hain Diya tale Andhera koi nahi Dekhta sab Dekhte hain to bas uski Roshni. Hum agar sachmuch chah lein ki hume apni Zindagi mein ye haasil karna hai to hume koi nahi rok sakta, bas hume apne manzil ka pata hona chahiye. Ek Alcohol addict jisne kar de thi nashe ki sari hade par, nashe mein dooba rehne wala wo insaan aakhir kaise nikla apne nashe ki lat se bahar aur wo kaise bana itna bada YouTuber aur ek safal Entrepreneur. Kya hai uske safalta ki kahani aur kaise dooba apne kaam ke nashe mein jaanne ke liye suniye “Ranveer Allahbadia” Ka ye Audio Show.

title: Mastering Your Emotions
description: Is competitive duniya mein shanti aur safalta se bhari zindagi jeene ka ek asaan tarika hai - apne emotions ko niyantrit rakhna. Lekin apne emotions ko kaise control karte hain? Is kala ko bina kisi ki sahayata ke kaise sikhte hain? In sab sawaalon ke jawab ke liye suniye yeh special show!

title: हत्यारा प्रेम
description: Pyar me thukrae jane par Rajeev atmahatya kar leta hai. Poora parivar toot jata hai. Lekin koun hai jo Rajeev ka badla leta hai aur shahar ki har Shreya naam ki ladki ka buri tarah katl karta hai?

title: Anhoni
description: Naye ghar me kadam rakhte hi Rajwanshi family ke sath hone lagi khaufnaak ghatnaye. EK rahasyamay Kala Saya jiske napak hain irade wo ban baitha hai dushman 8 saal ke masoom Tejas ka. Kya Prachi bacha payegi apne bete Tejas ko jab sab maan baithe hain wo ho chuki hai pagal! Kaise rokegi wo ye Anhoni?

title: Reasons to Stay Alive
description: An Optimistic Story about Depression and Anxiety

title: Think and Grow Rich
description: The Secrets of 40 Millionaires' Wealth' Revealed

title: UPSC Success Story - IAS Ira Singhal
description: KukuFm Aaap ke liye laya hai IAS Ira Singhal Ji (All India Rank 1) Ka Exclusive interview Jisme yeh humein btaati hain UPSC Aur zindagi Ke Baare mein Bahut saari insightful baatein. Agar Aap bhi UPSC clear karna chahte hain to suniye yeh interview sirf KUKUFM par.

title: A Journey To Holy Rivers Of India
description: Ye audiobook ek journey hai humare India ki Holy Rivers ki, jismein na keval hum nadiyon ke baare me baat karenge balki uske saath-saath kayi aise nadiyon se judi mysteries ke baare mein bhi batayenge jinke baare mein shayad hi aapne kabhi suna hoga and also ek surprise episode bhi hai un logo ke liye jinhe adventure sports pasand hai. To chaliye shuru karte hai humare India ki holi rivers ko jaanne ka safar.

title: British Economic Policy In India
description: India, Industrial England ke liye Economic Colony ban Gaya tha. British ne Bahut si ladaiyan ladi aur India se dutch, french, portuguese ko bhaga diya aur Mughalon se dosti kar India par kabza kar liya tha. Iske Bad dheere dheere bahut si Policies lagu ki, jisse Britishers Powerful hote gaye. India jo ki bahut bada Business Market aur Raw Material Provider tha use England ka Raw Material supplier bana diya. Is Series mein aap sab kuch detail mein janenge.  Agar aapko 'The Discovery of India' jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook aapko khoob pasand aayegi.

title: खून का प्यासा
description: Delhi Jaise Seher mei ek ke badh ek Ladkiyoo ka katal ho raha hei, Katal Karne ki tarika bilkul Alag hei, Ladkiyo ki Gardaan Kaatkar unke Sarir se saara Khoon Nikal kar Unki Body kon Safed Karke Katil Jungle mei Patak Deta hei. Police Investigation kar rahi hei lekin koi Surag nahi mil raha hei. Kya Hei inn Khoon ka Raaz? Jaane ke liye Suniye ' Khoon Ka pyasa'

title: Becoming a Great Manager
description: Manager, ye ek aisa word hai jo kuch logon ko pareshan karta hai toh wahin kuch logon ko yeh word sunte hi support, empower aur ek accha workspace ki yaad dilata hai. Doston ek accha manager na sirf apne business ko fayda pahunchata hai balki apni team ko bhi professionally grow karne mein madad karta hai, toh aakhir ek accha manager bana kaise jaye? Chaliye jaante hain is audiobook mein.

title: Productive Meetings For Effective Results
description: Humare career ka ek bada hissa hum meeting mein bitate hain. Hum khud ko meetings mein kaise present karte hain, yeh bahut maayne rakhta hai usme bhi agar aap Manager ya Leader hai to yeh aur bhi zyada zaroori ho jata hai. To agar aap Manager ya Leader hai, to meetings kaise karni chahiye? Meeting ka agenda kaise set karna chahiye? Aur kaise meetings mein problems ko solve kiya jata hai, janiye is audio book mein.

title: Retirement Ke Bad Sukhi Jeevan
description: Aapne business aur career ke baare me kaafi chez suni aur padhi hongi , lekin kya kabhi apne retirement ke baad ki planning ki hai? aksar kaam ke bina insan bore ho jata hai aur retirement ke baad apne bhi kafi logo ko zindagi se bore hote hue dekha hoga. to chaliye jante hai retirement ke baare mein iss audio book me jinke examples aur saral baatein aapki 2nd innings ki dost banegi.

title: Perfect Decision Maker Baniye
description: Aapka behavior dimaag ke 2 systems se determine hota hai, 1 conscious and dusra hai automatic. In 2 systems ki ek dusre ke beech ki fight ki wajah se aapke memories mein errors aate hai aur aap decision lene mein chuk jaate hain. Iss Original show mein aap inn 2 systems ke baare mein jaanenge jisse aap ek acche decision maker ban sakein.

title: The Psychology of Money
description: Timeless Lessons: Wealth, Greed & Happiness

title: Bachhon Ki Pratibha Kaise Ubharein?
description: Aaj bhi kayi aise parents hai jinko lagta hai sports mein career banana bewakufi hai. Kyunki sports mein ya yun keh le unke bachhe ke chune hue kisi mamuli field mein unhe apne bachhe ka accha future nazar nahi aata. Par agar sahi mayno mein dekha jaaye to kisi bhi bachhe ka sabse bada moral support uske parents hi hote hai. Jo unke skills, unke talent ko badha kar unme confidence ko boost karte hai. Parents ko isi baat ka ehsaas dilane ke liye hum lekar aaye hai aapke liye audiobook!

title: Dream Job : Paise Kamaane Ka Asaan Rasta
description: Kya aapko bhi apne dream job ki talash hai? Kya aap bhi janna chahte hai, logon ko kaise milti hai unki pasand ki naukri ? To suniye yeh audiobook  “Dream job - Paise kamaane ka asaan rasta". Iss audiobook mein aap sikhenge ki kaise banate hain wo resume aur cover letter, jo companies ko impress karte hain. Saath hi janenge un portals ke baare mein jo job khojne mein aapki madad kar sakta hai.

title: Anxiety aur Panic Attacks se kaise deal karein?
description: Jo log anxiety se deal kar rahe hote hai, yaa toh unhe medication par jeena padta hai ya depression ke saath jeena sikh lena padta hai. Magar ye book summary ek aise author ne likhi hai jinhone 10 saal se anxiety se guzarne wale logo ko successfully usse bahar nikala hai. Is book summary ki technique har koi istemaal kar sakta hai bina kisi age ya background ke restriction ke.

title: Hardik Pandya : T20 Ka X Factor
description: Hardik Pandya currently Indian Cricket Team ka ek bada naam hai, lekin ye naam itna bada itni aasani se nahi bana iske pichhe kayi kahaniyan hain, struggle hai, controversies hain, aur hard work hai jise hum is show mein janenge. To chaliye shuru karte hai 9th fail Hardik Pandya ki "T-20 Ka X Factor" banne tak ki kahani ka safar Sirf Kuku FM par.

title: Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan
description: Ek sadharan se bacche se ek asadharan Major banne ki kahani, bahaduri aur deshprem ki misaal ban kar Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan 26/11 ki raat ke aatanki hamle mein bahaduri se ladkar shaheed hue. Magar kya thi inki kahani? Kaise diya inhone aatankiyon ko muh tod jawab? Chaliye jaante hain is show mein.

title: R D Burman
description: Is audiobbok mein apko milegi sur samrat R D Burman sahab ki bareim kuch chaukane dene wala facts jisko sunkar ap hairan ho jayenge. Kya ap jante hain ki R D Burman sahab unka pehla gaana matra 9 saal ki umra mein banaya tha. Ap hairan ho jayenge sunkar ke R D Burman sirf 2 minute mein sagar film ka gaana banaya tha. Aise hi uski jeevan ki kuch kahaniya ka niskarsh hain ye audiobook. To sunte rahiye is audiobook aur kukufm par bane rahe.

title: Ruktapur
description: Bihar! India Ka aisa state jahan se sabse zyada IAS niklate hain. Jahan ke log aur kai states mein jakar job karte hain aur un rajyon ki economy ko badhte hain. Lekin Bihar vahin ka vahin hai, jaise Ruka hua ho kai sau saalon se. Yahan ki shiksha, jobs aur hospitals sab pichde hue maloom hote hain. Isi Bihar ki kai kahaniyan aur sach batane ke liye KUKU Fm le aaya hai writer Pushyamitra ki likhi famous kitab "RUKTAPUR" ki Audiobook !

title: लताजी के गले से खून?
description: Geeta Ray ke Geeta Dutt aur Badruddin ke Johny Walker banne ki Kahani. Kya ap jante hain ek gaane ko lekar S D Burman sab bhi Dare huye the. Is audiobook se Bollywood ke aise hi kuch ghatnao ki bare mein jane.

title: जया बच्चन और डैनी का रिश्ता
description: Ek hi formula se banayi na jane kitni filmein Nasir Hussain ne. Kya Ap Jante hain ki Nasir Hussain ne ek mamuli Lights man se Film Star bane the. Bollywood celebs ki aisi hi kuch khas qisse hain in audiobook mein.

title: The Burari Death Case
description: Burari Case –  Ek Hi Privar ke 11 logo ki Maut Ek sath, Burari Case Pure desh ki vo ghatna jiske bare me jankar man me kai saval uth jate hai. Aapne bhi jarur is ghatna ko TV par ya Mobile par dekha hoga, dukh hua hoga Aur kafi kuchh janne ki koshish bhi ki hogi. Is ghatna ko ham bariki se samjhenge, Unki Family kaisi thi? Dosto ka kya kehna tha? Relative’s ka kya kehna tha?  or sach ka pata lagane ki koshish karenge.

title: Rajiv Gandhi
description: Rajiv Gandhi, hindustani siyaasat ka voh chiraag jinhone jeevan se mile apne adhikaar ko bakhoobi nibhaaya. Srimati Indira Gandhi ki mrutyu ke baad ekaaek inhe pradhaanmantri bana diya gaya. Bina koi anubhav aur siyaasati daav pench se door saral si zindagi jeene wale aur Indian airlines ke pilot aakhir kaise utre rajneeti mein, kaise pakad banayi ek adhunik bharat ki taraf aur kaise bharat ne inhe khoya, aaiye jaante hai unki is kahaani ke saath!

title: Beyond The Cycle of Birth & Death
description: Janm hai to mrityu bhi hogi aur mrityu hai to janm bhi hoga. Birth and death ke strange concept ko deal karte huye ye audioshow hamari Janm se pehle aur Mrityu ke baad ki kayi saari mysteries reveal karta hai. In secrets ko jaan kar kab humare andar se mrityu ka dar chala jaata hai aur humein pata bhi nahi chalta. After life ke bare mein jaan-ne ka craze logo mein badhta ja raha hai. Iske bare mein alag alag philosophers aur books ki alag alag raay milti hai. Par iska scriptural proof shayad hi kahi available hai. Aur isi demand ko poora karta hai ye audioshow jise sunne ke baad aapki life ko ek nayi shuruaat milegi.

title: Mahapadma Nanda: Itihas ka Dusra Parashurama
description: MahapadmaNanda kaun the? Kalpak ne unhe unki jaati kyun yaad dilayi? Jo ranneeti aur rajneeti mein mahir tha us senapati ko shadayantra ki jarurat kyun padi? Aur usne aisa kya kiya jo matr ek senapati MahapadmaNanda Magadh jaise samrajya ka shasak ban baitha? Kyun kaha jata hai ise ek Ekrati aur Bharat ka pehla Chakravarti Samrat? Nand Vansh ki shuruat aakhirkaar hui kaise? Fir agar MahapadmaNanda ke dwara shuru kiya gaya Nand Vansh itna mahan tha to Chandragupta Maurya ne ise kaise hara diya? Kyun kaha jata hai unhe dusra Parshuram? Kya thi unki jaati, Kshatriya na hote hue bhi kaise unhone apna samrajya banaya?

title: Maths Aur Science Mein Excellent Kaise Banein
description: “Confusion hi confusion hai solution kuch pata nahi” 3 idiots ka yeh song bas song nahi har us insan ki kahani hai jo maths aur science mein numbers ke sath ladaai ladte hain. Lekin ab aap maths aur science se ladaai nahi karenge balki usnhein apna dost bana lenge. Is Original Show ko sunne ke baad aapke liye maths aur science ko samajhna bahut easy ho jayega, saath hi aap  apne baaki subjects mein bhi learning capability badha payenge

title: Bloody Teddy
description: Silicon Valley of India  “Bengaluru” me Serial Killer “Bloody Teddy” ki dahshat se koi nahi bacha , Har ek subah naya murder case aur unhi dead bodies ke tukdon me alag hue  body parts is baat ka saboot the ki shahar me Law & Order fail ho chuka hai. Evidence ke naam pe sirf dead bodies ke kate hue parts aur unpe likhe “Bloody Teddy” ke naam ke alawa Killer ke khilaaf kuch bhi nahi mila. Police se le kar Junta tak me bas yahi sawal dahshat macha rakha hai ki Aakhir Kaun hai ye Serial  Killer “Bloody Teddy” Kyun hai ye itna beraham qatil aur kab tak iske hanthon bekasooron ka Qatl aur unki body ke sath khooni khel khela jayega ?

title: फँस गया ऑटो वाला
description: Zara sochiye aap kabhi kisi museebat mein pad jaaye aur jaane anjaane mein hi sahi par aap kar lete hai kisi se sachi dosti. Par jab aapka bura waqt aata hai toh aur aap sabko chodkar sirf usi pe bharosa karte hai. Lekin wo dost bhi de deta hai aapko vishwaasghaat. Aise hi dhoke aur dosti ki yeh kahani likhi hai aapke apne Pravin Singh Negi ne.

title: पागल लड़की
description: Atharv college aate jaate sadak kinaare pade ek ladki maile-kuchle kapdo mein dekha karta hai aur ek raat wah use apne ghar utha laata hai. Ladki nahi chahti hai ki Atharva uske kaaran kisi musibat mein phase isliye vah ghar se bhaag jaati hai. Aisa kayi baar hota hai. Wah paagal ladki Atharv ke Dilo-Dimaag mein bas jaati hai. Use prem ho jaata hai. Lekin kya Bhavishya mein Atharv ko uska pyaar milta hai? Us ladki ke saath aisa kya hua tha jo vo sadak par rahti thi?

title: How To Achieve Financial Peace
description: Aaj ke waqt mein har koi apni zaroorat se zayda paise kamana chahta hai aur kuch log kama bhi lete hain lekin phir bhi bahut se logon ko un paison ko manage karna nahi aata. Kitni savings karni chahiye, Kitna Invest karna chahiye in chezon ko lekar hum aaj bhi bahut confuse rehte hain. Isiliye humare is Audio show mein humne 10 aise keys ke baare mein discuss kiya hai jo aapko sirf Rich aur Wealthy hi nahi balki apne Financial peace ko kaise achieve karna hai uske baare mein bhi bataya gaya hai.  Agar aapko "The Total Money Makeover : A Proven Plan for Financial Fitness" jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Karagar
description: दुनिया के उत्पीड़न से जूझती रज्जो, हर एक लड़की के लिए एक मिसाल है। हर एक लड़की के दिल की चुभती चीख है जो आज भी कहीं न कहीं दबी हुई है। कैसे लड़ेगी रज्जो इस समाज से? सुनिए रज्जो की कहानी सिर्फ Kuku FM पर।

title: Vande Mataram : National song ki kahani
description: “Sujalam sufalam malayaja shitalam sashya shamlam Mataram, Vande Mataram” ye lines 1882 me publish hui lekin Inko kayi saalo pehle likha gaya tha, chaliye jaante hain Vande Mataram kavita ki is biography mein ke kaise 19th century me likhi gayi ye lines humari azadi ki warcry bani aur kyu abhi bhi ye kavita har indian ke dil mein desh bhakti ka josh bhar deti hai.

title: The History of Languages
description: Bhaasha ka nirman kaha se hua? Kaunsi bhaasha thi jo sabse pehele aayi aur kya hai iska itihas? Jaaniye in sabhi sawalo ke jawab aur mitaye apni curiosity!

title: Patanjali Aastangik Yoga
description: Yeh audiobook aapko Patanjali ke Aastangik yog ya 8 ango vale marg ke naitik mulyo ka abhyas karke ek purposeful jeevan jeene ke baare mein batayegi. Aasthangik yog ke 8 ango mein Yam, Niyam, Dhyaan, Pranayam, Pratyahar, Dharna, Dhyan aur Samadhi Shamil hain, jo humein humari prakruti ke aadhyatmik pehlu ki aur le jate hain aur is audiobook mein ise bahut hi saral tarike se samajaya gaya hai.

title: Acres of Diamond
description: Sadi ki sabse badi pustak ke darze ke saath saath, effective speech ka sateek model aur philosophy ka bharmaar hai 'Acres of Diamond'. Lekhak Russel Conwell ke bahumulya lectures ki series jo aapko awsar prapt kar use safalta mein kaise badla jaaye. Aur apne karmo se paaye hue fal ko lok kalyaan mein lagana seekh apne hard work ki paribhaasha badle aur ek altruic vision ko paida kare. Suniye yeh bhavya aur vishaal lessons se bharpoor eye opener jaha aap samjhenge heeron ki kheti ka matlab.

title: Bhakti Darshan
description: Embark on a spiritual journey through the legends and myths of our rich culture while listening to unknown, traditional stories.

title: शापित जंगल
description: Jungle ke rakhwaale ki hatya kar koi bach nahi sakta hei. Yaha Kahani Unhone Rakhwaalon ke Rashas banane ke safar ki hei.

title: How to Enjoy Your Life and Your Job
description: Jeevan ke obstacles kahi sadharan cheezon mein chupe hote hai. Hum apne aap ko kiss tarah se dekhte hai ya apna message dusro take kaise pohochaate hai isse bhi aapke life ke obstacles par prabhaav padta hai. Lekin is kitaab mein Dale Carnegie inn obstacles se bahaar aane mein aapki madat karenge

title: How to Lead A Satvic Life In 2023
description:
Kya aapko pata hai jo khana hum khate hain waisi hi life hum attract karte hain, humara khana hi humara sabse important aspect hai, agar sahi se 
physical activity aur work-life balance ke saath spiritual practice karte rahe toh life ke lie khud he ek positive attitude develop hoga. Yahi toh bhagwan Sri Krishna geeta main keh gye hain, unhone bataya hai ke kis terha sattva gun sabse supreme gun hai jo ultimately moksha ke terfa aatma ko lejata hai, toh kya hai sattva gun, kaise attain karein iss modern life main ek satvic lifestyle. Yeh sab jaanane ke lie sunte rahein yeh exclusive audiobook sirf KUKU FM par. Toh is naye saal ki suruwat karein satvic lifestyle se aur cure karein khudko.

title: नाजुक बंधन
description: Suhaagraat' shabd 'Saubhagya Raat' se bana hai kintu vivah ke baad pratham milan ki raat sabke liye to saubhagya lekar nahin aati Namita ke sath bhi kuchh aisa hi hua.

title: How To Set Goals And Achieve Them
description: Aakhir jeevan mein ek maksad hona kyon zaroori hai ? Aap hi sochiye, subah uth ke aapke paas kuch karne ke liye na ho to aapko kya subah uthne ka motivation milega ? Goals hume jeene ka purpose dete hai aur safalta ke aur aage badhne ka direction. To agar aap kuch extraordinary chahte hai ? Apne sapne ko hakikat mein badalna chahte hai to yeh show aapke liye hai jo aapko goal set karne, uss ke liye strategy banane ke kuch golden rules aapko batayegi

title: खौफ़.... कदमों की आहट
description:
Publisher:- FlyDreams Publications  ...          
Buy Now:- https://www.amazon.in/dp/B086RR291Q/            

 .....  खौफ...कदमों की आहट कहानी संग्रह में खौफनाक डर शुरू से अंत तक बना रहता है। इसकी प्रत्‍येक कहानियां खौफ पैदा करती हैं। हॉरर कहानियों का खौफ क्‍या होता है, इस कहानी संग्रह को सुनकर आप समझ जाएंगे! कहानियों की घटनाएं आस-पास होते हुए प्रतीत होती हैं। आप भी सुनें बिना नहीं रह पाएंगे, तो अभी सुनें खौफ...कदमों की आहट …!

title: NCERT Class 12th Political Science Part-1
description:
Yeh Class 12th ki NCERT Political Science book ki complete explanation hai. Ise sun kar aap The End of Bipolarity, Contemporary South Asia, International Organizations, Security in the Contemporary World
jaise topics ko ache se samajh jaayenge. Ismein har topic se jude examples aur important questions bhi bataye gaye hain, jo aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge. Agar aap UPSC ki taiyaari kar rahe hain toh yeh information aapke liye kaafi helpful rahegi.

title: Kaise Secure Karein Family Ka Future
description: Ek family man ke liye apni family ki safety aur financial security bahut important hoti hai. Lekin life ki bhag daud mein hum is baare mein soch hi nahi paate ki kya humara parivaar humare bina survive kar payega? Aakhir kaise hum apni family ke future ko secure kar sakte hain?  Humari Yeh Original series aapke isi problem ka solution hai. Toh chaliye apni family ko secure karne ke liye sahi kadam ki tarafh aage badhte hain.

title: मोहरा - ऐ मर्डर मिस्ट्री
description: एक व्‍यक्ति निराशा से भरा अपने कमरे में आत्‍महत्‍या करने की कोशिश में फंदे से लटकने ही वाला था कि तभी उसके फोन की घंटी बजी….फोन कट करते ही उस इंसान के चेहरे पर मुस्‍कान आ गई। और आत्‍महत्‍या का विचार त्‍याग दिया। फोन करनेवाले ने उसे एक काम सौंपा था...कौन सा काम था? कौन था वह व्‍यक्ति जिसने निराशा से आशा की दुनिया में उस इंसान को वापस ले आया? सस्‍पेंस और थ्रीलर से भरी कहानी मोहरा ए मर्डर मिस्‍ट्री सुनें केवल कुकू एफएम पर।

title: मुट्ठी भर धूप
description:
वीर की नजर जब पहली बार मीरा पर पड़ी, तो जबरदस्त आकर्षण के जादू ने उसे अपने वश में कर लिया। मीरा को भी कुछ-कुछ महसूस हुआ। देखते-ही-देखते यही उनकी जिंदगी बन गई। दोनों को एक-दूसरे की तरफ खींचनेवाली ताकत ही मानो एकमात्र सच्चाई थी, जिसे बयां नहीं किया जा सकता। हालांकि यही प्‍यार उन्‍हें एक-दूसरे से अलग कर देता है। अचानक एक तबाही उन पर हमला करती है और उनके सपनों को झकझोर देती है। कुछ बाकी रह जाती है तो सिर्फ नफरत, जो उनके प्यार के जितनी ही ताकतवर है। बरसों बाद, किस्मत एक और चाल चलती है और दोनों को आमने-सामने ला खड़ा करती है। एक बार फिर। इस बार फैसला उन्हें करना हैः अपनी नफरत के हाथों बरबाद हो जाएं या प्यार को एक और मौका दें।
Voiceover Artist: Ashish Jain
Script Writer: Vikram Bhatt

title: मुस्कुराने की वजह तुम हो
description: रनबीर, अदा को चाहता है और उसके लिए दुनिया छोड़ सकता है। उसके पास अच्‍छी नौकरी है, मोटी सैलरी है लेकिन उसकी इच्‍छा कुछ और करने की है। एक दिन काफी सोच-विचार के बाद, वह अपनी नौकरी को छोड़ पूरी तरह से लिखने के काम में जुट जाता है। वह जब इस क्षेत्र में संघर्ष कर रहा होता है, तो अदा उससे दूर होने लगती है। इन सारी उलझनों के बीच, पीहू शर्मा उसकी जिंदगी में आती है, जो उसकी अब तक की पहली प्रशंसक, और पूरी तरह से उसके प्यार में डूबी हुई लगती है। किसका प्‍यार सच्‍चा है अदा या पीहू का? सुनें पूरी कहानी।

title: Analyzing Demonetization - Note Bandi ke 5 Saal
description: Maine sirf desh se 50 din mange hai, “Mere bhaiyo aur behno 30 december tak mujhe mauka de dijiye” aapko ye sambodhan to yaad hai na jise Note-Bandi ke baad PM Modi ne diya tha. Is series mein hum Demonetization yani Note-Bandi ke 5 saalo ka lekha jokha vistar se samjhne wale hai ki Kya Note-Bandi Modi sarkar ki sabse badi mistake thi ya Digital Revolution ki ek Shuruwat. Demonetization ke Nuksan aur Fayde ko fact ke sath janenge.

title: Nithari Kand Ke Khooni Kisse
description: Nithari Kand. Uttar Pradesh  ka wo kand jisne logon ki neend uda di thi.Vo kand jismen do hatyaron  ne hatya karne ke aise tareeke apnaye jise jankar samaaj, police aur court bhi dang rah gae.Is Audio Book men ham aapko suna rahe hain usi Nithari Kaand ki shuru se lekar ant tak ki poori kahani. To aaiye sunte  hai desh ke  sabse bade cannibal case ke bare men.

title: आँख मिचौनी
description:
आँख मिचौनी 
writer: रमेश गुप्त
Voiceover Artist : Rashmi Sharma
Author : Vishwa Books

title: मेरे सामने वाली खिड़की में
description: Zindagei ek khidaki hai bas usase baahar jhaankane kee dar hai ki sab kuchh saaph saaph najar aa jaata hai. is kahaani mein bhi Adi ke saath kuchh aisa hi hua. jaise hee usane apanee khidakee se baahar jhaanka use usakee zindagee ko makasad dene vaalee koee mil gaee. par kya aadi ka pyaar paravaan chadhega? ya reh jaegee khidaki band? Jaanane ke lie sunie Anil Garg dwara likhi ye prem kahaani....

title: त ता ती
description:
त-ता-ती Collection of Small Stories
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Author : मुमताज़ खान सादिक़

title: Bachho Ko Bigdane Se Kaise Roke
description: Scientific facts ki maane to humara dimaag galat chizon ki taraf jaldi attract hota hai, Aur aaj ke is modern daur mein ye pata lagana aur bhi mushkil hota jaa raha hai ki humare bacche kis disha mein aage badh rahe hain, Unke dost kaise hain? kahin unhe kisi buri aadat to nahi, Aise bahut se sawal hain jo aaj kal ke parents ko pareshan karte hain. To aakhir bachho ko sahi disha kaise di jaae, Unhe bigadne se kaise roka jae, Aur wo Kaun Kaun se steps hain jise follow kar aap apne bacho ko ek Disciplined way mein raise kar sakte hain jaanenge humare is Audiobook mein.

title: Kuku FM ki Case Study
description: Indian Startup Ecosystem ka ek bahut bada naam, Bharat ka largest audiobooks platform KukuFM, jisne sirf 5 saal mein 30 Lakh se zyada logon ko apne saath joda aur subscription model par education ko ghar ghar gaanv gaanv pahuncha diya. Lekin unhone aakhir aisa kiya kaise ? Aaiye jaante hein hain KukuFM ke teen founders se Lal Chand Bisu, Vikas Goyal Aur Vinod Kumar Meena aur sunte hai unke success ki journey

title: Story of Byju's
description: India me Byju's naam shayad he kisi ne naa suna ho , Indian cricket team ki T shirt se lekar harr gali me rehta student . Jabse india me harr hath me 4G aya hai "Byju's" indian education ka synonym ban gaya hai. To chaliye sunte hai ek teacher ki kahani , Jo apne dosto ko padha kar popular hue , Jinse padhne ke liye pura "Stadium" bhar jata tha & Ab jinka naam ek Billion dollar brand ban chuka hai.

title: प्यार का एहसास "कोरोना"
description:
यह कहानी है रितिका की, जो अपनी मासूमियत और शरारतों से कठोर से कठोर आदमी का दिल पिघला दे। यह कहानी है सना की जो अपनी जान से ज्यादा अपने साथ वालों की परवाह करती है, यह कहानी है निशा की जो 12 साल से अपनी एक गलती की सजा भुगत रही है। इन सब की जिंदगी में कोरोना वरदान और अभिशाप दोनों की तरह आया बस जिसने इसको जैसे देखा वह उसको वैसे ही मिल गया।
सुनिए इस प्यार के एहसास को जिसने खुशी और गम से इन सबकी जिंदगी को पूरी तरह से बदल कर रख दिया किसी को कुछ दे दिया और किसी से कुछ ले लिया।।

title: How to improve your Email writing skills
description: Email likhte samay hum logon ko words nahi sujhte aur kayi baar to ek chhota sa email likhna bhi 4 page ke essay likhne se zyada mushkil ho jata hai. Par agar aap ye original show sunenge to aap unlogon mein shamil nahi honge, jo email ki jagah whatsapp pe communicate karna easy samajhte hai. Kuku FM ka ye show aapki email writing se judi sabhi problems ko solve karega. Kyunki is show mein subject se lekar email ke tone tak, sab par baat hogi. To aaiye ise sunkar, apne email writing skills ko sudharkar ek better email writer bane.

title: Break Toh Banta Hai
description: Aap ko yaad hoga, school mein 4 lectures ke baad recess milti thi, yeh isliye kyuki humara brain kuch ghanto baad thak jata hai, aur uske liye focus kar pana mushkil ho jata hai. Par jab hum UPSC, IIT jaisi competitive exam ke liye prepare kar rahe hote hai tab breaks lena mushkil jo jata hai aur break ke bina focus karna pana mushkil ho jata hai. To kaise in dono ke bich balance banayein? Kaise effective break lein, jisse humara focus badhe aur hum acche se exam ke liye khud ko taiyaar kar sake, aaiye jante hai.

title: Kakori- British Raj ki Sabse Badi Train Dakaiti
description: Gulami ki beriyon se Bharat mata ko aazad karne nikal pade Ram Prasad Bismil, Chandrashekhar Azad aur unke sathi lekin kranti ki aag ko kaayam rakhne ke liye chahiye tha paisa jiske liye dia unhone Kakori train loot ko anjaam aur British Raj ko munh tod jawab. Kaise anjaam dia unhone is kaarname ko jaanne ke liye sune Kakori sirf kuku fm par.

title: The Foundation of Success: Little Things that Matter
description: Agar Hum Aapse Puchhein Ki Shandaar Zindagi Jeene Ke Liye Ek Insaan Ko Sabse Jyada Zaroorat Ki Cheez Ki Hoti Hai Toh Aap Mein Se Bahut Se Log Kahenge Paisa, Ghar, Gadi Vagera Vagera. Lekin Hamari Aaj Ki Book Summary Ke Author Shiv Khera Maante Hain Ki Ek Shandaar Aur Successful Zindagi Jeene Ke Liye Humein Agar Kuch Chahiye Toh Wo Hai Positive Attitude. Chaliye Jaante Hain Kaise Hum Sab Life Mein Successful Ban Sakte Hain.

title: How to deal with Toxicity in Workspace?
description: Insaan shayad sab kuch jhel sakta hai, lekin ek toxic workplace uski zindagi barbaad kar sakti hai. Kya hote hain ek toxic workplace ke lakshan aur kaise aap isse bahar aa sakte hain jaanenge iss show ke zariye.

title: Martin Luther King
description: "I Have a Dream" - Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. ke bhaashan se in alfaazo ne usi din unki aur America mein barso se shoshit kiye jaa rahe, Black Communities ki taqdeer badal di. A Civil Rights Leader, Gandhi ki soch rakhne wale, equal rights activist aur ek Black Messiah. Yeh har racism se ghaayal hue insaan ki prerna the. Inhone logo ko apni identity, apna etihaas aur apne culture ko apnakar sar uthaakar jeena seekhaaya. Inke leadership mein, America ne pehli baar Black Power ko mehsoos kiya. Chaliye sunte hai yeh show aur inke mahaan jeevani se kuch seekhte hai.

title: डोली से अर्थी तक
description: Shadi ek aisa vishay hai, jiska sapna maa baap apne bachcho ke liye tabhi se dekhna shuru kar dete hain jab wah paida ho jate hain, chahe ladka ho ya ladki, shadi tay karte samay saari samajhdari dhari ki dhari rah jati hai. Apni saamarthya se upar bhavyata me kharch bhi karte hain, fir bhi man hi man dar satata rahta hai ki kuchh kami to nahin rah gayi. Kami rah jati hai to bas baavon ki aur rishton ke ahamiyat ki. Doli se Arthi kahani aap ki ankhon ko nam kar degi aur yah sochne par majboor karti hai ki jhoothe rishton ko nibhana kitna jaroori hai?

title: Pari hu mai
description: परी हूँ मैं। एक ऐसी लड़की की कहानी है जिसे अपनी पहचान छुपाकर जन्म लेना पड़ता है। क्योंकि उसके गांव में यह प्रथा थी, कि बहू का पहला बच्चा अगर कन्या हुई तो जन्म होते ही उसे मार दिया जाए। परी को भी जन्म लेते ही मार देने के योजना थी। लेकिन किस तरह उसकी जान बची ..? और उसके जन्म के बाद क्या हुआ उसके साथ..? और क्या वर्षों से चल रही इस रूढ़िवादी परंपरा का अंत हुआ..? इन प्रश्नों का उत्तर जानने के लिए सुने एक बेहद खूबसूरत पारिवारिक कहानी- परी हूँ मैं।

title: Kya Aap Jante Hai?
description: Kya aap bhi science aur general knowledge ke sawalon mein interest rakhte hain? Agar haan to es audiobook ko sun kar aap 500 se adhik aise questions ka Jawab sun sakte hain. Apni knowledge badhane ke liye bacchon ko practice karane ke liye ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: Did You Know?
description: Un Cheezon ke bare mein ek series jo aapko lagta hai ki aap janate hain, lekin kya aap sach mein vo jaante hain? Ab aap Sabse simple cheezon ke piche ke rahsyon ka ptaa lagayein, mithakon ko khatm karna aur kuch important issue ko sabke samne layein jinke bare mein koyi bhi baat nhih karega!

title: Live A Happy Life
description:
Aapki Life Ko Safal Banane Ke Sawalon Ke Jawaab, Is show Mein Hain Janaab.
Kabhi- kabhi aisa lagta hai na ki samay kitni tez bhag raha hai. Kaam ke chakkar mein khud ko samay nhin de paate ya samay ke chakkar mein khud ko. In jaise kai sawalon ke jawaab dene ke liye hi to KUKU FM  laya hai Live A Happy Life naam ki kamaal ki audiobook. Apne time ko kaise manage karein aur kaise samsyaon se ubrein? Ye sab is show mein itminan se bataya gaya hai.To chaliye karte hai shuruaat.

title: How America Controls the World?
description: Duniya ki sabse strongest currency USD Yani United States Dollar hai, yeh to hum sabko pata hai. Lekin US dollar ke paas itni power aayi kaise? Aur kya USD hi ek aisi currency hai jo world par humesha raj karegi? Agar aisa hai to kyun? Aur agar aisa nahi hai to kaunsi currency ab US dollar ko lagatar challenge kar rahi hai? In saare sawalon ke jawab janne ke liye abhi suniye yeh Original Show.

title: काला पहाड़
description: Sultaan Karnani ki sena ka Subhedar Kalaachand Ray Dharmishtha Brahamin tha. Sultan ki beti dulhari ne Uss par Mugdha hokar vivah karne ka faisla liya, Lekin dharma ke khatir uss ne yaha prastav thukra diya. Lekin Samaj badla aur usne dulhari kaa Hath tham liya. Fir Suru hui Dharmadha Bhramano ki kutilaata ki kahani- Insaan ka hevan bannane ka safar jaane. Jaane waha pehle Kaalchand Rai se Mohabbat Famuli bana aur Fir ban kaala Pahad kaise bana?

title: विक्रांत - इनाम 4 करोड़ का
description:
राजस्‍थान के सबसे मशहूर और रईस लोगों में शुमार अमरीश चौहान के बेटे राज और बेटी खुशी का अपहरण होता है, लेकिन इसमें ट्विस्‍ट आता है और कड़ी सुरक्षा के बावजूद अपहरणकर्ता के चंगुल से कोई और उन्‍हें उठा लेता है। कौन है ये इंसान? शक्तिपुंज का क्‍या है रहस्‍य? कहानी रहस्‍य और रोमांच से भरपूर है। हर कदम पर सस्‍पेंस मिलेगा। अपनी जिज्ञासा को शांत करने के लिए सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Author : प्रवीण सिंह नेगी
Voiceover Artist : RJ Manish

title: Mukammal Ishq
description: जरूरी नहीं हर कहानी का अंत मिल कर ही मुकम्मल हो। कुछ कहानी न मिलकर भी मुकम्मल कहलाती है। प्रेम, एक ऐसा एहसास है, जिसे पाकर ही लोग पूरे हो जाते है! इस कहानी में भी आपको प्रेम का यह स्वरूप सिद्धार्थ और नंदिनी के जरिए देखने को मिलेगा। जिन्होंने एक दूसरे को न पाकर भी एक मुकम्मल इश्क़ रच दिया।

title: How to Think Differently
description: Kya aap linchpin hai ? Kyuki  aaj ke samay mein ye humari life ka sabse essential part hai. Linchpins yani ki vo insaan jo bheed se alag hatkar ,kuch invent karta hai , kisi organization ko lead karta hai ya Karna Chahta hai aur society mein sabke sath ek accha connection banakar rakhta hai.  Lekin sirf is jaankari se hum Linchpin nahi ban jayenge iske liye humein apni kismat aur system ke bharose baithne ke bajaye khud ek map taiyar karke uske hisab se life mein aage badhna hoga. Aur  vo map kaise taiyaar kiya ja sakta hai ?  Ye janne ke liye is book summary se perfect aur kuch bhi nahi ho sakta hai.

title: Aap Bhi Merit Mein Aa Sakte Hain
description: Acche Colleges mein admission milne ki baat ho ya kisi sarkari vibhag mein naukri, Merit mein aaye hue students ka number sabse pehle aata hai. Toh ab aap bhi merit mein aa sakte hain aur aasani se safalta ki seediyan chadh kar apni alag pehchan bana sakte hain. Iske liye aapko jyada kuch karne ki zaroorat bhi nahi hai bas is audiobook mein batayein gay asaan tareekon ke anusaar aapko apne daily routine mein kuch badlaav lane hain.

title: Archimedes
description: Bachpan men padhi gai ek kahaani yaad hai na aapko.Jismen scientists nahate hue achanak kuch khoj leta hai aur Yureka! Yureka! chillata hua raja ke mahal ki taraf bhagta hai. Us mahan scientists ka naam tha Archimedes. Archimedes jisne duniya ko pani ke kai siddhanton ko samjhaya aur khoje naye- naye auzaar.Is audio book men ham aapke liye laaye hain Pracheen yunaan vaigyanikon aur vahan ki sabhayataon ke vikaas ki poori kahani.janane ke liye Yunaan aur Archimedes ka itihas aap bane rahiye is audio book aur kuku fm ke saath.

title: Balanced life jeene ka Matlab
description: Ye Book summary diye gaye project mein sabse mahatvapurn kaarya par dhyan kendrit karke kisi ke karyabhar ko saral banane ke mulya par charcha karti hai. Ye vastavik roop se us kaarya aur samagra pariyojna ki dakshata ko adhiktam karne ke liye kaam karne ke liye ek kaarya ko chunne ke samanya vyavsayik siddhant batati hai

title: NCERT Class 10th Political Science
description: Class mein first aana ho ya UPSC ki taiyari karni ho ya phir kisi competitive exam mein achhi Rank laani ho, Shuruaat to NCERT book utha kar padhne se hi karni hogi. KUKU fm par yeh original series apke isi problem ka solution hai. Jise sun kar aap Power Sharing, Federalism, Gender, Religion and Caste, Political Parties jaise topics ko achhe se jaan jaayenge aur saath hi inse jude examples aur important questions aapko exam ki taiyari mein aur bhi zyaada help karenge.

title: How to Design Your Dream Retirement
description: Hum aksar retirement ko itna seriously nahi lete aur sochte hai abhi to bahut time hai, retire hone mein. Par agar retirement ki taiyaari aaj se nahi ki to retirement life guzaar pana mushkil ho sakta hai. To iss audio-show mein hum aapko batayenge ki retirement ki taiyaari kab aur kaise shuru karni chahiye. Kya hai government ki schemes jo ismein aapki madad kar sakti hai aur kaise retirement ke liye ek sahi investment plan decide kiya jaye uspe bhi charcha karenge

title: Arvind Kejriwal: The Founder Of AAP
description: Arvind Kejriwal ki zindagi ke kuch ankahe kisse hain jo shayad bahut kam logon ko pata hai , unka engineering school se suru hua safar delhi ke CM banane tak aur usse aage ke unki soch kya hai? kaise unke voters unhe vote karte hain? aise kya baatein hain jisse wo raato raat politics main itna bada naam ho gye? aur unke around controversies kya hain? Jaanenge yeh sari ansuni baatein KUKU FM ki iss original audio series main.

title: हमारी अधूरी कहानी
description: Hamari Adhuri Kahani Ek Aise Ishq ki kahani hei jyo ishq chaha kar bhi pura Na ho paya, par afsoos kuch kahaniyaa wahi se suru hoti hei jaha unka Anth Hota hei.

title: Introduction to Computer
description: Computer ka itihas apne aap mein hi bahut mazedar hai. Par kya aapne kabhi ye janne ki koshish ki hai, ki ye aakhir bana kaise? Aakhir iska Software kaise work karta hai? Hardware ka kya kaam hai ? Aur ye WWW yani world wide web ki kya kahani hai? Aakhir Computer se Internet ka kya lena dena hai? In saare sawalon ka jawaab hai humari is Audio book mein jiska naam hai "Introduction to Computer"

title: Wright Bandhu
description: Aaj hum ko aakash mein jo Aeroplane dekhte hai, hawai yatra karte hai, iska pura shrey Wright brothers ko jata hai. Wright brothers bachpan se hi hawa mein udne ke concept ki aur attracted the aur saal 1900 mein pehli baar biplane banane se lekar 17 december 1903 ko ek successful udaan tak ka unka yahi safar hum janenge iss audiobook mein

title: Neera Arya - First Lady Spy
description: Neera Arya jisne Ek deshbhakt Krantikar ko bachane ke liye apne Pati ko Maut ke ghat utar diya tha. Akhir Neera Arya kon thi jise Indias First Spy bhi kaha jata tha? Neera ka Jeevan kaise tha? Inko Neta ji ne apni Rani jhansi sena ki kaman kyon di thi? Neta ji ke sath desh ki azadi me inka kya connection tha? In sare sawalo ke javab aapko hamari is series me milenge. deshbhakti se Oot-Prot is series ko suniye jo aapko ek sachce deshbhakt ki yaad dilayegi jise kai salo pahle bhula diya gaya tha.

title: भक्ति भारत की शान है मेरे भारत की पहचान है
description:
Bhakti Bharat ki Shaan Hai- Mere Bharat ki Pehchaan Hai Written by Harisha Chandra Narrated by Arjun Dev
Voiceover Artist : Arjun Dev

title: The Arab & Turks Invasions In India
description: Doston jis Bharat mein hum rehte hain isse har daur mein loot ka shikhar hona pada hai yeh loot sirf Angrezi loot tak seemit nhi hai , iss dharti par loot ke kahani to kafi pehele he suru ho gayi, jis waqt Turks aur Arabs ke aankh iss dharti par aa ruki , unhone yaha aakar khub loot paat machaya , mandir tode , libraries jalai, gyan ki bhoomi par khub katleaam kiya aur yaha ke sanskriti mei bhi daal diya zeher , Kaisa ?? Yeh aapko pata chalega iss audio series mei jiska naam hai The Arab & Turks Invasions In India.

title: अनकहा इश्क़
description: Ishq!! Pyaar!! Mohabbat!! Kabhi Umrah ke bandhan ka Mohtaaj nahi hota. Umrah ke iss bandhon ko seere se Nakarta hei Rishabh aur Kamini ka Ankaha Ishq. Woh ishq jo suru toh hua kolkata ki Galiyon mei par Mukammal hua Chennai ke ek Alishan Ghar Mein. Kolkata mein rehne waali Rishabh ki Kamini kismat ke fer se Bichad kar Chennai pohchti hei aur Ban jaati hei Dakshin ki prasiddh Abhinetri Kamya Banerjee!! Jaha inka Ankaha Ishq bachpan mei bichde Sathi ko Samne lakar khada kar deta hei kya hoga jab lambe intezar ke badh doono fir se milenge, kya pehchan payenge ek dusre ko….. Jaane ke liye Sunnie puri Kahani.

title: आख़री ख़्वाहिश
description: Yatra Kasi Thi' Usne mere chehre ko Dularete huie pucha " Mein Duty par tha", thek hei! mujhe pata hei ki iska matlab kya hei. Yaha Vidhyarthi ke liye ek yatra thi aur mere liye bolne ka sahaas tha. Mein Muskaraya, lekin kuch bolo nahi, Suniye pyar bhari Kahani

title: Bewafai or Mohobbat
description: कहते हैं इस दुनिया में सभी के लिए कोई ना कोई बना है। बस उस किसी के मिलने का सही वक्त होता है। और हमें बस उस वक्त को समझने की ज़रूरत होती है। इस कहानी में भी हमारी काजल सच्चे प्यार की बेवफाई में फंस जाती है पर क्या वो इससे निकल पाएगी? क्या उसे भी मिलेगा उसका सच्चा प्यार? जानने के लिए सुनिए स्वाति कुमारी द्वारा लिखित कहानी बेवफाई और मोहब्बत!

title: Retirement Planning Kaise Karein?
description: Yeh audiobook aapko kuch valuable insights aur tips degi jo aapko apni retirement planning mein help karegi. Chahe aap savings karna shuru kar rahe ho ya pehle se hi retirement age ke qareeb ho, is show mein aapko financial planning, investment strategies aur social security benefits ke bare mein jaankari milegi jisse aap apne retirement ke golden years ko khushi se guzar sakein.

title: Trading aur investment ka Manual
description: Long run mein Wealth banane ke liye kya hai sabse easy aur simple strategy? Kya mutual funds labhdayak hai? Iska maximum fayda kaise kare? Jaane aise kai saare trade secrets is book mein! Agar aapko One Up On Wall Street jaisi book pasand hai to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: वो धुंधली डायरी
description:
यह दोस्ती और प्यार की एक ऐसी कहानी जिसमें हमेशा एक-दूसरे से जुड़े रहने के लिए ऐसा रिश्ता बनाया जिसको शब्दों से बयां करना थोड़ा मुश्किल हैं। वो मिले भी शायद इसलिए हो जिससे उनकी मानसिक स्थिति, एक सकारात्मक सोच और कुछ जुनुन के साथ उनके अधूरे सपने जिन्हें उन्हें पूरा करना था। तीन दोस्त अर्शी, अबीर और ऋषि की कहानी। वे अपनी कंपनी की जॉइनिंग डेट पर एक-दूसरे से मिले। इन सभी की अलग-अलग कहानियां, सपने और कुछ ट्रेजेडी हैं, लेकिन फिर भी वे आजादी और खुशी के साथ जीवन जीने के लिए एक-दूसरे का साथ देते हैं। तान्या एक ऐसा किरदार हैं जो ऋषि के न होते हुए भी उसके सपने अर्शी और अबीर के साथ पूरे करती हैं।
Script Writer : Ravindra Singh Takur
Voiceover Artist : Rj Simmi

title: Kalpana ki Udaan
description: Sapno ki udaan ka naam hai Kalpana. Hindustaan ka gaurav aur antriksh amar gaatha! Ek Indian American astronaut jinka janm hua tha Karnal mein aur jinka jeevan har mahila ke liye prerna daayak hai jo apne sapno ko dekh unhe jeene ki umeed rakhti hai. Space Shuttle Columbia, 1997 mein shuruaat aur dusri udaan STS - 107, saal 2003 mein hamesha ke liye amar.
