Teams divided hai, Celebraties jud chuke hai or iska market bahut baa ho chuka hai. Isi Popularity ke chalte ham aapke liye lekar aaye Kabadi Kabaddi yani full masti vale Game ki complete series.

title: You Can Be Original Too
description: Kya Duniya mein har ek idea original hai? Kya ideas ko copy nahi kiya ja sakta? itne bade bade unicorns aakhir kaise ban jaate hain? Kya hai secret original ideas ka aur originality ka. Aaiye humare saath is safar par aur jaaniye kuch dimaag ko hila dene wale concepts jo aapke sochne ke tareeke ko badal denge. To Abhi suniye yeh audiobook sirf KUKU FM par.

title: Kalam, Talwar Aur Tyag
description: "Kalam, Talwar Aur Tyag"  Munshi Premchand ka likha ek samajik upanyas hai, jisme wo shiksha, swatantrata aur samajik nyay ke muddon par likhte hain. Is kahani mein main kirdar Jumman ki jindagi ke baare mein likha gaya hai, jaane jumman ki poori kahani is Audiobook mein. Sirf KUKU Fm par.

title: सपने सच होते हैं - नसीरुद्दीन शाह
description: Naseeruddin Shah saheb ka NSD ka safar kaise aur kiske sath shuru kiya filmon ka safar.Naseeruddin Shah ki love life...kaise mile woh Ratna Pathak ji se.Naseeruddin Shah aise actor jinhone bataya kitni tarah se has sakte hain, kitni different tarike se ro sakte hain. Janiye uske barein aur kayi batein sirf is audiobook mein.

title: Simple & Effective Diet for Working Individual
description: Agar aap bhi Wokring indiviual ho to hum samaj sakte hai ke Kaam saath saath apni fitness ko sambhal pana kitna mushkil hai par kaam ko achhe se karne ke liye fitness zaruri bhi hai! To chaliye jante hai ke ek active aur fit life jine ke liye kesi diet follow karni hai aur agar ghar se kaam kar rahe hai to kya karna chahiye.

title: Advertisement ki ABC
description: Koi bhi business tab tak aage nahi badh sakta jab tak uske product ki promotion sahi tarah se na ho. Aur yeh promotion hota hai advertisement se. Lekin promotion ka matlab apne product ke sirf banners lagana nahi hota ismein aur bhi aisi kayi chizein shamil hoti hai, jispar promotion ka successful hona depend karta hai. Aaiye unhi anjani chizon se aapko rubaru karate hai humare is show mein, taaki aap apne product ko successful product bana sake.

title: Corporate Rules Ko Todkar Safal Hue CEOs
description: Aapke hisab se degree zyada matter karti hai ya experience ? Actually humare society mein ek bahut hi bada myth hai ki jis field ki aap padhai karte ho, aapko sirf usi mein kaam karke success milegi. Lekin agar aisa hota to shayad Dhirubhai Ambani Reliance ko itna successful nahi bana paate. Kyuki na unke paas MBA ki degree thi na koi business background. Inke jaise kai aur logo ne yeh prove kiya jiske baare mein hum iss audiobook mein charcha karenge aur janenge ki aakhir wo konsi quality hai jo bina degree, bina experience ke insaan ko successful banati hai

title: कुछ रिश्ते अनजाने से
description:
शादी वाले दिन सीरत का होनेवाला दुल्‍हा भाग जाता है। मजबूरी में भाई के दोस्‍त परम से शादी हो जाती है लेकिन सीरत हमेशा खुद को नौकरानी ही मानती है, कभी खुद को पत्‍नी का दर्जा नहीं देती। दुर्भाग्‍य वश परम की दूसरी शादी हो जाती है सीरत की सहेली से। एक म्‍यान में दो तलवार क्‍या रह पाती हैं? अचानक एक ही परिवार के पांच लोगों की हत्‍या... आखिर क्‍या है इसका रहस्‍य? प्‍यार, समर्पण, चाहत और प्रतिशोध में कौन हारता है और कौन जीतता है, सुनें पूरी कहानी।
Author : एस. सिमरप्रीत सिंह कंग
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain

title: कैमरामैन - अ लास्ट वेडिंग शूट
description: Ek anjan mulakat se Deepak aur Sanjan ki love story shuru hoti hai. Lekin kuchh aisa hota hai ki Sanjana bewafa ho jati hai. Jisse Deepak bahut dukhi hota hai aur uski poori duniya hi badal jati hai. Lekin saalon baad Sanjana ko dulhan ke jode me dekhkar cameraman bana Deepak k jakhma hare ho jate hain. Lekin fir aisa hota hai Sanjan ke liye Deepak apne jeevan ko kurban kar deta hai?

title: और सफर पूरा हुआ: ऋषि कपूर
description: Bollywwod industry ke sabse pyare joro mein se ek hone ke babajood , bahut se log iss tathya se abagat nahi hain ki ek samay tha jab unhe ek dusre se talaq lena padta tha.Janiye unke real aur reel life ki aisi ghatanayo ki is audio mein.

title: समय साक्षी है
description: Uss Upanyas mei jiss Kalkhand ki charcha hei, Waha Ajadi ke pehle ka hei, Uss Samaj Desh ke Kshitij par Aajadi ke Badal Chaya hua the, Desh bhar Jhulus aur Sabhao ka Mohol tha.

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hai Bharatvarsh : Dara Shukoh
description: 30 August 1659 ko hi Mughal Sashak Shahzada ke bete Dara shuko ki uske hi bhai aurangzeb ne hatya karwa di thi, ye saltanat  par kabje ki khuni jang ki romachak kahani hain.

title: How India can avoid Sri Lanka Crisis?
description: Sri Lanka mein aaj Halaat bahut kharab bane huye hai, Sri Lanka Sabse bade Crisis se guzar raha hai, Sri Lanka aur China ki dosti bhi bahut news mein bani hui hai jismein China ka fayda saaf saaf dikh raha hai. Is show mein aaj aise kuch anjaan sawalon ko samjhenge jaise, Sri Lanka mein Crisis kyu aaya? Iski kya vajah thi aur kaun Zimmedar hai iske liye? Aur India ek padosi desh hone ke naate Sri Lanka ki kaise madad kar sakta hai? Aaiye jaante hain.

title: Mansarovar Aahuti
description: Munshi Premchand  Ki Likhi Novel "Mansarovar Aahuti" Bharteey samaaj ka aaina hai. Jismein kaise shahri logon aur gaanv ke logon ke rahne aur nature mein antar hai ye bataya gya hai. Aap ke liye Kuku fm le aaya hai is novel ki Audiobook. Jo dikhati hai aapko hamare samaj ki sachchai.

title: अन्तर्द्वन्द्व
description:
अंतर्द्वंद्व जावेद अमर जॉन के पिछले उपन्यास ‘मास्टरमाइंड' का सीक्वल है। मास्टरमाइंड की कहानी अपने आप में सम्पूर्ण अवश्य थी पर उसकी विषय-वस्तु जो जटिलता लिये थी उसे न्याय देने के लिये एक वृहद कहानी की आवश्यकता थी और प्रस्तुत उपन्यास उसी आवश्यकता को पूर्ण करने हेतु लिखा गया है।
writer: शुभानंद
Author : Shubhanand
Voiceover Artist : RJ Hemant

title: Jeevansathi 101
description: Shaadi, Life Ka Ek Aisa Decision Hai Jis Par Hamari Aage Ki Poori Zindagi Tiki Hui Hoti Hai. Shaadi Ke Liye Sahi Partner Dhoodhna Ek Bahut Hi Mushkil Task Lagta Hai Upar Se Agar Baat Ho Arrange Marriage Ki Toh Bahut Se Log Ghabra Jaate Hain. Chaliye Jaante Hain Kaise Dhoodhe Apne Liye Sahi Life Partner.

title: जिंदगी एक एहसास
description:
It isn't easy to understand this life but I have lived every moment of it and penned down all my experiences, whether good or bad. That explains the title of the book 'Zindagi Ek Ehsaas'. "Live each day like it's your last."

Author : chaman singh
Voiceover Artist : Rj Nikhil

title: Outwitting The Devil
description: Kya kisi bhi kam ko lekar apka viswas dagmagane lagta hain? Kya nirnay lete samay ap duvidha me par jate hain ki kya kare kya na kare?To apki is duvidha ko dur karne ke liye kukufm hain. Suniye audio book 'man me hain biswas aur apne biswas ko majboot banaiye taki behtar pradarshan kar paye.

title: हमसफ़र जिंदगी
description: Ye kahani 2 pyar karne walon ke pyar, unke jajbaat, samaj ki soch aur ladkiyon ke sath ho rahe anyay ki hai. Ye kahani hai ek aisi ladki ki jiski khud ki jindagi to andhere me doobti rahi lekin usne doosron ki zindagi ko roshan karna seekha. Ye kahani hai 2 alag alag insaano ki jinki soch to bilkul nahi milti thi lekin dil mil gae. Ye kahani hai Roshni aur Vineet ki jinke naam me "ni" shabd ke alawa kuchh nahi milta tha.

title: पवित्र बंधन
description: Do dost na chahte hue bhi shadi karte hain, fir khushi khushi ek doosre ko talaak bhi de dete hain. Sirf isliye ki unme se kisi ek ka pyar mukammal ho sake. Par kya jaisa wo sochte hain, aisa ho pata hai?

title: लव यू माँ
description: Rohit, hamesha apni patni Minakshi ki hi baato par hi yakeen karta tha. Usne kabhi bhi apni maa ke dil ki baat ko  na jana aur na kabhi yakeen kiya. Minakshi aoni saas ko pareshan karne me koi kasar nahin chhodti thi. Dono hi hamesha boodhi maa ko hamesha khari-khoti sunate rahte hain. Ant me Rohit maa ko wridhhashram chhod aata hai aur jab use apni galti ka ehsaas hota hai, tab tal bahut der ho chuki hoti hai. Yah kahani apki ankhon ko nam kar degi.

title: वाया गुड़गांव
description: Mahendra aur Suman ek Dusre ko Chhatein hei, Aur haryana ke bedas dharti par iska Matlab bahut kuch hone waala tha, Akhir unka pyaar kissi Anjam par pahuchayenge aur kese Kese Pahuchange? Padhiye Dusyant Ke Dilchasp Upanyas mein

title: Kya Court Se Bahar Bhi Nyaay Mil Sakta Hai?
description: Taarikh pe taarikh, Taarikh pe taarikh!  Hum sabhi jante hai ki Bharat ke judicial system mein pehle hi lakho cases ki files padi hai aur roz hazaaron nayi darj hoti hai. Aise mein waqt lagna toh jayaz hai. Magar kya quick, fast aur kam rupayo mein kisi dispute ka hal nikal sakta hai? Kaunsi aisi bodies hai jinki madad se hum nyaay ke darwaze alag raston se bhi khatkhata sakte hai? Aaiye jante hai

title: Increasing Human Efficiency In Business
description:
A book for increasing your efficiency in business.
Recited by rj karan Sharma

title: Undisputed Melody Queen Ashaji
description: Dil cheez kya hai gane ki recording ke dauran kyon Khyyan Saheb se sahmat nahin thi Ashaji. Jab Ashaji ki zyada fee se dare producers aur Shammi Kapoor ne diya Ashaji ka sath. Jab Gulzar Saheb ke likhe gane ko RD ne kiya reject aur fir wahi gana bana evergreen jo gana koi nahi ga sakta tha, RD Wahi gana Aasha ji se gavate the. Kyon nikala master ne school se Lataji aur Ashaji ko. Ashaji aur RD Barman ke beech kis baat ko lekar hoti thi nokjhok.

title: How to Become A Pro in Fortnite
description: Aaj gaming Industry boom pe hai, covid ke baad se ye market aur garm ho gaya hai, Pubg aur Fortnite abhi ke time ke sabse best games hai jinhe worldwide khela jata hai. Fortnite mein pro banne ke liye aapko Fundamentals, Tips aur Tricks ki knowledge honi chahiye is series mein aap Fortnite ki Interesting Story ke sath sath isme pro banne ka tarika bhi seekh sakte hai.

title: Is it a Good Strategy or a Bad Strategy?
description: Kisi bhi bade target ko achieve kaise kiya jata hai? Kya sirf hard work karke hum life mein successful ban sakte hai? Lekin agar aisa hota toh kheton mein din raat mehnat karne wala har kisan ameer hota, magar aisa hai nahi. Toh aisa kya karte hain successful log? Aaiye jaante hain.

title: Dating Tips 101
description: All about dating

title: Money hai to Honey Hai
description: Munaafe ki baat sabko acchi lagti hai kyunki munaafe se aata hai paisa. Aisi hi kuch munaafe ke paath aapko seekhne milenge iss audiobook se. Toh sunte rahiye aur profit ka anand uthate rahiye

title: How to Manage a Long Distance Relationship?
description: Kehte hain ki jab rishton ki jadein mazboot ho toh kisi tarah ki doori mayne nahi rakhti hai. Ye statement kis hadd tak sahi hai? Kya ye kaafi hai? Kya trust, insecurity, closeness par doori ka asar nahi padta? Relationship bas apne partners se nahi hoti, balki hamare parents, in-laws, friends se bhi hoti hai. Kaise rakhein in relationships ko doori ke bawajood bhi mazboot? Chaliye jaane. Agar aapko "The Seven Principles of Making Marriage Work" jaisi books pasand hain to ye audiobook zaroor sunein.

title: 4 Din kaam baaki aaram
description:
The 4-Hour Workweek: Escape 9–5, Live Anywhere and Join the New Rich is a self-help book by Timothy Ferriss, an American writer, educational activist, and entrepreneur. The book has spent more than four years on The New York Times Best Seller List, has been translated into 40 languages and has sold more than 2.1 million copies worldwide. It deals with what Ferriss refers to as "lifestyle design" and repudiates the traditional "deferred" life plan in which people work grueling hours and take few vacations for decades and save money in order to relax after retirement.

So, goo ahead and give a listen to this coursebook.

title: College Dropout - Arabpatiyon ki prerak kahaniyaan
description: Ek esi audiobook jisme duniya main naam aur paisa kamane vale businessman ki kahani hai. Unki shuruwat, tarakki jo ki sabke liye naya tha aur sabhi ko uss cheez ki jarurat thi, in logon ne kaise limited resources mein maximum karake dikhaya. Khas baat yeah rahi ki yeah sab colleges ya school dropout hain. Jihone esa kuch kar dikhaya ki ab kitabe inke bare mein duniya ko batati hain. Bill Gates se lekar David Murdock tak ki kahani hai.

title: बारह मील दूर
description:
बारह मील दूर 
writer: जे.जे. नंदीग्राम
Voiceover Artist : RJ Swati
Author : J J Nandigram

title: Fight Like Yuvi
description: Hum zindagi mein 9 se 5 ke job mein hi itne thak jaate hai aur apne life se itni asaani se give up kar dete hai. Par iss player ne apne career ke utaar chadhaav ke saath saath Cancer jaisi bimaari ko maat diya aur bangaye Cricket ke Prince. Aaiye experience karte hai inki life story sirf Kuku FM par

title: Mithali Raj - Born To Bat
description: 2017 ke baad Women's Cricket ko India mein bohot viewership mili hai par uske pehle se Indian Women's Cricket team ki flag bearer reh chuki hai Mithali Raj. 16 year old ne apne debut match mein hi 114 runs banaye the. Aaiye sunte hai issi fearless cricketer ki setbacks, sweat, tears and India ke liye Cricket khelne ke junoon ko

title: The Indestructible - Mirabai Chanu
description: Mira Bai Chanu ek aisa naam hai jo sirf ladkiyon ke liye hi nahi ladko ke liye bhi ek inspiration hai. Ek Chhote se shehar se nikal kar Mira kaise India ke liye Gold jeet ke lekar aayi aur is jeet ke peeche ki struggle ki poori story aapko is show me sunne ko milegi, to bina time waste kiye shuru karte hai.

title: मेरे सपने मेरा गाँव
description:
मेरे सपने मेरा गाँव
writer: ओमेश्वरी 'नूतन'
Voiceover Artist : Ruby Pareek
Author : Omeshwari 'Nootan'

title: Paper Money to Plastic Money
description: Aaj ke waqt mein hum aur aap pure din mein ek baar to apne sabzi wale ya dudh wale se ye zaroor kehte hain ki bhaiya Cash to nahi hai aap Online hi payment lelo, Shayad aapne bhi last time payment online hi ki hogi lekin kya aapne kabhi ye socha hai ki jo payment aap karte hain uska pura process kaise chalta hai? Is payment ke process mein kitne log aur kya technology involved hoti hogi? Aur aakhir ye payment app waale paise kaise kamate honge? Kahin aage chal kar koi bada scam to nahi hoga? In sabhi sawalon ke jawaab ke liye Suniye humara ye Audio show “Paper Money to Plastic Money”.

title: कलम से हत्या
description: पत्रकारिता के झोल, पुलिस विभाग की बहादुरी और एक लव स्टोरी का मिश्रण है ये पुस्तक।

title: माँ के आँसू
description:
Maa ke Aansoo एक सामाजिक उपन्यास है 
Author : Umesh Pandit "Utpal"
Voiceover Artist : Sikha Singh

title: Prerit Karne Ke Mission Par Agrasar
description: Aajkal Hum Kaam Ki Jis Jaldbaazi Mein Rehte Hain Uske Beech Inspiration Aur Motivation Dhoodhne Ka Na Toh Hamare Pas Time Hai Aur Na Hi Himmat. Ye Audiobook Aapko Apne Har Ek Chapter Ke Zariye Zindagi Ke Alag Alag Rang Dikhaegi Aur Aapko Positivity Se Bhar Degi. Chaliye Sunte Hain Chhoti Chhoti Motivational Kahaniya Aur Koshish Karte Hain Zindagi Ko Aur Jyada Zindadilli Ke Saath Jeene Ki.

title: Aatma Samman Kyun Aur Kaise Badhayein
description: Aatma Samman ke bina ek vyakti jeevit laash ki tarah hota hai isiliye har ek vyakti ke liye Aatma Samman banaye rakhna bahut zaroori hai. Lekin hum isko banaye rakhne mein safal kyon nahi hain? Shayad humein iska sahi tareeka nahi pata hai. Jo is audiobook mein lekhak Narendra Nath Chaturvedi ne ekdam saralta aur gambheerta se samjhaya hai. Jisko samajhne ke baad hum apne Aatma Samman ko banaye rakh kar sukhi jeevan jee sakte hain.

title: How to Breast Feed Your Baby
description: Kya aap jaanate hain ki 70% Indian women find breastfeeding a challenge, Jaha ek taraf world breastfeeding week manaya jaata hai toh doosari taraf aaj bhi public main breastfeed karana ek taboo hai, aaj bhi humare working spaces main lactating mothers ke liye koi infrastructure hai he nahi.  Breastfeeding is a painless and enjoyable process. Aur aap isse na dare isiliye hum aapke liye laaye hai yeh exclusive show joh aapke saare sawaalon ke jawaab de dega. Toh suniye yeh amazing audio series 'How to Breast Feed Your Baby' sirf KUKU FM par.

title: एक कहानी यह भी
description: Ulhaas se bhari Suhana Mausam mei Kante ki Khubne ne Namit ko Uska beeta hua Kaal Yaad dila diya, aur Namita apne jivan ke beete huie pal mein Gauth lagane lagi.

title: शाही शिकार
description: Chunav me bete ki haar ki ghoshna ki raat Maharaja Vikramjeet Singh ki maut ho gayi. Pahli nazar me yah atmahatya lag rahi thi, lekin Thanedar ke man me aisa kuchh th jo ise manane ko tayyar nahi tha

title: कालभुजंग
description: Block Head aur Read Head ek esa group hei, jyo apni shaktiyo badne ke liye insaano ki Bali dete hei. Lekin Inn dono ke bich tesra ek aisa Shenshah hota hei kalbhujang jyo, apni badshahat ko zinda karna chahta hei. Inn teen kali shaktiyo ke chakar mei ek baar ek insaan mohra ban jaata hei.  Inspector Shamsher in takaton se ladte hei. kya woh apne iss misssion mei kamyab ho payenge? Jane ke liye suniye rahasya aur romanchak se bhari kahani Kalbhujang.

title: Indra Nooyi
description:
Indra Nooyi ke safalta ko duniya ke har akhbaar aur vyapar patrika ne chart kiya hai, lekin hum mein se kitne log chhavi ke peeche ke vyakti ko jaante hai? Ye biography hume Nooyi ke jeevan, unke bachpan ke vikalpon, unke dwara kiye gaye sangharshon aur shikhar par pohochne ke dauran unke dwara seekhe gaye sabak ke baare mein batayegi ki aakhir Nooyi ne ye kaise kiya? Unki prerna kya thi? Duniya mein dusra sabse bada khadya aur pey vyavsaay chalane ke dauran uaayi chunautiya ka saamna karte hue ghar aur chulha kaise sambhala? 
Aaiye, jaane!

title: FIFA Scandals
description: Jab 2018 aur 2022 FIFA ki hosting rights Russia aur Qatar ko mile tab se hi FIFA shak ke daayre mein raha hai.Aur jab 2015 mein FIFA ke 7 officials ko corruption ke charges mein arrest kiya gaya toh cheezein saaf hone lagi. Migrant labours ki maut se le kar homophobic comments tak bahut se daag hai FIFA World Cup par. Jaane kab aur kaise FIFA par lage corruption ke charges?

title: गुजरा हूँ जिधर से
description:
गुज़रा हूँ जिधर से कविता संग्रह
Voiceover Artist : RJ Nitin
Author : Tejpal Singh ' Tej'

title: अनचाहा रिश्ता
description: kaie bar ek majburi kab ek vardaan mei tabdil ho jaati hei, pata hi nahi chalta. Suniye ki kese yaha Anchaha rishta kese ek khubsurat mood leta hei.

title: तूंफ़ाँ की ज़द में
description:
तूंफ़ाँ की ज़द में Poetry
Voiceover Artist : Shreya Awasthi
Author : Tejpal Singh ' Tej'

title: फिर वही
description: Vineeta aur Alok pyar ki madhoshi me us manjil tak pahuch jate hain, jahaan unhe hosh nahin rahta. Lekin Alok ne is bhool ko khubsurati ke sath sanwar liya aur dono ne apni duniya basai. Jab unka beta Gunjan bada hua, to itihas ne ek baar fir apne aap ko dohraya, par naye jamane ka Gunjan Alok ki tarah jimmedar aur wafadar nahin tha. Usne Linda ke sath pyar ka natak kiya aur badnami ke mod par lakar chhod diya. Kya Linda ne haar maan li? Kya Gunjan use apnaega? Aaj ke yuva jeevan me mulyon ke badalte mayne ko pesh karti hai yah upanyas.

title: How to Choose Your Career?
description: Kya aap khud ke liye ya apne bachhe ke liye ek achhe career ki talash mein hain? Ek aisa career jiske raaste par chalne ke baad kabhi regret na ho? Toh abhi is audiobook ko suniye aur apne dream career ko select kar lijiye. Ye audiobook naye-puraane, har tarah ke careers ke liye ek ultimate guide hai jismein har field ki detailed information ke sath usmein safalta hasil karne ka roadmap hai. Yaad rakhiye sahi career selection yaani successful future ki guarantee.

title: Kaise de Bacche ke Mushkil Sawalon ke Jawab?
description: Kya aapke bacche ke kai sawal aise hote hai jiske jawab aapke paas hote hain lekin aap ye nahi samajh paate ki ise bacche ko kaise samjhayein? Bacchon ke awkward sawalon ko daat-phatkaar kar chup karaya jaaye ya unki curiosity ko shaant karaya jaaye? Seekhein parenting ka sabse mushkil task is show mein!

title: Smriti Mandhana: From Sangli to Stardom
description: Kya aapko pata hai ki kaise India ki top performing women’s cricketer Smriti Mandhana ne  Sangli naam ke chhote sheher se nikal kar  bade-bade khiladiyon ke saath muqabla kiya aur international cricket mein ek khaas pehchaan banayi? Agar nahi toh abhi suniye KUKU FM ka ye original show. Smriti ki ye kahani aaapko batayegi ki zindagi ke us mauke par jab aapko lagta hai ki aap haar chuke hain toh kaise usko aasani se jeet mein badla ja sakta hai.

title: Anupam Kher Prastut Karte Hain Bharatvarsh- Prithviraj Chauhan
description: Ye bharatvarsh ke sabse romantic prem kahani ko ek jhalak hai. Sanyogita aur Prithviraj ki prem kahani, jisme rajkumari ne raja ke putale ko hi varmala pahna kar apna var ghoshit kar diya. Is swayanvar ne na sirf prem kahani ko janma diya, balki kehte hai ki Bharat ke itihas ko hamesha ke liye badal kar rakh diya.

title: Indira Gandhi | Writer - Junaid Choudhary
description: Indira Priyadarshini Gandhiek bharatiya Rajniti aur Bharatiya Rashtriya Congress ki ek kendriya sakshiyat thi.Woh Bharat ki pehli aur ajtak ki ekmatra mahila pradhanmantri thi.Indira Gandhi pehae pradhan mantri Jawaharlal Nehru ke beti thi. Janiye Indira Gandhi ke bare mein is audiobook mein.

title: Gita Gyaan aur Cricketers ki Kahaniyaan
description: Bhagvad Geeta ke aadarsh aur sidhaant hum jaane anjaane mein follow karte hai. Aise hi kuch seekh ko azmaaye hai humaare kuch famous cricketers mein. Kaise? Aaiye sunte hai iss audio show mein

title: How To Make Your Baby Sleep
description: Bache ho ya bade, ek acchi neend sabke liye zaruri hai, Khaas kar newborn babies ke liye. Lekin bahut baar bachon ko neend aane mein pareshani hoti hai ya der raat tak unhe neend nahi aati ya to wo subah jaldi uth jaate hain jisse hum bhi pareshan ho jaate hain. Par aap chinta mat kijiye, agar aap janna chahte hain ki baby ki neend ka khayal kaise rakha jaaye ? To Suniye yeh audiobook jisme hum kuch tips ke baare mein jaan ne ki koshish karenge jo aapko ek accha parent banne mein helpful rahegi

title: Your friendship guide
description: How to Win Friends and Influence People, 1936 mein prakashit  Dale Carnegie dvara likhit ek swa-sahayata pustak hai. duniya bhar mein 30 million se adhik copies bik chuke hain, jisse yeh ab tak ke sabse adhik bikne wale pustakon mein se ek ban gayi hai. 2011 mein Time Magazine ke 100 sabse prabhavashali kitabon ke suchi mein yah 19 number par tha. Iske audio coursebook abhi sunen!

title: Rahul Dravid
description: Unka naam unke sanyamit ballebaji aur unke shant dimag ke liye jana jata hai. Yeh bharatiya cricket ke sabse kharab daur mein bhi majboot rahe. kebal kukufm par suniye unke jiban ke bare mein।

title: Stan Lee : The man who created Super Heroes
description: Duniya ke koi bhi ek Comic book creator ka naam bataiye? aur aapke man me sirf ek he naam ata hai aur wo hai "The MAN" yaani " STAN LEE ". Spiderman , Iron man , Thor, Black panther jaise kai Super Heroes ko Banane wale Lee,  Jab bhi Movie me 10 second ke liye bhi aate hai tab unke fans taaliyaan bajane se thakte nahi, Chaliye Jante hai Marvel studios ke main Hero Stan Lee aur unki super heroes ki army ke baare me iss audiobook me

title: Kyun Hota hai Motapa
description: Kyu hota hai Motapa

title: The Epic Rise And Fall Of WeWork
description: We Work, ek coworking space jo itni popularity ke bawajood struggle se hote hui guzri hai. Magar aaj bhi standard bilkul kam nahi hua. Kya hai iski kahani? Kaise build kiya gaya ise? jaanenge We Work is rise or fall ke baare mein is audiobook mein

title: Bhagat Singh | Writer - Dr. Rajesh Mishra
description: Bhagat Singh ek Bharatiya Samajbadi Krantikari the,Jinki Bhara3t mein agrezo ke khilaf natakiya hissa  aur 23 saal ki umra mein fansi ki  saja  ne unhe  bharatiya swatantrata andolon ka lok nayak bana diya. Is audiobbok mein jane Bhagat singh ke jivan ke bareim mein kuch mahatwapurna batein.

title: Sunil Gavaskar - Theth Madhyam Warg ke Nayak
description:
क्रिकेट का खेल गावस्कर के परिवार में शामिल था. गावस्कर के पापा मनोहर एक क्लब लेवल के ठीक-ठाक खिलाड़ी थे जो अपने ऑफिस के लिए खेला करते थे. गावस्कर की मां मीनल भी गावस्कर की शुरूआती क्रिकेट की तालीम का हिस्सा रहीं. पढ़िए राजदीप सरदेसाई की जबानी क्रिकेट की कहानी|
writer: राजदीप सरदेसाई
Voiceover Artist : Ashish Jain
Script Writer : Rajdeep Sardesai

title: छोटी सरपंच -
description:
शहर में पढ़ी लिखी लड़की, पिछड़े गांव के माहौल को किस तरह आधुनिक बनाती है। किस तरह वो गांव पर राज कर रहे, सरपंच का सच गांव के सामने लेकर आती है।
Author : Prateek Saxena
Voiceover Artist : Shrikant Sinha

title: The US-India Nuclear Deal
description: India Ko Nuclear Energy Sector mein strong banane ke liye India Ke saamne kai saare challenges the jaise Oppositiion parties, NPT Deal aur bhi bahut kuch. Jinko face karte hue India Ne Kaise america se nuclear deal ko poora kiya aur Isme konse Politicians aur Scientist ne apna Yogdaan diya. Yeh Sabkuch apko is Audiobook “The US- India Nuclear Deal” mein Janne ko Milega sirf Kuku FM par.

title: रुद्रवीरा
description: Ek ladki Jungke mei buri tarah ghayal aavasta hei saavarm ko milti hei. Ilaaj hone par pata chalta hei ki uski yaadash chali gaie hei...Kya yeh sach hei? Aachanak Savarm par jaanleva hamla hota hei...Kya yeh hamla uss ladki se juda heu?? Uss ladki ki kya hei sachaie? Rahasya aur romanchak se bhar pur sunne kahani Rudraveer

title: Champions of 83
description: 83 mein betting karne waale bhi 66:1 offer kar rahe the for India winning the worldcup. Saare odds ke khilaap ladke, Kapil Dev ki inspirational captaincy ne India ko apna pehla Worldcup dila hi diya. Aaiye sunte hai Underdogs se Worldcup ke lions banne ka yeh safar.

title: सीखिए physicalऔर mental fitness
description: अपने जीवन में physical fitness के साथ साथ mental fitness होना बोहोत जरूरी ह।  जानिए कैसे एक party animal बना fitness trainer, और करीब से सुनिए उसकी spiritual journey

title: Rise of ESports in India
description: India me humesha bachho ne suna hai ke "Games khelna bandh kar ,  isse pet nahi bharega ". lekin aaj Esports industry aaj $1.08 billion ki ban chuki hai aur 2024 tak $1.62 billion ki ban jayegi. India me bhi Gaming & Esports ek booming industry hai jo ek achha career option ban sakta hai. to chaliye Sunte hai . India me Esports & Gaming ka growth kaise humare youth ko global level recognition dega.

title: नवजीवन
description: Kabhi Chandni se saj jata, adbhut hriday padal sansaar. Fir sahsa kuchh aisa hota, na rukti bahti ashrudhar..

title: Prince Of Kolkata - Sourav Ganguly
description: Sourav Ganguly ka jeevan utaar-chadhav se bhara raha hai. India ke greatest captain, jisne team ko aatma-vishwas diya, firse sakriya kiya aur Bharat ko pehli baar shaandar videshi jeet dilyai. Lekin Ganguly ki kahani bhi badi chunautiyon ke saath aayi, apne shuruwati dino se jaha unhe team mein shaamil hone ke liye 4 saal ka intezaar karna pada. Kyun? Aaiye jaane

title: Aapki Kismat Ke Taale Ki Chabi
description: Hum aksar apne failure ko badluck bolke sochte hain ki humara kuch nahi ho paayega. Is Original show ko sunne ke baad aapko samajh mein aayega ki hum apna luck khud hi bana sakte hain aur apne luck ko apne tareeqe se use bhi kar sakte hain. humara luck aur koi nahi sirf hum hi apni qismat ko banate hain. to chaliye shuru karte hain apni Qismat ko unlock karne ke safar ko.

title: Strategies To Prevent Next Pandemic
description: Covid -19 ek virus jisne puri duniya ko hilakar rakh diya tha aur abhi bhi duniya bhar mein scientist use samjhne aur usse pichha chhudane ki koshish kar rahe hai aur aage ki aise mahamari ko kaise roka jaye ispe research kar rahe hai. Par kya isse roka ja sakta hai ? Bill Gates ka maan na hai ki aisi mahamari ko roka ja sakta hai. Par kaise ? Janiye iss audio book mein

title: Dinner With Adventure
description: Hum sabko lagta hai na ki khana banana bahut hi tough kaam hai. Kabhi-Kabhi to aisa lagta hai ki bas koi khana banane ko na khe aur chahe jo karwa le. Khaskar din bhar thak kar office se ghar aane ka baad. Lekin khana to banana hi padta hai na boss. kab tak bahar ka kahyenge. Isiliye hum aapki is samsya ka ilaaz laaye hain aur vo hai ye show "Dinner With Adventure". jiski madad se aap aasani se badhiya khana bhi bana sakte hain aur chahein to ise apna passion bhi bana sakte hain.

title: रील दुनिया की असली राजकुमारी वहीदा रहमान
description: Wah abhinetri jiske deewane hue Gurudutt, Sheesha kyon dekhti rehti thi Wahida, Kyon badalna padta tha Wahida ji ke dance teacher ko apna shahr, Kaisi thi Wahida Rehman ki pahli mulakat Gurudutt ke sath, Kyon lad padti thi sound recordist se Wahida Rehman, Wahida Rehman ko bhi offer hue the relieving kapde, Sirf Wahida Rehman ko tha bharosa Pyasa ke superhit hone ka, Wahida Rehman ki secret dost, Wahida ji ko sher yaad nahi rehte to dialogue kaise, Wahida ji ka acting mantra.

title: मुनमुन
description: Munmum actor ban ne ka sapna le kar pahuchti hai aisi jagah jahi uski taskeeri ho jaati hai. Use phek diya jaata hai ek aise kamre mein jis se ladki ya to kisi mard ki jismaani pyaas bujhaane nikalti hai ya kisi kothe mein bikne ke liye. Munmun ki saahas ki kahani sune sirf KUKU FM par.

title: हादसों के दौर में
description:
हादसों के दौर में Poetry
Voiceover Artist : Shreya Awasthi
Author : Tejpal Singh ' Tej'

title: Abhi-Neta
description: Rajneeti ki baazi aur takht kab palat jaye ye andaza koi nahi laga sakta aur uske liye sari political party alag alag daav-pench aazmati hai, agar popularity badhani ho to aise Abhineta ko bhi “Neta” banana padta hai, to chaliye jante hai India ke Celebrities ki kahani jo Abhineta se Neta bane.

title: Age Is Just A Number featuring Dev Anand
description: Dev Anand ka janma 26 september 1923 ko Punjab ke gurudaspur zille ki shakargarh tehsil mein hua tha.Unke pita Gurudaspur nyaylay mein  bade bakil the.unhonne 1949 mein apane bade bhai chetan anand ke saath navaketan films ke sah-sthaapana ke. janiye legendary bollywood actor Dev Anand ke bare kukufm mein .

title: गुरु दत्त जिन्हें दुनिया समझ न सकी
description: Jab bhi top 10 filmo ki list banti hai Guru Dutt Saheb ki filme usme hoti hi hain.   Kaise bana gaana waqt ne kiya kya haseen sitam.   Jab pyasa boxoffice par fail hui tab kya hua.   Film release ke baad bhi logon ke reaction ke baad poora scene fir se shoot kiya Guru Dutt Saheb ne - Film Saheb Biwi aur Gulaam.  Gurudutt jinhen duniya samajh na saki.   Kahani Devanand aur Gurudutt saheb ki dosti ki aur Guru Dutt ke majboori me hero banne ki.  Wahida Rehman jaise bade stars ko acting ki ABC sikhane wale Director Gurudutt Saheb.

title: छोटा पैकेट बड़ा धमाका - जया बच्चन
description: Wo pahli film jisme bheed ka hissa thi Jaya Bachchan, Jaya Bachchan ka bachpan, Jaya Bachchan ko nahi pasand the filmon ke actors, Acting bhi koi seekhne ki cheez hoti hai, Kya promise kiya tha Jaya ji ne apni maa ko, Din me do baar kyon nahana chahati thi Jaya Bachchan, Mausami Chatterjee nahi kar payi film Guddi par Jaya ji ne ki, Film Zanjeer ki success party bani wajah Jaya Bhaduri aur Amitabh Bachchan ki shadi ka, Anokhi jodi Amitabh aur Jaya ki, Shahanshah thi Jaya Bachchan ki film, Shole ki shooting ke dauran Jaya Bachchan thi pregnant.

title: The Show Man Raj Kapoor
description: Raj Kapoor hindi Cinema ke sabse mahan aur sabse prabhabshali abhinetaon aur film nirmataon mein se ek the. Jahan log Cinema mein unke kirdar ke liye  ko jyaadaatar yaad karte hain, wohi Filmon ke prati unke junoon se pare unke liye aur bhi bahoot kuch hai. unke prerak kahaniyan keval kukufm par sunen.

title: How To Build Your Wedding Budget
description: Hum sab jante hai, shaadi jeevan ke sabse bade dino mein se ek hai. Har koi apni zindagi ke is din ko yaadgaar banana chahta hai. Par kya is ek din ke liye humein humari sari savings ko use karna chahiye? Ek ideal shaadi ka budget kitna hona chahiye aur kaisa hona chahiye? Hum kum kharche mein bhi kya ek acchi memorable shaadi kar sakte hain? Aur shadi ke liye pehle se paiso ki taiyari kaise kare, janiye is audiobook mein

title: Goddess of Indian Playback Singing Lata Mangeshkar_1
description: Kaun deta tha Lata ji ko zahar? Kyon Lata ji fir se Lata ke roop me janma lena nahi chahti? Jab Lataji ko bahut door se haate hue aana pada gaana record karne ke liye? Dilip Sahab ki kaun si baat ko challenge ki tarah sweekar kiya Lata ji ne? Lata ji ki kaun si iksha poori na ho pai? Lata ji ko bhi shuru me rejection mili.

title: चाय का गिलास धोने वाला बना ओमपुरी
description: Om Puri ek bharatiya abhineta the jo kayi bharatiya, pakistani, hollywood aur british filmmon mein dikhayi die the. Woh un kuch byabsayik abhinetaon mein se the, jinhone 80 ke dashak ke dauran Ardh Satya (1982), aur Mirch Masala (1986) jaise kala-ghar ke filmon mein kam kiya aur waha bhi safalata payi.  Kayi safal filmon jaise Akrosh (1980), Arohan (1982), Ghayal (1990) aur Maachis (1996) mein dikhai diye. Unhen bharat ke chauthe sarvoch nagarik puraskaar, padmashree se bhi sammanit kiya gaya tha. Unki hi barnamay jeevan ke bare janiye is audiobook se.

title: बर्फखोर हवाएं - मूल
description: Barfkhor Hawayen' kahaniyon ka sangrah hai jisme 12 chuninda kahaniyan shamil hai. Kahaniyon ki sabse badi khubi hai ki we listeners ko nirash nahin karenge. In kahaniyon me samaj, rishte, parivar, samajik sanskar, rodhiyon, seekh shamil hain, jo listeners ko unse jodta hai.

title: पीताम्बरी
description: Meena Pathak dwara likhi gai kahani sangrah Pitambari parivaar aur samajik rudhiyon ko batati hai. Jismein rishton aur sanskar ka adar bhi hai. Gaon ki khani aaj ke samaj ka pratik hai. Kuku FM per abhi sune Pitambari kahani sangrah.

title: बिग बी हर रात हॉस्टल से क्यों भाग जाते थे?
description: Pita Haribansh Rai Bachchan Ki woh ek sikh jisne Amitabh Bacchan Saheb ko Zindagi ke sabse uche makam pain lakar khara kar diya. Amitabh Bacchan Hostel se chup chup kar film dekhne ke liye jana aur phir usi industry ka Sahenshah ban jana salim khan saheb ne kabhi Salman Khan ki sifarish kyo nahi ki. Salman Khan Ko kaise mili unki career ki best film miane pyar kiya. Suniye ye sari batein only on KUKUfm par.

title: Majestic Mary Kom
description: Mary Kom 6 baar vishva amateur boxing championship jeetne vaali akeli mahila khiladi hain. Pehle 7 vishva championship mein se pratyek mein padak jeetne vaale akeli mahila mukkebaaj aur 8 World Championships padak jeetane vaali ekmaatra mukkebaaj (purush ya mahila) hain. Is audio mein aap Mary Kom ke shaandaar safar ka anubhav karenge.

title: Lionel Messi - The Legend
description: Kabhi apne Football dekha hai, ya sadak par pade kisi pathhar ko kick kiya hai?  To aapko Messi ka naam jarur pata hoga! Chaliye sunte hai Argentina ke ek bacche ki kahani jisse growth hormone ki bimari thi par fir bhi apne natural skills, talent aur mehnat se wo Football game ka Legend ban gaya.

title: Dassler Brothers : Shoe Wars
description: Bachha bachha janta hai ke "Adidas aur Puma" shoes ki best companies hai , lekin kya aapko pata hai ye company ke founder sage bhai the? Chaliye jante hai 2 bhai aur 2 brand ki rivalry ko jo ek ghar se nikal kar puri duniya fail gayi.

title: जॉनी जॉनी - वॉकर टू लीवर
description: Johnny Walker kaise bane bus conductor se filmon ke star comedian. Keshto Mukharji filmon me sirf sharabi banne wale kalakar jinhone sharab ko zindagi bhar hath nahi lagaya. Johnny Lever sadkon par pen bechne se lekar filmon tak ka safar.

title: अड़ियल
description:
ब्रु की उम्र 17 साल है और वो गुस्से में है. अदालत के आदेश पर वो थेरेपी ले रहा है, क्योंकि उसने अपनी मां तो बचाने के लिए अपने सौतेले बाप को पीट दिया था. उसे अपने दुर्व्यवहारों से मुक्त होना होगा, लेकिन क्या वो ऐसा कर पाएगा? एक आधुनिक भारतीय किशोर की परेशानियों और गुस्से का एक बेहतरीन किस्सा.
Voiceover Artist : Shreekant Sinha
Author : Kabir Mandrekar

title: The Rise Of Gorakshpeeth Gorakhpur
description: Uttar Pradesh aur yahan ka shahar Gorakhpur jo famous hai “Gorakhnath Peeth” ke liye aur famous hai yahan hone wali politics ke liye bhi. Kaise is math ke santon ne raajneeti mein kadam rakha? Kaise desh ki azadi ke liye ladayi ladi aur kaise isi math ke head Yogi Adityanath bane UP ke mukhyamnatri? Aapko Gorakshpeeth Gorakhpur ka pura itihas batane ja rahe hain is khas show The Rise Of Gorakshpeeth Gorakhpur mein.

title: मिरर मैन
description: Raghav Apni Pehli Wedding Anniversary celebrate karne ke liye Samundra ke kinare ek shandhar party rakta hei. party mei ek bhayanak saaya asmaan mei mandrane lagta hei.  Aur dekhte hi dekhte lasshe girne lagti hei....woh bhayanak Saaya Multi Kaarte ka mang karta hei, Jiske baare mei koi nahi janta. Akhir kya hei Multi Kaart ka Rahasya? Kon hei Woj saaya, jyo maut bankar aata hei? Rahasya aur Romanchak se bhari Iss kahani ka anand lene ke liye Sunne KUKU FM

title: Interesting Journey of Dada Muni Ashok Kumar
description: Kumudlal Ganguly, jinhen unke manch naam ashok kumaar se behatar jaana jaata hai aur jinhen daadaamuni bhee kaha jaata hai, ek bhaaratiya film abhineta the, jinhonne bharatiya cinema mein pratishthit sthiti praapt kee aur jo  gaanguly parivaar ke sadasy the. is audiobook mein unke bare janiye keval kukufm par.

title: Sreesanth: The Controversial Cricketer
description: Sreesanth ek waqt par Indian cricket team ka kafi bada naam jo ab apni game se jyada apni controversies ke liye jana jata hai. Par kaise thi Sreesanth ki cricket journey aur kyon bane wo ek famous controversy king. Ye sab aap sunoge hamare iss khas show main, to chaliye shuru karte hain, Sreesanth jo janna.
